Text

[I]0-i want to speak about bodies changed into new forms . [You]1445-you , [gods]1446-gods , since [you]1445-you are [the ones who alter these , and all other things]1447-the ones who alter these , and all other things , inspire [my]0-i attempt , and spin out a continuous thread of words , from [the world]1448-the world 's first origins to [my]0-i own time . Before there was [earth]1449-earth or [sea]1450-sea or the sky that covers everything , Nature appeared the same throughout [the whole world]1451-the whole world : what [we]1452-we call chaos : a raw confused mass , nothing but inert matter , badly combined discordant atoms of things , confused in the one place . There was [no Titan]1453-no titan yet , shining [his]1453-no titan light on [the world]1448-the world , or waxing Phoebe renewing [her]1455-her white horns , or the earth hovering in surrounding air balanced by [her]1455-her own weight , or watery Amphitrite stretching out [her]1455-her arms along [the vast shores of [the world]1448-the world]1456-the vast shores of the world . Though there was [land]1458-land and [sea]1450-sea and air , it was [unstable land , unswimmable water , air needing light]1460-unstable land , unswimmable water , air needing light . Nothing retained its shape , one thing obstructed another , because in the one body , cold fought with heat , moist with dry , soft with hard , and weight with weightless things .

This conflict was ended by [a god]1461-a god and [a greater order of nature]1462-a greater order of nature , since [he]1461-a god split off [the earth]1463-the earth from the sky , and [the sea]1464-the sea from [the land]1465-the land , and divided the transparent heavens from the dense air . When [he]1461-a god had disentangled the elements , and freed [them]1466-them from the obscure mass , [he]1461-a god fixed them in separate spaces in harmonious peace . The weightless fire , that forms the heavens , darted upwards to make its home in the furthest heights . Next came air in lightness and place . [Earth]1-earth , heavier than either of these , drew down the largest elements , and was compressed by its own weight . The surrounding water took up the last space and enclosed [the solid world]1467-the solid world . When [whichever god it]1468-whichever god it was had ordered and divided the mass , and collected it into separate parts , [he]1461-a god first gathered [the earth]1463-the earth into a great ball so that it was uniform on all sides . Then [he]1461-a god ordered the seas to spread and rise in waves in the flowing winds and pour around [the coasts of [the encircled land]1471-the encircled land]1470-the coasts of the encircled land . [He]1461-a god added [springs]1472-springs and [standing pools]1473-standing pools and [lakes]1474-lakes , and contained in shelving banks the widely separated rivers , some of which are swallowed by [the earth itself]1475-the earth itself , others of which reach [the sea]1464-the sea and entering [the expanse of open waters beat against coastlines]1477-the expanse of open waters beat against coastlines instead of [riverbanks]1478-riverbanks . [He]1461-a god ordered [the plains]1479-the plains to extend , [the valleys]1480-the valleys to subside , leaves to hide the trees , [stony mountains]1481-stony mountains to rise : and just as the heavens are divided into two zones to the north and two to the south , with a fifth and hotter between them , so [the god]1482-the god carefully marked out [the enclosed matter]1483-the enclosed matter with the same number , and described as [many regions on [the earth]1463-the earth]1484-many regions on the earth . [The equatorial zone]1486-the equatorial zone is too hot to be habitable ; the two poles are covered by deep snow ; and [he]1461-a god placed [two regions]1487-two regions between and gave [them]1487-two regions a temperate climate mixing heat and cold . Air overhangs them , heavier than fire by as much as water ’s weight is lighter than [earth]1449-earth . There [he]1461-a god ordered the clouds and vapours to exist , and thunder to shake the minds of [human beings]1489-human beings , and winds that create lightning - bolts and flashes . [[The world]1448-the world ’s maker]1491-the world ’s maker did not allow these , either , to possess the air indiscriminately ; as it is they are scarcely prevented from tearing [the world]1448-the world apart , each with its blasts steering a separate course : like the discord between [brothers]1493-brothers . [Eurus]495-eurus , [the east wind]1494-the east wind , drew back to [the realms of [Aurora]569-aurora]1495-the realms of aurora , to [Nabatea]3-nabatea , [Persia]4-persia , and the heights under the morning light : Evening , and [the coasts that cool in the setting sun]1496-the coasts that cool in the setting sun , are close to [Zephyrus]496-zephyrus , the west wind . [Chill Boreas]497-boreas , the north wind , seized [Scythia]5-scythia and the seven stars of [the Plough]6-the plough : while the south wind , Auster , drenches [the lands]1497-the lands opposite with incessant clouds and rain . Above these [he]1461-a god placed the transparent , weightless heavens free of [the dross of earth]1498-the dross of earth . [He]1461-a god had barely separated out everything within fixed limits when the constellations that had been hidden for a long time in dark fog began to blaze out throughout the whole sky . And so that [no region]1499-no region might lack [its]1499-no region own animate beings , the stars and the forms of [gods]1446-gods occupied the floor of [heaven]1501-heaven , [the sea]1464-the sea gave a home to the shining fish , [earth]1449-earth took the wild animals , and the light air flying things .

As yet there was no animal capable of higher thought that could be ruler of all the rest . Then [Humankind]1504-humankind was born . Either [the creator god]1505-the creator god , source of [a better world]1506-a better world , seeded it from the divine , or [the newborn earth just drawn from the highest heavens]1507-the newborn earth just drawn from the highest heavens still contained fragments related to the skies , so that [Prometheus]498-prometheus , blending them with streams of rain , moulded them into an image of [the all - controlling gods]1508-the all - controlling gods . While other animals look downwards at the ground , [he]498-prometheus gave [human beings]1489-human beings an upturned aspect , commanding [them]1489-human beings to look towards the skies , and , upright , raise [their]1489-human beings face to the stars . So [the earth]1463-the earth , that had been , a moment ago , uncarved and imageless , changed and assumed the unknown shapes of [human beings]1489-human beings .

This was the Golden Age that , without coercion , without laws , spontaneously nurtured the good and the true . There was no fear or punishment : there were no threatening words to be read , fixed in bronze , no crowd of suppliants fearing [the judge]1512-the judge ’s face : [they]1489-human beings lived safely without protection . No pine tree felled in [the mountains]1513-the mountains had yet reached the flowing waves to travel to [other lands]1514-other lands : [human beings]1489-human beings only knew [[their]1489-human beings own shores]1516-their own shores . There were no steep ditches surrounding [towns]1517-towns , no straight war - trumpets , no coiled horns , no swords and helmets . Without the use of [armies]1518-armies , [people]1519-people passed [their]1519-people lives in gentle peace and security . [The earth]1463-the earth [herself]1463-the earth also , freely , without the scars of ploughs , untouched by hoes , produced everything from [herself]1463-the earth . Contented with food that grew without cultivation , [they]1489-human beings collected mountain strawberries and the fruit of the strawberry tree , wild cherries , blackberries clinging to the tough brambles , and acorns fallen from [Jupiter]499-jupiter ’s spreading oak - tree . Spring was eternal , and gentle breezes caressed with warm air the flowers that grew without being seeded . Then [the untilled earth]1521-the untilled earth gave of [its]1521-the untilled earth produce and , without needing renewal , [the fields]1522-the fields whitened with heavy ears of corn . Sometimes rivers of milk flowed , sometimes streams of nectar , and golden honey trickled from the green holm oak .

When [Saturn]500-saturn was banished to gloomy [Tartarus]7-tartarus , and [Jupiter]499-jupiter ruled [the world]1448-the world , then came [the people of the age of silver that is inferior to gold]1524-the people of the age of silver that is inferior to gold , more valuable than yellow bronze . [Jupiter]499-jupiter shortened spring ’s first duration and made the year consist of four seasons , winter , summer , changeable autumn , and brief spring . Then parched air first glowed white scorched with the heat , and ice hung down frozen by the wind . Then [houses]1525-houses were first made for shelter : before that [homes]1526-homes had been made in [caves]1527-caves , and dense thickets , or under branches fastened with bark . Then seeds of corn were first buried in the long furrows , and bullocks groaned , burdened under the yoke .

Third came [the people of the bronze age , with fiercer natures , readier to indulge in savage warfare , but not yet vicious]1528-the people of the bronze age , with fiercer natures , readier to indulge in savage warfare , but not yet vicious . The harsh iron age was last . Immediately every kind of wickedness erupted into this age of baser natures : truth , shame and honour vanished ; in [their]1489-human beings place were fraud , deceit , and trickery , violence and pernicious desires . [They]1489-human beings set sails to the wind , though as yet [the seamen]1529-the seamen had poor knowledge of [their]1529-the seamen use , and [the ships]1530-the ships ’ keels that once were trees standing amongst [high mountains]5782-high mountains , now leaped through uncharted waves . [The land that was once common to [all]5784-all , as the light of the sun is , and the air]5783-the land that was once common to all , as the light of the sun is , and the air , was marked out , to [its]5783-the land that was once common to all , as the light of the sun is , and the air furthest boundaries , by [wary surveyors]5785-wary surveyors . Not only did [they]1489-human beings demand the crops and the food the rich soil owed [them]1489-human beings , but [they]1489-human beings entered [the bowels of [the earth]1463-the earth]5786-the bowels of the earth , and excavating brought up the wealth it had concealed in Stygian shade , wealth that incites [men]5788-men to crime . And now harmful iron appeared , and gold more harmful than iron . War came , whose struggles employ both , waving clashing arms with bloodstained hands . [They]1489-human beings lived on plunder : [friend]5789-friend was not safe with [friend]5789-friend , relative with [relative]5791-relative , kindness was rare between [brothers]1493-brothers . [Husbands]5793-husbands longed for the death of [[their]5793-husbands wives]5794-their wives , [wives]5795-wives for the death of [[their]5795-wives husbands]5796-their husbands . [Murderous stepmothers]5797-murderous stepmothers mixed deadly [aconite]5798-aconite , and [sons]5799-sons inquired into [[their]5799-sons father]5800-their father ’s years before [their]5799-sons time . [Piety]501-piety was dead , and [virgin Astraea]502-virgin astraea , last of [all the immortals]5801-all the immortals to depart , [herself]502-virgin astraea abandoned [the blood - drenched earth]5802-the blood - drenched earth .[1533-they]

Rendering [the heights of heaven]1531-the heights of heaven no safer than [the earth]1463-the earth , [they]1533-they say [the giants]1534-the giants attempted to take [the Celestial kingdom]1535-the celestial kingdom , piling [mountains up to the distant stars]1536-mountains up to the distant stars . Then [the all - powerful father of [the gods]1538-the gods]1537-the all - powerful father of the gods hurled [his]1537-the all - powerful father of the gods bolt of lightning , fractured [Olympus]12-olympus and threw [Mount Pelion]504-pelion down from [Ossa]8-ossa below . [[Her]1539-her sons]1540-her sons ’ dreadful bodies , buried by that mass , drenched Earth with streams of blood , and [they]1533-they say [she]1539-her warmed it to new life , so that a trace of [[her]1539-her children]5803-her children might remain , transforming it into the shape of [human beings]1489-human beings . But [these progeny also despising the gods]5805-these progeny also despising the gods were savage , violent , and eager for slaughter , so that [you]5806-you might know [they]5805-these progeny also despising the gods were born from blood .[1540-her sons]

When [[Saturn]500-saturn ’s son]1541-saturn ’s son , [the father of the gods]1542-the father of the gods , saw this from [[his]1541-saturn ’s son highest citadel]1543-his highest citadel , [he]1541-saturn ’s son groaned , and recalling the vile feast at [Lycaon]507-lycaon ’s table , so recent it was still unknown , [his]1541-saturn ’s son mind filled with a great anger fitting for [Jupiter]499-jupiter , and [he]1541-saturn ’s son called [the gods]1538-the gods to council , a summons that brooked no delay . There is a high track , seen when the sky is clear , called [the Milky Way]10-the milky way , and known for its brightness . This way [the gods]1538-the gods pass to [the palaces and halls of the mighty Thunderer]1546-the palaces and halls of the mighty thunderer . To right and left are [the houses of [the greater gods]1548-the greater gods]1547-the houses of the greater gods , doors open and crowded . [The lesser gods]1549-the lesser gods live elsewhere . Here [the powerful and distinguished]1550-the powerful and distinguished have made [[their]1549-the lesser gods home]1551-their home . This is [the place]1552-the place , if [I]0-i were to be bold , [I]0-i would not be afraid to call [high heaven ’s Palatine]1553-high heaven ’s palatine . When [the gods]1538-the gods had taken [their]1538-the gods seats in the marble council chamber [[their]1538-the gods king]1555-their king , sitting high above [them]1538-the gods , leaning on [his]1555-their king ivory sceptre , shook [his]1555-their king formidable mane three times and then a fourth , disturbing [the earth]1463-the earth , [sea]1450-sea and stars . Then [he]1555-their king opened [his]1555-their king lips in indignation and spoke . ‘ [I]1555-their king was not more troubled than [I]1555-their king am now concerning [the world]1448-the world ’s sovereignty than when each of the snake - footed giants prepared to throw [his]1555-their king hundred arms around the imprisoned sky . Though [they]1538-the gods were [fierce enemies]5808-fierce enemies , still [their]1538-the gods attack came in one body and from one source . Now [I]1555-their king must destroy [the human race]5809-the human race , wherever [Nereus]505-nereus sounds , throughout [the world]1448-the world . [I]1555-their king swear it by the infernal streams , that glide below [the earth]1463-the earth through [the Stygian groves]5812-the stygian groves . All means should first be tried , but the incurable flesh must be excised by the knife , so that the healthy part is not infected . [Mine]506-mine are [the demigods]5813-the demigods , [the wild spirits]5814-the wild spirits , [nymphs]5815-nymphs , fauns and [satyrs]5816-satyrs , and [sylvan deities of [the hills]5818-the hills]5817-sylvan deities of the hills . Since [we]5819-we have not yet thought [them]1538-the gods worth a place in [heaven]1501-heaven let [us]5819-we at least allow [them]1538-the gods to live in safety in [the lands [we]5819-we have given [them]1538-the gods]5821-the lands we have given them . Perhaps [[you]5822-you gods]5823-you gods believe [they]1538-the gods will be safe , even when [Lycaon]507-lycaon , known for [his]507-lycaon savagery , plays tricks against [me]1555-their king , who holds the thunderbolt , and reigns over [you]5822-you . ’[1555-their king]

[All the gods]1558-all the gods murmured aloud and , zealously and eagerly , demanded punishment of [the man who committed such actions]1559-the man who committed such actions . When [the impious band of conspirators]1560-the impious band of conspirators were burning to drown the name of [Rome]11-rome in [Caesar]508-caesar ’s blood , [the human race]5809-the human race was suddenly terrified by fear of just such a disaster , and [the whole world]1451-the whole world shuddered with horror . [[Your]1563-you subjects]1564-your subjects ’ loyalty is no less pleasing to [you]1563-you , [Augustus]509-augustus , than [theirs]1564-your subjects was to [Jupiter]499-jupiter . After [he]499-jupiter had checked [their]1564-your subjects murmuring with voice and gesture , [they]1564-your subjects were all silent . When the noise had subsided , quieted by [his]499-jupiter royal authority , [Jupiter]499-jupiter again broke the silence with these words : ‘[1563-you] Have no fear , [he]1559-the man who committed such actions has indeed been punished , but [I]0-i will tell [you]1563-you [his]1559-the man who committed such actions crime , and what the penalty was . News of these evil times had reached [my]0-i ears . Hoping it false [I]0-i left [[Olympus]12-olympus ’s heights]1565-olympus ’s heights , and travelled [the earth]1463-the earth , [a god in human form]1567-a god in human form . It would take too long to tell what wickedness [I]0-i found everywhere . Those rumours were even milder than the truth . [I]0-i had crossed [Maenala]13-maenala , [those mountains bristling with wild beasts ’ lairs]5824-those mountains bristling with wild beasts ’ lairs , [Cyllene]14-cyllene , and [the pinewoods of [chill Lycaeus]15-chill lycaeus]5825-the pinewoods of chill lycaeus . Then , as the last shadows gave way to night , [I]0-i entered [the inhospitable house of [the Arcadian king]5827-the arcadian king]5826-the inhospitable house of the arcadian king . [I]0-i gave [them]5827-the arcadian king signs that [a god]1461-a god had come , and [the people]5829-the people began to worship [me]0-i . At first [Lycaon]507-lycaon ridiculed [their]5829-the people piety , then exclaimed ‘[0-i] [I]0-i will prove by a straightforward test whether [he]1568-he is [a god]1461-a god or [a mortal]1570-a mortal . The truth will not be in doubt . ’ [He]507-lycaon planned to destroy [me]1571-my in the depths of sleep , unexpectedly , by night . That is how [he]507-lycaon resolved to prove the truth . Not satisfied with this [he]507-lycaon took [a hostage sent by [the Molossi]510-the molossi]5830-a hostage sent by the molossi , opened [his]507-lycaon throat with a knife , and made some of the still warm limbs tender in seething water , roasting others in the fire . No sooner were these placed on the table than [I]1571-my brought the roof down on [the household gods]5831-the household gods , with [my]1571-my avenging flames , [those gods worthy of [such a master]5833-such a master]5832-those gods worthy of such a master . [He]507-lycaon [himself]507-lycaon ran in terror , and reaching [the silent fields]5834-the silent fields howled aloud , frustrated of speech . Foaming at the mouth , and greedy as ever for killing , [he]507-lycaon turned against the sheep , still delighting in blood . [His]507-lycaon clothes became bristling hair , [his]507-lycaon arms became legs . [He]507-lycaon was a wolf , but kept some vestige of [his]507-lycaon former shape . There were the same grey hairs , the same violent face , the same glittering eyes , the same savage image . [One house]5835-one house has fallen , but [others]5836-others deserve to also . Wherever [the earth]1463-the earth extends the avenging furies rule . [You]5838-you would think [men]5788-men were sworn to crime ! Let [them]5788-men all pay the penalty [they]5788-men deserve , and quickly . That is [my]1571-my intent . ’[1571-my] When [he]1571-my had spoken , [some of [the gods]1538-the gods]1572-some of the gods encouraged [Jupiter]499-jupiter ’s anger , shouting [their]1572-some of the gods approval of [his]1571-my words , while [others]5836-others consented silently . [They]1575-their were all saddened though at this destruction of [the human species]1576-the human species , and questioned what the future of [the world]1448-the world would be free of [humanity]1578-humanity . Who would honour [their]1575-their altars with incense ? Did [he]1571-my mean to surrender [the world]1448-the world to the ravages of [wild creatures]1580-wild creatures ? In answer [the king of the gods]1581-the king of the gods calmed [their]1575-their anxiety , the rest would be [his]1581-the king of the gods concern , and [he]1581-the king of the gods promised [them]1575-their [a people different from the first , of a marvellous creation]1582-a people different from the first , of a marvellous creation . Now [he]1581-the king of the gods was ready to hurl [his]1581-the king of the gods lightning - bolts at [the whole world]1451-the whole world but feared that the sacred heavens might burst into flame from the fires below , and burn to the furthest pole : and [he]1581-the king of the gods remembered that a time was fated to come when [sea and land]1584-sea and land , and the untouched courts of the skies would ignite , and the troubled mass of [the world]1448-the world be besieged by fire . So [he]1581-the king of the gods set aside the weapons [the Cyclopes]1586-the cyclopes forged , and resolved on a different punishment , to send down rain from the whole sky and drown [humanity beneath the waves]1587-humanity beneath the waves . Straight away [he]1581-the king of the gods shut up the north winds in [[Aeolus]511-aeolus ’s caves]1588-aeolus ’s caves , with the gales that disperse the gathering clouds , and let loose the south wind , [he]1581-the king of the gods who flies with dripping wings , [his]1581-the king of the gods terrible aspect shrouded in pitch - black darkness . [His]1581-the king of the gods beard is heavy with rain , water streams from [his]1581-the king of the gods grey hair , mists wreathe [his]1581-the king of the gods forehead , and [his]1581-the king of the gods feathers and the folds of [his]1581-the king of the gods robes distil the dew . When [he]1581-the king of the gods crushes the hanging clouds in [his]1581-the king of the gods outstretched hand there is a crash , and the dense vapours pour down rain from heaven . [Iris]512-iris , [[Juno]513-juno ’s messenger]1589-juno ’s messenger , dressed in the colours of the rainbow , gathers water and feeds it back to the clouds . [The cornfields]1590-the cornfields are flattened and saddening [the farmers]1591-the farmers , the crops , the object of [their]1591-the farmers prayers , are ruined , and the long year ’s labour wasted . [Jupiter]499-jupiter ’s anger is not satisfied with only [[his]499-jupiter own aerial waters]1592-his own aerial waters : [[his]499-jupiter brother]1593-his brother [the sea - god]1594-the sea - god helps [him]499-jupiter , with the ocean waves . [He]499-jupiter calls the rivers to [council]1595-council , and when [they]1596-their have entered [[[their]1596-their ruler]1597-their ruler ’s house]1598-their ruler ’s house , says ‘ Now is not the time for long speeches ! Exert all [your]5840-your strength . That is what is needed . Throw open [your]5840-your doors , drain the dams , and loose the reins of all [[your]5840-your streams]5841-your streams ! ’[499-jupiter] Those are [his]499-jupiter commands . The rivers return and uncurb [their]1596-their fountains ’ mouths , and race an unbridled course to [the sea]1464-the sea .[514-neptune]

[Neptune]514-neptune [himself]514-neptune strikes the ground with [his]514-neptune trident , so that it trembles , and with that blow opens up channels for the waters . Overflowing , the rivers rush across [the open plains]1599-the open plains , sweeping away at the same time not just orchards , flocks , [houses]1525-houses and [human beings]1489-human beings , but sacred temples and [their]1525-houses contents . [Any building that has stood firm , surviving the great disaster undamaged , still has [its]1602-any building that has stood firm , surviving the great disaster undamaged , still has its roof drowned by the highest waves , and its towers buried below the flood roof drowned by the highest waves , and [its]1602-any building that has stood firm , surviving the great disaster undamaged , still has its roof drowned by the highest waves , and its towers buried below the flood towers buried below the flood]1602-any building that has stood firm , surviving the great disaster undamaged , still has its roof drowned by the highest waves , and its towers buried below the flood . And now [the land]1465-the land and [sea]1450-sea are not distinct , all is [the sea]1464-the sea , [the sea without a shore]1606-the sea without a shore .

There [one man]1607-one man escapes to [a hilltop]1608-a hilltop , while another seated in [[his]1609-his rowing boat]1610-his rowing boat pulls the oars over places where lately [he]1609-his was ploughing . [One man]1607-one man sails over [[his]1607-one man cornfields]1612-his cornfields or over the roof of [[his]1607-one man drowned farmhouse]1613-his drowned farmhouse , while [another man]1614-another man fishes in the topmost branches of an elm . Sometimes , by chance , an anchor embeds itself in [a green meadow]1615-a green meadow , or [the curved boats]1616-the curved boats graze the tops of vineyards . Where [lately lean goats browsed shapeless seals]1617-lately lean goats browsed shapeless seals play . [The Nereids]16-the nereids are astonished to see woodlands , [houses]1525-houses and [whole towns]1619-whole towns under [the water]1620-the water . There are dolphins in the trees : disturbing the upper branches and stirring the oak - trees as they brush against them . [Wolves]515-wolves swim among the sheep , and the waves carry tigers and tawny lions . The boar has no use for [his]1607-one man powerful tusks , the deer for its quick legs , both are swept away together , and the circling bird , after a long search for [a place to land]1621-a place to land , falls on tired wings into [the water]1620-the water . [The sea]1464-the sea in unchecked freedom has buried [the hills]5818-the hills , and fresh waves beat against [the mountaintops]1625-the mountaintops . [The waters]1626-the waters wash away most living things , and those [the sea]1464-the sea spares , lacking food , are defeated by slow starvation . [Phocis]17-phocis , [a fertile country when [it]17-phocis [was still land]1629-was still land]1628-a fertile country when it was still land , separates [Aonia]18-aonia from [Oeta]19-oeta , though at that time it was part of [the sea]1464-the sea , [a wide expanse of suddenly created water]1631-a wide expanse of suddenly created water . [There Mount Parnassus]1632-there mount parnassus lifts [its]1632-there mount parnassus twin steep summits to the stars , its peaks above the clouds . When [Deucalion]516-deucalion and [[his]516-deucalion wife]1633-his wife landed here in [[their]1634-their small boat]1635-their small boat , everywhere else being drowned by [the waters]1626-the waters , [they]1634-their worshipped [the Corycian nymphs]1637-the corycian nymphs , [the mountain gods]1638-the mountain gods , and [the goddess of the oracles]1639-the goddess of the oracles , prophetic Themis .

[No one]1640-no one was more virtuous or fonder of justice than [he]516-deucalion was , and [no woman]1641-no woman showed greater reverence for [the gods]1538-the gods . When [Jupiter]499-jupiter saw [the earth]1463-the earth covered with the clear waters , and that [only one man]1644-only one man was left of [all those thousands of men]1645-all those thousands of men , [only one woman left of all those thousands of women]1646-only one woman left of all those thousands of women , both innocent and [both worshippers of [the gods]1538-the gods]1647-both worshippers of the gods , [he]499-jupiter scattered the clouds and mist , with the north wind , and revealed the heavens to [the earth]1463-the earth and [the earth]1463-the earth to the sky . It was no longer [an angry sea]1651-an angry sea , since [the king of [the oceans]1653-the oceans]1652-the king of the oceans putting aside [his]1652-the king of the oceans three - pronged spear calmed the waves , and called [sea - dark Triton]20-sea - dark triton , showing from the depths [his]1652-the king of the oceans shoulders thick with shells , to blow into [his]1652-the king of the oceans echoing conch and give the rivers and streams the signal to return . [He]1652-the king of the oceans lifted the hollow shell that coils from its base in broad spirals , that shell that filled with [his]1652-the king of the oceans breath in mid - ocean makes [the eastern and the western shores]1654-the eastern and the western shores sound . So now when it touched [the god]1482-the god ’s mouth , and dripping beard , and sounded out the order for retreat , it was heard by all the waters on [earth]1449-earth and in [the ocean]1657-the ocean , and all the waters hearing it were checked . Now [the sea]1464-the sea has shorelines , the brimming rivers keep to their channels , the floods subside , and [hills]1659-hills appear . [Earth]1449-earth rises , the soil increasing as the water ebbs , and finally the trees show [their]1661-their naked tops , the slime still clinging to their leaves . [The world]1448-the world was restored . But when [Deucalion]516-deucalion saw its emptiness , and the deep silence of [the desolate lands]1663-the desolate lands , [he]516-deucalion spoke to [Pyrrha]517-pyrrha , through welling tears . ‘ [Wife]5843-wife , [cousin]5844-cousin , [sole surviving woman]5845-sole surviving woman , joined to [me]1664-me by [[our]5846-our shared race]5847-our shared race , [[our]5846-our family]5848-our family origins , then by the marriage bed , and now joined to [me]1664-me in danger , [we]5846-our two are [the people of [all the countries seen by the setting and the rising sun]5850-all the countries seen by the setting and the rising sun , [the sea]1464-the sea took [all the rest]5852-all the rest]5849-the people of all the countries seen by the setting and the rising sun , the sea took all the rest . Even now [our]5846-our lives are not guaranteed with certainty : the storm clouds still terrify [my]1664-me mind . How would [you]517-pyrrha feel now , [poor soul]5853-poor soul , if the fates had willed [you]517-pyrrha to be saved , but not [me]1664-me ? How could [you]517-pyrrha endure [your]517-pyrrha fear alone ? Who would comfort [your]517-pyrrha tears ? Believe [me]1664-me , [dear wife]5854-dear wife , if [the sea]1464-the sea had [you]517-pyrrha , [I]1664-me would follow [you]517-pyrrha , and [the sea]1464-the sea would have [me]1664-me too . If only [I]1664-me , by [[my]1664-me father]5857-my father ’s arts , could recreate [earth ’s peoples]5858-earth ’s peoples , and breathe life into the shaping clay ! [The human race]5809-the human race remains in [us]1665-they . [The gods]1538-the gods willed [it]5861-it that [we]1665-they are the only examples of [mankind left behind]5862-mankind left behind . ’[1664-me] [He]1664-me spoke and [they]1665-they wept , resolving to appeal to [the sky - god]1666-the sky - god , and ask [his]1666-the sky - god help by sacred oracles . Immediately [they]1665-they went side by side to [the springs of [Cephisus]21-cephisus that , though still unclear , flowed in its usual course]1667-the springs of cephisus that , though still unclear , flowed in its usual course . When [they]1665-they had sprinkled [their]1665-they heads and clothing with its watery libations , [they]1665-they traced [their]1665-they steps to [the temple of [the sacred goddess]1669-the sacred goddess , whose pediments were green with disfiguring moss , [her]1669-the sacred goddess altars without fire]1668-the temple of the sacred goddess , whose pediments were green with disfiguring moss , her altars without fire . When [they]1665-they reached [the steps of [the sanctuary]1671-the sanctuary]1670-the steps of the sanctuary [they]1665-they fell forward together and lay prone on the ground , and kissing the cold rock with trembling lips , said ‘ If [the gods]1538-the gods ’[1672-the just] wills soften , appeased by the prayers of [the just]1672-the just , if in this way [their]1672-the just anger can be deflected , [Themis]1672-the just tell [us]1665-they by what art the damage to [[our]1665-they race]1673-our race can be repaired , and bring help , most gentle one , to [this drowned world]1674-this drowned world ! ’ [The goddess]5864-the goddess was moved , and uttered oracular speech : ‘[1672-the just] Leave [the temple]1675-the temple and with veiled heads and loosened clothes throw behind [you]1676-you the bones of [[your]1676-you great mother]1677-your great mother ! ’ For a long time [they]1665-they stand there , dumbfounded . [Pyrrha]517-pyrrha is first to break the silence : [she]517-pyrrha refuses to obey [the goddess]5864-the goddess ’s command . [Her]517-pyrrha lips trembling [she]517-pyrrha asks for pardon , fearing to offend [[her]517-pyrrha mother]5866-her mother ’s spirit by scattering [her]517-pyrrha bones . Meanwhile [they]1665-they reconsider the dark words [the oracle]5867-the oracle gave , and their uncertain meaning , turning them over and over in [their]1665-they minds . Then [[Prometheus]498-prometheus ’s son]5868-prometheus ’s son comforted [[Epimetheus]518-epimetheus ’s daughter]5869-epimetheus ’s daughter with quiet words : ‘[1672-the just] Either this idea is wrong , or , since [oracles]1678-oracles are godly and never urge evil , [[our]1679-our great mother]1680-our great mother must be [the earth]1463-the earth : [I]0-i think the bones [she]1680-our great mother spoke about are stones in the body of [the earth]1463-the earth . It is these [we]1679-our are told to throw behind [us]1679-our . ’ Though [[the Titan]5870-the titan ’s daughter]5871-the titan ’s daughter is stirred by [[her]5871-the titan ’s daughter husband]5872-her husband ’s thoughts , still hope is uncertain : [they]1665-they are both so unsure of the divine promptings ; but what harm can it do to try ? [They]1665-they descended the steps , covered [their]1665-they heads and loosened [their]1665-they clothes , and threw the stones needed behind [them]1665-they . The stones , and [who would believe it if it were not for ancient tradition]5873-who would believe it if it were not for ancient tradition , began to lose [their]1665-they rigidity and hardness , and after a while softened , and once softened acquired new form . Then after growing , and ripening in nature , a certain likeness to a human shape could be vaguely seen , like marble statues at first inexact and roughly carved . The earthy part , however , wet with moisture , turned to flesh ; what was solid and inflexible mutated to bone ; the veins stayed veins ; and quickly , through the power of [the gods]1538-the gods , stones [the man]5875-the man threw took on the shapes of [men]5788-men , and [women]5877-women were remade from those thrown by [the woman]5878-the woman . So the toughness of [[our]1679-our race]1673-our race , [our]1679-our ability to endure hard labour , and the proof [we]1679-our give of the source from which [we]1679-our are sprung . Earth spontaneously created other diverse forms of animal life . After the remaining moisture had warmed in the sun ’s fire , the wet mud of [the marshlands]5880-the marshlands swelled with heat , and the fertile seeds of things , nourished by life - giving soil as if in [a mother]5881-a mother ’s womb , grew , and in time acquired a nature . So , when [the seven - mouthed Nile]5882-the seven - mouthed nile retreats from [the drowned fields]5883-the drowned fields and returns to its former bed , and the fresh mud boils in the sun , [farmers]5884-farmers find many creatures as [they]5884-farmers turn the lumps of earth . Amongst [them]5884-farmers [they]5884-farmers see [some just spawned , on the edge of life]5885-some just spawned , on the edge of life , [some with incomplete bodies and number of limbs , and often in the same matter one part]5886-some with incomplete bodies and number of limbs , and often in the same matter one part is alive and the other is raw earth . In fact when heat and moisture are mixed [they]5884-farmers conceive , and from these two things the whole of life originates . And though fire and water fight each other , heat and moisture create everything , and this discordant union is suitable for growth . So when [the earth]1463-the earth muddied from the recent flood glowed again heated by the deep heaven - sent light of the sun [she]5878-the woman produced innumerable species , partly remaking previous forms , partly creating new monsters . Indeed , though [she]5878-the woman would not have desired to , [she]5878-the woman then gave birth to [you]5888-you , great Python , covering so great [an area of [the mountain slopes]5890-the mountain slopes]5889-an area of the mountain slopes , a snake not known before , a terror to [the new race of [men]5788-men]5891-the new race of men . [The archer god]5893-the archer god , with lethal shafts that [he]5893-the archer god had only used before on fleeing red deer and roe deer , with a thousand arrows , almost emptying [his]5893-the archer god quiver , destroyed [the creature]5894-the creature , the venom running out from its black wounds . Then [he]5893-the archer god founded the sacred Pythian games , celebrated by contests , named from the serpent [he]5893-the archer god had conquered . There [the young winners in boxing , in foot and chariot racing]5895-the young winners in boxing , in foot and chariot racing , were honoured with oak wreaths . There was no laurel as yet , so [Phoebus]519-phoebus crowned [his]519-phoebus temples , [his]519-phoebus handsome curling hair , with leaves of any tree .[1680-our great mother]

[Phoebus]519-phoebus ’s first love was [Daphne]520-daphne , [daughter of [Peneus]521-peneus]1683-daughter of peneus , and not through chance but because of [Cupid]522-cupid ’s fierce anger . Recently [the Delian god]1684-the delian god , exulting at [his]1684-the delian god victory over the serpent , had seen [him]519-phoebus bending [his]519-phoebus tightly strung bow and said ‘ [Impudent boy]5896-impudent boy , what are [you]519-phoebus doing with [a man]5897-a man ’s weapons ? That one is suited to [my]519-phoebus shoulders , since [I]519-phoebus can hit wild beasts of a certainty , and wound [[my]519-phoebus enemies]5898-my enemies , and not long ago destroyed with countless arrows the swollen Python that covered many acres with its plague - ridden belly . [You]519-phoebus should be intent on stirring the concealed fires of love with [your]519-phoebus burning brand , not laying claim to [my]519-phoebus glories ! ’[519-phoebus] [[Venus]523-venus ’s son]1685-venus ’s son replied ‘ [You]519-phoebus may hit every other thing [Phoebus]519-phoebus , but [my]1685-venus ’s son bow will strike [you]519-phoebus : to the degree that [all living creatures]5899-all living creatures are less than [gods]1446-gods , by that degree is [your]519-phoebus glory less than [mine]1685-venus ’s son . ’[1685-venus ’s son] [He]1685-venus ’s son spoke , and striking the air fiercely with beating wings , [he]1685-venus ’s son landed on [the shady peak of [Parnassus]49-parnassus]1686-the shady peak of parnassus , and took two arrows with opposite effects from [his]1685-venus ’s son full quiver : one kindles love , the other dispels it . The one that kindles is golden with a sharp glistening point , the one that dispels is blunt with lead beneath its shaft . With the second [he]1685-venus ’s son transfixed [[Peneus]521-peneus ’s daughter]1687-peneus ’s daughter , but with the first [he]1685-venus ’s son wounded [Apollo]519-phoebus piercing [him]1685-venus ’s son to the marrow of [his]1685-venus ’s son bones . Now [the one]1688-the one loved , and [the other]1689-the other fled from love ’s name , taking delight in the depths of [the woods]1690-the woods , and the skins of the wild beasts [she]1687-peneus ’s daughter caught , emulating [virgin Phoebe]524-phoebe , a careless ribbon holding back [her]524-phoebe hair . [Many]1691-many courted [her]1687-peneus ’s daughter , but [she]1687-peneus ’s daughter , averse to being wooed , free from [men]5788-men and unable to endure [them]5788-men , roamed [the pathless woods]1693-the pathless woods , careless of [Hymen]525-juno or [Amor]526-amor , or whatever marriage might be . [[Her]1687-peneus ’s daughter father]1694-her father often said ‘ [Girl]5901-girl [you]5901-girl owe [me]1694-her father [a son - in - law]5902-a son - in - law ’[1694-her father] , and again often ‘ [Daughter]5903-daughter , [you]5901-girl owe [me]1694-her father [grandsons]5904-grandsons . ’[1694-her father] But , hating the wedding torch as if it smacked of crime [she]1687-peneus ’s daughter would blush red with shame all over [her]1687-peneus ’s daughter beautiful face , and clinging to [[her]1687-peneus ’s daughter father]1694-her father ’s neck with coaxing arms , [she]1687-peneus ’s daughter would say ‘ [Dearest father]5905-dearest father , let [me]1687-peneus ’s daughter be [a virgin]5906-a virgin for ever ! [[Diana]527-diana ’s father]5907-diana ’s father granted it to [her]1687-peneus ’s daughter . ’[1687-peneus ’s daughter] [He]1694-her father yields to that plea , but [your]1696-your beauty itself , [Daphne]520-daphne , prevents [your]1696-your wish , and [your]1696-your loveliness opposes [your]1696-your prayer . [Phoebus]519-phoebus loves [her]1687-peneus ’s daughter at first sight , and desires to [we]1697-we d [her]1687-peneus ’s daughter , and hopes for what [he]519-phoebus desires , but [his]519-phoebus own oracular powers fail [him]519-phoebus . As the light stubble of [an empty cornfield]1698-an empty cornfield blazes ; as sparks fire a hedge when [a traveller]1699-a traveller , by mischance , lets [them]1699-a traveller get too close , or forgets them in the morning ; so [the god]1482-the god was altered by the flames , and all [his]519-phoebus heart burned , feeding [his]519-phoebus useless desire with hope . [He]1694-her father sees [her]1687-peneus ’s daughter disordered hair hanging about [her]1687-peneus ’s daughter neck and sighs ‘ What if it were properly dressed ? ’[1694-her father] [He]1694-her father gazes at [her]1687-peneus ’s daughter eyes sparkling with the brightness of starlight . [He]1694-her father gazes on [her]1687-peneus ’s daughter lips , where mere gazing does not satisfy . [He]1694-her father praises [her]1687-peneus ’s daughter wrists and hands and fingers , and [her]1687-peneus ’s daughter arms bare to the shoulder : whatever is hidden , [he]1694-her father imagines more beautiful . But [she]1687-peneus ’s daughter flees swifter than the lightest breath of air , and resists [his]1694-her father words calling [her]1687-peneus ’s daughter back again . ‘ Wait nymph , [daughter of [Peneus]521-peneus]1683-daughter of peneus , [I]1694-her father beg [you]1683-daughter of peneus ! [I]1694-her father who am chasing [you]1683-daughter of peneus am not [[your]1683-daughter of peneus enemy]5909-your enemy . [Nymph]528-nymph , Wait ! This is the way a sheep runs from the wolf , a deer from the mountain lion , and a dove with fluttering wings flies from the eagle : everything flies from its foes , but it is love that is driving [me]1694-her father to follow [you]1683-daughter of peneus ! Pity [me]1694-her father ! [I]1694-her father am afraid [you]1683-daughter of peneus might fall headlong or thorns undeservedly scar [your]1683-daughter of peneus legs and [I]1694-her father be a cause of grief to [you]1683-daughter of peneus ! These are rough places [you]1683-daughter of peneus run through . Slow down , [I]1694-her father ask [you]1683-daughter of peneus , check [your]1683-daughter of peneus flight , and [I]1694-her father too will slow . At least enquire whom it is [you]1683-daughter of peneus have charmed . [I]1694-her father am [no mountain man]5910-no mountain man , [no shepherd]5911-no shepherd , [no rough guardian of the herds and flocks]5912-no rough guardian of the herds and flocks . [Rash girl]5913-rash girl , [you]1683-daughter of peneus do not know , [you]1683-daughter of peneus can not realise , who [you]1683-daughter of peneus run from , and so [you]1683-daughter of peneus run . [[Delphi]82-delphi ’s lands]5914-delphi ’s lands are [mine]1694-her father , [Claros]23-claros and [Tenedos]24-tenedos , and [Patara]530-patara acknowledges [me]1694-her father [king]5915-king . [Jupiter]499-jupiter is [[my]1694-her father father]5857-my father . Through [me]1694-her father what was , what is , and what will be , are revealed . Through [me]1694-her father strings sound in harmony , to song . [My]1694-her father aim is certain , but an arrow truer than [mine]1694-her father , has wounded [my]1694-her father free heart ! [The whole world]1451-the whole world calls [me]1694-her father [the bringer of aid]5918-the bringer of aid ; medicine is [my]1694-her father invention ; [my]1694-her father power is in herbs . But love can not be healed by any herb , nor can the arts that cure [others]5836-others cure [[their]5836-others lord]5920-their lord ! ’[1694-her father]

[He]1701-he would have said more as timid [Peneïs]531-peneïs ran , still lovely to see , leaving [him]1701-he with [his]1701-he words unfinished . The winds bared [her]531-peneïs body , the opposing breezes in [her]531-peneïs way fluttered [her]531-peneïs clothes , and the light airs threw [her]531-peneïs streaming hair behind [her]531-peneïs , [her]531-peneïs beauty enhanced by flight . But [the young god]1702-the young god could no longer waste time on further blandishments , urged on by [Amor]526-amor , [he]526-amor ran on at full speed . Like a hound of Gaul starting a hare in [an empty field]1703-an empty field , that heads for its prey , [she]531-peneïs for safety : [he]526-amor , seeming about to clutch [her]531-peneïs , thinks now , or now , [he]526-amor has [her]531-peneïs fast , grazing [her]531-peneïs heels with [his]526-amor outstretched jaws , while [she]531-peneïs uncertain whether [she]531-peneïs is already caught , escaping [his]526-amor bite , spurts from the muzzle touching [her]531-peneïs . So [the virgin]1704-the virgin and [the god]1482-the god : [he]526-amor driven by desire , [she]531-peneïs by fear . [He]526-amor ran faster , [Amor]526-amor giving [him]526-amor wings , and allowed [her]531-peneïs no rest , hung on [her]531-peneïs fleeing shoulders , breathed on the hair flying round [her]531-peneïs neck . [Her]531-peneïs strength was gone , [she]531-peneïs grew pale , overcome by the effort of [her]531-peneïs rapid flight , and seeing [Peneus]521-peneus ’s waters near cried out ‘ Help [[me]531-peneïs [father]5922-father]5921-me father ! If [your]5922-father streams have divine powers change [me]531-peneïs , destroy this beauty that pleases too well ! ’[531-peneïs] [Her]531-peneïs prayer was scarcely done when a heavy numbness seized [her]531-peneïs limbs , thin bark closed over [her]531-peneïs breast , [her]531-peneïs hair turned into leaves , [her]531-peneïs arms into branches , [her]531-peneïs feet so swift a moment ago stuck fast in slow - growing roots , [her]531-peneïs face was lost in the canopy . Only [her]531-peneïs shining beauty was left . Even like this [Phoebus]519-phoebus loved [her]531-peneïs and , placing [his]519-phoebus hand against the trunk , [he]519-phoebus felt [her]531-peneïs heart still quivering under the new bark . [He]519-phoebus clasped the branches as if they were parts of human arms , and kissed the wood . But even the wood shrank from [his]519-phoebus kisses , and [the god]1482-the god said ‘ Since [you]531-peneïs can not be [[my]1482-the god bride]5923-my bride , [you]531-peneïs must be [my]1482-the god tree ! Laurel , with [you]531-peneïs [my]1482-the god hair will be wreathed , with [you]531-peneïs [my]1482-the god lyre , with [you]531-peneïs [my]1482-the god quiver . [You]531-peneïs will go with [the Roman generals]5924-the roman generals when joyful voices acclaim [their]5924-the roman generals triumph , and [the Capitol]5925-the capitol witnesses [their]5924-the roman generals long processions . [You]531-peneïs will stand outside [Augustus]509-augustus ’s doorposts , [a faithful guardian]5926-a faithful guardian , and keep watch over the crown of oak between [them]1710-them . And just as [my]1482-the god head with its un - cropped hair is always young , so [you]531-peneïs also will wear the beauty of undying leaves . ’[1482-the god] [Paean]532-paean had done : the laurel bowed [her]1707-her newly made branches , and seemed to shake [her]1707-her leafy crown like a head giving consent .

There is [a grove in [Haemonia]25-haemonia]1708-a grove in haemonia , closed in on [every side by wooded cliffs]1709-every side by wooded cliffs . [They]1710-them call [it]1708-a grove in haemonia [Tempe]26-tempe . Through [it]1708-a grove in haemonia [the river]1711-the river [Peneus]521-peneus rolls , with foaming waters , out of [the roots of [Pindus]27-pindus]1712-the roots of pindus , and in its violent fall gathers clouds , driving the smoking mists along , raining down spray onto the tree tops , and deafening remoter places with its roar . Here is [the house]1713-the house , the home , [the innermost sanctuary of [the great river]1715-the great river]1714-the innermost sanctuary of the great river . Seated here , in [a rocky cavern]1716-a rocky cavern , [he]1717-his laid down the law to the waters and [the nymphs who lived in [[his]1717-his streams]1719-his streams]1718-the nymphs who lived in his streams . Here [the rivers of [[his]1717-his own country]1721-his own country]1720-the rivers of his own country first met , unsure whether to console or celebrate with [[Daphne]520-daphne ’s father]1722-daphne ’s father : Spercheus among poplars , restless Enipeus , [gentle Amphrysus]533-gentle amphrysus , [Aeas]534-aeas and [ancient Apidanus]535-ancient apidanus ; and then later all the others that , whichever way [their]1723-their force carries [them]1723-their , bring down [[their]1723-their weary wandering waters to [the sea]1464-the sea]1724-their weary wandering waters to the sea . Only [Inachus]536-inachus is missing , but hidden in [the deepest cave]1726-the deepest cave [he]536-inachus swells [his]536-inachus stream with tears , and in utter misery laments [[his]536-inachus lost daughter]1727-his lost daughter , [Io]537-io , not knowing if [she]1727-his lost daughter is alive or among the shades . Since [he]536-inachus can not find [her]1727-his lost daughter anywhere , [he]536-inachus imagines [her]1727-his lost daughter nowhere , and [his]536-inachus heart fears worse than death .

[Jupiter]499-jupiter first saw [her]1727-his lost daughter returning from [[[her]1727-his lost daughter father]1694-her father ’s stream]1729-her father ’s stream , and said ‘ [Virgin]538-virgin , worthy of [Jupiter]499-jupiter [himself]499-jupiter , who will make [some unknown man]5927-some unknown man happy when [you]1730-you share [his]499-jupiter bed , while it is hot and the sun is at the highest point of its arc , find shade in [the deep woods]5928-the deep woods ! ( And [he]499-jupiter showed [her]1727-his lost daughter [the woods]1690-the woods ’[499-jupiter] shade ) . But if [you]1730-you are afraid to enter [the wild beasts]1731-the wild beasts ’ lairs , [you]1730-you can go into [the remote woods]5930-the remote woods in safety , protected by [a god]1461-a god , and not by [any lesser god]5932-any lesser god , but by [the one who holds the sceptre of heaven]5933-the one who holds the sceptre of heaven in [his]1482-the god mighty hand , and who hurls the flickering bolts of lightning . Do not fly from [me]1732-she ! ’[1732-she] [She]1732-she was already in flight . [She]1732-she had left behind [[Lerna]539-lerna ’s pastures]1733-lerna ’s pastures , and [the Lyrcean plain ’s wooded fields]1734-the lyrcean plain ’s wooded fields , when [the god]1482-the god hid [the wide earth]1736-the wide earth in a covering of fog , caught [the fleeing girl]1737-the fleeing girl , and raped [her]1737-the fleeing girl . Meanwhile [Juno]525-juno looked down into [the heart of [Argos]28-argos]1738-the heart of argos , surprised that rapid mists had created night in shining daylight . [She]525-juno knew they were not vapours from [the river]1711-the river , or breath from [the damp earth]1740-the damp earth . [She]525-juno looked around to see where [[her]525-juno husband]5872-her husband was , knowing by now the intrigues of [a spouse so often caught in the act]1742-a spouse so often caught in the act . When [she]525-juno could not find [him]5872-her husband in the skies , [she]525-juno said ‘ Either [I]525-juno am wrong , or being wronged ’[525-juno] and gliding down from [[heaven]1501-heaven ’s peak]1744-heaven ’s peak , [she]525-juno stood on [earth]1449-earth ordering the clouds to melt . [Jupiter]499-jupiter had a presage of [[his]499-jupiter wife]1633-his wife ’s arrival and had changed [[Inachus]536-inachus ’s daughter]1747-inachus ’s daughter into a gleaming heifer . Even in that form [she]1747-inachus ’s daughter was beautiful . [Saturnia]540-saturnia approved the animal ’s looks , though grudgingly , asking , then , whose [she]1747-inachus ’s daughter was , where from , what herd , as if [she]540-saturnia did not know . [Jupiter]499-jupiter , to stop all inquiry , lied , saying [she]1747-inachus ’s daughter had been born from [the earth]1463-the earth . Then [Saturnia]540-saturnia claimed [her]1747-inachus ’s daughter as a gift . What could [he]499-jupiter do ? Cruel to sacrifice [his]499-jupiter love , but suspicious not to . [Shame]541-shame urges [him]499-jupiter to it , [Amor]526-amor urges not . [Amor]526-amor would have conquered Shame , but if [he]499-jupiter refused so slight a gift as a heifer to [the companion of [[his]499-jupiter race]1750-his race and bed]1749-the companion of his race and bed , it might appear [no heifer]1751-no heifer ! Though [[her]540-saturnia rival]1752-her rival was given up [the goddess]5864-the goddess did not abandon [her]540-saturnia fears at once , cautious of [Jupiter]499-jupiter and afraid of [his]499-jupiter trickery , until [she]540-saturnia had given [Io]537-io into [Argus]542-argus ’s keeping , [that son of Arestor]1754-that son of arestor . [Argus]542-argus had a hundred eyes round [his]542-argus head , that took [their]1755-their rest two at a time in succession while [the others]1756-the others kept watch and stayed on guard . Wherever [he]542-argus stood [he]542-argus was looking at [Io]537-io , and had [Io]537-io in front of [his]542-argus eyes when [his]542-argus back was turned . [He]542-argus let [her]537-io graze in the light , but when the sun sank below the earth , [he]542-argus penned [her]537-io , and fastened a rope round [her]537-io innocent neck . [She]537-io grazed on the leaves of trees and bitter herbs . [She]537-io often lay on the bare ground , and [the poor thing]1757-the poor thing drank water from [muddy streams]1758-muddy streams . When [she]537-io wished to stretch [her]537-io arms out to [Argus]542-argus in supplication , [she]537-io had no arms to stretch . Trying to complain , a lowing came from [her]537-io mouth , and [she]537-io was alarmed and frightened by the sound of [her]537-io own voice . When [she]537-io came to [[Inachus]536-inachus ’s riverbanks]1759-inachus ’s riverbanks where [she]537-io often used to play and saw [her]537-io gaping mouth and [her]537-io new horns in [the water]1620-the water , [she]537-io grew frightened and fled terrified of [herself]537-io . [The naiads]1761-the naiads did not know [her]537-io : [Inachus]536-inachus [himself]536-inachus did not know [her]537-io , but [she]537-io followed [[her]537-io father]1694-her father , followed [[her]537-io sisters]1763-her sisters , allowing [herself]537-io to be petted , and offering [herself]537-io to be admired . [Old Inachus]536-inachus pulled some grasses and held them out to [her]537-io : [she]537-io licked [[her]537-io father]1694-her father ’s hand and kissed [his]1694-her father palm , could not hold back [her]537-io tears , and if only words could have come [she]537-io would have begged for help , telling [her]537-io name and [her]537-io distress . With letters drawn in the dust with [her]537-io hoof , instead of words , [she]537-io traced the sad story of [her]537-io changed form . ‘ Pity [me]536-inachus ! ’[536-inachus] said [[her]537-io father]1694-her father [Inachus]536-inachus , clinging to the groaning heifer ’s horns and snow - white neck , ‘ Pity [me]536-inachus ! ’[536-inachus] [he]536-inachus sighed ; ‘ Are [you]537-io really [[my]536-inachus daughter]5934-my daughter [I]536-inachus searched [the wide world]5935-the wide world for ? There was less sadness with [you]537-io lost than found ! Without speech , [you]537-io do not answer in words to [mine]536-inachus , only heave deep sighs from [your]537-io breast , and all [you]537-io can do is low in reply to [me]536-inachus . Unknowingly [I]536-inachus was arranging marriage and a marriage - bed for [you]537-io , hoping for [a son - in - law]5902-a son - in - law first and then [grandchildren]5937-grandchildren . Now [you]537-io must find [a mate from the herd]5938-a mate from the herd , and from the herd get [you]537-io [a son]5939-a son . [I]536-inachus am not allowed by dying to end such sorrow ; it is hard to be [a god]1461-a god , the door of death closed to [me]536-inachus , [my]536-inachus grief goes on immortal for ever . ’[536-inachus] As [he]1766-he mourned , [Argus]542-argus with [his]542-argus star - like eyes drove [her]1767-her to [distant pastures]1768-distant pastures , dragging [her]1767-her out of [[her]1767-her father]1694-her father ’s arms . There , sitting at a distance [he]542-argus occupied [a high peak of [the mountain]1771-the mountain]1770-a high peak of the mountain , where resting [he]542-argus could keep a watch on every side . Now [the king of the gods]1581-the king of the gods can no longer stand [Phoronis]543-phoronis ’s great sufferings , and [he]1581-the king of the gods calls [[his]1581-the king of the gods son]1773-his son , born of [the shining Pleiad]544-the shining pleiad , and orders [him]1581-the king of the gods to kill [Argus]542-argus . [Mercury]545-mercury , quickly puts on [his]545-mercury winged sandals , takes [his]545-mercury sleep - inducing wand in [his]545-mercury divine hand , and sets [his]545-mercury cap on [his]545-mercury head . Dressed like this the son of [Jupiter]499-jupiter touches down on [the earth]1463-the earth from [[[his]1773-his son father]1775-his father ’s stronghold]1776-his father ’s stronghold . There , [he]545-mercury takes off [his]545-mercury cap , and doffs [his]545-mercury wings , only keeping [his]545-mercury wand . Taking this , disguised as [a shepherd]1777-a shepherd , [he]545-mercury drives [she]1778-she - goats , stolen on the way , through [solitary lanes]1779-solitary lanes , and plays [his]545-mercury reed pipe as [he]545-mercury goes . [[Juno]525-juno ’s guard]1780-juno ’s guard is captivated by this new sound . ‘ [You]525-juno there , whoever [you]525-juno are ’[542-argus] [Argus]542-argus calls ‘ [you]525-juno could sit here beside [me]542-argus on [this rock]5941-this rock ; there ’s no better grass elsewhere for [[your]525-juno flock]5942-your flock , and [you]525-juno can see that the shade is fine for [shepherds]5943-shepherds . ’[542-argus]

[The descendant of [Atlas]546-atlas]1781-the descendant of atlas sits down , and passes the day in conversation , talking of many things , and playing on [his]545-mercury reed pipe , trying to conquer those watching eyes . [Argus]542-argus however fights to overcome gentle sleep , and though [he]542-argus allows some of [his]542-argus eyes to close , the rest stay vigilant . [He]542-argus even asks , since the reed pipe has only just been invented , how it was invented . So [the god]1482-the god explained ‘ On [Arcadia]30-arcadia ’s cold mountain slopes among the wood nymphs , the hamadryads , of [Mount Nonacris]31-mount nonacris , [one]5944-one was the most celebrated : [the nymphs]5945-the nymphs called [her]5944-one [Syrinx]547-syrinx . [She]5944-one had often escaped from [the satyrs]5946-the satyrs chasing [her]5944-one , and from [others of the demi - gods that live in [shadowy woods]5948-shadowy woods and [fertile fields]5949-fertile fields]5947-others of the demi - gods that live in shadowy woods and fertile fields . But [she]5944-one followed the worship of [the Ortygian goddess]5950-the ortygian goddess in staying virgin . [Her]5944-one dress caught up like [Diana]527-diana [she]5944-one deceives the eye , and could be mistaken for [[Leto]548-leto ’s daughter]5951-leto ’s daughter , except that [her]5944-one bow is of horn , and the other ’s is of gold . Even so [she]5944-one is deceptive . [Pan , whose head is crowned with a wreath of sharp pine shoots]5952-pan , whose head is crowned with a wreath of sharp pine shoots , saw [her]5944-one , coming from [Mount Lycaeus]32-mount lycaeus , and spoke to [her]5944-one . ’[1482-the god] Now [Mercury]545-mercury still had to relate what [Pan]549-pan said , and how [the nymph]1783-the nymph , despising [his]549-pan entreaties , ran through [the wilds]1784-the wilds till [she]1783-the nymph came to [the calm waters of [sandy Ladon]33-sandy ladon]1785-the calm waters of sandy ladon ; and how when [the river]1711-the river stopped [her]1783-the nymph flight [she]1783-the nymph begged [[her]1783-the nymph sisters]1763-her sisters of [the stream]1788-the stream to change [her]1783-the nymph ; and how [Pan]549-pan , when [he]549-pan thought [he]549-pan now had [Syrinx]547-syrinx , found that instead of [the nymph]1783-the nymph ’s body [he]549-pan only held reeds from [the marsh]1790-the marsh ; and , while [he]549-pan sighed there , the wind in the reeds , moving , gave out a clear , plaintive sound . Charmed by this new art and its sweet tones [the god]1482-the god said ‘ This way of communing with [you]1792-the girl is still left to [me]1482-the god . ’[1482-the god] So unequal lengths of reed , joined together with wax , preserved [the girl]1792-the girl ’s name .

About to tell all this , [Cyllenian Mercury]550-cyllenian mercury saw that every eye had succumbed and [their]1793-their light was lost in sleep . Quickly [he]550-cyllenian mercury stops speaking and deepens [their]1793-their rest , caressing those drowsy eyes with touches of [his]550-cyllenian mercury magic wand . Then straightaway [he]550-cyllenian mercury strikes the nodding head , where it joins the neck , with [his]550-cyllenian mercury curved sword , and sends it bloody down the rocks , staining [the steep cliff]1794-the steep cliff . [Argus]542-argus , [you]542-argus are overthrown , the light of [your]542-argus many eyes is extinguished , and one dark sleeps under so many eyelids .

[Saturnia]540-saturnia took [his]550-cyllenian mercury eyes and set them into the feathers of [her]540-saturnia own bird , and filled the tail with star - like jewels . Immediately [she]540-saturnia blazed with anger , and did not hold back from its consequences . [She]540-saturnia set a terrifying Fury in front of the eyes and mind of [that ‘ slut ’[540-saturnia] from [the Argolis]34-the argolis]1795-that ‘ slut ’ from the argolis , buried a tormenting restlessness in [her]540-saturnia breast , and drove [her]540-saturnia as a fugitive through [the world]1448-the world . [You]542-argus , [Nile]551-nile , put an end to [her]540-saturnia immeasurable suffering . When [she]540-saturnia reached [you]542-argus , [she]540-saturnia fell forward onto [her]540-saturnia knees on [the riverbank]1797-the riverbank and turning back [her]540-saturnia long neck with [her]540-saturnia face upwards , in the only way [she]540-saturnia could , looked to the sky , and with groans and tears and sad lowing seemed to reproach [Jupiter]499-jupiter and beg [him]499-jupiter to end [her]540-saturnia troubles . [Jupiter]499-jupiter threw [his]499-jupiter arms round [[his]499-jupiter wife]1633-his wife ’s neck and pleaded for an end to vengeance , saying ‘ Do not fear , in future [she]537-io will never be a source of pain ’[499-jupiter] and [he]499-jupiter called [the Stygian waters]1799-the stygian waters to witness [his]499-jupiter words . As [the goddess]5864-the goddess grows calmer , [Io]537-io regains [her]537-io previous appearance , and becomes what [she]537-io once was . The rough hair leaves [her]537-io body , the horns disappear , the great eyes grow smaller , the gaping mouth shrinks , the shoulders and hands return , and the hooves vanish , each hoof changing back into five nails . Nothing of the heifer is left except [her]537-io whiteness . Able to stand on two feet [she]537-io raises [herself]537-io erect and fearing to speak in case [she]537-io lows like a heifer , timidly attempts long neglected words . Now [she]537-io is worshipped as [a greatly honoured goddess]1801-a greatly honoured goddess by [crowds of [linen clad acolytes]1803-linen clad acolytes]1802-crowds of linen clad acolytes . In due time [she]537-io bore [a son]5939-a son , [Epaphus]552-epaphus , who shared [the cities]1805-the cities ’ temples with [[his]552-epaphus mother]5953-his mother , and was believed to have been conceived from mighty [Jupiter]499-jupiter ’s seed . [He]552-epaphus had [a friend]5954-a friend , [Phaethon]553-phaethon , [child of the Sun]5955-child of the sun , equal to [him]552-epaphus in spirit and years , who once boasted proudly that [Phoebus]519-phoebus was [[his]552-epaphus father]1775-his father , and refused to concede the claim , which [[Inachus]536-inachus ’s grandson]5957-inachus ’s grandson could not accept . ‘[1806-you] [You]1806-you are mad to believe all [[your]1806-you mother]1807-your mother says , and [you]1806-you have an inflated image of [[your]1806-you father]1808-your father . ’ [Phaethon]553-phaethon reddened but , from shame , repressed [his]553-phaethon anger , and went to [[his]553-phaethon mother]5953-his mother [Clymene]555-clymene with [Inachus]536-inachus ’s reproof . ‘[1806-you] To sadden [you]1806-you more , [mother]1809-mother , [I]0-i [the free , proud , spirit]1810-the free , proud , spirit was silent ! [I]0-i am ashamed that such a reproach can be spoken and not answered . But if [I]0-i am born at all of divine stock , give [me]0-i some proof of [my]0-i high birth , and let [me]0-i claim [my]0-i divinity ! ’ So saying [he]553-phaethon flung [his]553-phaethon arms round [[his]553-phaethon mother]5953-his mother ’s neck , entreating [her]5953-his mother , by [his]553-phaethon own and [[her]5953-his mother husband]5872-her husband [Merops]554-merops ’s life , and by [[his]553-phaethon sisters]5961-his sisters ’[0-i] marriages , to reveal to [him]0-i some true sign of [his]0-i parentage . [Clymene]555-clymene , moved perhaps by [Phaethon]553-phaethon ’s entreaties or more by anger at the words spoken , stretched both arms out to the sky and looking up at the sun ’s glow said ‘ By that brightness marked out by glittering rays , that sees [us]5962-us and hears [us]5962-us , [I]553-phaethon swear to [you]553-phaethon , [[my]553-phaethon son]5963-my son , that [you]553-phaethon are [the child of the Sun]5964-the child of the sun ; of that being [you]553-phaethon see ; [you]553-phaethon are [the child of [he]554-merops who governs [the world]1448-the world]5965-the child of he who governs the world ; if [I]553-phaethon lie , may [he]554-merops [himself]554-merops decline to look on [me]553-phaethon again , and may this be the last light to reach [our]5962-us eyes ! It is no great effort for [you]553-phaethon [yourself]553-phaethon to find [[[your]553-phaethon father]1808-your father ’s house]5968-your father ’s house . [The place [he]554-merops rises from]5969-the place he rises from is near [[our]5962-us land]5970-our land . If [you]553-phaethon have it in mind to do so , go and ask the sun [himself]554-merops ! ’[553-phaethon] Immediately [Phaethon]553-phaethon , delighted at [[his]553-phaethon mother]5953-his mother ’s words , imagining the heavens in [his]553-phaethon mind , darts off and crosses Ethiopia [[his]553-phaethon people ’s land]1812-his people ’s land , then [India]36-india , land of [those bathed in radiant fire]1813-those bathed in radiant fire , and with energy reaches [the East]37-the east .

[The palace of the Sun]1814-the palace of the sun towered up with raised columns , bright with glittering gold , and gleaming bronze like fire . Shining ivory crowned [the roofs]1815-the roofs , and the twin doors radiated light from polished silver . The work of art was finer than the material : on the doors [Mulciber]556-mulciber had engraved the waters that surround [the earth]1463-the earth ’s centre , the earthly globe , and the overarching sky . [The dark blue sea]1817-the dark blue sea contains [the gods]1538-the gods , [melodious Triton]20-sea - dark triton , shifting Proteus , [Aegaeon]558-aegaeon crushing two huge whales together , [his]558-aegaeon arms across [their]1819-their backs , and [Doris]559-doris with [[her]559-doris daughters]1820-her daughters , [some seen swimming]1821-some seen swimming , some sitting on rocks drying [their]1821-some seen swimming sea - green hair , some riding the backs of fish . [They]1822-them are neither all alike , nor all different , just as [sisters]1823-sisters should be . [The land]1465-the land shows [men]5788-men and [towns]1517-towns , [woods]1827-woods and creatures , rivers and [nymphs]5815-nymphs and [other rural gods]1829-other rural gods . Above [them]1822-them was an image of the glowing sky , with six signs of the zodiac on the right hand door and the same number on the left . As soon as [[Clymene]555-clymene ’s son]1830-clymene ’s son had climbed [the steep path there]1831-the steep path there , and entered [the house of [this parent of whose relationship to [himself]1830-clymene ’s son [he]1830-clymene ’s son was uncertain]1833-this parent of whose relationship to himself he was uncertain , [he]1830-clymene ’s son immediately made [his]1830-clymene ’s son way into [[his]1830-clymene ’s son father]1775-his father ’s presence]1832-the house of this parent of whose relationship to himself he was uncertain , he immediately made his way into his father ’s presence , but stopped some way off , unable to bear [his]1830-clymene ’s son light too close . Wearing a purple robe , [Phoebus]519-phoebus sat on a throne shining with bright emeralds . To right and left stood the Day , Month , and Year , the Century and the equally spaced Hours . [Young Spring]560-young spring stood there circled with a crown of flowers , naked [Summer]561-summer wore a garland of ears of corn , Autumn was stained by the trodden grapes , and icy Winter had white , bristling hair . The Sun , seated in the middle of [them]1822-them , looked at [the boy]1835-the boy , who was fearful of the strangeness of it all , with eyes that see everything , and said ‘ What reason brings [you]1835-the boy here ? What do [you]1835-the boy look for on [these heights]5971-these heights , [Phaethon]553-phaethon , [son that]5972-son that [no father]5973-no father need deny ? ’[553-phaethon] [Phaethon]553-phaethon replied ‘ Universal light of [the great world]5974-the great world , [Phoebus]519-phoebus , [father]5922-father , if [you]5922-father let [me]553-phaethon use that name , if [Clymene]555-clymene is not hiding some fault behind false pretence , give [me]553-phaethon proof [father]5922-father , so [they]5977-they will believe [I]553-phaethon am [[your]5922-father true offspring]5978-your true offspring , and take away this uncertainty from [my]553-phaethon mind ! ’[553-phaethon] [He]553-phaethon spoke , and [[his]553-phaethon father]1775-his father removed the crown of glittering rays from [his]553-phaethon head and ordered [him]553-phaethon to come nearer . Embracing [him]553-phaethon , [he]1775-his father said ‘ It is not to be denied [you]553-phaethon are worthy to be [mine]1775-his father , and [Clymene]555-clymene has told [you]553-phaethon the truth of [your]553-phaethon birth . So that [you]553-phaethon can banish doubt , ask for any favour , so that [I]1775-his father can grant it to [you]553-phaethon . May [the Stygian lake]5979-the stygian lake , that [my]1775-his father eyes have never seen , by which [the gods]1538-the gods swear , witness [my]1775-his father promise . ’[1775-his father] Hardly had [he]553-phaethon settled back properly in [his]553-phaethon seat when [the boy]1835-the boy asked for [[his]1835-the boy father]1775-his father ’s chariot and the right to control [his]553-phaethon wing - footed horses for a day .

[[His]1835-the boy father]1775-his father regretted [his]1775-his father oath . Three times , and then a fourth , shaking [his]1775-his father bright head , [he]1775-his father said ‘ [Your]553-phaethon words show [mine]1775-his father were rash ; if only it were right to retract [my]1775-his father promise ! [I]1775-his father confess [[my]1775-his father boy]5981-my boy [I]1775-his father would only refuse [you]553-phaethon this one thing . It is right to dissuade [you]553-phaethon . What [you]553-phaethon want is unsafe . [Phaethon]553-phaethon [you]553-phaethon ask too great a favour , and one that is unfitting for [your]553-phaethon strength and boyish years . [Your]553-phaethon fate is mortal : it is not mortal what [you]553-phaethon ask . Unknowingly [you]553-phaethon aspire to more than [the gods]1538-the gods can share . Though [each deity]5983-each deity can please [themselves]5983-each deity , within what is allowed , [no one]1640-no one except [myself]1775-his father has the power to occupy the chariot of fire . Even [the lord of [mighty Olympus]12-olympus]5985-the lord of mighty olympus , who hurls terrifying lightning - bolts from [his]5985-the lord of mighty olympus right hand , can not drive [this team]5986-this team , and who is greater than [Jupiter]499-jupiter ? ’[1775-his father] ‘ The first part of [the track]5987-the track is steep , and one that [my]1775-his father fresh horses at dawn can hardly climb . In mid - heaven it is highest , where to look down on [earth and sea]5988-earth and sea often alarms even [me]1775-his father , and makes [my]1775-his father heart tremble with awesome fear . The last part of [the track]5987-the track is downwards and needs sure control . Then [even [Tethys]562-tethys [herself]562-tethys , who receives [me]1775-his father in [her]562-tethys submissive waves]5990-even tethys herself , who receives me in her submissive waves , is accustomed to fear that [I]1775-his father might dive headlong . Moreover the rushing sky is constantly turning , and drags along the remote stars , and whirls them in rapid orbits . [I]1775-his father move the opposite way , and its momentum does not overcome [me]1775-his father as it does all other things , and [I]1775-his father ride contrary to its swift rotation . Suppose [you]5991-you are given [the chariot]5992-the chariot . What will [you]5991-you do ? Will [you]5991-you be able to counter the turning poles so that the swiftness of the skies does not carry [you]5991-you away ? Perhaps [you]5991-you conceive in imagination that there are groves there and [cities of the gods]5993-cities of the gods and [temples with rich gifts]5994-temples with rich gifts . The way runs through ambush , and apparitions of wild beasts ! Even if [you]5991-you keep [your]5991-you course , and do not steer awry , [you]5991-you must still avoid the horns of [Taurus the Bull]563-taurus the bull , [Sagittarius the Haemonian Archer]564-sagittarius the haemonian archer , raging [Leo]565-leo and the Lion ’s jaw , [Scorpio]566-scorpio ’s cruel pincers sweeping out to encircle [you]5991-you from one side , and [Cancer]567-cancer ’s crab - claws reaching out from the other . [You]5991-you will not easily rule those proud horses , breathing out through mouth and nostrils the fires burning in [their]5995-their chests . [They]5995-their scarcely tolerate [my]1775-his father control when [their]5995-their fierce spirits are hot , and [their]5995-their necks resist the reins . Beware [[my]1775-his father boy]5981-my boy , that [I]1775-his father am not the source of a gift fatal to [you]5991-you , while something can still be done to set right [your]5991-you request ! ’[1775-his father] ‘ No doubt , since [you]5991-you ask for a certain sign to give [you]5991-you confidence in being born of [my]553-phaethon blood , [I]553-phaethon give [you]5991-you that sure sign by fearing for [you]5991-you , and show [myself]553-phaethon [a father]5997-a father by fatherly anxiety . Look at [me]553-phaethon . If only [you]5991-you could look into [my]553-phaethon heart , and see [a father]5997-a father ’s concern from within ! Finally , look around [you]5991-you , at the riches [the world]1448-the world holds , and ask for anything from all of the good things in [earth]1449-earth , [sea]1450-sea , and sky . [I]553-phaethon can refuse [you]5991-you nothing . Only this one thing [I]553-phaethon take exception to , which would truly be a punishment and not an honour . [Phaethon]553-phaethon , [you]553-phaethon ask for punishment as [your]553-phaethon reward ! Why do [you]553-phaethon unknowingly throw [your]553-phaethon coaxing arms around [my]553-phaethon neck ? Have no doubt ! Whatever [you]553-phaethon ask will be given , [I]553-phaethon have sworn it by [the Stygian streams]6002-the stygian streams , but make a wiser choice ! ’[553-phaethon] The warning ended , but [Phaethon]553-phaethon still rejected [his]553-phaethon words , and pressed [his]553-phaethon purpose , blazing with desire to drive [the chariot]5992-the chariot . So , as [he]553-phaethon had the right , [[his]553-phaethon father]1775-his father led [the youth]1842-the youth to the high chariot , [Vulcan]568-vulcan ’s work . It had an axle of gold , and a gold chariot pole , wheels with golden rims , and circles of silver spokes . Along the yoke chrysolites and gemstones , set in order , glowed with brilliance reflecting [Phoebus]519-phoebus ’s own light . Now while [brave Phaethon]553-phaethon is gazing in wonder at the workmanship , see , [Aurora]569-aurora , awake in [the glowing east]1843-the glowing east , opens wide [her]569-aurora bright doors , and [[her]569-aurora rose - filled courts]1844-her rose - filled courts . The stars , whose ranks are shepherded by [Lucifer the morning star]1845-lucifer the morning star , vanish , and [he]553-phaethon , last of all , leaves [his]553-phaethon station in the sky . When [Titan]569-aurora saw [his]553-phaethon setting , as [the earth]1463-the earth and skies were reddening , and just as the crescent of the vanishing moon faded , [he]553-phaethon ordered [the swift Hours]1847-the swift hours to yoke [[his]553-phaethon horses]1848-his horses . [The goddesses]1849-the goddesses quickly obeyed [his]553-phaethon command , and led [the team , sated with ambrosial food and breathing fire]1850-the team , sated with ambrosial food and breathing fire , out of [the tall stables]1851-the tall stables , and put on [their]1850-the team , sated with ambrosial food and breathing fire ringing harness .
