Then [the father]1852-the father rubbed [[his]1852-the father son]1773-his son ’s face with a sacred ointment , and made it proof against consuming flames , and placed [his]1852-the father rays amongst [his]1852-the father hair , and foreseeing tragedy , and fetching up sighs from [his]1852-the father troubled heart , said ‘ If [you]1773-his son can at least obey [[your]1773-his son father]1808-your father ’s promptings , spare the whip , [boy]6004-boy , and rein [them]1850-the team , sated with ambrosial food and breathing fire in more strongly ! [They]1850-the team , sated with ambrosial food and breathing fire run swiftly of [their]1850-the team , sated with ambrosial food and breathing fire own accord . It is a hard task to check [their]1850-the team , sated with ambrosial food and breathing fire eagerness . And do not please [yourself]1773-his son , taking a path straight through [the five zones of heaven]6005-the five zones of heaven ! The track runs obliquely in a wide curve , and bounded by [the three central regions]6006-the three central regions , avoids [the southern pole]6007-the southern pole and [the Arctic north]6008-the arctic north . This is [[your]1773-his son road]6009-your road , [you]1773-his son will clearly see [my]1852-the father wheel - marks , and so that [heaven and earth]6010-heaven and earth receive equal warmth , do not sink down too far or heave [the chariot]5992-the chariot into the upper air ! Too high and [you]1773-his son will scorch the roof of heaven : too low , [the earth]1463-the earth . The middle way is safest . Nor must [you]1773-his son swerve too far right towards [writhing Serpens]39-writhing serpens , nor lead [your]1773-his son wheels too far left towards [sunken Ara]40-sunken ara . Hold [your]1773-his son way between [them]39-writhing serpens ! [I]1852-the father leave the rest to [Fortune]570-fortune , [I]1852-the father pray [she]6013-she helps [you]1773-his son , and takes better care of [you]1773-his son than [you]1773-his son do [yourself]1773-his son . While [I]1852-the father have been speaking , dewy night has touched [her]6013-she limit on [[Hesperus]41-hesperus ’s far western shore]6014-hesperus ’s far western shore . [We]6015-we have no time for freedom ! [We]6015-we are needed : [Aurora]569-aurora , the dawn , shines , and the shadows are gone . Seize the reins in [your]1773-his son hand , or if [your]1773-his son mind can be changed , take [my]1852-the father counsel , do not take [my]1852-the father horses ! While [you]1773-his son can , while [you]1773-his son still stand on solid ground , before unknowingly [you]1773-his son take to [the chariot]5992-the chariot [you]1773-his son have unluckily chosen , let [me]1852-the father light [the world]1448-the world , while [you]1773-his son watch in safety ! [The boy]1835-the boy has already taken possession of [the fleet chariot]6019-the fleet chariot , and stands proudly , and joyfully , takes the light reins in [his]1835-the boy hands , and thanks [[his]1835-the boy unwilling father]6020-his unwilling father .[1852-the father]

Meanwhile the sun ’s swift horses , [Pyroïs]571-pyroïs , [Eoüs]572-eoüs , [Aethon]573-aethon , and [the fourth , Phlegon]1854-the fourth , phlegon , fill the air with fiery whinnying , and strike the bars with [their]1855-their hooves . When [Tethys]562-tethys , ignorant of [[her]562-tethys grandson]1856-her grandson ’s fate , pushed back the gate , and gave [them]1855-their access to [the wide heavens]1857-the wide heavens , rushing out , [they]1855-their tore through the mists in the way with [their]1855-their hooves and , lifted by [their]1855-their wings , overtook the East winds rising from [the same region]1858-the same region . But the weight was lighter than the horses of the Sun could feel , and the yoke was free of its accustomed load . Just as curved - sided boats rock in the waves without their proper ballast , and being too light are unstable at [sea]1450-sea , so [the chariot]5992-the chariot , free of its usual burden , leaps in the air and rushes into the heights as though it were empty . As soon as [they]1855-their feel this [the team of four]1861-the team of four run wild and leave [the beaten track]1862-the beaten track , no longer running in [their]1861-the team of four pre - ordained course . [He]1856-her grandson was terrified , unable to handle the reins entrusted to [him]1856-her grandson , not knowing where [the track]5987-the track was , nor , if [he]1856-her grandson had known , how to control [the team]1864-the team . Then for the first time the chill stars of [the Great and Little Bears]574-the bears , grew hot , and tried in vain to douse [themselves]574-the bears in [forbidden waters]1865-forbidden waters . And the Dragon , [Draco]575-draco , that is nearest to the frozen pole , never formidable before and sluggish with the cold , now glowed with heat , and took to seething with new fury . [They]1855-their say that [you]1866-you Bootës also fled in confusion , slow as [you]1866-you are and hampered by [the Plough]6-the plough . When [the unlucky Phaethon]553-phaethon looked down from [the heights of the sky]1867-the heights of the sky at [the earth]1463-the earth far , far below [he]1856-her grandson grew pale and [his]1856-her grandson knees quaked with sudden fear , and [his]1856-her grandson eyes were robbed of shadow by the excess light . Now [he]1856-her grandson would rather [he]1856-her grandson had never touched [[his]1856-her grandson father]1775-his father ’s horses , and regrets knowing [his]1856-her grandson true parentage and possessing what [he]1856-her grandson asked for . Now [he]1856-her grandson wants only to be called [[Merops]554-merops ’s son]1870-merops ’s son , as [he]1856-her grandson is driven along like [a ship]1871-a ship in a northern gale , whose master lets go the ropes , and leaves [her]1872-her to prayer and [the gods]1538-the gods . What can [he]1856-her grandson do ? Much of the sky is now behind [his]1856-her grandson back , but more is before [his]1856-her grandson eyes . Measuring both in [his]1856-her grandson mind , [he]1856-her grandson looks ahead to the west [he]1856-her grandson is not fated to reach and at times back to [the east]1874-the east . Dazed [he]1856-her grandson is ignorant how to act , and can neither grasp the reins nor has the power to loose them , nor can [he]1856-her grandson change course by calling the horses by name . Also , alarmed , [he]1856-her grandson sees the marvellous forms of huge creatures everywhere in the glowing sky . There is a place where [Scorpio]566-scorpio bends [his]566-scorpio pincers in twin arcs , and , with [his]566-scorpio tail and [his]566-scorpio curving arms stretched out to both sides , spreads [his]566-scorpio body and limbs over two star signs . When [the boy]1835-the boy saw this monster drenched with black and poisonous venom threatening to wound [him]1835-the boy with its arched sting , robbed of [his]1835-the boy wits by chilling horror , [he]1835-the boy dropped the reins . When the horses feel the reins lying across [their]1876-they backs , after [he]1856-her grandson has thrown them down , [they]1876-they veer off course and run unchecked through [unknown regions of the air]1877-unknown regions of the air . Wherever [their]1876-they momentum takes [them]1876-they [there]1878-there [they]1876-they run , lawlessly , striking against the fixed stars in deep space and hurrying [the chariot]5992-the chariot along [remote tracks]1880-remote tracks . Now [they]1876-they climb to [the heights of heaven]1531-the heights of heaven , now rush headlong down [its]1531-the heights of heaven precipitous slope , sweeping a course nearer to [the earth]1463-the earth . [The Moon]576-the moon , amazed , sees [[her]576-the moon brother]1883-her brother ’s horses running below [her]576-the moon own , and the boiling clouds smoke . [The earth]1463-the earth bursts into flame , in [the highest regions]1885-the highest regions first , opens in deep fissures and all its moisture dries up . [The meadows]1886-the meadows turn white , the trees are consumed with all their leaves , and the scorched corn makes its own destruction . But [I]0-i am bemoaning the lesser things . [Great cities]1887-great cities are destroyed with all [their]1887-great cities walls , and the flames reduce [whole nations]1888-whole nations with all [[their]1888-whole nations peoples]1889-their peoples to ashes . [The woodlands]1890-the woodlands burn , with [the hills]5818-the hills . [Mount Athos]42-mount athos is on fire , [Cilician Taurus]43-cilician taurus , [Tmolus]1156-mount tmolus , [Oete]45-oete and [Ida]577-mount ida , dry now once covered with fountains , and [[Helicon]46-helicon home of [the Muses]578-the muses]1892-helicon home of the muses , and [Haemus]47-haemus not yet linked with [King Oeagrius]579-king oeagrius ’s name . [Etna]855-etna blazes with immense redoubled flames , [the twin peaks of [Parnassus]49-parnassus]1893-the twin peaks of parnassus , [Eryx]836-eryx , [Cynthus]51-cynthus , [Othrys]935-othrys , Rhodope fated at last to lose [its]855-etna snow , [Mimas]53-mimas and [Dindyma]54-dindyma , [Mycale]55-mycale and [Cithaeron]56-cithaeron , ancient in rites . [Its]855-etna chilly climate can not save [Scythia]5-scythia . [The Caucasus]57-the caucasus burn , and [Ossa]8-ossa along with [Pindus]27-pindus , and [Olympos]58-olympos greater than either , and [the lofty [Alps]59-alps and [cloud - capped Apennines]60-cloud - capped apennines]1894-the lofty alps and cloud - capped apennines . Then , truly , [Phaethon]553-phaethon sees [the whole earth]1895-the whole earth on fire . [He]553-phaethon can not bear the violent heat , and [he]553-phaethon breathes the air as if from a deep furnace . [He]553-phaethon feels [his]553-phaethon chariot glowing white . [He]553-phaethon can no longer stand the ash and sparks flung out , and is enveloped in dense , hot smoke . [He]553-phaethon does not know where [he]553-phaethon is , or where [he]553-phaethon is going , swept along by the will of the winged horses . It was then , so [they]1896-they believe , that [the Ethiopians]580-the ethiopians acquired [their]580-the ethiopians dark colour , since the blood was drawn to the surface of [their]580-the ethiopians bodies . Then [Libya]61-libya became [a desert]1897-a desert , the heat drying up [her]61-libya moisture . Then [the nymphs with dishevelled hair]1898-the nymphs with dishevelled hair wept bitterly for [their]1898-the nymphs with dishevelled hair lakes and fountains . [Boeotia]62-boeotia searches for [[Dirce]581-dirce ’s rills]1899-dirce ’s rills , [Argos]28-argos for [[Amymone]582-amymone ’s fountain]1900-amymone ’s fountain , [Corinth]63-corinth for [the Pirenian spring]1901-the pirenian spring . Nor are [the rivers]1902-the rivers safe because of [[their]1902-the rivers wide banks]1903-their wide banks . [The Don]1904-the don turns to steam in mid - water , and old Peneus , and [Mysian Caicus]64-mysian caicus and swift - flowing Ismenus , [Arcadian Erymanthus]583-arcadian erymanthus , [Xanthus]584-xanthus destined to burn again , [golden Lycormas]585-golden lycormas and [Maeander]586-maeander playing in its watery curves , [Thracian Melas]65-thracian melas and [Laconian Eurotas]66-laconian eurotas . [Babylonian Euphrates]587-babylonian euphrates burns . [Orontes]588-orontes burns and quick Thermodon , [Ganges]67-ganges , [Phasis]68-phasis , and [Danube]69-danube . [Alpheus]589-alpheus boils . [[Spercheos]70-spercheos ’s banks]1905-spercheos ’s banks are on fire . The gold that [the River Tagus]71-the river tagus carries is molten with the fires , and the swans for whose singing [[Maeonia]590-maeonia ’s riverbanks]1906-maeonia ’s riverbanks are famous , are scorched in [[Caÿster]591-caÿster ’s midst]1907-caÿster ’s midst . The Nile fled in terror to [the ends of the earth]1908-the ends of the earth , and hid its head that remains hidden . [Its]1909-its seven mouths are empty and dust - filled , seven channels without [a stream]1910-a stream . The same fate parches [the Thracian rivers]1911-the thracian rivers , [Hebrus]72-hebrus and [Strymon]73-strymon , and the western rivers , [Rhine]74-rhine , [Rhone]75-rhone , [Po]76-po and the Tiber who had been promised universal power . Everywhere the ground breaks apart , light penetrates through the cracks down into [Tartarus]7-tartarus , and terrifies [the king of the underworld]1912-the king of the underworld and [[his]1912-the king of the underworld queen]1913-his queen . [The sea]1464-the sea contracts and what was a moment ago [wide sea]1915-wide sea is a parched expanse of sand . [Mountains]77-mountains emerge from [the water]1620-the water , and add to the scattered Cyclades . The fish dive deep , and the dolphins no longer dare to rise arcing above [the water]1620-the water , as [they]1918-they have done , into the air . The lifeless bodies of seals float face upwards on [the deep]1919-the deep . [They]1920-they even say that [Nereus]505-nereus [himself]505-nereus , and [Doris]559-doris and [[her]559-doris daughters]1820-her daughters drifted through [warm caves]1922-warm caves . Three times [Neptune]514-neptune tried to lift [his]514-neptune fierce face and arms above [the waters]1626-the waters . Three times [he]514-neptune could not endure the burning air . Nevertheless , [kindly Earth]1-earth , surrounded as [she]1924-her was by [sea]1450-sea , between [the open waters]1926-the open waters and the dwindling streams that had buried themselves in [[their]1927-their mother]1928-their mother ’s dark womb , lifted [her]1924-her smothered face . Putting [her]1924-her hand to [her]1924-her brow , and shaking everything with [her]1924-her mighty tremors , [she]1924-her sank back a little lower than [she]1924-her used to be , and spoke in a faint voice ‘ If this pleases [you]6021-your , if [I]1924-her have deserved it , [O king of the gods]6022-o king of the gods , why delay [your]6021-your lightning bolts ? If it is right for [me]1924-her to die through the power of fire , let [me]1924-her die by [your]6021-your fire and let [the doer of it lessen the pain of the deed]6023-the doer of it lessen the pain of the deed ! [I]1924-her can hardly open [my]1924-her lips to say these words ’[1924-her] ( the heat was choking [her]1924-her ) . Look at [my]0-i scorched hair and the ashes in [my]0-i eyes , the ashes over [my]0-i face ! Is this the honour and reward [you]1929-you give [me]0-i for [my]0-i fruitfulness and service , for carrying wounds from the curved plough and the hoe , for being worked throughout the year , providing herbage and tender grazing for [the flocks]1930-the flocks , produce for [the human race]5809-the human race and incense to minister to [[you]1929-you gods]5823-you gods ? Even if [you]1929-you find [me]0-i deserving of ruin , what have the waves done , why does [[your]1929-you brother]1933-your brother deserve this ? Why are the waters that were [his]1933-your brother share by [lot]593-lot diminished and so much further from the sky ? If neither regard for [me]0-i or for [[your]1929-you brother]1933-your brother moves [you]1929-you pity at least [[your]1929-you own heavens]1935-your own heavens ! Look around [you]1929-you on either side : both the poles are steaming ! If the fire should melt them , [[your]1929-you own palace]1936-your own palace will fall ! [Atlas]546-atlas [himself]546-atlas is suffering , and can barely hold up the white - hot sky on [his]546-atlas shoulders ! If [the sea]1464-the sea and [the land]1465-the land and [the kingdom of [the heavens]1940-the heavens]1939-the kingdom of the heavens are destroyed , [we]1941-we are lost in ancient chaos ! Save whatever is left from the flames , and think of [our]1941-we common interest ! ’ So [the Earth]1-earth spoke , and unable to tolerate the heat any longer or speak any further , [she]1929-you withdrew [her]1929-you face into [her]1929-you depths closer to [the caverns of the dead]6024-the caverns of the dead . But [the all - powerful father of the gods]1537-the all - powerful father of the gods climbs to [the highest summit of [heaven]1501-heaven]6026-the highest summit of heaven , from where [he]1537-the all - powerful father of the gods spreads [his]1537-the all - powerful father of the gods clouds over [the wide earth]1736-the wide earth , from where [he]1537-the all - powerful father of the gods moves the thunder and hurls [his]1537-the all - powerful father of the gods quivering lightning bolts , calling on [the gods]1538-the gods , especially on [him]1537-the all - powerful father of the gods who had handed over the sun chariot , to witness that , unless [he]1537-the all - powerful father of the gods [himself]1537-the all - powerful father of the gods helps , [the whole world]1451-the whole world will be overtaken by a ruinous fate . Now [he]1537-the all - powerful father of the gods has no clouds to cover [the earth]1463-the earth , or rain to shower from the sky . [He]1537-the all - powerful father of the gods thundered , and balancing a lightning bolt in [his]1537-the all - powerful father of the gods right hand threw it from eye - level at [the charioteer]6032-the charioteer , removing [him]1537-the all - powerful father of the gods , at the same moment , from [the chariot]5992-the chariot and from life , extinguishing fire with fierce fire . Thrown into confusion the horses , lurching in different directions , wrench [their]6034-their necks from the yoke and throw off the broken harness . Here the reins lie , there the axle torn from the pole , there the spokes of shattered wheels , and the fragments of [the wrecked chariot]6035-the wrecked chariot are flung far and wide .[553-phaethon]

But [Phaethon]553-phaethon , flames ravaging [his]553-phaethon glowing hair , is hurled headlong , leaving a long trail in the air , as sometimes a star does in the clear sky , appearing to fall although it does not fall . Far from [[his]553-phaethon own country]1721-his own country , in [a distant part of [the world]1448-the world]1943-a distant part of the world , [the river god [Eridanus]594-eridanus]1945-the river god eridanus takes [him]553-phaethon from the air , and bathes [his]553-phaethon smoke - blackened face . There [the Italian nymphs]1946-the italian nymphs consign [his]553-phaethon body , still smoking from that triple - forked flame , to [the earth]1463-the earth , and [they]1946-the italian nymphs also carve a verse in [the rock]1948-the rock : HERE [PHAETHON]553-phaethon LIES WHO THE SUN ’S JOURNEY MADE DARED ALL THOUGH [HE]553-phaethon BY WEAKNESS WAS BETRAYED Now [the father]1852-the father , pitiful , ill with grief , hid [his]1852-the father face , and , if [we]6037-we can believe it , a whole day went by without the sun . But the fires gave light , so there was something beneficial amongst all that evil . But [Clymene]555-clymene , having uttered whatever can be uttered at such misfortune , grieving and frantic and tearing [her]555-clymene breast , wandered over [the whole earth]1895-the whole earth first looking for [[her]555-clymene son]6039-her son ’s limbs , and then failing that [his]6039-her son bones . [She]555-clymene found [his]6039-her son bones already buried however , beside [the riverbank]1797-the riverbank in [a foreign country]6041-a foreign country . Falling to [the ground]6042-the ground [she]555-clymene bathed with tears the name [she]555-clymene could read on the cold stone and warmed it against [her]555-clymene naked breast . [The Heliads]595-the heliads , [[her]555-clymene daughters]1820-her daughters and [the Sun ’s]6044-the sun ’s , cry no less , and offer [their]595-the heliads empty tribute of tears to [the dead]6045-the dead , and , beating [their]595-the heliads breasts with [their]595-the heliads hands , [they]595-the heliads call for [[their]595-the heliads brother]6046-their brother night and day , and lie down on [[his]6046-their brother tomb]6047-his tomb , though [he]6046-their brother can not hear [their]595-the heliads pitiful sighs .[1946-the italian nymphs]

Four times the moon had joined [her]1949-her crescent horns to form [her]1949-her bright disc . [They]1950-they by habit , since use creates habit , devoted [themselves]1950-they to mourning . Then [Phaethüsa]596-phaethüsa , [the eldest sister]1951-the eldest sister , when [she]1951-the eldest sister tried to throw [herself]1951-the eldest sister to the ground , complained that [her]1951-the eldest sister ankles had stiffened , and when [radiant Lampetia]597-radiant lampetia tried to come near [her]1951-the eldest sister [she]1951-the eldest sister was suddenly rooted to the spot . [A third sister]1952-a third sister attempting to tear at [her]1952-a third sister hair pulled out leaves . [One]5944-one cried out in pain that [her]5944-one legs were sheathed in wood , another that [her]5944-one arms had become long branches . While [they]1954-their wondered at this , bark closed round [their]1954-their thighs and by degrees over [their]1954-their waists , breasts , shoulders , and hands , and all that was left free were [their]1954-their mouths calling for [[their]1954-their mother]1928-their mother . What can [[their]1954-their mother]1928-their mother do but go here and there as the impulse takes [her]1928-their mother , pressing [her]1928-their mother lips to [theirs]1954-their where [she]1928-their mother can ? It is no good . [She]1928-their mother tries to pull the bark from [their]1954-their bodies and break off new branches with [her]1928-their mother hands , but drops of blood are left behind like wounds . ‘ Stop , [mother]1809-mother , please ’[1928-their mother] cries out whichever one [she]1928-their mother hurts , ‘ Please stop : It is [my]1928-their mother body in the tree [you]1928-their mother are tearing . Now , farewell . ’[1928-their mother] and the bark closed over [her]1928-their mother with [her]1928-their mother last words . [Their]1954-their tears still flow , and hardened by the sun , fall as amber from the virgin branches , to be taken by [the bright river]1957-the bright river and sent onwards to adorn [Roman brides]1958-roman brides . [Cycnus]598-cycnus , [the son of [Sthenelus]599-sthenelus]1959-the son of sthenelus witnessed this marvel , who though [he]598-cycnus was kin to [you]1960-you Phaethon , through [[his]598-cycnus mother]5953-his mother , was closer still in love . Now , though [he]598-cycnus had ruled [the people and [great cities of [Liguria]79-liguria]1963-great cities of liguria]1962-the people and great cities of liguria , [he]598-cycnus left [[his]598-cycnus kingdom]1964-his kingdom , and filled [Eridanus]594-eridanus ’s green banks and [streams]1965-streams , and [the woods]1690-the woods [the sisters]1967-the sisters had become part of , with [his]598-cycnus grief . As [he]598-cycnus did so [his]598-cycnus voice vanished and white feathers hid [his]598-cycnus hair , [his]598-cycnus long neck stretched out from [his]598-cycnus body , [his]598-cycnus reddened fingers became webbed , wings covered [his]598-cycnus sides , and a rounded beak [his]598-cycnus mouth . So [Cycnus]598-cycnus became a new kind of bird , the swan . But [he]598-cycnus had no faith in [Jupiter]499-jupiter and [the heavens]1940-the heavens , remembering the lightning bolt [the god]1482-the god in [his]598-cycnus severity had hurled . [He]598-cycnus looked for [standing water]1970-standing water , and [open lakes hating fire]1971-open lakes hating fire , choosing to live in floods rather than flames . Meanwhile [[Phaethon]553-phaethon ’s father]1972-phaethon ’s father , mourning and without [his]1972-phaethon ’s father accustomed brightness , as if in eclipse , hated the light , [himself]1972-phaethon ’s father and the day . [He]1972-phaethon ’s father gave [his]1972-phaethon ’s father mind over to grief , and to grief added [his]1972-phaethon ’s father anger , and refused to provide [his]1972-phaethon ’s father service to [the earth]1463-the earth . ‘ Enough ’[1972-phaethon ’s father] [he]1972-phaethon ’s father says ‘ since the beginning , [my]1972-phaethon ’s father task has given [me]1972-phaethon ’s father no rest and [I]1972-phaethon ’s father am weary of work without end and labour without honour ! [Whoever chooses to can steer the chariot of light]6049-whoever chooses to can steer the chariot of light ! If [no one]1640-no one does , and [all the gods]1558-all the gods acknowledge [they]1558-all the gods can not , let [Jupiter]499-jupiter [himself]499-jupiter do it , so that for a while at least , while [he]499-jupiter tries to take the reins , [he]499-jupiter must put aside the lightning bolts that leave [fathers]6052-fathers bereft ! Then [he]499-jupiter will know when [he]499-jupiter has tried the strength of those horses , with hooves of fire , that [the one who failed to rule [them]6054-them]6053-the one who failed to rule them well did not deserve to be killed . ’[1972-phaethon ’s father]

[All the gods]1558-all the gods gather round [Sol]600-sol , as [he]600-sol talks like this , and beg [him]600-sol not to shroud everything with darkness . [Jupiter]499-jupiter [himself]499-jupiter tries to excuse the fire [he]499-jupiter hurled , adding threats to [his]499-jupiter entreaties as [kings]1975-kings do . Then [Phoebus]519-phoebus rounds up [[his]519-phoebus horses]1848-his horses , maddened and still trembling with terror , and in pain lashes out at [them]1848-his horses with goad and whip ( really lashes out ) reproaching [them]1848-his horses and blaming [them]1848-his horses for [[his]519-phoebus son]1773-his son ’s death . Now [the all - powerful father of [the gods]1538-the gods]1537-the all - powerful father of the gods circuits [the vast walls of [heaven]1501-heaven]1980-the vast walls of heaven and examines [them]1980-the vast walls of heaven to check if anything has been loosened by the violent fires . When [he]1537-the all - powerful father of the gods sees they are as solid and robust as ever [he]1537-the all - powerful father of the gods inspects [the earth]1463-the earth and the works of [humankind]1504-humankind . [Arcadia]30-arcadia above all is [his]1537-the all - powerful father of the gods greatest care . [He]1537-the all - powerful father of the gods restores [her]30-arcadia fountains and streams , that are still hardly daring to flow , gives grass to [the bare earth]1984-the bare earth , leaves to the trees , and makes [the scorched forests]1985-the scorched forests grow green again . Often , as [he]1537-the all - powerful father of the gods came and went , [he]1537-the all - powerful father of the gods would stop short at the sight of [a girl from [Nonacris]80-nonacris]1986-a girl from nonacris , feeling the fire take in the very marrow of [his]1537-the all - powerful father of the gods bones . [She]1986-a girl from nonacris was not one to spin soft wool or play with [her]1986-a girl from nonacris hair . A clasp fastened [her]1986-a girl from nonacris tunic , and a white ribbon held back [her]1986-a girl from nonacris loose tresses . Dressed like this , with a spear or a bow in [her]1986-a girl from nonacris hand , [she]1986-a girl from nonacris was [one of [[Diana]527-diana ’s companions]1988-diana ’s companions]1987-one of diana ’s companions . [No nymph who roamed [Maenalus]602-maenalus]1989-no nymph who roamed maenalus was dearer to [Trivia]603-trivia , [goddess of the crossways]1990-goddess of the crossways , than [she]603-trivia , [Callisto]604-callisto , was . But no favour lasts long . The sun was high , just path the zenith , when [she]1986-a girl from nonacris entered [a grove]1991-a grove that had been untouched through the years . Here [she]1986-a girl from nonacris took [her]1986-a girl from nonacris quiver from [her]1986-a girl from nonacris shoulder , unstrung [her]1986-a girl from nonacris curved bow , and lay down on the grass , [her]1986-a girl from nonacris head resting on [her]1986-a girl from nonacris painted quiver . [Jupiter]499-jupiter , seeing [her]1986-a girl from nonacris there weary and unprotected , said ‘ Here , surely , [[my]499-jupiter wife]6055-my wife will not see [my]499-jupiter cunning , or if [she]6055-my wife does find out it is , oh it is , worth a quarrel ! ’[499-jupiter] Quickly [he]499-jupiter took on the face and dress of [Diana]527-diana , and said ‘ Oh , girl who follows [me]499-jupiter , where in [[my]499-jupiter domains]6056-my domains have [you]527-diana been hunting ? ’[499-jupiter] [The virgin girl]1992-the virgin girl got up from the turf replying ‘ Greetings , [goddess greater than [Jupiter]499-jupiter]6057-goddess greater than jupiter : [I]1992-the virgin girl say it even though [he]499-jupiter [himself]499-jupiter hears it . ’[1992-the virgin girl] [He]499-jupiter did hear , and laughed , happy to be judged greater than [himself]499-jupiter , and gave [her]1992-the virgin girl kisses unrestrainedly , and not those that [virgins]1993-virgins give . When [she]1992-the virgin girl started to say which woods [she]1992-the virgin girl had hunted [he]499-jupiter embraced and prevented [her]1992-the virgin girl and not without committing a crime . Face to face with [him]499-jupiter , as far as [a woman]1994-a woman could , ( [I]0-i wish [you]499-jupiter had seen [her]1994-a woman [Juno]525-juno : [you]499-jupiter would have been kinder to [her]1994-a woman ) [she]1992-the virgin girl fought [him]499-jupiter , but how could [a girl]1995-a girl win , and who is more powerful than [Jove]605-jove ? Victorious , [Jupiter]499-jupiter made for the furthest reaches of the sky : while to [Callisto]604-callisto [the grove]1996-the grove was odious and the wood seemed knowing . As [she]1992-the virgin girl retraced [her]1992-the virgin girl steps [she]1992-the virgin girl almost forgot [her]1992-the virgin girl quiver and its arrows , and the bow [she]1992-the virgin girl had left hanging .

Behold how [Diana]527-diana , with [her]527-diana band of huntresses , approaching from [the heights of [Maenalus]602-maenalus]1997-the heights of maenalus , magnificent from the kill , spies [her]527-diana there , and seeing [her]527-diana calls out . At the shout [she]527-diana runs , afraid at first in case it is [Jupiter]499-jupiter disguised , but when [she]527-diana sees [the other nymphs]1998-the other nymphs come forward [she]527-diana realises there is no trickery and joins [their]1998-the other nymphs number . Alas ! How hard it is not to show [one]5944-one ’s guilt in [one]5944-one ’s face ! [She]527-diana can scarcely lift [her]527-diana eyes from the ground , not as [she]527-diana used to be , wedded to [[her]527-diana goddess]2001-her goddess ’s side or [first of [the whole company]2003-the whole company]2002-first of the whole company , but is silent and by [her]527-diana blushing shows signs of [her]527-diana shame at being attacked . Even if [she]527-diana were not [herself]527-diana virgin , [Diana]527-diana could sense [her]527-diana guilt in a thousand ways . [They]2004-they say [all the nymphs]2005-all the nymphs could feel it .

[Nine crescent moons]2006-nine crescent moons had since grown full when [the goddess]5864-the goddess faint from the chase in [[her]5864-the goddess brother]1883-her brother ’s hot sunlight found [a cool grove out of which a murmuring stream ran , winding over fine sand]2009-a cool grove out of which a murmuring stream ran , winding over fine sand . [She]527-diana loved [the place]1552-the place and tested the water with [her]527-diana foot . Pleased with this too [she]527-diana said ‘ [Any witness]6058-any witness is far away , let ’s bathe [our]2012-all of them bodies naked in the flowing water . ’[527-diana] [The Arcadian girl]2011-the arcadian girl blushed : [all of [them]2012-all of them]2012-all of them took off [their]2012-all of them clothes : one of [them]2012-all of them tried to delay : hesitantly the tunic was removed and there [her]2011-the arcadian girl shame was revealed with [her]2011-the arcadian girl naked body . Terrified [she]2011-the arcadian girl tried to conceal [her]2011-the arcadian girl swollen belly . [Diana]527-diana cried ‘ Go , far away from here : do not pollute [the sacred fountain]6059-the sacred fountain ! ’[527-diana] and [the Moon - goddess]2013-the moon - goddess commanded [her]527-diana to leave [[her]527-diana band of [followers]2015-followers]2014-her band of followers . [[The great Thunderer]2016-the great thunderer ’s wife]2017-the great thunderer ’s wife had known about all this for a long time and had held back [her]2017-the great thunderer ’s wife severe punishment until the proper time . Now there was no reason to wait . [The girl]1792-the girl had given birth to [a boy]2019-a boy , [Arcas]606-arcas , and that in itself enraged [Juno]525-juno . When [she]1792-the girl turned [her]1792-the girl angry eyes and mind to thought of [him]2019-a boy [she]1792-the girl cried out ‘ Nothing more was needed , [[you]2019-a boy adulteress]6060-you adulteress , than [your]2019-a boy fertility , and [your]2019-a boy marking the insult to [me]1792-the girl by giving birth , making public [my]1792-the girl [Jupiter]499-jupiter ’s crime . [You]2019-a boy ’ll not carry this off safely . Now , [insolent girl]6061-insolent girl , [I]1792-the girl will take that shape away from [you]1792-the girl , that pleased [you]1792-the girl and [[my]1792-the girl husband]6062-my husband so much ! ’[1792-the girl] At this [she]1792-the girl clutched [her]1792-the girl in front by the hair of [her]1792-the girl forehead and pulled [her]1792-the girl face forwards onto the ground . [Callisto]604-callisto stretched out [her]604-callisto arms for mercy : those arms began to bristle with coarse black hairs : [her]604-callisto hands arched over and changed into curved claws to serve as feet : and [her]604-callisto face , that [Jupiter]499-jupiter had once praised , was disfigured by gaping jaws : and so that [her]604-callisto prayers and words of entreaty might not attract [him]499-jupiter [her]604-callisto power of speech was taken from [her]604-callisto . An angry , threatening growl , harsh and terrifying , came from [her]604-callisto throat . Still [her]604-callisto former feelings remained intact though [she]604-callisto was now a bear . [She]604-callisto showed [her]604-callisto misery in continual groaning , raising such hands as [she]604-callisto had left to the starry sky , feeling , though [she]604-callisto could not speak it , [Jupiter]499-jupiter ’s indifference . Ah , how often [she]604-callisto wandered near [the house and fields]2020-the house and fields that had once been [[her]604-callisto home]2021-her home , not daring to sleep in [the lonely woods]2022-the lonely woods ! Ah , how often [she]604-callisto was driven among the rocks by the baying hounds , and [the huntress]2023-the huntress fled in fear from [the hunters]2024-the hunters ! Often [she]604-callisto hid at the sight of wild beasts forgetting what [she]604-callisto was , and though [a bear]2025-a bear [she]604-callisto shuddered at the sight of other bears on [the mountains]1513-the mountains and feared the wolves though [[her]604-callisto father]1694-her father [Lycaon]507-lycaon ran with [them]2028-them .

And now [Arcas]606-arcas , [grandson of [Lycaon]507-lycaon]2029-grandson of lycaon , had reached [his]606-arcas fifteenth year ignorant of [his]606-arcas parentage . While [he]606-arcas was hunting wild animals , while [he]606-arcas was finding suitable glades and penning up [the Erymanthian groves]2030-the erymanthian groves with woven nets , [he]606-arcas came across [[his]606-arcas mother]5953-his mother , who stood still at sight of [Arcas]606-arcas and appeared to know [him]606-arcas . [He]606-arcas shrank back from those unmoving eyes gazing at [him]606-arcas so fixedly , uncertain what made [him]606-arcas afraid , and when [she]5953-his mother quickly came nearer [he]606-arcas was about to pierce [her]5953-his mother chest with [his]606-arcas lethal spear . [All - powerful Jupiter]2032-all - powerful jupiter restrained [him]606-arcas and in the same moment removed them and the possibility of that wrong , and together , caught up through the void on the winds , [he]606-arcas set them in the heavens and made them similar constellations , [the Great and Little Bear]2033-the great and little bear .

[Juno]525-juno was angered when [she]525-juno saw [his]606-arcas inamorato shining among the stars , and went down into [the waters]1626-the waters to white - haired [Tethys]562-tethys and [old Oceanus]607-oceanus to whom [the gods]1538-the gods often make reverence . When [they]2036-you asked [her]525-juno the reason for [her]525-juno visit [she]525-juno began ‘ [You]2036-you ask [me]525-juno why [I]525-juno , [the queen of the gods]6063-the queen of the gods , have left [[my]525-juno home]6064-my home in [the heavens]1940-the heavens to be here ? Another has taken [my]525-juno place in the sky ! [I]525-juno tell a lie , if [you]2036-you do not see , when night falls and [the world]1448-the world darkens , newly exalted stars to wound [me]525-juno , set in the sky , where the remotest and shortest orbit circles the uttermost pole . Why should [anyone]6067-anyone wish to avoid wounding [Juno]525-juno or dread [my]525-juno enmity if [I]525-juno only benefit those [I]525-juno harm ? Oh what a great achievement ! Oh what marvellous powers [I]525-juno have ! [I]525-juno stopped [her]525-juno being human and [she]525-juno becomes [a goddess]6068-a goddess ! This is the punishment [I]525-juno inflict on [the guilty]6069-the guilty ! This is [my]525-juno wonderful sovereignty ! Let [him]6070-him take away [her]525-juno animal form and restore [her]525-juno former beauty as [he]6070-him did before with [that Argive girl]6071-that argive girl , [Io]537-io . Why not divorce [Juno]525-juno , install [her]525-juno in [my]525-juno place , and let [Lycaon]507-lycaon be [[his]507-lycaon father - in - law]6072-his father - in - law ? If this contemptible insult to [[your]6073-your foster - child]6074-your foster - child moves [you]6073-your , shut out the seven stars of the Bear from [[your]6073-your dark blue waters]6075-your dark blue waters , repulse this constellation set in the heavens as a reward for [her]525-juno defilement , and do not let [[my]525-juno rival]6076-my rival dip in [your]6073-your pure flood ! ’[525-juno]

[The gods of [the sea]1464-the sea]2037-the gods of the sea nodded [their]2037-the gods of the sea consent . Then [Saturnia]540-saturnia , in [[her]540-saturnia light chariot]2039-her light chariot drawn by painted peacocks , drove up through the clear air . These peacocks had only recently been painted , when [Argus]542-argus was killed , at the same time that [your]2040-you wings , [Corvus]608-corvus , croaking Raven , were suddenly changed to black , though they were white before . [He]608-corvus was once a bird with silver - white plumage , equal to the spotless doves , not inferior to the geese , [those saviours of [the Capitol]81-the capitol]2041-those saviours of the capitol with [their]2041-those saviours of the capitol watchful cries , or the swan , [the lover of rivers]2042-the lover of rivers . [His]608-corvus speech condemned [him]608-corvus . Because of [his]608-corvus ready speech [he]608-corvus , who was once snow white , was now white ’s opposite . [Coronis of Larissa]609-coronis of larissa was [the loveliest girl in [all Thessaly]2044-all thessaly]2043-the loveliest girl in all thessaly . Certainly [she]609-coronis of larissa pleased [you]2040-you , [god of [Delphi]82-delphi]2045-god of delphi . Well , as long as [she]609-coronis of larissa was faithful , or not caught out . But [that bird of [Phoebus]519-phoebus]2046-that bird of phoebus discovered [her]609-coronis of larissa adultery and , [merciless informer]2047-merciless informer , flew straight to [[his]2046-that bird of phoebus master]2048-his master to reveal the secret crime . [The garrulous Crow]2049-the garrulous crow followed with flapping wings , wanting to know everything , but when [he]2049-the garrulous crow heard the reason , [he]2049-the garrulous crow said ‘ This journey will do [you]2040-you no good : do n’t ignore [my]2049-the garrulous crow prophecy ! See what [I]2049-the garrulous crow was , see what [I]2049-the garrulous crow am , and search out the justice in it . Truth was [my]2049-the garrulous crow downfall . ’[2049-the garrulous crow]

Once upon a time [Pallas]610-pallas hid [a child]2050-a child , [Erichthonius]611-erichthonius , born without [a human mother]2051-a human mother , in a box made of Actaean osiers . [She]610-pallas gave this to [the three virgin daughters of two - natured Cecrops]2052-the three virgin daughters of two - natured cecrops , who was part human part serpent , and ordered [them]2052-the three virgin daughters of two - natured cecrops not to pry into its secret . Hidden in the light leaves that grew thickly over an elm - tree [I]0-i set out to watch what [they]2052-the three virgin daughters of two - natured cecrops might do . [Two of [the girls]2054-the girls]2053-two of the girls , [Pandrosus]612-pandrosus and [Herse]613-herse , obeyed without cheating , but [the third Aglauros]2055-the third aglauros called [[her]2055-the third aglauros sisters]1763-her sisters cowards and undid the knots with [her]2055-the third aglauros hand , and inside [they]2052-the three virgin daughters of two - natured cecrops found [a baby boy with a snake stretched out next to [him]2057-a baby boy with a snake stretched out next to him]2057-a baby boy with a snake stretched out next to him . That act [I]0-i betrayed to [the goddess]5864-the goddess . And this is the reward [I]0-i got for it , no longer consecrated to [Minerva]610-pallas ’s protection , and ranked below the Owl , that night - bird ! [My]0-i punishment should be a warning to all birds not to take risks by speaking out . ’ ‘[5864-the goddess] And just think , not only had [I]0-i not asked for [her]5864-the goddess favour , [she]5864-the goddess had sought [me]0-i out , of [her]5864-the goddess own accord ! – Ask [Pallas]610-pallas [herself]610-pallas : though [she]5864-the goddess is angry , [she]5864-the goddess will not deny it even in anger . [The famous Coroneus]2059-the famous coroneus was [[my]0-i father]5857-my father , in [the land of [Phocis]17-phocis]2061-the land of phocis ( it is said to be well known ) and [I]0-i was [a royal virgin]2062-a royal virgin and [wealthy princes]2063-wealthy princes courted [me]0-i ( so do not disparage [me]0-i ) . But [my]0-i beauty hurt [me]0-i . Once when [I]0-i was walking slowly as [I]0-i used to do along [the crest of the sands]2064-the crest of the sands by [the shore]2065-the shore [the sea - god]1594-the sea - god saw [me]0-i and grew hot . When [his]1594-the sea - god flattering words and entreaties proved a waste of time , [he]1594-the sea - god tried force , and chased after [me]0-i . [I]0-i ran , leaving [the solid shore]2067-the solid shore behind , tiring [myself]0-i out uselessly in [the soft sand]2068-the soft sand . Then [I]0-i called out to [gods]1446-gods and [men]5788-men . [No mortal]2071-no mortal heard [my]0-i voice , but [the virgin goddess]2072-the virgin goddess feels pity for [a virgin]5906-a virgin and [she]2072-the virgin goddess helped [me]0-i . [I]0-i was stretching out [my]0-i arms to the sky : those arms began to darken with soft plumage . [I]0-i tried to lift [my]0-i cloak from [my]0-i shoulders but it had turned to feathers with roots deep in [my]0-i skin . [I]0-i tried to beat [my]0-i naked breast with [my]0-i hands but found [I]0-i had neither hands nor naked breast . [I]0-i ran , and now the sand did not clog [my]0-i feet as before but [I]0-i lifted from the ground , and soon sailed high into the air . So [I]0-i became [an innocent servant of [Minerva]610-pallas]2074-an innocent servant of minerva . But what use was that to [me]0-i if [Nyctimene]614-nyctimene , who was turned into [an Owl]2075-an owl for [her]614-nyctimene dreadful sins , has usurped [my]0-i place of honour ? Or have [you]2076-you not heard the story all [Lesbos]326-lesbos knows well , how [Nyctimene]614-nyctimene desecrated [[her]614-nyctimene father]1694-her father ’s bed ? Though [she]614-nyctimene is now [a bird]2078-a bird [she]614-nyctimene is conscious of guilt at [her]614-nyctimene crime and flees from human sight and the light , and hides [her]614-nyctimene shame in darkness , and is driven from the whole sky by all the birds . ’[2079-the raven]

To all this , [the Raven]2079-the raven replied ‘ [I]2079-the raven pray any evil be on [your]2048-his master own head . [I]2079-the raven spurn empty prophecies ’[2079-the raven] and , completing the journey [he]2079-the raven had started , [he]2079-the raven told [[his]2079-the raven master]2048-his master [he]2079-the raven had seen [Coronis]609-coronis of larissa lying beside [a Thessalian youth]2081-a thessalian youth . The laurel fell from [the lover]2082-the lover ’s head on hearing of the charge , [his]2079-the raven expression and colour and the tone of [his]2079-the raven lyre changed , and [his]2079-the raven mind boiled with growing anger . [He]2079-the raven seized [his]2079-the raven usual weapons , strung [his]2079-the raven bow bending it by the tips , and , with [his]2079-the raven unerring arrow , pierced the breast that had so often been close to [his]2079-the raven own . [She]2082-the lover groaned at the wound , and as the arrow was drawn out [her]2082-the lover white limbs were drenched with scarlet blood and [she]2082-the lover cried out ‘ Oh [Phoebus]519-phoebus it was in [your]519-phoebus power to have punished [me]2082-the lover , but to have let [me]2082-the lover give birth first : now two will die in one . ’[2082-the lover] [She]2082-the lover spoke , and then [her]2082-the lover life flowed out with [her]2082-the lover blood . A deathly cold stole over [her]2082-the lover body , emptied of being .

Alas ! Too late [the lover]2082-the lover repents of [his]2079-the raven cruel act , and hates [himself]2079-the raven for listening to the tale that has so angered [him]2079-the raven . [He]2079-the raven hates the bird that has compelled [him]2079-the raven to know of the fault that brought [him]2079-the raven pain . [He]2079-the raven hates the bow , [his]2079-the raven hand , and the hastily fired arrow as well as that hand . [He]2079-the raven cradles [the fallen girl]2084-the fallen girl and attempts to overcome fate with [his]2079-the raven healing powers . It is too late , and [he]2079-the raven tries [his]2079-the raven arts in vain . Later , when all efforts had failed , seeing the funeral pyre prepared to consume [her]2084-the fallen girl body , then indeed [the god]1482-the god groaned from the depths of [his]1482-the god heart ( since the faces of [the heavenly gods]2086-the heavenly gods can not be touched by tears ) , groans no different from those of [a young bullock]2087-a young bullock , seeing the hammer poised at [the slaughterer]2088-the slaughterer ’s right ear , crash down on the hollow forehead of a suckling calf . Even though [she]2084-the fallen girl can not know of it , [the god]1482-the god pours fragrant incense over [her]2084-the fallen girl breast , and embraces [her]2084-the fallen girl body , and unjustly , performs the just rites . [He]1482-the god could not let [a child of Phoebus]2090-a child of phoebus be destroyed in [the same ruin]2091-the same ruin , and [he]1482-the god tore [[his]1482-the god son]1773-his son , [Aesculapius]616-aesculapius , from [its mother]2093-its mother ’s womb and from the flames , and carried [him]1773-his son to [the cave of [Chiron]617-chiron the Centaur , who was half man and half horse]2094-the cave of chiron the centaur , who was half man and half horse . But [he]1482-the god stopped [the Raven , who had hoped for a reward for telling the truth]2095-the raven , who had hoped for a reward for telling the truth , from living among the white birds .

[The semi - human]2096-the semi - human was pleased with [this foster - child of divine origin]2097-this foster - child of divine origin , glad at the honour it brought [him]1482-the god , when [[his]1482-the god daughter]2098-his daughter suddenly appeared , [her]2098-his daughter shoulders covered with [her]2098-his daughter long red hair , whom [the nymph Chariclo]2099-the nymph chariclo called [Ocyrhoë]618-ocyrhoë , having given birth to [her]2098-his daughter on [the banks of [that swift stream]2101-that swift stream]2100-the banks of that swift stream . [She]2098-his daughter was not content merely to have learned [[her]2098-his daughter father]1694-her father ’s arts , [she]2098-his daughter also chanted the secrets of [the Fates]619-the fates . So when [she]2098-his daughter felt the prophetic frenzy in [her]2098-his daughter mind , and was on fire with [the god]1482-the god enclosed in [her]2098-his daughter breast , [she]2098-his daughter looked at [the infant boy]2104-the infant boy and cried out ‘ Grow and thrive , [child]6077-child , healer of all [the world]1448-the world ! [Human beings]1489-human beings will often be in [your]6077-child debt , and [you]6077-child will have the right to restore the dead . But if ever it is done regardless of [the god]1482-the god ’s displeasure [you]6077-child will be stopped , by the flame of [[your]6077-child grandfather]6081-your grandfather ’s lightning bolt , from doing so again . From [a god]1461-a god [you]6077-child will turn to a bloodless corpse , and then to [a god who was a corpse]6083-a god who was a corpse , and so twice renew [your]6077-child fate . [You]6077-child also , [dear father]6084-dear father , now immortal , and created by the law of [your]6077-child birth to live on through all the ages , will long for death , when [you]6077-child are tormented by the terrible venom of the Serpent , [Hydra]620-the lernean hydra , absorbed through [your]6077-child wounded limbs . But at last [the gods]1538-the gods will give [you]6077-child the power to die , and [the Three Goddesses]6086-the three goddesses will sever the thread . ’[2098-his daughter] Other prophecies remained to tell : but [she]2105-her sighed deeply , distressed by the tears welling from [her]2105-her eyes , and cried ‘ [The Fates]619-the fates prevent [me]2105-her , and forbid [me]2105-her further speech . [My]2105-her throat is constricted . These arts are not worth the cost if they incur the gods ’[2105-her] anger against [me]0-i . Better not to know the future ! Now [I]0-i see [my]0-i human shape being taken away , now grass contents [me]0-i for food , now [my]0-i impulse is to race over [the wide fields]2106-the wide fields . [I]0-i am changing to a mare , the form of [my]0-i kindred . But why am [I]0-i completely so ? Surely [[my]0-i father]5857-my father is still half human . ’ Even as [she]2105-her spoke , the last part of [her]2105-her complaint was hard to understand and [her]2105-her words were troubled . Soon they seemed neither words nor a horse ’s neighs , but the imitation of a horse . In a little while [she]2105-her gave out clear whinnying noises , and [her]2105-her arms moved in the grass . Then [her]2105-her fingers came together and one thin solid hoof of horn joined [her]2105-her five fingernails . [Her]2105-her head and the length of [her]2105-her neck extended , the greater part of [her]2105-her long gown became a tail , and the loose hair thrown over [her]2105-her neck hung down as a mane on [her]2105-her right shoulder . Now [she]2105-her was altered in both voice and features , and from this marvellous happening [she]2105-her gained a new name . [The demi - god]6087-the demi - god , [son of Philyra]6088-son of philyra , wept , and called to [you]6089-you for help in vain , [O lord of [Delphi]82-delphi]6090-o lord of delphi . [You]6089-you could not re - call [mighty Jupiter]499-jupiter ’s command , and , if [you]6089-you had been able to , [you]6089-you were not there . [You]6089-you lived in [Elis]83-elis and [the Messenian lands]6091-the messenian lands . That was the time when [you]6089-you wore [a shepherd]1777-a shepherd ’s cloak , carried a wooden crook in [your]6089-you left hand , and in the other a pipe of seven disparate reeds . And while [your]6089-you thoughts were of love , while [you]6089-you played sweetly on [your]6089-you pipe , [your]6089-you cattle , unguarded , strayed , it is said , into [the Pylian fields]6093-the pylian fields . There , [Mercury Atlantiades]545-mercury , [son of [Maia]621-maia]6094-son of maia , saw [them]6095-them and by [his]545-mercury arts drove [them]6095-them into [the woods]1690-the woods and hid [them]6095-them there . [Nobody]6097-nobody saw the theft except [one old man , well known in [that country]6099-that country , whom [they]6100-they called [Battus]622-battus]6098-one old man , well known in that country , whom they called battus . [He]6098-one old man , well known in that country , whom they called battus served as [guardian of [a herd of pedigree mares]6102-a herd of pedigree mares , for [a wealthy man Neleus]6103-a wealthy man neleus , in [the rich meadows and woodland pastures]6104-the rich meadows and woodland pastures]6101-guardian of a herd of pedigree mares , for a wealthy man neleus , in the rich meadows and woodland pastures . [Mercury]545-mercury found [him]6098-one old man , well known in that country , whom they called battus and drawing [him]6098-one old man , well known in that country , whom they called battus away with coaxing hand said ‘[5857-my father] Whoever [you]2108-you are , [friend]5789-friend , if [anyone]6067-anyone asks if [you]2108-you have seen any of these cattle , say no , and so that the favour is not un - rewarded , [you]2108-you can take a shining heifer for [your]2108-you prize ! ’ and [he]545-mercury handed it over . [The fellow]6105-the fellow accepted it and replied ‘[0-i] Go on , [you]2108-you are safe . That stone would betray [you]2108-you quicker than [I]0-i ’ and [he]545-mercury even pointed out a stone . [[Jupiter]499-jupiter ’s son]6106-jupiter ’s son pretended to go , but soon returned in another form and voice , saying ‘[2111-countryman] [Countryman]2111-countryman , if [you]2111-countryman have seen any cattle going this way , help [me]0-i , and do n’t be silent , they were stolen ! [I]0-i ’ll give [you]2111-countryman a reward of a bull and its heifer . ’ [The old man]6107-the old man , hearing the prize doubled said ‘[0-i] [They]2112-they were at [the foot of [the mountain]1771-the mountain]2113-the foot of the mountain , and at [the foot of [the mountain]1771-the mountain]2113-the foot of the mountain is where [they]2112-they are . ’ [Atlantiades]545-mercury laughed . ‘[2111-countryman] Would [you]2111-countryman betray [me]0-i to [myself]0-i , [[you]2111-countryman rascal]2117-you rascal ? Betray [me]0-i to [myself]0-i ? ’ And [he]2118-the god with the caduceus turned that deceitful body to solid flint , that even now is called ‘[2111-countryman] touchstone ’ , [the ‘[2111-countryman] informer ’]6108-the ‘ informer ’ , and unjustly [the old disgrace]6109-the old disgrace clings to the stone .[2111-countryman]

[The god with the caduceus]2118-the god with the caduceus lifted upwards on [his]2118-the god with the caduceus paired wings and as [he]2118-the god with the caduceus flew looked down on [the Munychian fields]2119-the munychian fields , [the land that [Minerva]610-pallas loves]2120-the land that minerva loves , and on [the groves of [the cultured Lyceum]2122-the cultured lyceum]2121-the groves of the cultured lyceum . That day happened to be a festival of [Pallas]610-pallas , when , by tradition , [innocent girls]2123-innocent girls carried the sacred mysteries to [[her]610-pallas temple]2124-her temple , in flower - wreathed baskets , on [their]2123-innocent girls heads . [The winged god]2125-the winged god saw [them]2123-innocent girls returning and flew towards [them]2123-innocent girls , not directly but in a curving flight , as a swift kite , spying out the sacrificial entrails , wheels above , still fearful of [the priests]2126-the priests crowding round [the victim]2127-the victim , but afraid to fly further off , circling eagerly on tilted wings over its hoped - for prey . So agile [Mercury]545-mercury slanted in flight over [the Athenian hill]2128-the athenian hill , spiraling on the same winds . As [Lucifer]623-lucifer shines more brightly than the other stars , and [golden Phoebe]524-phoebe outshines [Lucifer]623-lucifer , so [Herse]613-herse was pre - eminent among [the virgin girls]2129-the virgin girls , the glory of that procession of [[her]613-herse comrades]2130-her comrades . [[Jupiter]499-jupiter ’s son]6106-jupiter ’s son was astonished at [her]613-herse beauty , and , even though [he]6106-jupiter ’s son hung in the air , [he]6106-jupiter ’s son was inflamed . Just as when a lead shot is flung from a Balearic sling it flies on and becomes red hot , discovering heat in the clouds it did not have before . [He]6106-jupiter ’s son altered course , leaving the sky , and heading towards [earth]1449-earth , without disguising [himself]6106-jupiter ’s son , [he]6106-jupiter ’s son was so confident of [his]6106-jupiter ’s son own looks . Nevertheless , even though it is so , [he]6106-jupiter ’s son takes care to enhance [them]2133-them . [He]6106-jupiter ’s son smoothes [his]6106-jupiter ’s son hair , and arranges [his]6106-jupiter ’s son robe to hang neatly so that the golden hem will show , and has [his]6106-jupiter ’s son polished wand , that induces or drives away sleep , in [his]6106-jupiter ’s son right hand , and [his]6106-jupiter ’s son winged sandals gleaming on [his]6106-jupiter ’s son trim feet .

There were [three rooms deep inside [the house]1713-the house , decorated with tortoiseshell and ivory]2134-three rooms deep inside the house , decorated with tortoiseshell and ivory . [Pandrosus]612-pandrosus had [the right hand room]2136-the right hand room , [Aglauros]624-aglauros the left , and [Herse]613-herse [the room between]2137-the room between . [[She]613-herse of [the left hand room]2139-the left hand room]2138-she of the left hand room first saw [the god]1482-the god ’s approach and dared to ask [his]6106-jupiter ’s son name and the reason for [his]6106-jupiter ’s son visit . [The grandson of [Atlas]546-atlas and [Pleione]625-pleione]2141-the grandson of atlas and pleione replied ‘ [I]624-aglauros am the one who carries [[my]624-aglauros father]5857-my father ’s messages through the air . [[My]624-aglauros father]5857-my father is [Jupiter]499-jupiter [himself]499-jupiter . [I]624-aglauros wo n’t hide the reason . Only be loyal to [[your]624-aglauros sister]6112-your sister and consent to be called [[[my]624-aglauros child]6113-my child ’s aunt]6114-my child ’s aunt . [Herse]613-herse is the reason [I]624-aglauros am [here]6115-here . [I]624-aglauros beg [you]624-aglauros to help [a lover]6116-a lover . ’[624-aglauros] [Aglauros]624-aglauros looked at [him]2142-him with the same rapacious eyes with which [she]624-aglauros had lately looked into golden [Minerva]610-pallas ’s hidden secret , and [she]624-aglauros demanded a heavy weight of gold for [her]624-aglauros services . Meanwhile [she]624-aglauros compelled [him]2142-him to leave [the house]1713-the house .

Now [the warrior goddess]2144-the warrior goddess turned angry eyes on [her]624-aglauros , and in [her]2144-the warrior goddess emotion drew breath from deep inside so that both [her]2144-the warrior goddess strong breast and the aegis that covered [her]2144-the warrior goddess breast shook with it . [She]624-aglauros remembered that [this girl]2145-this girl had revealed [her]2145-this girl secret with profane hands , when , breaking [her]624-aglauros command , [she]624-aglauros had seen [Erichthonius]611-erichthonius , [son of [Vulcan]568-vulcan]2146-son of vulcan , [the Lemnian]2147-the lemnian , [the child born without a mother]2148-the child born without a mother . Now [the girl]1792-the girl would be dear to [the god]1482-the god , and to [[her]1792-the girl own sister]2151-her own sister , and rich with the gold [she]1792-the girl acquired , demanded by [her]624-aglauros greed . Straightaway [the goddess]5864-the goddess made for [[Envy]626-envy ’s house]2153-envy ’s house that is filthy with dark decay . [[Her]626-envy cave]2154-her cave was hidden deep among [valleys , sunless and inaccessible to the winds]2155-valleys , sunless and inaccessible to the winds , [a melancholy place and filled with a numbing cold]2156-a melancholy place and filled with a numbing cold . Fire is always absent , and fog always fills it .

When [the feared war goddess]2157-the feared war goddess came [there]1878-there , [she]2157-the feared war goddess stood outside [the cave]2159-the cave , since [she]2157-the feared war goddess had no right to enter [the place]1552-the place , and struck the doors with the butt of [her]2157-the feared war goddess spear . With the blow they flew open . [Envy]626-envy could be seen , eating vipers ’ meat that fed [her]626-envy venom , and at the sight [the goddess]5864-the goddess averted [her]5864-the goddess eyes . But the other got up slowly from the ground , leaving the half - eaten snake flesh , and came forward with sluggish steps . When [she]5864-the goddess saw [the goddess]5864-the goddess dressed in [her]5864-the goddess armour and [her]5864-the goddess beauty , [she]5864-the goddess moaned and frowned as [she]5864-the goddess sighed . Pallor spreads over [her]5864-the goddess face , and all [her]5864-the goddess body shrivels . [Her]5864-the goddess sight is skewed , [her]5864-the goddess teeth are livid with decay , [her]5864-the goddess breast is green with bile , and [her]5864-the goddess tongue is suffused with venom . [She]5864-the goddess only smiles at the sight of suffering . [She]5864-the goddess never sleeps , excited by watchful cares . [She]5864-the goddess finds [men]5788-men ’s successes disagreeable , and pines away at the sight . [She]5864-the goddess gnaws and being gnawed is also [her]5864-the goddess own punishment . Though [she]5864-the goddess hated [her]5864-the goddess so , nevertheless [Tritonia]627-tritonia spoke briefly to [her]2163-her . ‘[2157-the feared war goddess] [Poison one of [Cecrops ’s daughters]2162-cecrops ’s daughters]2161-poison one of cecrops ’s daughters with [your]2163-her venom . That is the task . [Aglauros]624-aglauros is [the one]1688-the one . ’ Without more words [she]5864-the goddess fled and with a thrust of [her]5864-the goddess spear sprang from [the earth]1463-the earth . [Envy]626-envy , squinting at [her]5864-the goddess as [she]5864-the goddess flees , gives out low mutterings , sorry to think of [Minerva]610-pallas ’s coming success . [She]5864-the goddess takes [her]5864-the goddess staff bound with strands of briar , and sets out , shrouded in gloomy clouds . Wherever [she]5864-the goddess passes [she]5864-the goddess tramples [the flower - filled fields]6121-the flower - filled fields , withers the grass , blasts the highest treetops and poisons [homes]1526-homes , [cities]6123-cities and [peoples]6124-peoples with [her]5864-the goddess breath . At last [she]5864-the goddess sees [Athens]85-athens , [Tritonia]627-tritonia [’s city , flourishing with arts and riches and leisured peace]6125-’s city , flourishing with arts and riches and leisured peace . [She]5864-the goddess can hardly hold back [her]5864-the goddess tears because [she]5864-the goddess sees nothing tearful . But after entering [the chamber of [[Cecrops]628-cecrops ’s daughter]6127-cecrops ’s daughter]6126-the chamber of cecrops ’s daughter , [she]5864-the goddess carried out [her]5864-the goddess command and touched [her]5864-the goddess breast with a hand tinted with darkness and filled [her]5864-the goddess heart with sharp thorns . Then [she]5864-the goddess breathed poisonous , destructive breath into [her]5864-the goddess and spread black venom through [her]5864-the goddess bones and the inside of [her]5864-the goddess lungs . And so that the cause for pain might never be far away [she]5864-the goddess placed [[Aglauros]624-aglauros ’s sister]6128-aglauros ’s sister before [her]5864-the goddess eyes , in imagination , [[her]2165-her sister]6129-her sister ’s fortunate marriage , and the beauty of [the god]1482-the god , magnifying it all . [[Cecrops]628-cecrops ’s daughter]6127-cecrops ’s daughter , tormented by this , is eaten by secret agony , and troubled by night and troubled by light , [she]2165-her moans and wastes away in slow , wretched decay , like ice eroded by the fitful sun . [She]2165-her is consumed by envy of [Herses]629-herses ’[1688-the one] happiness ; just as when a fire is lit under a pile of weeds which give no flames and burn with a slow heat . Often [she]2165-her longed to die so that [she]2165-her need not look on , often to tell [[her]2165-her stern father]2166-her stern father of it as a crime . Finally [she]2165-her sat down at [[her]2165-her sister]6129-her sister ’s threshold to oppose [the god]1482-the god ’s entrance when [he]2166-her stern father came . When [he]2166-her stern father threw compliments , prayers and gentlest words at [her]2165-her , [she]2165-her said ‘ Stop now , since [I]2165-her wo n’t go from here until [I]2165-her have driven [you]2166-her stern father away . ’[2165-her] ‘ [We]6132-we ’ll hold to that contract ’[2165-her] [Cyllenius]630-cyllenius quickly replied , and [he]2166-her stern father opened the door with a touch of [his]2166-her stern father heavenly wand . At this [the girl]1792-the girl tried to rise , but found [her]1792-the girl limbs , bent from sitting , unable to move from dull heaviness . When [she]2165-her tried to lift [her]2165-her body , [her]2165-her knees were rigid , cold sank through [her]2165-her to [her]2165-her fingernails , and [her]2165-her arteries grew pale with loss of blood . As an untreatable cancer slowly spreads more widely bringing disease to still undamaged parts so a lethal chill gradually filled [her]2165-her breast sealing the vital paths and airways . [She]2165-her no longer tried to speak , and if [she]2165-her had tried , [her]2165-her voice had no means of exit . Already stone had gripped [her]2165-her neck , [her]2165-her features hardened , and [she]2165-her sat there , a bloodless statue . Nor was [she]2165-her white stone : [her]2165-her mind had stained it . When [Mercury]545-mercury had inflicted this punishment on [the girl]1792-the girl for [her]1792-the girl impious words and thoughts , [he]545-mercury left [[Pallas]610-pallas ’s land]2171-pallas ’s land behind and flew to the heavens on outstretched wings . There [[his]545-mercury father]1775-his father calls [him]545-mercury aside , and without revealing love as the reason , says ‘ [Son]6133-son , [faithful worker of [my]545-mercury commands]6134-faithful worker of my commands , go , quickly in [your]6133-son usual way , fly down to where , in [an eastern land]6135-an eastern land , [they]6136-they observe [[your]6133-son mother]1807-your mother ’s star , among [the Pleiades]87-the pleiades , ( [the inhabitants]6138-the inhabitants give it the name of [Sidon]631-sidon ) . There drive the herd of royal cattle , that [you]6133-son will see some distance off , grazing [the mountain grass]6139-the mountain grass , towards [the sea shore]6140-the sea shore ! ’[545-mercury] [He]545-mercury spoke , and immediately , as [he]545-mercury commanded , the cattle , driven from [the mountain]1771-the mountain , headed for [the shore]2065-the shore , where [[the great king]2175-the great king ’s daughter]2176-the great king ’s daughter , [Europa]632-europa , used to play together with [the Tyrian virgins]2177-the tyrian virgins . [Royalty]2178-royalty and love do not sit well together , nor stay long in [the same house]2179-the same house . So [[the father]1852-the father and ruler of [the gods]1538-the gods , who is armed with the three - forked lightning in [his]1852-the father right hand , whose nod shakes [the world]1448-the world , setting aside [his]1852-the father royal sceptre]2181-the father and ruler of the gods , who is armed with the three - forked lightning in his right hand , whose nod shakes the world , setting aside his royal sceptre , took on the shape of a bull , lowed among the other cattle , and , beautiful to look at , wandered in the tender grass . In colour [he]1852-the father was white as the snow that rough feet have not trampled and the rain - filled south wind has not melted . The muscles rounded out [his]1852-the father neck , the dewlaps hung down in front , the horns were twisted , but one might argue they were made by hand , purer and brighter than pearl . [His]1852-the father forehead was not fearful , [his]1852-the father eyes were not formidable , and [his]1852-the father expression was peaceful . [[Agenor]633-agenor ’s daughter]2184-agenor ’s daughter marvelled at how beautiful [he]1852-the father was and how unthreatening . But though [he]1852-the father seemed so gentle [she]2184-agenor ’s daughter was afraid at first to touch [him]1852-the father . Soon [she]2184-agenor ’s daughter drew close and held flowers out to [his]1852-the father glistening mouth . [The lover]2082-the lover was joyful and while [he]1852-the father waited for [his]1852-the father hoped - for pleasure [he]1852-the father kissed [her]2184-agenor ’s daughter hands . [He]1852-the father could scarcely separate then from now . At one moment [he]1852-the father frolics and runs riot in the grass , at another [he]1852-the father lies down , white as snow on [the yellow sands]2186-the yellow sands . When [her]2184-agenor ’s daughter fear has gradually lessened [he]1852-the father offers [his]1852-the father chest now for virgin hands to pat and now [his]1852-the father horns to twine with fresh wreaths of flowers . [The royal virgin]2187-the royal virgin even dares to sit on the bull ’s back , not realising whom [she]2187-the royal virgin presses on , while [the god]1482-the god , first from [dry land]2189-dry land and then from [the shoreline]2190-the shoreline , gradually slips [his]1852-the father deceitful hooves into the waves . Then [he]1852-the father goes further out and carries [his]1852-the father prize over [the mid - surface of [the sea]1464-the sea]2191-the mid - surface of the sea . [She]2184-agenor ’s daughter is terrified and looks back at [the abandoned shore]2193-the abandoned shore [she]2184-agenor ’s daughter has been stolen from and [her]2184-agenor ’s daughter right hand grips a horn , the other [his]1852-the father back , [her]2184-agenor ’s daughter clothes fluttering , winding , behind [her]2184-agenor ’s daughter in the breeze .

And now [the god]1482-the god , dispensing with the deceptive image of the bull , confessed who [he]1852-the father was , and made for [the fields of [Crete]88-crete]2195-the fields of crete . Meanwhile [[Europa]632-europa ’s father]2196-europa ’s father , in ignorance of this , orders [[his]2196-europa ’s father son]1773-his son [Cadmus]634-cadmus to search for [the stolen girl]2198-the stolen girl , and adds that exile is [his]634-cadmus punishment if [he]634-cadmus fails to find [her]2198-the stolen girl , showing [himself]634-cadmus , by the same action , both pious and impious . Roaming [the world]1448-the world ( for who can discover whatever [Jupiter]499-jupiter has taken ? ) [[Agenor]633-agenor ’s son]2200-agenor ’s son , [the fugitive]2201-the fugitive , shuns [[his]2200-agenor ’s son native land]2202-his native land and [[his]2200-agenor ’s son parent]2203-his parent ’s anger and as a suppliant consults [[Apollo]519-phoebus ’s oracle]2204-apollo ’s oracle and asks in what land [he]2200-agenor ’s son might settle . [Phoebus]519-phoebus replies ‘ [A heifer]6141-a heifer will find [you]2200-agenor ’s son in [the fields]1522-the fields , that has never submitted to the yoke and is unaccustomed to the curved plough . Go where [she]2206-her leads , and where [she]2206-her finds rest on the grass build the walls of [Thebes]89-thebes , [[your]2200-agenor ’s son city]6143-your city , and call [the land Boeotia]6144-the land boeotia . ’[519-phoebus]

[Cadmus]634-cadmus had scarcely left [the Castalian cave]2205-the castalian cave when [he]634-cadmus saw an unguarded heifer , moving slowly , and showing no mark of the yoke on [her]2206-her neck . [He]634-cadmus follows close behind and chooses [his]634-cadmus steps by the traces of [her]2206-her course , and silently thanks [Phoebus]519-phoebus , [[his]634-cadmus guide]2207-his guide to the way . Now [he]634-cadmus had passed [the fords of [Cephisus]21-cephisus]2208-the fords of cephisus and [the fields of [Panope]91-panope]2209-the fields of panope : [the heifer]2210-the heifer stopped , and lifting [her]2206-her beautiful head with its noble horns to the sky stirred the air with [her]2206-her lowing . Then looking back , to see [[her]2206-her companion]2211-her companion following , [she]2206-her sank [her]2206-her hindquarters on the ground and lowered [her]2206-her body onto the tender grass . [Cadmus]634-cadmus gave thanks , pressing [his]634-cadmus lips to the foreign soil and welcoming [the unknown hills and fields]2212-the unknown hills and fields . Intending to offer a sacrifice to [Jupiter]499-jupiter , [he]634-cadmus ordered [[his]634-cadmus attendants]2213-his attendants to go in search of water from [a running stream]2214-a running stream for a libation . There was an ancient wood there , free from desecration , and , in the centre of [it]2215-it , a chasm thick with bushes and willow branches , framed in effect by stones making a low arch , and rich with copious springs . There was a snake sacred to [Mars]635-mars concealed in [this cave]2216-this cave , with a prominent golden crest . Fire flickered in its eyes , its whole body was swollen with venom , its three - forked tongue flickered , and its teeth were set in a triple row .

After [the people of [Tyre]92-tyre]2217-the people of tyre , setting out , a fatal step , reached [the grove]1996-the grove , and let [their]2217-the people of tyre pitchers down into the water , it gave out a reverberation . The dark green snake thrust [his]2219-his head out of [the deep cavern]2220-the deep cavern , hissing awesomely . The pitchers fell from [their]2217-the people of tyre hands , the blood left [their]2217-the people of tyre bodies , and , terrified , a sudden tremor took possession of [their]2217-the people of tyre limbs . The snake winds [his]2219-his scaly coils in restless writhings , and , shooting upwards , curves into a huge arc . With half its length raised into thin air , it peers down over the whole wood , [its]2219-his body as great , seen in its entirety , as that Dragon that separates [the twin constellations of [the Bear]93-the bear]2221-the twin constellations of the bear . Without pause [he]634-cadmus takes [the Phoenicians]636-the phoenicians , whether [they]636-the phoenicians prepare to fight , run , or are held by fear itself . Some [he]634-cadmus slays with [his]634-cadmus bite , some [he]634-cadmus kills in [his]634-cadmus deep embraces , others with the corrupting putrefaction of [his]634-cadmus venomous breath . The sun had reached the heights of the sky , and driven away the shadows . And now [the son of [Agenor]633-agenor]2222-the son of agenor , wondering what has delayed [[his]2222-the son of agenor friends]2223-his friends , searches for [the men]2224-the men . [He]2222-the son of agenor is covered with the pelt stripped from a lion . [His]2222-the son of agenor sword is tipped with glittering iron . [He]2222-the son of agenor has a spear , and better still a spirit superior to all . When [he]2222-the son of agenor enters the wood and sees the dead bodies , and over [them]2224-the men the victorious enemy , with its vast body , licking at [their]2224-the men sad wounds with a bloody tongue , [he]2222-the son of agenor cries out ‘ Faithful hearts , [I]2222-the son of agenor shall either be [the avenger of [your]6146-your deaths]6145-the avenger of your deaths , or become [[your]6146-your companion]6147-your companion ’[2222-the son of agenor] . So saying [he]2222-the son of agenor lifted a massive rock with [his]2222-the son of agenor right hand and with great effort hurled the huge weight . Steep walls with [their]2224-the men high turrets , would have been shattered by the force of the blow , but the snake remained unwounded , protected by its scales like a breastplate , and its dark , hard skin repelled the powerful stroke .

But that same hardness can not keep out the spear that defeats it , that is fixed in a curve of its pliant back , and sinks [its]2225-its whole iron blade into its entrails . [The creature maddened with pain]2226-the creature maddened with pain twists [its]2226-the creature maddened with pain head over [its]2226-the creature maddened with pain back , sees the wound , and bites at the shaft lodged there . Even when the snake had loosened its hold all round by its powerful efforts , [it]2226-the creature maddened with pain could scarcely rip [it]2227-it from [its]2226-the creature maddened with pain flesh and the iron stayed fixed in [its]2226-the creature maddened with pain spine . Then indeed new purpose was added to [its]2226-the creature maddened with pain usual wrath : [its]2226-the creature maddened with pain throat swells , the veins fill , and white spume flecks its baleful jaws . The earth resounds to its scaly scraping and a black breath like that from the mouth of the Styx fouls the corrupted air . At one instant it coils in vast spiralling circles , at another rears up straighter than a high tree . Again it rushes on like [a rain - filled river]2228-a rain - filled river and knocks down all the trees obstructing it in front . [The son of Agenor]2222-the son of agenor gives way a little withstanding [its]2226-the creature maddened with pain attacks by means of the lion ’s skin and keeps back the ravening jaws by thrusting forward the point of [his]2222-the son of agenor sword . The snake is maddened and bites uselessly at the hard iron and only drives the sharp point between its teeth . Now the blood begins to drip from its venomous throat and soak the green grass with its spattering . But the wound is slight , because the serpent draws back from the thrust , pulling [its]2226-the creature maddened with pain wounded neck away , and , conceding its wound , keeps back the sword , and does not let it sink deeper . But [the son of [Agenor]633-agenor]2222-the son of agenor following it all the time presses the embedded iron into its throat , until an oak - tree blocks [its]2226-the creature maddened with pain backward course and neck and tree are pinned together . The tree bends under the serpent ’s weight and the trunk of the oak groans with the lashing of its tail . While [the conqueror]2231-the conqueror stares at [the vast bulk of [[his]2231-the conqueror conquered enemy]2233-his conquered enemy]2232-the vast bulk of his conquered enemy , suddenly a voice is heard . It is not easy to imagine where it comes from , but it is heard . ‘ Why gaze , [son of Agenor]6148-son of agenor , at the serpent [you]6148-son of agenor have killed ? [You]6148-son of agenor too shall be [a serpent to be gazed on]6149-a serpent to be gazed on . ’[2222-the son of agenor] For a long time [he]2222-the son of agenor stands there quaking , and at the same time loses colour in [his]2222-the son of agenor face , and [his]2222-the son of agenor hair stands on end in cold terror .
