Then , behold , [Pallas]610-pallas , [[the hero]2234-the hero ’s guardian]2235-the hero ’s guardian approaches , sinking down through the upper air , and orders [him]2222-the son of agenor to turn [the earth]1463-the earth and sow the dragon ’s teeth , destined to generate [a people]2237-a people . [He]2222-the son of agenor obeys , and opening the furrows with a slice of [his]2222-the son of agenor plough , sows the teeth in the ground , as human seed . Then , almost beyond belief , the cultivated earth begins to move , and first spear points appear among the furrows , next helmets nodding [their]2238-their painted crests , then chests and shoulders spring up , and arms weighed down with spears , and [the field]2239-the field is thick with the round shields of [warriors]2240-warriors . Just as at festivals in [the theatre]2241-the theatre , when the curtain is lifted at the end , designs rise in the air , first revealing faces and then gradually the rest , until , raised gently and steadily , [they]2242-their are seen whole , and at last [their]2242-their feet rest on the lower border .

Alarmed by [this new enemy]2243-this new enemy [Cadmus]634-cadmus was about to take up [his]634-cadmus weapons : ‘ Keep away ’[634-cadmus] one of [the army]2244-the army , that [the earth]1463-the earth had produced , cried at [him]634-cadmus ‘ and take no part in [our]2244-the army internal wars ! ’[634-cadmus] So saying [he]634-cadmus raised [his]634-cadmus sharp sword against [one of [[his]634-cadmus earth - born brothers]2247-his earth - born brothers nearby]2246-one of his earth - born brothers nearby , then , [himself]634-cadmus , fell to a spear thrown from far off . But [the one who killed [him]634-cadmus]2248-the one who killed him lived no longer than [he]634-cadmus did and breathed out the air [he]634-cadmus had just breathed in . This example stirred [them]2242-their all equally , as if at a storm - wind , and , in [their]2242-their warring , [these brothers of a moment]2249-these brothers of a moment were felled by mutual wounds . And now [these youths , who were allowed such brief lives]2250-these youths , who were allowed such brief lives , were drumming on [[their]2250-these youths , who were allowed such brief lives mother]1928-their mother ’s breast hot with [their]2250-these youths , who were allowed such brief lives blood . [Five]2252-five were still standing , one of whom was [Echion]637-echion . [He]637-echion , at a warning from [Pallas]610-pallas , threw [his]637-echion weapons on the ground and sought assurances of peace from [[his]637-echion brothers]2253-his brothers , and gave [them]2253-his brothers in return . [The Sidonian wanderer]2254-the sidonian wanderer had [these men]2255-these men as [companions]2256-companions in [his]2254-the sidonian wanderer task when [he]2254-the sidonian wanderer founded [the city commanded by [Apollo]519-phoebus ’s oracle]2257-the city commanded by apollo ’s oracle . Now [Thebes]89-thebes stands , and now [you]2258-your might be seen as happy , in [your]2258-your exile , [Cadmus]634-cadmus . [You]2258-your have [Mars]635-mars and [Venus]523-venus as [[[your]2258-your bride]2259-your bride ’s parents]2260-your bride ’s parents , and added to this [the children of [so noble a wife]2262-so noble a wife]2261-the children of so noble a wife , [so many sons]2263-so many sons and [daughters]2264-daughters , and [dearly loved descendants]2265-dearly loved descendants , [[your]2258-your grandchildren]2266-your grandchildren , who now are [young men]2267-young men . But in truth [we]2268-we should always wait for [a man]5897-a man ’s last day , for that time when [he]5897-a man has paid [his]5897-a man last debt , and [we]2268-we should call [no man]2270-no man ’s life happy until [he]5897-a man is dead . [Actaeon]638-actaeon , [one of [[your]2258-your grandsons]2272-your grandsons]2271-one of your grandsons , was [your]2258-your first reason for grief , in all [your]2258-your happiness , [Cadmus]634-cadmus . Strange horns appeared on [his]638-actaeon forehead , and [his]638-actaeon hunting dogs sated themselves on the blood of [[their]2273-their master]2274-their master . But if [you]2258-your look carefully , [you]2258-your will find that it was the fault of chance and not wickedness : what wickedness is there in error ? It happened on [a mountain]2275-a mountain , stained with the blood of many creatures , and midday had contracted every shadow and the sun was equidistant from either end of [his]638-actaeon journey . Then [Actaeon]638-actaeon , [the young Boeotian , with a quiet expression]2276-the young boeotian , with a quiet expression , spoke to [[his]638-actaeon companions]2277-his companions in the hunt as [they]2277-his companions wandered through the solitary wilds ‘ [Friends]6150-friends , [our]6150-friends spears and nets are drenched with the blood of [[our]6150-friends victims]6151-our victims , and the day has been fortunate enough . When [Aurora]569-aurora in [her]569-aurora golden chariot brings another day [we]6150-friends will resume [our]6150-friends purpose . Now [Phoebus]519-phoebus is also between the limits of [his]519-phoebus task , and is splitting open [the earth]1463-the earth with [his]519-phoebus heat . Finish [your]2224-the men present task and carry home the netted meshes . ’[2224-the men] [The men]2224-the men obeyed [his]638-actaeon order and left off [their]2224-the men labour . There was [a valley there]2279-a valley there called [Gargaphie]94-gargaphie , dense with pine trees and sharp cypresses , sacred to [[Diana]527-diana of the high - girded tunic]2280-diana of the high - girded tunic , where , in the depths , there is [a wooded cave]2281-a wooded cave , not fashioned by art . But ingenious nature had imitated art . [She]527-diana had made a natural arch out of native pumice and porous tufa . On the right , a spring of bright clear water murmured into a widening pool , enclosed by grassy banks . Here [the woodland goddess , weary from the chase]2282-the woodland goddess , weary from the chase , would bathe [her]527-diana virgin limbs in the crystal liquid . [Another]2286-another takes [her]527-diana robe over [her]527-diana arm , while two unfasten the sandals on [her]527-diana feet . Then , more skilful than the rest , [Theban Crocale]639-theban crocale gathers the hair strewn around [her]639-theban crocale neck into a knot , while [her]639-theban crocale own is still loose . So [the fates]2293-the fates would have it . As soon as [he]2290-cadmus ’s grandson reaches [the cave]2159-the cave mouth dampened by the fountain , [the naked nymphs]2295-the naked nymphs , seeing [a man]5897-a man ’s face , beat at [their]2295-the naked nymphs breasts and filling the whole wood with [their]2295-the naked nymphs sudden outcry , crowd round [Diana]527-diana to hide [her]527-diana with [their]2295-the naked nymphs bodies . But [the goddess]5864-the goddess stood head and shoulders above all the others . However , though [[her]527-diana band of nymphs]2298-her band of nymphs gathered in confusion around [her]527-diana , [she]527-diana stood turning to one side , and looking back , and wishing [she]527-diana had [her]527-diana arrows to hand . And as [she]527-diana sprinkled [his]5875-the man hair with the vengeful drops [she]527-diana added these words , harbingers of [his]5875-the man coming ruin , ‘ Now [you]5875-the man may tell , if [you]5875-the man can tell that is , of having seen [me]527-diana naked ! ’[527-diana] Without more threats , [she]527-diana gave the horns of a mature stag to the head [she]527-diana had sprinkled , lengthening [his]5875-the man neck , making [his]5875-the man ear - tips pointed , changing feet for hands , long legs for arms , and covering [his]5875-the man body with a dappled hide . And then [she]527-diana added fear . [[Autonoë]646-autonoë ’s brave son]2300-autonoë ’s brave son flies off , marvelling at such swift speed , within [himself]2300-autonoë ’s brave son . But when [he]2300-autonoë ’s brave son sees [his]2300-autonoë ’s brave son head and horns reflected for certain in [the water]1620-the water , [he]2300-autonoë ’s brave son tries to say ‘ Oh , look at [me]2300-autonoë ’s brave son ! ’[2300-autonoë ’s brave son] but no voice follows . [He]2300-autonoë ’s brave son groans : that is [his]2300-autonoë ’s brave son voice , and tears run down [his]2300-autonoë ’s brave son altered face . Only [his]2300-autonoë ’s brave son mind remains unchanged . What can [he]2300-autonoë ’s brave son do ? Shall [he]2300-autonoë ’s brave son return to [[his]2300-autonoë ’s brave son home]2302-his home and [the royal palace]2303-the royal palace , or lie hidden in [the woods]1690-the woods ? [The pack of [them]2309-them]2312-the pack of them , greedy for the prey follow over [cliffs and crags]2313-cliffs and crags , and [inaccessible rocks]2314-inaccessible rocks , where the way is hard or there is no way at all . [He]2315-his runs , over the places where [he]2315-his has often chased , flying , alas , from [his]2315-his own hounds . [He]2315-his longs to shout ‘ [I]2315-his am [Actaeon]638-actaeon ! Know [[your]638-actaeon own master]6156-your own master ! ’[2315-his] but words fail [him]2315-his , the air echoes to the baying . First ‘ Black - hair ’[2315-his] , Melanchaetes , wounds [his]2315-his back , then ‘ Killer ’[675-theridamas] , [Theridamas]675-theridamas , and [Oresitrophos]676-oresitrophos , [the ‘ Climber ’]6157-the ‘ climber ’[6157-the ‘ climber ’] , clings to [his]2315-his shoulder . [They]2312-the pack of them had set out late but outflanked the route by a shortcut over [the mountains]1513-the mountains . While [they]2312-the pack of them hold [[their]2312-the pack of them master]2274-their master [the whole pack]2318-the whole pack gathers and [they]2312-the pack of them sink [their]2312-the pack of them teeth in [his]2315-his body till there is no place left to wound [him]2315-his . [He]2315-his groans and makes a noise , not human , but still not one a deer could make , and fills familiar heights with mournful cries . And on [his]2315-his knees , like a suppliant begging , [he]2315-his turns [his]2315-his wordless head from side to side , as if [he]2315-his were stretching arms out towards [them]2312-the pack of them . Now [[his]2315-his friends]2223-his friends , unknowingly , urge the ravening crowd of dogs on with [their]2223-his friends usual cries , looking out for [Actaeon]638-actaeon , and shouting , in emulation , for absent [Actaeon]638-actaeon ( [he]638-actaeon turning [his]638-actaeon head at the sound of [his]638-actaeon name ) complaining [he]2315-his is not there , and through [his]2315-his slowness is missing the spectacle offered by [[their]2312-the pack of them prey]2320-their prey . [He]2315-his might wish to be absent it ’s true , but [he]2315-his is here : [he]2315-his might wish to see and not feel the fierce doings of [his]2315-his own hounds . [They]2312-the pack of them surround [him]2315-his on every side , sinking [their]2312-the pack of them jaws into [his]2315-his flesh , tearing [[their]2312-the pack of them master]2274-their master to pieces in the deceptive shape of the deer . [They]2312-the pack of them say [Diana]527-diana [the Quiver - bearer]2322-the quiver - bearer ’s anger was not appeased , until [his]2315-his life had ended in innumerable wounds . The debate is undecided : to some the punishment is more violent than just , merely for seeing the face of [a goddess]6068-a goddess , [others]5836-others approve it and call it fitting because of [her]6068-a goddess strict vow of virginity , and both can make a case . [Only [Jupiter]499-jupiter ’s wife]2325-only jupiter ’s wife was saying nothing , neither of praise or blame . [She]2325-only jupiter ’s wife was glad of the disaster that had come down on [the house of [Agenor]633-agenor]2326-the house of agenor , and had transferred [her]2325-only jupiter ’s wife hatred from [Europa]632-europa , to [those who were allied to [the Tyrian girl]2328-the tyrian girl by birth]2327-those who were allied to the tyrian girl by birth . Then there was a fresh wrong added to the first . [She]2325-only jupiter ’s wife was grieved by the fact that [Semele]677-semele was pregnant , with the seed of [mighty Jove]605-jove . Swallowing words of reproach , [she]2325-only jupiter ’s wife said ‘ What , in truth , have [I]2325-only jupiter ’s wife gained from frequent reproaches ? [I]2325-only jupiter ’s wife must attack [her]677-semele . If [I]2325-only jupiter ’s wife am rightly to be called most powerful [Juno]525-juno , if it is right for [me]2325-only jupiter ’s wife to hold the jewelled sceptre in [my]2325-only jupiter ’s wife hand , if [I]2325-only jupiter ’s wife am [queen]6158-queen , and [sister]6159-sister and [wife of [Jove]605-jove]6160-wife of jove , [sister]6159-sister at least , then it is [her]677-semele [I]2325-only jupiter ’s wife must destroy . Yet [I]2325-only jupiter ’s wife think [she]677-semele is content with [her]677-semele secret , and the injury to [my]2325-only jupiter ’s wife marriage will be brief . But [she]677-semele has conceived – and that damages [me]2325-only jupiter ’s wife – and makes [her]677-semele crime visible in [her]677-semele swollen belly , and wants , what [I]2325-only jupiter ’s wife have barely achieved , to be confirmed as [the mother of [Jupiter]499-jupiter ’s child]6162-the mother of jupiter ’s child , so great is [her]677-semele faith in [her]677-semele beauty . [I]2325-only jupiter ’s wife will render that faith hollow . [I]2325-only jupiter ’s wife am not [Saturnia]540-saturnia if [she]677-semele does not plunge into [the Stygian waters]1799-the stygian waters , overwhelmed by [Jove]605-jove [himself]605-jove . ’[2325-only jupiter ’s wife] At this [she]2329-she rose from [her]2329-she seat and cloaked in a dark cloud [she]2329-she came to [Semele]677-semele ’s threshold . But before [she]2329-she removed the cloud [she]2329-she disguised [herself]2329-she as [an old woman]2330-an old woman , ageing [her]2329-she hair , ploughing [her]2329-she skin with wrinkles , and walking with bowed legs and tottering steps . [She]2329-she made [her]2329-she voice sound old and was [herself]2329-she Beroë , [[Semele]677-semele ’s Epidaurian nurse]2331-semele ’s epidaurian nurse . So , when [they]2332-they came to [Jupiter]499-jupiter ’s name , in the midst of [their]2332-they lengthy gossiping , [she]2329-she sighed , and said ‘ [I]2329-she hope , for [your]677-semele sake , that it really is [Jupiter]499-jupiter , but [I]2329-she am suspicious of all that sort of thing . [Many men]6164-many men have entered [the bedrooms of [chaste women]6166-chaste women]6165-the bedrooms of chaste women in the name of [the gods]1538-the gods . It ’s not good enough for [him]499-jupiter merely to be [Jove]605-jove : [he]499-jupiter must give a proof of [his]499-jupiter love if it truly is [him]499-jupiter . Beg [him]499-jupiter to assume all [his]499-jupiter powers before [he]499-jupiter embraces [you]677-semele , and be just as glorious as when [Juno]525-juno welcomes [him]499-jupiter on high . ’[2329-she]

With such words [Juno]525-juno gulled [the unsuspecting daughter of [Cadmus]634-cadmus]2333-the unsuspecting daughter of cadmus . [Semele]677-semele asked [Jupiter]499-jupiter for an unspecified gift . ‘ Choose ! ’[1482-the god] said [the god]1482-the god , ‘ Nothing will be refused , and , so that [you]677-semele may believe it more firmly , [I]1482-the god swear it by the Stygian torrent , that is the divine conscience , the fear , and god , of [all the gods]1558-all the gods . ’[1482-the god] Pleased by [her]677-semele misfortune , too successful , and doomed to be undone by [[her]677-semele lover]2335-her lover ’s indulgence , [Semele]677-semele said ‘ As [Saturnia]540-saturnia is used to [your]499-jupiter embrace , when [you]499-jupiter enter into the pact of [Venus]523-venus , give [yourself]499-jupiter to [me]677-semele ! ’[677-semele] [The god]1482-the god would have stopped [her]677-semele lips as [she]677-semele spoke : but [her]677-semele voice had already rushed into the air . [He]499-jupiter groans , since [she]677-semele can not un - wish it or [he]499-jupiter un - swear it . So , most sorrowfully , [he]499-jupiter climbs [the heights of heaven]1531-the heights of heaven , and , with a look , gathered the trailing clouds , then added their vapours to lightning mixed with storm - winds , and thunder and fateful lightning bolts . Still , [he]499-jupiter tries to reduce [his]499-jupiter power in whatever way [he]499-jupiter can , and does not arm [himself]499-jupiter with that lightning with which [he]499-jupiter deposed hundred - handed [Typhoeus]678-typhoeus : it is too savage in [his]499-jupiter grasp . There is a lighter dart to which [the Cyclops]679-cyclops ’s hands gave a less violent fire , a lesser anger . [The gods]1538-the gods call [these]2339-these [his]499-jupiter secondary weapons . Taking these [he]499-jupiter enters [[Agenor]633-agenor ’s house]2340-agenor ’s house . But still [Semele]677-semele ’s mortal body could not endure the storm , and [she]677-semele was consumed , by the fire of [her]677-semele nuptial gift . [The infant Bacchus]2341-the infant bacchus , still unfinished , is torn from [the mother]2342-the mother ’s womb , and ( if it can be believed ) is sewn into [[his]2341-the infant bacchus father]1775-his father ’s thigh to complete [his]2341-the infant bacchus full term . [Ino]680-ino , [[[his]2341-the infant bacchus mother]5953-his mother ’s sister]2345-his mother ’s sister reared [him]2341-the infant bacchus secretly , in infancy , and then [he]2341-the infant bacchus was given to [the nymphs of [Mount Nysa]681-mount nysa who hid [him]2341-the infant bacchus in [[their]2346-the nymphs of mount nysa who hid him in their cave and fed him on milk cave]2347-their cave and fed [him]2341-the infant bacchus on milk]2346-the nymphs of mount nysa who hid him in their cave and fed him on milk .

While these things were brought about on [earth]1449-earth because of that fatal oath , and while [twice - born [Bacchus]682-bacchus ’s cradle]2349-twice - born bacchus ’s cradle remained safe , [they]2350-they say that [Jupiter]499-jupiter , expansive with wine , set aside [his]499-jupiter onerous duties , and relaxing , exchanging pleasantries , with [Juno]525-juno , said ‘ [You]683-tiresias gain more than [we]2350-they do from the pleasures of love . ’[525-juno] [She]525-juno denied it . [They]2350-they agreed to ask [learned Tiresias]683-tiresias for [his]683-tiresias opinion . [He]683-tiresias had known [Venus]523-venus in both ways . Once , with a blow of [his]683-tiresias stick , [he]683-tiresias had disturbed two large snakes mating in [the green forest]2351-the green forest , and , marvellous to tell , [he]683-tiresias was changed from [a man]5897-a man to [a woman]1994-a woman , and lived as such for seven years . In the eighth year [he]683-tiresias saw the same snakes again and said ‘ Since there is such power in plaguing [you]6169-you that it changes the giver of a blow to the opposite sex , [I]683-tiresias will strike [you]6169-you again , now . ’[683-tiresias] [He]683-tiresias struck the snakes and regained [his]683-tiresias former shape , and returned to the sex [he]683-tiresias was born with .

As [the arbiter of the light - hearted dispute]2354-the arbiter of the light - hearted dispute [he]683-tiresias confirmed [Jupiter]499-jupiter ’s words . [Saturnia]540-saturnia , it is said , was more deeply upset than was justified and than the dispute warranted , and damned [the one who had made the judgement to eternal night]2355-the one who had made the judgement to eternal night . But , since [no god]2356-no god has the right to void what [another god]2357-another god has done , [the all - powerful father of the gods]1537-the all - powerful father of the gods gave [Tiresias]683-tiresias knowledge of the future , in exchange for [his]683-tiresias lost sight , and lightened the punishment with honour .

Famous throughout [all the Aonian cities]2359-all the aonian cities , [Tiresias]683-tiresias gave faultless answers to [people who consulted [him]683-tiresias]2360-people who consulted him . [Dusky Liriope]684-dusky liriope , [the Naiad]2361-the naiad , was the first to test the truth and the accuracy of [his]684-dusky liriope words , whom once [the river - god Cephisus]2362-the river - god cephisus clasped in [[his]2362-the river - god cephisus winding streams]2363-his winding streams , and took by force under the waves . [This loveliest of nymphs]2364-this loveliest of nymphs gave birth at full term to [a child whom , even then , one]2365-a child whom , even then , one could fall in love with , called [Narcissus]685-narcissus . Being consulted as to whether [the child]2366-the child would live a long life , to a ripe old age , [the seer with prophetic vision]2367-the seer with prophetic vision replied ‘ If [he]2366-the child does not discover [himself]2366-the child ’[2367-the seer with prophetic vision] . For a long time [the augur]2368-the augur ’s pronouncement appeared empty words . But in the end it proved true : the outcome , and the cause of [his]2368-the augur death , and the strangeness of [his]2368-the augur passion . One year [the son of Cephisus]2369-the son of cephisus had reached sixteen and might seem both boy and [youth]2370-youth . [Many youths]2371-many youths , and [many young girls]2372-many young girls desired [him]2369-the son of cephisus . But there was such intense pride in that delicate form that [none of the youths]2373-none of the youths or [young girls]2374-young girls affected [him]2369-the son of cephisus . One day [the nymph Echo]686-echo saw [him]2369-the son of cephisus , driving frightened deer into [his]2369-the son of cephisus nets , [she]686-echo of the echoing voice , who can not be silent when others have spoken , nor learn how to speak first [herself]686-echo . [Echo]686-echo still had a body then and was not merely a voice . But though [she]686-echo was garrulous , [she]686-echo had no other trick of speech than [she]686-echo has now : [she]686-echo can repeat the last words out of many . [Juno]525-juno made [her]686-echo like that , because often when [she]686-echo might have caught [the nymphs]5945-the nymphs lying beneath [her]686-echo [Jupiter]499-jupiter , on [the mountain slopes]5890-the mountain slopes , [Echo]686-echo knowingly held [her]686-echo in long conversations , while [the nymphs]5945-the nymphs fled . When [Saturnia]540-saturnia realised this [she]540-saturnia said ‘ [I]540-saturnia shall give [you]685-narcissus less power over that tongue by which [I]540-saturnia have been deluded , and the briefest ability to speak ’[540-saturnia] and what [she]540-saturnia threatened [she]540-saturnia did . [Echo]686-echo only repeats the last of what is spoken and returns the words [she]686-echo hears . Now when [she]686-echo saw [Narcissus]685-narcissus wandering through [the remote fields]2378-the remote fields , [she]686-echo was inflamed , following [him]685-narcissus secretly , and the more [she]686-echo followed the closer [she]686-echo burned with fire , no differently than inflammable sulphur , pasted round the tops of torches , catches fire , when a flame is brought near it . O how often [she]686-echo wants to get close to [him]685-narcissus with seductive words , and call [him]685-narcissus with soft entreaties ! [Her]686-echo nature denies it , and will not let [her]686-echo begin , but [she]686-echo is ready for what it will allow [her]686-echo to do , to wait for sounds , to which [she]686-echo can return words . By chance , [the boy]1835-the boy , separated from [[his]1835-the boy faithful band of [followers]2015-followers]2380-his faithful band of followers , had called out ‘ Is [anyone]6067-anyone here ? ’[686-echo] and ‘ Here ’[686-echo] [Echo]686-echo replied . [He]1835-the boy is astonished , and glances everywhere , and shouts in a loud voice ‘ Come to [me]686-echo ! ’[686-echo] [She]686-echo calls as [he]1835-the boy calls . [He]1835-the boy looks back , and [no one appearing behind]2382-no one appearing behind , asks ‘ Why do [you]686-echo run from [me]1835-the boy ? ’[1835-the boy] and receives the same words as [he]1835-the boy speaks . [He]1835-the boy stands still , and deceived by the likeness to an answering voice , says ‘ Here , let [us]6171-us meet together ’[1835-the boy] . And , never answering to another sound more gladly , [Echo]686-echo replies ‘ Together ’[686-echo] , and to assist [her]686-echo words comes out of [the woods]1690-the woods to put [her]686-echo arms around [his]1835-the boy neck , in longing . [He]1835-the boy runs from [her]686-echo , and running cries ‘ Away with these encircling hands ! May [I]686-echo die before what ’s mine is [yours]686-echo . ’[686-echo] [She]686-echo answers , only ‘ What ’s mine is [yours]686-echo ! ’[686-echo] Scorned , [she]686-echo wanders in [the woods]1690-the woods and hides [her]686-echo face in shame among the leaves , and from that time on lives in [lonely caves]2385-lonely caves . But still [her]686-echo love endures , increased by the sadness of rejection . [Her]686-echo sleepless thoughts waste [her]686-echo sad form , and [her]686-echo body ’s strength vanishes into the air . Only [her]686-echo bones and the sound of [her]686-echo voice are left . [Her]686-echo voice remains , [her]686-echo bones , [they]2386-they say , were changed to shapes of stone . [She]686-echo hides in [the woods]1690-the woods , no longer to be seen on [the hills]5818-the hills , but to be heard by [everyone]2389-everyone . It is sound that lives in [her]686-echo . As [Narcissus]685-narcissus had scorned [her]686-echo , so [he]685-narcissus had scorned [the other nymphs of [the rivers and mountains]2391-the rivers and mountains]2390-the other nymphs of the rivers and mountains , so [he]685-narcissus had scorned the companies of [young men]2267-young men . Then one of [those who had been mocked , lifting hands to the skies]2393-those who had been mocked , lifting hands to the skies , said ‘ So may [he]685-narcissus [himself]685-narcissus love , and so may [he]685-narcissus fail to command what [he]685-narcissus loves ! ’[2393-those who had been mocked , lifting hands to the skies] [Rhamnusia]687-rhamnusia , who is the goddess [Nemesis]688-nemesis , heard this just request . There was an unclouded fountain , with silver - bright water , which [neither shepherds]2394-neither shepherds nor goats grazing [the hills]5818-the hills , nor other flocks , touched , that no animal or bird disturbed not even a branch falling from a tree . Grass was around [it]2396-it , fed by the moisture nearby , and a grove of trees that prevented the sun from warming [the place]1552-the place . Here , [the boy]1835-the boy , tired by the heat and [his]1835-the boy enthusiasm for the chase , lies down , drawn to it by its look and by [the fountain]2399-the fountain . While [he]1835-the boy desires to quench [his]1835-the boy thirst , a different thirst is created . While [he]1835-the boy drinks [he]1835-the boy is seized by the vision of [his]1835-the boy reflected form . [He]1835-the boy loves a bodiless dream . [He]1835-the boy thinks that a body , which is only a shadow . [He]1835-the boy is astonished by [himself]1835-the boy , and hangs there motionless , with a fixed expression , like a statue carved from Parian marble . Flat on the ground , [he]1835-the boy contemplates two stars , [his]1835-the boy eyes , and [his]1835-the boy hair , fit for Bacchus , fit for [Apollo]519-phoebus , [his]1835-the boy youthful cheeks and ivory neck , the beauty of [his]1835-the boy face , the rose - flush mingled in the whiteness of snow , admiring everything for which [he]1835-the boy is [himself]1835-the boy admired . Unknowingly [he]1835-the boy desires [himself]1835-the boy , and [the one who praises]2400-the one who praises is [himself]1835-the boy praised , and , while [he]1835-the boy courts , is courted , so that , equally , [he]1835-the boy inflames and burns . How often [he]1835-the boy gave [his]1835-the boy lips in vain to [the deceptive pool]2401-the deceptive pool , how often , trying to embrace the neck [he]1835-the boy could see , [he]1835-the boy plunged [his]1835-the boy arms into the water , but could not catch [himself]1835-the boy within them ! What [he]1835-the boy has seen [he]1835-the boy does not understand , but what [he]1835-the boy sees [he]1835-the boy is on fire for , and the same error both seduces and deceives [his]1835-the boy eyes . [Fool]2402-fool , why try to catch a fleeting image , in vain ? What [you]2403-you search for is nowhere : turning away , what [you]2403-you love is lost ! What [you]2403-you perceive is the shadow of reflected form : nothing of [you]2403-you is in it . It comes and stays with [you]2403-you , and leaves with [you]2403-you , if [you]2403-you can leave ! No care for [Ceres]689-ceres ’s gift of bread , or for rest , can draw [him]1835-the boy away . Stretched on [the shadowed grass]2404-the shadowed grass [he]1835-the boy gazes at that false image with un - sated eyes , and loses [himself]1835-the boy in [his]1835-the boy own vision . Raising [himself]1835-the boy a little way and holding [his]1835-the boy arms out to [the woods]1690-the woods , [he]1835-the boy asks , ‘ Has [anyone]6067-anyone ever loved more cruelly than [I]1835-the boy ? [You]2403-you must know , since [you]2403-you have been a chance hiding place for [many people]6173-many people . Do [you]2403-you remember in [your]2403-you life that lasts so many centuries , in all the long ages past , [anyone who pined away like this]6174-anyone who pined away like this ? [I]1835-the boy am enchanted and [I]1835-the boy see , but [I]1835-the boy can not reach what [I]1835-the boy see and what enchants [me]1835-the boy ’[1835-the boy] – so deep in error is [this lover]2406-this lover – ‘ and it increases [my]2407-i pain the more , that [no wide sea]6175-no wide sea separates [us]6176-us , [no road]6177-no road , no [mountains]6178-mountains , no walls with locked doors . [We]6176-us are only kept apart by a little water ! Whenever [I]2407-i extend [my]2407-i lips to the clear liquid , [he]1835-the boy tries to raise [his]1835-the boy lips to [me]2407-i . [He]1835-the boy desires to be held . [You]2403-you would think [he]1835-the boy could be touched : it is such a small thing that prevents [our]6176-us love . Whoever [you]2403-you are come out to [me]2407-i ! Why do [you]2403-you disappoint [me]2407-i , [[you]2403-you extraordinary boy]6179-you extraordinary boy ? Where do [you]2403-you vanish when [I]2407-i reach for [you]2403-you ? Surely [my]2407-i form and years are not what [you]2403-you flee from , and [I]2407-i am one that [the nymphs]5945-the nymphs have loved ! [You]2403-you offer [me]2407-i some unknown hope with [your]2403-you friendly look , and when [I]2407-i stretch [my]2407-i arms out to [you]2403-you , [you]2403-you stretch out [yours]2403-you . When [I]2407-i smile , [you]2403-you smile back . And [I]2407-i have often seen [your]2403-you tears when [I]2407-i weep tears . [You]2403-you return the gesture of [my]2407-i head with a nod , and , from the movements of [your]2403-you lovely mouth , [I]2407-i guess that [you]2403-you reply with words that do not reach [my]2407-i ears ! [I]2407-i am [he]2407-i . [I]2407-i sense it and [I]2407-i am not deceived by [my]2407-i own image . [I]2407-i am burning with love for [myself]2407-i . [I]2407-i move and bear the flames . What shall [I]2407-i do ? Surely not court and be courted ? Why court then ? What [I]2407-i want [I]2407-i have . [My]2407-i riches make [me]2407-i poor . O [I]2407-i wish [I]2407-i could leave [my]2407-i own body ! Strange prayer for [a lover]6116-a lover , [I]2407-i desire what [I]2407-i love to be distant from [me]2407-i . Now sadness takes away [my]2407-i strength , not much time is left for [me]2407-i to live , and [I]2407-i am cut off in the prime of youth . Nor is dying painful to [me]2407-i , laying down [my]2407-i sadness in death . [I]2407-i wish that [him]2407-i [I]2407-i love might live on , but now [we]6182-we shall die united , two in one spirit . ’[2407-i] [He]2407-i spoke , and returned madly to the same reflection , and [his]2407-i tears stirred the water , and the image became obscured in the rippling pool . As [he]2407-i saw it vanishing , [he]2407-i cried out ‘ Where do [you]2407-i fly to ? Stay , [cruel one]6183-cruel one , do not abandon one who loves [you]2407-i ! [I]2407-i am allowed to gaze at what [I]2407-i can not touch , and so provide food for [my]2407-i miserable passion ! ’[2407-i] While [he]2407-i weeps , [he]2407-i tears at the top of [his]2407-i clothes : then strikes [his]2407-i naked chest with hands of marble . [His]2407-i chest flushes red when [they]2408-they strike it , as apples are often pale in part , part red , or as grapes in [their]2409-their different bunches are stained with purple when they are not yet ripe . As [he]2407-i sees all this reflected in the dissolving waves , [he]2407-i can bear it no longer , but as yellow wax melts in a light flame , as morning frost thaws in the sun , so [he]2407-i is weakened and melted by love , and worn away little by little by the hidden fire . [He]2407-i no longer retains [his]2407-i colour , the white mingled with red , no longer has life and strength , and that form so pleasing to look at , nor has [he]2407-i that body which [Echo]686-echo loved . Still , when [she]686-echo saw this , though angered and remembering , [she]686-echo pitied [him]2407-i , and as often as [the poor boy]2410-the poor boy said ‘ Alas ! ’[686-echo] [she]686-echo repeated with [her]686-echo echoing voice ‘ Alas ! ’[686-echo] and when [his]2407-i hands strike at [his]2407-i shoulders , [she]686-echo returns the same sounds of pain . [His]2407-i last words as [he]2407-i looked into [the familiar pool]2411-the familiar pool were ‘ Alas , in vain , [beloved boy]6184-beloved boy ! ’[2407-i] and [the place]1552-the place echoed every word , and when [he]2407-i said ‘ Goodbye ! ’[2407-i] [Echo]686-echo also said ‘ Goodbye ! ’[686-echo] [He]2407-i laid down [his]2407-i weary head in the green grass , death closing those eyes that had marvelled at [[their]2413-their lord]5920-their lord ’s beauty . And even when [he]2407-i had been received into [the house of shadows]2415-the house of shadows , [he]2407-i gazed into [the Stygian waters]1799-the stygian waters . [[His]2407-i sisters]5961-his sisters [the Naiads]690-the naiads lamented , and let down [their]690-the naiads hair for [[their]690-the naiads brother]6046-their brother , and [the Dryads]691-the dryads lamented . [Echo]686-echo returned [their]2413-their laments . And now [they]2413-their were preparing the funeral pyre , the quivering torches and the bier , but there was no body . [They]2413-their came upon a flower , instead of [his]2407-i body , with white petals surrounding a yellow heart . When all this became known it spread [the prophet]2419-the prophet ’s fame throughout [the cities of Achaia]2420-the cities of achaia , and [his]2419-the prophet reputation was high . Still , [Pentheus]692-pentheus , [the son of [Echion]637-echion]2421-the son of echion , in scorn of [the gods]1538-the gods , alone amongst [all of [them]2012-all of them]2012-all of them , rejected [the seer]2424-the seer , laughed at [the old man]6107-the old man ’s words of augury , and taunted [him]6107-the old man with the darkness , and the ruin of [his]6107-the old man lost sight . [He]6107-the old man , shaking [his]6107-the old man white head in warning , said ‘ How happy [you]6185-you would be if these dispossessed orbs were [yours]6185-you , so as not to see the sacred rites of [Bacchus]682-bacchus ! Now the day approaches , and [I]6107-the old man see it is not far off , when [the new god]6186-the new god , [Liber]682-bacchus , [son of [Semele]677-semele]6187-son of semele will come , and unless [you]6185-you think [him]6186-the new god worthy to be done honour in [[your]6185-you sanctuaries]6188-your sanctuaries , [you]6185-you will be scattered , torn , in a thousand pieces , and stain [[your]6185-you mother]1807-your mother , and [[her]1807-your mother sisters]1763-her sisters and [the woods]1690-the woods [themselves]1690-the woods with [your]6185-you blood . [You]6185-you will not think [the god worthy of being honoured]6192-the god worthy of being honoured , and [you]6185-you will lament of [me]6107-the old man , that in [my]6107-the old man darkness [I]6107-the old man have seen too far . ’[6107-the old man] Even as [he]2426-he speaks , [[Echion]637-echion ’s son]2427-echion ’s son thrusts [him]2426-he away . The truth of [his]2426-he words followed , the oracles of [the prophet]2419-the prophet were performed . [Liber]682-bacchus has come , and [the festive fields]2429-the festive fields echo with cries . [The crowd]2430-the crowd all run , [fathers]6052-fathers , [mothers]2432-mothers , [young girls]2374-young girls , [princes]2434-princes and [people]1519-people , mixed together , swept towards the unknown rites . [Pentheus]692-pentheus shouts ‘ What madness has stupefied [your]6185-you minds , [children of the serpent]6193-children of the serpent , [people of [Mars]635-mars]6194-people of mars ? Can the clash of brazen cymbals , pipes of curved horn , and magical tricks be so powerful that [men , who were not terrified by drawn swords or blaring trumpets or ranks of sharp spears]6195-men , who were not terrified by drawn swords or blaring trumpets or ranks of sharp spears , are overcome by the shrieks of [women]5877-women , [men mad with wine , crowds of obscenities , and empty drumming]6197-men mad with wine , crowds of obscenities , and empty drumming ? Should [I]692-pentheus admire [you]6185-you , [elders]6198-elders , who , sailing [the deep seas]6199-the deep seas , sited [your]6185-you Tyre here , [[your]6185-you exiled Penates]6200-your exiled penates , and now let [them]6200-your exiled penates be taken without a fight ? Or [[you]6185-you younger men , of fresher age , nearer [my]692-pentheus own , for whom it was fitting to carry weapons and not the thyrsus , [your]6185-you heads covered with helmets not crowns of leaves]6201-you younger men , of fresher age , nearer my own , for whom it was fitting to carry weapons and not the thyrsus , your heads covered with helmets not crowns of leaves ? Remember , [I]692-pentheus beg [you]6185-you , from what roots [you]6185-you were created , and show the spirit of the serpent , who , though one alone , killed many . [He]6202-he died for [his]6202-he spring and pool , but [you]6185-you should conquer for [your]6185-you own glory ! [He]6202-he put [brave men]6203-brave men to death , but [you]6185-you should make [craven men]6204-craven men run , and maintain the honour of [[your]6185-you country]6205-your country ! If it is [Thebes]693-thebes ’[692-pentheus] fate to stand for only a short time , [I]0-i wish [her]2436-her walls might be destroyed by [men]5788-men and siege engines , that fire and iron might sound against [her]2436-her ! Then [we]2438-we would be miserable but not sinful , [we]2438-we would lament [our]2438-we fate not try to hide it , [our]2438-we tears would be free from shame . But now [Thebes]693-thebes will be taken by [an unarmed boy , who takes no pleasure in fighting , or weapons , or the use of horses]2439-an unarmed boy , who takes no pleasure in fighting , or weapons , or the use of horses , but in myrrh - drenched hair , soft wreathes of leaves , and embroidered robes woven with gold . But , if [you]2440-you stand aside , [I]0-i will quickly force [him]2439-an unarmed boy , who takes no pleasure in fighting , or weapons , or the use of horses to confess that [his]2439-an unarmed boy , who takes no pleasure in fighting , or weapons , or the use of horses pretended parentage and religion are inventions . Should [Pentheus]692-pentheus and [the rest of [Thebes]693-thebes]2441-the rest of thebes be terrified of [his]2439-an unarmed boy , who takes no pleasure in fighting , or weapons , or the use of horses arrival , when [Acrisius]694-acrisius had courage enough to defy [a false god]2442-a false god , and shut the gates of [Argos]28-argos at [his]2439-an unarmed boy , who takes no pleasure in fighting , or weapons , or the use of horses coming ? ‘ Go quickly ’[692-pentheus] , [he]692-pentheus ordered [[his]692-pentheus attendants]2213-his attendants ‘ bind [him]2439-an unarmed boy , who takes no pleasure in fighting , or weapons , or the use of horses and drag [him]2439-an unarmed boy , who takes no pleasure in fighting , or weapons , or the use of horses here , [this conqueror]6206-this conqueror ! Do n’t be slow in carrying out [your]2213-his attendants orders ! ’[692-pentheus] [[His]2439-an unarmed boy , who takes no pleasure in fighting , or weapons , or the use of horses grandfather]2444-his grandfather , [Cadmus]634-cadmus , [[his]2439-an unarmed boy , who takes no pleasure in fighting , or weapons , or the use of horses uncle]2445-his uncle , [Athamas]695-athamas , and [the rest of [[his]2439-an unarmed boy , who takes no pleasure in fighting , or weapons , or the use of horses advisors]2447-his advisors]2446-the rest of his advisors reprove [his]692-pentheus words , and try in vain to restrain [him]2439-an unarmed boy , who takes no pleasure in fighting , or weapons , or the use of horses . [He]2439-an unarmed boy , who takes no pleasure in fighting , or weapons , or the use of horses is only made more eager by [their]2213-his attendants warning , and [his]2439-an unarmed boy , who takes no pleasure in fighting , or weapons , or the use of horses rage is maddened and grows with restraint , and [he]2439-an unarmed boy , who takes no pleasure in fighting , or weapons , or the use of horses is provoked by [their]2213-his attendants objections . So [I]0-i have seen [a river]2448-a river , where nothing obstructs [its]2448-a river passage , flow calmly and with little noise , but rage and foam wherever trees and obstacles of stone held it back , fiercer for the obstruction . See now , [they]2213-his attendants return , stained with blood , and when [[their]2213-his attendants lord]5920-their lord queries where [Bacchus]682-bacchus is , [they]2213-his attendants deny having seen [Bacchus]682-bacchus , but reply , ‘ [We]2213-his attendants have captured [this companion of [his]2450-a man of tyrrhenian stock]6207-this companion of his , [a priest of [his]2450-a man of tyrrhenian stock sacred rites]6208-a priest of his sacred rites ’[2213-his attendants] and [they]2213-his attendants hand over [a man of Tyrrhenian stock]2450-a man of tyrrhenian stock , with [his]2450-a man of tyrrhenian stock hands bound behind [his]2450-a man of tyrrhenian stock back , [a follower of the worship of the god]2451-a follower of the worship of the god . [Pentheus]692-pentheus looks at [him]2450-a man of tyrrhenian stock , with eyes made terrible by anger , and although [he]692-pentheus can scarcely wait for the moment of punishment , [he]692-pentheus says ‘ O [you]2450-a man of tyrrhenian stock who are about to die , and , by [your]2450-a man of tyrrhenian stock death , teach [the others]1756-the others a lesson , tell [me]692-pentheus [your]2450-a man of tyrrhenian stock name , [[your]2450-a man of tyrrhenian stock parents]6210-your parents ’[692-pentheus] name and [your]2450-a man of tyrrhenian stock country , and why [you]2450-a man of tyrrhenian stock follow the customs of this new religion ! ’ Without fear , [he]692-pentheus answers ‘[0-i] [My]0-i name is [Acoetes]696-acoetes , and [Maeonia]590-maeonia is [[my]0-i country]2452-my country , [[my]0-i parents]2453-my parents humble [ordinary people]2454-ordinary people . [[My]0-i father]5857-my father did not leave [me]0-i fields for sturdy oxen to work , no flocks of sheep , nor any cattle . [I]0-i am poor as [he]5857-my father [himself]5857-my father was , and [he]5857-my father used to catch fish in [the streams]2456-the streams with a rod and line and a hook to snare [them]2456-the streams . [His]5857-my father skill was [his]5857-my father wealth , and when [he]5857-my father bequeathed it to [me]0-i , [he]5857-my father said ‘ Take what [I]5857-my father have . Apply [yourself]0-i to the work as [[my]5857-my father successor]6211-my successor and heir . ’[5857-my father] Dying , [he]5857-my father left [me]0-i nothing but water . The only thing [I]0-i can call [my]0-i inheritance . Soon , so that [I]0-i was not stuck for ever to [the same rocks]2457-the same rocks , [I]0-i learned how to guide [boats]2458-boats , steering oar in hand , and to observe [Capella]101-capella and the rainy stars of [the Olenian Goat]102-the olenian goat , Taÿgete among [the Pleiades]87-the pleiades , [the Hyades]697-the hyades , and the Arctic Bears , [the houses of the winds]2459-the houses of the winds , and [the havens for [ships]2461-ships]2460-the havens for ships . Heading for [Delos]897-delos , and being driven by chance onto the coast of [the island of [Chios]104-chios]2462-the island of chios , making [shore]2463-shore by skilful use of the oars , giving a gentle leap , and landing on the wet sand , there [we]2464-we passed the night . As soon as the dawn began to redden , [I]0-i ordered the getting in of fresh water , and showed the path that led to a spring . [I]0-i [myself]0-i commanded the view from [a high hill]2465-a high hill to find what wind promised , called [[my]0-i comrades]2466-my comrades and went back to [the boat]2467-the boat . ‘ See , [we]2464-we are here ’[698-opheltes] said [Opheltes]698-opheltes , [the foremost of [[my]0-i friends]2469-my friends]2468-the foremost of my friends , and led [a boy]2019-a boy , with the beauty of [a virgin girl]2471-a virgin girl , along [the shore]2065-the shore , a prize , or so [he]2019-a boy thought , that [he]2019-a boy had found in [a deserted field]2473-a deserted field . [The boy]1835-the boy seemed to stumble , heavy with wine and sleep , and could scarcely follow . [I]0-i examined [his]1835-the boy clothing , appearance and rank , and [I]0-i saw nothing that made [me]0-i think [him]1835-the boy mortal . And [I]0-i felt this and said it to [[my]0-i companions]2475-my companions ‘ [I]0-i do not know which god is in that body , but there is a god within ! Whoever [you]2475-my companions are , [O]6212-o favour and assist [our]6212-o efforts , and forgive [these men]2255-these men ! ’[0-i] ‘ Do n’t pray for [us]6212-o ’[699-dictys] said [Dictys]699-dictys , who was the quickest at climbing to [the highest yard]2476-the highest yard and sliding down grasping the rigging . So said [Libys]700-libys , and yellow - haired [Melanthus]701-melanthus , [the forward look - out]2477-the forward look - out , and [Alcimedon]702-alcimedon agreed , and [Epopeus]703-epopeus , who with [his]701-melanthus voice gave the measure and the pauses for [the oarsmen]2478-the oarsmen to urge on [their]2478-the oarsmen purpose . [All the others]2479-all the others said the same , so blind was [their]2479-all the others greed for gain . ‘ [I]0-i still will not allow [this ship]6214-this ship to be cursed by [a sacred victim to whom violence has been done]6215-a sacred victim to whom violence has been done ’[0-i] [I]0-i said . ‘ Here [I]0-i have the greatest authority ’[0-i] . And [I]0-i prevented [them]2479-all the others boarding . Then [[Lycabas]704-lycabas the most audacious of [them]2479-all the others all]2480-lycabas the most audacious of them all began to rage at [me]0-i , [he]704-lycabas who had been thrown out of [Tuscany]105-tuscany , and was suffering the punishment of exile from [[his]2480-lycabas the most audacious of them all city]2481-his city for a terrible murder . While [I]0-i held [him]2480-lycabas the most audacious of them all off , [he]2480-lycabas the most audacious of them all punched [me]0-i in the throat with [his]2480-lycabas the most audacious of them all strong young fists , and would have thrown [me]0-i semi - conscious into [the sea]1464-the sea , if [I]0-i had not clung on , almost stunned , held back by the rigging . [The impious crew]2483-the impious crew cheered on [the doer of it]2484-the doer of it . Then , at last , [Bacchus]682-bacchus ( for it was indeed [Bacchus]682-bacchus ) was freed from sleep , as if by the clamour , and the sense returned to [his]2480-lycabas the most audacious of them all drunken mind . ‘ What are [you]0-i doing ? Why this shouting ? ’[2480-lycabas the most audacious of them all] [he]2480-lycabas the most audacious of them all said . ‘ Tell [me]2480-lycabas the most audacious of them all , [[you]0-i seamen]6216-you seamen , how [I]2480-lycabas the most audacious of them all came [here]6115-here ? Where do [you]0-i intend to take [me]2480-lycabas the most audacious of them all ? ’[2480-lycabas the most audacious of them all] ‘ Have no fear ’[705-proreus] , said [Proreus]705-proreus , ‘ and , whatever port [you]0-i wish to touch at , [you]0-i will be set down in [the country [you]0-i demand]6218-the country you demand ! ’[705-proreus] ‘ [Naxos]706-naxos ’[682-bacchus] said [Liber]682-bacchus , ‘ set [your]0-i course for [there]1878-there ! That is [[my]682-bacchus home]6064-my home : it will be [a friendly land]6221-a friendly land to [you]0-i ! ’[682-bacchus] [The treacherous men]2485-the treacherous men swore , by [the sea]1464-the sea and [all the gods]1558-all the gods , it would be so , and told [me]0-i to get [the painted vessel]2488-the painted vessel under sail . [Naxos]706-naxos was to starboard , but as [I]0-i trimmed the sails on a starboard tack , [they]2485-the treacherous men , [each one]2489-each one , asked [me]0-i ‘ What are [you]0-i doing , [O madman]6222-o madman ? [Acoetes]696-acoetes , what craziness has got into [you]0-i ? Take the port tack ! ’[2485-the treacherous men] [most of [them]2485-the treacherous men]2490-most of them letting [me]0-i know what [they]2485-the treacherous men intended with a nod of the head , [the others]1756-the others in a whisper . [I]0-i was horrified . ‘ [Someone else]6223-someone else can steer ’[0-i] [I]0-i said , and distanced [myself]0-i from the wickedness and deception . There were cries against [me]0-i from all sides , [the whole crew]2492-the whole crew murmured against [me]0-i . And one of [them]2485-the treacherous men , [Aethalion]707-aethalion , cried ‘ [You]0-i seem to think that all [our]6224-our lives depend on [you]0-i alone ! ’[707-aethalion] Then [he]707-aethalion took [my]0-i place [himself]707-aethalion , discharged [[my]0-i office]2493-my office , and abandoning [Naxos]706-naxos took the opposite course . Then [the god]1482-the god , playfully , as though [he]1482-the god had just realised [their]2485-the treacherous men deceit , looked at [the sea]1464-the sea over the curve of the stern , and as though [he]1482-the god were weeping said ‘ [Sailors]6225-sailors , these are not [the shores [you]6225-sailors promised [me]1482-the god]6226-the shores you promised me , and this is not [the land [I]1482-the god chose for [myself]1482-the god]6227-the land i chose for myself ? What have [I]1482-the god done to merit punishment ? Where ’s the glory in [men]5788-men cheating [a boy]2019-a boy , or [many cheating just one]6230-many cheating just one ? ’[1482-the god] [I]0-i was already weeping , but [the impious crew]2483-the impious crew laughed at [my]0-i tears , and drove [the ship]2497-the ship quickly through [the water]1620-the water . Now [I]0-i swear by [the god]1482-the god [himself]1482-the god ( since there is [no god]2356-no god more certainly present than [he]1482-the god is ) that what [I]0-i say to [you]2501-you is the truth , though that truth beggars belief . [The ship]2497-the ship stands still in the waves , just as if it were held in [dry dock]2503-dry dock . [Amazed]708-amazed , [the crew]2504-the crew keep flogging away at the oars , and unfurling the sails , try to run on with double power . But ivy impedes the oars , creeping upwards , with binding tendrils , and drapes the sails with heavy clusters . [The god]1482-the god [himself]1482-the god waves a rod twined with vine leaves , [his]1482-the god forehead wreathed with bunches of grapes . Around [him]1482-the god lie insubstantial phantom lynxes , tigers , and the savage bodies of spotted panthers . [The men]2224-the men leap overboard , driven to it either by madness or by fear . And [Medon]709-medon is the first to darken all over [his]709-medon body , and [his]709-medon spine to be bent into an arched curve . [Lycabas]704-lycabas cries out to [him]709-medon ‘ What monster are [you]709-medon turning into ? ’[704-lycabas] And in speaking [his]704-lycabas jaws widen , [his]704-lycabas nose becomes hooked , and [his]704-lycabas skin becomes hard and scaly . But [Libys]700-libys hampered when [he]700-libys wishes to turn the oars sees [his]700-libys hands shrink suddenly in size , and now they are not hands , but can only be called fins . [Another]2286-another , eager to grasp at the tangled ropes , no longer has arms , and goes arching backwards limbless into [the sea]1464-the sea . [His]2286-another newest feature is a scythe - shaped tail , like the curved horns of a fragmentary moon . The dolphins leap everywhere drenched with spray . [They]2224-the men emerge once more , only to return again to [the depths]2509-the depths , playing together as if [they]2224-the men were in a troupe , throwing [their]2224-the men bodies around wantonly , and blowing out the seawater drawn in through [their]2224-the men broad nostrils . Of a group of twenty ( that was how many [the ship]2497-the ship carried ) [I]0-i alone was left . [The god]1482-the god roused [me]0-i with difficulty , [my]0-i body shaking with cold and terror , and barely [myself]0-i , saying ‘ Free [your]2513-your heart from fear , and hold off for [Naxos]706-naxos ! ’[1482-the god] And consigned to [that island]2512-that island , [I]0-i have adopted its religion , and celebrate the Bacchic rites . ‘ [We]6231-we have only listened to this winding tale ’[692-pentheus] , said [Pentheus]692-pentheus , ‘ so that [our]6231-we anger might spend its strength in delay . ‘[692-pentheus] [You]2513-your , [attendants]2514-attendants , remove [this man]2515-this man , quickly , and let [his]2515-this man body be tortured in greatest anguish , and send [him]2515-this man down to Stygian night ! ’ [Acoetes]696-acoetes , [the Tyrrhenian]6232-the tyrrhenian , was dragged out , straightaway , and shut in [a deep dungeon]6233-a deep dungeon . But while the instruments of cruelty , the irons and the fire , were being prepared to kill [him]2515-this man as had been ordered , the doors flew open by themselves , the chains loosening without any effort , so tradition holds . [The son of [Echion]637-echion]2421-the son of echion persisted in [his]2421-the son of echion purpose , not ordering [others]5836-others to go , but now going [himself]2421-the son of echion , to where [Mount Cithaeron]710-mount cithaeron , chosen for performing the rites , was sounding with the chants and shrill cries of [the Bacchantes]711-the bacchantes . As a brave horse snorts and shows [his]2421-the son of echion love for the fight , when [the trumpeter]6236-the trumpeter ’s brass gives the signal for attack , so the heavens pulsating from the long drawn - out cries stirred [Pentheus]692-pentheus , and , hearing the clamour , [his]692-pentheus anger flared again . Near [the middle of [the mountainside]6238-the mountainside]6237-the middle of the mountainside , was [a clearing surrounded with remote woods , free of trees , and visible from all sides]6239-a clearing surrounded with remote woods , free of trees , and visible from all sides . Here as [he]692-pentheus watched [the mysteries , with profane eyes]6240-the mysteries , with profane eyes , [[his]692-pentheus mother]5953-his mother was the first to see [Pentheus]692-pentheus , the first roused to run at [him]692-pentheus madly , the first to wound [him]692-pentheus , hurling [her]5953-his mother thyrsus . [She]5953-his mother shouted ‘[2514-attendants] O [you]2516-you two , [sisters]1823-sisters , come ! That huge boar , who is straying in [[our]2518-they fields]2519-our fields , that boar is [my]0-i sacrifice . ’ [They]2518-they all rush on [him]692-pentheus in [one maddened crowd]6242-one maddened crowd : [they]2518-they converge together pursuing [the frightened man]6243-the frightened man , frightened now , speaking words free of violence now , cursing [himself]692-pentheus now , realising [his]692-pentheus own offence . [Stricken]712-stricken , [he]692-pentheus still shouts ‘[646-autonoë] Help [me]0-i , [aunt Autonoë]646-autonoë ! Let [Actaeon]638-actaeon ’s shade move [your]646-autonoë spirit ! ’ [She]5953-his mother , not remembering [Actaeon]638-actaeon , tears away the suppliant ’s right arm . [Ino]680-ino , in frenzy , rips off the other . Now [the unhappy man]6244-the unhappy man has no limbs to hold out to [[his]6244-the unhappy man mother]5953-his mother , but , showing [his]6244-the unhappy man wounded trunk shorn of its members , [he]6244-the unhappy man cries ‘[1809-mother] [Mother]1809-mother , see ! ’ . [Agave]713-agave howls , and twists [her]5953-his mother neck about , and thrashes [her]5953-his mother hair in the air , and tearing off [his]6244-the unhappy man head , holding it in [her]5953-his mother bloody hands , shouts ‘[1809-mother] Behold , [sisters]1823-sisters , this act marks [our]2522-our victory ! ’ The wind does not strip the leaves clinging there , from the high tree touched by an autumn frost , more quickly than [this man]2515-this man ’s limbs are torn by those terrible hands . Warned by such an example , [the Theban women]6247-the theban women throng to the new religion , burn incense , and worship at the sacred altars . But [Alcithoë]714-alcithoë , [daughter of [Minyas]715-minyas]6248-daughter of minyas , will not celebrate the Bacchic rites , in acceptance of [the god]1482-the god . [She]714-alcithoë is rash enough to deny that [Bacchus]682-bacchus is [the son of [Jupiter]499-jupiter]6250-the son of jupiter , and [[her]714-alcithoë sisters]1763-her sisters share in [her]714-alcithoë impiety . [The priest]6252-the priest had ordered the observation of the festival , asking for [all female servants]6253-all female servants to be released from work , [they]6253-all female servants and [[their]6253-all female servants mistresses]6254-their mistresses to drape animal skins across [their]6253-all female servants breasts , free [their]6253-all female servants headbands , wreathe [their]6253-all female servants hair , and carry an ivy - twined thyrsus in [their]6253-all female servants hand . And [he]6252-the priest prophesied that [the god]1482-the god ’s rage would be fierce if [he]6252-the priest was angered . [The young women]6256-the young women and [mothers]2432-mothers obey , leaving [their]6253-all female servants baskets and looms , and [their]6253-all female servants unfinished tasks , and burn incense , calling on [Bacchus]682-bacchus , on [Bromius]716-bromius , ‘[2523-the noisy one] [the noisy one]2523-the noisy one ’ , [Lyaeus]717-lyaeus , ‘[6258-deliverer from care ’] [deliverer from care ’]6258-deliverer from care ’ , on [the child of the lightning]6259-the child of the lightning , [the twice - born]6260-the twice - born , [the son of [two mothers]6262-two mothers]6261-the son of two mothers , and adding to these calls [Nyseus]718-nyseus , ‘[2524-he] [he]2524-he of [Heliconian Nysa]107-heliconian nysa ’ , [Thyoneus]719-thyoneus , ‘[6265-the nightcomer ’] the unshorn ’ who is [[Semele]677-semele ’s son]6263-semele ’s son , [Lenaeus]720-lenaeus , [the planter of joy - giving vines]6264-the planter of joy - giving vines , [Nyctelius]721-nyctelius , ‘[6265-the nightcomer ’] [the nightcomer ’]6265-the nightcomer ’ , [father Eleleus , of the howls]6266-father eleleus , of the howls , [Iacchus]722-iacchus , of the shouts , and [Euhan]723-euhan , of the cries , and all of the other names [you]6267-you have , [Liber]682-bacchus , among [the peoples of [Greece]108-greece]6268-the peoples of greece . [Unfading youth]6269-unfading youth is [yours]6267-you , [[you]6267-you boy]6270-you boy eternal , [you]6267-you , the most beautiful sight in the depths of the morning and evening sky , [your]6267-you face like [a virgin]5906-a virgin ’s when [you]6267-you stand before [us]6272-us without [your]6267-you horns . [The Orient]724-the orient calls [you]6267-you [its conqueror]6273-its conqueror , as far as [darkest India]36-india , dipped in [the remote Ganges]67-ganges . [You]6267-you , [the revered one]6274-the revered one , [punished Pentheus]692-pentheus , and Lycurgus , [king of [Thrace]111-thrace]6275-king of thrace , who carried the double - headed axe , and [you]6267-you sent [the Tyrrhenians]725-the tyrrhenians into the waves . [You]6267-you yoke together two lynxes with bright reins decorating [their]6276-their necks , [Bacchantes]711-the bacchantes and [Satyrs]5816-satyrs follow [you]6267-you , and [that drunken old man]6278-that drunken old man , [Silenus]726-silenus , who supports [his]726-silenus stumbling body with [his]726-silenus staff , and clings precariously to [his]726-silenus bent - backed mule . Wherever [you]6267-you go the shouts of [youths]6279-youths ring out , and the chorus of female voices , hands beating on tambourines , the clash of cymbals , and the shrill piping of the flute . [The Ismenides]727-the ismenides pray to [Bacchus]682-bacchus ‘[6265-the nightcomer ’] Be satisfied with [us]2525-us , be gentle ’ and [they]727-the ismenides celebrate the rites ordained . Only [the daughters of Minyas]6280-the daughters of minyas remain inside , disturbing the festival , with the untimely arts of [Minerva]610-pallas , drawing out strands of wool , twisting the threads with [their]727-the ismenides fingers , or staying at [their]727-the ismenides looms , and plying [[their]727-the ismenides servants]6281-their servants with work . Then one of [them]1756-the others , [Arsippe]728-arsippe , speaks , spinning the thread lightly with [her]728-arsippe thumb . ‘[6265-the nightcomer ’] While [the others]1756-the others are leaving [their]1756-the others work , and thronging to this false religion , let [us]2525-us , restrained by [Pallas]610-pallas , [a truer goddess]2527-a truer goddess , lighten the useful work of [our]2525-us hands , and take turns in recalling a story to [our]2525-us idle minds , so that the time will not seem so long ! ’ [[Her]728-arsippe sisters]1763-her sisters are pleased with this , and beg [her]728-arsippe to begin first . [She]728-arsippe wondered which of many [she]728-arsippe should tell ( since [she]728-arsippe knew very many ) , and hesitated whether to tell about [you]6283-your , [Babylonian Dercetis]729-babylonian dercetis , who , as [the Syrians of Palestine]730-the syrians of palestine believe , with altered shape , [your]6283-your lower limbs covered with scales , swam in [the waters]1626-the waters , or how [[your]6283-your daughter]6285-your daughter , assuming wings , lived [her]6285-your daughter earliest years out among the white dovecotes . Or how [a Naiad , with incantations , and all too powerful herbs]6286-a naiad , with incantations , and all too powerful herbs , changed the bodies of [youths]6279-youths into dumb fishes , until the same thing happened to [her]6286-a naiad , with incantations , and all too powerful herbs . Or how the mulberry tree that bore white berries now bears dark red ones , from the stain of blood . This one pleases [her]728-arsippe . [She]728-arsippe begins to spin this tale , which is not yet well known , as [she]728-arsippe spins [her]728-arsippe woollen thread . ‘[731-pyramus] [Pyramus]731-pyramus and [Thisbe]732-thisbe , [he]731-pyramus the loveliest youth , and [she]732-thisbe [the most sought after girl]2528-the most sought after girl , the East held , lived in [neighbouring houses]2529-neighbouring houses , in [the towering city of [Babylon]112-babylon]2530-the towering city of babylon , that [Semiramis]113-semiramis is said to have enclosed with [walls of brick]2531-walls of brick . [Their]2532-they nearness and [their]2532-they first childhood steps made [them]2532-they acquainted and in time love appeared . [They]2532-they would have agreed to swear the marriage oath as well , but [[their]2532-they parents]2533-their parents prevented it . [They]2532-they were both on fire , with hearts equally captivated , something [no parent]2534-no parent can prevent . [They]2532-they had [no one]1640-no one to confide all this to : nods and signs were [their]2532-they speech , and the more [they]2532-they kept the fire hidden , the more it burned . There was a fissure , a thin split , in the shared wall between [[their]2532-they houses]2536-their houses , which traced back to when [it]2537-it was built . [No one]1640-no one had discovered the flaw in all those years – but what can love not detect ? – [[You]2539-you lovers]2540-you lovers saw it first , and made it a path for [your]2539-you voices . [Your]2539-you endearments passed that way , in safety , in the gentlest of murmurs . Often , when [they]2532-they were in place , [Thisbe]732-thisbe here , and [Pyramus]731-pyramus [there]1878-there , and [they]2532-they had each caught the sound of [the other]1689-the other ’s breath , [they]2532-they said “ Unfriendly wall , why do [you]2539-you hinder [lovers]2543-lovers ? How hard would it be for [you]2539-you to let [our]2532-they whole bodies meet , or if that is too much perhaps , to open to the kisses [we]2532-they give [each other]2544-each other ? Not that [we]2532-they are not grateful . [We]2532-they confess that [we]2532-they owe it to [you]2539-you that words are allowed to pass to loving ears . ” So [they]2532-they talked , hopelessly , sitting opposite , saying , as night fell , “ Farewell ” , each touching the wall with kisses that could not reach the other side . One morning when [Aurora]569-aurora had quenched the fires of night , and the sun ’s rays had thawed the frosty grass , [they]2532-they came to [their]2532-they usual places . Then [they]2532-they decided , first with a little murmur of [their]2532-they great sorrows , to try , in the silence of night , to deceive [the guards]2545-the guards , and vanish outside . Once out of [the house]1713-the house [they]2532-they would leave [the city]2547-the city as well , and [they]2532-they agreed , in case [they]2532-they went astray crossing [the open country]2548-the open country , to meet by [the grave of [Ninus]733-ninus]2549-the grave of ninus , and hide in the shelter of a tree . There was a tall mulberry tree there , dense with white berries , bordering a cool fountain . [They]2532-they were satisfied with [their]2532-they plan , and the light , slow to lose its strength , was drowned in the waters , and out of [the same waters]2550-the same waters the night emerged . ’ ‘[732-thisbe] Carefully opening the door , [Thisbe]732-thisbe , slipped out , deceiving [[her]732-thisbe people]2551-her people , and came to [the tomb]2552-the tomb , [her]732-thisbe face veiled , and seated [herself]732-thisbe under the tree [they]2532-they had agreed on . Love made [her]732-thisbe brave . But a lioness fresh from the kill , [her]732-thisbe jaws foaming , smeared with the blood of cattle , came to slake [her]732-thisbe thirst at the nearby spring . In the moonlight , [Babylonian Thisbe]732-thisbe sees [her]732-thisbe some way off , and flees in fear to [a dark cave]2553-a dark cave , and as [she]732-thisbe flees , [she]732-thisbe leaves behind [her]732-thisbe fallen veil . When [the fierce lioness]2554-the fierce lioness has drunk deeply , returning towards [the trees]2555-the trees , [she]2554-the fierce lioness chances to find the flimsy fabric , without its owner , and rips it in [her]2554-the fierce lioness bloodstained jaws . Leaving [the city]2547-the city a little later , [Pyramus]731-pyramus sees [the creature]5894-the creature ’s tracks in the thick dust , and [his]731-pyramus face is drained of colour . When [he]731-pyramus also discovers the veil stained with blood , [he]731-pyramus cries , “ [Two lovers]2558-two lovers will be lost in one night . [She]2554-the fierce lioness was the more deserving of a long life . [I]0-i am [the guilty spirit]2559-the guilty spirit . [I]0-i have killed [you]732-thisbe , [poor girl , who told [you]732-thisbe to come by night to [this place filled with danger]2561-this place filled with danger , and did not reach [it]2561-this place filled with danger first]2560-poor girl , who told you to come by night to this place filled with danger , and did not reach it first . O , all [you]732-thisbe lions , that live amongst these rocks , tear [my]0-i body to pieces , and devour [my]0-i sinful flesh in [your]732-thisbe fierce jaws ! Though it is cowardly to ask for death ”

[He]731-pyramus picks up [Thisbe]732-thisbe ’s veil , and carries it with [him]731-pyramus to the shadow of [the tree [they]2563-they had chosen]2562-the tree they had chosen . Kissing the token , and wetting it with tears , [he]731-pyramus cries , “ Now , be soaked in [my]0-i blood too . ” Having spoken [he]731-pyramus drove the sword [he]731-pyramus had been wearing into [his]731-pyramus groin , and , dying , pulled it , warm , from the wound . As [he]731-pyramus lay back again on the ground , the blood spurted out , like a pipe fracturing at a weak spot in the lead , and sending long bursts of water hissing through the split , cutting through the air , beat by beat . Sprinkled with blood , the tree ’s fruit turned a deep blackish - red , and the roots , soaked through , also imbued the same overhanging mulberries with the dark purplish colour . ’ ‘[2335-her lover] Now [Thisbe]732-thisbe returns , not yet free of fear , lest [she]732-thisbe disappoint [[her]732-thisbe lover]2335-her lover , and [she]732-thisbe calls for [him]2335-her lover with [her]732-thisbe eyes and in [her]732-thisbe mind , eager to tell [him]2335-her lover about the great danger [she]732-thisbe has escaped . Though [she]732-thisbe recognises [the place]1552-the place and the shape of the familiar tree , the colour of the berries puzzles [her]732-thisbe . [She]732-thisbe waits there : perhaps this is it . Hesitating , [she]732-thisbe sees quivering limbs writhing on the bloodstained earth , and starts back , terrified , like [the sea]1464-the sea , that trembles when the slightest breeze touches [its]1464-the sea surface , [her]732-thisbe face showing whiter than boxwood . But when , staying a moment longer , [she]732-thisbe recognises [[her]732-thisbe lover]2335-her lover , [she]732-thisbe cries out loud with grief , striking at [her]732-thisbe innocent arms , and tearing at [her]732-thisbe hair . Cradling the beloved body , [she]732-thisbe bathes [his]2335-her lover wounds with tears , mingling their drops with blood . Planting kisses on [his]2335-her lover cold face , [she]732-thisbe cries out ‘ [Pyramus]731-pyramus , what misfortune has robbed [me]732-thisbe of [you]2335-her lover ? [Pyramus]731-pyramus , answer [me]732-thisbe ! [[Your]731-pyramus dearest [Thisbe]732-thisbe]6288-your dearest thisbe calls to [you]2335-her lover : obey [me]732-thisbe , lift [your]2335-her lover fallen head ! ’[732-thisbe] At [Thisbe]732-thisbe ’s name , [Pyramus]731-pyramus raised [his]731-pyramus eyes , darkening with death , and having looked at [her]732-thisbe , buried them again in darkness . ’ ‘[731-pyramus] When [she]732-thisbe recognised [her]732-thisbe veil and saw the ivory scabbard without its sword , [she]732-thisbe said , “ [Unhappy boy]2568-unhappy boy , [your]2568-unhappy boy own hand , and [your]2568-unhappy boy love , have destroyed [you]2568-unhappy boy ! [I]0-i too have a firm enough hand for once , and [I]0-i , too , love . It will give [me]0-i strength in [my]0-i misfortune . [I]0-i will follow [you]2568-unhappy boy to destruction , and [they]2569-they will say [I]0-i was [a most pitiful friend and companion to [you]2568-unhappy boy]2570-a most pitiful friend and companion to you . [He]2571-his , who could only be removed from [me]0-i by death , death can not remove . Nevertheless [I]0-i ask this for both of [us]2572-us , in uttering these words , O [[our]2572-us poor parents]2573-our poor parents , [mine]0-i and [his]2571-his , do not deny [us]2572-us the right to be laid in [one tomb]2574-one tomb , [we]2572-us whom certain love , and the strangest hour have joined . And [you]2568-unhappy boy , the tree , that now covers the one poor body with [your]2568-unhappy boy branches , and soon will cover two , retain the emblems of [our]2572-us death , and always carry [your]2568-unhappy boy fruit darkened in mourning , a remembrance of the blood of [us]2572-us both . ” Saying this , and placing the point under [her]2575-her heart , [she]2575-her fell forward onto the blade , still warm with [his]2571-his blood . Then [her]2575-her prayer moved [the gods]1538-the gods , and stirred [[her]2575-her parents]2577-her parents ’ feelings , for the colour of the berry is blackish - red , when fully ripened , and what was left from the funeral pyres rests in a single urn . ’[2575-her] [Arsippe]728-arsippe ceased . There was a short pause and then [Leuconoë]734-leuconoë began to speak , while [[her]2575-her sisters]1763-her sisters were quiet . ‘ [Love]735-love even takes [[Sol]600-sol prisoner , who rules all the stars with [his]6289-sol prisoner , who rules all the stars with his light light]6289-sol prisoner , who rules all the stars with his light . [I]734-leuconoë will tell [you]2568-unhappy boy about [his]6289-sol prisoner , who rules all the stars with his light amours . [He]6289-sol prisoner , who rules all the stars with his light was [the first god [they]2577-her parents say to see the adulteries of [Venus]523-venus and [Mars]635-mars]6290-the first god they say to see the adulteries of venus and mars : [he]6289-sol prisoner , who rules all the stars with his light sees all things first . [He]6289-sol prisoner , who rules all the stars with his light was sorry to witness the act , and [he]6289-sol prisoner , who rules all the stars with his light told [[her]734-leuconoë husband]5872-her husband [Vulcan]568-vulcan , [son of Juno]6292-son of juno , of this bedroom intrigue , and where the intrigue took place . [Vulcan]568-vulcan ’s heart dropped , and [he]568-vulcan dropped in turn [the craftsman]6293-the craftsman ’s work [he]568-vulcan held in [his]568-vulcan hand . Immediately [he]568-vulcan began to file thin links of bronze , for a net , a snare that would deceive the eye . The finest spun threads , those the spider spins from the rafters , would not better [his]568-vulcan work . [He]568-vulcan made it so it would cling to the smallest movement , the lightest touch , and then artfully placed it over the bed . When [the wife]6294-the wife and [the adulterer]6295-the adulterer had come together on the one couch , [they]2580-the two were entangled together , surprised in the midst of [their]2580-the two embraces , by [the husband]6296-the husband ’s craft , and the new method of imprisonment [he]568-vulcan had prepared for [them]2580-the two .[734-leuconoë]

[The Lemnian]736-the lemnian , [Vulcan]568-vulcan , immediately flung open the ivory doors , and let in [the gods]1538-the gods . There [the two]2580-the two lay shamefully bound together , and [one of [the gods]1538-the gods]2581-one of the gods , undismayed , prayed that [he]2581-one of the gods might be shamed like that . And [the gods]1538-the gods laughed . And for a long time it was the best - known story in all [the heavens]1940-the heavens . ’ ‘[1538-the gods] But [Cytherea]737-cytherea , remembering [the informer]2585-the informer , exacted punishment , and took revenge on [him]2585-the informer . [[He]2585-the informer who harmed [her]737-cytherea secret affair]2586-he who harmed her secret affair , was equally harmed by love . [Son of Hyperion]2587-son of hyperion , what use to [you]2587-son of hyperion now , are beauty , lustre , and radiant light ? Surely , [you]2587-son of hyperion who make [all countries]2588-all countries burn with [your]2587-son of hyperion fires , burn with a new fire . [You]2587-son of hyperion , who should discern everything , contemplate Leucothoë , and [your]2587-son of hyperion eyes , that ought to be fixed on [the whole earth]1895-the whole earth , are fixed on [one virgin girl]2590-one virgin girl . Sometimes [you]2587-son of hyperion rise too early in the dawn sky . Sometimes [you]2587-son of hyperion sink too late into the waves . Thinking of [her]2590-one virgin girl , [you]2587-son of hyperion lengthen the winter hours . Sometimes [you]2587-son of hyperion vanish , [your]2587-son of hyperion mind ’s defect affecting [your]2587-son of hyperion light , and , obscured , terrify [men]5788-men ’s hearts . It is not because the moon ’s shadow , closer to [the earth]1463-the earth , eclipses [you]2587-son of hyperion , that [you]2587-son of hyperion fade . It is that love of [yours]2587-son of hyperion that determines [your]2587-son of hyperion aspect . [You]2587-son of hyperion only love [her]2590-one virgin girl . [You]2587-son of hyperion forget [Clymene]555-clymene , [[Phaethon]553-phaethon ’s mother]2593-phaethon ’s mother , and the nymph [Rhode]738-rhode , and [Perse]739-perse , [the most beautiful mother of [Aeaean Circe]2595-aeaean circe]2594-the most beautiful mother of aeaean circe , and [Clytie]740-clytie , although despised , seeks union with [you]2587-son of hyperion , and , even now , suffers its deep wounds . Leucothoë makes [you]2587-son of hyperion forget [them]2596-them all , [she]2590-one virgin girl whom loveliest [Eurynome]741-eurynome gave birth to , among [the people who produce sweet - smelling incense]2597-the people who produce sweet - smelling incense . But when [the daughter]2598-the daughter grew to womanhood , [she]2598-the daughter outshone [[her]2598-the daughter mother]5866-her mother , as [[her]2598-the daughter mother]5866-her mother surpassed [all others]2601-all others . [[Her]2598-the daughter father]1694-her father [Orchamus]742-orchamus ruled [the Achaemenian Cities of [Persia]4-persia]2603-the achaemenian cities of persia , seventh in line from [ancient Belus]743-ancient belus , [the founder]2604-the founder . ’ ‘[2604-the founder] Under western skies are [the fields of the horses of the Sun]2605-the fields of the horses of the sun : [they]2606-their have ambrosia to crop not grass . It nourishes [their]2606-their weary legs after the day ’s work , and refreshes [them]2606-their for [their]2606-their labours . While [his]1694-her father horses browse on celestial food and while night carries out [her]2598-the daughter role , [the god]1482-the god enters [his]1482-the god loved [one ’s room]2608-one ’s room , taking on the shape of [[her]2598-the daughter mother]5866-her mother , [Eurynome]741-eurynome . There [he]1482-the god finds [Leucothoë]744-leucothoë in the lamplight , amongst [[her]741-eurynome twelve maids]2610-her twelve maids , drawing out fine threads , winding them on [her]741-eurynome spindle .
