So [he]1482-the god gives [her]744-leucothoë a kiss , just as [a mother [[her]741-eurynome dear daughter]2612-her dear daughter]2611-a mother her dear daughter , and says “ This is secret : [servants]2613-servants , depart , and do n’t rob [a mother of the power to speak in private]2614-a mother of the power to speak in private . ” [They]2615-they obey , and when there are [no witnesses]2616-no witnesses left in [the room]2617-the room , [the god]1482-the god speaks .

“ Who measures the long year , [I]0-i am [he]1482-the god . [I]0-i see all things , [earth]1449-earth sees all things by [me]0-i , [I]0-i , [the world]1448-the world ’s eye . Trust [me]0-i , [you]2621-you please [me]0-i . ” [She]744-leucothoë is afraid , and , in [her]744-leucothoë fear , distaff and spindle fall from [her]744-leucothoë lifeless fingers . [Her]744-leucothoë fear enhances [her]744-leucothoë , and [he]1482-the god , waiting no longer , resumes [his]1482-the god true form , and [his]1482-the god accustomed brightness . And , though [the girl]1792-the girl is alarmed by this sudden vision , overwhelmed by [his]1482-the god brightness , suppressing all complaint , [she]744-leucothoë submits to the assault of [the god]1482-the god . ’ [Clytie]740-clytie was jealous ( there were no bounds to [her]740-clytie love for [Sol]600-sol ) , and goaded by anger at [[her]740-clytie rival]1752-her rival , [she]740-clytie broadcast the adultery , and maligning [the girl]1792-the girl , betrayed [her]744-leucothoë to [[her]744-leucothoë father]1694-her father . [He]1482-the god in [his]1482-the god pride and savagery , buried [her]744-leucothoë deep in the earth , [she]740-clytie praying , stretching [her]740-clytie hands out towards [Sol]600-sol ’s light , crying “ [He]1482-the god forced [me]2624-i , against [my]2624-i will ” , and [he]1482-the god piled a heavy mound of sand over [her]744-leucothoë . [Poor nymph]6300-poor nymph , [[Hyperion]745-hyperion ’s son]6301-hyperion ’s son dispersed this with shafts of light , and gave [you]6302-you a way to show [your]6302-you buried face , but [you]6302-you could not lift [your]6302-you head , crushed by the weight of earth , and lay there , a pale corpse . [They]6303-they say [the god of the winged horses]6304-the god of the winged horses had seen nothing more bitter than this , since [Phaethon]553-phaethon ’s fiery death . [He]1482-the god tried to see if [he]1482-the god could recall life to those frozen limbs , with [his]1482-the god powerful rays . But since fate opposed such efforts , [he]1482-the god sprinkled the earth , and the body itself , with fragrant nectar , and , after much lamenting , said “ [You]6302-you will still touch the air ” . Immediately the body , soaked through with heavenly nectar , dissolved , steeping the earth in its perfume . [Tentatively]746-tentatively , putting out roots , the shoot of a tree , resinous with incense , grew through the soil , and pierced the summit of the mound . [The god of light]6305-the god of light no longer visited [Clytie]740-clytie , nor found anything to love in [her]740-clytie , even though love might have been an excuse for [her]740-clytie pain , and [her]740-clytie pain for [her]740-clytie betrayal . [She]740-clytie wasted away , deranged by [her]740-clytie experience of love . Impatient of [the nymphs]5945-the nymphs , night and day , under the open sky , [she]740-clytie sat dishevelled , bareheaded , on [the bare earth]1984-the bare earth . Without food or water , fasting , for nine days , [she]740-clytie lived only on dew and tears , and did not stir from the ground . [She]740-clytie only gazed at [the god]1482-the god ’s aspect as [he]1482-the god passed , and turned [her]740-clytie face towards [him]1482-the god . [They]5945-the nymphs say that [her]740-clytie limbs clung to the soil , and that [her]740-clytie ghastly pallor changed part of [her]740-clytie appearance to that of a bloodless plant : but part was reddened , and a flower like a violet hid [her]740-clytie face . [She]740-clytie turns , always , towards the sun , though [her]740-clytie roots hold [her]740-clytie fast , and , altered , loves unaltered . ’[2624-i] [She]2624-i finished speaking : the wonderful tale had charmed [their]2625-their ears . [Part of [them]2625-their]2626-part of them denies it could have happened , part says that [the true gods]2627-the true gods can do anything . Though [Bacchus]682-bacchus is not one of those . When [the sisters]1967-the sisters are silent , [Alcithoë]714-alcithoë is called on next . Standing there , running [her]2624-i shuttle through the threads on [her]2624-i loom , [she]2624-i said ‘ [I]2624-i will say nothing of that well - known story , the love of [Daphnis]747-daphnis , [the Idaean shepherd - boy]6309-the idaean shepherd - boy , whom [a nymph]6310-a nymph , angered by [a rival]6311-a rival , turned to stone : so great is the pain that inflames [lovers]2543-lovers . Neither will [I]2624-i tell [you]6313-you how , the laws of nature conspiring to alter , [Sithon]748-sithon became of indeterminate sex , now [man]6314-man , now [woman]6315-woman : how [Celmis]749-celmis , [you]6313-you too , now changed to steel , were [a most loyal friend to the infant [Jupiter]499-jupiter]6316-a most loyal friend to the infant jupiter : how [the Curetes]750-the curetes were born from vast showers of rain : how [Crocus]751-crocus and [Smilax]752-smilax were turned into tiny flowers . [I]2624-i will reject all those , and charm [your]6313-you imaginations with a sweet , new story . Now [you]6313-you will hear where [the pool of [Salmacis]756-salmacis]6317-the pool of salmacis got its bad reputation from , how [its]6317-the pool of salmacis enervating waters weaken , and soften the limbs [they]6317-the pool of salmacis touch . The cause is hidden , but the fountain ’s effect is widely known . [The Naiads]1761-the naiads nursed [a child born of Hermes]6319-a child born of hermes , and [a goddess]6068-a goddess , [Cytherean Aphrodite]753-cytherean aphrodite , in [[Mount Ida]577-mount ida ’s caves]6321-mount ida ’s caves . [His]6319-a child born of hermes features were such that , in them , both [mother]1809-mother and [father]5922-father could be seen : and from [them]6324-them [he]6319-a child born of hermes took [his]6319-a child born of hermes name , [Hermaphroditus]754-hermaphroditus . When [he]6319-a child born of hermes was fifteen years old , [he]6319-a child born of hermes left [[his]6319-a child born of hermes native mountains]6325-his native mountains and [Ida]577-mount ida , [[his]6319-a child born of hermes nursery]6326-his nursery , delighted to wander in [unknown lands]6327-unknown lands , and gaze at [unknown rivers]6328-unknown rivers , [his]6319-a child born of hermes enthusiasm making light of travel . [He]6319-a child born of hermes even reached [the Lycian cities]6329-the lycian cities , and [the Carians]755-the carians by [Lycia]117-lycia . Here [he]6319-a child born of hermes saw [a pool of water]6330-a pool of water , clear to [its]6330-a pool of water very depths . There were no marsh reeds round [it]6330-a pool of water , no sterile sedge , no spikes of rushes : it is crystal liquid . The edges of [the pool]6331-the pool are bordered by fresh turf , and the grass is always green . [A nymph]6310-a nymph lives [there]1878-there , but [she]6310-a nymph is not skilled for the chase , or used to flexing the bow , or the effort of running , the only Naiad not known by swift - footed [Diana]527-diana . Often , it ’s said , [[her]6310-a nymph sisters]1763-her sisters would tell [her]6310-a nymph “ [Salmacis]756-salmacis , take up the hunting - spear or the painted quiver and vary [your]756-salmacis idleness with some hard work , hunting ! ” But [she]6310-a nymph takes up neither the hunting spear nor the painted quiver , and will not vary [her]6310-a nymph idleness with the hardship of hunting . [She]6310-a nymph only bathes [her]6310-a nymph shapely limbs in the pool , often combs out [her]6310-a nymph hair , with a comb that is made of boxwood from [Cytorus]118-cytorus , and looks in [the water]1620-the water to see what suits it best . Then draped in a translucent robe , [she]6310-a nymph lies down on the soft leaves , or in the soft grass . Often [she]6310-a nymph gathers flowers . And [she]6310-a nymph was also busy gathering them , then , when [she]6310-a nymph saw [the boy]1835-the boy , and what [she]6310-a nymph saw [she]6310-a nymph longed to have . ’[2624-i] ‘ [She]6310-a nymph did not go near [him]1835-the boy yet , though [she]6310-a nymph was quick to go to [him]1835-the boy , waiting until [she]6310-a nymph had calmed [herself]6310-a nymph , checked [her]6310-a nymph appearance , composed [her]6310-a nymph expression , and merited being seen as beautiful . Then [she]6310-a nymph began to say “ [Youth]2370-youth , O most worthy to be thought [a god]1461-a god , if [you]2370-youth are [a god]1461-a god , [you]2370-youth must be [Cupid]6340-cupid , or , if [you]2370-youth are mortal , whoever engendered [you]2370-youth is blessed , and [any brother of [yours]2370-youth]6341-any brother of yours is happy , [any sister]6342-any sister fortunate , if [you]2370-youth have [sisters]1823-sisters , and even [the nurse who suckled [you]2370-youth at [her]6344-the nurse who suckled you at her breast breast]6344-the nurse who suckled you at her breast . But far beyond [them]6345-them , and far more blessed is [she]6310-a nymph , if there is a [she]6310-a nymph , promised to [you]2370-youth , whom [you]2370-youth think worthy of marriage . If there is [someone]6346-someone , let [mine]6347-mine be a stolen pleasure , if not , [I]2624-i will be [the one]1688-the one , and let [us]6349-us enter into marriage together . ” After this [the naiad]2361-the naiad was silent . A red flush branded [the boy]1835-the boy ’s face . [He]1835-the boy did not know what love was : though the blush was very becoming . [Apples]757-apples are tinged with this colour , hanging in a sunlit tree , or ivory painted with red , or the moon , eclipsed , blushing in [her]2361-the naiad brightness , while the bronze shields clash , in vain , to rescue [her]2361-the naiad . [The nymph]1783-the nymph begged endlessly , at least [a sister]6353-a sister ’s kiss , and , about to throw [her]2361-the naiad arms round [his]1835-the boy ivory - white neck , [he]1835-the boy said “ Stop this , or shall [I]2624-i go , and leave [this place]6354-this place , and [you]2361-the naiad ? ” [Salmacis]756-salmacis , afraid , turning away , pretended to go , saying , “ [I]2624-i freely surrender this place to [you]756-salmacis , be [[my]2624-i guest]6355-my guest . ” But [she]2361-the naiad still looked back , and hid [herself]2361-the naiad among bushes in [the secluded woods]6356-the secluded woods , on [her]2361-the naiad bended knees . But [he]1835-the boy , obviously at leisure , as if unobserved , walks here and there on the grass and playfully , at the end of [his]1835-the boy walk , dips [his]1835-the boy feet and ankles in [the pool]6331-the pool . Then , quickly captured by the coolness of the enticing water , [he]1835-the boy stripped the soft clothes from [his]1835-the boy slender body . Then [she]2361-the naiad was truly pleased . And [Salmacis]756-salmacis was inflamed with desire for [his]1835-the boy naked form . [The nymph]1783-the nymph ’s eyes blazed with passion , as when [Phoebus]519-phoebus ’s likeness is reflected from a mirror , that opposes [his]1835-the boy brightest unclouded orb . [She]2361-the naiad can scarcely wait , scarcely contain [her]2361-the naiad delight , now longing to hold [him]1835-the boy , now unable to keep [her]2361-the naiad love to [herself]2361-the naiad . [He]1835-the boy , clapping [his]1835-the boy open palms to [his]1835-the boy side , dives into the pool , and leading with one arm and then the other , [he]1835-the boy gleams through the pure water , as if [one sheathed an ivory statue]6359-one sheathed an ivory statue , or bright lilies behind clear glass . “ [I]2624-i have won , [he]2630-him is mine ” , [the naiad]2361-the naiad cries , and flinging aside all [her]2629-she garments , [she]2629-she throws [herself]2629-she into the midst of the water .[2624-i]

[She]2629-she held [him]2630-him to [her]2629-she , struggling , snatching kisses from the fight , putting [her]2629-she hands beneath [him]2630-him , touching [his]2630-him unwilling breast , overwhelming [the youth]1842-the youth from this side and that . At last , [she]2629-she entwines [herself]2629-she face to face with [his]2630-him beauty , like a snake , lifted by [the king of birds]2632-the king of birds and caught up into the air , as [Hermaphroditus]754-hermaphroditus tries to slip away . Hanging there [she]2629-she twines round [his]2630-him head and feet and entangles [his]2630-him spreading wings in [her]2629-she coils . Or as ivy often interlaces tall tree trunks . Or as the cuttlefish holds the prey , it has surprised , underwater , wrapping its tentacles everywhere . [The descendant of [Atlas]546-atlas]1781-the descendant of atlas holds out , denying [the nymph]1783-the nymph ’s wished - for pleasure : [she]2629-she hugs [him]2630-him , and clings , as though [she]2629-she is joined to [his]2630-him whole body . “ It is right to struggle , [perverse one]2635-perverse one , ” [she]2629-she says , “ but [you]2630-him will still not escape . Grant this , [[you]2630-him gods]5823-you gods , that no day comes to part [me]0-i from [him]2630-him , or [him]2630-him from [me]0-i . ” [Her]2629-she prayer reached [the gods]1538-the gods . Now the entwined bodies of [the two]2580-the two were joined together , and one form covered both . Just as when [someone]6346-someone grafts a twig into the bark , [they]6346-someone see [both]2640-both grow joined together , and develop as one , so when [they]2640-both were mated together in a close embrace , [they]2640-both were not two , but a two - fold form , so that [they]2640-both could not be called male or female , and seemed neither or either . When [he]2630-him saw now that the clear waters which [he]2630-him had penetrated as [a man]5897-a man , had made [him]2630-him [a creature of both sexes]2642-a creature of both sexes , and [his]2630-him limbs had been softened there , [Hermaphroditus]754-hermaphroditus , stretching out [his]754-hermaphroditus hands , said , but not in [a man]5897-a man ’s voice , “ [Father]5922-father and [mother]1809-mother , grant this gift to [[your]5922-father son]2646-your son , who bears both [your]5922-father names : whoever comes to these fountains as [a man]5897-a man , let [him]2648-him leave them half [a man]5897-a man , and weaken suddenly at the touch of these waters ! ” Both [[his]2646-your son parents]2650-his parents moved by this , granted the prayer of [[their]2650-his parents twin - formed son]2651-their twin - formed son , and contaminated the pool with a damaging drug . ’ The story was finished , and [the daughters of [Minyas]715-minyas]6280-the daughters of minyas still pressed on with [their]6280-the daughters of minyas work , spurning [the god]1482-the god and profaning [his]1482-the god festival , when suddenly harsh sounds sprang up from unseen drums , pipes with curved horns sounded , and cymbals clashed . Saffron and myrrh perfumed the air , and unbelievably [their]6280-the daughters of minyas looms began to grow like greenwood , the cloth [they]6280-the daughters of minyas were weaving put out leaves of hanging ivy , part altered to vines , and what were once threads changed into tendrils : vine shoots came out of the warp , and clusters of dark - coloured grapes took on the splendour of the purple fabric . Now the day was past , and the time had come when [you]6363-you could not say that it was light or darkness , but a borderland of light and uncertain night . Suddenly the ceiling shook , the oil lamps seemed to brighten , and [the house]1713-the house to shine with glowing fires , and fill with the howling of fierce creatures ’[2650-his parents] deceptive phantoms . Quickly [the sisters]1967-the sisters hide in [the smoke - filled house]2653-the smoke - filled house , and , in various places , shun the flames and light . While [they]1967-the sisters seek the shadows , a thin membrane stretches over [their]1967-the sisters slender limbs , and delicate wings enfold [their]1967-the sisters arms . The darkness prevents [them]1967-the sisters knowing how [they]1967-the sisters have lost [their]1967-the sisters former shape . [They]1967-the sisters do not rise on soft plumage , but lift [themselves]1967-the sisters on semi - transparent wings , and trying to speak emit the tiniest squeak , as befits [their]1967-the sisters bodies , and tell [their]1967-the sisters grief in faint shrieks . [They]1967-the sisters frequent rafters , rather than [woods]1827-woods , and , hating the light , [they]1967-the sisters fly at night , and derive [their]1967-the sisters name , ‘ vespertiliones ’[1967-the sisters] , from ‘ vesper ’[1967-the sisters] , the evening . Then indeed [Bacchus]682-bacchus ’s divinity was spoken of throughout [Thebes]89-thebes , and [Ino]680-ino , [[[his]2655-his mother]5953-his mother ’s sister]2345-his mother ’s sister , told about [the new god]6186-the new god ’s great powers , everywhere . Of all [[her]680-ino sisters]1763-her sisters [she]680-ino was the only one free from trouble , except that which [[her]680-ino sisters]1763-her sisters made . [Juno]525-juno considered [this woman]2661-this woman , and the lofty pride [she]525-juno had in [[her]525-juno sons]1540-her sons , [her]525-juno marriage to [King Athamas]695-athamas , and [[her]525-juno foster - child]2663-her foster - child [Bacchus]682-bacchus , and could not bear it . [She]525-juno said , to [herself]525-juno , ‘ [That son of [[my]525-juno rival]6076-my rival]6365-that son of my rival could change [the Maeonian sailors]6367-the maeonian sailors , and immerse [them]6367-the maeonian sailors in [the sea]1464-the sea , and give the flesh of [a child]2050-a child to be torn in pieces , by [[his]6365-that son of my rival own mother]6370-his own mother , and enfold [the three daughters of [Minyas]715-minyas]6371-the three daughters of minyas in strange wings . Can [Juno]525-juno do nothing except lament [her]525-juno troubles , un - avenged ? Is that enough for [me]525-juno ? Is that [my]525-juno only power ? [He]6365-that son of my rival teaches [me]525-juno what to do ( it is possible to learn from [the enemy]6372-the enemy ): [he]6365-that son of my rival has shown enough , and more than enough , of the power madness has , by the killing of [Pentheus]692-pentheus . Why should [Ino]680-ino not be tormented , and follow [[her]2664-her relatives]6373-her relatives ’[525-juno] example in [her]2664-her madness ? ’ There is a downward path , gloomy with fatal yew trees : it leads through dumb silence to [the infernal regions]6374-the infernal regions . [The sluggish Styx]6375-the sluggish styx exhales vapour , and , by that way , the shadows of the newly dead descend , entombed with full rites , and the ghosts of [those , at last , given proper burial]6376-those , at last , given proper burial . The wide , thorny waste is cold and pallid , and [the newly arrived shades]6377-the newly arrived shades are ignorant of the road that leads to [the Stygian city]6378-the stygian city , where [black Dis]758-dis has [[his]758-dis cruel palace]6379-his cruel palace . [The roomy city]6380-the roomy city has [a thousand entrances]6381-a thousand entrances , and open gates on every side , and as [the ocean]1657-the ocean accepts [the rivers of all the world]6383-the rivers of all the world , so [this place]6354-this place accepts [all the souls]6385-all the souls , and is never too small for [any populace]6386-any populace , nor notices [the crowds that come]6387-the crowds that come . There the bloodless shadows wander without flesh or bone . [Some crowd the forum]6388-some crowd the forum , [some the house of [the ruler of [the depths]2509-the depths]6390-the ruler of the depths]6389-some the house of the ruler of the depths , [others]5836-others follow [their]5836-others trades , imitating [their]5836-others previous lives , and still [others]5836-others incur punishment . Leaving [her]6394-her place in [heaven]1501-heaven , [Saturnian Juno]513-juno endured the journey there , giving in to such a degree to anger and hatred . As soon as [she]6394-her entered and the threshold sighed at the touch of [her]6394-her sacred body , [Cerberus]759-cerberus lifted [his]759-cerberus triple head and let out [his]759-cerberus threefold baying . [She]6394-her called out for the dread , implacable Furies , [the Sisters]1967-the sisters , [the children of Night]6397-the children of night . [They]1967-the sisters sat in front of the prison gates , closed with steel , combing out [their]1967-the sisters hair , of black snakes . [The goddesses]1849-the goddesses rose together , recognising [her]6394-her shadow in the darkness . [The place]1552-the place is called [Accursed]119-accursed . Here [Tityos]760-tityos offers up [his]760-tityos innards to be torn , stretched out over [nine fields]6400-nine fields . [You]6401-you , [Tantalus]761-tantalus , can not catch the drops of water , and the tree [you]6401-you grasp at , eludes [you]6401-you . [You]6401-you , [Sisyphus]762-sisyphus , attack or pursue the stone that always returns . [Ixion]763-ixion turns , and follows after [himself]763-ixion and flees , and [the forty - nine Belides]6402-the forty - nine belides , who dared to plot the destruction of [[their]6402-the forty - nine belides cousins]6403-their cousins , [[their]6402-the forty - nine belides husbands]5796-their husbands , fetch again , with incessant labour , the water [they]6402-the forty - nine belides have lost . After [Saturnia]540-saturnia had looked grimly , glancing fiercely , at all these , and at [Ixion]763-ixion above all , looking back from [him]763-ixion to [Sisyphus]762-sisyphus , [she]540-saturnia asks [the Furies]764-the furies ‘[525-juno] Why does [this son of Aeolus]2665-this son of aeolus , suffer perpetual torment , while [[his]2665-this son of aeolus brother [Athamas]695-athamas , who , with [[his]695-athamas wife]1633-his wife , scorns [me]0-i , lives , in [his]695-athamas pride , in [a rich palace]2668-a rich palace]2666-his brother athamas , who , with his wife , scorns me , lives , in his pride , in a rich palace ? ’ And [she]540-saturnia expounds the causes of [her]540-saturnia hatred , [her]540-saturnia journey , and what it is [she]540-saturnia wishes . What [she]540-saturnia wished was that [the House of [Cadmus]634-cadmus]6405-the house of cadmus should no longer stand , and that [the Sisters]1967-the sisters should drive [Athamas]695-athamas mad . [She]540-saturnia urged [the goddesses]1849-the goddesses help , mingling promises , commands and prayers together . When [Juno]513-juno had finished speaking , [Tisiphone]765-tisiphone , grey - haired as [she]765-tisiphone was , shook [her]765-tisiphone locks , flinging back the snakes that concealed [her]765-tisiphone face , and said ‘[2669-you] It does not need all these words : consider it done , whatever [you]2669-you have ordered . Leave [this unlovely kingdom]2670-this unlovely kingdom , and go back to [heaven]1501-heaven with its sweeter air . ’ [Juno]513-juno returned happily , and [Iris]512-iris , [[her]513-juno messenger]6408-her messenger , [the daughter of [Thaumus]766-thaumus]6409-the daughter of thaumus , purified [her]765-tisiphone , as [she]765-tisiphone was about to enter [heaven]1501-heaven , with drops of dew . Without delay , [Tisiphone]765-tisiphone , [the troubler]6411-the troubler , grasped a torch soaked with blood , put on a dripping red robe , coiled a writhing serpent round [her]765-tisiphone waist , and left the spot . [Grief]767-grief went as [[her]765-tisiphone companion]2211-her companion , and Panic , and Terror , and Madness with agitated face . [She]765-tisiphone took up [her]765-tisiphone position on the threshold , and [they]6413-them say the pillars of the doorway of [[Aeolus]511-aeolus ’s palace]6414-aeolus ’s palace shook , the doors of maple - wood were tainted with whiteness , and the sun fled [the place]1552-the place . [Athamas]695-athamas and [[his]695-athamas wife]1633-his wife , [Ino]680-ino , were terrified at these portents of doom , and [they]6413-them tried to escape [the palace]6417-the palace . [The baleful Erinys]768-the baleful erinys obstructed [them]6413-them , and blocked the way . Stretching out [her]765-tisiphone arms , wreathed with knots of vipers , [she]765-tisiphone flailed [her]765-tisiphone hair , and the snakes hissed at [her]765-tisiphone movements . Some coiled over [her]765-tisiphone shoulders , some slid over [her]765-tisiphone breast , giving out whistling noises , vomiting blood , and flickering [their]6413-them tongues . Then [she]765-tisiphone pulls two serpents from the midst of [her]765-tisiphone hair , and hurls what [she]765-tisiphone has snatched with a deadly aim . [They]6413-them slither over [Ino]680-ino and [Athamas]695-athamas , and blow [their]6413-them oppressive breath into [them]6413-them . [Their]6413-them limbs are not wounded : it is the mind that feels the dreadful stroke . [She]765-tisiphone had brought foul poisonous liquids too , spume from the jaws of [Cerberus]759-cerberus , [Echidna]769-echidna ’s venom , those that cause vague delusions , dark oblivions of the mind , wickedness and weeping , rage and love of murder , all seethed together . [She]765-tisiphone had boiled them , mixed with fresh blood , in hollow bronze , stirred with a stalk of green hemlock . While [they]6413-them stood trembling , [she]765-tisiphone poured this venom of the Furies over the breasts of [the two of [them]6413-them]6418-the two of them , and sent it into the depths of [their]6413-them minds . Then , brandishing [her]765-tisiphone torch , encircled [them]6413-them with fire , by fire ’s swift movement , whirling it round in repeated orbit . So having conquered [them]6413-them , and carried out [her]765-tisiphone orders , [she]765-tisiphone returned to [the wide kingdom of [mighty Dis]758-dis]6419-the wide kingdom of mighty dis , and unloosed the serpent [she]765-tisiphone had wrapped around [her]765-tisiphone . Then [Athamas]695-athamas , raving through the centre of [[his]0-i palace]6420-his palace , cries out ‘[6150-friends] [Friends]6150-friends , spread the nets through [these woods]2673-these woods ! [I]0-i have just seen [a lioness]2674-a lioness here , with [her]2674-a lioness two cubs ’ and in [his]0-i madness [he]0-i followed [[his]0-i wife]1633-his wife ’s steps as if [she]2674-a lioness were a wild beast . Then [he]0-i snatched [[his]0-i son]1773-his son [Learchus]770-learchus , who was laughing and waving [his]770-learchus little arms , from [[his]770-learchus mother]5953-his mother ’s protection , and whirled [him]770-learchus round , two or three times , in the air , in the manner of a sling , and dashed [the infant]6424-the infant ’s head fiercely against the solid rock . Then [the mother]2342-the mother , roused at last by the pain this caused , or by reason of the poison sprinkled on [her]2342-the mother , howled like an animal , and fled , insanely , tearing at [her]2342-the mother hair . In [her]2342-the mother naked arms [she]2342-the mother carried [you]2675-you , [Melicertes]771-melicertes , and cried out ‘[772-euhoe] [Euhoe]772-euhoe , [Bacchus]682-bacchus ’ . [Juno]513-juno laughed aloud at [Bacchus]682-bacchus ’s name , saying ‘[682-bacchus] Such help as this may [[your]2675-you foster - son]2676-your foster - son give [you]2675-you ! ’ [A cliff]6426-a cliff overhung [the water]1620-the water , carved out at [its]6426-a cliff base by the breakers , and [it]6426-a cliff sheltered the waves [it]6426-a cliff hid , from the rain . [Its]6426-a cliff summit reared up and stretched out , in front , over [the water]1620-the water , into empty space . [Ino]680-ino climbed up there ( madness had lent [her]680-ino strength ) and unrestrained by fear threw [herself]680-ino and [her]680-ino burden into [the sea]1464-the sea : the wave foamed white where [she]680-ino fell . [Venus]523-venus , pitying [[her]523-venus granddaughter]6430-her granddaughter ’s undeserved sufferings , coaxed [[her]523-venus uncle]6431-her uncle , saying ‘[682-bacchus] O [Neptune]514-neptune , god of [the waters]1626-the waters , whose power only ceases near heaven , it ’s true that what [I]0-i ask is great , but take pity on [those who are [mine]0-i , whom [you]2679-you see]2678-those who are mine , whom you see , fallen into [the vast Ionian waters]2680-the vast ionian waters , and add them to [your]2679-you sea - gods . Some kindness is due [me]0-i from [the sea]1464-the sea , if once [I]0-i was made from the spume in [the midst of [the deep]1919-the deep]2682-the midst of the deep , and from that [my]0-i Greek name , ‘ foam - born ’[753-cytherean aphrodite] [Aphrodite]753-cytherean aphrodite , remains . ’ [Neptune]514-neptune accepted [her]523-venus prayer , and taking from [them]2678-those who are mine , whom you see what was mortal , gave [them]2678-those who are mine , whom you see greatness , giving [them]2678-those who are mine , whom you see at the same time new names and forms , calling [the god Palaemon]6432-the god palaemon , and [[his]6432-the god palaemon mother]5953-his mother , [Leucothoë]744-leucothoë , [the white goddess]6434-the white goddess . [[Ino]680-ino ’s Sidonian attendants]6435-ino ’s sidonian attendants followed the marks of [her]680-ino feet as best [they]6435-ino ’s sidonian attendants could , only to see [her]680-ino last leap from [the pinnacle of rock]6436-the pinnacle of rock . Not doubting that [she]680-ino was dead , [they]6435-ino ’s sidonian attendants mourned for [the House of [Cadmus]634-cadmus]6405-the house of cadmus , beating [their]6435-ino ’s sidonian attendants breasts , tearing at [their]6435-ino ’s sidonian attendants clothes and hair , saying that [the goddess]5864-the goddess had shown too little justice , and too much cruelty , to [the rival who had made [her]680-ino jealous]6439-the rival who had made her jealous . [Juno]513-juno could not bear [their]6435-ino ’s sidonian attendants protests , and said ‘[0-i] [I]0-i will make [you]2684-you the best monument to [my]0-i cruelty ’ . What [she]513-juno said was done . Now [the one who had been most faithful]6440-the one who had been most faithful cried ‘[0-i] [I]0-i will follow [the queen]2685-the queen into [the sea]1464-the sea ’ , and starting [her]6440-the one who had been most faithful leap could not move at all , and stuck fast , fixed to [the cliff]6441-the cliff . [Another]2286-another felt [her]6440-the one who had been most faithful raised arms grow rigid , when [she]6440-the one who had been most faithful tried to beat [her]6440-the one who had been most faithful breasts , as [she]6440-the one who had been most faithful had been doing . [Another]2286-another chanced to stretch [her]6440-the one who had been most faithful hands out to the waves of [the sea]1464-the sea , but now hands made of stone were extended over the same waves . One , as [she]6440-the one who had been most faithful tore at the crown of [her]6440-the one who had been most faithful head to pull out [her]6440-the one who had been most faithful hair , [you]6445-you might see , suddenly with stiffened fingers amongst [her]6440-the one who had been most faithful hair . Whatever gesture [they]6446-they were caught in , there [they]6446-they remained . [Others]5836-others , [Theban women]6448-theban women , changed to birds , also , now , skim the surface of those depths with [their]5836-others wings . [The son of [Agenor]633-agenor]2222-the son of agenor , [Cadmus]634-cadmus , did not know that [[his]634-cadmus daughter]2098-his daughter and [little grandson]6451-little grandson were now [sea - gods]6452-sea - gods . Conquered by the pain of this run of disasters , and daunted by all [he]634-cadmus had seen , [the founder]2604-the founder departed [[his]634-cadmus city]2481-his city , as if the misfortunes of [the place]1552-the place and not [himself]634-cadmus were oppressing [him]634-cadmus . Driven to wandering , at length [his]634-cadmus journey carried [him]634-cadmus and [[his]634-cadmus wife]1633-his wife to [the borders of [Illyria]121-illyria]6457-the borders of illyria . Now , weighed down by age and sadness , [they]6458-their thought of the original destiny of [[their]6458-their house]6459-their house , and in talk reviewed [their]6458-their sufferings . [Cadmus]634-cadmus said ‘[0-i] Surely that snake [my]0-i spear pierced , must have been sacred , when , fresh from [Sidon]631-sidon , [I]0-i scattered the serpent ’s teeth , a strange seed , over [the earth]1463-the earth ? If that is what [the gods]1538-the gods have been avenging with such sure anger , may [I]0-i [myself]0-i stretch out as a long - bellied snake . ’ And , so speaking , [he]634-cadmus did extend into a long - bellied snake , and felt [his]634-cadmus skin hardening as scales grew there , while dark green patches chequered [his]634-cadmus black body . [He]634-cadmus lay prone on [his]634-cadmus breast , and gradually [his]634-cadmus legs fused together thinning out towards a smooth point . Still [his]634-cadmus arms were left to [him]634-cadmus , and what was left of [his]634-cadmus arms [he]634-cadmus stretched out , and , with tears running down [his]634-cadmus still human cheeks , [he]634-cadmus said ‘[0-i] Come here , [wife]5843-wife , come here , [most unfortunate one]2690-most unfortunate one , and while there is still something left of [me]0-i , touch [me]0-i , and take [my]0-i hand , while it is still a hand , while the snake does not yet have all of [me]0-i . ’ [He]634-cadmus wanted to say so much more , but suddenly [his]634-cadmus tongue was split in two , and though [he]634-cadmus wished for words none came , and whenever [he]634-cadmus started on some plaintive sound , [he]634-cadmus hissed : this was the voice that [Nature]773-nature bequeathed [him]634-cadmus . Then , striking [her]5843-wife naked breast with [her]5843-wife hands , [[his]634-cadmus wife]1633-his wife cried out ‘[634-cadmus] [Cadmus]634-cadmus , wait , [unhappy one]2691-unhappy one , tear away this monstrous thing ! [Cadmus]634-cadmus , what is it ? Where are [your]2691-unhappy one feet ? Where are [your]2691-unhappy one hands , shoulders , face , colour , everything – while [I]0-i speak ? Why do [you]2691-unhappy one not change [me]0-i as well , [[you]2691-unhappy one gods]5823-you gods , into this same snake ’s form ? ’ [She]1633-his wife spoke . [His]634-cadmus tongue flickered over [[his]634-cadmus wife]1633-his wife ’s face , [he]634-cadmus slid between [her]5843-wife beloved breasts as if known there , and clasped [her]5843-wife , and searched about for the neck [he]634-cadmus knew so well . [Everyone who was there]6462-everyone who was there ( [[their]6462-everyone who was there comrades]6463-their comrades were present ) was horrified , but [she]1633-his wife stroked the gleaming neck of the crested serpent , and suddenly there were two snakes there , with intertwining coils , until [they]6464-they sought the shelter of [the neighbouring woods]6465-the neighbouring woods . Even now [they]6464-they do not avoid [human beings]1489-human beings or wound [them]6464-they , quiet serpents , remembering what [they]6464-they once were . Nevertheless even in [their]6464-they altered form , [[their]6464-they grandson]6467-their grandson [Bacchus]682-bacchus gave [them]6464-they great consolation , whom conquered [India]774-india worshipped , to whose newly created temples [the Achaians]6468-the achaians thronged . Only [Acrisius]694-acrisius , [son of [Abas]775-abas]6469-son of abas , born from the same roots ( through [Belus brother of [Agenor]633-agenor]6470-belus brother of agenor ) , was [an exception , who closed [Argos]28-argos within [its]28-argos walls]6471-an exception , who closed argos within its walls , took up arms against [the god]1482-the god , and did not consider [him]694-acrisius [a child of [Jupiter]499-jupiter]6473-a child of jupiter . Nor did [he]694-acrisius consider , as [a child of [Jupiter]499-jupiter]6473-a child of jupiter , [[his]694-acrisius grandson]6475-his grandson [Perseus]776-perseus whom [Danaë]777-aegina conceived of a shower of gold . Though later ( such is truth ’s power ) [Acrisius]694-acrisius repented of outraging [the god]1482-the god , and of not acknowledging [[his]694-acrisius grandson]6475-his grandson . [One]5944-one had taken [his]5944-one place in [the heavens]1940-the heavens , but the other was travelling through the gentle air , on beating wings , bringing back an amazing , monstrous prize , and as [the victor]6480-the victor hung above [the Libyan sands]6481-the libyan sands , bloody drops fell from [the Gorgon]778-the gorgon ’s head . [The earth]1463-the earth caught [them]6483-them and gave [them]6483-them life , as species of snakes , and so [that country]6099-that country is infested with deadly serpents . [He]694-acrisius was driven from [there]1878-there by conflicting winds , carried this way and that , through [vast spaces]6486-vast spaces , like a rain cloud . [He]694-acrisius flew over [the whole world]1451-the whole world , looking down , through the air , from a great height at [remote countries]6488-remote countries . Three times [he]694-acrisius saw the frozen constellations of [the Bears]574-the bears , three times the Crab ’s pincers . Often [he]694-acrisius was forced below the west , often into [the east]1874-the east , and now as the light died , afraid to trust to night , [he]694-acrisius put down in [the western regions of [Hesperus]41-hesperus]6490-the western regions of hesperus , in [the kingdom of [Atlas]546-atlas]6491-the kingdom of atlas . [He]694-acrisius looked to rest there a while , till [Lucifer]623-lucifer summoned up [Aurora]569-aurora ’s fires , and [Aurora]569-aurora the chariot of dawn . Here was [Atlas]546-atlas , [son of [Iapetus]779-iapetus]6492-son of iapetus , exceeding [all men]6493-all men by the size of [his]546-atlas body . [The most remote land]6494-the most remote land was under [Atlas]546-atlas ’s rule , and [the ocean]1657-the ocean , into which [Sol]600-sol ’s panting horses plunged , and where [his]546-atlas straining axle was welcomed . [He]546-atlas had a thousand flocks , and as many herds of cattle straying through the grass , and [no neighbouring soil]6496-no neighbouring soil was richer than [his]546-atlas . The leaves of the trees , bright with radiant gold , covered branches of gold , and fruit of gold . [Perseus]776-perseus said to [him]5789-friend ‘[5789-friend] [Friend]5789-friend , if high birth impresses [you]5789-friend , [Jupiter]499-jupiter is responsible for [my]0-i birth . Or if [you]5789-friend admire great deeds , [you]5789-friend will admire [mine]0-i . [I]0-i ask for hospitality and rest . ’ [Atlas]546-atlas remembered an ancient prophecy . [Themis]780-themis on [Parnassus]49-parnassus had given that prophecy . ‘[546-atlas] [Atlas]546-atlas , the time will come when [your]546-atlas tree will be stripped of its gold , and [he]2694-he who steals it will be called [the son of [Jupiter]499-jupiter]6250-the son of jupiter . ’ Fearful of this , [Atlas]546-atlas had enclosed [[his]546-atlas orchard]6497-his orchard with solid walls , and set a huge dragon to guard it , and kept [all strangers]6498-all strangers away from [[his]546-atlas borders]6499-his borders . To [Perseus]776-perseus , [he]546-atlas said ‘[6250-the son of jupiter] Go far away , lest the glory of the deeds , that [you]546-atlas lie about , and [Jupiter]499-jupiter [himself]499-jupiter , fail [you]546-atlas ! ’ [He]546-atlas added weight to [his]546-atlas threats , and tried to push [him]776-perseus away with [his]546-atlas great hands , [Perseus]776-perseus delaying resolutely , and combining that with calm words . Inferior in strength ( who could equal [Atlas]546-atlas in strength ? ) , [he]546-atlas said , ‘[546-atlas] Well now , since [you]546-atlas show [me]0-i so little kindness , accept a gift ’ and turning away [himself]546-atlas , [he]546-atlas held out [Medusa]781-medusa ’s foul head , on [his]546-atlas left hand side . [Atlas]546-atlas became [a mountain]2275-a mountain , as huge as [he]546-atlas [himself]546-atlas had been . Now [his]546-atlas hair and beard were changed into trees , [his]546-atlas shoulders and hands into ridges . What had been [his]546-atlas head before was [the crest on [the mountain summit]6502-the mountain summit]6501-the crest on the mountain summit . [His]546-atlas bones became stones . Then [he]546-atlas grew to an immense height in every part ( so [you]6503-you gods determined ) and the whole sky , with its many stars , rested on [him]546-atlas . [Aeolus]511-aeolus , [son of [Hippotas]782-hippotas]6504-son of hippotas , had confined the winds in [[their]6505-their prison under [Mount Etna]123-mount etna]6506-their prison under mount etna , and [Lucifer]623-lucifer , who exhorts [us]6507-us to work , shone brightest of all in [the depths of the eastern sky]6508-the depths of the eastern sky . [Perseus]776-perseus strapped the winged sandals [he]776-perseus had put to one side to [his]776-perseus feet , armed [himself]776-perseus with [his]776-perseus curved sword , and cut through the clear air on beating pinions . Leaving innumerable nations behind , below and around [him]776-perseus , [he]776-perseus came in sight of [the Ethiopian peoples]6509-the ethiopian peoples , and [the fields of [Cepheus]785-cepheus]6510-the fields of cepheus . There [Jupiter Ammon]499-jupiter had unjustly ordered [the innocent Andromeda]6511-the innocent andromeda to pay the penalty for [[her]6511-the innocent andromeda mother]5866-her mother [Cassiopeia]783-cassiopeia ’s words . As soon as [Perseus]776-perseus , [great - grandson of [Abas]775-abas]6513-great - grandson of abas , saw [her]6511-the innocent andromeda fastened by [her]6511-the innocent andromeda arms to the hard rock , [he]776-perseus would have thought [she]6511-the innocent andromeda was a marble statue , except that a light breeze stirred [her]6511-the innocent andromeda hair , and warm tears ran from [her]6511-the innocent andromeda eyes . [He]776-perseus took fire without knowing it and was stunned , and seized by the vision of the form [he]776-perseus saw , [he]776-perseus almost forgot to flicker [his]776-perseus wings in the air . As soon as [he]776-perseus had touched down , [he]776-perseus said ‘[546-atlas] O , [you]2696-her do not deserve these chains , but those that link [ardent lovers]2697-ardent lovers together . Tell [me]0-i [your]2696-her name , [I]0-i wish to know it , and the name of [[your]2696-her country]6205-your country , and why [you]2696-her are wearing these fetters . At first [she]2696-her was silent : [a virgin]5906-a virgin , [she]2696-her did not dare to address [a man]5897-a man , and [she]2696-her would have hidden [her]2696-her face modestly with [her]2696-her hands , if they had not been fastened behind [her]2696-her . [She]2696-her used [her]2696-her eyes instead , and they filled with welling tears . At [his]0-i repeated insistence , so as not to seem to be acknowledging a fault of [her]2696-her own , [she]2696-her told [him]0-i [her]2696-her name and the name of [[her]2696-her country]2701-her country , and what faith [[her]2696-her mother]5866-her mother had had in [her]2696-her own beauty . Before [she]2696-her had finished speaking , all the waves resounded , and a monster menaced them , rising from [the deep sea]2703-the deep sea , and covered [the wide waters]2704-the wide waters with its breadth . [The girl]1792-the girl cried out : [[her]1792-the girl grieving father]2706-her grieving father and [mother]1809-mother were together nearby , both wretched , but [the mother]2342-the mother more justifiably so . [They]2709-they bring no help with [them]2709-they , only weeping and lamentations to suit the moment , and cling to [her]2342-the mother fettered body . Then [the stranger]2710-the stranger speaks ‘ There will be plenty of time left for tears , but only a brief hour is given [us]6514-us to work . If [I]2710-the stranger asked for [this girl]2145-this girl as [Perseus]776-perseus , [son of [Jupiter]499-jupiter]6516-son of jupiter and [that Danaë]6517-that danaë , imprisoned in [the brazen tower]6518-the brazen tower , whom [Jupiter]499-jupiter filled with [his]499-jupiter rich golden shower ; [Perseus]776-perseus conqueror of [the Gorgon with snakes for hair]6519-the gorgon with snakes for hair , [he]776-perseus [who dared to fly , driven through the air , on soaring wings]6520-who dared to fly , driven through the air , on soaring wings , then surely [I]2710-the stranger should be preferred to [all other suitors]6521-all other suitors as [a son - in - law]5902-a son - in - law . If [the gods]1538-the gods favour [me]2710-the stranger , [I]2710-the stranger will try to add further merit to these great gifts . [I]2710-the stranger will make a bargain . Rescued by [my]2710-the stranger courage , [she]2711-her must be mine . ’[2710-the stranger] [[Her]2711-her parents]2577-her parents accept the contract ( who would hesitate ? ) and , entreating [him]2713-him , promise a kingdom , as well , for a dowry . See how the creature comes , parting the waves with surging breast , like a fast ship with pointed prow ploughing the water , driven by the sweat - covered muscles of [[her]2711-her crew]2714-her crew . [It]2715-it was as far from the rock as a Balearic sling can send a lead shot through the air , when suddenly [the young hero]2716-the young hero , pushing [his]2716-the young hero feet hard against the earth , shot high among the clouds . When the shadow of [a man]5897-a man appeared on [the water ’ surface]6524-the water ’ surface , [the creature]5894-the creature raged against the shadow [it]5894-the creature had seen . As [Jupiter]499-jupiter ’s eagle , when [it]5894-the creature sees a snake , in an open field , showing [its]5894-the creature livid body to the sun , takes it from behind , and fixes its eager talons in the scaly neck , lest it twists back its cruel fangs , so [the descendant of [Inachus]536-inachus]6526-the descendant of inachus hurling [himself]6526-the descendant of inachus headlong , in swift flight , through empty space , attacked the creature ’s back , and , as it roared , buried [his]6526-the descendant of inachus sword , to the end of the curved blade , in the right side of its neck . Hurt by the deep wound , now it reared high in the air , now it dived underwater , or turned now , like a fierce wild boar , when the dogs scare [him]6526-the descendant of inachus , and the pack is baying around [him]6526-the descendant of inachus . [Perseus]776-perseus evades the eager jaws on swift wings , and strikes with [his]776-perseus curved sword wherever the monster is exposed , now at the back encrusted with barnacles , now at the sides of the body , now where the tail is slenderest , ending fishlike . The beast vomits seawater mixed with purplish blood . The pinions grow heavy , soaked with spray . Not daring to trust [his]776-perseus drenched wings any further , [he]776-perseus sees [a rock whose highest point stands above quiet water , hidden by rough seas]6527-a rock whose highest point stands above quiet water , hidden by rough seas . Resting there , and holding on to the topmost pinnacle with [his]776-perseus left hand , [he]776-perseus drives [his]776-perseus sword in three or four times , repeatedly . [The shores]6528-the shores , and [the high places of [the gods]1538-the gods]6529-the high places of the gods , fill with the clamour of applause . [Cassiope]784-cassiope and [Cepheus]785-cepheus rejoice , and greet [[their]6531-their son - in - law]6532-their son - in - law , acknowledging [him]6532-their son - in - law as [the pillar of [[their]6531-their house]6459-their house]6533-the pillar of their house , and [[their]6531-their deliverer]6535-their deliverer . Released from [her]6536-her chains , [the girl]1792-the girl comes forward , the prize and the cause of [his]776-perseus efforts . [He]776-perseus washes [his]776-perseus hands after the victory in seawater drawn for [him]776-perseus , and , so that [Medusa]781-medusa ’s head , covered with its snakes , is not bruised by the harsh sand , [he]776-perseus makes the ground soft with leaves , and spreads out plants from below the waves , and places the head of [that daughter of Phorcys]6538-that daughter of phorcys on [them]6539-them . The fresh plants , still living inside , and absorbent , respond to the influence of the Gorgon ’s head , and harden at its touch , acquiring a new rigidity in branches and fronds . And [the ocean nymphs]6540-the ocean nymphs try out this wonder on more plants , and are delighted that the same thing happens at its touch , and repeat it by scattering the seeds from the plants through the waves . Even now corals have the same nature , hardening at a touch of air , and what was alive , under the water , above [water]6541-water is turned to stone . To [the three gods]6542-the three gods , [he]776-perseus builds the same number of altars out of turf , to [you]6543-you [Mercury]545-mercury on the left , to [you]6543-you [Minerva]610-pallas , warlike virgin , on the right , and an altar of [Jupiter]499-jupiter in the centre . [He]776-perseus sacrifices a cow to [Minerva]610-pallas , a calf to [the wing - footed god]6544-the wing - footed god , and a bull to [you]6543-you , greatest of [the gods]1538-the gods . Then [he]776-perseus claims [Andromeda]125-andromeda , without a dowry , valuing [her]125-andromeda as the worthiest prize . [Hymen]525-juno and [Amor]526-amor wave the marriage torch , the fires are saturated with strong perfumes , garlands hang from the rafters , and everywhere flutes and pipes , and singing , sound out , the happy evidence of joyful hearts . The doors fold back to show the whole of [the golden hall]6546-the golden hall , and [the noble Ethiopian princes]6547-the noble ethiopian princes enter to a richly prepared banquet already set out for [them]6547-the noble ethiopian princes . When [they]6547-the noble ethiopian princes have attacked the feast , and [their]6547-the noble ethiopian princes spirits are cheered by wine , the generous gift of [Bacchus]682-bacchus , [Perseus]776-perseus asks about [the country]6548-the country and [its]6548-the country culture , its customs and the character of [[its]6548-the country people]6549-its people . At the same time as [he]776-perseus instructed [him]776-perseus about these , [one of [the guests]6551-the guests]6550-one of the guests said ‘[776-perseus] [Perseus]776-perseus , [I]0-i beg [you]776-perseus to tell [us]2718-us by what prowess and by what arts [you]776-perseus carried off that head with snakes for hair . ’ [The descendant of [Agenor]633-agenor]6552-the descendant of agenor told how there was [a cave lying below [the frozen slopes of [Atlas]546-atlas]6554-the frozen slopes of atlas]6553-a cave lying below the frozen slopes of atlas , safely hidden in [its]6553-a cave lying below the frozen slopes of atlas solid mass . At the entrance to [this place]6354-this place [the sisters]1967-the sisters lived , [the Graeae]786-the graeae , [daughters of [Phorcys]787-phorcys]6557-daughters of phorcys , similar in appearance , sharing only one eye between [them]1967-the sisters . [He]776-perseus removed it , cleverly , and stealthily , cunningly substituting [his]776-perseus own hand while [they]1967-the sisters were passing it from one to another . Far from there , by hidden tracks , and through rocks bristling with shaggy trees , [he]776-perseus reached the place where [the Gorgons]788-the gorgons lived . In [the fields]1522-the fields and along the paths , here and there , [he]776-perseus saw the shapes of [men]5788-men and animals changed from [their]1967-the sisters natures to hard stone by [Medusa]781-medusa ’s gaze . Nevertheless [he]776-perseus had [himself]776-perseus looked at the dread form of [Medusa]781-medusa reflected in a circular shield of polished bronze that [he]776-perseus carried on [his]776-perseus left arm . And while a deep sleep held the snakes and [herself]781-medusa , [he]776-perseus struck [her]781-medusa head from [her]781-medusa neck . And [the swift winged horse Pegasus]6560-the swift winged horse pegasus and [[his]776-perseus brother]1593-his brother [the warrior [Chrysaor]789-chrysaor]6562-the warrior chrysaor , were born from [[their]1967-the sisters mother]1928-their mother ’s blood . [He]776-perseus told of [his]776-perseus long journeys , of dangers that were not imaginary ones , what seas and [lands]6564-lands [he]776-perseus had seen below from [his]776-perseus high flight , and what stars [he]776-perseus had brushed against with beating wings . [He]776-perseus still finished speaking before [they]1967-the sisters wished . [Next one of [the many princes]6566-the many princes]6565-next one of the many princes asked why [Medusa]781-medusa , alone among [[her]781-medusa sisters]1763-her sisters , had snakes twining in [her]781-medusa hair . [The guest]6568-the guest replied ‘[776-perseus] Since what [you]2719-you ask is worth the telling , hear the answer to [your]2719-you question . [She]2720-her was once most beautiful , and the jealous aspiration of [many suitors]2721-many suitors . Of all [her]2720-her beauties none was more admired than [her]2720-her hair : [I]0-i came across [a man who recalled having seen [her]2720-her]2722-a man who recalled having seen her . [They]2723-they say that [Neptune]514-neptune , [lord of [the seas]2725-the seas]2724-lord of the seas , violated [her]2720-her in [the temple of [Minerva]610-pallas]2726-the temple of minerva . [[Jupiter]499-jupiter ’s daughter]2727-jupiter ’s daughter turned away , and hid [her]2727-jupiter ’s daughter chaste eyes behind [her]2727-jupiter ’s daughter aegis . So that it might not go unpunished , [she]2727-jupiter ’s daughter changed [the Gorgon]2728-the gorgon ’s hair to foul snakes . And now , to terrify [[her]2727-jupiter ’s daughter enemies]2729-her enemies , numbing [them]2729-her enemies with fear , [the goddess]5864-the goddess wears the snakes , that [she]2727-jupiter ’s daughter created , as a breastplate . ’ While [the hero]2234-the hero , [the son of [Danae]790-danae]6570-the son of danae , is recalling this succession of events , amongst [the Ethiopians]580-the ethiopians , [the royal halls]6571-the royal halls suddenly fill with a riot of complaints . It is not the sound of a wedding feast that rings out , but that which presages the use of arms . The festivities , turned to sudden confusion , could be likened to a calm sea that the fierce raging of the wind churns into rising waves . [Phineus]791-phineus , [[the king]6572-the king ’s brother]6573-the king ’s brother , is first mover in this , a rash stirrer - up of strife , shaking [his]0-i ashen spear tipped with bronze . ‘[2727-jupiter ’s daughter] See , ’ [he]0-i shouted ‘[2727-jupiter ’s daughter] See , [I]0-i come here as [an avenger for the carrying off of [[my]0-i bride]5923-my bride]2731-an avenger for the carrying off of my bride . [Your]2733-you wings wo n’t help [you]2733-you escape [me]0-i , nor even [Jupiter]499-jupiter , changed to a shower of fool ’s gold ! ’ As [he]0-i prepared to throw the spear , [Cepheus]785-cepheus cried ‘[2733-you] What are [you]2733-you doing ? [Brother]2734-brother , what mad feelings drive [you]2733-you to crime ? Are these the thanks [you]2733-you return for such service ? Is this the gift with which [you]2733-you pay compensation for a life restored ? If [you]2733-you want the truth it was not [Perseus]776-perseus who took [her]5923-my bride from [you]2733-you , but [Neptune]514-neptune , [the stern god of the Nereids]2735-the stern god of the nereids , and [horned Jupiter Ammon]499-jupiter , and that monster that came from [the sea]1464-the sea to glut itself on [my]0-i own flesh and blood . It was then [she]5923-my bride was taken from [you]2733-you , when [she]5923-my bride was about to die : but perhaps , [hard - hearted one]2737-hard - hearted one , that is what [you]2733-you want , for [her]5923-my bride to die , and [you]2733-you to take comfort from [my]0-i grief . Of course , it is not enough that [you]2733-you saw [her]5923-my bride fastened [there]1878-there , and brought [her]5923-my bride no help , [you]2733-you [[her]5923-my bride uncle]6431-her uncle and [her]5923-my bride intended . Are [you]2733-you grieved that [she]5923-my bride was saved by [someone else]6223-someone else , and would [you]2733-you take away [his]6223-someone else prize ? If it seemed so great a prize to [you]2733-you , [you]2733-you should have sought [her]5923-my bride among the rocks where [she]5923-my bride was chained . Now let [the man who did seek it]2741-the man who did seek it , take what [he]2741-the man who did seek it has earned and what was promised , since , thanks to [him]2741-the man who did seek it , [I]0-i shall not have a childless old age . Realise that it is not [Perseus]776-perseus , but the prospect of certain death that has displaced [you]2733-you . ’ [Phineus]791-phineus said nothing , but turned [his]791-phineus face alternately from [Perseus]776-perseus to [[his]791-phineus brother]1593-his brother , not knowing whether to aim at [the one]1688-the one or the other . Hesitating for a while [he]791-phineus hurled [his]791-phineus spear , throwing it with the energy of anger , but uselessly , at [Perseus]776-perseus . Only when it had stuck fast in the bench , did [Perseus]776-perseus leap up from where [he]776-perseus was lying . Returning the weapon , fiercely , [he]776-perseus would have pierced [[his]776-perseus enemy]6576-his enemy ’s chest , if [Phineus]791-phineus had not dodged behind the altars : and ( shamefully ) [the wretch]6577-the wretch found safety in [that refuge]6578-that refuge . Nevertheless the javelin was not without effect , and struck [Rhoetus]792-rhoetus full face , who immediately fell , and , when the weapon had been pulled out of the bone , [he]792-rhoetus kicked out and sprayed the laden tables with [his]792-rhoetus blood . Then [the crowd of men]6579-the crowd of men was truly ablaze with anger , and [they]6579-the crowd of men hurled [their]6579-the crowd of men spears , and there were [those who said [Cepheus]785-cepheus deserved to die with [[his]785-cepheus son - in - law]6581-his son - in - law]6580-those who said cepheus deserved to die with his son - in - law . But [Cepheus]785-cepheus had already crossed the threshold , calling on justice , good faith , and on [the gods of friendship]6582-the gods of friendship , to witness that what was being done was forbidden . [Warlike Pallas]793-pallas came and protected [[her]793-pallas brother]1883-her brother , [Perseus]776-perseus , with [her]793-pallas shield , the aegis , and gave [him]776-perseus courage . There was [a youth from [India]36-india]6584-a youth from india , [Athis]794-athis , whom [Limnaee]795-limnaee , [a nymph of [the River Ganges]127-the river ganges]6585-a nymph of the river ganges is said to have given birth to , under [its]127-the river ganges glassy waters . [He]794-athis was of outstanding beauty , [his]794-athis sixteen years unimpaired , enhanced by [his]794-athis rich robes , wearing [his]794-athis military cloak of Tyrian purple , fringed with gold . A gold collar ornamented [his]794-athis neck , and a curved coronet [his]794-athis myrrh - drenched hair . [He]794-athis was skilled at piercing anything with the javelins [he]794-athis launched , however distant , but was even more skilled at shooting with the bow . While [he]794-athis was bending the pliant tips in [his]794-athis hands , [Perseus]776-perseus struck [him]794-athis , with a log that had been smouldering in the middle of the altar , and shattered [his]794-athis face to splintered bone . When [Lycabas]704-lycabas , [the Assyrian]6586-the assyrian , closest to [him]794-athis , as [a friend]5954-a friend , and , most probably , [a lover]6116-a lover , saw [his]794-athis much praised features masked with blood , [he]794-athis wept bitterly for [Athis]794-athis , breathing out [his]794-athis life through that sad wound . [He]0-i caught up the bow [Athis]794-athis had strung and said ‘[2742-yourself] Now match [yourself]2742-yourself with [me]0-i ! [You]2742-yourself will not have long to rejoice over the death of [a child]2050-a child , an act which holds more shame than praise . ’ [He]0-i had not finished speaking when the sharp arrow shot from the bowstring , but [Perseus]776-perseus avoided it , and it was left hanging from a fold of [his]776-perseus clothes . [The grandson of Acrisius]6589-the grandson of acrisius turned against [him]0-i [that scimitar]6590-that scimitar , tried and proven in [his]6589-the grandson of acrisius killing of [Medusa]781-medusa , driving it into [his]6589-the grandson of acrisius chest . But even in death , [his]6589-the grandson of acrisius eyes failing , [he]6589-the grandson of acrisius looked round for [Athis]794-athis , in that gloomy night , and fell next to [him]794-athis , taking for [his]6589-the grandson of acrisius solace , to the shadows , the fact of being joined with [him]6589-the grandson of acrisius in death . [Phorbas of Syene]796-phorbas , [the son of [Metion]797-metion]6591-the son of metion , and [Libyan Amphimedon]798-libyan amphimedon , eager to commit to the fight , fell , having slipped on the ground , warm and drenched with blood on every side . Rising , [they]6592-they were stopped by the sword , piercing [Phorbas]796-phorbas ’s throat , and [Amphimedon]798-libyan amphimedon ’s ribs . But [Perseus]776-perseus did not challenge [Eurytus]799-eurytus , [son of Actor]6593-son of actor , who had a battle - axe , with [his]799-eurytus scimitar , instead , lifting a mixing bowl , embossed with decorations and very heavy in weight , high in the air , with both hands , [he]776-perseus dashed it down on [the man , who vomited bright red blood]6594-the man , who vomited bright red blood , and , lying on [his]799-eurytus back , beat the earth with [his]799-eurytus head . Then [Perseus]776-perseus overthrew [Polydegmon]800-polydegmon , born of the blood of [Queen Semiramis]801-queen semiramis , [Abaris]802-abaris from [Caucasia]128-caucasia , [Lycetus]803-lycetus from [the River Spercheos region]6595-the river spercheos region , [Helices]6596-helices with flowing hair , [Clytus]804-clytus and [Phlegyas]805-phlegyas , and trod on a mounting pile of [the dying]6597-the dying . [Phineus]791-phineus did not dare to fight hand to hand with [[his]791-phineus enemy]6576-his enemy , but threw [his]791-phineus spear , which felled [Idas]806-idas , by mistake , who , though unavailingly , had no part in the fight , and was [a follower of neither side]6599-a follower of neither side . [He]0-i , looking fiercely at [Phineus]791-phineus , said ‘[2742-yourself] Since [I]0-i have been forced to take part , then , [Phineus]791-phineus , acknowledge the enemy [you]791-phineus have made , and repay [me]0-i wound for wound ! ’ [He]0-i was about to hurl back the javelin [he]0-i had pulled from [his]0-i body when [he]0-i collapsed dying , [his]0-i limbs drained of blood . Then [Hodites]807-hodites , [the greatest of the Ethiopians next to [the king]6572-the king]6600-the greatest of the ethiopians next to the king , was killed by [Clymenus]808-clymenus ’s sword . [Hypseus]809-hypseus struck [Prothoënor]810-prothoënor , and [Lyncides]811-lyncides struck [Hypseus]809-hypseus . [One very old man]6602-one very old man , [Emathion]812-emathion , was there who upheld justice , and feared [the gods]1538-the gods . [He]6602-one very old man stepped forward , and since [his]6602-one very old man age prevented [him]6602-one very old man fighting , [he]6602-one very old man warred in words , cursing [their]1538-the gods sinful weapons . [Chromis]813-chromis decapitated [him]6602-one very old man with [his]813-chromis sword , as [he]6602-one very old man clung to the altar with trembling hands , and the head fell straight on to the hearth , and there the half living tongue still uttered imprecations , and its life expired in the midst of the flames . Then [two brothers]6604-two brothers fell at the hands of [Phineus]791-phineus . [They]6604-two brothers were [Broteas]814-broteas , and [Ammon]499-jupiter [the famous boxers , who would have been able to overcome anything , if boxing gloves were able to overcome swords]6605-the famous boxers , who would have been able to overcome anything , if boxing gloves were able to overcome swords , and [Ampycus]815-ampycus , [priest of [Ceres]689-ceres]6606-priest of ceres , [his]815-ampycus forehead wreathed with white fillets . And [you]6607-you [Lampetides , summoned , but not for this purpose , who played the lute and sang the work of peace]6608-lampetides , summoned , but not for this purpose , who played the lute and sang the work of peace , ordered to help celebrate the feast , and recite the bridal songs . [Pedasus]816-pedasus , mockingly shouted to [him]816-pedasus , as [he]816-pedasus stood to one side holding [his]816-pedasus unwarlike plectrum , ‘[791-phineus] Go and sing the rest to the Stygian shades ! ’ and pierced [his]816-pedasus left temple with [his]816-pedasus blade . [He]816-pedasus fell , and tried to pluck the lyric strings again , with dying fingers , and , falling , struck a plaintive note . [Lycormas]585-golden lycormas , angered , did not allow [him]816-pedasus to die without taking revenge . Grasping a heavy bar from the door on [his]816-pedasus right , [he]816-pedasus struck [Pedasus]816-pedasus , in the middle of [his]816-pedasus neck - bones , and [he]816-pedasus fell dead to the ground , like a bullock at the sacrifice . [Pelates]817-pelates , from [the banks of [Cinyps]130-cinyps]6609-the banks of cinyps , tried to take the bar from the left door , and , while attempting to do so , [his]817-pelates right hand was transfixed by the spear of [Corythus]818-corythus , from [Marmarica]131-marmarica , and pinned to the wood . [Abas]775-abas pierced [him]817-pelates in the side as [he]817-pelates was fastened there , and [he]817-pelates did not fall , but hung there , dying , from the post to which [his]817-pelates hand was nailed . [Melaneus]670-melaneus , [a follower of [Perseus]776-perseus ’s cause]6610-a follower of perseus ’s cause , was also killed , and [Dorylas]819-dorylas , [the wealthiest man in [the fields of [Nasamonia]132-nasamonia]6612-the fields of nasamonia , Dorylas whose wealth was in [fields]6613-fields , than whom [no man]2270-no man held a greater tract , nor could pile up as many heaps of spices]6611-the wealthiest man in the fields of nasamonia , dorylas whose wealth was in fields , than whom no man held a greater tract , nor could pile up as many heaps of spices . A missile thrown from the side stuck in [his]817-pelates groin , that fatal place . When [Halcyoneus of Bactria]820-halcyoneus of bactria , [the perpetrator of the wound]6615-the perpetrator of the wound , saw [him]817-pelates gasping for life , [his]820-halcyoneus of bactria eyes rolling , [he]820-halcyoneus of bactria said ‘[791-phineus] Of [all [your]2745-you lands]2744-all your lands [you]2745-you shall have only [this earth]2746-this earth [you]2745-you lie on ! ’ and left [his]820-halcyoneus of bactria bloodless corpse . But [Perseus]776-perseus , [the avenger]6616-the avenger , [the descendant of [Abas]775-abas]6617-the descendant of abas , turned against [him]817-pelates the spear , pulled hot from the wound . Catching the nose , it went through the middle of the neck , jutting out front and back . While [Fortune]570-fortune aided [his]817-pelates hand , [Perseus]776-perseus killed [Clytius]821-clytius and [Clanis]822-clanis , born of [one mother]6618-one mother , with different wounds . An ashen spear , from [his]817-pelates strong arm , went through both [Clytius]821-clytius ’s thighs , while [Clanis]822-clanis ’s jaw bit on a javelin . [Mendesian Celadon]823-mendesian celadon was killed , [Astreus]824-astreus , of [unknown father]6619-unknown father and [Syrian mother]6620-syrian mother , [Aethion]825-aethion , once skilled in telling the future , now deceived by lack of foresight , [Thoactes]826-thoactes , [the armour - bearer of [the king]6572-the king]6621-the armour - bearer of the king , and [Agyrtes]827-agyrtes , notorious for murdering [[his]827-agyrtes own father]6623-his own father . There is yet more to be done , despite what [he]817-pelates has endured : the purpose of all is to overwhelm [this one man]6624-this one man . [The bands of [conspirators]6626-conspirators]6625-the bands of conspirators oppose [him]817-pelates on all sides , in a cause opposed to justice , and good faith . [[His]817-pelates father]1775-his father , with helpless loyalty , and [[his]817-pelates new bride]6628-his new bride and [[her]6628-his new bride mother]5866-her mother , support [him]817-pelates to the best of [their]6625-the bands of conspirators abilities , filling [the palace]6417-the palace with [their]6625-the bands of conspirators cries . But the clash of weapons and the groans of [the fallen]6631-the fallen , drown [them]6625-the bands of conspirators out , and at the same time [Bellona]828-bellona , [goddess of war]6632-goddess of war , pollutes and drenches [the penates]6633-the penates , [the household gods , with blood , and stirs renewed conflict]6634-the household gods , with blood , and stirs renewed conflict . [Phineus]791-phineus and [a thousand followers of [Phineus]791-phineus]6635-a thousand followers of phineus , surround [the one man]6636-the one man . [Spears]829-spears to the right of [him]6636-the one man , spears to the left of [him]6636-the one man , fly thicker than winter hail , past [his]6636-the one man eyes and ears . [He]6636-the one man sets [his]6636-the one man back and shoulders against a massive stone column , and protected behind , turns towards [the opposing crowd of men]6637-the opposing crowd of men , and withstands [their]6637-the opposing crowd of men threat . [The Chaonian]830-the chaonian , [Molpeus]831-molpeus , presses [him]6636-the one man on the left , and on the right [Ethemon]832-ethemon , [a Nabatean]6638-a nabatean . Like a tiger , goaded by hunger , that hears the bellowing of two herds of cattle in [separate valleys]6639-separate valleys , and does not know which it would rather rush at , fired up to rush at either , so [Perseus]776-perseus hesitates whether to strike right or left . [He]776-perseus drives [Molpeus]831-molpeus off , piercing [him]831-molpeus with a wound to the leg , and is content to let [him]831-molpeus go : but [Ethemon]832-ethemon allows [him]6636-the one man no time , and raging and eager to give [him]6636-the one man a wound high on the neck , flails at [him]6636-the one man , incautiously and violently , and fractures [his]6636-the one man sword , striking it on the extreme edge of the column . The blade is detached , and fixes itself in [its owner]6640-its owner ’s throat . The wound it gives [him]6636-the one man is not serious enough to cause [his]6636-the one man death , but as [he]6636-the one man stands there , quivering , and uselessly stretching out [his]6636-the one man defenceless arms , [Perseus]776-perseus stabs [him]6636-the one man with [Cyllenian Mercury]550-cyllenian mercury ’s curved sword . When [Perseus]776-perseus saw indeed that , [his]776-perseus efforts would succumb to the weight of numbers , [he]776-perseus said ‘[791-phineus] Since [you]2747-your plan it like this , [I]0-i will ask help of [the enemy]6372-the enemy . If there are [any friends here]2749-any friends here , turn [your]2747-your face away ! ’ and [he]776-perseus held up the Gorgon ’s head . ‘[2747-your] Find others , who might be worried by [your]2747-your marvel ’ said [Thesculus]833-thesculus , but as [he]833-thesculus prepared to throw [his]833-thesculus deadly javelin , [he]833-thesculus was frozen , like a marble statue , in the act . [Ampyx]834-ampyx , next to [him]833-thesculus , thrust [his]834-ampyx sword straight at the heart of [the courageous descendant of [Lynceus]835-lynceus]6641-the courageous descendant of lynceus , and , in thrusting , [his]834-ampyx right hand stiffened , without movement this way or that . [But [Nileus]551-nile who falsely claimed that [he]551-nile was born of [the Nile]551-nile with its seven mouths]551-nile , [his]551-nile shield engraved with its seven streams , part gold , part silver , cried ‘[776-perseus] [Perseus]776-perseus , see , the sources of [[my]0-i people]2750-my people : it will be a great consolation to [you]776-perseus to take with [you]776-perseus , in death , to the silent shadows , the knowledge of having fallen to [so noble a man]2751-so noble a man ’ . The last echo of [his]551-nile voice was cut off in mid - flight , and [you]776-perseus might believe [his]551-nile mouth still wished to speak , though it was no longer pervious to words . [Eryx]836-eryx rebuked [them]2750-my people , saying , ‘[778-the gorgon] Lack of courage , not the power of [the Gorgon]778-the gorgon , freezes [you]776-perseus . Rush in with [me]0-i and knock [this youth]2752-this youth and [his]2752-this youth magic weapon to the ground ! ’ [He]551-nile had started [his]551-nile rush , but the floor held [his]551-nile feet fast , and there [he]551-nile stayed , unmoving stone , [a fully - armed statue]6642-a fully - armed statue . [They]2750-my people all deserved the punishment [they]2750-my people suffered , except [one of [[Perseus]776-perseus ’s warriors]6644-perseus ’s warriors]6643-one of perseus ’s warriors . While [he]551-nile was fighting on [his]551-nile side , [Aconteus]837-aconteus , saw [the Gorgon]778-the gorgon ’s head , and took the shape of hardened stone . [Astyages]838-astyages struck [him]551-nile with [his]838-astyages long sword thinking [he]551-nile was still alive , and the blade gave a high - pitched ringing noise . While [Astyages]838-astyages stood there amazed , the same power transformed [him]838-astyages , and [he]838-astyages remained there with a wondering look on [his]838-astyages marble face . It would take a long time to tell the names of [the middle ranks of [men]5788-men]6645-the middle ranks of men : [two hundred bodies]6647-two hundred bodies survived the fight , [two hundred bodies]6647-two hundred bodies were turned to stone , at sight of [the Gorgon]778-the gorgon ’s head . Now , at last , [Phineus]791-phineus regrets the unjust fight , but what can [he]791-phineus do ? [He]791-phineus sees [the figures in diverse attitudes]6649-the figures in diverse attitudes , and recognises [the men]2224-the men , and calling on [each]6651-each by name , asks [his]791-phineus help . Disbelieving , [he]791-phineus touches the bodies nearest to [him]791-phineus . [They]6647-two hundred bodies are marble . [He]791-phineus averts [his]791-phineus gaze from [Perseus]776-perseus , and in supplication , [he]791-phineus stretches out [his]791-phineus hands in acknowledgement , [his]791-phineus arms still held out towards [him]791-phineus . ‘[776-perseus] [Perseus]776-perseus ’ , [he]0-i cries , ‘[776-perseus] [you]776-perseus have won ! Take away that monstrous thing of [yours]776-perseus : remove [your]776-perseus head of [the Medusa]2753-the medusa , whoever [she]2753-the medusa may be , that turns [men]5788-men to stone . Take it away , [I]0-i beg [you]776-perseus ! It was not hate , or desire for power , that drove [me]0-i to war . [I]0-i took up arms to win [a bride]2755-a bride ! [Your]776-perseus claim was greater by merit , but [mine]0-i by precedence . [I]0-i do not regret ending it . Give [me]0-i nothing , except [my]0-i life , most resolute of [men]5788-men , the rest is [yours]2757-yours ! ’ So speaking , not daring to look towards [him]776-perseus to whom [he]0-i directed [his]0-i request , [Perseus]776-perseus replied ‘[791-phineus] Have no fear , [most cowardly Phineus]791-phineus , [I]0-i will grant both what [I]0-i can grant , and what is a great gift to the fearful ! [You]776-perseus will not suffer the sword . Rather [I]0-i will cause [you]776-perseus to be an enduring monument through the ages , and [you]776-perseus will always be seen in [[my]0-i father]5857-my father - in - [law ’s palace]2759-law ’s palace , so that [[my]0-i wife]6055-my wife may find solace in the statue of [her]6055-my wife intended . ’ [He]0-i spoke , and carried the head of [[Phorcys]787-phorcys ’s daughter]6652-phorcys ’s daughter to where [Phineus]791-phineus had turned [his]791-phineus frightened face . As [Phineus]791-phineus tried to avert [his]791-phineus gaze , [his]791-phineus neck hardened , and the tears on [his]791-phineus cheeks were turned to stone . Now the frightened face , the suppliant expression , the submissive hands , and the slavish appearance , remained , in marble . [The victorious descendant of [Abas]775-abas]6653-the victorious descendant of abas , with [[his]6653-the victorious descendant of abas bride]6654-his bride , enters [Argos]28-argos , [[his]6653-the victorious descendant of abas ancestral city]6655-his ancestral city , and as [the champion and vindicator of [[his]6653-the victorious descendant of abas grandfather]2444-his grandfather Acrisius , who little deserves it , [he]6653-the victorious descendant of abas attacks [Proetus]839-proetus , who has made [[his]6653-the victorious descendant of abas brother]1593-his brother [a fugitive by force of arms]6659-a fugitive by force of arms , and seized [[his]6653-the victorious descendant of abas stronghold]6660-his stronghold]6656-the champion and vindicator of his grandfather acrisius , who little deserves it , he attacks proetus , who has made his brother a fugitive by force of arms , and seized his stronghold . But neither by force of arms , nor by possession of [the stronghold [he]6653-the victorious descendant of abas had taken in [his]6653-the victorious descendant of abas wickedness]6661-the stronghold he had taken in his wickedness , could [he]6653-the victorious descendant of abas overcome the fierce gaze of the snake - wreathed monster . Still , [you]6662-you , [O Polydectes]840-o polydectes , [king of [tiny Seriphos]6664-tiny seriphos]6663-king of tiny seriphos , softened neither by [the young man]6665-the young man ’s virtue , visible in all [his]6665-the young man efforts , nor by [his]6665-the young man suffering , nursed a harsh and unrelenting hatred , and there was no limit to [your]6662-you baseless anger . [You]6662-you disparaged the praise given [him]6665-the young man , and accused [his]6665-the young man account of the killing of [Medusa]781-medusa of being a lie . ‘[0-i] [I]0-i will give [you]2761-you evidence of its truth . [Friends]6150-friends , protect [your]2761-you eyes ! ’ cried [Perseus]776-perseus , and with the face of [Medusa]781-medusa [he]776-perseus turned the face of [the king]6572-the king to bloodless stone .
