Up to this point [Tritonian Minerva]841-tritonian minerva had given [her]841-tritonian minerva time , freely , in friendship , to [this brother of [hers]841-tritonian minerva]6667-this brother of hers , conceived in a shower of gold , but now , surrounded by vaulted cloud , [she]841-tritonian minerva vanished from [the island of [Seriphos]134-seriphos]6668-the island of seriphos , and leaving [Cythnus]842-cythnus and [Gyarus]843-gyarus behind on [her]841-tritonian minerva right , [she]841-tritonian minerva headed for [Thebes]89-thebes , and [Mount Helicon]135-mount helicon , home of [the virgin Muses]6669-the virgin muses , crossing [the sea]1464-the sea by whichever way seemed quickest . Reaching [it]135-mount helicon , [she]841-tritonian minerva alighted there , and spoke to [the sisters]1967-the sisters , learned in song , saying ‘[6150-friends] Talk of a new fountain has reached [my]0-i ears , that gushed out from under the hard hoof of winged Pegasus , born of [Medusa]781-medusa . That is the reason for [my]0-i journey . [I]0-i wanted to see this wonderful creation . [He]2763-he [himself]2763-he [I]0-i saw born from [[his]2763-he mother]5953-his mother ’s blood . ’ [Urania]844-urania replied ‘[2763-he] Whatever reason brings [you]0-i here , to see [[our]2765-our home]2766-our home , [goddess]2767-goddess , [you]0-i are dear to [our]2765-our hearts . But the tale is true : [Pegasus]845-pegasus is the source of [our]2765-our fountain ’ , and [she]841-tritonian minerva led [her]841-tritonian minerva to [the sacred waters]6672-the sacred waters . [Pallas]793-pallas , having looked in wonder , for a long time , at [this stream]6673-this stream , made by the blow of the horse ’s hoof , gazed around [her]841-tritonian minerva at the groves of ancient trees , [the caves]6674-the caves , and the grass , embroidered with innumerable flowers , and said that [the daughters of [Mnemosyne]846-mnemosyne]6675-the daughters of mnemosyne were equally happy in [[their]6675-the daughters of mnemosyne home]1551-their home and [their]6675-the daughters of mnemosyne pursuits . At which [one of [the sisters]1967-the sisters]6677-one of the sisters answered , ‘[627-tritonia] O , [Tritonia]627-tritonia , who would have been one of [[our]2765-our choir]2768-our choir , if [your]627-tritonia virtues had not formed [you]627-tritonia for greater things , what [you]627-tritonia say is true , and [you]627-tritonia rightly approve [our]2765-our arts and [our]2765-our haunts . [Our]2765-our life is happy , if only it were safe . But ( nothing is sacred to [the wicked]2769-the wicked ) , all things frighten [virgin minds]2770-virgin minds . [Dread Pyreneus]847-dread pyreneus ’s destruction is in front of [my]0-i eyes , and [my]0-i mind has not yet recovered fully . [That fierce man]2771-that fierce man had captured [Daulis]137-daulis and [the Phocian fields]2772-the phocian fields , with [[his]2771-that fierce man Thracian warriors]2773-his thracian warriors , and wrongly held [the kingdom]2774-the kingdom . [We]2765-our were heading for [the shrine on [Parnassus]49-parnassus]2775-the shrine on parnassus . [He]2771-that fierce man saw [us]2765-our going by , and [his]2771-that fierce man face showing apparent reverence for [our]2765-our divinity , [he]2771-that fierce man said ( knowing [us]2765-our ) , “ [Mnemonides]848-mnemonides , wait , do n’t be afraid , [I]0-i beg [you]848-mnemonides , to shelter from the rain and the lowering skies ” ( it was raining ): “ [The gods]1538-the gods have often entered [humbler homes]2777-humbler homes ” . Responding to [his]2771-that fierce man words , and the weather , [we]2765-our gave [the man]5875-the man [our]2765-our assent , and went into [the entrance hall of [the palace]6417-the palace]2779-the entrance hall of the palace . The rain stopped , the north wind overcame the south , and the dark clouds fled from the clearing sky . [We]2765-our wished to go . [Pyreneus]847-dread pyreneus closed the doors , and prepared for violence , and [we]2765-our escaped that only by taking to [our]2765-our wings . [He]847-dread pyreneus stood on [the highest summit]2781-the highest summit , as if [he]847-dread pyreneus would follow [us]2765-our , saying “ Whatever is [your]848-mnemonides way , is also mine ” , and foolishly threw [himself]847-dread pyreneus from the roof of [the main tower]2782-the main tower . [He]847-dread pyreneus fell headlong , breaking [his]847-dread pyreneus skull , hammering the ground in dying , and staining the earth with [his]847-dread pyreneus evil blood . ’ [The Muse]6679-the muse was speaking : wings sounded in the air , and voices in greeting came out of the high branches . [The daughter of [Jupiter]499-jupiter]6680-the daughter of jupiter looked up , and questioned where the sound came from , that was so much like mouths speaking , and thought it human , though it was birdsong . Nine of [them]2783-their , magpies , that imitate everything , had settled in the branches , bemoaning [their]2783-their fate . While [she]6680-the daughter of jupiter wondered , [the other]1689-the other began speaking , [goddess]2767-goddess to [goddess]2767-goddess , ‘[2783-their] Defeated in a contest , [they]2783-their have been added only recently to the flocks of birds . Pierus of [Pella]138-pella , rich in fields , was [[their]2783-their father]5800-their father , and [Paeonian Euippe]849-paeonian euippe was [[their]2783-their mother]1928-their mother . Nine times , while giving birth , [she]1928-their mother called , nine times , to [powerful Lucina]850-lucina . Swollen with pride in [their]2783-their numbers , [this crowd of foolish sisters]2786-this crowd of foolish sisters came here , to [us]2787-us , through [the many cities of [Achaia]139-achaia and [Haemonia]25-haemonia]2788-the many cities of achaia and haemonia , and challenged [us]2787-us to a singing competition , saying “ Stop cheating [the untutored masses]2789-the untutored masses with [your]2790-you empty sweetness . If [you]2790-you have faith in [yourselves]2790-you , contend with [us]2787-us , [[you]2790-you goddesses of [Thespiae]140-thespiae]2791-you goddesses of thespiae . [We]2787-us can not be outdone in voice or art , and [we]2787-us are [[your]2790-you equals]2792-your equals in numbers . If [you]2790-you want , if [you]2790-you are defeated , [you]2790-you can grant [us]2787-us the Heliconian fountains , Hippocrene , of [[Medusa]781-medusa ’s offspring]2793-medusa ’s offspring , and [Boeotian Aganippe]141-boeotian aganippe . Or [we]2787-us will grant [you]2790-you [[the Emathian]142-the emathian plains as far as [snow - covered Paeonia]143-snow - covered paeonia]2794-the emathian plains as far as snow - covered paeonia ! Let [the nymphs]5945-the nymphs decide the outcome . ” It was shameful to compete with [them]5945-the nymphs , but it seemed more shameful to concede . [The nymphs]5945-the nymphs were elected , and swore on [their]5945-the nymphs streams to judge fairly , and sat on platforms of natural rock . Then , without drawing lots , [the one who had first declared the contest]2797-the one who had first declared the contest sang , of the war with [the gods]1538-the gods , granting false honours to [the giants]1534-the giants , and diminishing the actions of [the mighty deities]2800-the mighty deities . How [Typhoeus]678-typhoeus , issued forth from [his]678-typhoeus abode in [the depths of the earth]2801-the depths of the earth , filling the heavenly gods with fear , and how [they]5945-the nymphs all turned [their]5945-the nymphs backs in flight , until [Egypt]144-egypt received [them]5945-the nymphs , and [the Nile]551-nile with its seven mouths . [She]2802-she told how earth - born [Typhoeus]678-typhoeus came [there]1878-there as well , and [the gods]1538-the gods concealed [themselves]1538-the gods in disguised forms . “ [Jupiter]499-jupiter ” [she]2802-she said , “ turned [himself]499-jupiter into a ram , the head of the flock , and even now [Libyan Ammon]499-jupiter is shown with curving horns . [Delian Apollo]851-delian apollo hid as a crow , Bacchus , [[Semele]677-semele ’s child]2805-semele ’s child , as a goat , [Diana]527-diana , [the sister of [Phoebus]519-phoebus]2806-the sister of phoebus , a cat , [Saturnian Juno]513-juno a white cow , [Venus]523-venus a fish , and [Cyllenian Mercury]550-cyllenian mercury the winged ibis . ” ‘ This much [she]2802-she played on [her]2802-she lute , with singing voice . Then called on [us]6684-us , - but perhaps [you]793-pallas are not at leisure , or free to listen to a repetition of [our]6684-us music ? ’[6679-the muse] ‘ Do not stop ’[793-pallas] said [Pallas]793-pallas , ‘ but sing [your]793-pallas song again as [you]793-pallas arranged it ! ’[2802-she] and [she]2802-she sat amongst the light shadows of [the grove]1996-the grove . [The Muse]6679-the muse renewed [her]6679-the muse tale ‘ [We]6684-us gave [[our]6684-us best singer]6685-our best singer to the contest . [Calliope]852-calliope , who rose , with [her]852-calliope loose hair bound with ivy , tried out the plaintive strings with [her]852-calliope fingers , then accompanied the wandering notes with this song . “ [Ceres]689-ceres first turned the soil with curving plough , first ripened the crops and produce of [the earth]1463-the earth , first gave [us]6684-us laws : all things are [Ceres]689-ceres ’s gift . [My]6679-the muse song is of [her]689-ceres . If only [I]6679-the muse could create a song in any way worthy of [the goddess]5864-the goddess ! [This goddess]6688-this goddess is truly a worthy subject for [my]6679-the muse song . [Trinacris]145-trinacris , [the vast isle of [Sicily]146-sicily]6689-the vast isle of sicily , had been heaped over the giant ’s limbs , and with its great mass oppressed buried [Typhoeus]678-typhoeus , [he]678-typhoeus who had dared to aspire to a place in [heaven]1501-heaven . [He]678-typhoeus struggles it ’s true and often tries to rise , but [his]678-typhoeus right hand is held by [the promontory of [Ausonian Pelorus]147-ausonian pelorus]6691-the promontory of ausonian pelorus , and [his]678-typhoeus left hand by [you]6692-you , [Pachynus]853-pachynus . Often , [a wrestler]6693-a wrestler , [he]6693-a wrestler throws back the weight of earth , and tries to roll [the high mountains]6694-the high mountains and the cities from [his]6693-a wrestler body , and then the ground trembles , and even [the lord of [the silent kingdom]6696-the silent kingdom]6695-the lord of the silent kingdom is afraid lest [he]6695-the lord of the silent kingdom be exposed , and the soil split open in wide fissures , and the light admitted to scare the anxious dead . Fearing this disaster , [the king of the dark]6697-the king of the dark had left [[his]6697-the king of the dark shadowy realm]6698-his shadowy realm , and , drawn in [his]6697-the king of the dark chariot by black horses , carefully circled [the foundations of [the Sicilian land]6700-the sicilian land]6699-the foundations of the sicilian land . When [he]6697-the king of the dark had checked and was satisfied that nothing was collapsing , [he]6697-the king of the dark relinquished [his]6697-the king of the dark fears . Then [Venus]523-venus , at [Eryx]836-eryx , saw [him]6697-the king of the dark moving , as [she]523-venus sat on [the hillside]6701-the hillside , and embraced [[her]523-venus winged son]6702-her winged son , [Cupid]522-cupid , and said ‘[6679-the muse] [[My]0-i child]6113-my child , [my]0-i hands and weapons , [my]0-i power , seize those arrows , that overcome all , and devise a path for [your]6113-my child swift arrows , to the heart of [that god to whom [the final share of [the triple kingdom]2812-the triple kingdom fell]2811-the final share of the triple kingdom fell]2810-that god to whom the final share of the triple kingdom fell . [We]2822-we are talking of [a third part of [the world]1448-the world]2823-a third part of the world . And yet , as is evident to [me]0-i , [I]0-i am scorned in [heaven]1501-heaven , and Love ’s power diminishes with [mine]0-i . And [[Ceres]689-ceres ’s daughter]2827-ceres ’s daughter too , [Proserpine]857-proserpine , will be [a virgin]5906-a virgin if [we]2822-we allow it , since [she]857-proserpine hopes to be like [them]2829-them . Then [he]6431-her uncle bent the pliant tips against [his]6431-her uncle knee , and with [his]6431-her uncle barbed arrow struck [Dis]758-dis in the heart . ” “ Not far from [the walls of [Enna]148-enna]6704-the walls of enna , there is [a deep pool]6705-a deep pool . [Pergus]149-pergus is [its]6705-a deep pool name . [Caÿster]591-caÿster does not hear more songs than rise from the swans on its gliding waves . A wood encircles [the waters]1626-the waters , surrounds them on every side , and its leaves act as a veil , dispelling [Phoebus]519-phoebus ’s shafts . The branches give it coolness , and the moist soil , Tyrian purple flowers : there , it is everlasting Spring . While [Proserpine]857-proserpine was playing in this glade , and gathering violets or radiant lilies , while with girlish fondness [she]857-proserpine filled the folds of [her]857-proserpine gown , and [her]857-proserpine basket , trying to outdo [[her]857-proserpine companions]6707-her companions in [her]857-proserpine picking , [Dis]758-dis , almost in a moment , saw [her]857-proserpine , prized [her]857-proserpine , took [her]857-proserpine : so swift as this , is love . [The frightened goddess]6708-the frightened goddess cries out to [[her]6708-the frightened goddess mother]5866-her mother , to [[her]6708-the frightened goddess friends]6710-her friends , most of all to [[her]6708-the frightened goddess mother]5866-her mother , with piteous mouth . [The ravisher]6712-the ravisher whipped up [[his]6712-the ravisher chariot]6713-his chariot , and urged on the horses , calling [them]6714-them by name , shaking out the shadowy , dark - dyed , reins , over [their]6714-them necks and manes , through [deep pools]6715-deep pools , [they]6714-them say , and the sulphurous reeking swamps of [the Palici]150-the palici , vented from [a crevice of [the earth]1463-the earth]6716-a crevice of the earth , to [Syracuse]151-syracuse where [the Bacchiadae]858-the bacchiadae , [a people born of [Corinth]63-corinth]6718-a people born of corinth between [two seas]6719-two seas , laid out [[their]858-the bacchiadae city]6720-their city between [unequal harbours]6721-unequal harbours . Between [Cyane]859-cyane and [Pisaean Arethusa]153-pisaean arethusa , there is [a bay enclosed by narrow arms]6722-a bay enclosed by narrow arms . [She]859-cyane showed [herself]859-cyane from [the pool]6331-the pool as far as [her]859-cyane waist , and recognising [the goddess]5864-the goddess , cried out to [Dis]758-dis , ‘[6113-my child] No ’ , and ‘[6113-my child] Go no further ! ’ ‘[2833-you] [You]2833-you can not be [[Ceres]689-ceres ’s son]2834-ceres ’s son against [her]689-ceres will : [the girl]1792-the girl should have been asked , and not abused . If it is right for [me]0-i to compare small things with great , [Anapis]860-anapis prized [me]0-i and [I]0-i wedded [him]2834-ceres ’s son , but [I]0-i was persuaded by talk and not by terror . ’ Speaking , [she]859-cyane stretched [her]859-cyane arms out at [her]859-cyane sides , obstructing [him]2834-ceres ’s son . [The son of [Saturn]500-saturn]6727-the son of saturn could scarcely contain [his]6727-the son of saturn wrath , and urging on the dread horses , [he]6727-the son of saturn turned [his]6727-the son of saturn royal sceptre with powerful arm , and plunged it through the bottom of [the pool]6331-the pool . [The earth]1463-the earth , pierced , made a road to [Tartarus]7-tartarus , and swallowed [the headlong chariot]6730-the headlong chariot , into the midst of [the abyss]6731-the abyss . ” “ [Cyane]859-cyane , mourning the rape of [the goddess]5864-the goddess , and the contempt for the sanctities of [her]859-cyane fountain , nursed an inconsolable grief in [her]859-cyane silent heart , and pined away wholly with sorrow . [She]859-cyane melted into those waters whose [great goddess [she]859-cyane had previously been]6733-great goddess she had previously been . [You]6734-you might see [her]859-cyane limbs becoming softened , [her]859-cyane bones seeming pliant , [her]859-cyane nails losing their hardness . First of all the slenderest parts dissolve : [her]859-cyane dusky hair , [her]859-cyane fingers and toes , [her]859-cyane feet and ankles ( since it is no great transformation from fragile limbs to cool waters ) . Next [her]859-cyane breast and back , shoulders and flanks slip away , vanishing into tenuous streams . At last the water runs in [her]859-cyane ruined veins , and nothing remains that [you]6734-you could touch . Meanwhile [the mother]2342-the mother , fearing , searches in vain for [the maid]6736-the maid , through all [the earth]1463-the earth and [sea]1450-sea . Neither the coming of dewy - haired [Aurora]569-aurora , nor [Hesperus]41-hesperus , finds [her]859-cyane resting . Lighting pine torches with both hands at [Etna]855-etna ’s fires , [she]2342-the mother wanders , unquiet , through the bitter darkness , and when the kindly light has dimmed the stars , [she]2342-the mother still seeks [[her]2342-the mother child]6739-her child , from the rising of the sun till the setting of the sun . [She]2342-the mother found [herself]2342-the mother thirsty and weary from [her]2342-the mother efforts , and had not moistened [her]2342-the mother lips at any of the springs , when by chance [she]2342-the mother saw [a hut with a roof of straw]6740-a hut with a roof of straw , and [she]2342-the mother knocked on [its]6740-a hut with a roof of straw humble door . At that sound , [an old woman]2330-an old woman emerged , and saw [the goddess]5864-the goddess , and , when [she]2330-an old woman asked for water , gave [her]2342-the mother something sweet made with malted barley . While [she]2342-the mother drank what [she]2342-the mother had been given a rash , [foul - mouthed boy]6743-foul - mouthed boy stood watching , and taunted [her]2342-the mother , and called [her]2342-the mother greedy . [The goddess]5864-the goddess was offended , and threw the liquid [she]5864-the goddess had not yet drunk , mixed with the grains of barley , in [his]6743-foul - mouthed boy face . [His]6743-foul - mouthed boy skin , absorbing it , became spotted , and where [he]6743-foul - mouthed boy had once had arms , [he]6743-foul - mouthed boy now had legs . A tail was added to [his]6743-foul - mouthed boy altered limbs , and [he]6743-foul - mouthed boy shrank to a little shape , so that [he]6743-foul - mouthed boy has no great power to harm . [He]6743-foul - mouthed boy is like a lesser lizard , a newt , of tiny size . [The old woman]6745-the old woman wondered and wept , and , trying to touch the creature , [it]6745-the old woman ran from [her]6745-the old woman and searched out [a place to hide]6746-a place to hide . [It]6745-the old woman has a name fitting for [its]6745-the old woman offence , stellio , its body starred with various spots . It would take too long to tell through what lands and [seas]6747-seas [the goddess]5864-the goddess wandered . Searching [the whole earth]1895-the whole earth , [she]5864-the goddess failed to find [[her]5864-the goddess daughter]6750-her daughter : [she]5864-the goddess returned to [Sicily]146-sicily , and while crossing [it]146-sicily from end to end , [she]5864-the goddess came to [Cyane]859-cyane , who if [she]5864-the goddess had not been changed would have told all . But though [she]5864-the goddess wished to , [she]5864-the goddess had neither mouth nor tongue , nor anything with which to speak . Still [she]5864-the goddess revealed clear evidence , known to [the mother]2342-the mother , and showed [Persephone]862-persephone ’s ribbon , fallen , by chance , into [the sacred pool]6752-the sacred pool . As soon as [she]5864-the goddess recognised it , [the goddess]5864-the goddess tore [her]5864-the goddess dishevelled hair , and beat [her]5864-the goddess breast again and again with [her]5864-the goddess hands , as if [she]5864-the goddess at last comprehended the rape . [She]5864-the goddess did not know yet where [Persephone]862-persephone was , but condemned all [the lands]1497-the lands , and called [them]1497-the lands thankless and unworthy of [her]5864-the goddess gift of corn , [Sicily]146-sicily , [that [Trinacria]154-trinacria , above all , where [she]5864-the goddess had discovered the traces of [her]5864-the goddess loss]6755-that trinacria , above all , where she had discovered the traces of her loss . So , in [that place]6756-that place , with cruel hands , [she]5864-the goddess broke the ploughs that turned up the soil , and , in [her]5864-the goddess anger , dealt destruction to [farmers]5884-farmers , and the cattle in [[their]5884-farmers fields]6758-their fields , alike , and ordered [the ever - faithful land]6759-the ever - faithful land to fail , and spoiled the sowing . The fertility of [that country]6099-that country , acclaimed throughout [the world]1448-the world , was spoken of as a fiction : the crops died as young shoots , destroyed by too much sun , and then by too much rain . Wind and weather harmed [them]5884-farmers , and hungry birds gathered the scattered seed . Thistles and darnel and stubborn grasses ruined the wheat harvest . ” “ Then [Arethusa]863-arethusa , once of Elis , whom [Alpheus]589-alpheus loved , lifted [her]5864-the goddess head from [her]5864-the goddess pool , and brushed the wet hair from [her]5864-the goddess forehead , saying ‘[0-i] [O great goddess of the crops]2836-o great goddess of the crops , [mother of that virgin]2837-mother of that virgin sought through [all the earth]2838-all the earth , end [your]2839-your fruitless efforts , and do not anger [yourself]2839-your so deeply against [the faithful land]2840-the faithful land . [The land]1465-the land does not deserve it : [it]1465-the land opened to the rape against its will . A fitting time will come for [me]0-i to tell [you]2852-you , how [I]0-i moved from [[my]0-i country]2452-my country , and came to [Ortygia]156-ortygia , over [such a great expanse of sea]2854-such a great expanse of sea , when [you]2852-you are free of care , and of happier countenance . [The fissured earth]2855-the fissured earth showed [me]0-i a way , and slipping below [the deepest caverns]2856-the deepest caverns , here , [I]0-i lifted up [my]0-i head , and saw the unfamiliar stars . So , while [I]0-i glided underground down there , among [Stygian streams]2857-stygian streams , with these very eyes , [I]0-i saw [[your]2852-you Proserpine]2858-your proserpine . [She]2858-your proserpine was sad indeed , but , though [her]2858-your proserpine face was fearful still , [she]2858-your proserpine was nevertheless [a queen]2859-a queen , [the greatest one among the world of shadows]2860-the greatest one among the world of shadows , [the powerful consort]2861-the powerful consort , nevertheless , of [the king of hell]2862-the king of hell ! ’ [The mother]2342-the mother was stunned to hear these words , as if petrified , and was , for a long time , like [someone thunderstruck , until the blow of deep amazement]6763-someone thunderstruck , until the blow of deep amazement became deep indignation . [She]2858-your proserpine rose , in [her]2858-your proserpine chariot , to [the realms of heaven]6764-the realms of heaven . See , the daughter [I]0-i have searched for so long , has been found , if [you]499-jupiter call it finding to lose [her]2598-the daughter more surely , if [you]499-jupiter call it finding merely to know where [she]2598-the daughter is . [I]0-i can bear the fact that [she]2598-the daughter has been raped , if [he]0-i will only return [her]2598-the daughter ! [A spoiler]2866-a spoiler is not worthy to be [the husband of [[your]499-jupiter daughter]6285-your daughter , even if [she]2598-the daughter is no longer [[my]0-i daughter]5934-my daughter]2867-the husband of your daughter , even if she is no longer my daughter . ’ [Jupiter]499-jupiter replied ‘[2870-us] [[Our]2870-us child]2871-our child is a pledge and a charge , between [us]2870-us , [you]499-jupiter and [I.]0-i But if only [we]2870-us are willing to give things [their]2872-their right names , the thing is not an insult in itself : the truth is it is love . [He]0-i would not be [a shameful son - in - law]2873-a shameful son - in - law for [us]2870-us , if only [you]499-jupiter would wish it , [goddess]2767-goddess . How great a thing it is to be [[Jupiter]499-jupiter ’s brother]2875-jupiter ’s brother , even if all the rest is lacking ! Why , what if there is nothing lacking at all , except what [he]0-i yielded to [me]0-i by lot ? But if [you]499-jupiter have such a great desire to separate [them]2876-them , [Proserpine]857-proserpine shall return to [heaven]1501-heaven , but on only one condition , that no food has touched [her]857-proserpine lips , since that is the law , decreed by [the Fates]2293-the fates . ’ ” “ [He]499-jupiter spoke , and [Ceres]689-ceres felt sure of regaining [[her]689-ceres daughter]6750-her daughter . But [the Fates]619-the fates would not allow it , for [the girl]1792-the girl had broken [her]1792-the girl fast , and wandering , innocently , in [a well - tended garden]6767-a well - tended garden , [she]1792-the girl had pulled down a reddish - purple pomegranate fruit , hanging from a tree , and , taking seven seeds from its yellow rind , squeezed them in [her]1792-the girl mouth . [Ascalaphus]865-ascalaphus was [the only one to see it]6768-the only one to see it , whom , it is said , [Orphne]866-orphne bore , to [her]857-proserpine Acheron , in [the dark woods]6769-the dark woods , [she]857-proserpine not the least known of [the nymphs of [Avernus]157-avernus]6770-the nymphs of avernus . [He]499-jupiter saw , and by [his]499-jupiter cruel disclosure , prevented [Proserpine]857-proserpine ’s return . Then [the queen of [Erebus]158-erebus]6771-the queen of erebus grieved , and changed [the informant]6772-the informant into [a bird of ill omen]6773-a bird of ill omen : [she]6771-the queen of erebus sprinkled [his]6772-the informant head with water from the Phlegethon , and changed [him]6772-the informant to a beak , plumage , and a pair of huge eyes . Losing [his]6772-the informant own form [he]6772-the informant is covered by [his]6772-the informant tawny wings , and looks like a head , and long , curving claws . [He]6772-the informant scarcely stirs the feathers growing on [his]6772-the informant idle wings . [He]6772-the informant has become [an odious bird]6774-an odious bird , [a messenger of future disaster]6775-a messenger of future disaster , the screech owl , torpid by day , a fearful omen to [mortal creatures]6776-mortal creatures . [He]6772-the informant indeed can be seen to have deserved [his]6772-the informant punishment , because of [his]6772-the informant disclosure and [his]6772-the informant words . But why have [you]6777-you , [Sirens]867-sirens , skilled in song , [daughters of Acheloüs]6778-daughters of acheloüs , the feathers and claws of birds , while still bearing human faces ? Is it because [you]6777-you were numbered among [the companions]6779-the companions , when [Proserpine]857-proserpine gathered the flowers of Spring ? When [you]6777-you had searched in vain for [her]857-proserpine on [land]1458-land , [you]6777-you wanted , then , to cross the waves on beating wings , so that [the waters]1626-the waters would also know of [your]6777-you trouble . [The gods]1538-the gods were willing , and suddenly [you]6777-you saw [your]6777-you limbs covered with golden plumage . But , so that [your]6777-you song , born , sweetly , in [our]6783-our ears , and [your]6777-you rich vocal gift , might not be lost with [your]6777-you tongues , [each virgin face]6784-each virgin face and human voice remained . Now [Jupiter]499-jupiter , intervening , between [[his]499-jupiter brother]1593-his brother and [grieving sister]6786-grieving sister , divides the turning year , equally . And now [the goddess]5864-the goddess , [Persephone]862-persephone , shared divinity of [the two kingdoms]6788-the two kingdoms , spends so many months with [[her]5864-the goddess mother]5866-her mother , so many months with [[her]5864-the goddess husband]5872-her husband . The aspect of [her]5864-the goddess face and mind alters in a moment . Now [the goddess]5864-the goddess ’s looks are glad that even [Dis]758-dis could see were sad , a moment ago . Just as the sun , hidden , before , by clouds of rain , wins through and leaves the clouds . ” “ [Ceres]689-ceres , kindly now , happy in the return of [[her]689-ceres daughter]6750-her daughter , asks what the cause of [your]6777-you flight was , [Arethusa]863-arethusa , and why [you]6777-you are now a sacred fountain . The waters fall silent while [[their]6793-their goddess]6794-their goddess lifts [her]5864-the goddess head from the deep pool , and wringing the water from [her]5864-the goddess sea - green tresses , [she]5864-the goddess tells of the former love of [that river of [Elis]83-elis]6795-that river of elis . ‘[0-i] [I]0-i was [one of the nymphs , that lived in [Achaia]139-achaia]2879-one of the nymphs , that lived in achaia , ’ [she]5864-the goddess said ‘[2880-them] none of [them]2880-them keener to travel [the woodland]2881-the woodland , none of [them]2880-them keener to set out the nets . But , though [I]0-i never sought fame for [my]0-i beauty , though [I]0-i was wiry , [my]0-i name was , [the beautiful]2882-the beautiful . Nor did [my]0-i looks , praised too often , give [me]0-i delight . [I]0-i blushed like a simpleton at the gifts of [my]0-i body , those things that [other girls]2883-other girls used to rejoice in . [I]0-i thought it was sinful to please . [Tired]868-tired ( [I]0-i remember ) , [I]0-i was returning , from [the Stymphalian woods]2884-the stymphalian woods . It was hot , and [my]0-i efforts had doubled the heat . [I]0-i came to [a river]2448-a river , without a ripple , hurrying on without a murmur , clear to its bed , in whose depths [you]2886-you could count every pebble : [you]2886-you would scarce think it moving . Silvery willows and poplars , fed by the waters , gave a natural shade to [the sloping banks]2887-the sloping banks . Approaching [I]0-i dipped [my]0-i toes in , then as far as [my]0-i knees , and not content with that [I]0-i undressed , and draped [my]0-i light clothes on a hanging willow , and plunged , naked , into [the stream]1788-the stream . While [I]0-i gathered the water to [me]0-i and splashed , gliding around in a thousand ways , and stretching out [my]0-i arms to shake the water from them , [I]0-i thought [I]0-i heard a murmur under the surface , and , in fear , [I]0-i leapt for [the nearest bank of the flood]2889-the nearest bank of the flood . ‘ What are [you]0-i rushing for , [Arethusa]863-arethusa ? ’[589-alpheus] [Alpheus]589-alpheus called from the waves . ‘ Why are [you]0-i rushing ? ’[2890-he] [He]2890-he called again to [me]0-i , in a strident voice . Just as [I]0-i was , [I]0-i fled , without [my]0-i clothes ( [I]0-i had left [my]0-i clothes on [the other bank]2891-the other bank ): so much the more fiercely [he]2890-he pursued and burned , and being naked , [I]0-i seemed readier for [him]2890-he . So [I]0-i ran , and so [he]2890-he wildly followed , as doves fly from a hawk on flickering wings , as a hawk is used to chasing frightened doves . Even beyond [Orchemenus]160-orchemenus , [I]0-i still ran , by [Psophis]869-psophis , and [Cyllene]14-cyllene , and the ridges of [Maenalus]602-maenalus , by [chill Erymanthus]583-arcadian erymanthus , [Elis]83-elis , [he]2890-he no quicker than [I.]0-i But [I]0-i could not stay the course , being unequal in strength : [he]2890-he was fitted for unremitting effort . Still , across [the plains]1479-the plains , over [tree - covered mountains]2893-tree - covered mountains , through [rocks and crags]2894-rocks and crags , and where there was no path , [I]0-i ran . The sun was at [my]0-i back . [I]0-i saw a long shadow stretching before [my]0-i feet , unless it was [my]0-i fear that saw it , but certainly [I]0-i feared the sound of feet , and the deep breaths from [his]2890-he mouth stirred the ribbons in [my]0-i hair . Weary with the effort to escape [him]2890-he , [I]0-i cried out ‘ Help [me]0-i : [I]0-i will be taken . [Diana]527-diana , help the one who bore [your]527-diana weapons for [you]527-diana , whom [you]527-diana often gave [your]527-diana bow to carry , and [your]527-diana quiver with all its arrows ! ’[0-i] [The goddess]5864-the goddess was moved , and raising an impenetrable cloud , threw it over [me]0-i . [The river - god]2896-the river - god circled the concealing fog , and in ignorance searched about the hollow mist . Twice , without understanding , [he]2896-the river - god rounded the place , where [the goddess]5864-the goddess had concealed [me]0-i , and twice called out ‘ [Arethusa]863-arethusa , O Arethusa ! ’[2896-the river - god] What wretched feelings were [mine]0-i , then ? Perhaps those [the lamb]2898-the lamb has when it hears the wolves , howling round the high fold , or the hare , that , hidden in the briars , sees the dogs hostile muzzles , and does not dare to make a movement of its body ? [He]2896-the river - god did not go far : [he]2896-the river - god could see no signs of [my]0-i tracks further on : [he]2896-the river - god observed [the cloud]2899-the cloud and [the place]1552-the place . Cold sweat poured down [my]0-i imprisoned limbs , and dark drops trickled from [my]0-i whole body . Wherever [I]0-i moved [my]0-i foot , a pool gathered , and moisture dripped from [my]0-i hair , and faster than [I]0-i can now tell the tale [I]0-i turned to liquid . And indeed [the river - god]2896-the river - god saw [his]2896-the river - god love in the water , and putting off the shape of [a man [he]2896-the river - god had assumed]2902-a man he had assumed , [he]2896-the river - god changed back to [his]2896-the river - god own watery form , and mingled with [mine]0-i . [The Delian goddess]2903-the delian goddess split [the earth]1463-the earth , and plunging down into secret caverns , [I]0-i was brought here to [Ortygia]156-ortygia , dear to [me]0-i , because it has the same name as [[my]0-i goddess]2905-my goddess , the ancient name , for [Delos]897-delos , where [she]2903-the delian goddess was born , and this was [the first place to receive]2906-the first place to receive [me]0-i , into the clear air . ’ ” “ That was as far as [Arethusa]863-arethusa went . [The goddess of all that is fertile]6796-the goddess of all that is fertile , fastened twin dragons to [[her]6796-the goddess of all that is fertile chariot]6797-her chariot , curbing [them]6798-them with the bit , between [their]6798-them teeth , and was carried through the air , between heaven and [earth]1449-earth . Reaching [Eleusis]161-eleusis , by [Athens]85-athens , [city of Tritonian Minerva]6800-city of tritonian minerva , [she]6796-the goddess of all that is fertile gave [[her]6796-the goddess of all that is fertile swift chariot]6801-her swift chariot to [Triptolemus]871-triptolemus , and ordered [him]871-triptolemus to scatter the seeds [she]6796-the goddess of all that is fertile gave , partly in [untilled soil]6802-untilled soil , partly in [fields reclaimed]6803-fields reclaimed , after lying for a long time fallow . Now [the youth]1842-the youth was carried high over [Europe]162-europe and [Asia]163-asia . [He]1842-the youth turned [his]1842-the youth face towards [Scythia]5-scythia where , [Lyncus]872-lyncus was [king]5915-king . [He]1842-the youth stood before [[the king]6572-the king ’s household gods]6807-the king ’s household gods . [He]1842-the youth was asked how [he]1842-the youth had come [there]1878-there , and the reason for [his]1842-the youth journey , [his]1842-the youth name and [[his]1842-the youth country]6809-his country . [He]0-i said ‘[0-i] [Athens]85-athens , [the famous city]2907-the famous city , is [[my]0-i home]6064-my home , [Triptolemus]871-triptolemus , [my]0-i name . [I]0-i came not by [ship]2909-ship , on [the sea]1464-the sea , or by foot , over [land]1458-land . The clear air parted for [me]0-i . [I]0-i bring [you]2912-you the gifts of [Ceres]689-ceres . If [you]2912-you scatter them through [the wide fields]2106-the wide fields , [they]2914-they will give [you]2912-you back fruitful harvests , and ripening crops . ’ [The barbarian]6810-the barbarian was jealous . So that [he]6810-the barbarian might be [the author , of so great a gift]6811-the author , of so great a gift , [he]6810-the barbarian received [him]6810-the barbarian like [a guest]6812-a guest , but attacked [Triptolemus]871-triptolemus , with a sword , while [he]871-triptolemus was in deep sleep . As [he]6810-the barbarian attempted to pierce [the youth]1842-the youth ’s breast , [Ceres]689-ceres turned [the king]6572-the king into a lynx , then ordered [the youth]1842-the youth , of [Athens]85-athens , [the city of Mopsopus]6816-the city of mopsopus , to drive [the sacred team]6817-the sacred team back through the air . ” ‘[2914-they] So ended the singing , from [the greatest of [[our]2916-us singers]2917-our singers]2915-the greatest of our singers , and [the nymphs , with one harmonious voice]2918-the nymphs , with one harmonious voice , said that [the goddesses of [Helicon]46-helicon]2919-the goddesses of helicon had taken the honours . When [the losers]2920-the losers hurled abuse at [us]2916-us , [I]0-i said “ Seeing that [you]2921-you deserve punishment enough for [your]2921-you challenge , and now add profanities to [your]2921-you offence , and since [our]2916-us patience is not unlimited , [we]2916-us will move on to sentence [you]2921-you , and follow where anger prompts [us]2916-us . ” [The Emathides]873-the emathides laughed and ridiculed these threatening words , but as [they]873-the emathides tried to speak , and , attack [us]2916-us with insolent hands , making a great clamour , [they]873-the emathides saw feathers spring from under [their]873-the emathides nails , and plumage cover [their]873-the emathides arms . [Each one]2489-each one saw [the next one]2923-the next one ’s mouth harden to a solid beak , and a new bird enter the trees . When [they]873-the emathides wanted to beat [their]873-the emathides breasts in sorrow , [they]873-the emathides hung in the air , lifted by the movement of [their]873-the emathides arms , magpies now , [the slanderers of [the woods]1690-the woods]2924-the slanderers of the woods . Even now , as birds , [their]873-the emathides former eloquence remains , [their]873-the emathides raucous garrulity , and [their]873-the emathides monstrous capacity for chatter . ’ [Tritonian Minerva]841-tritonian minerva had listened to every word , and approved of [the Aonian Muses]6818-the aonian muses ’s song , and [their]6818-the aonian muses justified indignation . Then [she]841-tritonian minerva said , to [herself]841-tritonian minerva , ‘[2924-the slanderers of the woods] To give praise is not enough , let [me]0-i be praised as well , and not allow [my]0-i divine powers to be scorned without inflicting punishment . ’ [Her]841-tritonian minerva thoughts turned to [Arachne]874-arachne , of [Maeonia]590-maeonia , whom [she]841-tritonian minerva had heard would not give [her]841-tritonian minerva due credit , in the art of spinning . [The girl]1792-the girl was not known for [her]1792-the girl place of birth , or [family]6820-family , but for [her]1792-the girl skill . [[Her]1792-the girl father]1694-her father , [Idmon of Colophon]875-idmon of colophon , dyed the absorbent wool purple , with Phocaean murex . [[Her]1792-the girl mother]5866-her mother was dead . [She]1792-the girl too had been of humble birth , and [the father]1852-the father the same . Nevertheless , though [she]1792-the girl lived in [a modest home]6824-a modest home , in little Hypaepa , [Arachne]874-arachne had gained a name for artistry , throughout [the cities of [Lydia]165-lydia]6825-the cities of lydia . Often [the nymphs of [Mount Tmolus]1156-mount tmolus]6826-the nymphs of mount tmolus deserted [[their]6826-the nymphs of mount tmolus vine - covered slopes]6827-their vine - covered slopes , and [the nymphs of [the River Pactolus]167-the river pactolus]6828-the nymphs of the river pactolus deserted [their]6828-the nymphs of the river pactolus waves , to examine [her]1792-the girl wonderful workmanship . It was not only a joy to see the finished cloths , but also to watch them made : so much beauty added to art . Whether at first [she]1792-the girl was winding the rough yarn into a new ball , or working the stuff with [her]1792-the girl fingers , teasing out the clouds of wool , repeatedly , drawing them into long equal threads , twirling the slender spindle with practised thumb , or embroidering with [her]1792-the girl needle , [you]6829-you could see [she]1792-the girl was taught by [Pallas]793-pallas . Yet [she]1792-the girl denied it , and took offence at the idea of such [a teacher]6830-a teacher . ‘[2924-the slanderers of the woods] Contend with [me]0-i ’ [she]1792-the girl said ‘[2924-the slanderers of the woods] [I]0-i will not disagree at all if [I]0-i am beaten ’ . [Pallas Minerva]610-pallas took the shape of [an old woman]2330-an old woman : adding grey hair to [her]2330-an old woman temples , and ageing [her]2330-an old woman limbs , which [she]2330-an old woman supported with a stick . Then [she]793-pallas spoke , to [the girl]1792-the girl , as follows . ‘[2924-the slanderers of the woods] Not everything old age has is to be shunned : knowledge comes with advancing years . Do not reject [my]0-i advice : seek great fame amongst [mortals]2926-mortals for [your]2927-you skill in weaving , but give way to [the goddess]5864-the goddess , and ask [her]5864-the goddess forgiveness , [rash girl]5913-rash girl , with a humble voice : [she]5864-the goddess will forgive if [you]2927-you will ask . ’ [Arachne]874-arachne looked fiercely at [her]793-pallas and left the work [she]874-arachne was on : scarcely restraining [her]874-arachne hands , and with dark anger in [her]874-arachne face . [Pallas]610-pallas , disguised it is true , received this answer . ‘[5864-the goddess] [Weak - minded and worn out by tedious old age]2930-weak - minded and worn out by tedious old age , [you]2927-you come here , and having lived too long destroys [you]2927-you . Let [[your]2927-you daughter - in - law]2931-your daughter - in - law if [you]2927-you have one , let [[your]2927-you daughter]6285-your daughter if [you]2927-you have one , listen to [your]2927-you voice . [I]0-i have wisdom enough of [my]0-i own . [You]2927-you think [your]0-i advice is never heeded : that is [my]0-i feeling too . Why does [she]6285-your daughter not come [herself]6285-your daughter ? Why does [she]6285-your daughter shirk this contest ? ’ [The goddess]5864-the goddess said ‘[6285-your daughter] [She]6285-your daughter is here ! ’ and , relinquishing [the old woman]6745-the old woman ’s form , revealed [Pallas Minerva]610-pallas . [The nymphs]5945-the nymphs and [the Phrygian women]6836-the phrygian women worshipped [[her]610-pallas godhead]6837-her godhead : [the girl]1792-the girl alone remained unafraid , yet [she]1792-the girl did blush , as the sky is accustomed to redden when [Aurora]569-aurora first stirs , and , after a while , to whiten at the sun from the east . [She]1792-the girl is stubborn in [her]1792-the girl attempt , and rushes on to [her]1792-the girl fate , eager for a worthless prize . Now , [[Jupiter]499-jupiter ’s daughter]2727-jupiter ’s daughter does not refuse , and does not give warning , or delay the contest a moment . Immediately [they]6840-their both position [themselves]6840-their , in separate places , and stretch out the fine threads , for the warp , over twin frames . The frame is fastened to the cross - beam ; the threads of the warp separated with the reed ; the thread of the weft is inserted between , in the pointed shuttles that [their]6840-their fingers have readied ; and , drawn through the warp , the threads of the weft are beaten into place , struck by the comb ’s notched teeth . [They]6840-their each work quickly , and , with [their]6840-their clothes gathered in tight , under [their]6840-their breasts , apply skilful arms , [their]6840-their zeal not making it seem like work . There , shades of purple , dyed in Tyrian bronze vessels , are woven into the cloth , and also lighter colours , shading off gradually . The threads that touch seem the same , but the extremes are distant , as when , often , after a rainstorm , the expanse of the sky , struck by the sunlight , is stained by a rainbow in one vast arch , in which a thousand separate colours shine , but the eye itself still can not see the transitions . There , are inserted lasting threads of gold , and an ancient tale is spun in the web . [Pallas Athene]168-pallas athene depicts [the hill of [Mars]635-mars]6841-the hill of mars , and [the court of [the Aeropagus]6843-the aeropagus]6842-the court of the aeropagus , in [Cecrops ’s [Athens]85-athens]6844-cecrops ’s athens , and the old dispute between [Neptune]514-neptune and [herself]168-pallas athene , as to who had the right to [the city]2547-the city and [its]2547-the city name . There [the twelve gods]6846-the twelve gods sit in great majesty , on [their]6846-the twelve gods high thrones , with [Jupiter]499-jupiter in the middle . [She]168-pallas athene weaves [the gods]1538-the gods with [their]1538-the gods familiar attributes . The image of [Jupiter]499-jupiter is a royal one . There [she]168-pallas athene portrays [the Ocean god]6848-the ocean god , standing and striking the rough stone , with [his]6848-the ocean god long trident , and seawater flowing from the centre of the shattered rock , a token of [his]6848-the ocean god claim to [the city]2547-the city . [She]168-pallas athene gives [herself]168-pallas athene a shield , a sharp pointed spear , and a helmet for [her]168-pallas athene head , while the aegis protects [her]168-pallas athene breast . [She]168-pallas athene shows an olive - tree with pale trunk , thick with fruit , born from the earth at a blow from [her]168-pallas athene spear , the gods marvelling : and Victory crowns the work . Then [she]168-pallas athene adds four scenes of contest in the four corners , each with miniature figures , in their own clear colours , so that [[her]168-pallas athene rival]1752-her rival might learn , from the examples quoted , what prize [she]168-pallas athene might expect , for [her]168-pallas athene outrageous daring . One corner shows [Thracian Mount Rhodope]170-thracian mount rhodope and [Mount Haemus]171-mount haemus , now icy peaks , once [mortal beings who ascribed the names of [the highest gods]6852-the highest gods to [themselves]6851-mortal beings who ascribed the names of the highest gods to themselves]6851-mortal beings who ascribed the names of the highest gods to themselves . A second corner shows the miserable fate of [the queen of the Pygmies]6853-the queen of the pygmies : how [Juno]513-juno , having overcome [her]513-juno in a contest , ordered [her]513-juno to become a crane and make war on [[her]513-juno own people]6854-her own people . Also [she]168-pallas athene pictures [Antigone]876-antigone , whom [Queen Juno]877-juno turned into a bird for having dared to compete with [[Jupiter]499-jupiter ’s great consort]6855-jupiter ’s great consort : neither [[her]168-pallas athene father]1694-her father [Laomedon]878-laomedon , nor [[her]168-pallas athene city Ilium]6857-her city ilium were of any use to [her]168-pallas athene , but taking wing as a white stork [she]168-pallas athene applauds [herself]168-pallas athene with clattering beak . The only corner left shows [Cinyras]879-cinyras , bereaved : and [he]879-cinyras is seen weeping as [he]879-cinyras clasps the stone steps of [the temple]1675-the temple that were once [[his]879-cinyras daughters]6859-his daughters ’[6285-your daughter] limbs . [Minerva]610-pallas surrounded the outer edges with the olive wreaths of peace ( this was the last part ) and so ended [her]610-pallas work with emblems of [her]610-pallas own tree . [The Maeonian girl]2933-the maeonian girl depicts [Europa]632-europa deceived by the form of the bull : [you]2934-you would have thought it a real bull and real waves . [She]2933-the maeonian girl is seen looking back to [the shore]2065-the shore [she]2933-the maeonian girl has left , and calling to [[her]2933-the maeonian girl companions]6707-her companions , displaying fear at the touch of the surging water , and drawing up [her]2933-the maeonian girl shrinking feet . Also [Arachne]874-arachne showed [Asterie]880-asterie , held by the eagle , struggling , and [Leda]881-leda lying beneath the swan ’s wings . [She]2933-the maeonian girl added [Jupiter]499-jupiter who , hidden in the form of [a satyr]2937-a satyr , filled [Antiope]882-antiope , [daughter of [Nycteus with twin offspring]2939-nycteus with twin offspring]2938-daughter of nycteus with twin offspring ; [who , as Amphitryon , was charmed by [you]2934-you , [Alcmena]777-aegina , of [Tiryns]777-aegina ; by [Danaë]777-aegina , as a golden shower ; by [Aegina]777-aegina , daughter of [Asopus]777-aegina]777-aegina , as a flame ; by [Mnemosyne]846-mnemosyne , as [a shepherd]1777-a shepherd ; by [Proserpine]857-proserpine , [[Ceres]689-ceres ’s daughter]2827-ceres ’s daughter , as a spotted snake . [She]2933-the maeonian girl wove [you]2934-you , [Neptune]514-neptune , also , changed to a fierce bull for [Canace]883-canace , [[Aeolus]511-aeolus ’s daughter]2942-aeolus ’s daughter . In [Enipeus]884-enipeus ’s form [you]2934-you begot [the Aloidae]174-the aloidae , and deceived [Theophane]885-theophane as a ram . [The golden - haired , gentlest , mother of [the cornfields]1590-the cornfields]2943-the golden - haired , gentlest , mother of the cornfields , knew [you]2934-you as a horse . [The snake - haired mother of the winged horse]2945-the snake - haired mother of the winged horse , knew [you]2934-you as a winged bird . [Melantho]886-melantho knew [you]2934-you as [a dolphin]2946-a dolphin . [She]2933-the maeonian girl gave all these [their]2947-their own aspects , and the aspects of [the place]1552-the place . Here is [Phoebus]519-phoebus like [a countryman]2949-a countryman , and [she]2933-the maeonian girl shows [him]519-phoebus now with the wings of a hawk , and now in a lion ’s skin , and how as [a shepherd]1777-a shepherd [he]519-phoebus tricked [Isse]887-isse , [[Macareus]888-macareus ’s daughter]2951-macareus ’s daughter . [She]2933-the maeonian girl showed how [Bacchus]682-bacchus ensnared [Erigone]889-erigone with delusive grapes , and how [Saturn]500-saturn as the double of a horse begot [Chiron]617-chiron . The outer edge of the web , surrounded by a narrow border , had flowers interwoven with entangled ivy . [Neither Pallas]610-pallas nor [Envy]626-envy [itself]626-envy could fault that work . [The golden - haired warrior goddess]2952-the golden - haired warrior goddess was grieved by its success , and tore the tapestry , embroidered with [the gods]1538-the gods ’ crimes , and as [she]2952-the golden - haired warrior goddess held [her]2952-the golden - haired warrior goddess shuttle made of boxwood from [Mount Cytorus]175-mount cytorus , [she]2952-the golden - haired warrior goddess struck [Idmonian Arachne]874-arachne , three or four times , on the forehead . [The unfortunate girl]6860-the unfortunate girl could not bear it , and courageously slipped a noose around [her]6860-the unfortunate girl neck : [Pallas]610-pallas , in pity , lifted [her]6860-the unfortunate girl , as [she]6860-the unfortunate girl hung there , and said these words , ‘[2952-the golden - haired warrior goddess] Live on then , and yet hang , [condemned one]2954-condemned one , but , lest [you]2954-condemned one are careless in future , this same condition is declared , in punishment , against [[your]2954-condemned one descendants]2955-your descendants , to [the last generation]2956-the last generation ! ’ Departing after saying this , [she]2952-the golden - haired warrior goddess sprinkled [her]6860-the unfortunate girl with the juice of [Hecate]890-hecate ’s herb , and immediately at the touch of this dark poison , [Arachne]874-arachne ’s hair fell out . With it went [her]874-arachne nose and ears , [her]874-arachne head shrank to the smallest size , and [her]874-arachne whole body became tiny . [Her]874-arachne slender fingers stuck to [her]874-arachne sides as legs , the rest is belly , from which [she]874-arachne still spins a thread , and , as a spider , weaves [her]874-arachne ancient web . All of [Lydia]165-lydia murmurs : the tale goes through [the towns of [Phrygia]176-phrygia]6861-the towns of phrygia , and fills [the whole world]1451-the whole world with talk . [Niobe]892-niobe had known [Arachne]874-arachne . As [a girl]1995-a girl , before [her]892-niobe marriage , [she]892-niobe had lived in [Maeonia]590-maeonia , near [Mount Sipylus]178-mount sipylus . Nevertheless [she]892-niobe was not warned by [[her]892-niobe countrywoman]6864-her countrywoman ’s fate , to give [the gods]1538-the gods precedence , and use more modest words . Many things swelled [her]892-niobe pride , but neither [[her]892-niobe husband]5872-her husband [Amphion]893-amphion ’s marvellous art in music , nor both of [their]6867-their high lineages , nor the might of [[their]6867-their great kingdom of [Thebes]89-thebes]6868-their great kingdom of thebes , pleased [her]892-niobe , though [they]6867-their did please [her]892-niobe , as much as [[her]892-niobe children]5803-her children did . And [Niobe]892-niobe would have been spoken of as [the most fortunate of [mothers]2432-mothers]6870-the most fortunate of mothers , if [she]892-niobe had not seemed so to [herself]892-niobe . Now [Manto]894-manto , [the daughter of Tiresias , prescient of the future , stirred by divine impulse]6872-the daughter of tiresias , prescient of the future , stirred by divine impulse , went through the middle of [the streets]6873-the streets , declaiming . ‘[2957-women of thebes] [Women of [Thebes]89-thebes]2957-women of thebes , [Ismenides]2958-ismenides , go , as [a crowd]2959-a crowd , and wreathe [your]2957-women of thebes hair with laurel , and bring incense with holy prayer to [Latona]895-latona , and [[Latona]895-latona ’s children]2960-latona ’s children , [Diana]527-diana and [Apollo]519-phoebus . [Latona]895-latona commands it through [my]0-i mouth . ’ [They]2957-women of thebes obey : all the Theban women , as commanded , dress [their]2957-women of thebes temples with sweet - bay , and bring incense and words of prayer to the sacred flames . Look , [Niobe]892-niobe comes , followed by a crowded thong , visible , in [her]892-niobe Phrygian robes woven with gold , and as beautiful as anger will let [her]892-niobe be . Turning [her]892-niobe lovely head with the hair falling loose over both [her]892-niobe shoulders , [she]892-niobe pauses , and looks around with pride in [her]892-niobe eyes , from [her]892-niobe full height , saying ‘[895-latona] What madness , to prefer the gods [you]2957-women of thebes are told about to [the ones [you]2957-women of thebes see]2961-the ones you see ? Why is [Latona]895-latona worshipped at the altars , while as yet [[my]0-i godhead]2962-my godhead is without its incense ? [Tantalus]761-tantalus is [[my]0-i father]5857-my father , who is [the only man to eat the food of the gods]2964-the only man to eat the food of the gods . [[My]0-i mother]2965-my mother is one of the seven sisters , [the Pleiades]2966-the pleiades . [Great Atlas]546-atlas , who carries the axis of [the heavens]1940-the heavens on [his]546-atlas shoulders , is [one of [[my]0-i grandfathers]2969-my grandfathers]2968-one of my grandfathers . [Jupiter]499-jupiter is the other , and [I]0-i glory in having [him]499-jupiter as [[my]0-i father - in - law]2970-my father - in - law as well . [The peoples of [Phrygia]176-phrygia]2971-the peoples of phrygia fear [me]0-i . [[Cadmus]634-cadmus ’s royal house]2972-cadmus ’s royal house is under [my]0-i rule : and the walls , built to [[[my]0-i husband]6062-my husband ’s lyre]2974-my husband ’s lyre , and [Thebes ’s people]2975-thebes ’s people , will be ruled by [his]634-cadmus power and [mine]0-i . Whichever part of [the palace]6417-the palace [I]0-i turn [my]0-i eyes on , [I]0-i look at immense wealth . Augment it with [my]0-i beauty , worthy of [a goddess]6068-a goddess , and add to this [[my]0-i seven daughters]2978-my seven daughters , as many [sons]5799-sons , and soon [[my]0-i sons-]2980-my sons- and [[my]0-i daughters - in - law]2981-my daughters - in - law ! Now , ask what the reason is for [my]0-i pride , and then dare to prefer [Latona]895-latona to [me]0-i , that Titaness , [daughter of [Coeus]896-coeus]2982-daughter of coeus , whoever [he]634-cadmus is . [Latona]895-latona , whom [the wide earth]1736-the wide earth once refused even a little piece of ground to give birth on . [Land]1458-land , [sea]1450-sea , and sky were no refuge for [[your]2986-your goddess]2987-your goddess . [She]895-latona was exiled from [the world]1448-the world , until [Delos]897-delos , pitying [the wanderer]2989-the wanderer , gave [her]895-latona a precarious place , saying “ [Friend]5789-friend , [you]5789-friend wander [the earth]1463-the earth , [I]0-i [the sea]1464-the sea . ” There [she]895-latona gave birth to [twins]2993-twins , only a seventh of [[my]0-i offspring]2994-my offspring . [I]0-i am fortunate ( indeed , who can deny it ? ) and [I]0-i will stay fortunate ( and who can doubt that too ? ) . [My]0-i riches make [me]0-i safe . [I]0-i am greater than any whom [Fortune]570-fortune can harm , and though [she]895-latona could take much away , [she]895-latona would leave [me]0-i much more . Surely [my]0-i comforts banish fear . Imagine that [some of this host of [children]2996-children]2995-some of this host of children could be taken from [me]0-i , [I]0-i would still not , bereaved , be reduced to [the two of [[Latona]895-latona ’s family]2998-latona ’s family]2997-the two of latona ’s family . In that state , how far is [she]895-latona from childlessness ? Go [home]2999-home – enough of holy things – and take those laurel wreaths from [your]3000-you hair ! ’ [They]2997-the two of latona ’s family relinquish them , and leave the rite unfinished , except what is [their]2997-the two of latona ’s family right , reverencing [the goddess]5864-the goddess in a secret murmur . [The goddess]5864-the goddess was deeply angered , and on [the summit of [Mount Cynthus]179-mount cynthus]6876-the summit of mount cynthus [she]5864-the goddess spoke to [[her]5864-the goddess twin children]6877-her twin children . ‘[1807-your mother] See , it will be doubted whether [I]0-i , [[your]3000-you mother]1807-your mother , proud to have borne [you]3000-you , and giving way to [no goddess]3002-no goddess , except [Juno]877-juno , am [a goddess]6068-a goddess , and worship will be prevented at [my]0-i altars through all the ages , unless [you]3000-you help [me]0-i , [[my]0-i children]3004-my children . Nor is this [my]0-i only grief . [This daughter of Tantalus]3005-this daughter of tantalus has added insult to injury , and has dared to put [[her]3005-this daughter of tantalus children]5803-her children above [you]3000-you , and has called [me]0-i childless , may that recoil on [her]3005-this daughter of tantalus own head , and has shown [she]3005-this daughter of tantalus has [[her]3005-this daughter of tantalus father]1694-her father ’s tongue for wickedness . ’ [Latona]895-latona would have added [her]895-latona entreaties to what [she]895-latona had related , but [Phoebus]519-phoebus cried ‘[3005-this daughter of tantalus] Enough ! Long complaint delays [her]3005-this daughter of tantalus punishment ! ’ [Phoebe]524-phoebe said the same , and falling swiftly through the air , concealed by clouds , [they]6878-they reached [the house of [Cadmus]634-cadmus]6405-the house of cadmus . There was [a broad , open plain near the walls , flattened by the constant passage of horses]6880-a broad , open plain near the walls , flattened by the constant passage of horses , where many wheels and hard hooves had levelled the turf beneath [them]6878-they . There , [a number of [[Amphion]893-amphion ’s seven sons]6882-amphion ’s seven sons mounted on [their]6881-a number of amphion ’s seven sons mounted on their strong horses strong horses]6881-a number of amphion ’s seven sons mounted on their strong horses , and sitting firmly on [their]6881-a number of amphion ’s seven sons mounted on their strong horses backs , bright with Tyrian purple , guided [them]6881-a number of amphion ’s seven sons mounted on their strong horses using reins heavy with gold . While [Ismenus]898-ismenus , one of these , who had been [the first of [[his]898-ismenus mother]5953-his mother ’s burdens]6883-the first of his mother ’s burdens , was wheeling [his]898-ismenus horse ’s path around in an unerring circle , and hauling at the foaming bit , [he]898-ismenus cried out ‘[0-i] Oh , [I]0-i am wounded ! ’ and revealed an arrow fixed in [his]898-ismenus chest , and loosing the reins from [his]898-ismenus dying hands , slipped gradually , sideways , over [[his]898-ismenus mount]6885-his mount ’s right shoulder . [Next Sipylus]899-next sipylus , hearing the sound of a quiver in the empty air , let out the reins , just as a shipmaster sensing a storm runs for it when [he]898-ismenus sees the cloud , and claps on all sail , so that not even the slightest breeze is lost . Still giving full rein , [he]898-ismenus was overtaken , by the arrow none can avoid , and the shaft stuck quivering in [his]898-ismenus neck , and the naked tip protruded from [his]898-ismenus throat . Leaning forward , as [he]898-ismenus was , [he]898-ismenus rolled down over the mane and the galloping hooves , and stained the ground with warm blood . [Unlucky Phaedimus]900-unlucky phaedimus , and [Tantalus]761-tantalus , who carried [[his]898-ismenus grandfather]2444-his grandfather ’s name , at the end of the usual task imposed on [them]6887-they , had joined the exercise of [the young men]6888-the young men , and were gleaming with oil in the wrestling match . And now [they]6887-they were fully engaged , in a tight hold , chest to chest , when an arrow , loosed from the taut bow , pierced [them]6887-they both , as [they]6887-they were . [They]6887-they groaned as one , and fell as one , [their]6887-they limbs contorted with pain . As [they]6887-they lay there , [they]6887-they cast a last dying look , as one , and , as one , gave up the ghost . [Alphenor]901-alphenor saw [them]6887-they die , and striking at [his]901-alphenor breast in anguish , [he]901-alphenor ran to [them]6887-they to lift [their]6887-they cold bodies in [his]901-alphenor embrace . In this filial service [he]901-alphenor also fell , for [Delian Apollo]851-delian apollo tore at [his]901-alphenor innermost parts with deadly steel . As the shaft was removed , a section of [his]901-alphenor lung was drawn with it , caught on the barbs , and with [his]901-alphenor life ’s blood [his]901-alphenor spirit rushed out into the air . But it was not a simple wound that longhaired [Damasicthon]902-damasicthon suffered . [He]901-alphenor was hit where the shin begins , and where the sinews of the knee leave a soft place between . While [he]901-alphenor was trying to pull out the fatal shaft with [his]901-alphenor hand , another arrow was driven into [his]901-alphenor throat as far as the feathers . The rush of blood expelled it , and gushing out , spurted high in the air , in a long jet . [The last son]6889-the last son , [Ilioneus]903-ilioneus , stretched out [his]6889-the last son arms in vain entreaty . ‘[0-i] O [[you]3008-her company of [all the gods]1558-all the gods]3009-you company of all the gods , spare [me]0-i ! ’ [he]6889-the last son cried , unaware that [he]6889-the last son need not ask [them]1558-all the gods all . [The archer god [Apollo]851-delian apollo]6890-the archer god apollo was moved , though already the dart could not be recalled : yet only a slight wound killed [the boy]1835-the boy , the arrow not striking deeply in [his]1835-the boy heart . The rumour of trouble , [the people]5829-the people ’s sorrow , and the tears of [[her]3008-her own family]6893-her own family , confirming sudden disaster to [the mother]2342-the mother , left [her]3008-her astounded that [the gods]1538-the gods could have done it , and angered that [they]1538-the gods had such power , and dared to use it . Now , [she]3008-her learned that [the father]1852-the father , [Amphion]893-amphion , driving the iron blade through [his]1852-the father heart , had , in dying , ended pain and life together . Alas , how different [this Niobe]6897-this niobe from [that Niobe]6898-that niobe , [the one , who a moment ago chased [the people]5829-the people from [[Latona]895-latona ’s altar]6901-latona ’s altar]6899-the one , who a moment ago chased the people from latona ’s altar , and made [her]6898-that niobe way through [the city]2547-the city with head held high , enviable to [[her]6898-that niobe friends]6710-her friends , and now more to be pitied by [[her]6898-that niobe enemies]2729-her enemies . [She]6898-that niobe threw [herself]6898-that niobe on the cold bodies , and without regard for due ceremony , gave all [[her]6898-that niobe sons]1540-her sons a last kiss . Turning from [them]1540-her sons [she]6898-that niobe lifted [her]6898-that niobe bruised arms to the sky , and cried out ‘[0-i] Feed [your]3011-your heart , [cruel one]6183-cruel one , [Latona]895-latona , on [my]0-i pain , feed [your]3011-your heart , and be done ! Be done , savage spirit ! [I]0-i am buried seven times . Exult and triumph over [[your]3011-your enemy]5909-your enemy ! But where is the victory ? Even in [my]0-i misery [I]0-i have more than [you]3011-your in [your]3011-your happiness . After so many deaths , [I]0-i still outdo [you]3011-your ! ’ [She]6898-that niobe spoke , and the twang of a taut bowstring sounded , terrifying all of [them]3011-your , except [Niobe]892-niobe . Pain gave [her]6898-that niobe courage . [The sisters , with black garments , and loosened hair]6906-the sisters , with black garments , and loosened hair , were standing by [[their]6906-the sisters , with black garments , and loosened hair brothers]6907-their brothers ’[3011-your] bodies . [One]5944-one , grasping at an arrow piercing [her]5944-one side , falling , fainted in death beside [[her]5944-one brother]1883-her brother ’s face . [A second , attempting to comfort [[her]5944-one grieving mother]3017-her grieving mother]3016-a second , attempting to comfort her grieving mother , fell silent , and was bent in agony with a hidden wound . [She]5944-one pressed [her]5944-one lips together , but life had already fled . [One]904-one fell trying in vain to run , and [[her]5944-one sister]6129-her sister fell across [her]5944-one . [One]5944-one tried to hide , while another trembled in full view . Now six had been dealt death , suffering [their]3020-their various wounds : [the last]3021-the last remained . [The mother]2342-the mother , with all [her]2342-the mother robes and with [her]2342-the mother body , protected [her]5944-one , and cried out ‘ Leave [me]2342-the mother just one , [the youngest]6908-the youngest ! [I]2342-the mother only ask for one , [the youngest of all]6909-the youngest of all ! ’[2342-the mother] While [she]2342-the mother prayed , [she]2342-the mother , for whom [she]2342-the mother prayed , was dead . Childless , [she]2342-the mother sat among the bodies of [[her]2342-the mother sons]1540-her sons , [[her]2342-the mother daughters]1820-her daughters , and [[her]2342-the mother husband]5872-her husband , frozen in grief . The breeze stirs not a hair , the colour of [her]2342-the mother cheeks is bloodless , and [her]2342-the mother eyes are fixed motionless in [her]2342-the mother sad face : nothing in that likeness is alive . Inwardly [her]2342-the mother tongue is frozen to the solid roof of [her]2342-the mother mouth , and [her]2342-the mother veins cease their power to throb . [Her]2342-the mother neck can not bend , nor [her]2342-the mother arms recall their movement , nor [her]2342-the mother feet lead [her]2342-the mother anywhere . Inside , [her]2342-the mother body is stone . Yet [she]2342-the mother weeps , and , enclosed in a powerful whirlwind , [she]2342-the mother is snatched away to [[her]2342-the mother own country]3026-her own country : there , set on [a mountain top]3027-a mountain top , [she]2342-the mother wears away , and even now tears flow from the marble . Now [all men]6493-all men and [women]5877-women are indeed afraid of the anger manifested by divine being , and [all]5784-all pay more respect to the great power of [the goddess]5864-the goddess , [the mother of [the twins]3033-the twins]3032-the mother of the twins . As often happens , because of recent events [they]3034-i tell old stories , and one says ‘ In [[Lycia]117-lycia ’s fertile fields]6910-lycia ’s fertile fields , in ancient times , also , [the farmers]1591-the farmers spurned [the goddess]5864-the goddess , and not without suffering for it . The thing is not well known , it is true , because [the men]2224-the men were unknown , nevertheless , it was wonderful . [I]3034-i [myself]3034-i saw [the place]1552-the place , and [the lake]6915-the lake made notable by the strangeness of it , since [[my]3034-i father]5857-my father , getting old , and unable to endure the journey , had ordered [me]3034-i to collect some choice cattle from there , and [one of [the men of [that country]6099-that country]6918-the men of that country]6917-one of the men of that country had offered [himself]6917-one of the men of that country as [a guide]6920-a guide . While [I]3034-i crossed [the pastureland]6921-the pastureland with [him]6917-one of the men of that country , there was an old altar , black with ashes , standing in the middle of [a lake]6922-a lake , surrounded by trembling reeds . [[My]3034-i guide]6923-my guide stopped and , shivering with fear , said in a murmur ‘[3034-i] Have mercy on [me]0-i ! ’ and [I]3034-i , similarly , said in a murmur ‘[3034-i] Have mercy ! ’ Then [I]3035-young man asked [him]6917-one of the men of that country whether it was an altar to [the Naiads]690-the naiads , [Faunus]905-faunus , or [a local god]6924-a local god , and [[my]3035-young man friend]6925-my friend replied ‘[3035-young man] [Young man]3035-young man , it is no mountain spirit in this altar . [She]3036-she calls it [hers]3036-she , whom [the queen of heaven]3037-the queen of heaven once banned from [the world]1448-the world , and whom vagrant [Delos]897-delos , [a lightly floating island]3039-a lightly floating island , would barely accept , at [her]3036-she prayer . There , between [Pallas]610-pallas ’s olive tree and a date - palm , [Latona]895-latona bore [[her]895-latona twins]3040-her twins , against [[their]3040-her twins step - mother]3041-their step - mother [Juno]877-juno ’s will . Having endured [her]895-latona labour , even then [she]895-latona fled [Juno]877-juno , carrying [the divine twins]3042-the divine twins clasped to [her]895-latona breast . Then , inside [the borders of [Lycia]117-lycia]3043-the borders of lycia , [home of the Chimaera]3044-home of the chimaera , as the fierce sun scorched [the fields]1522-the fields , [the goddess]5864-the goddess , weary from [her]5864-the goddess long struggle , and parched by the radiant heat , felt [her]5864-the goddess thirst : also [[her]5864-the goddess hungry children]3047-her hungry children had drunk all [her]5864-the goddess rich milk . By chance [she]5864-the goddess saw [a smallish lake in [a deep valley]3049-a deep valley]3048-a smallish lake in a deep valley . [Countrymen]3050-countrymen were there , gathering bushy osiers , rushes , and the fine marsh sedges . [[The Titan]5870-the titan ’s daughter]5871-the titan ’s daughter approached , and putting [her]5871-the titan ’s daughter knee to the ground , rested , to enjoy a drink of the cool water . [The group of [rustics]3054-rustics]3053-the group of rustics denied it to [her]5871-the titan ’s daughter . [The goddess]5864-the goddess , denied , spoke . ‘ Why do [you]3053-the group of rustics forbid [me]5864-the goddess [your]3053-the group of rustics waters ? The use of water is [everyone]2389-everyone ’s right . Nature has not made the sun , or the air , or the clear waves , private things . [I]5864-the goddess come for a public gift , and yet [I]5864-the goddess beg [you]3053-the group of rustics to grant it to [me]5864-the goddess as a suppliant . [I]5864-the goddess was not preparing to bathe [my]5864-the goddess limbs and [my]5864-the goddess weary body here , only to quench [my]5864-the goddess thirst . [My]5864-the goddess mouth lacks moisture from speaking , [my]5864-the goddess throat is dry , and there ’s scarcely a path here for speech . A drink of water would be nectar to [me]5864-the goddess , and [I]5864-the goddess would bear witness to accepting life from it , as well : [you]3053-the group of rustics will be giving life from [your]3053-the group of rustics waves . Let [these children]6927-these children move [you]3053-the group of rustics , also , who stretch [their]3056-their little arms out from [my]5864-the goddess breast . ’[5864-the goddess] And it chanced that [they]3056-their did stretch out [their]3056-their arms . Who would not have been moved by [the goddess]5864-the goddess ’s winning words ? Yet , despite [her]5864-the goddess prayers [they]3056-their persisted in denying [her]5864-the goddess , with threats , if [she]5864-the goddess did not take [herself]5864-the goddess off , and added insults besides . Not content with that , [they]3056-their also stirred the pool with [their]3056-their hands and feet , and churned up the soft mud from [the depths]2509-the depths , by leaping about , maliciously . Anger forgot thirst , for now [the daughter of [Coeus]896-coeus]3059-the daughter of coeus could not bear to beg from the unworthy , nor speak in words inferior to those of [a goddess]6068-a goddess , and stretching [her]3059-the daughter of coeus palms to the heavens , [she]3059-the daughter of coeus said ‘ Live in [that swamp]6928-that swamp for ever ! ’[3059-the daughter of coeus] It happened as [the goddess]5864-the goddess wished : It is [their]3056-their delight to be under [the water]1620-the water , now to submerge [their]3056-their bodies completely in [the deep pool]3063-the deep pool , now to show [their]3056-their heads , now to swim on the surface . Often [they]3056-their squat on the edges of [the marsh]1790-the marsh , often retreat to [the cool lake]3065-the cool lake , but now as before [they]3056-their employ [their]3056-their ugly voices in quarrelling , and shamefully , even though [they]3056-their are under the water , from under [the water]1620-the water [they]3056-their try out [their]3056-their abuse . Now [their]3056-their voices are also hoarse , [their]3056-their inflated throats are swollen , and [their]3056-their croaking distends [their]3056-their wide mouths . [Their]3056-their shoulders and heads meet , and [their]3056-their necks appear to have vanished . [Their]3056-their backs are green ; [their]3056-their bellies , the largest part of [their]3056-their body , are white , and , as newly made frogs , [they]3056-their leap in [their]3056-their muddy pool . When whoever it was had finished relating the ruin of [the men of [Lycia]117-lycia]3067-the men of lycia , [another storyteller]3068-another storyteller remembered [the satyr]3069-the satyr , [Marsyas]906-marsyas , whom [Apollo]851-delian apollo , [[Latona]895-latona ’s son]3070-latona ’s son , had defeated , playing on the flute , that [Tritonian Minerva]841-tritonian minerva invented . [He]906-marsyas had exacted punishment . [Marsyas]906-marsyas cried ‘ Why do [you]3071-you peel [me]906-marsyas out of [myself]906-marsyas ? Aah ! [I]906-marsyas repent ’[906-marsyas] , [he]906-marsyas screamed in agony . ‘ Aah ! Music is not worth this pain ! ’[906-marsyas] As [he]906-marsyas screams , the skin is flayed from the surface of [his]906-marsyas body , no part is untouched . Blood flows everywhere , the exposed sinews are visible , and the trembling veins quiver , without skin to hide them : [you]3071-you can number the internal organs , and the fibres of the lungs , clearly visible in [his]906-marsyas chest . [The woodland gods]3072-the woodland gods , and [the fauns of [the countryside]3074-the countryside]3073-the fauns of the countryside , wept , and [[his]906-marsyas brother]1593-his brother satyrs , Olympus [[his]906-marsyas friend and pupil]3076-his friend and pupil , still dear to [him]906-marsyas then , and [the nymphs]5945-the nymphs , and [all who pastured [their]3078-all who pastured their fleecy sheep and horned cattle on those mountains fleecy sheep and horned cattle on [those mountains]3079-those mountains]3078-all who pastured their fleecy sheep and horned cattle on those mountains . [The fertile soil]3080-the fertile soil was drenched , and the drenched earth caught the falling tears , and absorbed them into its deep veins . It formed a stream then , and sent it into the clear air . From there it ran within sloping banks , quickly , to [the sea]1464-the sea , [the clearest river of [Phrygia]176-phrygia]3082-the clearest river of phrygia , taking [Marsyas]906-marsyas ’s name . From such tales as these [the company]3083-the company turns immediately to the present , and mourns the loss of [Amphion]893-amphion and [[his]906-marsyas children]3084-his children . [The mother]2342-the mother was blamed , though even then [one man]1607-one man , [[her]2342-the mother brother]1883-her brother [Pelops]907-pelops , is said to have wept for [her]2342-the mother and , after taking off [his]907-pelops tunic , to have shown the ivory , of [his]907-pelops left shoulder . This was of flesh , and the same colour as [his]907-pelops right shoulder , at the time of [his]907-pelops birth . Later , when [he]907-pelops had been cut in pieces , by [[his]907-pelops father]1775-his father , it is said that [the gods]1538-the gods fitted [his]907-pelops limbs together again . [They]1538-the gods found the pieces , but one was lost , between the upper arm and the neck . Ivory was used in place of the missing part , and by means of that [Pelops]907-pelops was made whole . [The princes]3090-the princes , of countries to the southwest , [near neighbours of [Thebes]89-thebes]3091-near neighbours of thebes , gathered , and [the cities related to [Thebes]89-thebes]3092-the cities related to thebes urged [[their]3092-the cities related to thebes kings]3093-their kings to go and offer sympathy .
