[Argos]28-argos and [Sparta]95-sparta , and [Peloponnesian Mycenae]181-peloponnesian mycenae , [Calydon]182-calydon not yet cursed for rejecting [Diana]527-diana , fertile [Orchomenos]184-orchomenos , and [Corinth]63-corinth famous for bronze ; warlike [Messene]185-messene , [Patrae]186-patrae , and low - lying Cleonae , [Nelean Pylos]187-nelean pylos , and [Troezen]188-troezen not yet ruled by [Pittheus]1051-pittheus ; and [whichever of [the other cities]3095-the other cities were southwest of [the Isthmus]190-the isthmus , lying between [[its]190-the isthmus two seas]3096-its two seas , or seen to [the northeast of [the Isthmus]190-the isthmus]3097-the northeast of the isthmus , lying between [[its]190-the isthmus two seas]3096-its two seas]3094-whichever of the other cities were southwest of the isthmus , lying between its two seas , or seen to the northeast of the isthmus , lying between its two seas . But who can believe this ? [Athens]85-athens , alone , did nothing . War prevented [them]3099-them doing so . A Barbarian army had crossed [the sea]1464-the sea and brought terror to [the walls of [the city of Mopsopius]3102-the city of mopsopius]3101-the walls of the city of mopsopius . [[Tereus]908-tereus of [Thrace]111-thrace]3103-tereus of thrace routed [these Barbarians]3104-these barbarians , with [[his]908-tereus army of [auxiliaries]3106-auxiliaries]3105-his army of auxiliaries , and won a great name by [his]908-tereus victory . Since [Tereus]908-tereus was [a master of men and riches]3107-a master of men and riches , and happened to trace [his]908-tereus descent from [mighty Mars]635-mars [himself]908-tereus , [Pandion]909-pandion , [king of [Athens]85-athens]3108-king of athens , made [them]3099-them [allies]3109-allies , by giving [him]3108-king of athens [[his]3108-king of athens daughter]2098-his daughter [Procne]910-procne in marriage . [Neither [Juno]525-juno , who attends on brides , nor [Hymen]525-juno , nor [the three Graces]3111-the three graces]525-juno , was [there]1878-there . [The Eumenides]911-the eumenides , [the Furies]3113-the furies , held torches snatched from a funeral . [The Eumenides]911-the eumenides , [the Furies]3113-the furies , prepared [their]3113-the furies marriage bed , and [the unholy screech owl]3115-the unholy screech owl brooded over [[their]3113-the furies house]6459-their house , and sat on the roof of [[their]3113-the furies chamber]3117-their chamber . By this bird - omen , [Procne]910-procne and [Tereus]908-tereus were joined . By this bird - omen , [they]3113-the furies were made [parents]3118-parents . [Thrace]111-thrace of course rejoiced with [them]3113-the furies , and [they]3113-the furies [themselves]3113-the furies gave thanks to [the gods]1538-the gods , and the day when [[Pandion]909-pandion ’s daughter]3120-pandion ’s daughter married [[her]3120-pandion ’s daughter illustrious king]3121-her illustrious king , and the day on which [Itys]912-itys [[their]3113-the furies son]3122-their son was born , [they]3113-the furies commanded to be celebrated as festivals : so , always , [our]3113-the furies real advantages escape [us]3113-the furies . Now , [Titan]569-aurora , the sun , had guided the turning year through five autumns when [Procne]910-procne said , coaxingly to [[her]910-procne husband]5872-her husband , ‘ If any thanks are due [me]910-procne , either send [me]910-procne to see [[my]910-procne sister]6929-my sister , or let [[my]910-procne sister]6929-my sister come here . [You]908-tereus can promise [[my]910-procne father]5857-my father [she]6929-my sister will return after a brief stay . It would be worth a great deal to [me]910-procne , if [you]908-tereus allowed [me]910-procne to see [Philomela]913-philomela . ’[910-procne] [Tereus]908-tereus ordered [[his]908-tereus ship]3124-his ship to [sea]1450-sea , and with sail and oar reached [the harbour of [Cecrops]628-cecrops]3126-the harbour of cecrops , and landed on [the shore of [Piraeus]192-piraeus]3127-the shore of piraeus . As soon as [he]908-tereus gained access to [[his]908-tereus father - in - law]6072-his father - in - law , right hand was joined to right hand , and [they]3129-they began by wishing [each other]2544-each other favourable omens . [Tereus]908-tereus had started to tell of the reason for [his]908-tereus visit , [[his]908-tereus wife]1633-his wife ’s request , and promise a speedy return if [she]1633-his wife were sent back with [him]908-tereus , when , see , [Philomela]913-philomela entered , dressed in rich robes , and richer beauty , walking as [we]3132-we are used to being told [the naiads]1761-the naiads and dryads of [the deep woods]5928-the deep woods do , if only one were to give [them]3135-them , like [her]913-philomela , culture and dress . Seeing [the girl]1792-the girl , [Tereus]908-tereus took fire , just as if [someone]6346-someone touched a flame to corn stubble , or burned the leaves , or hay stored in [a loft]3138-a loft . [Her]1792-the girl beauty was worthy of it , but [he]908-tereus was driven by [his]908-tereus natural passion , and the inclination of [the people of [[his]908-tereus region]3140-his region]3139-the people of his region is towards lust : [he]908-tereus burnt with [his]908-tereus own vice and [[his]908-tereus nation]3141-his nation ’s . [His]908-tereus impulse was to erode [her]1792-the girl attendants care , and [[her]1792-the girl nurse]3142-her nurse ’s loyalty , even seduce [the girl]1792-the girl [herself]1792-the girl with rich gifts , to the extent of [[his]908-tereus kingdom]1964-his kingdom , or rape [her]1792-the girl and defend the rape in savage war . There was nothing [he]908-tereus would not dare , possessed by unbridled desire , nor could [he]908-tereus contain the flame in [his]908-tereus heart . Now [he]908-tereus suffered from impatience , and eagerly returned to [Procne]910-procne ’s request , pursuing [his]908-tereus own wishes as [hers]1792-the girl . Desire made [him]908-tereus eloquent , and whenever [he]908-tereus petitioned more strongly than was seemly , [he]908-tereus would make out that [Procne]910-procne wished it so . [He]908-tereus even embellished [his]908-tereus speeches with tears , as though [she]910-procne had commissioned [him]908-tereus to do that too . [[You]3145-you gods]5823-you gods , what secret darknesses human hearts hide ! Due to [his]908-tereus efforts , [Tereus]908-tereus is viewed as faithful , in [his]908-tereus deceit , and is praised for [his]908-tereus crime . Moreover [Philomela]913-philomela wishes [his]908-tereus request granted , and resting [her]913-philomela forearms on [[her]913-philomela father]1694-her father ’s shoulders , coaxing [him]1694-her father to let [her]913-philomela go to visit [[her]913-philomela sister]6129-her sister , [she]913-philomela urges it , in [her]913-philomela own interest , and against it . [Tereus]908-tereus gazes at [her]913-philomela , and imagining [her]913-philomela as already [his]908-tereus , watching [her]913-philomela kisses , and [her]913-philomela arms encircling [[her]913-philomela father]1694-her father ’s neck , it all spurs [him]1694-her father on , food and fuel to [his]1694-her father frenzy . Whenever [she]913-philomela embraces [[her]913-philomela father]1694-her father , [he]1694-her father wishes [he]1694-her father were [that father]3151-that father : though of course [his]1694-her father intentions would be no less wicked . [The father]1852-the father is won over by [the twin entreaties]3153-the twin entreaties . [The girl]1792-the girl is overjoyed , and thanks [[her]1792-the girl father]1694-her father , and thinks , poor wretch , that what will bring sorrow to [both sisters]3156-both sisters is actually a success for [both]2640-both . Now little was left of [Phoebus]519-phoebus ’s daily labour , and [his]519-phoebus horses were treading the spaces of the western sky . A royal feast was served at [Pandion]909-pandion ’s table , with wine in golden goblets . Then [their]3156-both sisters bodies sated , [they]3156-both sisters gave [themselves]3156-both sisters to quiet sleep . But though [the Thracian king]3158-the thracian king retired to bed , [he]3158-the thracian king was disturbed by thoughts of [her]1792-the girl , and remembering [her]1792-the girl features , [her]1792-the girl gestures , [her]1792-the girl hands , [he]3158-the thracian king imagined the rest that [he]3158-the thracian king had not yet seen , as [he]3158-the thracian king would wish , and fuelled [his]3158-the thracian king own fires , in sleepless restlessness . Day broke , and [Pandion]909-pandion , clasping [[his]3158-the thracian king son - in - law]6581-his son - in - law ’s right hand , in parting , with tears welling in [his]3158-the thracian king eyes , entrusted [[his]3158-the thracian king daughter]2098-his daughter to [him]3158-the thracian king . ‘ [Dear son]6932-dear son , since affectionate reasons compel it , and both of [them]3156-both sisters desire it ( [you]6932-dear son too have desired it , [Tereus]908-tereus ) , [I]3161-his give [her]1792-the girl over to [you]6932-dear son , and by [your]6932-dear son honour , by the entreaty of a heart joined to [yours]6932-dear son , and by [the gods above]6933-the gods above , [I]3161-his beg [you]6932-dear son , protect [her]1792-the girl with [a father]5997-a father ’s love , and send back to [me]3161-his , as soon as is possible ( it will be all too long a wait for [me]3161-his ) , this sweet comfort of [my]3161-his old age . [You]6932-dear son too , as soon as is possible ( it is enough that [[your]6932-dear son sister]6112-your sister is so far away ) , if [you]6932-dear son are at all dutiful , [Philomela]913-philomela , return to [me]3161-his ! ’[3161-his] So [he]3161-his commanded [[his]3161-his daughter]2098-his daughter and kissed [her]2098-his daughter , and soft tears mingled with [his]3161-his commands . As a token of [their]3163-their promise [he]3161-his took [their]3163-their two right hands and linked them together , and asked [them]3163-their , with a prayer , to remember to greet [[his]3161-his absent daughter]3164-his absent daughter , and [grandson]3165-grandson , for [him]3161-his . [His]3161-his mouth sobbing , [he]3161-his could barely say a last farewell , and [he]3161-his feared the forebodings in [his]3161-his mind . As soon as [Philomela]913-philomela was on board [the brightly painted ship]3166-the brightly painted ship , and [the sea]1464-the sea was churned by the oars , and [the land]1465-the land left behind [them]3163-their , [the barbarian king]3169-the barbarian king cried ‘ [I]3161-his have won ! [I]3161-his carry with [me]3161-his what [I]3161-his wished for ! ’[3161-his] [He]3161-his exults , and [his]3161-his passion can scarcely wait for its satisfaction . [He]3161-his never turns [his]3161-his eyes away from [her]913-philomela , no differently than when [Jupiter]499-jupiter ’s eagle deposits a hare , caught by the curved talons , in its high eyrie : there is no escape for [the captive]3170-the captive , and [the raptor]3171-the raptor gazes at its prize . Now [they]3163-their had completed [their]3163-their journey , and disembarked from [the wave - worn ship]3172-the wave - worn ship , on [the shores of [[his]3161-his country]6809-his country]3173-the shores of his country . [The king]6572-the king took [her]913-philomela to [a high - walled building , hidden in [an ancient forest]3177-an ancient forest]3176-a high - walled building , hidden in an ancient forest , and there [he]6572-the king locked [her]913-philomela away , [she]913-philomela , pale and trembling , fearing everything , in tears now , begging to know where [[her]913-philomela sister]6129-her sister was . Then , confessing [his]6572-the king evil intent , [he]6572-the king overcame [her]913-philomela by force , [she]913-philomela [a virgin and alone]3179-a virgin and alone , as [she]913-philomela called out , again and again , in vain , to [[her]913-philomela father]1694-her father , [[her]913-philomela sister]6129-her sister , and most of all to [the great gods]3182-the great gods . [She]913-philomela quivered like a frightened lamb , that fails to realise it is free , wounded and discarded by a grey wolf , or like a dove trembling , its feathers stained with its blood , still fearing the rapacious claws that gripped it . After a brief while , when [she]913-philomela had come to [her]913-philomela senses , [she]913-philomela dragged at [her]913-philomela dishevelled hair , and like [a mourner]3183-a mourner , clawed at [her]913-philomela arms , beating them against [her]913-philomela breasts . Hands outstretched , [she]913-philomela shouted ‘ Oh , [you]6572-the king savage . Oh , what an evil , cruel , thing [you]6572-the king have done . Did [you]6572-the king care nothing for [[my]913-philomela father]5857-my father ’s trust , sealed with holy tears , [[my]913-philomela sister]6929-my sister ’s affection , [my]913-philomela own virginity , [your]6572-the king marriage vows ? [You]6572-the king have confounded everything . [I]913-philomela have been forced to become [[[my]913-philomela sister]6929-my sister ’s rival]6939-my sister ’s rival . [You]6572-the king are joined to both . Now [Procne]910-procne will be [[my]913-philomela enemy]6940-my enemy ! Why not rob [me]913-philomela of life as well , [[you]6572-the king traitor]6941-you traitor , so that no crime escapes [you]6572-the king ? If only [you]6572-the king had done it before that impious act . Then [[my]913-philomela shade]6942-my shade would have been free of guilt . Yet , if [the gods above]6933-the gods above witness such things , if the powers of [heaven]1501-heaven mean anything , if all is not lost , as [I]913-philomela am , then one day [you]6572-the king will pay [me]913-philomela for this ! [I]913-philomela , without shame , will tell what [you]6572-the king have done . If [I]913-philomela get the chance it will be in front of [everyone]2389-everyone . If [I]913-philomela am kept imprisoned in [these woods]2673-these woods , [I]913-philomela will fill [the woods]1690-the woods with it , and move the stones , that know of [my]913-philomela guilt , to pity . The skies will hear of it , and [any god that may be there]6948-any god that may be there ! ’[913-philomela] [The king]6572-the king ’s anger was stirred by these words , and [his]6572-the king fear also . Goaded by both , [he]6572-the king freed the sword from its sheath by [his]6572-the king side , and seizing [her]3185-her hair gathered it together , to use as a tie , to tether [her]3185-her arms behind [her]3185-her back . [Philomela]913-philomela , seeing the sword , and hoping only for death , offered up [her]913-philomela throat . But [he]6572-the king severed [her]913-philomela tongue with [his]6572-the king savage blade , holding it with pincers , as [she]913-philomela struggled to speak in [her]913-philomela indignation , calling out [[her]913-philomela father]1694-her father ’s name repeatedly . [Her]913-philomela tongue ’s root was left quivering , while the rest of it lay on the dark soil , vibrating and trembling , and , as though it were the tail of a mutilated snake moving , it writhed , as if , in dying , it was searching for some sign of [her]913-philomela . [They]3187-they say ( though [I]0-i scarcely dare credit it ) that even after this crime , [he]6572-the king still assailed [her]913-philomela wounded body , repeatedly , in [his]6572-the king lust . [He]6572-the king controlled [himself]6572-the king sufficiently to return to [Procne]910-procne , who , seeing [him]6572-the king returned , asked where [[her]913-philomela sister]6129-her sister was . [He]6572-the king , with false mourning , told of a fictitious funeral , and tears gave it credence . [Procne]910-procne tore [her]913-philomela glistening clothes , with [their]3189-their gold hems , from [her]913-philomela shoulders , and put on black robes , and built [an empty tomb]3190-an empty tomb , and mistakenly brought offerings , and lamented the fate of [a sister]6353-a sister , not yet due to be lamented in that way . [The sun - god]3192-the sun - god has circled the twelve signs , and a year is past . What can [Philomela]913-philomela do ? [A guard]3193-a guard prevents [her]913-philomela escape ; the thick walls of [the building]3194-the building are made of solid stone ; [her]913-philomela mute mouth can yield no token of the facts . Great trouble is inventive , and ingenuity arises in difficult times . Cleverly , [she]913-philomela fastens [her]913-philomela thread to a barbarian ’s loom , and weaves purple designs on a white background , revealing the crime . [She]913-philomela entrusts it , when complete , to [a servant]3195-a servant , and asks [her]3195-a servant , by means of gestures , to take it to [[her]3195-a servant mistress]3196-her mistress . [She]913-philomela , as [she]913-philomela is asked , takes it to [Procne]910-procne , not knowing what it carries inside . [The wife of [the savage king]3198-the savage king]3197-the wife of the savage king unrolls the cloth , and reads [[her]3197-the wife of the savage king sister]6129-her sister ’s terrible fate , and by a miracle keeps silent . Grief restrains [her]913-philomela lips , [her]913-philomela tongue seeking to form words adequate to [her]913-philomela indignation , fails . [She]913-philomela has no time for tears , but rushes off , in a confusion of right and wrong , [her]913-philomela mind filled with thoughts of vengeance . It was the time when [the young Thracian women]3200-the young thracian women used to celebrate the triennial festival of [Bacchus]682-bacchus . ( [Night]914-night knew [their]3200-the young thracian women holy rites : by night , [Mount Rhodope]915-mount rhodope rang with the high - pitched clashing of bronze ) . By night [the queen]2685-the queen left [[her]2685-the queen palace]3202-her palace , prepared [herself]2685-the queen for the rites of [the god]1482-the god , and took up the weapons of that frenzied religion . Tendrils of vine wreathed [her]2685-the queen head ; a deerskin was draped over [her]2685-the queen left side ; a light javelin rested on [her]2685-the queen shoulder . Hurtling through [the woods]1690-the woods with [a crowd of [[her]2685-the queen companions]6707-her companions]3205-a crowd of her companions , terrifying , driven by maddening grief , [Procne]910-procne embodies [you]3207-you , [Bacchus]682-bacchus . [She]910-procne comes at last to [the building in [the wilderness]3209-the wilderness]3208-the building in the wilderness , and howls out loud , giving the ecstatic cry of [Euhoe]772-euhoe , breaks the door down , seizes [[her]2685-the queen sister]6129-her sister , disguises [her]6129-her sister with the tokens of a wild Bacchante , hides [her]6129-her sister face with ivy leaves , and dragging [her]6129-her sister along with [her]910-procne , frightened out of [her]6129-her sister wits , leads [her]6129-her sister inside [the palace]6417-the palace walls . When [Philomela]913-philomela realised that [she]913-philomela had reached [that accursed house]3212-that accursed house , [the wretched girl]3213-the wretched girl shuddered in horror , and [her]3213-the wretched girl whole face grew deathly pale . [Procne]910-procne , once there , took off the religious trappings ; uncovered the downcast face of [[her]2685-the queen unhappy sister]3214-her unhappy sister , and clutched [her]6129-her sister in [her]2685-the queen arms . But [Philomela]913-philomela could not bear to lift [her]913-philomela eyes , seeing [herself]913-philomela as [[her]913-philomela sister]6129-her sister ’s betrayer . With [her]913-philomela face turned towards the ground , wanting to swear by [the gods]1538-the gods , and call [them]1538-the gods to witness , that [her]913-philomela shame had been visited on [her]913-philomela by force , [she]913-philomela made signs with [her]913-philomela hands in place of speech . [Procne]910-procne burned , and could not control [her]910-procne anger , reproaching [[her]910-procne sister]6129-her sister for weeping , saying ‘ Now is not the time for tears , but for the sword , or for what overcomes the sword , if [you]6129-her sister know of such a thing . [I]910-procne am prepared for any wickedness , [sister]6159-sister ; to set [the palace]6417-the palace alight with a torch , and throw [Tereus]908-tereus , [the author of this]6951-the author of this , into the midst of the flames ; or to cut out [his]908-tereus eyes and tongue , and the parts which brought shame to [you]6129-her sister ; or to force out [his]908-tereus guilty spirit through a thousand wounds ! [I]910-procne am ready for any enormity : but what it should be , [I]910-procne still do not know yet . ’[910-procne] While [Procne]910-procne was going over these things , [Itys]912-itys came to [[his]912-itys mother]5953-his mother . [His]912-itys arrival suggested what [she]5953-his mother might do , and regarding [him]912-itys with a cold gaze , [she]5953-his mother said ‘ Ah ! How like [[your]912-itys father]1808-your father [you]912-itys are ! ’[5953-his mother] Without speaking further , seething in silent indignation , [she]5953-his mother began to conceive [her]5953-his mother tragic plan . Yet , when [the boy]1835-the boy approached , and greeted [[his]1835-the boy mother]5953-his mother , and put [his]1835-the boy little arms round [her]5953-his mother neck , and kissed [her]5953-his mother with childish endearments , [she]5953-his mother was moved , [her]5953-his mother anger was checked , and [her]5953-his mother eyes were wet with the tears that gathered against [her]5953-his mother will . But , realising that [her]5953-his mother mind was wavering through excess affection , [she]5953-his mother turned away from [him]912-itys , and turned to look at [[her]5953-his mother sister]6129-her sister ’s face again , till , gazing at both in turn , [she]5953-his mother said ‘ Why should [the one]1688-the one be able to speak [his]1688-the one endearments , while the other is silent , [her]1688-the one tongue torn out ? Though [he]1688-the one calls [me]5953-his mother [mother]1809-mother , why can [she]1688-the one not call [me]5953-his mother [sister]6159-sister ? Look at [the husband [you]6956-the husband you are bride to , pandion ’s daughter are [bride]6957-bride to , [[Pandion]909-pandion ’s daughter]3120-pandion ’s daughter]6956-the husband you are bride to , pandion ’s daughter ! This is unworthy of [you]6956-the husband you are bride to , pandion ’s daughter ! Affection is criminal in [a wife of [Tereus]908-tereus]6959-a wife of tereus ’[5953-his mother] Without delay , [she]5953-his mother dragged [Itys]912-itys off , as [a tigress does an un - weaned fawn , in [the dark forests of [the Ganges]67-ganges]3223-the dark forests of the ganges]3222-a tigress does an un - weaned fawn , in the dark forests of the ganges . As [they]3224-they reached [a remote part of [the great palace]3226-the great palace]3225-a remote part of the great palace , [Procne]910-procne , with an unchanging expression , struck [him]912-itys with a knife , in the side close to the heart , while [he]912-itys stretched out [his]912-itys hands , knowing [his]912-itys fate at the last , crying out ‘ [Mother]916-mother ! [Mother]1809-mother ! ’[912-itys] , and reaching out for [her]5953-his mother neck . That one wound was probably enough to seal [his]912-itys fate , but [Philomela]913-philomela opened [his]912-itys throat with the knife . While the limbs were still warm , and retained some life , they tore them to pieces . Part bubble in bronze cauldrons , part hiss on the spit : and [the distant rooms]3227-the distant rooms drip with grease . [The wife]6294-the wife invites [the unsuspecting Tereus]908-tereus to the feast , and giving out that it is a sacred rite , practised in [[her]6294-the wife country]2701-her country , where it is only lawful for [the husband]6296-the husband to be present , [she]6294-the wife sends away [[their]3231-their followers]3232-their followers and [servants]2613-servants . [Tereus]908-tereus eats by [himself]908-tereus , seated in [his]908-tereus tall ancestral chair , and fills [his]908-tereus belly with [[his]908-tereus own child]3234-his own child . And in the darkness of [his]908-tereus understanding cries ‘ Fetch Itys here ’[910-procne] . [Procne]910-procne can not hide [her]910-procne cruel exultation , and now , eager to be , [herself]910-procne , [the messenger of destruction]3235-the messenger of destruction , [she]910-procne cries ‘ [You]908-tereus have [him]1835-the boy there , inside , the one [you]908-tereus ask for . ’[908-tereus] [He]908-tereus looks around and questions where [the boy]1835-the boy is . And then while [he]908-tereus is calling out and seeking [him]1835-the boy , [Philomela]913-philomela , springs forward , [her]913-philomela hair wet with the dew of that frenzied murder , and hurls the bloodstained head of [Itys]912-itys in [[his]1835-the boy father]1775-his father ’s face . Nor was there a time when [she]913-philomela wished more strongly to have the power of speech , and to declare [her]913-philomela exultation in fitting words . [The Thracian king]3158-the thracian king pushed back the table with a great cry , calling on [the Furies]3113-the furies , [the snake - haired sisters of [the vale of [Styx]194-the styx]3241-the vale of styx]3240-the snake - haired sisters of the vale of styx . Now if [he]3158-the thracian king could , [he]3158-the thracian king would tear open [his]3158-the thracian king body , and reveal the dreadful substance of the feast , and [[his]3158-the thracian king half - consumed child]3242-his half - consumed child . Then [he]3158-the thracian king weeps , and calls [himself]3158-the thracian king [the sepulchre of [[his]3158-the thracian king unhappy son]3244-his unhappy son]3243-the sepulchre of his unhappy son , and now pursues , with naked sword , [the daughters of [Pandion]909-pandion]3245-the daughters of pandion . [You]3246-you might think [the Athenian women]3247-the athenian women have taken wing : [they]3247-the athenian women have taken wings . One of [them]3247-the athenian women , a nightingale , [Procne]910-procne , makes for [the woods]1690-the woods . The other , a swallow , [Philomela]913-philomela , flies to the eaves of [the palace]6417-the palace , and even now [her]913-philomela throat has not lost the stain of that murder , and the soft down bears witness to the blood . [Tereus]908-tereus swift in [his]908-tereus grief and desire for revenge , is [himself]908-tereus changed to a bird , with a feathered crest on its head . An immoderate , elongated , beak juts out , like a long spear . The name of the bird is the hoopoe , and it looks as though it is armed . This tragedy sent [Pandion]909-pandion down to [the shadows of [Tartarus]7-tartarus]3250-the shadows of tartarus before [his]3158-the thracian king time , before the last years of old age . [His]3158-the thracian king rule over [the kingdom]2774-the kingdom , and [his]3158-the thracian king wealth passed to [Erectheus , whose ability for sound government , and superiority in warfare]3252-erectheus , whose ability for sound government , and superiority in warfare , was never in doubt . [He]3158-the thracian king had [four sons and the same number of daughters]3253-four sons and the same number of daughters , and [two of [the daughters]3255-the daughters]3254-two of the daughters were [rivals in beauty]3256-rivals in beauty . Of these two , [Procris]917-procris made [you]3257-you happy in marriage , [Cephalus]918-cephalus , [grandson of [Aeolus]511-aeolus]3258-grandson of aeolus . But [you]3257-you , [Boreas]497-boreas , [god of the north wind]3259-god of the north wind , were long denied [[your]3257-you beloved]3260-your beloved , [Orithyia]919-orithyia , harmed by [your]3257-you origins , with [Tereus]908-tereus , among [the Thracians]3261-the thracians . This was so while [Boreas]497-boreas wooed [her]3260-your beloved , and preferred prayers to force . But when charm got [him]497-boreas nowhere , [he]497-boreas bristled with anger , which is [his]497-boreas usual mood for too much of the time , and said ‘ [I]497-boreas deserve it ! Why have [I]497-boreas relinquished [my]497-boreas own weapons , force and ferocity , and anger and menacing moods , and turned to prayers , that are unbecoming for [me]497-boreas to use ? Force is fitting for [me]497-boreas . By force , [I]497-boreas drive forward the mists , by force move [the sea]1464-the sea . [I]497-boreas overturn knotted oaks , harden the snow , and strike earth with hail . And , when [I]497-boreas meet [[my]497-boreas brothers]6962-my brothers under the open sky ( since that is [my]497-boreas battleground ) [I]497-boreas struggle so fiercely with [them]6962-my brothers that the midst of the heavens echoes with [our]6963-our collisions , and lightning leaps , hurled from the vaulted clouds . So , when [I]497-boreas penetrate the hollow openings of [the earth]1463-the earth , and apply [my]497-boreas proud back to the deepest cave roofs , [I]497-boreas trouble the shades , and the whole world with the tremors . That is how [I]497-boreas should have sought [a wife]6965-a wife , and not become [[Erectheus]920-erectheus ’s son - in - law]6966-erectheus ’s son - in - law by prayer but by action . ’[497-boreas] With these , or other equally forceful words , [Boreas]497-boreas unfurled [his]497-boreas wings , by whose beating the whole world is stirred , and made [the wide ocean]3262-the wide ocean tremble . Trailing [his]497-boreas cloak of dust over [the mountain summits]3263-the mountain summits , [he]497-boreas swept [the land]1465-the land , and , shrouded in darkness , [the lover]2082-the lover embraced [his]497-boreas Orithyia , with [his]497-boreas dusky wings , as [she]3266-she shivered with fear . As [he]497-boreas flew , [his]497-boreas own flames of passion were fanned , and burned fiercer . Nor did [the thief]3267-the thief halt in [his]3267-the thief flight through the air , till [he]3267-the thief reached the walls of [the city]2547-the city and [people of [Thrace]111-thrace]3269-people of thrace , [the Cicones]195-the cicones . There [the girl from [Attica]196-attica]3270-the girl from attica married [the chilly tyrant]3271-the chilly tyrant , and became [a mother]5881-a mother , giving birth to [twin brothers]3273-twin brothers , who took after [[their]3273-twin brothers mother]1928-their mother , in everything else but [[their]3273-twin brothers father]5800-their father ’s wings . Yet [they]3273-twin brothers say the wings were not present , on [their]3273-twin brothers bodies , when [they]3273-twin brothers were born , but while [they]3273-twin brothers still were lacking beards , to match [their]3273-twin brothers red hair , [Calais]921-calais , and [Zetes]922-zetes , as [boys]3276-boys , were wingless . But [both alike]3277-both alike , soon after , began to sprout the pinions of birds on [their]3277-both alike shoulders , and both [their]3277-both alike jaws and cheeks grew tawny . And , when [their]3277-both alike boyhood was over , [the youths]3278-the youths sailed , as [Argonauts]923-the argonauts , with [the Minyans]3279-the minyans , in [that first ship]3280-that first ship , through [unknown seas]3281-unknown seas , to seek the glittering wool of a golden fleece . And now [the Argonauts]923-the argonauts were ploughing through [the sea]1464-the sea in [[their]923-the argonauts ship]3283-their ship , built in [Thessalian Pagasae]197-thessalian pagasae . [They]923-the argonauts had visited [Phineus]791-phineus , [king of [Thracian Salmydessus]198-thracian salmydessus]3284-king of thracian salmydessus , living out a useless old age in perpetual blindness , and [the winged sons of [Boreas]497-boreas]3285-the winged sons of boreas had driven [the birdlike Harpies]3286-the birdlike harpies from the presence of [the unhappy , aged man]3287-the unhappy , aged man . At last , after enduring many trials , under [[their]923-the argonauts famous leader]3288-their famous leader , [Jason]924-jason , [they]923-the argonauts reached [the turbulent river - waters of [the muddy Phasis]68-phasis]3289-the turbulent river - waters of the muddy phasis , in [the land of [Colchis]200-colchis]3290-the land of colchis . While [they]923-the argonauts were standing before [King Aeetes]925-king aeetes , of [Aea]926-aea , requesting the return of the Golden Fleece , taken from the divine ram that carried [Phrixus]201-phrixus , and while extreme terms were being imposed , involving daunting tasks , [Medea]927-medea , [the daughter of [the king]6572-the king]3291-the daughter of the king , conceived an overwhelming passion for [Jason]924-jason . [She]927-medea fought against it for a time , but when reason could not overcome desire , [she]927-medea debated with [herself]927-medea . ‘ [Medea]927-medea , [you]927-medea struggle in vain : [some god]6967-some god , [I]3293-i do not know which , opposes [you]927-medea . [I]3293-i wonder if this , or something , like this , is what [people]1519-people indeed call love ? Or why would the tasks [[my]3293-i father]5857-my father demands of [Jason]924-jason seem so hard ? They are more than hard ! Why am [I]3293-i afraid of [his]924-jason death , when [I]3293-i have scarcely seen [him]924-jason ? What is the cause of all this fear ? Quench , if [you]927-medea can , [unhappy girl]6970-unhappy girl , these flames that [you]927-medea feel in [your]927-medea virgin heart ! If [I]3293-i could , [I]3293-i would be wiser ! But a strange power draws [me]3293-i to [him]924-jason against [my]3293-i will . Love urges one thing : reason another . [I]3293-i see , and [I]3293-i desire the better : [I]3293-i follow the worse . Why do [you]927-medea burn for [a stranger]2843-a stranger , [royal virgin]6972-royal virgin , and dream of marriage in [an alien land]6973-an alien land ? [This earth]2746-this earth can also give [you]927-medea what [you]927-medea can love . Whether [he]924-jason lives or dies , is in the hands of [the gods]1538-the gods . Let [him]924-jason live ! [I]3293-i can pray for this even if [I]3293-i may not love [him]924-jason : what is [Jason]924-jason guilty of ? Who , but the heartless , would not be touched by [Jason]924-jason ’s youth , and birth , and courage ? Who , though the other qualities were absent , could not be stirred by [his]924-jason beauty ? [He]924-jason has stirred [my]3293-i heart , indeed . And unless [I]3293-i offer [my]3293-i help , [he]924-jason will feel the fiery breath of the bronze - footed bulls ; have to meet [that enemy]6976-that enemy , sprung from the soil , born of [his]924-jason own sowing ; or be given as captured prey to the dragon ’s greed . If [I]3293-i allow this , then [I]3293-i am born of [the tigress]6977-the tigress : then [I]3293-i show [I]3293-i have a heart of stone and iron ! Why can [I]3293-i not watch [him]924-jason die , and shame [my]3293-i eyes by seeing ? Why do [I]3293-i not urge the bulls on , to meet [him]924-jason , and [the wild earth - born warriors]6978-the wild earth - born warriors , and [the unsleeping dragon]6979-the unsleeping dragon ? Let [the gods]1538-the gods also desire the better ! Though it is not for [me]3293-i to pray for , but to bring about . Shall [I]3293-i betray [[my]3293-i father ’s country]6981-my father ’s country ? Shall [some unknown]6982-some unknown be saved by [my]3293-i powers , and unhurt because of [me]3293-i , without [me]3293-i , set [his]924-jason sails to the wind , and be husband to another , leaving [Medea]927-medea to be punished ? If [he]924-jason could do that , if [he]924-jason could set [another woman]6983-another woman above [me]3293-i , let [him]924-jason die , [the ungrateful man]6984-the ungrateful man ! But [his]924-jason look , [his]924-jason nobility of spirit , and [his]924-jason graceful form , do not make [me]3293-i fear deceit or forgetfulness of [my]3293-i kindness . And [he]924-jason will give [me]3293-i [his]924-jason word beforehand , and [I]3293-i will gather [the gods]1538-the gods to witness [our]6986-our pledge . Why fear when it is certain ? Prepare [yourself]6987-you , and dispel all delay : [Jason]924-jason will be for ever in [your]6987-you debt , take [you]6987-you to [himself]924-jason in sacred marriage , and through [the cities of [Pelasgian Greece]202-pelasgian greece]6988-the cities of pelasgian greece , the crowds of [women]5877-women will glorify [you]6987-you as [[his]924-jason saviour]6990-his saviour . Carried by the winds , shall [I]3293-i leave [[my]3293-i native country]6991-my native country , [[my]3293-i sister]6929-my sister , [[my]3293-i brother]6993-my brother , [[my]3293-i father]5857-my father , and [[my]3293-i gods]6995-my gods ? Well then , [[my]3293-i father]5857-my father is barbarous , and [[my]3293-i country]2452-my country is savage , and [[my]3293-i brother]6993-my brother is still [a child]2050-a child : [[my]3293-i sister]6929-my sister ’s prayers are for [me]3293-i , and [the greatest god]7001-the greatest god is within ! [I]3293-i will not be leaving greatness behind , but pursuing greatness : honour as [a saviour of [these Achaean people]7003-these achaean people]7002-a saviour of these achaean people , familiarity with [a better land]7004-a better land and with [cities whose fame is flourishing even here]7005-cities whose fame is flourishing even here , the culture and arts of [those places]7006-those places , and [the man]5875-the man , [the son of [Aeson]928-aeson]7008-the son of aeson , for whom [I]3293-i would barter those things that [the wide world]5935-the wide world owns , joined to whom [I]3293-i will be called fortunate , dear to [the gods]1538-the gods , and [my]3293-i head will be crowned with the stars . What of the stories of mountains that clash together in [mid - ocean]7011-mid - ocean , and [Charybdis]929-charybdis the bane of [sailors , now sucking in , now spewing out]7012-sailors , now sucking in , now spewing out [the sea]1464-the sea , and rapacious dog - headed Scylla , yelping over [the Sicilian deeps]203-the sicilian deeps ? Well , holding what [I]3293-i love , clinging to [Jason]924-jason ’s breast , [I]3293-i shall be carried over [the wide seas]7014-the wide seas : in [his]924-jason arms , [I]3293-i will fear nothing , or if [I]3293-i am afraid , [I]3293-i will only be afraid for [him]924-jason . But do [you]7015-you call that marriage , [Medea]927-medea , and clothe [your]7015-you fault with fair names ? Consider instead , how great a sin [you]7015-you are near to , and while [you]7015-you can , shun the crime ! ’[3293-i] [She]3293-i spoke , and in front of [her]3293-i eyes , were rectitude , piety , modesty : and now , [Cupid]522-cupid , defeated , was turning away . [She]3293-i went to [the ancient altars of [Hecate]890-hecate]3294-the ancient altars of hecate , [daughter of the Titan Perses]3295-daughter of the titan perses , that [the shadowy grove]3296-the shadowy grove conceals , in [the remote forest]3297-the remote forest . And now [she]3293-i was strong and [her]3293-i passion , now conquered , had ebbed , when [she]3293-i saw [the son of [Aeson]928-aeson]7008-the son of aeson and the flame , that was dead , relit . [Her]3293-i cheeks flushed , and then [her]3293-i whole face became pallid . Just as a tiny spark that lies buried under the ashes , takes life from a breath of air , and grows and , living , regains its previous strength , so now [her]3293-i calmed passion , that [you]3299-you would have thought had dulled , when [she]3293-i saw [the young hero]2716-the young hero , flared up at [his]2716-the young hero visible presence . It chanced that [[Aeson]928-aeson ’s son]3301-aeson ’s son was more than usually handsome that day : [you]3299-you could forgive [her]3293-i for loving [him]3301-aeson ’s son . [She]3293-i gazed at [him]3301-aeson ’s son , and fixed [her]3293-i eyes on [him]3301-aeson ’s son as if [she]3293-i had never looked at [him]3301-aeson ’s son before , and in [her]3293-i infatuation , seeing [his]3301-aeson ’s son face , could not believe [him]3301-aeson ’s son mortal , nor could [she]3293-i turn away . So that when , indeed , [the stranger]2710-the stranger grasped [her]3293-i right hand , and began to speak , and in a submissive voice asked for [her]3293-i help , promising marriage , [she]3293-i replied in a flood of tears . ‘ [I]3301-aeson ’s son see what [I]3301-aeson ’s son am doing : it is not ignorance of the truth that ensnares [me]3301-aeson ’s son , but love . [Your]3301-aeson ’s son salvation is in [my]3301-aeson ’s son gift , but being saved , remember [your]3301-aeson ’s son promise ! ’[3301-aeson ’s son] [He]3301-aeson ’s son swore by the sacred rites of [the Triple Goddess]3303-the triple goddess , by the divine presence of [the grove]1996-the grove , by [the all - seeing Sun , who was [the father of [King Aeetes]925-king aeetes]3306-the father of king aeetes , [[his]3301-aeson ’s son father - in - law]6072-his father - in - law to be , and by [his]3301-aeson ’s son own good fortune , and by [his]3301-aeson ’s son great danger]3305-the all - seeing sun , who was the father of king aeetes , his father - in - law to be , and by his own good fortune , and by his great danger . Immediately , as [he]3301-aeson ’s son was now trusted , [he]3301-aeson ’s son accepted the magic herbs from [her]3303-the triple goddess , and learnt [their]3308-their use , and returned to [the palace]6417-the palace , joyfully . The next day ’s dawn dispelled the glittering stars . Then [the people]5829-the people gathered on [the sacred field of Mars]3311-the sacred field of mars and took up [their]5829-the people position on [the ridge]3312-the ridge . [The king]6572-the king was seated in the middle , clothed in purple , and distinguished by [his]6572-the king ivory sceptre . Behold , the bronze - footed bulls , breathing [Vulcan]568-vulcan ’s fire from nostrils of steel . At the touch of [their]3314-their heat the grass shrivels , and as stoked fires roar , or as broken limestone , that has absorbed the heat inside an earthen furnace , hisses explosively , when cool water is scattered over it , so the flames sounded , pent up in [their]3314-their heaving chests and burning throats . Still [the son of [Aeson]928-aeson]7008-the son of aeson went out to meet [them]3314-their . As [he]7008-the son of aeson came to [them]3314-their , the fierce creatures , with [their]3314-their iron - tipped horns , turned [their]3314-their terrible gaze towards [him]7008-the son of aeson , pawed the dusty ground with [their]3314-their cloven feet , and filled the air with the steam of [their]3314-their bellowing . [The Minyans]930-the minyans were frozen in fear . [He]7008-the son of aeson went up to the bulls , not feeling [their]3314-their fiery breath ( so great is the power of magic drugs ! ) , and stroking [their]3314-their hanging dewlaps , with a bold hand , yoked [them]3314-their together , and forced [them]3314-their to pull the heavy blade , and till [the virgin field]3316-the virgin field with the iron plough . [The Colchians]931-the colchians were stunned , but [the Argonauts]923-the argonauts increased [their]923-the argonauts shouting , and heightened [his]7008-the son of aeson courage . Then [he]7008-the son of aeson took the dragon ’s teeth from the bronze helmet , and scattered them over [the turned earth]3317-the turned earth . The soil softened the seeds that had been steeped in virulent poison , and they sprouted , and the teeth , freshly sown , produced new bodies . As [an embryo]3318-an embryo takes on human form in [the mother]2342-the mother ’s womb , and is fully developed there in every aspect , not emerging to the living air until it is complete , so when those shapes of [men]5788-men had been made in [the bowels of [the pregnant earth]3322-the pregnant earth]3321-the bowels of the pregnant earth , [they]3314-their surged from [the teeming soil]3323-the teeming soil , and , what is even more wonderful , clashed weapons , created with [them]3314-their . [The Pelasgians]932-pelasgians ’ faces fell in fear , and [their]923-the argonauts courage failed [them]923-the argonauts , when [they]923-the argonauts saw [these warriors]7016-these warriors preparing to hurl [their]7016-these warriors sharp spears , at the head of [the Haemonian hero]7017-the haemonian hero . [She]2342-the mother also , who had rendered [him]7017-the haemonian hero safe , was afraid . When [she]2342-the mother saw [the solitary youth attacked by so many enemies]7018-the solitary youth attacked by so many enemies , [she]2342-the mother grew pale , and sat there , suddenly cold and bloodless . And in case the herbs [she]2342-the mother had given [him]7017-the haemonian hero had not been potent enough , [she]2342-the mother chanted a spell to support [them]7016-these warriors , and called on [her]2342-the mother secret arts . [He]7017-the haemonian hero threw a boulder into the midst of [[his]7017-the haemonian hero enemies]7019-his enemies , and this turned [their]7019-his enemies attack , on [him]7017-the haemonian hero , against [themselves]7019-his enemies . [The earth - born brothers]7020-the earth - born brothers died at [each other]2544-each other ’s hands , and fell as in civil war . [The Achaeans]7022-the achaeans cheered , and clung to [the victor]6480-the victor , and hugged [him]6480-the victor in eager embraces . [You]7024-you also , [princess among [the Barbarians]7026-the barbarians]7025-princess among the barbarians , longed to hold [the victorious man]7027-the victorious man : but modesty prevented it . Still , [you]7024-you might have held [him]7027-the victorious man , but concern for [your]7024-you reputation stopped [you]7024-you from doing so . What [you]7024-you might fittingly do [you]7024-you did , rejoicing silently , giving thanks , for [your]7024-you incantations , and [the gods who inspired [them]7020-the earth - born brothers]7028-the gods who inspired them . The final task was to put the dragon to sleep with the magic drugs . Known for its crest , its triple tongues and curved fangs , it was [the dread guardian of the tree ’s gold]7029-the dread guardian of the tree ’s gold . But when [Jason]924-jason had sprinkled it with the Lethean juice of a certain herb , and three times repeated the words that bring tranquil sleep , that calm the rough seas and [turbulent rivers]7030-turbulent rivers , sleep came to those sleepless eyes , and [the heroic son of [Aeson]928-aeson]7031-the heroic son of aeson gained the Golden Fleece . Proud of [his]924-jason prize , and taking with [him]924-jason a further prize , [the one who had helped [him]924-jason gain it , [the hero]2234-the hero , and [[his]2234-the hero wife]1633-his wife [Medea]927-medea]7032-the one who had helped him gain it , the hero , and his wife medea , returned to [the harbour at [Iolchos]204-iolchos]7035-the harbour at iolchos . [The elderly Haemonian mothers]7036-the elderly haemonian mothers and [fathers]6052-fathers bring offerings to mark [[their]3324-their sons]7038-their sons ’[924-jason] return , and melt incense heaped in the flames . The sacrifice , with gilded horns , that [they]3324-their have dedicated , is led in and killed . But [Aeson]928-aeson is absent from the rejoicing , now near death , and weary with the long years . Then [Jason]924-jason , [[his]924-jason son]1773-his son , said ‘ O [[my]924-jason wife]6055-my wife , to whom [I]924-jason confess [I]924-jason owe [my]924-jason life , though [you]6055-my wife have already given [me]924-jason everything , and the total of all [your]6055-my wife kindnesses is beyond any promises [we]7040-we made , let [your]6055-my wife incantations , if [they]7041-they can ( what indeed can [they]7041-they not do ? ) reduce [my]924-jason own years and add them to [[my]924-jason father]5857-my father ’s ! ’[924-jason] [He]924-jason could not restrain [his]924-jason tears . [Medea]927-medea was moved by the loving request , and the contrast with [Aeetes]925-king aeetes , abandoned by [her]927-medea , came to mind . Yet , not allowing [herself]927-medea to be affected by such thoughts , [she]927-medea answered ‘ [Husband]933-husband , what dreadful words have escaped [your]933-husband lips ? Do [you]933-husband think [I]927-medea can transfer any part of [your]933-husband life to another ? [Hecate]7043-hecate would not allow it : nor is [yours]933-husband a just request . But [I]927-medea will try to grant a greater gift than the one [you]933-husband ask for , [Jason]924-jason . If only [the Triple Goddess]3303-the triple goddess will aid [me]927-medea , and give [her]3303-the triple goddess assent in person to this great act of daring , [I]927-medea will attempt to renew [[your]933-husband father]1808-your father ’s length of years , without need for [yours]933-husband . ’[927-medea] Three nights were lacking before the moon ’s horns met , to make their complete orb . When it was shining at its fullest , and gazed on the earth , with perfect form , [Medea]927-medea left [the palace]6417-the palace , dressed in unclasped robes . [Her]927-medea feet were bare , [her]927-medea unbound hair streamed down , over [her]927-medea shoulders , and [she]927-medea wandered , companionless , through midnight ’s still silence . [Men]5788-men , beasts , and birds were freed in deep sleep . There were no murmurs in the hedgerows : the still leaves were silent , in silent , dew - filled , air . Only the flickering stars moved . Stretching [her]927-medea arms to them [she]927-medea three times turned [herself]927-medea about , three times sprinkled [her]927-medea head , with water from [the running stream]3328-the running stream , three times let out a wailing cry , then knelt on [the hard earth]3329-the hard earth , and prayed : ‘ Night , [most faithful keeper of [our]3330-our secret rites]7046-most faithful keeper of our secret rites ; Stars , that , with the golden moon , succeed the fires of light ; [Triple Hecate]890-hecate , [you]3331-you who know all [our]3330-our undertakings , and come , to aid [the witches]7047-the witches ’[927-medea] art , and all [our]3330-our incantations : [You]3331-you , Earth , who yield [the sorceress herbs of magic force]3332-the sorceress herbs of magic force : [You]3331-you , airs and breezes , [pools and hills]3333-pools and hills , and [every watercourse]3334-every watercourse ; Be here ; all [you]3331-you Gods of Night , and [Gods of [Groves]205-groves]3335-gods of groves endorse . [Streams]206-streams , at will , by banks amazed , turn backwards to [their]206-streams source . [I]0-i calm [rough seas]3336-rough seas , and stir the calm by [my]0-i magic spells : bring clouds , disperse the clouds , raise storms and storms dispel ; and , with [my]0-i incantations , [I]0-i break the serpent ’s teeth ; and root up nature ’s oaks , and rocks , from [[their]206-streams native heath]3337-their native heath ; and move [the forests]3338-the forests , and command [the mountain tops]3339-the mountain tops to shake , earth to groan , and from [their]206-streams tombs the sleeping dead to wake . [You]3331-you also , [Luna]934-luna , [I]0-i draw down , eclipsed , from heaven ’s stain , though bronzes of Temese clash , to take away [your]3331-you pains ; and at [my]0-i chant , the chariot of [the Sun - god]3192-the sun - god , [[my]0-i grandsire]3341-my grandsire , grows pale : [Aurora]569-aurora , at [my]0-i poisons , dims [her]569-aurora morning fire . [You]3331-you quench the bulls ’ hot flame for [me]3342-she : force [their]7048-their necks to bow , beneath the heavy yoke , that never pulled the curving plough : [You]3331-you turn [the savage warfare , born of the serpent ’s teeth]7049-the savage warfare , born of the serpent ’s teeth , against itself , and lull [the watcher , innocent of sleep]7050-the watcher , innocent of sleep ; [that guard deceived]7051-that guard deceived , bring golden spoil , to [the towns of [Greece]108-greece]7052-the towns of greece . Now [I]3342-she need the juice by which old age may be renewed , that can regain the prime of years , return the flower of youth , and [You]3331-you will grant it . Not in vain , stars glittered in reply : not in vain , winged dragons bring [[my]3342-she chariot]7053-my chariot , through the sky . ’[3342-she] There , sent from the sky , was [[her]3342-she chariot]6797-her chariot . When [she]3342-she had mounted , stroked the dragons ’ bridled necks , and shaken the light reins in [her]3342-she hands , [she]3342-she was snatched up on high . [She]3342-she looked down on [Thessalian Tempe]207-thessalian tempe far below , and sent [the dragons]7054-the dragons to [certain places that [she]3342-she knew]7055-certain places that she knew . [She]3342-she considered those herbs that grow on [Mount Ossa]208-mount ossa , those of [Mount Pelion]504-pelion , [Othrys]935-othrys and [Pindus]27-pindus , and [higher Olympus]12-olympus , and of those that pleased [her]3342-she , plucked [some by the roots , and cut others , with a curved pruning - knife of bronze]7056-some by the roots , and cut others , with a curved pruning - knife of bronze . Many [she]3342-she chose , as well , from [the banks of [the Apidanus]535-ancient apidanus]7057-the banks of the apidanus . [Many]1691-many [she]3342-she chose , as well , from [the Amphrysus]533-gentle amphrysus . Nor did [she]3342-she omit [the Enipeus]884-enipeus . [Peneus]521-peneus , and [[Spercheus]215-spercheus ’s waters]7059-spercheus ’s waters gave something , and [the reedy shores of [Boebe]216-boebe]7060-the reedy shores of boebe . And at [Anthedon]217-anthedon , by [Euboea]282-euboea , [she]3342-she picked a plant of long life , not yet famous for the change it made in [Glaucus]936-glaucus ’s body . Then [she]3342-she returned , after nine days and nine nights surveying [all the lands [she]3342-she had crossed]7061-all the lands she had crossed , from [[her]3342-she chariot]6797-her chariot , drawn by the winged dragons . The dragons had only smelt the herbs , yet [they]7063-they shed [their]7063-they skins of many years . Reaching [her]3342-she door and threshold , [she]3342-she stopped on the outside , and under the open sky , avoiding contact with [any man]7064-any man , [she]3342-she set up two altars of turf , one on the right to [Hecate]890-hecate , one on the left to [Youth]937-youth . [She]3342-she wreathed them with sacred boughs from the wildwood , then dug two trenches near by in [the earth]1463-the earth , and performed the sacrifice , plunging [her]3342-she knife into the throat of a black - fleeced sheep , and drenching the wide ditches with blood . [She]3342-she poured over it cups of pure honey , and again [she]3342-she poured over it cups of warm milk , uttering words as [she]3342-she did so , calling on the spirits of [the earth]1463-the earth , and begging [the shadowy king]7067-the shadowy king and [[his]7067-the shadowy king stolen bride]7068-his stolen bride , not to be too quick to steal life from [the old man]6107-the old man ’s limbs . When [she]3342-she had appeased [the gods]1538-the gods by prayer and murmured a while , [she]3342-she ordered [Aeson]928-aeson ’s exhausted body to be carried into the air , and freeing [him]928-aeson to deep sleep with [her]3342-she spells , [she]3342-she stretched [him]928-aeson out like a corpse on a bed of herbs . [She]3342-she ordered [Jason]924-jason , [[his]7067-the shadowy king son]1773-his son , to go far off , and [the attendants]7072-the attendants to go far off , and warned [them]7072-the attendants to keep profane eyes away from the mysteries . [They]7072-the attendants went as [she]3342-she had ordered . [Medea]927-medea , with streaming hair , circled the burning altars , like a Bacchante , and dipping many - branched torches into [the black ditches filled with blood]7073-the black ditches filled with blood , [she]3342-she lit them , once they were darkened , at the twin altars . Three times with fire , three times with water , three times with sulphur , [she]3342-she purified [the old man]6107-the old man . Meanwhile a potent mixture is heating in a bronze cauldron set on the flames , bubbling , and seething , white with turbulent froth . [She]3342-she boils there , roots dug from [a Thessalian valley]7075-a thessalian valley , seeds , flowerheads , and dark juices . [She]3342-she throws in precious stones searched for in [the distant east]7076-the distant east , and sands that the ebbing tide of [ocean]7077-ocean washes . [She]3342-she adds hoar - frost collected by night under the moon , the wings and flesh of a vile screech - owl , and the slavering foam of a sacrificed were - wolf , that can change its savage features to those of [a man]5897-a man . [She]3342-she does not forget the scaly skin of a thin Cinyphian water - snake , the liver of a long - lived stag , the eggs and the head of a crow that has lived for nine human life - times . With these , and a thousand other nameless things , [the barbarian witch]7079-the barbarian witch pursued [her]3342-she greater than mortal purpose . [She]3342-she stirred it all with a long - dry branch of a fruitful olive , mixing the depths with the surface . Look ! [The ancient staff]7080-the ancient staff turned in the hot cauldron , first grew green again , then in a short time sprouted leaves , and was , suddenly , heavily loaded with olives . And whenever the flames caused froth to spatter from the hollow bronze , and warm drops to fall on [the earth]1463-the earth , the soil blossomed , and flowers and soft grasses grew . As soon as [she]3342-she saw this , [Medea]927-medea unsheathed a knife , and cut [the old man]6107-the old man ’s throat , and letting the old blood out , filled the dry veins with the juice . When [Aeson]928-aeson had absorbed it , part through [his]928-aeson mouth , and part through the wound , the white of [his]928-aeson hair and beard quickly vanished , and a dark colour took its place . At a stroke [his]928-aeson leanness went , and [his]928-aeson pallor and dullness of mind . The deep hollows were filled with rounded flesh , and [his]928-aeson limbs expanded . [Aeson]928-aeson marvelled , recalling that this was [his]928-aeson self of forty years ago . [Bacchus]682-bacchus saw this wondrous miracle from [heaven ’s heights]7083-heaven ’s heights , and realising from it , that [the Nymphs of [Mount Nysa]681-mount nysa , who had nursed [him]928-aeson]681-mount nysa , could have [their]681-mount nysa youth restored , [he]928-aeson secured that gift from [the witch of [Colchis]200-colchis]7084-the witch of colchis . There was no end to [her]927-medea magic . [Phasian Medea]927-medea , pretending to a sham quarrel with [[her]927-medea husband]5872-her husband , fled as [a suppliant to [[Pelias]938-pelias ’s threshold]7087-pelias ’s threshold]7086-a suppliant to pelias ’s threshold , [he]7087-pelias ’s threshold who had usurped [Aeson]928-aeson ’s throne . There , [[the king]6572-the king ’s daughters]7089-the king ’s daughters received [her]927-medea , since [he]5872-her husband [himself]5872-her husband was weighed down by the years . [The lying Colchian]939-the lying colchian soon won [them]7089-the king ’s daughters over by a skilful show of friendship , and when [she]927-medea told [them]7089-the king ’s daughters of one of [her]927-medea greatest gifts , the removal of [Aeson]928-aeson ’s many years , and lingered over it , hope was aroused in [[Pelias]938-pelias ’s daughters]7090-pelias ’s daughters that similar magic arts might rejuvenate [[their]7090-pelias ’s daughters father]5800-their father . [They]7089-the king ’s daughters begged [her]927-medea , and told [her]927-medea to set a price however great . [She]927-medea was silent for a moment , and appeared to hesitate , keeping the minds of [[her]927-medea petitioners]7092-her petitioners in suspense by a show of solemn pretence . When , eventually , [she]927-medea promised to do it , [she]927-medea said ‘[3342-she] To give [you]3344-your greater confidence in [my]0-i gift , [[your]3344-your oldest ram]3345-your oldest ram , [the leader of [your]3344-your flocks]3346-the leader of your flocks , will by turned into [a young lamb]3347-a young lamb again , by [my]0-i magic drugs . ’ Straight away [the woolly creature , worn out by innumerable years]7093-the woolly creature , worn out by innumerable years , was dragged forward , [his]7093-the woolly creature , worn out by innumerable years horns curving round [his]7093-the woolly creature , worn out by innumerable years hollow temples . When [the witch]7094-the witch had cut [his]7093-the woolly creature , worn out by innumerable years wizened throat with [her]7094-the witch Thessalian knife , hardly staining the blade with blood , [she]7094-the witch immersed the sheep ’s carcass in the bronze cauldron , along with [her]7094-the witch powerful magic herbs . These shrank its limbs , melted away its horns , and , with its horns , the years . A high - pitched bleating came from inside [the vessel]7095-the vessel , and while [they]7092-her petitioners were wondering at the bleating , a lamb leapt out , and frisked away , seeking the udder and milk . [[Pelias]938-pelias ’s daughters]7090-pelias ’s daughters were stunned , and now the truth of [her]7094-the witch promise had been displayed , [they]7090-pelias ’s daughters insisted even more eagerly . Three times [Phoebus]519-phoebus had unyoked [[his]519-phoebus horses]1848-his horses , after [their]1848-his horses plunge into [the western ocean]7098-the western ocean , and on the fourth night the stars were glittering in all their radiance , when [the deceitful daughter of Aeetes]7099-the deceitful daughter of aeetes set clear water , and herbs , but ineffectual ones , over a blazing fire . And now [the king]6572-the king and [[his]6572-the king guards]7101-his guards also were deep in death - like sleep , achieved by [her]7094-the witch incantations and the power of [her]7094-the witch magic spells . [[The king]6572-the king ’s daughters]7089-the king ’s daughters , at [her]7094-the witch command , crossed the threshold , with [the Colchian witch]7104-the colchian witch , and stood around [his]6572-the king bed . ‘[3348-your] Why do [you]3348-your hesitate , so timidly ? ’ [she]7104-the colchian witch said . ‘[3348-your] Un - sheath [your]3348-your blades , and let out the old blood , so that [I]0-i can fill the empty veins with new ! [[Your]3348-your father]1808-your father ’s life and youth are in [your]3348-your hands . If [you]3348-your have any filial affection , if those are not vain hopes that stir [you]3348-your , render [[your]3348-your father]1808-your father this service , banish old age with [your]3348-your weapons , and drive out [his]1808-your father poisoned blood with a stroke of the iron blade ! ’ Urged on by these words , the more love [each]6651-each had for [him]6572-the king , the quicker [she]7104-the colchian witch was to act without love , and did evil , to avoid greater evil . Nevertheless [they]2264-daughters could not bear to see [their]2264-daughters own blows , and turned [their]2264-daughters eyes away , and with averted faces , wounded [him]6572-the king blindly with cruel hands . Streaming blood , [the old man]6107-the old man still raised [himself]6107-the old man on [his]6107-the old man elbow , and , though mutilated , tried to rise from [his]6107-the old man bed . Stretching [his]6107-the old man pallid hands out among the many weapons , [he]6107-the old man cried ‘[2264-daughters] [Daughters]2264-daughters , why are [you]2264-daughters doing this ? What has made [you]3348-your take up weapons against [[your]3348-your father]1808-your father ’s life ? ’ [Their]2264-daughters strength and courage vanished . But as [he]6107-the old man was about to utter more words , [the Colchian witch]7104-the colchian witch cut [his]6107-the old man throat , and plunged [his]6107-the old man torn body into the seething water . [She]7104-the colchian witch would not have escaped punishment had [she]7104-the colchian witch not taken to [the air]7108-the air , with [her]7104-the colchian witch winged dragons . Through the high sky , clockwise , [she]7104-the colchian witch fled , over [the shadowy slopes of [Pelion]504-pelion]7109-the shadowy slopes of pelion , [[Chiron]617-chiron ’s home]7110-chiron ’s home ; over [Othrys]935-othrys and the places made famous by the ancient fate of [Cerambus]220-cerambus , who , aided by [the nymphs and changed to a winged scarab beetle]7111-the nymphs and changed to a winged scarab beetle , lifted into the air , when [the all - powerful sea]7112-the all - powerful sea drowned [the solid earth]7113-the solid earth , and so escaped un - drowned from [Deucalion]516-deucalion ’s flood . [She]7104-the colchian witch passed [Aeolian Pitane]222-aeolian pitane on the left , with [its]222-aeolian pitane huge stone serpent image , and [[Ida]577-mount ida ’s grove]7114-ida ’s grove where [Liber]682-bacchus concealed , in the deceptive shape of a stag , the bullock stolen by [[his]220-cerambus son]1773-his son . [She]7104-the colchian witch passed [the place where [the father of Corythus]7117-the father of corythus , [Paris]1187-paris]7116-the place where the father of corythus , paris , lay , buried under a little sand ; and where [Hecuba]1183-hecuba , changed to a black bitch of Hecate , [Maera]940-maera , spread terror through [the fields]1522-the fields with [her]1183-hecuba strange barking . [She]7104-the colchian witch flew over [Astypalaea]225-astypalaea , [the city of Eurypylus]7119-the city of eurypylus , where [the women of [the island]7121-the island]7120-the women of the island , of [Cos]226-cos , acquired horns when [they]7120-the women of the island abused [Hercules]941-hercules , as [he]941-hercules and [[his]941-hercules company]7122-his company departed : over [Rhodes]227-rhodes , [beloved of [Phoebus]519-phoebus]7123-beloved of phoebus : and [the Telchines of]7124-the telchines of [[the city of [Ialysos]228-ialysos]7125-the city of ialysos on [Rhodes]227-rhodes , whose eyes corrupted everything [they]7124-the telchines of looked on , so that [Jupiter]499-jupiter , disgusted with [them]7124-the telchines of , sank [them]7124-the telchines of under [[his]499-jupiter brother]1593-his brother ’s ocean waves]7126-the city of ialysos on rhodes , whose eyes corrupted everything they looked on , so that jupiter , disgusted with them , sank them under his brother ’s ocean waves . [She]7128-she passed [the walls of ancient [Carthaea]229-carthaea , on [the island of [Ceos]230-ceos]7130-the island of ceos , where [Alcidamas]942-alcidamas , as [a father]5997-a father , would marvel , one day , that a peace - loving dove could spring from the body of [[his]942-alcidamas daughter]2098-his daughter , [Ctesylla]943-ctesylla]7129-the walls of ancient carthaea , on the island of ceos , where alcidamas , as a father , would marvel , one day , that a peace - loving dove could spring from the body of his daughter , ctesylla . Then [she]7128-she saw [Lake Hyrie]231-lake hyrie , and [Cycnean Tempe]232-cycnean tempe , made famous suddenly by a swan . There [Phylius]944-phylius , at [the boy [Cycnus]598-cycnus ’s command]7133-the boy cycnus ’s command , brought [him]942-alcidamas birds and a fierce lion [he]942-alcidamas had tamed . Ordered to overcome a wild bull as well , [he]942-alcidamas did overcome [him]942-alcidamas , but angry that [his]942-alcidamas love was rejected so often , [he]942-alcidamas refused to grant this last gift of a bull , when asked . [Cycnus]598-cycnus , angered , said ‘[3353-you] [You]3353-you will wish [you]3353-you had ’ and leapt from [a high cliff]7134-a high cliff . [All]5784-all thought [he]942-alcidamas had fallen , but changed to a swan [he]942-alcidamas beat through the air on white wings , though [[his]942-alcidamas mother]5953-his mother , [Hyrie]945-hyrie , not knowing [he]942-alcidamas was safe , pined away with weeping , and became [the lake that carries [her]5953-his mother name]7137-the lake that carries her name . Near there was [the city of]7138-the city of [Pleuron]233-pleuron , where [Combe]946-combe [the daughter of [Ophius]947-ophius]7139-the daughter of ophius , on flickering wings , escaped death at the hands of [[her]946-combe sons]1540-her sons , [the Aetolian Curetes]750-the curetes . And then [Medea]927-medea looked down at [the fields of [Calaurea]234-calaurea ’s isle]7141-the fields of calaurea ’s isle , sacred to [Leto]548-leto , whose king and [queen]6158-queen were also changed to birds . On [her]927-medea right was [Cyllene]14-cyllene , where [Menephron]948-menephron lay with [[his]948-menephron mother]5953-his mother , as though [he]948-menephron were a wild beast . Further on [she]927-medea sees [the Cephisus]7144-the cephisus , the river - god lamenting [[his]7144-the cephisus grandson]6475-his grandson ’s fate , changed by [Apollo]519-phoebus into a lumbering seal , and [the home of [Eumelus]949-eumelus]7146-the home of eumelus , mourning [[his]949-eumelus son]1773-his son [Botres]950-botres , reborn as a bird , the bee - eater , in the air . At last , the dragon ’s wings brought [her]927-medea to [Corinth]63-corinth , [the ancient Ephyre]7148-the ancient ephyre , and [its]63-corinth [Pirenian spring]7149-pirenian spring . Here , tradition says , that in earliest times , human bodies sprang from fungi , swollen by rain . After [[Jason]924-jason ’s new bride]7150-jason ’s new bride [Glauce]951-glauce had been consumed by the fires of vengeful Colchian witchcraft and both [the Isthmus]190-the isthmus ’s gulfs had witnessed flame consuming [[the king]6572-the king ’s palace]7152-the king ’s palace , [Medea]927-medea impiously bathed [her]927-medea sword in the blood of [[their]7153-their sons]7038-their sons . Then , after performing this evil act , [she]927-medea fled from [Jason]924-jason ’s wrath . Carried by [her]927-medea dragons that are born of [the Titans]953-the titans , [she]927-medea reached [[Pallas]610-pallas ’s citadel of [Athens]85-athens]7155-pallas ’s citadel of athens . This once knew [you]7156-you [Phene]954-phene , the most righteous , and [you]7156-you old Periphas , both flying in the air , as birds , the eagle and the osprey : and [Alcyone]955-alcyone , [granddaughter of [Polypemon]956-polypemon]7157-granddaughter of polypemon , resting on strange new wings . It was [Aegeus]957-aegeus who gave [Medea]927-medea sanctuary [there]1878-there , damned thereafter by that one action : and not content with taking [her]927-medea in , [he]957-aegeus even entered into a contract of marriage with [her]927-medea . Now [Theseus]958-theseus came to [Athens]85-athens , [[Aegeus]957-aegeus ’s son]7159-aegeus ’s son , but as yet unknown to [him]957-aegeus . [He]957-aegeus , by [his]957-aegeus courage , had brought peace to [the Isthmus between [the two gulfs]7161-the two gulfs]7160-the isthmus between the two gulfs . [Medea]927-medea , seeking [his]957-aegeus destruction , prepared a mixture of poisonous aconite , [she]927-medea had brought with [her]927-medea from [the coast of [Scythia]5-scythia]7162-the coast of scythia . This poison is said to have dripped from the teeth of [Cerberus]759-cerberus , the Echidnean dog . There is [a dark cavern with a gaping mouth]7163-a dark cavern with a gaping mouth , and a path into [the depths]2509-the depths , up which [Hercules]941-hercules , [hero of [Tiryns]777-aegina]7165-hero of tiryns , dragged the dog , tied with steel chains , resisting and twisting its eyes away from the daylight and the shining rays . [Cerberus]759-cerberus , provoked to a rabid frenzy , filled all the air with [his]759-cerberus simultaneous three - headed howling , and spattered [the green fields]7166-the green fields with white flecks of foam . These are supposed to have congealed and found food to multiply , gaining harmful strength from the rich soil . Because they are long - lived , springing from [the hard rock]7167-the hard rock , [the country people]7168-the country people call these shoots , of wolf - bane , ‘[7169-soil - less ’ aconites] [soil - less ’ aconites]7169-soil - less ’ aconites . Through [[his]957-aegeus wife]1633-his wife ’s cunning [Aegeus]957-aegeus , [the father]1852-the father , [himself]957-aegeus offered the poison to [[his]957-aegeus son]1773-his son , as if [he]1773-his son were [a stranger]2843-a stranger . [Theseus]958-theseus , unwittingly , had taken the cup [he]958-theseus was given in [his]958-theseus right hand , when [[his]1773-his son father]1775-his father recognised the emblems of [[his]957-aegeus own house]7175-his own house , on the ivory hilt of [[his]957-aegeus son]1773-his son ’s sword , and knocked the evil drink away from [his]957-aegeus mouth . But [she]1633-his wife escaped death , in a dark mist , raised by [her]1633-his wife incantations . Though [the father]1852-the father was overjoyed that [[his]957-aegeus son]1773-his son was unharmed , [he]957-aegeus was still horrified that so great a crime could have come so close to success . [He]957-aegeus lit fires on the altars , and heaped gifts for [the gods]1538-the gods . [His]957-aegeus axes struck the mountainous necks of [oxen]7180-oxen , [their]7180-oxen horns tied with the sacrificial ribbons . [They]7181-they say that was the happiest day that dawned in [the city of Erectheus]7182-the city of erectheus . [The statesmen]7183-the statesmen celebrated among [the people]5829-the people , and [they]7183-the statesmen sang verses , made even more inspired by the wine . ‘[958-theseus] [Great Theseus]958-theseus , admired in [Marathon]236-marathon , for the blood of the Cretan bull , [your]3354-your act and gift made [[Cromyon]959-cromyon ’s fields]3355-cromyon ’s fields safe for [the farmers]1591-the farmers plough . [[Epidaurus]960-epidaurus ’s land]3357-epidaurus ’s land saw [you]3354-your defeat [[Vulcan]568-vulcan ’s club - wielding son]3358-vulcan ’s club - wielding son , and [the banks of [the River Cephisus]237-the river cephisus]3359-the banks of the river cephisus saw evil Procrustes brought down . [Eleusis]161-eleusis , sacred to [Ceres]689-ceres [the Mother]2342-the mother , witnessed [Cercyon]961-cercyon ’s fall : [Sinis]962-sinis , [you]3354-your killed , [a man of great strength twisted to evil art , who could bend pine - tree trunks to the earth]3361-a man of great strength twisted to evil art , who could bend pine - tree trunks to the earth , and tear [men]5788-men ’s bodies apart : and [Sciron]963-sciron is done for , and [safe paths]3363-safe paths reach [[Megara]964-megara ’s Lelegeïan wall]3364-megara ’s lelegeïan wall : though [the ocean]1657-the ocean denied [his]963-sciron bones a grave , and [the land]1465-the land denied the same , till , long - time hurled , they hardened to cliffs , and the cliffs bear [Sciron]963-sciron ’s name . If [we]3367-our wanted to count [your]3354-your years and [your]3354-your honours , the deeds would exceed the years : to [you]3354-your , [the bravest]3368-the bravest , [we]3367-our empty [our]3367-our wine - cups , and offer [our]3367-our public prayers . ’ [The palace]6417-the palace echoed to [the people]5829-the people ’s applause and the prayers of [friends]6150-friends , and there was no sad place in [the whole city]7188-the whole city . Nevertheless [Aegeus]957-aegeus ’s pleasure in receiving [[his]957-aegeus son]1773-his son was not carefree ( indeed , joy is never complete , and some trouble always comes to spoil [our]3367-our delight ) . [Minos]965-minos , of [Crete]88-crete , was preparing for war . Powerful in [men]5788-men and [ships]2461-ships , [his]965-minos anger as [a father]5997-a father was more powerful still , and by right of arms [he]965-minos was seeking to avenge the death of [Androgeos]966-androgeos , [[his]957-aegeus son]1773-his son . But first [he]965-minos acquired [allies]3109-allies for [his]965-minos war , crossing [the sea]1464-the sea in [the swift fleet that was [his]965-minos strength]7196-the swift fleet that was his strength . [The island of [Anaphe]967-anaphe]7197-the island of anaphe joined with [him]965-minos , and that of [Astypalaea]225-astypalaea ( [Anaphe]967-anaphe by promises , [Astypalaea]225-astypalaea by Cretan supremacy in war ) ; low - lying [Myconos]239-myconos , and [chalky - soiled [Cimolos]240-cimolos]7198-chalky - soiled cimolos ; [Syros]241-syros flowering with thyme , flat [Seriphos]134-seriphos , [marble - cliffed [Paros]243-paros]7199-marble - cliffed paros , and [Siphnos]968-siphnos , betrayed to [him]965-minos by [that disloyal princess]7200-that disloyal princess , [Arne]969-arne , whom , when [she]969-arne had taken the gold [her]969-arne greed demanded , [the gods]1538-the gods changed into a bird , the black - footed , black - winged jackdaw , that still delights in gold . But [Oliaros]244-oliaros gave no aid to [the Cretan ships]7202-the cretan ships ; nor [Didyme]970-didyme , [Tenos]245-tenos , [Andros]246-andros , [Gyaros]247-gyaros ; nor [Peparethos]971-peparethos rich in bright olives . Sailing [northwest Minos]965-minos sought [Oenopia]249-oenopia , [the kingdom of [the Aeacidae]250-the aeacidae]7203-the kingdom of the aeacidae . [They]7204-they called [it]249-oenopia [Oenopia]249-oenopia in ancient times , but [Aeacus]972-aeacus [himself]972-aeacus named [it]249-oenopia [Aegina]777-aegina after [[his]972-aeacus mother]5953-his mother . [The crowd]2430-the crowd rushed down , to meet [Minos]965-minos , wanting to see so famous [a man]5897-a man . [Telamon]973-telamon went to [him]965-minos , and [Peleus]974-peleus , [junior to [Telamon]973-telamon]7208-junior to telamon , and [Phocus]975-phocus , [the third child]7209-the third child , [[their]7204-they half - brother]7210-their half - brother . [Aeacus]972-aeacus [himself]972-aeacus came , also , slow with the burden of years , and asked the cause of [his]965-minos visit . [The ruler of [a hundred cities]7212-a hundred cities]7211-the ruler of a hundred cities sighed , reminded of [his]0-i grief for [[his]0-i son]1773-his son , and replied ‘[0-i] [I]0-i beg [your]3369-your aid in a war , waged for [[my]0-i son]5963-my son ’s sake ; to be part of a just fight : [I]0-i ask the comfort of marking out [[his]5963-my son tomb]6047-his tomb . ’ [The grandson of [Asopus]777-aegina]7214-the grandson of asopus said ‘[3369-your] [You]3369-your ask in vain what [[my]0-i city]3372-my city can not give . [No city]3373-no city is more closely linked to [Athens]85-athens , [city of Cecrops]3374-city of cecrops , than this ; [we]3375-we and [they]3376-they are bound by treaty . ’ [Minos]965-minos turned away , sadly , saying ‘[3369-your] [Your]3369-your treaty will cost [you]3369-your dear ’ , since [he]965-minos thought it more useful to threaten war than to fight , and consume [his]965-minos strength too soon . [The Cretan fleet]7215-the cretan fleet could still be seen from [[Aegina]777-aegina ’s walls]7216-aegina ’s walls , when [a ship]1871-a ship from [Athens]85-athens arrived , under full sail , and entered [the allied port]7218-the allied port , bearing [Cephalus]918-cephalus , and likewise greetings from [[his]965-minos country]6809-his country . Though [they]3376-they had not seen [him]965-minos for a long time , [the sons of [Aeacus]972-aeacus]7220-the sons of aeacus still knew [him]965-minos , and clasped [his]965-minos right hand , and led [him]965-minos to [[[their]7220-the sons of aeacus father]5800-their father ’s house]7222-their father ’s house .
