[The hero]2234-the hero went forward , observed on all sides , even now retaining traces of [his]965-minos former beauty , carrying a branch of [[his]965-minos country]6809-his country ’s olive . And to right and left , [he]965-minos , [the elder]7225-the elder , had [two younger men]7226-two younger men , [Clytos]976-clytos and [Butes]977-butes , [the sons of [Pallas]610-pallas]7227-the sons of pallas . After meeting and exchanging a few words , [Cephalus]918-cephalus described [his]965-minos mandate from [Athens]85-athens , asking for help and quoting the treaty sworn to by [[their]3377-their ancestors]7228-their ancestors , adding that [Minos]965-minos was out to control all [Achaia]139-achaia . When [he]965-minos had invoked the treaty , in this way , to aid [his]965-minos cause , [Aeacus]972-aeacus , resting [his]972-aeacus left hand on the handle of [his]972-aeacus sceptre , replied ‘[3369-your] Do n’t ask for [our]3377-their help , assume it . Do n’t hesitate to reckon the forces of [this island]3378-this island [your]3379-your own , and ( let this state of [my]0-i fortunes last ! ) energy is not lacking . [I]0-i have [men]5788-men enough , and thank [the gods]1538-the gods , the moment is auspicious and there will be no excuses . ’ ‘[0-i] [I]0-i wish it may always be so ’ [Cephalus]918-cephalus said ‘[5788-men] and may [[your]3379-your city]6143-your city swell its numbers . Indeed , as [I]0-i came [I]0-i felt happy : [so many equally youthful , handsome people]3383-so many equally youthful , handsome people , meeting [me]0-i on the way . Yet there were many [I]0-i missed , that [I]0-i saw before , when [I]0-i visited [the city]2547-the city . ’ [Aeacus]972-aeacus sighed , and spoke sadly . ‘[0-i] From a bad beginning , better fortune follows . [I]0-i wish [I]0-i could recall the one for [you]3379-your without the other ! [I]0-i ’ll take them in order , now , and not stall [you]3379-your with irrelevances . Those [your]3379-your mind , remembering , misses are only bones and ashes , and how great a part of [my]0-i wealth perished with them ! A terrible plague afflicted [the people]5829-the people through the unjust anger of [Juno]525-juno , detesting [us]3386-us because [[our]3386-us island]3387-our island had been named after [[my]0-i mother]2965-my mother , [[her]525-juno rival]1752-her rival . While it looked like a human disease , and the cause of the disastrous epidemic was hidden , [we]3386-us fought it with medical skill . But the destruction cancelled out [our]3386-us efforts , which waned as [we]3386-us were conquered . At the outset the sky shrouded [the earth]1463-the earth in a thick fog , and held the sultry heat under clouds . While [Luna]934-luna filled [her]934-luna horns four times to make [her]934-luna disc complete , and four times thinned [her]934-luna full disc away , hot southerly winds breathed [their]3391-their deadly air on [us]3386-us . [We]3386-us know the pestilence reached [[our]3386-us lakes]3392-our lakes and [streams]1965-streams . Thousands of snakes slithered through [the empty fields]3394-the empty fields , and fouled the waters with their slime . The unexpected power of the disease surprised [us]3386-us , at the first , with its destruction of dogs , sheep and cattle , wild animals and birds . [The wretched ploughman]3395-the wretched ploughman watches in dismay as sturdy oxen stumble in [their]3396-their task , and sink down onto the furrows . The flocks of sheep give out a sickly bleating , while the wool falls away of itself , and [their]3397-their bodies waste . The spirited horse , once famous on the track , loses [his]3398-his glory , and forgetting past honour , whinnies in [his]3398-his stall , dying a slow death . The wild boar no longer remembers [his]3398-his fury ; the deer can not trust to speed ; the bears can not match the strength of the herds . Lethargy grips [them]3399-them all . Decaying carcasses lie in [the roadways]3400-the roadways , [fields]6613-fields and [woods]1827-woods , and the air is fouled with the stench . Strangely , dogs , carrion birds , and grey wolves , will not touch [them]3399-them . [They]3399-them rot on the ground , pollute the air with [their]3399-them dying breath , and spread contagion far and wide . Increasing in virulence the pestilence spreads to [the luckless farmers [themselves]3403-the luckless farmers themselves]3403-the luckless farmers themselves , and takes lordship inside the city walls . Firstly the inner organs grow hot , and a flushed skin and feverish breath are symptoms of hidden warmth . The tongue is rough and swollen with heat : the lips are parted , parched with dry breath , and gasping suck in the heavy air . [The sick]3404-the sick can not tolerate a bed or any kind of covering , but lie face down on [the bare ground]3405-the bare ground , though the earth does not cool [their]3404-the sick bodies , [their]3404-the sick bodies heat [the earth]1463-the earth . [No one]1640-no one can control it , and it breaks out fiercely among [the doctors]3408-the doctors [themselves]3408-the doctors , and the practice of [their]3408-the doctors skill condemns [the practitioners]3409-the practitioners . [The nearer people]3410-the nearer people are to [the sick]3404-the sick , and the more selflessly [they]3410-the nearer people attend [them]3410-the nearer people , the more swiftly [they]3410-the nearer people meet [their]3410-the nearer people fate , and as the hope of recovery deserts [them]3410-the nearer people , and [they]3410-the nearer people see the end of [their]3410-the nearer people illness only in death , [they]3410-the nearer people give way to [their]3410-the nearer people desires , and ignore what is good for [them]3410-the nearer people , since nothing is any good . Everywhere [they]3410-the nearer people cling to the fountains and runnels and [deep wells]3412-deep wells , and drinking , thirst is not quenched sooner than life . [Many of [them]3410-the nearer people]3413-many of them are too weak to stand , and even die in the water , yet [others]5836-others still draw it . [Others]5836-others loathe [their]3410-the nearer people hateful beds so much [they]5836-others leave [them]3410-the nearer people , and if [they]3410-the nearer people lack the strength to stand , [they]3410-the nearer people roll out onto the ground . [They]3410-the nearer people quit [[their]3410-the nearer people household gods]3416-their household gods since [[their]3410-the nearer people house]6459-their house seems fatal to [them]3410-the nearer people , and , because the cause is unknown , [the building itself]3418-the building itself is blamed . [You]3419-you see [them]3410-the nearer people , half - dead , wandering [the streets]6873-the streets , while [they]3410-the nearer people can still stay on [their]3410-the nearer people feet , [others]5836-others lying on the ground weeping , turning [their]5836-others exhausted gaze upwards in [their]5836-others dying efforts , and stretching [their]5836-others arms out to the stars in the overhanging sky , breathing [their]5836-others last , here or there , wherever death has overtaken [them]5836-others . What were [my]0-i feelings then ? What could [they]3422-they be , but to hate life , and to wish to be with [[my]0-i people]2750-my people ? Wherever [I]0-i looked as [I]0-i turned [my]0-i gaze , there were layers of dead , like rotten apples fallen from shaken branches , or acorns from a windblown ilex . See [that temple opposite on [the hill]3425-the hill with a flight of steps up to [it]3424-that temple opposite on the hill with a flight of steps up to it]3424-that temple opposite on the hill with a flight of steps up to it ? [It]3424-that temple opposite on the hill with a flight of steps up to it is [Jupiter]499-jupiter ’s . Who among [us]3426-us did not bring useless offerings to [those shrines]3427-those shrines ? How often [a husband]3428-a husband while still praying for [[his]3428-a husband wife]1633-his wife , or [a father]5997-a father still praying for [[his]5997-a father son]1773-his son , ended [his]5997-a father life in front of those implacable altars , part of the unused incense found in [their]3432-their hands ! How often [the sacrificial bulls]3433-the sacrificial bulls fell down , without waiting for the blow , while [the priest]6252-the priest was praying and pouring unmixed wine between the horns . Even when [I]0-i was sacrificing to [Jove]605-jove , for [myself]0-i [[my]0-i country]2452-my country and [[my]0-i three sons]3436-my three sons , [the victim]2127-the victim let out a dreadful moan , and suddenly collapsed without a stroke from [my]0-i blade , barely staining the knives below with its blood . The diseased entrails showed no marks , from which to read the prophetic truths , and warnings , of [the gods]1538-the gods . That offensive morbidity penetrated to [their]3432-their vital organs . [I]0-i have seen [corpses thrown down in front of the temple doors]3439-corpses thrown down in front of the temple doors , in front of the altars , to make [their]3432-their deaths even more of a reproach . [Some]3440-some cut off [their]3440-some breath with a noose , and banished , by death , [their]3440-some fear of death , summoning [their]3440-some approaching fate from the beyond . The bodies of the dead were not given the usual rites ( the exit gates from [the city]2547-the city could not cope with so many funerals ) . [They]3442-they either lay on the ground unburied , or were given to [the heaped pyres]3443-the heaped pyres without ceremony . And now there was no reverence left : [the people]5829-the people struggled to the pyres , and were consumed by [others]5836-others ’ flames . There was [no one left to mourn]7229-no one left to mourn , and the spirits of [parents]3118-parents and [children , of young and old]7231-children , of young and old were left to wander , unwept . There was no space in [the burial mounds]7232-the burial mounds , and not enough wood for the fires . ’[0-i] Stunned by such a storm of dark events , [I]0-i said ‘ O [Jupiter]499-jupiter , if [they]3432-their do not lie when [they]3432-their say that [you]499-jupiter were held in [Aegina]777-aegina ’s embrace , [she]777-aegina , [the daughter of [Asopus]777-aegina]7233-the daughter of asopus , and if [you]499-jupiter are not ashamed , [mighty father]7234-mighty father , to have fathered [me]0-i , give [me]0-i back [[my]0-i people]2750-my people or bury [me]0-i too in [[their]2750-my people tomb]7236-their tomb . ’[0-i] [He]3446-he gave [me]0-i a flash of lightning as a sign , and thunder followed . [I]0-i said ‘ [I]0-i interpret this to be an omen , and that [you]499-jupiter give [me]0-i it as a pledge , and may these accordingly be auspicious tokens of [your]499-jupiter purpose . ’[0-i] There happened to be an oak - tree nearby , with open spreading branches , seeded from [Dodona]253-dodona , and sacred to [Jove]605-jove . [I]0-i noticed a long train of food - gathering ants , carrying vast loads in [their]3447-their tiny mouths , and forging [their]3447-their own way over its corrugated bark . Admiring [their]3447-their numbers , [I]0-i said ‘ Best of [fathers]6052-fathers , give [me]0-i as many [citizens]7238-citizens as this and fill [the city]2547-the city ’s empty walls . ’[0-i] The tall oak - tree quivered , and its branches filled with sound , without a wind . [I]0-i shivered , [my]0-i limbs quaking with fear , and [my]0-i hair stood on end . Though [I]0-i kissed the oak - tree and [the earth]1463-the earth , not acknowledging [my]0-i hopes , yet [I]0-i did hope , and cherished [my]0-i longings in [my]0-i heart . Night fell , and sleep claimed [my]0-i care - worn body . The same oak - tree was there before [my]0-i eyes , with the same branches , and the same insects on its branches , and it shook with a similar motion , and seemed to scatter its column of grain - bearers onto the ground below . Suddenly [they]3447-their seemed to grow larger and larger , and raise [themselves]3447-their from the soil , and stand erect , [they]3447-their lost [their]3447-their leanness , many feet , and [their]3447-their black colouration , and [their]3447-their limbs took on human form . Sleep vanished . Awake again , [I]0-i dismissed [my]0-i dream , bemoaning the lack of help from [the gods]1538-the gods . But there was a great murmuring in [the palace]6417-the palace , and [I]0-i thought [I]0-i heard human voices , those [I]0-i was now unaccustomed to . While [I]0-i suspected that it was an effect of sleep , [Telamon]973-telamon came running and throwing open the door , shouted ‘ [Father]5922-father , come out and see , something greater than [you]5922-father could hope or believe . Come now ! ’[973-telamon] [I]0-i went , and saw [such men as [I]0-i had seen in sleep ’s imagining]3451-such men as i had seen in sleep ’s imagining , in ranks such as [I]0-i recognised and knew . [They]3451-such men as i had seen in sleep ’s imagining approached and saluted [me]0-i as [king]5915-king . [I]0-i fulfilled [my]0-i prayer to [Jove]605-jove , and divided [the city]2547-the city amongst [this new people]3454-this new people , along with [[the lost farmers]3455-the lost farmers ’ empty fields]7241-the lost farmers ’ empty fields . [I]0-i called [them]3451-such men as i had seen in sleep ’s imagining [Myrmidons]978-myrmidons , a name that did not belie [each one]2489-each one ’s origin as an ant , μύρμηξ . [You]7243-you have seen [their]3451-such men as i had seen in sleep ’s imagining bodies : [they]3451-such men as i had seen in sleep ’s imagining still retain the habits [they]3451-such men as i had seen in sleep ’s imagining had before , [a thrifty , hard - working people]7244-a thrifty , hard - working people , tenacious of achievement , and keeping what [they]3451-such men as i had seen in sleep ’s imagining achieve . [These men fresh in years and spirit]7245-these men fresh in years and spirit , will follow [you]7243-you to war , as soon as that favourable east wind that brought [you]7243-you here ’[0-i] ( it was indeed an easterly that had brought [him]605-jove ) ‘ has swung round to the south . ’[3454-this new people] [They]3454-this new people filled a long day with this and other talk : the last of the light was given over to feasting , and night to sleep . The sun shone gold again , but an east wind was still blowing , and kept the sails from the homeward voyage . [The sons of [Pallas]610-pallas]7227-the sons of pallas joined [Cephalus]918-cephalus , [[their]7227-the sons of pallas senior]3457-their senior , and [Cephalus]918-cephalus and [the princes]3090-the princes then went to [the king]6572-the king : but [the king]6572-the king was still in a deep sleep . [Phocus]975-phocus , [[Aeacus]972-aeacus ’s son]3461-aeacus ’s son , received [them]3454-this new people at the threshold , since [Telamon]973-telamon and [[his]973-telamon brother]1593-his brother were selecting [men]5788-men for the war . [Phocus]975-phocus led [the Athenians]3464-the athenians into [an inner walk]3465-an inner walk , beautiful and secluded , where [they]3454-this new people sat down together , and noticed that [the grandson of [Aeolus]511-aeolus]3466-the grandson of aeolus carried a spear in [his]3466-the grandson of aeolus hand , tipped with gold , and made of an unknown wood . In the midst of [their]3454-this new people first short conversation , [he]3466-the grandson of aeolus said ‘ [I]3466-the grandson of aeolus am knowledgeable about woodland , and hunting wild animals , but [I]3466-the grandson of aeolus have been wondering for a while what tree that shaft was cut from . If it were ash it would be deep yellow , and if it were [cornelian]7246-cornelian cherry it would be knotted . What it is [I]3466-the grandson of aeolus am ignorant of , but [my]3466-the grandson of aeolus eyes have never seen one more beautifully formed for throwing . ’[3466-the grandson of aeolus] [One of [the Athenian brothers]3468-the athenian brothers]3467-one of the athenian brothers replied ‘ [You]7247-you will marvel at its usefulness more than at its looks . It hits whatever it is aimed at : there is no chance involved , and then it flies back , bloodied , without needing to be retrieved . ’[3467-one of the athenian brothers] Then truly [the son of [the Nereid]979-nereid]3469-the son of the nereid wanted to know everything : why this was so , where it came from , and who gave such a wondrous gift . What [he]3469-the son of the nereid wanted to know , [Cephalus]918-cephalus told [him]3469-the son of the nereid , but was still ashamed to say what a high price it had cost [him]3469-the son of the nereid . [He]3469-the son of the nereid was silent , and touched with sadness for [[his]3469-the son of the nereid lost wife]3470-his lost wife , tears welling in [his]3469-the son of the nereid eyes , [he]3469-the son of the nereid uttered these words . ‘ [Son of [the goddess]5864-the goddess]7248-son of the goddess , this weapon makes [me]3469-the son of the nereid weep ( who would believe that ? ) and it will for many years if the fates grant [me]3469-the son of the nereid them . This weapon did for [[my]3469-the son of the nereid dear wife]7250-my dear wife and [me]3469-the son of the nereid . [I]3469-the son of the nereid wish that [I]3469-the son of the nereid had always been without it ! [She]7251-she was [Procris]917-procris , or if [Orithyia]919-orithyia ’s name has chanced to fill [your]7252-your ears more loudly , [the sister of that Orithyia whom [Boreas]497-boreas stole , though if [you]7252-your were to compare [the two]2580-the two in looks and manner , [Procris]917-procris was more worth stealing]7253-the sister of that orithyia whom boreas stole , though if you were to compare the two in looks and manner , procris was more worth stealing ! [[Her]917-procris father]1694-her father [Erechtheus]980-erechtheus brought [us]3471-our together in marriage , and love brought [us]3471-our together too . [I]3469-the son of the nereid was called happy , and [I]3469-the son of the nereid was . But [the gods]1538-the gods ’[3469-the son of the nereid] vision of the future was otherwise , or perhaps things would still be so . The second month after [our]3471-our marriage , [I]0-i was setting out nets to trap antlered deer , when [golden Aurora]569-aurora , chasing away the shadows , saw [me]0-i from [the summit of [Mount Hymettus]254-mount hymettus]3472-the summit of mount hymettus , that is always bright with flowers , and took [me]0-i away against [my]0-i will . By the grace of [the goddess]5864-the goddess [I]0-i can repeat the truth : though [her]5864-the goddess face has the blush of roses , though [she]5864-the goddess keeps the borderland of light and night , though [she]5864-the goddess drinks the dewy nectar , [I]0-i was in love with [Procris]917-procris . [Procris]917-procris was in [my]0-i heart : [Procris]917-procris was always on [my]0-i lips . [I]0-i kept talking about the sacred marriage bed , and the newness of [our]3471-our union , the recent wedding , and the prior claim of [[our]3471-our deserted couch]3474-our deserted couch . [The goddess]5864-the goddess was angered and said “ Stop complaining , [ungrateful man]3476-ungrateful man : have [your]3476-ungrateful man Procris ! But if [my]0-i vision is far - sighted , [you]3476-ungrateful man will wish [you]3476-ungrateful man had never had [her]917-procris . ” In a fury , [she]5864-the goddess sent [me]0-i back to [her]5864-the goddess . As [I]0-i was returning , reconsidering [the goddess]5864-the goddess ’s words , [I]0-i began to fear lest [[my]0-i wife]6055-my wife had not been faithful to [our]3471-our marriage vows . [Her]6055-my wife youth and beauty prompted thoughts of adultery , but [her]6055-my wife character forbade those thoughts . But [I]0-i had been away a while , and [she]6055-my wife from whom [I]0-i was returning was [herself]6055-my wife an example of the fault , and [lovers]2543-lovers fear the worst . [I]0-i decided to try what might grieve [me]0-i , testing [her]6055-my wife chaste loyalty with gifts . [Aurora]569-aurora supported [my]0-i fears , and [she]569-aurora changed [my]0-i appearance ( [I]0-i felt it happening ) . Unrecognisable , [I]0-i went back to [Athens]85-athens , [city of Pallas]3480-city of pallas , and entered [[my]0-i house]3481-my house . [The house itself]3482-the house itself was irreproachable , gave every sign of innocence , and was only anxious for [[its]3482-the house itself vanished master]3483-its vanished master . With difficulty , by a thousand stratagems , [I]0-i gained access to [[Erechtheus]980-erechtheus ’s daughter]3484-erechtheus ’s daughter . When [I]0-i saw [her]3484-erechtheus ’s daughter [I]0-i was rooted to the spot , and almost relinquished [my]0-i thoughts of testing [her]3484-erechtheus ’s daughter loyalty . Indeed [I]0-i could hardly keep from confessing the truth , and hardly keep from kissing [her]3484-erechtheus ’s daughter , as [I]0-i ought . [She]3484-erechtheus ’s daughter was sad ( but [no one]1640-no one could be more lovely than [her]3484-erechtheus ’s daughter in [her]3484-erechtheus ’s daughter sadness ) . [She]3484-erechtheus ’s daughter grieved with longing for [the husband who had been snatched away]3486-the husband who had been snatched away . [Phocus]975-phocus , [she]3484-erechtheus ’s daughter was [Beauty , whom Grief itself so befits]3487-beauty , whom grief itself so befits ! Why should [I]0-i tell how many times [her]3484-erechtheus ’s daughter chaste nature repelled [my]0-i advances ? All those many times [she]3484-erechtheus ’s daughter said “ [I]0-i hold [myself]0-i , in trust , for [one man]1607-one man only : wherever [he]1607-one man is , [I]0-i keep what [I]0-i can give , in trust , for [that one man]3489-that one man . ” For whom , in [his]1607-one man senses , was that not a great enough trial of loyalty ? But [I]0-i was not satisfied , and struggled on , wounding [myself]0-i , until by promising to give a fortune for just one night with [her]3484-erechtheus ’s daughter , and then increasing the offer , [I]0-i forced [her]3484-erechtheus ’s daughter to hesitate . Wrongly victorious , [I]0-i cried out “ [I]0-i am [no adulterer]3490-no adulterer , [wicked one]3491-wicked one ! [I]0-i am [[your]3484-erechtheus ’s daughter true husband]3492-your true husband ! [You]3484-erechtheus ’s daughter have [me]0-i for [a witness]3493-a witness , [[you]3484-erechtheus ’s daughter traitress]3494-you traitress ! ” [She]3484-erechtheus ’s daughter said not a word . Silent with overwhelming shame , [she]3484-erechtheus ’s daughter fled from the treacherous threshold , and [[her]3484-erechtheus ’s daughter evil husband]3495-her evil husband . Deeply hurt by [me]0-i , and hating [the whole race of men]3496-the whole race of men , [she]3484-erechtheus ’s daughter wandered [the mountains]1513-the mountains , following the ways of [Diana]527-diana . Then , deserted , a more violent flame burned in [my]0-i bones . [I]0-i begged [her]3484-erechtheus ’s daughter forgiveness , and confessed [I]0-i had sinned , and that [I]0-i too might have succumbed to the same fault , given the offer , if such gifts were offered to [me]0-i . When [I]0-i had owned to this , and after [she]3484-erechtheus ’s daughter had first taken revenge for [her]3484-erechtheus ’s daughter wounded honour , [she]3484-erechtheus ’s daughter returned to [me]0-i , and [we]3498-we lived out sweet years in harmony . Moreover , as though [she]3484-erechtheus ’s daughter in yielding [herself]3484-erechtheus ’s daughter gave only a small prize , [she]3484-erechtheus ’s daughter gave [me]0-i a hound as a gift , that [[her]3484-erechtheus ’s daughter own goddess]3499-her own goddess [Cynthia]981-cynthia had entrusted to [her]3484-erechtheus ’s daughter , saying “ [he]3500-he will surpass all other dogs for speed . ” [She]3484-erechtheus ’s daughter gave [me]0-i a spear , likewise , the one , [you]3501-you see , [I]0-i have in [my]0-i hands . Do [you]3501-you want to know the fate of the other gift ? Listen to something marvellous : [you]3501-you will be stirred by the strangeness of the thing ! ’ ‘[982-oedipus] [Oedipus]982-oedipus , [son of Laïus]3502-son of laïus , had solved with [his]982-oedipus genius the riddles whose meaning was previously not understood , and [the Sphinx , dark prophetess]3503-the sphinx , dark prophetess , had hurtled headlong from [the cliff]6441-the cliff , [her]3503-the sphinx , dark prophetess enigmatic words forgotten . Immediately [Aonian Thebes]89-thebes was plagued again ( since [righteous Themis]780-themis does not leave such things unpunished ! ) and [many country people]3505-many country people feared that [the Teumessian vixen]3506-the teumessian vixen would destroy [their]3505-many country people flocks and [themselves]3505-many country people . [The young men of the neighbourhood]3507-the young men of the neighbourhood came , and [we]3508-we beat over [the wide fields]2106-the wide fields . [That swift creature]3510-that swift creature leapt lightly over the nets , and cleared the tops of the traps [we]3508-we had set . Then [we]3508-we slipped [our]3508-we hounds from the tether , but [she]3510-that swift creature escaped [their]3507-the young men of the neighbourhood pursuit , and , travelling no slower than a bird flies , mocked the pack . With one great shout [the hunters]2024-the hunters called on [me]0-i to loose [Laelaps]983-laelaps , ‘ [Hurricane]984-hurricane ’[2024-the hunters] ( the name of [[my]0-i wife]6055-my wife ’s gift ) . [He]983-laelaps had long been struggling to free [himself]983-laelaps from [his]983-laelaps leash , and straining [his]983-laelaps neck against the restraint . [He]983-laelaps had scarcely been released properly before [we]3508-we lost sight of [him]983-laelaps . The hot dust showed the print of [his]983-laelaps paws , but [he]983-laelaps had vanished from sight . No javelin was quicker than [him]983-laelaps , no lead shot from a whirled sling , no light arrow shot from a Cretan bow . There was [an intervening hill whose summit overlooked [the surrounding fields]3514-the surrounding fields]3513-an intervening hill whose summit overlooked the surrounding fields . [I]0-i climbed [it]3513-an intervening hill whose summit overlooked the surrounding fields , and watched the spectacle of this strange race , where the quarry seemed to be caught , and then to escape its fate . Nor does the cunning animal run in a straight course in the open , but it eludes the pursuing muzzle and swings back in a circle , so its enemy can not charge . The hound presses hard , and matches its pace , seems to grip it , and does not grip it , and worries at the air with its empty snapping . [I]0-i turned to [my]0-i spear for help . While [I]0-i was balancing it in [my]0-i right hand , while [I]0-i was trying to fit [my]0-i fingers into the throwing strap , [I]0-i turned [my]0-i eyes away . When [I]0-i turned them back to the same place , [I]0-i saw ( a marvel ) two shapes of marble in the middle of [the plain]3515-the plain . One [you]3516-you would think to be fleeing , the other pursuing . Assuredly , if [a god]1461-a god was with [them]3518-them , [that god]3519-that god must have willed that both should be unconquered in the race , ’ [He]972-aeacus got so far in [his]972-aeacus story , and was silent . ‘[1461-a god] What crime has the spear committed ? ’ said [Phocus]975-phocus . And [Cephalus]918-cephalus recounted its crime . ‘[975-phocus] [Phocus]975-phocus , [my]0-i happiness was the beginning of [my]0-i sorrow , and [I]0-i will speak of happiness first . [Son of [Aeacus]972-aeacus]3520-son of aeacus , what a joy it is to remember that blessed time , when , in those early years , [I]0-i was delighted , and rightly so , with [[my]0-i wife]6055-my wife , and [she]6055-my wife was delighted with [[her]6055-my wife husband]5872-her husband . [We]3523-we two had mutual cares , and a shared love . [She]6055-my wife would not have preferred [[Jupiter]499-jupiter ’s bed]3524-jupiter ’s bed to [my]0-i love , and [no woman]1641-no woman could have captured [me]0-i , not if [Venus]523-venus [herself]523-venus had come [there]1878-there . An equal flame burnt in [our]3523-we hearts . Just after dawn , when the first rays struck [the hilltops]3527-the hilltops , full of youthfulness , [I]0-i used to go hunting in [the woods]1690-the woods . [I]0-i used to take [no servants]3529-no servants , or horses , or keen - scented hounds , or knotted snares . [I]0-i trusted in [my]0-i spear . But when [my]0-i right hand was sated with the slaughter of wild creatures , [I]0-i would return to the cool of the shade , and the breeze , aura , out of the chill valleys . [I]0-i courted the breeze , gentle to [me]0-i , in the midst of the heat : [I]0-i waited for aura : [she]3530-she was rest for [my]0-i labour . “ Aura ” ( Indeed , [I]0-i remember ) [I]0-i used to call “ Come to [me]0-i , delight [me]0-i , enter [my]0-i breast , most pleasing one , and , as [you]3531-you do , be willing to ease this heat [I]0-i burn with ! ” Perhaps [I]0-i did add more endearments ( so [my]0-i fate led [me]0-i on ) . “ [You]3531-you are [my]0-i greatest pleasure ” [I]0-i used to say . “ [You]3531-you revive [me]0-i , and cherish [me]0-i . [You]3531-you make [me]0-i love [the woods]1690-the woods and [lonely places]3533-lonely places . It is always [your]3531-you breath [I]0-i try to catch with [my]0-i lips . ” [Someone]6346-someone , [I]0-i do n’t know who , hearing the ambiguous words , represented [my]0-i speech as a betrayal , and thought the word aura [I]0-i called so often , was the name of [a nymph]6310-a nymph , [a nymph [he]6346-someone believed [I]0-i loved]3536-a nymph he believed i loved . Immediately [the unthinking witness]3537-the unthinking witness went to [Procris]917-procris with the tale of [my]0-i imagined disloyalty , and whispered what [he]6346-someone had heard . Love is a credulous thing . Overcome with sudden pain , [they]3538-they tell [me]0-i that [she]3539-she fainted . After a long time [she]3539-she revived , weeping for [herself]3539-she , calling [her]3539-she fate evil . [She]3539-she complained of [my]0-i faithlessness , and troubled by an imaginary crime , [she]3539-she feared what was nothing , feared a name without substance , and grieved , [the unhappy woman]3540-the unhappy woman , as though aura were [a real rival]3541-a real rival . Yet [she]3539-she often doubted , and hoped , in [her]3539-she misery , that [she]3539-she was wrong , declaring [she]3539-she would not believe it , and unless [she]3539-she witnessed it [herself]3539-she , would not condemn [[her]3539-she husband]5872-her husband as guilty of any crime . Next morning , when Dawn ’s light had dispelled the night [I]0-i left to seek [the woods]1690-the woods , and , victorious from the hunt , lying on the grass , [I]0-i said “ [Aura]985-aura , come and relieve [my]0-i suffering ! ” and suddenly , amongst [my]0-i words , [I]0-i thought [I]0-i heard [someone]6346-someone ’s moan . “ Come , [dearest]3545-dearest ! ” [I]0-i still said , and as the fallen leaves made a rustling sound in reply , [I]0-i thought it was a wild creature , and threw [my]0-i spear quickly . It was [Procris]917-procris . Clasping the wound in [her]917-procris breast [she]917-procris cried out “ Ah , [me]0-i ! ” Recognising it as the voice of [[my]0-i faithful wife]3546-my faithful wife , [I]0-i ran headlong and frantic towards that voice . [I]0-i found [her]917-procris half - alive , [her]917-procris clothes sprinkled with drops of blood , and ( what misery ! ) trying to pull this spear , [her]917-procris gift to [me]0-i , from the wound . [I]0-i lifted [her]917-procris body , dearer to [me]0-i than [my]0-i own , with gentle arms , tore the fabric from [her]917-procris breast , and bound up the cruel wound , trying to stem the blood , begging [her]917-procris not to leave [me]0-i , guilty of [her]917-procris death . Though [her]917-procris strength was failing , and even though [she]917-procris was dying , [she]917-procris forced [herself]917-procris to speak a little . “ By the bed [we]3547-we swore to share , by the gods that [I]0-i entreat , [those that are above]3548-those that are above , and those that are of [[my]0-i house]3481-my house , by any good [I]0-i have deserved of [you]3550-you , and by the abiding love , that still , while [I]0-i die , remains , that is itself the cause of [my]0-i death , do not allow [this Aura]3551-this aura to marry [you]3550-you in [my]0-i place ! ” [She]917-procris spoke , and then [I]0-i knew at last the error of the name , and told [her]917-procris . But what was the use of telling ? [She]917-procris wavered , and the little strength [she]917-procris had ebbed away with [her]917-procris blood . While [she]917-procris could still gaze at anything , [she]917-procris gazed at [me]0-i ; and to [me]0-i , and on [my]0-i lips , breathed out [her]917-procris unfortunate spirit . And [her]917-procris look seemed easier then , untroubled by death . ’ [The hero]2234-the hero , weeping , had told this sorrowful tale , when , behold , [Aeacus]972-aeacus entered with [[his]972-aeacus two sons]7258-his two sons , and [[their]7258-his two sons newly enlisted men]7259-their newly enlisted men , whom [Cephalus]918-cephalus then accepted , with all [their]7258-his two sons heavy armour . The horns of a new moon had risen six times and the fortunes of war still hung in the balance , so protractedly did Victory hover between the two , on hesitant wings . There was [a tower of [the king]6572-the king]7264-a tower of the king , added to walls of singing stone , where [Apollo]519-phoebus , [[Latona]895-latona ’s son]3070-latona ’s son , once rested [his]519-phoebus golden lyre , and the sound resonated in [the rock]1948-the rock . In days of peace , [Scylla]988-scylla , [the daughter of [King Nisus]987-nisus]7268-the daughter of king nisus , often used to climb up there , and make the stones ring using small pebbles . In wartime also [she]988-scylla would often watch the unyielding armed conflicts from there , and now , as the war dragged on , [she]988-scylla had come to know the names of [the hostile princes]7269-the hostile princes , [their]7269-the hostile princes weapons , horses , armour and Cretan quivers . Above all [she]988-scylla came to know the face of [[their]7269-the hostile princes leader]7270-their leader , [[Europa]632-europa ’s son]7271-europa ’s son , more than was fitting . If [he]7271-europa ’s son covered [his]7271-europa ’s son head with a plumed helmet , [she]988-scylla thought [him]7271-europa ’s son handsome in a helmet . When [he]7271-europa ’s son hurled [his]7271-europa ’s son heavy spear , with taut limbs , [the girl]1792-the girl admired [his]7271-europa ’s son strength combined with skill . Happy the spear [he]7271-europa ’s son held , [she]988-scylla said , and happy the reins [he]7271-europa ’s son lifted in [his]7271-europa ’s son hand . [Her]988-scylla impulse was to run , though only [a girl]1995-a girl , if it had been allowed , through the enemy lines ; [her]988-scylla impulse was to throw [herself]988-scylla from the top of [the tower]7275-the tower into [the Cretan camp]7276-the cretan camp , to open the bronze gates to [[their]7277-their army]7278-their army , or anything else [Minos]965-minos might wish . If [she]3555-she , who gave birth to [you]3556-you , [most handsome of [kings]1975-kings]3557-most handsome of kings , was as beautiful as [you]3556-you are , no wonder [the god]1482-the god was on fire for [her]3555-she . O [I]0-i would be three times happy if [I]0-i could take wing , through the air , and stand in [the camp of [the Cretan king]3561-the cretan king]3560-the camp of the cretan king , and reveal [myself]0-i , and [my]0-i love , and ask what dowry [he]965-minos would need to win [me]0-i : so long as [he]965-minos does not demand [[[my]0-i country]2452-my country ’s stronghold]3563-my country ’s stronghold ! Rather let [my]0-i hopes of marriage die , than that [I]0-i be capable of betrayal ! - Though often many have found it better to be defeated , if [a peace - loving conqueror]3564-a peace - loving conqueror showed clemency . Indeed [he]3564-a peace - loving conqueror wages a just war because of [[his]3564-a peace - loving conqueror murdered son]3565-his murdered son : [his]3564-a peace - loving conqueror cause is powerful , and the arms that support [his]3564-a peace - loving conqueror cause . Then , [I]0-i think [we]3566-we will be conquered . And if that is the end that awaits [the city]2547-the city , why should [his]3564-a peace - loving conqueror strength breach these walls of [mine]0-i , rather than [my]0-i love ? It would be better for [him]3564-a peace - loving conqueror to win , without slaughter , or delay , and without the shedding of [his]3564-a peace - loving conqueror own blood . At least [I]0-i would not be afraid lest [someone]6346-someone inadvertently wound [your]3569-you breast , [Minos]965-minos : for who would be so cruel as to venture to aim [his]3564-a peace - loving conqueror throw at [you]3569-you , unless [he]3564-a peace - loving conqueror was careless ? The idea pleases [me]0-i , and [I]0-i am firm in [my]0-i decision to deliver [myself]0-i to [you]3569-you , with [[my]0-i country]2452-my country as [[my]0-i dowry]3571-my dowry , and so put an end to war . But , it is not enough merely to want it ! There is [a guard watching the entrance]3572-a guard watching the entrance , and [[my]0-i father]5857-my father holds the keys of the gate . [I]0-i only fear through [him]5857-my father [I]0-i might be unlucky : only [he]5857-my father hinders [my]0-i wishes . Would that [the gods]1538-the gods had devised things so that [I]0-i had [no father]5973-no father ! Surely [everyone]2389-everyone is [[their]2389-everyone own god]3577-their own god : [Fortune]570-fortune rejects idle wishes . [Another girl , fired with as great a passion]3578-another girl , fired with as great a passion as [mine]0-i , would , long ago , have destroyed anything that stood in the way of [her]3578-another girl , fired with as great a passion love . And why should [another]2286-another be braver than [I]0-i am ? [I]0-i would dare to go through fire and sword : but there is no need here to brave fire or sword : [I]0-i need one lock of [[my]0-i father]5857-my father ’s hair . That is more precious than gold to [me]0-i , that purple lock of hair will bless [me]0-i , and let [me]0-i achieve [my]0-i desire . ’ As [she]3578-another girl , fired with as great a passion was speaking , [Night]914-night , [most powerful healer of [our]7282-our cares]7281-most powerful healer of our cares , darkened , and , with the shadows , [her]3578-another girl , fired with as great a passion boldness grew . The first hours of quiet had come , when sleep soothes hearts that the day ’s anxieties have wearied : [the daughter]2598-the daughter steals silently into [[[her]2598-the daughter father]1694-her father ’s room]7285-her father ’s room , and ( alas , the evil ! ) robs [him]1694-her father of the fateful lock of hair . Through the middle of [the enemy camp]7286-the enemy camp [she]3578-another girl , fired with as great a passion goes ( so certain of [her]3578-another girl , fired with as great a passion worth to [them]7286-the enemy camp ) with the impious prize [she]3578-another girl , fired with as great a passion has gained , straight to [the king]6572-the king : who is startled by [her]3578-another girl , fired with as great a passion speech to [him]6572-the king . ‘[988-scylla] Love drove [me]0-i to crime ! [I]0-i , [Scylla]988-scylla , [daughter of [King Nisus]987-nisus]3581-daughter of king nisus , deliver , to [you]3582-you , [the gods of [[my]0-i house]3481-my house , and [[my]0-i country]2452-my country]3583-the gods of my house , and my country . [I]0-i ask no gift but [yourself]3582-you . Take this purple lock of hair as the pledge of [my]0-i love , and know that [I]0-i do not deliver merely a lock of [his]987-nisus hair to [you]3582-you , but [his]987-nisus head ! ’ And [she]3581-daughter of king nisus held out [her]3581-daughter of king nisus gift in [her]3581-daughter of king nisus sinful hand . [Minos]965-minos recoiled from what [she]3581-daughter of king nisus offered [him]965-minos , and shaken by the thought of this unnatural act , answered ‘[1538-the gods] May [the gods]1538-the gods banish [you]3582-you from [[their]1538-the gods world]3587-their world , [O [you]3582-you who disgrace this age , and may land and [sea]1450-sea]3588-o you who disgrace this age , and may land and sea be denied [you]3582-you ! Be certain [I]0-i will never allow [Crete]88-crete , which is [[my]0-i world]3590-my world , and [the cradle of [Jove]605-jove]3591-the cradle of jove , to give sanctuary to [such a monstrous child]3592-such a monstrous child . ’ [He]965-minos spoke : and after establishing laws for [[his]965-minos defeated enemies]7288-his defeated enemies , this most just of legislators , ordered the cables to be loosed from [[his]965-minos fleet]7289-his fleet , and the oars of [the bronze - beaked ships]7290-the bronze - beaked ships to be set in motion . When [Scylla]988-scylla saw that [the ships]1530-the ships were drawing away over [the sea]1464-the sea , and that [[their]1530-the ships master]2274-their master had refused [her]988-scylla the reward for [her]988-scylla wickedness , exhausting prayer , [she]988-scylla succumbed to violent anger , and , [her]988-scylla hair streaming , shouted in [her]988-scylla fury , stretching [our]7294-our [her]988-scylla hands . ‘[3593-you] Where are [you]3593-you running to , deserting [the creator of [your]3593-you success]3594-the creator of your success , [O [you]3593-you whom [I]0-i have set above [[my]0-i father]5857-my father , set above [[my]0-i country]2452-my country]3595-o you whom i have set above my father , set above my country ? Where are [you]3593-you running to , [cruel one]6183-cruel one , whose victory was [my]0-i crime , and [my]0-i kindness ? Does neither the gift [I]0-i gave , nor [my]0-i love , move [you]3593-you , nor the knowledge that all [my]0-i hopes are contained in [you]3593-you alone ? Where shall [I]0-i go , deserted like this ? To [[my]0-i country]2452-my country ? It is defeated ! Even if it were not , it is closed to [me]0-i through [my]0-i treachery ! To [[my]0-i father]5857-my father ’s presence ? Whom [I]0-i betrayed to [you]3593-you ? [The citizens]3601-the citizens hate [me]0-i , with reason , and [[their]3601-the citizens neighbours]3602-their neighbours fear [my]0-i example . [I]0-i am exposed to [the world]1448-the world , so that [Crete]88-crete alone might be open to [me]0-i . If [you]3593-you deny [me]0-i [Crete]88-crete , also , and leave [me]0-i here , in [your]3593-you ingratitude , [[your]3593-you mother]1807-your mother was not [Europa]632-europa , but [the sandbanks of [hostile Syrtis]257-hostile syrtis]3605-the sandbanks of hostile syrtis , or [the Armenian tigress]3606-the armenian tigress , or [Charybdis]929-charybdis ’s whirlpool , stirred by the south wind . Nor are [you]3593-you [[Jupiter]499-jupiter ’s son]6106-jupiter ’s son , nor was [[your]3593-you mother]1807-your mother deceived by the image of a bull . That tale of [your]3593-you birth is a lie ! Truly a bull begot [you]3593-you : a wild one , never captive of [a heifer]6141-a heifer ’s love . [Nisus]987-nisus , [father]5922-father , punish [me]0-i ! Joy in [my]0-i pain , walls , that [I]0-i have betrayed ! Now , [I]0-i confess it , [I]0-i deserve to be hated , and to die . But let [one of those whom [I]0-i have impiously wounded]3611-one of those whom i have impiously wounded destroy [me]0-i ! Why should [you]3593-you attack [me]0-i for [my]0-i crime , who gained victory through that crime ? [My]0-i sin against [[my]0-i father]5857-my father , and [[my]0-i country]2452-my country , was a kindness to [you]3593-you ! [Pasiphaë]989-pasiphaë is truly a fit mate for [you]3593-you : [that adulteress who fooled the fierce bull with that wooden frame , and carried a hybrid foetus in [her]3615-her womb]3614-that adulteress who fooled the fierce bull with that wooden frame , and carried a hybrid foetus in her womb . Does [my]0-i speech penetrate [your]3593-you ears , monster of ingratitude , or do the same winds that blow [[your]3593-you ships]3616-your ships on , blow [my]0-i words away to nothingness ? Now , Now , it is no wonder to [me]0-i , that [Pasiphaë]989-pasiphaë preferred that bull to [you]3593-you : [you]3593-you have more savagery in [you]3593-you than [he]3617-he had . Oh , [he]3617-he is ordering [them]3618-them to run ! And the waves resound to the beat of the oars , and [I]0-i and [[my]0-i land]3619-my land recede . No matter . Oh , in vain , [you]3593-you forget [my]0-i kindnesses : [I]0-i shall follow [you]3593-you against [your]3593-you will , clinging to the curved sternpost , dragged over [the wide ocean]3262-the wide ocean . ’ [She]3593-you had scarcely finished speaking when [she]3593-you leapt into [the sea]1464-the sea , and swam after [the fleet]7296-the fleet , [her]3593-you passion lending [her]3593-you strength , and clung to [the Cretan boat]7297-the cretan boat . [[Her]3593-you father]1694-her father , who had been newly changed into [a sea eagle , soaring through the air on tawny wings]7299-a sea eagle , soaring through the air on tawny wings , saw [her]3593-you , and dived towards [her]3593-you , as [she]3593-you clung there , to tear at [her]3593-you with [his]1694-her father hooked beak . In fear [she]3593-you let go of the sternpost , but as [she]3593-you fell the light breeze seemed to hold [her]3593-you , not letting [her]3593-you touch the water . Feathers spring from [her]3593-you arms : changed into a bird , the rock dove , with its red legs and purple throat , [she]3593-you is called [Ciris]990-ciris , ‘[0-i] Cutter ’ , and acquired that name from [her]3593-you cutting of the lock of hair . When [Minos]965-minos reached [Cretan]258-cretan soil [he]965-minos paid [his]965-minos dues to [Jove]605-jove , with the sacrifice of a hundred bulls , and hung up [his]965-minos war trophies to adorn [the palace]6417-the palace . The scandal concerning [[his]965-minos family]7301-his family grew , and [the queen]2685-the queen ’s unnatural adultery was evident from the birth of [a strange hybrid monster]7303-a strange hybrid monster . [Minos]965-minos resolved to remove this shame , [the Minotaur]7304-the minotaur , from [[his]965-minos house]7305-his house , and hide it away in a labyrinth with [blind passageways]7306-blind passageways . [Daedalus]991-daedalus , celebrated for [his]991-daedalus skill in architecture , laid out the design , and confused the clues to direction , and led the eye into [a tortuous maze]7307-a tortuous maze , by the windings of alternating paths . No differently from the way in which the watery Maeander deludes the sight , flowing backwards and forwards in its changeable course , through [the meadows of [Phrygia]176-phrygia]7308-the meadows of phrygia , facing the running waves advancing to meet it , now directing its uncertain waters towards its source , now towards [the open sea]7309-the open sea : so [Daedalus]991-daedalus made the endless pathways of [the maze]7310-the maze , and was scarcely able to recover the entrance [himself]991-daedalus : [the building]3194-the building was as deceptive as that . In there , [Minos]965-minos walled up the twin form of bull and [man]6314-man , and twice nourished [it]7313-it on Athenian blood , but the third repetition of the nine - year tribute by lot , caused [the monster]7314-the monster ’s downfall . When , through the help of [the virgin princess]7315-the virgin princess , [Ariadne]992-ariadne , by rewinding the thread , [Theseus]958-theseus , [son of Aegeus]7316-son of aegeus , won [his]958-theseus way back to [the elusive threshold]7317-the elusive threshold , that [no one]1640-no one had previously regained , [he]958-theseus immediately set sail for [Dia]260-dia , stealing [the daughter of [Minos]965-minos]7319-the daughter of minos away with [him]958-theseus , then cruelly abandoned [[his]958-theseus companion]3554-his companion on [that shore]7321-that shore . Deserted and weeping bitterly , as [she]3554-his companion was , [Bacchus - Liber]682-bacchus brought [her]3554-his companion help and comfort . So that [she]3554-his companion might shine among the eternal stars , [he]958-theseus took the crown from [her]3554-his companion forehead , and set it in the sky . It soared through the rarefied air , and as it soared its jewels changed to bright fires , and took their place , retaining the appearance of a crown , as the Corona Borealis , between the kneeling [Hercules]941-hercules and the head of the serpent that [Ophiuchus]993-ophiuchus holds . Meanwhile Daedalus , hating [Crete]88-crete , and [his]3621-his long exile , and filled with a desire to stand on [[his]3621-his native soil]7322-his native soil , was imprisoned by the waves . ‘[3621-his] [He]3621-his may thwart [our]3622-our escape by [land]1458-land or [sea]1450-sea ’ [he]3621-his said ‘[3621-his] but the sky is surely open to [us]3622-our : [we]3622-our will go that way : [Minos]965-minos rules everything but [he]965-minos does not rule [the heavens]1940-the heavens ’ . So saying [he]958-theseus applied [his]958-theseus thought to new invention and altered the natural order of things . [He]958-theseus laid down lines of feathers , beginning with the smallest , following shorter with longer ones , so [you]7323-you might think they had grown like that , on a slant . In this way , long ago , the rustic pan - pipes were graduated , with lengthening reeds . Then [he]958-theseus fastened them together with thread at the middle , and bees’-wax at the base , and , when [he]958-theseus had arranged them , [he]958-theseus flexed each one into a gentle curve , so that they imitated real bird ’s wings . [[His]958-theseus son]1773-his son , [Icarus]994-icarus , stood next to [him]958-theseus , and , not realising that [he]958-theseus was handling things that would endanger [him]958-theseus , caught laughingly at the down that blew in the passing breeze , and softened the yellow bees’-wax with [his]958-theseus thumb , and , in [his]958-theseus play , hindered [[his]958-theseus father]1775-his father ’s marvellous work . When [he]958-theseus had put the last touches to what [he]958-theseus had begun , [the artificer]7326-the artificer balanced [his]958-theseus own body between the two wings and hovered in the moving air . [He]0-i instructed [the boy]1835-the boy as well , saying ‘[0-i] Let [me]0-i warn [you]3626-you , [Icarus]994-icarus , to take the middle way , in case the moisture weighs down [your]3626-you wings , if [you]3626-you fly too low , or if [you]3626-you go too high , the sun scorches them . Travel between the extremes . And [I]0-i order [you]3626-you not to aim towards [Bootes]995-bootes , [the Herdsman]3627-the herdsman , or [Helice]996-helice , [the Great Bear]3628-the great bear , or towards the drawn sword of [Orion]997-orion : take the course [I]0-i show [you]3626-you ! ’ At the same time as [he]0-i laid down the rules of flight , [he]0-i fitted the newly created wings on [the boy]1835-the boy ’s shoulders . While [he]0-i worked and issued [his]0-i warnings [the ageing man]7329-the ageing man ’s cheeks were wet with tears : [the father]1852-the father ’s hands trembled . [He]0-i gave a never to be repeated kiss to [[his]0-i son]1773-his son , and lifting upwards on [his]0-i wings , flew ahead , anxious for [[his]0-i companion]3554-his companion , like a bird , leading [her]3554-his companion fledglings out of a nest above , into the empty air . [He]0-i urged [the boy]1835-the boy to follow , and showed [him]1835-the boy the dangerous art of flying , moving [his]0-i own wings , and then looking back at [[his]0-i son]1773-his son . [Some angler catching fish with a quivering rod]7335-some angler catching fish with a quivering rod , or [a shepherd]1777-a shepherd leaning on [his]1777-a shepherd crook , or [a ploughman]7337-a ploughman resting on the handles of [his]1777-a shepherd plough , saw them , perhaps , and stood there amazed , believing [them]7338-them to be gods able to travel the sky . And now [Samos]998-samos , sacred to [Juno]525-juno , lay ahead to the left ( [Delos]897-delos and [Paros]243-paros were behind [them]7338-them ) , [Lebinthos]1000-lebinthos , and [Calymne]1001-calymne , rich in honey , to the right , when [the boy]1835-the boy began to delight in [his]1835-the boy daring flight , and abandoning [[his]1835-the boy guide]2207-his guide , drawn by desire for [the heavens]1940-the heavens , soared higher . [His]1835-the boy nearness to the devouring sun softened the fragrant wax that held the wings : and the wax melted : [he]1835-the boy flailed with bare arms , but losing [his]1835-the boy oar - like wings , could not ride the air . Even as [his]1835-the boy mouth was crying [[his]1835-the boy father]1775-his father ’s name , it vanished into [the dark blue sea]1817-the dark blue sea , [the Icarian Sea]261-the icarian sea , called after [him]1835-the boy . [The unhappy father]7344-the unhappy father , now no longer [a father]5997-a father , shouted ‘[994-icarus] [Icarus]994-icarus , [Icarus]994-icarus where are [you]994-icarus ? Which way should [I]0-i look , to see [you]994-icarus ? ’ ‘[994-icarus] [Icarus]994-icarus ’ [he]0-i called again . Then [he]0-i caught sight of the feathers on the waves , and cursed [his]0-i inventions . [He]0-i laid [the body]7346-the body to rest , in [a tomb]7347-a tomb , and [the island]7121-the island was named [Icaria]263-icaria after [[his]0-i buried child]7349-his buried child . As [he]0-i was consigning [[his]0-i unfortunate son]7350-his unfortunate son to the grave , a noisy partridge poked its head out from [a muddy ditch]7351-a muddy ditch , and , called , cackling joyfully , with whirring wings . It was the only one of its kind , not seen in previous years , and only recently made a bird , as a lasting reproach to [you]994-icarus , [Daedalus]991-daedalus . [[Your]994-icarus sister]6112-your sister , [Perdix]1002-perdix , oblivious to the fates , sent [you]994-icarus [[her]1002-perdix son]6039-her son , [Talus]1003-talus , to be taught : twelve years old , [his]1003-talus mind ready for knowledge . Indeed , [the child , studying the spine of a fish]7354-the child , studying the spine of a fish , took it as a model , and cut continuous teeth out of sharp metal , inventing the use of the saw . [He]1003-talus was also the first to pivot two iron arms on a pin , so that , with the arms at a set distance , one part could be fixed , and the other sweep out a circle . [Daedalus]991-daedalus was jealous , and hurled [the boy]1835-the boy headlong from [[Minerva]610-pallas ’s sacred citadel]7356-minerva ’s sacred citadel , claiming that [he]1835-the boy had fallen . But [Pallas Minerva]610-pallas , who favours [those with quick minds]7357-those with quick minds , caught [him]1835-the boy , and turned [him]1835-the boy into the partridge , masking [him]1835-the boy with feathers in mid - air . [His]1835-the boy inborn energy was transferred to swift wings and feet , and [he]1835-the boy kept [[his]1835-the boy mother]5953-his mother ’s name , [Perdix]1002-perdix , from before . But the bird does not perch above the ground , and does not make its nest on branches or on high points , but flies low on whirring wings over the soil , and lays its eggs in a sheltered place . Now [Sicily]146-sicily , [the land of [Mount Etna]123-mount etna]7359-the land of mount etna , held the weary [Daedalus]991-daedalus , and [King Cocalus]1004-king cocalus , regarded as peaceable , had taken up arms , against [Minos]965-minos , in defence of the suppliant : and thanks to [Theseus]958-theseus , [Athens]85-athens now had ceased to pay Crete the sorrowful levy . [The temple]1675-the temple was wreathed with flowers , and [the Athenians]3464-the athenians called out to warlike [Minerva]610-pallas , to [Jupiter]499-jupiter and to [the other gods]7362-the other gods , honouring [them]3464-the athenians with gifts , and the blood of sacrificial offerings , and the contents of [their]3464-the athenians incense - boxes . Far - wandering fame had spread the name of [Theseus]958-theseus through [all the cities of [the Argolis]34-the argolis]7363-all the cities of the argolis , and [the peoples inhabiting wealthy Achaia]7364-the peoples inhabiting wealthy achaia begged for [his]1004-king cocalus help in [their]7364-the peoples inhabiting wealthy achaia great trouble , and [Calydon]1005-calydon , as a suppliant , despite having [Meleager]1006-meleager , asked [his]1004-king cocalus help , with anxious prayers . The reason for [their]7364-the peoples inhabiting wealthy achaia asking was a wild boar , [servant]7365-servant and avenging power of [Diana]527-diana ’s aggression . [King Oeneus of [Calydon]182-calydon]1005-calydon , [they]7364-the peoples inhabiting wealthy achaia say , made offerings , from the successful harvests of a full year , of the first fruits of the crops to [Ceres]689-ceres , of wine to [Bacchus]682-bacchus , ‘[994-icarus] [the deliverer from care ’ , of libations of flowing oil]7366-the deliverer from care ’ , of libations of flowing oil , from the olives , to [golden Minerva]610-pallas . The honour [they]7364-the peoples inhabiting wealthy achaia desire was paid to [all the gods]1558-all the gods , beginning with [the rural deities]7368-the rural deities : only [the daughter of [Latona]895-latona ’s altar]7369-the daughter of latona ’s altar was passed by : neglected , it is said , and left without its incense . Anger even touches [the gods]1538-the gods . ‘[0-i] [I]0-i shall not suffer this without exacting punishment ’ [she]7369-the daughter of latona ’s altar cried ‘[3629-she] and , though not honoured , it will not be said that [I]0-i was un - avenged . ’ And [the goddess]5864-the goddess , spurned , sent an avenging wild boar , over [the Aetolian fields]7372-the aetolian fields : grassy [Epirus]266-epirus had none greater than [it]266-epirus , and those of [the island of [Sicily]146-sicily]7373-the island of sicily were smaller . [Its]266-epirus eyes glowed with bloodshot fire : [its]266-epirus neck was stiff with bristles , and the hairs , on its hide , bristled stiffly like spear - shafts : just as a palisade stands , so the hairs stood like tall spears . Hot foam flecked the broad shoulders , from its hoarse grunting . [Its]266-epirus tusks were the size of an Indian elephant ’s : lightning came from its mouth : and the leaves were scorched , by its breath . Now it trampled the young shoots of the growing crops , now cut short the ripeness , longed - for by [the mournful farmer]7374-the mournful farmer , and scythed down the corn in ear . [The granaries and threshing floors]7375-the granaries and threshing floors waited for the promised harvest in vain . Heavy clusters of grapes were brought down along with the trailing vines , and fruit and branch of the evergreen olives . It rages among the cattle too . Neither [the herdsmen]7376-the herdsmen and dogs , nor [their]7376-the herdsmen own fierce bulls can defend the herds . [The people]5829-the people scatter , and only count [themselves]5829-the people safe behind city walls . At last [Meleager]1006-meleager and [a handpicked group of men]7378-a handpicked group of men gather , longing for glory : [Castor]1007-castor and [Polydeuces]1008-polydeuces , [the Dioscuri]1009-the dioscuri , [twin sons of [Tyndareus]1010-tyndareus and [Leda]881-leda , [one son famous for boxing , the other for horsemanship]7380-one son famous for boxing , the other for horsemanship : [Jason]924-jason who built [the first ship]7381-the first ship : [Theseus]958-theseus and [Pirithoüs]1011-pirithoüs , fortunate in friendship : [Plexippus]1012-plexippus and [Toxeus]1013-toxeus , [the two sons of Thestius]7382-the two sons of thestius , [uncles of Meleager]7383-uncles of meleager : [Lynceus]835-lynceus and [swift Idas]806-idas , [sons of Aphareus]7384-sons of aphareus : [Caeneus]1014-caeneus , once [a woman]1994-a woman : [warlike Leucippus]7386-warlike leucippus : [Acastus]1015-acastus , famed for [his]1015-acastus javelin]7379-twin sons of tyndareus and leda , one son famous for boxing , the other for horsemanship : jason who built the first ship : theseus and pirithoüs , fortunate in friendship : plexippus and toxeus , the two sons of thestius , uncles of meleager : lynceus and swift idas , sons of aphareus : caeneus , once a woman : warlike leucippus : acastus , famed for his javelin : Hippothoüs : [Dryas]1210-dryas : [Phoenix]1016-phoenix , [[Amyntor]1017-amyntor ’s son]7387-amyntor ’s son : [Eurytus]799-eurytus and [Cleatus]1018-cleatus , [the sons of Actor]7388-the sons of actor : and [Phyleus]1019-phyleus , sent by [Elis]83-elis . [Telamon]973-telamon was [there]1878-there , and [Peleus]974-peleus , [father of the great Achilles]7390-father of the great achilles : with [Admetus]1020-admetus , [the son of Pheres]7391-the son of pheres , and [Iolaüs]1021-iolaüs from [Boeotia]62-boeotia were [Eurytion]1022-eurytion , energetic in action , and [Echion]637-echion unbeaten at running : and [Lelex]1023-lelex from [Locria]268-locria , [Panopeus]1024-panopeus , [Hyleus]1025-hyleus , and daring [Hippasus]1026-hippasus : [Nestor]1027-nestor , still in the prime of life : and those that Hippocoön sent , with Enaesimus , from ancient Amyclae : Laërtes , [[Penelope]1028-penelope ’s father - in - law]7392-penelope ’s father - in - law with [Ancaeus of Arcady]1029-ancaeus : [Mopsus]1030-mopsus , [the shrewd son of Ampyx]7393-the shrewd son of ampyx : and [Amphiaraüs]1031-amphiaraüs , son of Oecleus , not yet betrayed by [[his]1031-amphiaraüs wife]1633-his wife , Eriphyle . And [Atalanta]1032-atalanta , [the warrior girl of [Tegea]269-tegea]7395-the warrior girl of tegea , the glory of [Arcadia]30-arcadia ’s woods , with a polished brooch clasping the neck of [her]1032-atalanta garment , and [her]1032-atalanta hair simply done , caught in a single knot . An ivory quiver , holding [her]1032-atalanta arrows , that rattled as [she]1032-atalanta moved , hung from [her]1032-atalanta left shoulder , and [her]1032-atalanta left hand held the bow . So [she]1032-atalanta was dressed : as for [her]1032-atalanta face , [you]7396-you might truly say , [the virgin]1704-the virgin was there , in [a boy]2019-a boy , and [a boy]2019-a boy , in [the girl]1792-the girl . The moment [he]1031-amphiaraüs saw [her]1032-atalanta , that moment , [Meleager]1006-meleager , [the hero of [Calydon]182-calydon]7401-the hero of calydon , desired [her]1032-atalanta , though [the gods]1538-the gods might refuse it , devoured by secret fires . ‘[0-i] O , happy the man , whom [she]3629-she might think worthy ! ’ [he]1006-meleager said . Neither time nor honour allowed [him]1031-amphiaraüs further words : the greater task of the greater conflict urged [him]1031-amphiaraüs on . [A forest thick with trees]7403-a forest thick with trees , that had never been cut , at any time , began above [the plain]3515-the plain , and overlooked [the sloping fields]7405-the sloping fields . When [the heroes]7406-the heroes reached [it]7403-a forest thick with trees , [some spread out hunting nets]7407-some spread out hunting nets , others loosed the dogs from [their]7408-their leashes , while others again followed [the deeply - marked trail]7409-the deeply - marked trail , keen to discover [[their]7406-the heroes quarry]7410-their quarry . There was [a deep valley that collected streams of rainwater , falling near]7411-a deep valley that collected streams of rainwater , falling near [it]7411-a deep valley that collected streams of rainwater , falling near : and [it]7411-a deep valley that collected streams of rainwater , falling near held , in [its]7411-a deep valley that collected streams of rainwater , falling near depths , pliant willows , smooth sedges , and marsh grasses , and osiers and tall bulrushes , above [the lowly reeds]7412-the lowly reeds . The boar was roused from there , and made a violent charge into the midst of [its enemies]7413-its enemies , like lightning forced from colliding clouds . Trees were flattened by its impact , and [the woods]1690-the woods crashed as it drove into [them]1690-the woods . [The warriors]7415-the warriors shouted , and held [their]7415-the warriors spears spread outward , with firm hands , waving [their]7415-the warriors broad blades . The boar rushed [them]7415-the warriors , scattering the dogs , as [they]7415-the warriors obstructed it in its fury , putting the baying pack to flight with sidelong swipes of its tusks . The first spear , delivered by [Echion]637-echion ’s arm , was ineffectual , and gave the trunk of a maple a glancing blow . The next , if it had not been thrown with too great a force , aimed at the creature ’s back , seemed certain to stick there , but the throw was too long . [Jason of Pagasae]924-jason hurled the spear . Then [Mopsus]1030-mopsus , [son of Ampyx]7416-son of ampyx , cried out ‘[519-phoebus] [Phoebus]519-phoebus , if [I]0-i have worshipped [you]519-phoebus , and do so now , grant what [I]0-i ask , that [my]0-i spear strikes surely ! ’ [The god]1482-the god did what [he]1482-the god could , to fulfil the prayer : the boar was hit , but without being wounded . [Diana]527-diana had stolen the iron point of the javelin , in flight : what arrived was the wooden shaft without its tip . The wild beast ’s anger was aroused , and blazed out no more gently than lightning . Flame burned in its eyes , and was breathed from its chest . With dangerous and unerring momentum , the boar hurtled towards [the young men]6888-the young men , as a stone flies from a taut catapult , aimed at walls or battlements full of [soldiers]7419-soldiers . [Hippalmus]1033-hippalmus and [Pelagon]1034-pelagon , holding the right flank , were knocked to the ground : [[their]7415-the warriors friends]7420-their friends caught [them]7415-the warriors up as [they]7415-the warriors lay there . But [Enaesimus]1035-enaesimus , [son of [Hippocoön]1036-hippocoön]7421-son of hippocoön , did not escape the fatal blow : about to turn [his]1035-enaesimus back , in alarm , [he]1035-enaesimus sank down , as the sinews of [his]1035-enaesimus knee gave way . And [King Nestor of [Pylos]270-pylos]1027-nestor , might perhaps have perished before [his]1027-nestor time at [Troy]271-troy , but , using the leverage of [his]1027-nestor firmly planted spear , [he]1027-nestor vaulted into a tree , that stood close by , and looked down , from a place of safety , on [the quarry [he]1027-nestor had escaped]7422-the quarry he had escaped . The fierce creature , sharpening its tusks on the trunk of an oak , threatened [them]7415-the warriors with destruction , and confident in its freshly renewed weapons , ripped open [mighty Hippasus]1026-hippasus ’s thigh , with one curving edge . But now [the Gemini]1037-the gemini , [Castor]1007-castor and [Pollux]1038-pollux , not yet changed into stars in the sky , [twin brothers]3273-twin brothers , conspicuous among the rest , both rode up , on horses whiter than snow , and brandishing [their]3273-twin brothers javelins in the air as one , hurled [them]7415-the warriors , the points quivering with the motion . [They]3273-twin brothers would have wounded the beast , had not [the bristling creature]7424-the bristling creature retreated into the dense woods where no horse or spear could penetrate . [Telamon]973-telamon did follow , and careless where [he]973-telamon was placing [his]973-telamon feet , in [his]973-telamon enthusiasm , fell flat on the ground , tripping over the root of a tree . While [Peleus]974-peleus was lifting [him]973-telamon , [the girl]1792-the girl from [Tegea]269-tegea strung a swift arrow , and sent it speeding from the curved bow . The shaft just grazed the top of the boar ’s back , and fixing itself below one ear , reddened the bristles with a thin stream of blood . Nor did [she]1792-the girl praise [her]1792-the girl own successful shot more than [Meleager]1006-meleager did . [He]973-telamon was supposed to have been [the first to see the blood]7426-the first to see the blood , and first , having seen it , to point it out to [[his]973-telamon friends]2223-his friends , saying : ‘[3630-you] [You]3630-you will be honoured for the value of this service . ’ [The warriors]7415-the warriors flushed with [their]7415-the warriors shame , urged [each other]2544-each other on , gaining courage from [their]7415-the warriors clamour , hurling [their]7415-the warriors spears without sense of order . The jostling spoilt [their]7415-the warriors throw , and prevented the strike [they]7415-the warriors intended . Then [Ancaeus]1029-ancaeus of [Arcady]97-arcady , with [his]1029-ancaeus twin - headed axe , rushing to meet [his]1029-ancaeus fate , cried : ‘[3630-you] O [warriors]2240-warriors , learn how much better [a man]5897-a man ’s weapons are than [a girl]1995-a girl ’s , and leave the work to [me]0-i ! Though [[Latona]895-latona ’s daughter]3634-latona ’s daughter [herself]3634-latona ’s daughter protects [this creature]3635-this creature , in [her]3634-latona ’s daughter own way , in spite of [Diana]527-diana , [my]0-i right arm will destroy it . ’ Swollen with pride , like this , with boastful words , [he]1029-ancaeus spoke , and , lifting the double axe in both hands , [he]1029-ancaeus stood on tiptoe , poised for the downward blow . The boar anticipated [this daring enemy]7430-this daring enemy , and struck at the upper groin , the quickest way to kill , with [his]1029-ancaeus twin tusks . [Ancaeus]1029-ancaeus collapsed , and the slippery mass of [his]1029-ancaeus inner organs fell away in a pool of blood : the ground was soaked with the red fluid . Then [Pirithoüs]1011-pirithoüs , [son of [Ixion]763-ixion]7431-son of ixion , went against [the quarry]7432-the quarry , brandishing [his]1011-pirithoüs hunting - spear in [his]1011-pirithoüs strong right - hand . [Theseus]958-theseus , [[Aegeus]957-aegeus ’s son]7159-aegeus ’s son , called out ‘[3634-latona ’s daughter] Stay , farther away , [my]0-i soul ’s other half , O dearer to [me]0-i than [myself]0-i ! It is fine to be brave at a distance , also : [Ancaeus]1029-ancaeus ’s rash courage only did [him]1029-ancaeus harm . ’ [He]1029-ancaeus spoke , and threw [his]1029-ancaeus heavy spear , of cornelian cherry - wood , with its bronze blade . Though well aimed and capable of reaching its mark , it was deflected by the leafy branch of an oak . [Jason]924-jason , [[Aeson]928-aeson ’s son]3301-aeson ’s son , hurled [his]924-jason javelin , which swerved by accident , and the fatal throw transfixing the flanks of [an innocent hound]7435-an innocent hound , pinned it to the ground . But [Meleager]1006-meleager ’s hand made the difference , and of the two spears [he]1006-meleager threw , though one stuck in the earth , the other fixed itself in the boar ’s back . Now , while it raged , and twisted its body round , and spouted out hissing foam and fresh blood , the author of its wound came at it , pricked [his]1006-meleager quarry to fury , and buried [his]1006-meleager shining hunting - spear in [[his]1006-meleager enemy]6576-his enemy ’s shoulder . Then [the companions]6779-the companions give proof of [their]6779-the companions joy , shouting , and crowding around [him]1006-meleager to grasp [his]1006-meleager hand in [theirs]6779-the companions . [They]6779-the companions gaze , wonderingly , at the huge creature covering so much of the earth it lies on , and still think it unsafe to touch the beast , but nevertheless each wets [his]1006-meleager spear in its blood . [Meleager]1006-meleager , [himself]1006-meleager , pressed [his]1006-meleager foot down on the head of the deadly creature , and said to [Atalanta]1032-atalanta ‘[1029-ancaeus] [Girl from [Nonacria]272-nonacria]3636-girl from nonacria , take the prize that is [mine]3637-mine by right , and let [my]0-i glory be shared with [you]3636-girl from nonacria . ’ Then [he]1006-meleager gave [her]3636-girl from nonacria the spoils , the hide bristling with hair , and the head remarkable for its magnificent tusks . [She]3636-girl from nonacria delighted in [the giver]7438-the giver no less than the gift , but [the others]1756-the others were envious , and a murmur ran through [the whole company]2003-the whole company . Of these , [Plexippus]1012-plexippus , and [Toxeus]1013-toxeus , [the sons of [Thestius]1040-thestius]7441-the sons of thestius , [[Meleager]1006-meleager ’s uncles]7442-meleager ’s uncles , stretching [their]7442-meleager ’s uncles arms out , shouted loudly : ‘[1029-ancaeus] Come on , [girl]5901-girl , leave [them]3639-them alone : do not steal [our]3640-our titles to honour , and do not let too much faith in [your]5901-girl beauty deceive [you]5901-girl , lest [[your]5901-girl love - sick friend]3641-your love - sick friend turns out to be no help to [you]5901-girl . ’ And [they]3640-our took the gifts away from [her]5901-girl , and denied [him]1006-meleager the right to give [them]3639-them . [The descendant of [Mars]635-mars]7443-the descendant of mars could not bear this , and bursting with anger , gnashing [his]7443-the descendant of mars teeth , [he]7443-the descendant of mars said : ‘[1041-learn] [Learn]1041-learn , [[you]5901-girl thieves of [other men]3643-other men]3642-you thieves of other men ’s rights , the difference between threats and actions ’ , and plunged [his]7443-the descendant of mars iron point into [Plexippus]1012-plexippus ’s chest , [he]7443-the descendant of mars expecting nothing of that kind . [Meleager]1006-meleager gave [Toxeus]1013-toxeus , who stood in doubt , wanting to avenge [[his]1006-meleager brother]1593-his brother , but fearing [[his]1006-meleager brother]1593-his brother ’s fate , scant time for doubt , and while [his]1006-meleager spear was still warm from [the first brother]7446-the first brother ’s murder , [he]1006-meleager warmed it again with [the second brother]7447-the second brother ’s blood . [Althaea]1042-althaea was carrying thanksgiving offerings , for [[her]7448-her son]6039-her son [Meleager]1006-meleager ’s victory , to [the temple of [the gods]1538-the gods]7450-the temple of the gods , when [she]7448-her saw [them]7452-them bringing back [[her]7448-her dead brothers]7453-her dead brothers . [She]7448-her filled [the city]2547-the city with the clamour of wailing , beat [her]7448-her breasts , and replaced [her]7448-her golden robes with black . But when [she]7448-her heard who [the murderer]7455-the murderer was , [she]7448-her forgot [her]7448-her mourning , and [her]7448-her longing changed from tears to revenge . There was a piece of wood that [the Three Sisters]7456-the three sisters placed in the fire , when [Althaea]1042-althaea , [the daughter of [Thestius]1040-thestius]7457-the daughter of thestius , was in the throes of childbirth . As [they]3644-they spun the threads of fate firmly under [their]3644-they thumbs , [they]3644-they said : ‘[3644-they] [We]3644-they assign an equal span of time to [you]3645-you , [O new born child]3646-o new born child , and to this brand . ’ When [the goddesses]1849-the goddesses vanished , after speaking the prophecy , [the mother]2342-the mother snatched the burning branch from the fire , and doused it with water . It had long been hidden away in the depths of [the inner rooms]7460-the inner rooms , and preserved , had preserved [your]3645-you years , [youth]2370-youth . [[Your]3645-you mother]1807-your mother now brought it out , and called for pinewood and kindling : and , once that was in position , [she]1807-your mother lit the hostile flames . Then [she]1807-your mother tried , four times , to throw the brand in the fire , and four times , held back . [The mother]2342-the mother fought [the sister]7464-the sister in [her]2342-the mother , and the two tugged at the one heart . Often [her]2342-the mother cheeks grew pale at imminent wickedness . Often fierce anger filled [her]2342-the mother eyes with blood . One moment [she]2342-the mother seemed like [someone threatening some cruelty]7465-someone threatening some cruelty : the next [you]3645-you would think [her]2342-the mother full of compassion . When [her]2342-the mother heart ’s fierce passion dried up [her]2342-the mother tears , the tears welled up again . As [a ship]1871-a ship , that the wind , and the tide opposing the wind , both seize , feels the twin forces and obeys [the two]2580-the two , uncertainly , so [the daughter of [Thestius]1040-thestius]7457-the daughter of thestius , was swayed by [her]2342-the mother emotions , and [her]2342-the mother anger alternately calmed , and then flared again . However , [the sister]7464-the sister in [her]2342-the mother begins to outweigh [the mother]2342-the mother , and to appease the shades of [her]2342-the mother own blood , with blood , [she]2342-the mother escapes guilt by incurring it . Now , as the baleful fire strengthens , [she]2342-the mother cries ‘[3644-they] Let this be the funeral pyre that cremates [[my]0-i child]6113-my child . ’ As [she]2342-the mother held the fatal brand in [her]2342-the mother deadly hand , and stood , [wretched woman]7471-wretched woman , in front of the funeral altars , [she]2342-the mother said ‘[911-the eumenides] [Eumenides]911-the eumenides , [Triple Goddesses of Retribution]3648-triple goddesses of retribution , turn [your]3649-you faces towards these fearful rites ! [I]0-i take revenge , and [I]0-i do a wicked thing : death must be atoned for by death : crime must be heaped on crime , ruin on ruin . Let [this impious house]3650-this impious house end in a flood of mourning ! Shall , [Oeneus]1005-calydon , fortunate , rejoice in [[his]1005-calydon victorious child]3651-his victorious child , while [Thestius]1040-thestius is bereaved of [[his]1005-calydon sons]3652-his sons ? Better for both to grieve . Only , [[my]0-i brother]6993-my brother ’s spirits , [new - made ghosts]3654-new - made ghosts , recognise [my]0-i sense of duty to [you]3649-you , and accept the sacrifice [I]0-i prepare , so great its cost to [me]0-i , [the evil child of [my]0-i womb]3655-the evil child of my womb ! Ah [me]0-i ! What conclusion do [I]0-i rush towards ? [[My]0-i brothers]6962-my brothers , forgive [a mother]5881-a mother ! The hand is unequal to what it began : [I]0-i acknowledge [he]1005-calydon deserves to die , but [I]0-i do not desire to be the cause of [his]1005-calydon death . Shall [he]1005-calydon go unpunished ? Shall [he]1005-calydon live , victorious , proud of [his]1005-calydon success , and be king in [Calydon]182-calydon , while [you]3649-you lie there , the scant ashes of chill shadows ? For [my]0-i part [I]0-i can not suffer that to be : let [the wicked]2769-the wicked die , and pull down [[his]1005-calydon father]1775-his father ’s hopes , [his]1775-his father kingship , and the ruins of [[his]1005-calydon country]6809-his country ! Where are [my]0-i maternal feelings ? Where are the sacred allegiances of [a parent]3661-a parent ? Where are the anxieties [I]0-i suffered over those ten months ? O , [I]0-i wish , when [you]3649-you were [an infant]3662-an infant burning in those first flames , [I]0-i had allowed it to be ! By [my]0-i gift , [you]3649-you lived : now for [your]3649-you own fault , [you]3649-you die !
