Suffer the consequences of what [you]3649-you have done , and give [me]0-i back the life [I]0-i twice gave [you]3649-you , once at [your]3649-you birth , once when [I]0-i snatched at the brand , or let [me]0-i join [[my]0-i brothers]6962-my brothers in [the tomb]2552-the tomb ! [I]0-i yearn to do it , and [I]0-i can not do it . What shall [I]0-i do ? Now [[my]0-i brothers]6962-my brothers ’ wounds are before [my]1809-mother eyes and the image of all that blood : and now heart ’s love , and the word ‘[1809-mother] [mother]1809-mother ’ move [me]3667-me . Woe to [me]3667-me ! Evil is in [your]3649-you victory , [[my]3667-me brothers]6962-my brothers : but victory [you]3649-you shall have : only let [me]3667-me follow [you]3649-you , and the comfort [I]3667-me bring [you]3649-you ! ’[3667-me] [She]3667-me spoke , and turning [her]3667-me face away , with trembling hands , threw the fatal brand , into the midst of the fire . The piece of wood itself gave , or seemed to give , a sigh , as it was attacked , and burnt , by the reluctant flames . Far off , and unaware , [Meleager]1006-meleager is alight with that fire , and feels [his]1006-meleager inner organs invisibly seared . [He]1006-meleager controls the fierce agonies , with courage . Nevertheless [he]1006-meleager is sad that [he]1006-meleager must die a bloodless , cowardly death , and calls [Ancaeus]1029-ancaeus fortunate in [his]1006-meleager wounds . At the last , groaning with pain , [he]1006-meleager names [[his]1006-meleager aged father]3668-his aged father , [[his]1006-meleager brothers]2253-his brothers , [[his]1006-meleager loving sisters]3670-his loving sisters , [the companion of [his]1006-meleager bed]3671-the companion of his bed , and , it may be , [[his]1006-meleager mother]5953-his mother . The fire and the suffering flare up , and die away , again , and both are extinguished together . Gradually [his]1006-meleager breath vanishes into the light breeze : gradually white ashes veil the glowing embers . [Noble Calydon]1005-calydon lies dead . [Young men]2267-young men and old lament , [people]1519-people and [princes]2434-princes moan , and [the women of [Calydon]182-calydon]3676-the women of calydon , by [the River]1711-the river [Euenus]1043-euenus , tear at [their]3676-the women of calydon hair , and beat [their]3676-the women of calydon breasts . [[His]1006-meleager father]1775-his father , prone on the ground , mars [his]1775-his father aged features and white hair with dust , and rebukes [himself]1775-his father for [his]1775-his father long years . As for [[his]1006-meleager mother]5953-his mother , conscious of [her]5953-his mother dreadful action , [she]5953-his mother has exacted punishment on [herself]5953-his mother , with [her]5953-his mother own hand driving the weapon into [her]5953-his mother body . Not though [the god]1482-the god had given [me]0-i a hundred mouths speaking with tongues , the necessary genius , and all [Helicon]46-helicon as [my]0-i domain , could [I]0-i describe the sad fate of [[his]1006-meleager poor sisters]3681-his poor sisters . Forgetting what is seemly , [they]3681-his poor sisters strike [their]3681-his poor sisters bruised chests , and while there is something left of the body , the body is caressed again and again , as [they]3681-his poor sisters kiss it and kiss the bier on which it lies . Once [he]1006-meleager is ashes the ashes are gathered , and [they]3681-his poor sisters press them to [their]3681-his poor sisters breasts , throw [themselves]3681-his poor sisters down on [[his]1006-meleager tomb]6047-his tomb , and clasping the stone carved with [his]1006-meleager name , [they]3681-his poor sisters drown the name with tears . At last , [Diana]527-diana , satiated with [her]527-diana destruction of [the house of [Parthaon]1044-parthaon]3683-the house of parthaon , lifted [them]3681-his poor sisters up , all except [Gorge]1045-gorge , and [Deianira]1046-deianira , [the daughter - in - law of [noble Alcmena]777-aegina]3684-the daughter - in - law of noble alcmena , and , making feathers spring from [their]3681-his poor sisters bodies , and stretching long wings over [their]3681-his poor sisters arms , [she]527-diana gave [them]3681-his poor sisters beaks , and , changed to guinea - hens , [the Meleagrides]1047-the meleagrides , launched [them]3681-his poor sisters into the air . Meanwhile , [Theseus]958-theseus , having played [his]958-theseus part in the united effort , turned back towards [Athens]85-athens , [[Tritonia]627-tritonia ’s city , where [Erectheus]920-erectheus once ruled]273-tritonia ’s city , where erectheus once ruled . But [the River Acheloüs , swollen with rain]3685-the river acheloüs , swollen with rain , blocked [his]958-theseus immediate path , and stalled [his]958-theseus journey . ‘ Come under [my]2896-the river - god roof , [famous scion of [Cecrops]628-cecrops]7473-famous scion of cecrops , ’[2896-the river - god] [the river - god]2896-the river - god said , ‘ and do not commit [yourself]3688-yourself to [[my]2896-the river - god devouring waters]7474-my devouring waters . [They]7474-my devouring waters are liable to carry solid tree - trunks along , in [their]7474-my devouring waters roaring , and roll great boulders over on [their]7474-my devouring waters sides . [I]2896-the river - god have seen whole byres , near [the bank]7475-the bank , swept away , with all [their]7474-my devouring waters livestock : and neither the cattle ’s strength nor the horses ’[2896-the river - god] speed was of any use . Many [a strong man]3687-a strong man has been lost in the whirling vortices , when the torrent was loosed , after mountain snows . [You]3688-yourself will be safer to stay till [[my]0-i river]3689-my river runs in its normal channel , when its bed holds only a slender stream . ’ [[Aegeus]957-aegeus ’s son]7159-aegeus ’s son nodded , and replied : ‘[0-i] [I]0-i will make use of [[your]0-i house]3690-your house , and [[your]0-i counsel]3691-your counsel , [Acheloüs]1048-acheloüs . ’ And so [he]0-i did . [He]0-i entered [the dark building]7477-the dark building , made of spongy pumice , and rough tufa . The floor was moist with soft moss , and the ceiling banded with freshwater mussel and oyster shells . Now [Hyperion]745-hyperion , the sun , had measured out two thirds of [his]745-hyperion path of light , when [Theseus]958-theseus and [[his]958-theseus companions of the hunt]7478-his companions of the hunt seated [themselves]7478-his companions of the hunt on couches . Here was [Pirithoüs]1011-pirithoüs , [[Ixion]763-ixion ’s son]7479-ixion ’s son , and there , [Lelex]1023-lelex , [[Troezen]188-troezen ’s hero]7480-troezen ’s hero , [his]1023-lelex temples already streaked with thinning grey hair , and there were others whom [the Acarnanian river - god]7481-the acarnanian river - god , greatly delighted to have such [a guest]6812-a guest , judged worthy of equal honour . Quickly [the barefoot nymphs]7483-the barefoot nymphs set out dishes of food on the nearby tables , and when [they]7483-the barefoot nymphs had been cleared again , poured wine in jewelled cups . Then [the greatest of heroes]7484-the greatest of heroes looking out over [the waters below]7485-the waters below , asked : ‘[1048-acheloüs] What is that place ? ’ ( [He]7484-the greatest of heroes pointed with [his]7484-the greatest of heroes finger . ) ‘[1048-acheloüs] Tell [me]0-i what name [the island]7121-the island has , though it seems more than an island ! ’ [The river - god]2896-the river - god replied ‘[1048-acheloüs] What [you]3693-you see is not [one island]3694-one island : [five pieces of land]3695-five pieces of land lie together , but the distance conceals their distinctiveness . This will make [you]3693-you less astonished at what [Diana]527-diana did to [Calydon]1005-calydon when [she]527-diana was slighted . [Those islands]3696-those islands were once nymphs , who , though [they]3697-they had slaughtered ten bullocks and invited [the rural gods]3698-the rural gods to the festival , forgot [me]0-i as [they]3697-they led the festal dance . [I]0-i swelled with anger , as fierce as when [my]0-i flood is at its fullest , and terrible in wind and wave , [I]0-i tore forest from forest and [field]3699-field from [field]3699-field , and swept [the nymphs]5945-the nymphs , who then , at last , remembered [me]0-i , along with the place [they]5945-the nymphs trod , into [the sea]1464-the sea . There [the ocean]1657-the ocean and [[my]0-i waters]3704-my waters separated what had been continuous ground , and split [it]3705-it into as many parts as [you]3706-you see [islands]3707-islands , the Echinades , there in the midst of the waves . But as [you]3706-you can see for [yourself]3706-you , far off , far off [one island]3694-one island vanishes , dear to [me]0-i : [the sailors]3709-the sailors call it [Perimele]1050-perimele . [I]0-i loved [her]3710-her and stole [her]3710-her virginity . At which [[her]3710-her father]1694-her father , unable to accept it , threw [[his]1694-her father daughter]2098-his daughter from [the cliffs]3713-the cliffs into the deep , intending to destroy [her]3710-her . [I]0-i caught [her]3710-her , and holding [her]3710-her as [she]3710-her swam , [I]0-i cried : ‘ O God of [the Trident]275-the trident , to whom rule over the restless waves , closest to [earth]1449-earth , fell by [lot]7488-lot , give [your]7489-you aid [I]0-i beg , and grant a place to one whom [a father]5997-a father ’s anger drowns , or allow [her]3710-her to be that place [herself]3710-her ! ’[0-i] While [I]0-i spoke , [new earth]3714-new earth clasped [her]3710-her body , as [she]3710-her swam , and [a solid island]3715-a solid island rose , round [her]3710-her changed limbs . At this , [the river - god]2896-the river - god fell silent . The wonder of the thing had gripped [them]3717-them all . But that daring spirit , [Pirithoüs]1011-pirithoüs , [son of Ixion]7431-son of ixion , scornful of [the gods]1538-the gods , laughed at [their]3717-them credulity . ‘ These are fictions [you]7489-you tell of , [Acheloüs]1048-acheloüs , and [you]7489-you credit [the gods]1538-the gods with too much power , if [you]7489-you think [they]1538-the gods can give and take away the forms of things . ’[1756-the others] [The others]1756-the others were startled , and disapproved of [his]1011-pirithoüs words , [Lelex]1023-lelex above all , experienced in mind and years , who said : ‘ The power of the gods is great and knows no limit , and whatever heaven decrees comes to pass . To help convince [you]7489-you , in [the hills of [Phrygia]176-phrygia]7492-the hills of phrygia , an oak and a lime tree stand side by side , surrounded by a low wall . [I]1023-lelex have seen [the place]1552-the place , since [Pittheus]1051-pittheus , [king of [Troezen]188-troezen]7494-king of troezen , sent [me]1023-lelex into [that country]6099-that country , where [[his]1051-pittheus father]1775-his father [Pelops]907-pelops once ruled . There is [a swamp not far from there]7497-a swamp not far from there , once [habitable land]7498-habitable land but now the haunt of diving - birds and [marsh - loving coots]7499-marsh - loving coots . [Jupiter]499-jupiter went [there]1878-there , disguised as [a mortal]1570-a mortal , and [Mercury]550-cyllenian mercury , [the descendant of [Atlas]546-atlas]1781-the descendant of atlas , setting aside [his]550-cyllenian mercury wings , went with [[his]550-cyllenian mercury father]1775-his father , carrying the caduceus . [A thousand houses]7504-a thousand houses [they]7504-a thousand houses approached , looking for [a place to rest]7505-a place to rest : [a thousand houses]7504-a thousand houses were locked and bolted . But one received [them]7504-a thousand houses : it was humble it is true , roofed with reeds and stems from [the marsh]1790-the marsh , but [godly Baucis]1052-baucis and [the equally aged Philemon]7508-the equally aged philemon , had been wedded in [that cottage]7509-that cottage in [their]7504-a thousand houses younger years , and there had grown old together . [They]7504-a thousand houses made light of poverty by acknowledging it , and bearing it without discontent of mind . It was no matter if [you]7510-you asked for [owner]7511-owner or [servant there]7512-servant there : [those two]7513-those two were [the whole household]7514-the whole household : [they]7504-a thousand houses gave orders and carried [them]7504-a thousand houses out equally . So when [the gods from heaven]7515-the gods from heaven met [the humble household gods]7516-the humble household gods , and stooping down , passed the low doorway , [the old man]6107-the old man pulled out a bench , and requested [them]7504-a thousand houses to rest [their]7504-a thousand houses limbs , while over the bench [Baucis]1052-baucis threw a rough blanket . Then [she]7518-she raked over the warm ashes in the hearth , and brought yesterday ’s fire to life , feeding it with leaves and dried bark , nursing the flames with [her]7518-she aged breath . [She]7518-she pulled down finely divided twigs and dry stems from the roof , and , breaking them further , pushed them under a small bronze pot . Next [she]7518-she stripped the leaves from vegetables that [[her]7518-she husband]5872-her husband had gathered from [[his]5872-her husband well - watered garden]7520-his well - watered garden . [He]5872-her husband used a two - pronged stick to lift down a wretched - looking chine of meat , hanging from a blackened beam , and , cutting a meagre piece from the carefully saved chine , put what had been cut , to seethe , in boiling water . In the meantime [they]7504-a thousand houses made conversation to pass the time , and prevent [[their]7504-a thousand houses guests]7521-their guests being conscious of the delay . There was a beech wood tub , suspended by its handle from a crude peg : this had been filled with warm water , and allowed [[their]7504-a thousand houses visitors]7522-their visitors to refresh [their]7522-their visitors limbs . In the middle of the floor there was a mattress of soft sedges . Placed on a frame and legs of willow it made a couch . [They]7504-a thousand houses covered it with cloths , that [they]7504-a thousand houses only used to bring out for the times of sacred festivals , but even these were old and worn , not unworthy of the couch . [The gods]1538-the gods were seated . [The old woman]6745-the old woman , [her]6745-the old woman skirts tucked up , [her]6745-the old woman hands trembling , placed a table there , but a table with one of the three legs unequal : a piece of broken pot made them equal . Pushed underneath , it countered the slope , and [she]6745-the old woman wiped the level surface with fresh mint . On it [she]6745-the old woman put the black and green olives that belong to pure [Minerva]610-pallas , and the cornelian cherries of autumn , preserved in wine lees ; radishes and endives ; a lump of cheese ; and lightly roasted eggs , untouched by the hot ashes ; all in clay dishes . After this [she]6745-the old woman set out a carved mixing bowl for wine , just as costly , with cups made of beech wood , hollowed out , and lined with yellow bees ’[1023-lelex] wax . There was little delay before the fire provided [its]3721-its hot food , and the wine , of no great age , circulated , and then , removed again , made a little room for the second course . There were nuts , and a mix of dried figs and wrinkled dates ; plums , and sweet - smelling apples in open wicker baskets ; and grapes gathered from the purple vines . In the centre was a gleaming honeycomb . Above all , there was the additional presence of well - meaning faces , and no unwillingness , or poverty of spirit . ’ ‘[3722-the old couple] Meanwhile [the old couple]3722-the old couple noticed that , as soon as the mixing bowl was empty , it refilled itself , unaided , and the wine appeared of its own accord . [They]3722-the old couple were fearful at this strange and astonishing sight , and timidly [Baucis]1052-baucis and [Philemon]1053-philemon murmured a prayer , [their]3722-the old couple palms upwards , and begged [the gods]1538-the gods ’ forgiveness for the meal , and [their]3722-the old couple un - preparedness . [They]3722-the old couple had a goose , the guard for [[their]3722-the old couple tiny cottage]7525-their tiny cottage : as [hosts]7526-hosts [they]3722-the old couple prepared to sacrifice [it]7525-their tiny cottage for [[their]3722-the old couple divine guests]7527-their divine guests . But , quick - winged , it wore [the old people]7528-the old people out and , for a long time , escaped [them]7528-the old people , at last appearing to take refuge with [the gods]1538-the gods [themselves]3722-the old couple . Then [the heaven - born ones]7530-the heaven - born ones told [them]7528-the old people not to kill [it]7525-their tiny cottage . “ [We]3722-the old couple are [gods]1446-gods , ” [they]3722-the old couple said , “ and [this neighbourhood]7532-this neighbourhood will receive just punishment for its impiety , but to [you]7528-the old people [we]3722-the old couple grant exemption from that evil . Just leave [[your]7528-the old people house]3690-your house , and accompany [our]3722-the old couple steps , as [we]3722-the old couple climb [that steep mountainside]7534-that steep mountainside together . ” [They]3722-the old couple both obeyed , and leaning on [their]3722-the old couple sticks to ease [their]3722-the old couple climb , [they]3722-the old couple set foot on the long slope . When [they]3722-the old couple were as far from the summit as a bowshot might carry , [they]3722-the old couple looked back , and saw everywhere else vanished in [the swamp]7535-the swamp : only [their]3724-their own roof was visible . And while [they]3722-the old couple stood amazed at this , mourning [[their]3722-the old couple neighbours]3602-their neighbours ’[1052-baucis] fate , [[their]3724-their old cottage]3725-their old cottage , tiny even for [the two of [them]3724-their]6418-the two of them , turned into [a temple]3727-a temple . Wooden poles became pillars , and the reed thatch grew yellow , until a golden roof appeared , richly carved doors , and a marble pavement covering the ground . Then [the son of Saturn]6727-the son of saturn spoke , calmly , to [them]3724-their : “ Ask of [us]3724-their , [virtuous old man]3729-virtuous old man , and [you]3724-their , [wife]5843-wife , worthy of [a virtuous husband]3731-a virtuous husband , what [you]3724-their wish . ” When [he]6727-the son of saturn had spoken briefly with [Baucis]1052-baucis , [Philemon]1053-philemon revealed [their]3724-their joint request to [the gods]1538-the gods . “ [We]3724-their ask to be [priests]3733-priests and watch over [[your]3724-their temple]3734-your temple , and , since [we]3724-their have lived out harmonious years together , let the same hour take [the two of [us]3724-their]3735-the two of us , so that [I]0-i never have to see [[my]0-i wife]6055-my wife ’s grave , nor [she]6055-my wife have to bury [me]0-i . ” [The gods]1538-the gods ’ assurance followed the prayer . [They]1538-the gods had charge of [the temple]1675-the temple while [they]1538-the gods lived : and when [they]1538-the gods were released by old age , and by the years , as [they]1538-the gods chanced to be standing by the sacred steps , discussing the subject of [their]1538-the gods deaths , [Baucis]1052-baucis saw [Philemon]1053-philemon put out leaves , and [old Philemon]1053-philemon saw [Baucis]1052-baucis put out leaves , and as the tops of the trees grew over [their]1538-the gods two faces , [they]1538-the gods exchanged words , while [they]1538-the gods still could , saying , in the same breath : “ Farewell , [O dear companion]7538-o dear companion ” , as , in the same breath , the bark covered [them]1538-the gods , concealing [their]1538-the gods mouths . [The people of [Bithynia]276-bithynia]7539-the people of bithynia still show the neighbouring trees there , that sprang from [their]7539-the people of bithynia two bodies . [Trustworthy old men]7540-trustworthy old men related these things to [me]1023-lelex ( there was no reason why [they]7540-trustworthy old men should wish to lie ) . For [my]1023-lelex part , [I]1023-lelex saw garlands hanging from the branches , and placing fresh ones there said : “ Let [those who love the gods]7541-those who love the gods become [gods]1446-gods : let those who have honoured [them]7541-those who love the gods , be honoured . ” ’[1023-lelex] [Lelex]1023-lelex finished , and the tale and the teller of it had moved [them]3738-they all , [Theseus]958-theseus particularly . [He]1023-lelex wished to hear more of the marvellous acts of [the gods]1538-the gods . [Acheloüs]1048-acheloüs , [the river - god of [Calydon]182-calydon]3740-the river - god of calydon , leaning on [his]3740-the river - god of calydon elbow , said : ‘ [Hero]1054-hero , there are [those who , once changed in form , retain that transformation]7543-those who , once changed in form , retain that transformation : there are [others who are allowed to transmute into many shapes]7544-others who are allowed to transmute into many shapes : [you]1054-hero , for instance , [Proteus]1055-proteus , inhabitant of [the earth - encircling sea]7545-the earth - encircling sea . A moment ago [they]3738-they saw [you]1054-hero as [a young man]7546-a young man , then as a lion : now as a raging boar , then as a serpent , [they]3738-they fear to touch : and , in a moment , horns revealed [you]1054-hero as a bull . Often [you]1054-hero might have appeared as a stone , often , also , as a tree : sometimes , [you]1054-hero formed the likeness of running water , and became [a river]2448-a river : sometimes fire , water ’s opposite . [Mestra]1056-mestra , [[Erysichthon]1057-erysichthon ’s daughter]7548-erysichthon ’s daughter , [the wife of [Autolycus]1058-autolycus]7549-the wife of autolycus , had no less power . [[Her]1056-mestra father]1694-her father was [a man scornful of the gods]7551-a man scornful of the gods , who burnt no incense on [their]1694-her father altars . [Erysichthon]1057-erysichthon , it is said , once violated [the grove of [Ceres]689-ceres]7552-the grove of ceres with an axe , and desecrated [the ancient woods]7553-the ancient woods with iron . Within [them]7552-the grove of ceres stood a great oak , massive with the years , a sacred grove in [itself]7552-the grove of ceres : strands of wool , wreaths of flowers and votive tablets surrounded [it]7552-the grove of ceres , evidence of prayers granted . Often beneath [it]7552-the grove of ceres [the Dryads]7554-the dryads held [their]7554-the dryads festive dances : often , also , linking hands , in line , they circled its trunk ’s circumference , its massive girth measuring fifteen arm’s - lengths round . The other trees were not less far below [it]7552-the grove of ceres than the grass was far below all of [them]7552-the grove of ceres . [[Triopas]1059-triopas ’s son]7555-triopas ’s son would not hold back the blade , even for those reasons , commanding [[his]7555-triopas ’s son servants]7556-his servants to fell the sacred oak . When [he]7555-triopas ’s son saw [them]7556-his servants hesitating at the order , [the wretched man]7557-the wretched man snatched the axe from one of [them]7556-his servants , saying : “ Though this be , itself , [the goddess]5864-the goddess , not just what [the goddess]5864-the goddess loves , now its leafy crown will meet [the earth]1463-the earth . ” As [he]7557-the wretched man spoke , while [he]7557-the wretched man balanced the blade , for the slanting stroke , [Ceres]689-ceres ’s oak - tree trembled all over and gave a sigh , and at the same time its acorns and its leaves began to whiten , and its long branches grew pale . And , when [his]7557-the wretched man impious hand made a gash in the trunk , blood poured out of its damaged bark , like the crimson tide from [its]7552-the grove of ceres severed neck , when the mighty bull falls , in sacrifice , before the altar . [All]5784-all stood astonished , and [one of [them]5784-all]7562-one of them tried bravely to prevent the evil , and hinder the barbarous double - edged weapon . But [the Thessalian]1014-caeneus glared at [him]7557-the wretched man , saying : “ Here ’s the prize for [your]7557-the wretched man pious thought ! ” and swinging [his]7557-the wretched man blade at [the man not the tree]7563-the man not the tree , struck [his]7557-the wretched man head from [his]7557-the wretched man trunk . [He]7557-the wretched man was hewing at the oak - tree repeatedly , when the sound of a voice came from inside the oak , chanting these words : “ [I]1048-acheloüs am [a nymph , most dear to [Ceres]689-ceres]7564-a nymph , most dear to ceres , under the surface of this wood , who prophesy to [you]689-ceres , as [I]1048-acheloüs die , that punishment will follow blood : out of [my]1048-acheloüs ruin , the only good ” . But [he]7557-the wretched man pursued [his]7557-the wretched man course of evil , and at last , weakened by innumerable blows , and dragged down by ropes , the tree fell , its weight cutting a swathe through the wood . ’[1048-acheloüs] ‘ All [[her]689-ceres sister]6129-her sister [Dryads]691-the dryads , mourning and dressed in black , horrified at [the forest]7566-the forest ’s loss and [their]691-the dryads own , went to [Ceres]689-ceres , and begged [her]689-ceres to punish [Erysichthon]1057-erysichthon . [She]689-ceres assented , and , with a motion of [her]689-ceres head , that most beautiful of goddesses stirred [the fields]1522-the fields , heavy with ripened grain . [She]689-ceres devised a punishment to rouse [men]5788-men ’s pity , if [his]5788-men actions had deserved any pity : to torment [him]5788-men with baleful Hunger . But since [the goddess]5864-the goddess [herself]5864-the goddess could not approach [her]689-ceres ( for fate does not allow [Famine]1060-famine and [Ceres]689-ceres to meet ) [she]689-ceres called for one of the mountain spirits , [an Oread of wild places]7570-an oread of wild places , and said to [her]5864-the goddess : “ There is [a place at [the furthest bounds of [icy Scythia]5-scythia]7572-the furthest bounds of icy scythia , with sombre , sterile ground , [a land without crops or trees]7573-a land without crops or trees]7571-a place at the furthest bounds of icy scythia , with sombre , sterile ground , a land without crops or trees . [Torpid Cold]278-torpid cold inhabits [it]7571-a place at the furthest bounds of icy scythia , with sombre , sterile ground , a land without crops or trees , Fear and Trembling and barren Hunger . Order [Famine]1060-famine to immure [herself]1060-famine in the belly of [that sacrilegious wretch]7574-that sacrilegious wretch , and let [no plenty]7575-no plenty oust [her]1060-famine , and let [her]1060-famine overcome [me]1048-acheloüs in any trial of strength . So that the length of the journey does not worry [you]689-ceres , take [[my]1048-acheloüs chariot]7053-my chariot , take [my]1048-acheloüs winged dragons , and govern [their]7577-their bridles on high . ” And [she]5864-the goddess gave [her]1060-famine the reins . [The nymph]1783-the nymph came to [Scythia]5-scythia , carried through the air , in [the chariot [she]1783-the nymph was given]7579-the chariot she was given . On [the summit of [a frozen mountain chain]7581-a frozen mountain chain ( [they]7582-they call [the Caucasus]57-the caucasus]7580-the summit of a frozen mountain chain ( they call the caucasus ) [she]5864-the goddess loosed the dragons ’[1048-acheloüs] necks , and , searching for [Famine]1060-famine , saw [her]1060-famine in [a field of stones]3741-a field of stones , picking at the sparse grass with [her]1060-famine nails and teeth . [Her]1060-famine hair was matted , [her]1060-famine eyes sunken , [her]1060-famine face pallid : [her]1060-famine lips were grey with mould , [her]1060-famine throat with scabrous sores : through the hardened skin , [her]1060-famine inner organs could be seen : dry bones stuck out beneath [her]1060-famine hollow loins : [her]1060-famine belly was only the excuse for a belly : [her]1060-famine breastbone seemed to hang loosely , only held by the frame of [her]1060-famine spine . Emaciation made the joints look large : the curve of [her]1060-famine knees seemed swollen : and the ankles appeared as extravagant lumps . When [the Oread]1061-the oread saw [her]1060-famine , [she]1060-famine relayed [the goddess]5864-the goddess ’s command , from a distance ( since [she]1060-famine did not dare to approach [her]1060-famine ) , and though [she]1060-famine only delayed an instant , and stayed far off , though [she]1060-famine had only arrived there a moment before , [she]1060-famine still seemed to feel the hunger . Changing course , high in the air , [she]1060-famine directed the dragons towards [Haemonia]25-haemonia . [Famine]1060-famine carried out [Ceres]689-ceres ’s orders , though [their]3743-their tasks are ever opposed , and flew down through the eye of the wind to [the appointed house]3744-the appointed house . Straight away [she]1060-famine entered [the bedroom of [the sacrilegious man , who was sunk in profound sleep ( since it was night )]3746-the sacrilegious man , who was sunk in profound sleep ( since it was night )]3745-the bedroom of the sacrilegious man , who was sunk in profound sleep ( since it was night ) , and breathed [herself]1060-famine into [him]3746-the sacrilegious man , who was sunk in profound sleep ( since it was night ) , covering [his]3746-the sacrilegious man , who was sunk in profound sleep ( since it was night ) throat , and chest , and lips , with [her]1060-famine exhalations , and causing a lack of nourishment in [his]3746-the sacrilegious man , who was sunk in profound sleep ( since it was night ) hollow veins . Completing [her]1060-famine mission , [she]1060-famine left [the fertile lands]3747-the fertile lands , returning to [the houses of poverty]3748-the houses of poverty , and [[her]1060-famine customary caves]3749-her customary caves . Gentle Sleep still lulls [Erysichthon]1057-erysichthon , with [his]1057-erysichthon peaceful wings . [He]1057-erysichthon , in sleep , in imagination , dreams of feasts , closes [his]1057-erysichthon mouth on vacancy , grinds tooth on tooth , exercises [his]1057-erysichthon gluttony on insubstantial food , and , instead of a banquet , fruitlessly eats the empty air . But when indeed peace departs a desperate desire to eat possesses [his]1057-erysichthon famished jaws and burning belly . Without a moment ’s delay [he]1057-erysichthon calls out for whatever earth , air and [sea]1450-sea produce , and at table complains of hunger , and in the midst of eating demands to eat . What would feed [a city]3751-a city , or satisfy [a people]2237-a people , is not enough for one . The more [he]1057-erysichthon puts away inside , the greater [his]1057-erysichthon desire . As [the ocean]1657-the ocean receives [the rivers of all the earth]3754-the rivers of all the earth , and unfilled by [the waters]1626-the waters , swallows [every wandering stream]3756-every wandering stream : as the devouring flames never refuse more fuel , burn endless timber , and look for more , the greater the piles [they]3757-they are given , more voracious [themselves]3757-they by being fed , so [Erysichthon]1057-erysichthon ’s profane lips accept and demand all foods , in the same breath . All nourishment in [him]1057-erysichthon is a reason for nourishment , and always by eating [he]1057-erysichthon creates an empty void . ’ ‘[1057-erysichthon] Now hunger , and the deep pit of [his]1057-erysichthon gut had consumed [his]1057-erysichthon wealth , but even so , [Famine]1060-famine worked unabated and [his]1057-erysichthon burning appetite was unappeased . Eventually , when all [he]1057-erysichthon owned was inside [him]1057-erysichthon , only [[his]1057-erysichthon daughter]2098-his daughter , [Mestra]1056-mestra , was left , [a girl whom [the father]1852-the father was not worthy of]3759-a girl whom the father was not worthy of . Having nothing , [he]1057-erysichthon tried to sell [her]3759-a girl whom the father was not worthy of too . [The honourable child]3761-the honourable child refused to accept [a possessor]3762-a possessor , and stretching [her]3761-the honourable child hands out over the waves of [the shore]2065-the shore , [she]3761-the honourable child cried : “ [[You]1852-the father god , who stole away the prize of [my]0-i virginity]3764-you god , who stole away the prize of my virginity ” , for [Neptune]514-neptune had stolen it , “ save [me]0-i from slavery . ” [He]1057-erysichthon did not scorn [her]3761-the honourable child prayer . Although [the buyer]3765-the buyer had been following [her]3761-the honourable child , and had seen [her]3761-the honourable child a moment ago , [the god]1482-the god altered [her]3761-the honourable child shape , giving [her]3761-the honourable child [a man]5897-a man ’s features , and clothes appropriate to [a fisherman]3768-a fisherman . [[Her]3761-the honourable child purchaser]3769-her purchaser looked at [her]3761-the honourable child , and said : “ O , [you]3761-the honourable child who control the rod , and hide [your]3761-the honourable child bronze hook in a little bait , may [you]3761-the honourable child have [calm sea]3770-calm sea , and gullible fish , that feel nothing of the hook until they bite . Tell [me]0-i where [she]3761-the honourable child is , [the girl with shabby clothes and straggling hair , who stood here on [this beach]3772-this beach a moment ago ( since [I]0-i saw [her]3761-the honourable child , standing on [the beach]3773-the beach ): there are no footprints further on]3771-the girl with shabby clothes and straggling hair , who stood here on this beach a moment ago ( since i saw her , standing on the beach ): there are no footprints further on ! ” [She]3761-the honourable child sensed [the god]1482-the god ’s gift was working well for [her]3761-the honourable child , and delighted that [he]1482-the god was asking [her]3761-the honourable child for news of [herself]3761-the honourable child , replied to [his]1482-the god question : “ Forgive [me]0-i , whoever [you]3761-the honourable child are : [I]0-i have had no eyes for anything except [this pool]3775-this pool : [I]0-i have been occupied taking pains over [my]0-i fishing . To convince [you]3761-the honourable child , and may [the sea god]3776-the sea god help [me]0-i in these arts of mine , [no man]2270-no man has been on [this beach]3772-this beach , except [myself]0-i , for a long time , and [no woman]1641-no woman either . ” [He]1482-the god believed [her]3761-the honourable child , and turning round on the sand , having been outplayed , departed . Then [her]3761-the honourable child true shape was restored . When [[her]3761-the honourable child father]1694-her father realised that [she]3761-the honourable child could change [her]3761-the honourable child shape , [he]1694-her father often surrendered [Mestra]3781-mestra to [others]5836-others , so that [she]3761-the honourable child , escaping in the form of a mare , or a bird , or again as [a heifer or a hind]3783-a heifer or a hind , repeatedly obtained [her]3761-the honourable child price , dishonestly , for [[her]3761-the honourable child gluttonous father]3784-her gluttonous father . In the end when the evil had consumed everything [they]3785-they had , and [his]1694-her father grave disease needed ever more food , [Erysichthon]1057-erysichthon began to tear at [his]1694-her father limbs and gnaw them with [his]1694-her father teeth , and [the unhappy man]6244-the unhappy man fed , little by little , on [his]6244-the unhappy man own body . ’ ‘[6244-the unhappy man] But why do [I]0-i entertain [you]0-i with stories of [others]5836-others ? ’ said [Acheloüs]1048-acheloüs , ‘[0-i] Indeed , [young man]3035-young man , [I]0-i have often changed shape [myself]0-i , though the number of shapes [I]0-i can achieve is limited . Sometimes [I]0-i am seen as [I]0-i am now : sometimes [I]0-i become a snake : or , again , [the lead bull of [the herd]3790-the herd]3789-the lead bull of the herd , [my]0-i power in [my]0-i horns – horns , when [I]0-i still had two . Now one side of [my]0-i brow has lost its weapon , as [you]0-i can see for [yourself]0-i . ’ [His]0-i words were followed by a sigh . [Theseus]958-theseus , [the hero]2234-the hero , [reputed son of [Neptune]514-neptune]7584-reputed son of neptune , asked [Acheloüs]1048-acheloüs why [he]3791-he had sighed , and the reason for [his]3791-he damaged forehead : to which [the Calydonian river - god]7585-the calydonian river - god , [his]7585-the calydonian river - god uncut hair wreathed with reeds , replied : ‘[0-i] [You]0-i ask something painful of [me]0-i . Who wants to recall the battles [he]3791-he has lost ? But , [I]0-i will tell it as it happened : since the shame of being beaten is no less than the honour of having fought . It is a great consolation to [me]0-i that [the victor]6480-the victor was so famous . If [her]6480-the victor name has ever come to [your]0-i notice , [Deianira]1046-deianira was once [the most beautiful girl]3793-the most beautiful girl , and the jealous hope of [many suitors]2721-many suitors . When , with [them]3795-them , [I]0-i entered [[Oeneus]1005-calydon ’s house]3796-oeneus ’s house , [[her]6480-the victor father]1694-her father , and [the man]5875-the man [I]0-i sought as [[my]0-i father - in - law]2970-my father - in - law , [I]0-i said : “ Accept [me]0-i as [[your]0-i son - in - law]3800-your son - in - law , [son of Parthaon]3801-son of parthaon . ” [Hercules]941-hercules , [scion of [Alceus]1062-alceus]3802-scion of alceus , said the same . [The others]1756-the others gave way before [the two of [us]3735-the two of us]3735-the two of us . [Hercules]941-hercules declared that [he]941-hercules could offer [Jove]605-jove as [[[his]941-hercules bride]6654-his bride ’s father - in - law]3806-his bride ’s father - in - law , spoke of [his]941-hercules famous labours , and of how [he]941-hercules had survived what [[his]941-hercules stepmother]3807-his stepmother , [Juno]525-juno , had prescribed for [him]941-hercules . On [my]0-i side [I]0-i said : “ It would be shameful for [a god]1461-a god to concede to [a mortal]1570-a mortal ” – [He]605-jove was not yet [a god]1461-a god – “ In [me]0-i [you]3811-your see [the lord of the waters]3812-the lord of the waters , that flow in winding rivers , through [[your]3811-your kingdom]3813-your kingdom . As [[your]3811-your son - in - law]3800-your son - in - law [I]0-i would not be [a stranger sent from [a foreign shore]3816-a foreign shore , but [a native]3817-a native , and wedded to [your]3811-your own interests]3815-a stranger sent from a foreign shore , but a native , and wedded to your own interests . Only do n’t let it harm [my]0-i case that [Queen Juno]877-juno does not hate [me]0-i , and all the punishment of the labours , [she]877-juno demanded , passed [me]0-i by ! ” “ Now , listen , [Hercules]941-hercules , [you]941-hercules , [son of [Alcmena]777-aegina]3818-son of alcmena : [Jupiter]499-jupiter , whose child [you]941-hercules boast of being , is either wrongly called [[your]941-hercules father]1808-your father , or is truly [a wrongdoer]3820-a wrongdoer . [You]941-hercules seek [[your]941-hercules father]1808-your father in [a mother]5881-a mother ’s adultery . Choose whether [you]941-hercules prefer this fiction of [Jove]605-jove as [a father]5997-a father , or to be born [the son of shame]3824-the son of shame . ” As [I]0-i spoke , [he]941-hercules gazed at [me]0-i fiercely , all the while , and unable to act like [a man]5897-a man and control [his]941-hercules blazing anger , [he]941-hercules merely replied in these words : “ [My]0-i right hand is more powerful than [my]0-i tongue . As long as [I]0-i beat [you]0-i at wrestling , [you]0-i can win the talking ” , and [he]941-hercules came at [me]0-i ferociously . [I]0-i was ashamed to retreat , after [my]0-i words : [I]0-i took off [my]0-i green robes ; put up [my]0-i arms ; held [my]0-i hands , fingers curved , in front of [my]0-i chest in fighting stance ; and readied [my]0-i limbs for the match . [He]941-hercules caught up dust in the hollow of [his]941-hercules hands and threw it over [me]0-i , and , in turn , was , [himself]941-hercules , gilded by the yellow sand . Now [he]941-hercules caught at [my]0-i neck , or [you]3826-you might think [he]941-hercules caught [me]0-i , now at [my]0-i legs , now at [my]0-i loins : and attacked [me]0-i from every side . [My]0-i weight protected [me]0-i , and [his]941-hercules attempts were useless . [I]0-i was like a massive pile that the roaring flood assaults with all its might : it remains , secure in its own bulk . [We]3827-we pulled away for a moment , returned to the conflict , and stood firm , determined not to concede . Foot was set against foot , and [I]0-i pushed at [him]941-hercules , with [my]0-i chest full forward , fingers locked with fingers , and head to head . [I]0-i have seen two strong bulls come together like that , when [they]3828-they try for the sleekest heifer in [the pasture]3829-the pasture as [their]3828-they prize in the contest . [The herd]3790-the herd watches in fear , not sure to which one victory will grant overriding supremacy . Three times without success [Hercules]941-hercules tried to push [my]0-i gleaming chest away from [him]941-hercules . At the fourth attempt , [he]941-hercules broke [my]0-i grip , loosed [himself]941-hercules from [my]0-i constricting arms , and with a blow of [his]941-hercules hand – certainly , [I]0-i [myself]0-i confess it is the truth – [he]941-hercules turned [me]0-i about , and clung , with all [his]941-hercules weight , to [my]0-i back . If [you]3831-you can believe it - [I]0-i am not seeking to gain false credit by saying it – [I]0-i seemed to have a mountain pressing on top of [me]0-i . With difficulty [I]0-i thrust [my]0-i arms , pouring with sweat from the great effort it took , under [him]941-hercules , and , with difficulty , freed [his]941-hercules firm hold on [my]0-i body . [He]941-hercules pressed [me]0-i hard , as [I]0-i gasped for breath , prevented [me]0-i from gathering [my]0-i strength , and gripped [my]0-i neck . Then , at last , [my]0-i knee touched the ground , and [my]0-i mouth tasted sand . Inferior to [him]941-hercules in strength , [I]0-i turned to [my]0-i magic arts , and slipped from [his]941-hercules grasp in the shape of a long snake . But when [I]0-i had wound [my]0-i body in sinuous coils , and , hissing fiercely , darted [my]0-i forked tongue at [him]941-hercules , [[Tiryns]777-aegina ’s hero]3832-tiryns ’s hero laughed , and mocking [my]0-i magic arts , said : “ [My]0-i task in the cradle was to defeat snakes , and , though [you]0-i are greater than other reptiles , [Acheloüs]1048-acheloüs , how big a slice of the Lernean Hydra would [your]0-i one serpent be ? [It]3833-it was made fecund by [its]3833-it wounds , and not one of its hundred heads was safely cut off without its neck generating two more . [I]0-i overcame it , and having overcome it , disembowelled that monster , with branching snake - heads , that grew from [their]3834-their own destruction , thriving on evil . What do [you]0-i think will happen to [you]0-i , who are only a false snake , using unfamiliar weapons , whom a shifting form hides ? ” [He]941-hercules spoke and knotted [his]941-hercules fingers round [my]0-i throat . [I]0-i was suffocating , as if [my]0-i throat was gripped by a vice , and struggled to tear [his]941-hercules thumbs away from [my]0-i windpipe . Overpowered in this form , only [my]0-i third , fierce , bull - shape remained . So [I]0-i fought on , [my]0-i limbs those of a bull . From the left [he]941-hercules threw [his]941-hercules arms round [my]0-i bulging neck ; and followed [me]0-i as [I]0-i charged off ; dragging at [me]0-i , [my]0-i horns piercing the hard ground as [he]941-hercules pulled [me]0-i down ; and toppling [me]0-i into the deep sand . As if that was not enough , holding the tough horn in [his]941-hercules cruel hand , [he]941-hercules broke it and tore it away from [my]0-i mutilated brow . [The Naiades]1063-the naiades took it , filling it with fruit and scented flowers , and made it sacred : [the Goddess of Abundance]3835-the goddess of abundance is rich now because of [my]0-i horn of plenty . ” [He]941-hercules spoke : and a nymph , [one of [[his]941-hercules attendants]2213-his attendants , dressed like [Diana]527-diana , [her]3836-one of his attendants , dressed like diana , her hair streaming over her shoulders hair streaming over [her]3836-one of his attendants , dressed like diana , her hair streaming over her shoulders shoulders]3836-one of his attendants , dressed like diana , her hair streaming over her shoulders , came to [them]3838-them , bringing all of autumn ’s harvest in an overflowing horn , and , for an aftertaste , delicious fruits . Light gathered , and as the first rays struck [the mountain summits]3263-the mountain summits , [the warriors]7415-the warriors left , not waiting for [the river]1711-the river to flow calmly and placidly or for the falling waters to subside . [Acheloüs]1048-acheloüs hid [his]941-hercules wild features and [his]941-hercules head , marred by its broken horn , in the depths of the waves . Nevertheless [he]941-hercules only had the loss of that adornment , which had been taken from [him]941-hercules , to lament : [he]941-hercules was otherwise unhurt . Also [he]941-hercules hid [his]941-hercules loss with a wreath of willow leaves or reeds . But [you]3842-you , fierce [Nessus]1064-nessus , [the centaur]3843-the centaur , a passion for [that same virgin girl]3844-that same virgin girl destroyed [you]3842-you , hit in the back by a flying arrow . [Hercules]941-hercules , [son of Jupiter]6516-son of jupiter , on [his]941-hercules way to [[his]941-hercules native city]3846-his native city with [Deianira]1046-deianira , [[his]941-hercules new bride]6628-his new bride , came to [the swift waters of [the River Euenus]280-the river euenus]3848-the swift waters of the river euenus . The flood was higher than normal , increased by winter rains , with frequent whirlpools , and impassable . [He]941-hercules had no fear of going on [himself]941-hercules , but was anxious for [[his]941-hercules bride]6654-his bride , when [Nessus]1064-nessus approached , strong of limb , and knowing [the fords]3850-the fords . ‘ With [my]1064-nessus help , [Alcides]1065-alcides , ” [he]1064-nessus said , “ [she]6654-his bride will be set down on [the far bank]7586-the far bank . Use [your]1065-alcides strength to swim ! ” [The Theban]7587-the theban handed over [the Calydonian girl]7588-the calydonian girl , [she]7588-the calydonian girl , pale with fear , frightened of [the river]1711-the river and of [the centaur]3843-the centaur [himself]3843-the centaur . Straight away , weighed down as [he]3843-the centaur was by [his]3843-the centaur quiver and [his]3843-the centaur lion ’s skin - [he]3843-the centaur had thrown [his]3843-the centaur club and [his]3843-the centaur curved bow across to [the other bank]2891-the other bank – [the hero]2234-the hero said : ‘[1064-nessus] Let [me]0-i endure [the river]1711-the river since [I]0-i have started to cross . ’ [He]3843-the centaur did not hesitate , and did not search for where [the river]1711-the river was calmest , scorning to claim [the water]1620-the water ’s allegiance . [He]3843-the centaur had gained [the bank]7475-the bank , and was picking up the bow [he]3843-the centaur had thrown , when [he]3843-the centaur heard [[his]3843-the centaur wife]1633-his wife ’s voice , and shouted to [Nessus]1064-nessus , who was preparing to betray [his]0-i trust : ‘[1064-nessus] Where are [you]3852-you carrying [her]3853-her off to , [you]3852-you rapist , trusting in vain to [your]3852-you swiftness of foot ? [I]0-i am speaking to [you]3852-you , [Nessus]1064-nessus , the twice - formed . Listen : do not steal what is [mine]0-i . If [you]3852-you have no respect for [me]0-i , the thought of [[your]3852-you father]1808-your father , [Ixion]763-ixion , on [his]763-ixion whirling wheel might prevent this illicit union . However much [you]3852-you trust in [your]3852-you horse - craft , [you]3852-you will not escape . With wounds , not feet , [I]0-i will follow [you]3852-you . ’ [He]0-i made good [his]0-i last words with [his]0-i actions , shooting the arrow [he]0-i fired , across , at the fleeing back . The barbed tip jutted from the centaur ’s chest . When the shaft was pulled out , blood , mixed with the deadly arrow - poison of [the Lernean Hydra]620-the lernean hydra , gushed out simultaneously from the entry and exit wounds . [Nessus]1064-nessus trapped this , and murmured , to [himself]0-i of course : ‘[0-i] [I]0-i will not die without revenge ’ and gave [his]0-i tunic soaked with warm blood to [Deianira]1046-deianira , whom [he]0-i had abducted , presenting it to [her]1046-deianira as if it were a gift for reviving a waning love . A long space of intervening time passed by , and the tales of [mighty Hercules]941-hercules had filled [the world]1448-the world , and overcome [[his]0-i stepmother]3807-his stepmother ’s hatred . As [the victor at [Oechalia]281-oechalia]7599-the victor at oechalia , in [Euboea]282-euboea ( where [he]0-i had avenged an insult offered [him]0-i by [King Eurytus]799-eurytus ) [he]0-i was preparing to sacrifice to [Jupiter]499-jupiter at [Cenaeum]283-cenaeum , when [loquacious Rumour , who loves to add lies to fact]7600-loquacious rumour , who loves to add lies to fact , and expands from the tiniest truth by [her]7600-loquacious rumour , who loves to add lies to fact falsehoods , brought [her]7600-loquacious rumour , who loves to add lies to fact tale on ahead , to [your]7601-your ears , Deianira . [She]7600-loquacious rumour , who loves to add lies to fact claimed that [Hercules]941-hercules , [reputed son of Amphitryon]7602-reputed son of amphitryon , was filled with passion for [Iole]1066-iole , [daughter of [Eurytus]799-eurytus]7603-daughter of eurytus . [The loving wife]7604-the loving wife believes it , and terrified at first by the rumour of this new affair , [she]7600-loquacious rumour , who loves to add lies to fact indulges in tears , and [the poor girl]7605-the poor girl vents [her]7605-the poor girl misery in weeping . But [she]7600-loquacious rumour , who loves to add lies to fact soon says ‘[0-i] Why do [I]0-i weep ? That [adulteress]3855-adulteress will laugh at [my]0-i tears . Since [she]3855-adulteress is coming [here]6115-here , [I]0-i must plan quickly , while [I]0-i can , while another has not yet taken [my]0-i place . Should [I]0-i complain , or keep silent ? Return to [Calydon]182-calydon or stay ? Should [I]0-i leave [[my]0-i house]3481-my house ? Or , if [I]0-i can do nothing else , should [I]0-i at least stand in [their]3858-their way ? What if , remembering [I]0-i am [[your]3859-your sister]6112-your sister , [Meleager]1006-meleager , [I]0-i prepare , boldly , to commit a crime , and , by cutting [that adulteress]3861-that adulteress ’s throat , show what revenge and [a woman]1994-a woman ’s grief can do ? ’ [Her]3855-adulteress thought traced various courses . Of all of [them]7606-them [she]3855-adulteress preferred that of sending the shirt , imbued with [Nessus]1064-nessus ’s blood , to restore [[her]3855-adulteress husband]5872-her husband ’s waning love . Unwittingly , [she]3855-adulteress entrusted what became [her]3855-adulteress future grief , to [the servant]7608-the servant , [Lichas]1067-lichas , [he]5872-her husband not knowing what [he]5872-her husband had been entrusted with : and [the unfortunate woman]7609-the unfortunate woman , ordered [him]5872-her husband , with persuasive words , to give the present to [[her]7609-the unfortunate woman husband]5872-her husband . [Hercules]941-hercules , [the hero]2234-the hero , took it , without a thought , and put on the shirt of [Nessus]1064-nessus , soaked in the poison of [the Lernean Hydra]620-the lernean hydra . [He]941-hercules was making offerings of incense and reciting prayers over the first flames , and pouring a libation bowl of wine on to the marble altar . The power of the venom , warmed and released by the flames , dissolved , dispersing widely through the limbs of [Hercules]941-hercules . With [his]941-hercules usual courage , [he]941-hercules repressed [his]941-hercules groans while [he]941-hercules could . When [his]941-hercules strength to endure the venom was exhausted , [he]941-hercules overturned the altar , and filled [woody Oeta]19-oeta with [his]941-hercules shouts . [He]941-hercules tries at once to tear off the fatal clothing : where it is pulled away , it pulls skin away with it , and , revolting to tell , it either sticks to the limbs from which [he]941-hercules tries in vain to remove it , or reveals the lacerated limbs and [his]941-hercules massive bones . [His]941-hercules blood itself hisses and boils , with the virulence of the poison , like incandescent metal , dipped in a cold pool . There is no end to it : the consuming fires suck at the air in [his]941-hercules chest : dark sweat pours from [his]941-hercules whole body : [his]941-hercules scorched sinews crackle . [His]941-hercules marrow liquefying with the secret corruption , [he]941-hercules raises [his]941-hercules hands to the heavens , crying : ‘[877-juno] [Juno]877-juno , [Saturnia]540-saturnia , feed on [my]0-i ruin : feed , cruel one : gaze , from [the heights]3863-the heights , at this destruction , and sate [your]3864-your savage heart ! Or if this suffering seems pitiable even to [an enemy]3865-an enemy , even to [you]3864-your , take away this sorrowful and hateful life , with its fearful torments , that was only made for toil . Death would be a gift to [me]0-i , a fitting offering from [a stepmother]3866-a stepmother . Was it for this [I]0-i overcame [Busiris who defiled the temples with the blood of [sacrificed strangers]3868-sacrificed strangers]3867-busiris who defiled the temples with the blood of sacrificed strangers ? For this that [I]0-i lifted [fierce Antaeus]1069-fierce antaeus , robbing [him]1069-fierce antaeus of the strength of [[his]1069-fierce antaeus mother]5953-his mother Earth ? For this , that [I]0-i was unmoved , by [Geryon]1070-geryon ’s triple form , [the herdsman of [Spain]284-spain]3870-the herdsman of spain , or [your]3864-your triple form , [Cerberus]759-cerberus ? For this , [you]3864-your hands of [mine]0-i , that [you]3864-your dragged down the horns of the strong Cretan bull : that [the stables of [King Augeas of [Elis]83-elis]285-king augeas of elis]3871-the stables of king augeas of elis know of [your]3864-your efforts : the [Stymphalian Lake]286-stymphalian lake : and [the woods of [Mount Parthenius]287-mount parthenius]3872-the woods of mount parthenius , with [its]287-mount parthenius golden - antlered stag ? For this , that , by [your]3864-your virtue , the gold engraved girdle of [Hippolyte of Thermodon]1071-hippolyte of thermodon was taken , and the apples of [the Hesperides]288-the hesperides , guarded by the sleepless dragon ? Was it for this , that [the Centaurs]1072-the centaurs could not withstand [me]0-i , nor the Erymanthian Boar that laid [Arcady]97-arcady waste ? For this , that it did not help [the Hydra]620-the lernean hydra to thrive on destruction and gain redoubled strength ? What of the time when [I]0-i saw [Thracian Diomede]1073-diomede ’s horses , fed on human blood , [their]3873-them stalls filled with broken bodies , and , seeing [them]3873-them , overthrew [them]3873-them , and finished off [them]3873-them , and [[their]3873-them master]2274-their master ? The Nemean Lion lies crushed by these massive arms : and for [Atlas]546-atlas these shoulders of [mine]0-i held up the sky . [[Jupiter]499-jupiter ’s cruel consort]3875-jupiter ’s cruel consort is tired of giving commands : [I]0-i am not tired of performing them . But now a strange disease affects [me]0-i that [I]0-i can not withstand by courage , weapons or strength . Deep in [my]0-i lungs a devouring fire wanders , feeding on [my]0-i whole body . But [Eurystheus]1074-eurystheus , [[my]0-i enemy]6940-my enemy is well ! Are there those then who can believe that [the gods]1538-the gods exist ? ’ So saying [he]1074-eurystheus roamed , in [his]1074-eurystheus illness , over [the heights of [Oeta]19-oeta]7612-the heights of oeta , as a bull carries around a hunting spear embedded in its body , though [the hunter who threw it]7613-the hunter who threw it has long gone . Picture [him]1074-eurystheus there , in [the mountains]1513-the mountains , in [his]1074-eurystheus anger , often groaning , often shouting out , often attempting , again and again , to rid [himself]1074-eurystheus of the last of the garment , overturning trees , or stretching [his]1074-eurystheus arms out to [his]1074-eurystheus native skies . Then [he]1074-eurystheus caught sight of [the terrified Lichas]7615-the terrified lichas , cowering in [a hollow of [the cliff]6441-the cliff]7616-a hollow of the cliff , and pain concentrated all [his]1074-eurystheus fury . ‘[3878-you] Was it not [you]3878-you , [Lichas]1067-lichas , ’ [he]1074-eurystheus said , ‘[3878-you] who gave [me]0-i this fatal gift ? Are [you]3878-you not the agent of [my]0-i death ? ’ [The man]5875-the man trembled , grew pale with fear , and , timidly , made excuses . While [he]5875-the man was speaking , and trying to clasp [the hero]2234-the hero ’s knees , [Alcides]1065-alcides seized [him]5875-the man , and , swinging [him]5875-the man round three or four times , hurled [him]5875-the man , more violently than a catapult bolt , into [the Euboean waters]7620-the euboean waters . Hanging in the air , [he]5875-the man hardened with the wind . As rain freezes in the icy blasts and becomes snow ; whirling snowflakes bind together in a soft mass ; and they , in turn , accumulate as a body of solid hailstones : so [he]5875-the man , [the ancient tradition]7621-the ancient tradition says , flung by strong arms through the void , bloodless with fright , and devoid of moisture , turned to hard flint . Now , in [the Euboean Gulf]290-the euboean gulf , a low rock rises out of the depths , and keeps the semblance of a human shape . [This sailors]7622-this sailors are afraid to set foot on , as though it could sense [them]7622-this sailors , and [they]7622-this sailors call it , [Lichas]1067-lichas . But [you]7623-your , [famous son of [Jove]605-jove]7624-famous son of jove , felled the trees that grew on [steep Oeta]19-oeta , and made a funeral pyre , and commanded [Philoctetes]1075-philoctetes , [son of [Poeas]1076-poeas]7625-son of poeas , who supplied the flame that was plunged into it , to take [your]7623-your bow , [your]7623-your ample quiver , and the arrows , that were fated to see , once more , [the kingdom of [Troy]271-troy]7626-the kingdom of troy ( as [they]7627-they did when [you]7623-your rescued [Hesione]1159-hesione . ) As the mass caught light from the eager fire , [you]7623-your spread the Nemean Lion ’s pelt on the summit of the pile of logs , and lay down , [your]7623-your neck resting on [your]7623-your club , and with an aspect no different from that of [a guest]6812-a guest , reclining amongst the full wine cups , crowned with garlands . Now the fierce flames , spreading on every side , were crackling loudly , and licking at [his]7623-your body , [he]7623-your unconcerned and scornful of [them]7629-them . [The gods]1538-the gods were fearful for [[earth]1449-earth ’s champion]7632-earth ’s champion . [Saturnian Jupiter]1077-jupiter spoke to [them]3879-o divine beings , gladly , since [he]0-i understood [their]3879-o divine beings feelings . ‘[3878-you] [O divine beings]3879-o divine beings , [your]3879-o divine beings fear for [him]3880-he delights [me]0-i , and [I]0-i willingly congratulate [myself]0-i , with all [my]0-i heart , that [I]0-i am called [father]5922-father and ruler of [a thoughtful race]3882-a thoughtful race , and that [[my]0-i offspring]2994-my offspring is protected by [your]3879-o divine beings favour also . Though this tribute is paid to [his]3880-he great deeds , [I]0-i am obliged to [you]3879-o divine beings , also . But do not allow [your]3879-o divine beings loyal hearts to feel groundless fears . Forget Oeta ’s flames ! [He]3880-he , who has defeated all things , will defeat the fires [you]3879-o divine beings see , nor will [he]3880-he feel [Vulcan]568-vulcan ’s power , except in the mortal part that [he]3880-he owes to [[his]3880-he mother]5953-his mother , [Alcmene]1078-alcmene . What [he]3880-he has from [me]0-i is immortal , deathless and eternal : and that , no flame can destroy . When it is done with [the earth]1463-the earth , [I]0-i will accept it into [the celestial regions]3886-the celestial regions , and [I]0-i trust [my]0-i action will please [all the gods]1558-all the gods . But if there is [anyone]6067-anyone , [anyone at all]3889-anyone at all , who is unhappy at [Hercules]941-hercules ’s deification , and would not wish to grant this gift , [he]3890-he or [she]3891-she should know that it was given for merit , and should approve it , though unwillingly . ’ [The gods]1538-the gods agreed . [Juno]877-juno , also , appeared to accept the rest of [his]0-i words with compliance , but not the last ones , upset that [she]877-juno was being censored . Meanwhile , [Mulciber]556-mulciber had consumed whatever the flames could destroy , and no recognisable form of [Hercules]941-hercules remained , no semblance of what came to [him]941-hercules from [[his]941-hercules mother]5953-his mother : [he]941-hercules only retained [his]941-hercules inheritance from [Jove]605-jove . As a snake enjoys its newness , sloughing old age with its skin , gleaming with fresh scales ; so , when [the Tirynthian hero]7635-the tirynthian hero had shed [his]7635-the tirynthian hero mortal body , [he]7635-the tirynthian hero became [his]7635-the tirynthian hero better part , beginning to appear greater , and more to be revered , in [his]7635-the tirynthian hero high majesty . [The all - powerful father of the gods carrying [him]941-hercules upwards , in [[his]941-hercules four - horse chariot]7637-his four - horse chariot , through the substance - less clouds]7636-the all - powerful father of the gods carrying him upwards , in his four - horse chariot , through the substance - less clouds , set [him]941-hercules among the shining stars . [Atlas]546-atlas felt the weight of the new constellation . But even now the anger of [Eurystheus]1074-eurystheus , [son of Sthenelus]7638-son of sthenelus , was not appeased , and [he]1074-eurystheus pursued [his]1074-eurystheus unyielding hatred of [the father]1852-the father through [the children]7640-the children . [Argive Alcmena]1079-alcmena , troubled by endless cares , had [Iole]1066-iole , as one to whom [she]1079-alcmena could confide [an old woman]2330-an old woman ’s miseries , to whom [she]1079-alcmena could relate [[her]1079-alcmena son]6039-her son ’s labours , known to all [the world]1448-the world , and [her]1079-alcmena own misfortunes . At [Hercules]941-hercules request , [Hyllus]1080-hyllus , [[his]1852-the father son by [Deianira]1046-deianira]7644-his son by deianira , had taken [Iole]1066-iole to [his]1852-the father marriage - bed , and [his]1852-the father heart , and had planted [a child of that noble race]7645-a child of that noble race in [her]1066-iole womb . [Alcmena]1079-alcmena said to [her]3893-you : ‘[3891-she] Let [the gods]1538-the gods at least favour [you]3893-you , and shorten that time when , in childbirth , [you]3893-you call on [Ilithyia]1081-ilithyia , that Lucina who watches over [frightened women , who , thanks to [Juno]877-juno ’s influence , made things hard for [me]0-i]3894-frightened women , who , thanks to juno ’s influence , made things hard for me . When the time for [Hercules]941-hercules ’s difficult birth came , and [Capricorn]1082-capricorn , the tenth sign , was hidden by the sun , the weight of [the child]2366-the child stretched [my]0-i womb : what [I]0-i carried was so great , [you]3896-you could tell that [Jove]605-jove was the father of [my]0-i hidden burden . [I]0-i could not bear [my]0-i labour pains much longer . Even now , as [I]0-i speak , a cold horror grips [my]0-i body , and part of [me]0-i remembers it with pain . Tortured for seven nights and as many days , worn out with agony , stretching [my]0-i arms to heaven , with a great cry , [I]0-i called out to [Lucina]850-lucina , and [[her]850-lucina companion [gods of birth]3898-gods of birth]3897-her companion gods of birth , [the Nixi]1083-the nixi . Indeed , [she]850-lucina came , but committed in advance , determined to surrender [my]0-i life to unjust [Juno]877-juno . [She]850-lucina sat on the altar , in front of the door , and listened to [my]0-i groans . With [her]850-lucina right knee crossed over [her]850-lucina left , and clasped with interlocking fingers , [she]850-lucina held back the birth , [She]850-lucina murmured spells , too , in a low voice , and the spells halted the birth once it began . [I]0-i laboured , and , maddened , made useless outcries against ungrateful [Jove]605-jove . [I]0-i wanted to die , and [my]0-i moans would have moved the flinty rocks . [The Theban women who were [there]1878-there]3899-the theban women who were there , took up [my]0-i prayers , and gave [me]0-i encouragement in [my]0-i pain . Tawny - haired , [Galanthis]1084-galanthis , [one of [[my]0-i servant - girls]3902-my servant - girls]3901-one of my servant - girls , was [there]1878-there , humbly born but faithful in carrying out orders , loved by [me]0-i for the services [she]1084-galanthis rendered . [She]850-lucina sensed that unjust [Juno]877-juno was up to something , and , as [she]850-lucina was often in and out of [the house]1713-the house , [she]850-lucina saw [the goddess]5864-the goddess , [Lucina]850-lucina , squatting on the altar , arms linked by [her]5864-the goddess fingers , clasping [her]5864-the goddess knees , and said ‘ Whoever [you]7646-you are , congratulate [the mistress]7647-the mistress . [[Alcmena]1079-alcmena of [Argolis]34-the argolis]7648-alcmena of argolis is eased , and the prayers to aid childbirth have been answered . ’[850-lucina] [The goddess with power over the womb]3906-the goddess with power over the womb leapt up in consternation , releasing [her]3906-the goddess with power over the womb clasped hands : by releasing the bonds , [herself]3906-the goddess with power over the womb , easing the birth . [They]3907-they say [Galanthis]1084-galanthis laughed at [the duped goddess]3908-the duped goddess . As [she]1084-galanthis laughed , [the heaven - born one]3909-the heaven - born one , in [her]1084-galanthis anger , caught [her]1084-galanthis by the hair , and dragged [her]1084-galanthis down , and as [she]1084-galanthis tried to lift [her]1084-galanthis body from the ground , [she]1084-galanthis arched [her]1084-galanthis over , and changed [her]1084-galanthis arms into forelegs . [Her]1084-galanthis old energy remained , and the hair on [her]1084-galanthis back did not lose [her]1084-galanthis hair ’s previous colour : but [her]1084-galanthis former shape was changed to that of a weasel . And because [her]1084-galanthis lying mouth helped in childbirth , [she]1084-galanthis gives birth through [her]1084-galanthis mouth , and frequents [[my]0-i house]3481-my house , as before . ’ [She]1084-galanthis finished speaking , and sighed , [her]1084-galanthis feelings stirred by the memory of [[her]1084-galanthis former servant]7649-her former servant . While [she]1084-galanthis grieved , [[her]1084-galanthis daughter - in - law]7650-her daughter - in - law , [Iole]1066-iole , said : ‘[916-mother] [Mother]916-mother , this is still the altered form of [someone not of [our]3912-our blood]3911-someone not of our blood that affects [you]916-mother . What if [I]0-i were to relate to [you]916-mother [[my]0-i sister]6929-my sister ’s strange fate ? Though sadness and tears hold [me]0-i back , and hinder [me]0-i from talking . [Dryope]1085-dryope was [[[her]6929-my sister mother]5866-her mother ’s only child]3915-her mother ’s only child – [I]0-i was [[my]0-i father]5857-my father ’s by [another wife]3917-another wife – and [she]3915-her mother ’s only child was known as [the most beautiful girl in [Oechalia]281-oechalia]3918-the most beautiful girl in oechalia . Suffering the assault of [Apollo]519-phoebus , [that god who holds [Delphi]82-delphi and [Delos]897-delos]3919-that god who holds delphi and delos ; [her]3915-her mother ’s only child virginity lost ; [Andraemon]1086-andraemon married [her]3915-her mother ’s only child ; and was considered fortunate to have [her]3915-her mother ’s only child as [[his]1086-andraemon wife]1633-his wife . There is [a lake , whose sloping shoreline is formed by steep banks]3921-a lake , whose sloping shoreline is formed by steep banks , [their]3922-their summits crowned with myrtle . [Dryope]1085-dryope went [there]1878-there , unaware of any restrictions , and , to make what happened more unacceptable , bringing garlands for [the nymphs]5945-the nymphs . At [her]3915-her mother ’s only child breast [she]3915-her mother ’s only child carried a sweet burden , [[her]3915-her mother ’s only child son]6039-her son , not yet a year old , whom [she]3915-her mother ’s only child was suckling with [her]3915-her mother ’s only child warm milk . Not far away , a water - loving lotus tree flowered from [the swamp]7535-the swamp , with the promise of fruits to come , its colours imitating Tyrian purples . [Dryope]1085-dryope picked some of these blossoms , to offer [the child]2366-the child as playthings , and [I]0-i was looking to do the same - [I]0-i was with [her]3915-her mother ’s only child - when [I]0-i saw drops of blood fall from the flowers , and the branches move with a shiver of fear . It appears , as [the locals]3928-the locals now tell [us]3929-us , at last , but too late , that [Lotis]1087-lotis , a nymph , running from [obscene Priapus]1088-obscene priapus , turned into the tree , altering [her]1087-lotis features , keeping [her]1087-lotis name . [[My]0-i sister]6929-my sister had known nothing of this . When [she]3915-her mother ’s only child wished to retreat , in fear , from [the place]1552-the place , and escape by praying to [the nymphs]5945-the nymphs , [her]3915-her mother ’s only child feet clung like roots . [She]3915-her mother ’s only child struggled to tear them away , but nothing moved except [her]3915-her mother ’s only child torso . Slowly , thick bark grew upward from [her]3915-her mother ’s only child feet , hiding all [her]3915-her mother ’s only child groin . When [she]3915-her mother ’s only child saw this , and tried to tear at [her]3915-her mother ’s only child hair , with [her]3915-her mother ’s only child hands , [her]3915-her mother ’s only child hands filled with leaves : leaves covered [her]3915-her mother ’s only child whole head . But [the child]2366-the child , [Amphissos]1089-amphissos ( so [[his]2366-the child grandfather]2444-his grandfather , [Eurytus]799-eurytus , [King of [Oechalia]281-oechalia]3935-king of oechalia , had named [him]2366-the child ) felt [[his]2366-the child mother]5953-his mother ’s breast harden , and the milky liquid failed when [he]2366-the child sucked . [I]0-i was there , a spectator of [your]3937-your cruel destiny , [sister]6159-sister , and could bring [you]3937-your no help at all . Only , as far as [I]0-i could , [I]0-i held back the developing trunk and branches with [my]0-i embrace , and [I]0-i bear witness that [I]0-i longed to be sheathed in that same bark . Then [[her]5953-his mother husband]5872-her husband , [Andraemon]1086-andraemon , and [[her]5953-his mother luckless father]3940-her luckless father , [Eurytus]799-eurytus , came , asking for [Dryope]1085-dryope : the Dryope [they]3941-they searched for [I]0-i revealed as the lotus . [They]3941-they kissed the living wood , and prostrate on the ground clung to the roots of [their]3941-they tree . [You]3937-your , [[my]0-i dear sister]3942-my dear sister , displayed nothing but [your]3937-your face that was not already tree . [Your]3937-your tears rained on the leaves of [your]3937-your poor body , and while [your]3937-your mouth left a path for [your]3937-your voice , while [you]3937-your still could , [you]3937-your poured out [your]3937-your lament like this into the air : “ If there is truth in suffering , [I]0-i swear by [the gods]1538-the gods [I]0-i do not deserve this wrong . [I]0-i am being punished without guilt . [I]0-i lived in innocence . If [I]0-i lie , let [me]0-i lose the leaves [I]0-i have through drought , be levelled with the axe , and burned . Take [this child]3944-this child from these maternal branches , and find [him]3944-this child [a nurse]3945-a nurse , and have [him]3944-this child often drink [his]3944-this child milk under this tree of [mine]0-i , and play under this tree . And when [he]3944-this child learns to talk , have [him]3944-this child greet [[his]3944-this child mother]5953-his mother and say , sadly , ‘ [[My]3944-this child mother]2965-my mother is revealed in this tree . ’[3944-this child] Let [him]3944-this child still fear lakes , and pick no flowers from the trees , and think all shrubs are the body of [the goddess]5864-the goddess . [Dear husband]3948-dear husband , farewell , and [you]3948-dear husband , [sister]6159-sister ; [father]5922-father ! If [you]3948-dear husband love [me]0-i , defend [me]0-i from the sharp knife , and [my]0-i leaves from the browsing herd . And since [I]0-i am not allowed to bend to [you]3948-dear husband , reach up with [your]3948-dear husband arms , and find [my]0-i lips , while [I]0-i can still feel , and lift [[my]0-i little son]3951-my little son up to [me]0-i ! [I]0-i can speak no more . Now the soft sapwood spreads slowly over [my]0-i white neck : [I]0-i am imprisoned in its highest reaches . Take [your]3948-dear husband hands from [my]0-i eyes . Without trying to help [me]0-i , allow the enveloping bark to mask the fading light ! ” At the moment [her]6159-sister mouth ceased speaking , at that moment it ceased to be . For a long time , the freshly created branches glowed with warmth , from [her]6159-sister altered body . ’ While [[Eurytus]799-eurytus ’s daughter]7652-eurytus ’s daughter was relating this marvellous happening , and [Alcmena]1079-alcmena was wiping away [Iole]1066-iole ’s tears ( still weeping [herself]1079-alcmena ) a wonderful thing suspended all sadness . There , on the steep threshold , stood [Iolaüs]1021-iolaüs , [[Hercules]941-hercules ’s nephew]7653-hercules ’s nephew and companion , alive again , with the look of [his]941-hercules early years , a hint of down on [his]941-hercules cheeks , almost , again , [a child]2050-a child . Overwhelmed by the prayers of [[her]6159-sister husband]5872-her husband , [Hercules]941-hercules , [[Juno]877-juno ’s daughter]7656-juno ’s daughter , [Hebe]1090-hebe , had granted [him]941-hercules this gift . When [she]6159-sister was about to swear that , after this , [she]6159-sister would never allow any further such favour , [Themis]780-themis would not allow it . [She]780-themis prophesied . ‘[693-thebes] [Thebes]693-thebes is now moving towards civil war , and , of the Seven against [her]693-thebes , [Capaneus]1091-capaneus will not be overcome , except by [Jupiter]1077-jupiter [himself]1077-jupiter . [Two brothers]6604-two brothers , [Eteocles]1092-eteocles and [Polynices]1093-polynices , will die of mutually inflicted wounds . [[His]2424-the seer son]1773-his son , [Alcmaeon]1094-alcmaeon , shall avenge [him]2424-the seer , with [[his]1773-his son mother]5953-his mother Eriphyle ’s death , filial and sinful in the same act . Terrified at [his]2424-the seer own evil , exiled from [home]2999-home and sanity , [he]2424-the seer will be pursued by the faces of [the Eumenides]911-the eumenides , and by [[his]2424-the seer mother]5953-his mother ’s shade , until [[his]2424-the seer wife]1633-his wife , [Callirhoë]1095-callirhoë demands the fatal necklace , that [Venus]523-venus gave [Harmonia]1096-harmonia , and until the sword , of [[his]2424-the seer first father]3960-his first father - in - law , [Phegeus]1097-phegeus , in the hands of [[Phegeus]1097-phegeus ’s sons]3961-phegeus ’s sons , shall drain [[his]2424-the seer son - in - law]6581-his son - in - law ’s blood . Then at last , [Callirhoë]1095-callirhoë , [the daughter of [Acheloüs]1048-acheloüs]3963-the daughter of acheloüs , as a suppliant , will ask of mighty [Jupiter]1077-jupiter to add years to [[her]1095-callirhoë infant sons]3964-her infant sons , and not allow [the avenger]6616-the avenger ’s murder to be unavenged . In anticipation of being moved by [her]1095-callirhoë prayers , [Jupiter]1077-jupiter claims for [them]3964-her infant sons this gift that [you]3966-you , [[his]1077-jupiter stepdaughter]3967-his stepdaughter and [daughter - in - law]3968-daughter - in - law , possess , and will make [them]3964-her infant sons [men]5788-men , in [their]3964-her infant sons childhood years . ’ When [Themis]780-themis spoke these words , out of [her]780-themis prophetic mouth , prescient of what was to come , [the gods]1538-the gods complained in various mutterings , and there was a murmur as to why [they]1538-the gods were not able to grant the same gift to [other mortals]7658-other mortals . [Aurora]569-aurora , [daughter of [the Titan Pallas]1098-pallas]7659-daughter of the titan pallas , lamented the old age of [[her]569-aurora husband]5872-her husband , [Tithonus]1099-tithonus . [Gentle Ceres]689-ceres lamented the greying hair of [[her]689-ceres former lover]7661-her former lover [Iasion]1100-iasion . [Mulciber]556-mulciber demanded another lifetime for [[his]556-mulciber son]1773-his son , [Erichthonius]611-erichthonius : and [Venus]523-venus , also , touched by fears for the future , wanted to bargain for the renewal of [her]523-venus lover [Anchises]1101-anchises ’s years . [Each god]7663-each god had someone whose cause [they]7663-each god supported : and the troublesome mutiny , over [[their]7663-each god favourites]7664-their favourites , grew , until [Jupiter]1077-jupiter opened [his]1077-jupiter mouth and said : ‘[3970-you] O , if [you]3970-you have any respect for [me]0-i , where do [you]3970-you think all this talk is heading ? Do any of [you]3970-you think [you]3970-you can overcome fate as well ? Through fate [Iolaüs]1021-iolaüs ’s past years were restored . Through fate [[Callirhoë]1095-callirhoë ’s [children]2996-children]3971-callirhoë ’s children must prematurely become [men]5788-men , not through ambition or warfare . Even [you]3970-you , and [I]0-i , too , fate rules , if that also makes [you]3970-you feel better . If [I]0-i had power to alter fate , these late years would not bow down [my]0-i pious [Aeacus]972-aeacus . Just [Rhadamanthus]1102-rhadamanthus would always possess [youth]2370-youth ’s flower , and [[my]0-i Minos , who is scorned because of the bitter weight of old age , and no longer orders [the kingdom]2774-the kingdom in the way [he]965-minos did before]965-minos . ’ [Jupiter]1077-jupiter ’s words swayed [the gods]1538-the gods : and [no one]1640-no one could sustain [their]1538-the gods objection when [they]1538-the gods saw [Rhadamanthos]1103-rhadamanthos , [Aeacus]972-aeacus and [Minos]965-minos wearied with the years .
