When [he]965-minos was in [his]965-minos prime , [Minos]965-minos had made great nations tremble at [his]965-minos very name : now [he]965-minos was weak , and feared [Miletus]1104-miletus , who was proud of [his]965-minos strength and parentage , [the son of [Phoebus Apollo]519-phoebus and [the nymph Deione]7668-the nymph deione]7667-the son of phoebus apollo and the nymph deione . Though [Minos]965-minos believed [Miletus]1104-miletus might plot an insurrection , [he]965-minos still did not dare to deny [him]965-minos [[his]965-minos home]2302-his home . On [your]7670-your own initiative , [Miletus]1104-miletus , [you]7670-your left , cutting [the waters of [the Aegean]294-the aegean]7671-the waters of the aegean in [[your]7670-your swift ship]7672-your swift ship , and built [a city on [the soil of [Asia]163-asia]7674-the soil of asia , that still carries [its founder]7675-its founder ’s name]7673-a city on the soil of asia , that still carries its founder ’s name . There [you]7670-your knew [Cyanee]1105-cyanee , the daughter of [Maeander]586-maeander , whose stream so often curves back on itself , when [she]1105-cyanee was following [[[her]1105-cyanee father]1694-her father ’s winding shores]7677-her father ’s winding shores . [Twin children]7678-twin children were born to [her]1105-cyanee , of outstanding beauty of body , [Byblis]1106-byblis and [[her]1106-byblis brother]1883-her brother [Caunus]1107-caunus . [Byblis]1106-byblis , seized by a passion , for [[her]1106-byblis brother]1883-her brother , [scion of [Apollo]519-phoebus]7681-scion of apollo ; that [Byblis]1106-byblis serves for a warning to [girls]7682-girls , against illicit love . [She]1106-byblis loved , not as [a sister]6353-a sister loves [a brother]7684-a brother , nor as [she]1106-byblis should . At first , it is true , [she]1106-byblis did not understand the fires of passion , or think it wrong , to kiss , together , often , or throw [her]1106-byblis arms round [[her]1106-byblis brother]1883-her brother ’s neck . For a long time [she]1106-byblis was deceived by the misleading likeness to sisterly affection . Gradually the nature of [her]1106-byblis love went astray , and [she]1106-byblis came looking for [[her]1106-byblis brother]1883-her brother carefully dressed , and over - anxious to look beautiful . If [anyone]6067-anyone seemed more beautiful to [him]1883-her brother , [she]1106-byblis was jealous . But [her]1106-byblis own feelings were not clear to [her]1106-byblis , and though [she]1106-byblis had no inner longing for passion , nevertheless it burned . And now [she]1106-byblis called [him]1883-her brother [[her]1106-byblis lord]7688-her lord , now [she]1106-byblis hated the name that made [them]7689-them related , now [she]1106-byblis wrongly wished [him]1883-her brother to call [her]1106-byblis Byblis , rather than [sister]6159-sister . While [she]1106-byblis is awake [she]1106-byblis still dare not allow [her]1106-byblis mind its illicit hope , but , deep in peaceful dreams , [she]1106-byblis often sees what [she]1106-byblis loves , and is also seen , held in [[her]1106-byblis brother]1883-her brother ’s arms , and [she]1106-byblis blushes , though lost in sleep . When sleep has vanished , [she]1106-byblis lies there for a long time , recalling , to [herself]1106-byblis , the imagery of [her]1106-byblis dream , and at last utters these inner doubts : ‘[965-minos] Alas for [me]0-i ! What does it mean , this vision out of the night ’s silence ? How [I]0-i would hate it to be true ! Why do [I]0-i see these things in sleep ? [He]3976-he is truly handsome , even to unfriendly eyes , and is pleasing , and if [he]3976-he were not [[my]0-i brother]6993-my brother [I]0-i could love [him]3976-he , and [he]3976-he would be worthy of [me]0-i . Being [[his]3976-he sister]3978-his sister is the reality that harms [me]0-i . Let sleep often return with similar visions , as long as [I]0-i am not tempted to do any such thing while awake ! A dream lacks witnesses , but does not lack pleasure ’s counterpart . By [winged Cupid]522-cupid , and [Venus]523-venus , [[his]3976-he tender mother]3979-his tender mother , how great the joy [I]0-i had ! How clearly passion touched [me]0-i ! How [my]0-i whole heart melted where [I]0-i lay ! What joy in remembrance ! Though its pleasure was short - lived , and night rushed onwards , envious of [my]0-i imaginings . O if [I]0-i could have been joined to [you]3980-you , with another ’s name , [Caunus]1107-caunus , how good [a daughter - in - law]3981-a daughter - in - law [I]0-i could have been to [[your]3980-you father]1808-your father ! O Caunus , how good [a son - in - law]5902-a son - in - law [you]3980-you could have been to [[my]0-i father]5857-my father ! [We]3985-we would have had everything shared between [us]3985-we , except [[our]3985-we grandparents]3986-our grandparents : [I]0-i would have wanted [you]3980-you to be nobler than [me]0-i ! [You]3980-you , [most beautiful one]3987-most beautiful one , will make [someone else]6223-someone else [the mother of [[your]3980-you children]3990-your children]3989-the mother of your children , but to [me]0-i , whom evil luck has given [the same parents]3991-the same parents , [you]3980-you will be nothing but [a brother]7684-a brother . What separates [us]3985-we : that [we]3985-we will share as [one]5944-one . What does [my]0-i vision signify to [me]0-i ? What weight indeed do dreams have ? Or perhaps - the gods forbid - dreams do have weight ? Certainly , [the gods]1538-the gods have possessed [[their]1538-the gods sisters]3995-their sisters . So , [Saturn]500-saturn led [Ops]1108-ops , [[his]500-saturn blood - kin]3996-his blood - kin , to join with [him]500-saturn , and [Oceanus]607-oceanus , [Tethys]562-tethys , and [the ruler of [Olympus]12-olympus]3997-the ruler of olympus , [Juno]877-juno . [The gods]1538-the gods have [their]1538-the gods own laws ! Why try to relate human affairs to other , divine , behaviour ? Either [my]0-i forbidden passion will be driven from [my]0-i heart , or if [I]0-i can not achieve that , [I]0-i pray to be loved , before [I]0-i am laid out on [my]0-i deathbed , and [[my]0-i brother]6993-my brother kisses [me]0-i there . Yet that needs both [our]4000-our wills ! Suppose it pleases [me]0-i : it may seem a sin to [him]6993-my brother . Still , [the sons of [Aeolus]511-aeolus]4001-the sons of aeolus , [god of the winds]4002-god of the winds , were not afraid to marry [[their]4001-the sons of aeolus sisters]3995-their sisters ! Where did [I]0-i learn that ? Why do [I]0-i have such ready examples ? Where is this leading ? Vanish , far off , illicit flames , and let [[my]0-i brother]6993-my brother not be loved , except as [a sister]6353-a sister may love [him]6993-my brother ! Yet , if [he]6993-my brother [himself]6993-my brother were first captured by love of [me]0-i , [I]0-i might perhaps be able to indulge this madness . Then let [me]0-i woo [him]6993-my brother , whom [I]0-i would not reject , if [he]6993-my brother were wooing ! - Can [you]4006-she say it ? Can [you]4006-she acknowledge it ? - Love compels [me]0-i : [I]0-i can ! Or if shame closes [my]0-i lips , a secret letter will confess [my]0-i hidden passions . ’ This idea pleases [her]4006-she , and this decision overcomes the doubt in [her]4006-she mind . Turning on one side and leaning on [her]4006-she left elbow , [she]4006-she says to [herself]4006-she : ‘[0-i] Let [him]6993-my brother know : let [me]0-i acknowledge [my]0-i insane desires ! Alas , where am [I]0-i heading ? What fire has [my]0-i heart conceived ? ’ And , with a trembling hand , [she]4006-she begins to set down the words [she]4006-she has contemplated . [She]4006-she holds the pen in [her]4006-she right hand , and a blank wax tablet in [her]4006-she left . [She]4006-she begins , then hesitates ; writes and condemns the writing ; scribbles and smoothes it out ; alters , blames and approves ; in turn lays down what [she]4006-she has lifted , and lifts what [she]4006-she has laid down . [She]4006-she does not know what to do , displeased with whatever [she]4006-she is about to do . In [her]4006-she expression , shame is mixed with boldness . [She]4006-she had written ‘[6159-sister] [sister]6159-sister ’ , but decided to efface the name of [sister]6159-sister , and inscribed these words on the corrected tablet : ‘[4008-she] That wish , for long life , that [she]4008-she will not have , unless [you]4009-you grant it , one who loves [you]4009-you sends to [you]4009-you . [She]4008-she is ashamed , oh , ashamed to tell [her]4008-she name . And if [you]4009-you ask what [I]0-i desire , [I]0-i would have wished to plead [my]0-i cause , namelessly , and not to have been identified , until the expectation of what [I]0-i desired was certain , as [Byblis]1106-byblis . True , [you]4009-you might have seen signs of [my]0-i wounded heart in [my]0-i pallor , thinness , features , eyes full of tears , sighs with no apparent cause , frequent embraces , kisses , which , if [you]4009-you had chanced to notice , might not have felt like [a sister]6353-a sister ’s . Yet , though [my]0-i soul was deeply stricken , though the mad fire is in [me]0-i , [I]0-i have done everything [I]0-i can ( [the gods]1538-the gods are [[my]0-i witnesses]4012-my witnesses ) to become calmer . For a long time [I]0-i have struggled , unhappily , to escape [Cupid]522-cupid ’s onslaught , and [I]0-i have suffered more hardship than [you]4009-you would think [a girl]1995-a girl could suffer . [I]0-i am compelled to confess , [I]0-i have lost , and to beg [your]4009-you help , with humble prayers . [You]4009-you alone can save [[your]4009-you lover]4014-your lover , [you]4009-you alone destroy [her]4014-your lover . Choose what [you]4009-you will . It is not [[your]4009-you enemy]5909-your enemy who prays to [you]4009-you , but [one who , though closest to [you]4009-you]4016-one who , though closest to you , seeks to be closer still , and bound to [you]4009-you with a tighter bond . Let [old people]4017-old people know what is right , and what is allowed , and what is virtue and what is sin , and preserve the fine balance of the law . At [our]4018-we age Love is what is fitting , that takes no heed . [We]4018-we do not know yet what is permitted , and [we]4018-we consider all things permitted , and follow the example of [the great gods]3182-the great gods . [We]4018-we have [no harsh father]4020-no harsh father , no regard for reputation , and no fear to impede [us]4018-we . Even if there were cause for fear , [we]4018-we can hide sweet theft under the names of [brother]2734-brother and [sister]6159-sister . [I]0-i am free to speak to [you]4009-you in private , and [we]4018-we can embrace and kiss in front of [others]5836-others . How important is what is still lacking ? Pity [the one who confesses [her]4024-the one who confesses her love love]4024-the one who confesses her love , and would not confess if extreme desire did not force [her]4024-the one who confesses her love , and do not [you]4009-you be the reason for the writing on [[my]0-i tomb]4025-my tomb . ’ [Her]4024-the one who confesses her love handwriting filled the wax , with these fruitless words , the last line close to the edge . Immediately [she]4024-the one who confesses her love put [her]4024-the one who confesses her love seal on the sinful message , dampening it with [her]4024-the one who confesses her love tears ( moisture failed [her]4024-the one who confesses her love tongue ) , stamping it with [her]4024-the one who confesses her love signet ring . Shamefacedly , [she]4024-the one who confesses her love called [one of [[her]4024-the one who confesses her love servants]7694-her servants]7693-one of her servants , and shyly and coaxingly said : ‘[4026-you] [You]4026-you are most faithful . Take these to [[my]0-i .......... brother]4027-my .......... brother ’ [she]4024-the one who confesses her love added after a long silence . As [she]4024-the one who confesses her love let them go , the tablets slipped and fell from [her]4024-the one who confesses her love hand . [She]4024-the one who confesses her love still sent the letter , troubled by the omen . Finding a suitable time , [the messenger]7695-the messenger went , and delivered the hidden words . Horrified , [[Maeander]586-maeander ’s grandson]7696-maeander ’s grandson , suddenly enraged , hurled away the tablets [he]7696-maeander ’s grandson had accepted , and partly read , and , scarcely able to keep [his]7696-maeander ’s grandson hands from [the trembling servant]7697-the trembling servant ’s throat , cried : ‘[4027-my .......... brother] Run while [you]4026-you can , [you]4026-you rascally aide to forbidden lust ! [I]0-i would deal [you]4026-you death , as a punishment , if [your]4026-you fate would not also drag [our]4028-our honour down with it . ’ [The servant]7608-the servant fled in fear , and reported [Caunus]1107-caunus ’s fierce words , to [Byblis]1106-byblis . [She]7608-the servant grew pale , hearing that [she]7608-the servant had been rejected , and [her]7608-the servant body shook , gripped by an icy chill . But , when consciousness returned , so did the passion , and , [she]7608-the servant let out these words , [her]7608-the servant lips scarcely moving : ‘[0-i] [I]0-i deserve it ! Well , why did [I]0-i rashly reveal [my]0-i wound ? Why was [I]0-i in such a hurry to commit things , which were secret , to a hasty letter ? [I]0-i should have tested [his]4029-his mind ’s judgement before by ambiguous words . [I]0-i should have observed how the winds blew ; used other lesser sails , in case those breezes were not to be followed ; and crossed [the sea]1464-the sea in safety , not as now , under full canvas , caught by uncertain gusts . So [I]0-i am carried onto [the rocks]4031-the rocks , swamped , overwhelmed by [the whole ocean]4032-the whole ocean , and [my]0-i sails have no means of retreat . ’ ‘[4029-his] Why , as far as that is concerned , everything , unerringly , warned [me]0-i not to give way to [my]0-i desire , at the moment when the tablets fell , as [I]0-i was giving orders for them to be taken to [him]4029-his , meaning that [my]0-i hopes would also fall away . Should not , perhaps , the day , or [my]0-i whole intention , more so the day , have been altered ? [The god]1482-the god [himself]1482-the god issued a warning , and gave a clear sign , if [I]0-i had not been crazed with love . Also [I]0-i should have told [him]4029-his [myself]0-i , and revealed [my]0-i passion to [him]4029-his in person , and not committed [myself]0-i in writing . [He]4029-his would have seen the tears , and seen [a lover]6116-a lover ’s face . [I]0-i could have said more than any letter can contain . [I]0-i could have thrown [my]0-i arms around [his]4029-his unwilling neck , and if [I]0-i had been rejected , [I]0-i could have seemed on the point of dying , embraced [his]4029-his feet , and lying there begged for life . [I]0-i should have done all those things that , if not singly , all together , might have persuaded [his]4029-his stubborn mind . Maybe [the messenger who was sent]4035-the messenger who was sent was at fault : did not approach [him]4029-his properly , [I]0-i think , or choose a suitable moment , or discover when [he]4029-his and the time were free . It has all harmed [me]0-i . Truly , [[my]0-i brother]6993-my brother is not born of the tigress . [He]6993-my brother does not have a heart of unyielding flint , solid iron , or steel . [He]6993-my brother was not suckled on the milk of a lioness . [He]6993-my brother will be won ! [I]0-i will try again , and not suffer any weariness in [my]0-i attempts , while breath is left to [me]0-i . Since [I]0-i can not undo [my]0-i actions , it would have been best not to begin : but , having begun , the next best is to win through . In fact if [I]0-i relinquished [my]0-i longing , [he]4029-his could still not fail to remember what [I]0-i have dared , and by desisting [I]0-i will be seen to have been shallow in [my]0-i desires , or to have been trying to tempt and snare [him]4029-his . [He]4029-his will even believe , [I]0-i am sure , that [I]0-i have not been conquered by [the god]1482-the god , who , above all , impels and inflames [our]4038-our hearts , but by lust . In short , [I]0-i can not but be guilty of impiety , of writing , of wooing : [my]0-i wishes are revealed . Though [I]0-i add nothing to them , [I]0-i can not be said to be innocent . There is little left to be accused of , but much to long for . ’ So [she]7699-she argues , and ( so great is the undecided conflict in [her]7699-she mind ) while [she]7699-she repented of the attempt , [she]7699-she delights in attempting . Going beyond all moderation , and unsuccessful in what [she]7699-she tries , [she]7699-she is endlessly rejected . Finally , when there seems no end to it , [he]4029-his flees from this wickedness and from [[his]4029-his home]2302-his home , and founds [a new city]7701-a new city in [a foreign place]7702-a foreign place : [Caunus]1107-caunus , in [Caria]296-caria . Then , indeed , grief made [[Miletus]1104-miletus ’s daughter]7703-miletus ’s daughter lose [her]7703-miletus ’s daughter mind completely . Then , indeed , [she]7703-miletus ’s daughter tore the clothes from [her]7703-miletus ’s daughter breast , and beat [her]7703-miletus ’s daughter arms in frenzy . [Her]7703-miletus ’s daughter madness was now public , and [she]7703-miletus ’s daughter confessed [her]7703-miletus ’s daughter hope of illicit union , by leaving [the country [she]7703-miletus ’s daughter hated]7704-the country she hated , and [[her]7703-miletus ’s daughter household gods]7705-her household gods , and following the footsteps of [[her]7703-miletus ’s daughter fleeing brother]7706-her fleeing brother . [The women of [Bubasos]297-bubasos]7707-the women of bubasos saw [Byblis]1106-byblis , howling in [the open fields]7708-the open fields , as [[your]7709-your Thracians]7710-your thracians , [son of [Semele]677-semele]6187-son of semele , pricked by [your]7709-your thyrsus , keep [your]7709-your triennial festival . Leaving [them]7707-the women of bubasos behind [she]7703-miletus ’s daughter wandered through [Caria]296-caria , through [the lands of the armed Leleges]7712-the lands of the armed leleges , and on through [Lycia]117-lycia . Now [she]7703-miletus ’s daughter was beyond [Lycian Cragus]298-lycian cragus , and [Limyre]299-limyre , and [the waters of [the Xanthian plain]7714-the xanthian plain]7713-the waters of the xanthian plain , and [the ridge of [Mount Chimaera]300-mount chimaera near [Phaleris]301-phaleris]7715-the ridge of mount chimaera near phaleris , where the fire - breathing monster lived , joining a lion ’s head and chest to a serpent ’s tail . Above [the woods]1690-the woods , when , wearied , [you]7709-your were weak from following , [you]7709-your fell , [Byblis]1106-byblis , [your]7709-your hair spread on the hard earth , and [your]7709-your face pressing the fallen leaves . [The Lelegeian nymphs]7717-the lelegeian nymphs often try to lift [her]7703-miletus ’s daughter in [their]7717-the lelegeian nymphs tender arms , and often [they]7717-the lelegeian nymphs teach [her]7703-miletus ’s daughter how [she]7703-miletus ’s daughter might remedy [her]7703-miletus ’s daughter love , and [they]7717-the lelegeian nymphs offer comfort to [her]7703-miletus ’s daughter silent heart . [She]7703-miletus ’s daughter lies there , mute , clutching at the green stems with [her]7703-miletus ’s daughter fingers , and watering the grass with [her]7703-miletus ’s daughter flowing tears . [They]7717-the lelegeian nymphs say [the naiads]1761-the naiads created a spring from [them]7717-the lelegeian nymphs , beneath [her]7703-miletus ’s daughter , which could never run dry . Well , what more could [they]7717-the lelegeian nymphs offer [her]7703-miletus ’s daughter ? There and then , [Byblis]1106-byblis , [[Phoebus]519-phoebus ’s granddaughter]7719-phoebus ’s granddaughter , consumed by [her]1106-byblis own tears , is changed into a fountain : just as drops of resin ooze from a cut pine , or sticky bitumen from heavy soil , or as water , that has been frozen by the cold , melts in the sun , at the coming of the west wind ’s gentle breath : and even now in [those valleys]7720-those valleys it retains [its mistress]7721-its mistress ’s name , and flows from underneath a dark holm oak . Perhaps , the story of this new marvel would have filled [[Crete]88-crete ’s hundred cities]7722-crete ’s hundred cities , if [Crete]88-crete had not recently known a miracle nearer [home]2999-home , in [the metamorphosis of [Iphis]1109-iphis]7724-the metamorphosis of iphis . In [the Phaestos region]7725-the phaestos region , near [royal Cnossos]302-royal cnossos , there once lived [a man named [Ligdus]1110-ligdus]7726-a man named ligdus , undistinguished , [a native of [the place]1552-the place]7727-a native of the place , [his]7726-a man named ligdus wealth no greater than [his]7726-a man named ligdus fame , but living a blameless and honourable life . When [[his]0-i pregnant wife]7729-his pregnant wife , [Telethusa]1111-telethusa , was near to [her]7729-his pregnant wife time , [he]0-i spoke these words of warning in [her]7729-his pregnant wife ear : ‘[0-i] There are two things [I]0-i wish for : that [you]4039-you are delivered with the least pain , and that [you]4039-you produce [a male child]4040-a male child . [A girl]1995-a girl is a heavier burden , and misfortune denies [them]4042-them strength . So , though [I]0-i hate this , if , by chance , [you]4039-you give birth to [a female infant]4043-a female infant , reluctantly , [I]0-i order - let [my]0-i impiety be forgiven ! – that it be put to death . ’ [He]0-i spoke , and tears flooded [their]4039-you cheeks , [he]0-i who commanded , and [she]7729-his pregnant wife to whom the command was given . Nevertheless , [Telethusa]1111-telethusa , urged [[her]1111-telethusa husband]5872-her husband , with vain prayers , not to confine hope itself . [Ligdus]1110-ligdus remained fixed in [his]1110-ligdus determination . Now , [her]1111-telethusa pregnant belly could scarcely bear to carry [her]1111-telethusa fully - grown burden , when [Io]537-io , [the daughter of [Inachus]536-inachus]7731-the daughter of inachus , at midnight , in sleep ’s imagining , stood , or seemed to stand , by [her]1111-telethusa bed : [Isis]1112-isis , accompanied by [her]1111-telethusa holy procession . The moon ’s crescent horns were on [her]1111-telethusa forehead , and the shining gold of yellow ears of corn , and royal splendour belonged to [her]1111-telethusa . With [her]1111-telethusa were [the jackal - headed Anubis]7732-the jackal - headed anubis , [the hallowed cat - headed Bast]7733-the hallowed cat - headed bast , the dappled bull Apis , and [Harpocrates]1113-harpocrates , the god who holds [his]1113-harpocrates tongue , and urges silence , thumb in mouth . The sacred rattle , the sistrum , was there ; and [Osiris]1114-osiris , for whom [her]1111-telethusa search never ends ; and the strange serpent [she]1111-telethusa fashioned , swollen with sleep - inducing venom , that poisoned [the sun - god [Ra]1115-ra]7734-the sun - god ra . Then , as if [Telethusa]1111-telethusa had shaken off sleep , and was seeing clearly , [the goddess]5864-the goddess spoke to [her]4044-you , saying : ‘[0-i] O , [you]4044-you who belong to [me]0-i , forget [your]4044-you heavy cares , and do not obey [[your]4044-you husband]4045-your husband . When [Lucina]850-lucina has eased the birth , whatever sex [the child]2366-the child has , do not hesitate to raise it . [I]0-i am the goddess , who , when prevailed upon , brings help and strength : [you]4044-you will have no cause to complain , that [the divinity]4047-the divinity , [you]4044-you worshipped , lacks gratitude . ’ Having given [her]1111-telethusa command , [she]1111-telethusa left [the room]2617-the room . Joyfully , [the Cretan woman]7737-the cretan woman rose , and , lifting [her]7737-the cretan woman innocent hands to the stars , [she]7737-the cretan woman prayed , in all humility , that [her]7737-the cretan woman dream might prove true . When the pains grew , and [her]7737-the cretan woman burden pushed its own way into [the world]1448-the world , and [a girl]1995-a girl was born , [the mother]2342-the mother ordered it to be reared , deceitfully , as [a boy]2019-a boy , without [the father]1852-the father realising . [She]7737-the cretan woman had all that [she]7737-the cretan woman needed , and [no one]1640-no one but [the nurse]7744-the nurse knew of the fraud . [The father]1852-the father made good [his]1852-the father vows , and gave it the name of [the grandfather]7746-the grandfather : [he]7746-the grandfather was [Iphis]1109-iphis . [The mother]2342-the mother was delighted with the name , since it was appropriate for either gender , and [no one]1640-no one was cheated by it . From that moment , the deception , begun with a sacred lie , went undetected . [The child]2366-the child was dressed as [a boy]2019-a boy , and its features would have been beautiful whether they were given to [a girl]1995-a girl or [a boy]2019-a boy . Thirteen years passed by , meanwhile , and then , [Iphis]1109-iphis , [[your]1109-iphis father]1808-your father betrothed [you]1109-iphis to golden - haired [Ianthe]1116-ianthe , whose dowry was [her]1116-ianthe beauty , [the girl most praised amongst [the women of [Phaestos]303-phaestos]7755-the women of phaestos , [the daughter of Telestes of [Dicte]304-dicte]7756-the daughter of telestes of dicte]7754-the girl most praised amongst the women of phaestos , the daughter of telestes of dicte . [The two]2580-the two were equal in age , and equal in looks , and had received [their]2580-the two first instruction , in the knowledge of life , from [the same teachers]7758-the same teachers . From this beginning , love had touched both [their]2580-the two innocent hearts , and wounded [them]2580-the two equally , but with unequal expectations . [Ianthe]1116-ianthe anticipated [her]1116-ianthe wedding day , and the promised marriage , believing [he]2019-a boy , whom [she]1116-ianthe thought to be [a man]5897-a man , would be [[her]1116-ianthe man]7760-her man . [Iphis]1109-iphis loved one whom [she]1109-iphis despaired of being able to have , and this itself increased [her]1109-iphis passion , [a girl on fire for [a girl]1995-a girl]7761-a girl on fire for a girl . Hardly restraining [her]1109-iphis tears , [she]1109-iphis said ‘[4047-the divinity] What way out is there left , for [me]0-i , possessed by the pain of a strange and monstrous love , that [no one]1640-no one ever knew before ? If [the gods]1538-the gods wanted to spare [me]0-i [they]1538-the gods should have spared [me]0-i , but if [they]1538-the gods wanted to destroy [me]0-i , [they]1538-the gods might at least have visited on [me]0-i a natural , and normal , misfortune . Mares do not burn with love for mares , or heifers for [heifers]4050-heifers : the ram inflames the ewe : its hind follows the stag . So , birds mate , and among all animals , [not one female]4051-not one female is attacked by lust for [a female]4052-a female . [I]0-i wish [I]0-i were [not one]4053-not one ! Yet that [Crete]88-crete might not fail to bear every monstrosity , [Pasiphaë]989-pasiphaë , [[Sol]600-sol ’s daughter]4054-sol ’s daughter , loved a bull , though still that was [a female]4052-a female and [a male]4056-a male . [My]0-i love , truth be told , is more extreme than that . [She]4054-sol ’s daughter at least chased after the hope of fulfilment , though the bull had [her]4054-sol ’s daughter because of [her]4054-sol ’s daughter deceit , and in the likeness of a cow , and [the one who was deceived]4057-the one who was deceived was [a male adulterer]4058-a male adulterer . Though all of [the world]1448-the world ’s cleverness were concentrated here , though [Daedalus]991-daedalus were to return on waxen wings , what use would it be ? Surely even [his]991-daedalus cunning arts could not make [a boy]2019-a boy out of [a girl]1995-a girl ? Surely even [he]991-daedalus could not transform [you]4062-you , [Ianthe]1116-ianthe ? Rather be firm - minded , [Iphis]1109-iphis , and pull [yourself]4062-you together , and , with wisdom , shake off this foolish , useless passion . Look at what [you]4062-you have been , from birth , if [you]4062-you do n’t want to cheat [yourself]4062-you , and seek out what is right for [you]4062-you , and love as [a woman]1994-a woman should ! It is hope that creates love , and hope that nourishes it . Everything robs [you]4062-you of that . [No guardian]4064-no guardian keeps [you]4062-you from [her]4064-no guardian dear arms , [no wary husband]4065-no wary husband ’s care , [no cruel father]4066-no cruel father , nor does [she]4064-no guardian deny [your]4062-you wooing [herself]4064-no guardian . Yet [you]4062-you can never have [her]4064-no guardian , or be happy , whatever is accomplished , whatever [men]5788-men or [gods]1446-gods attempt . Even now , no part of [my]0-i prayers has been denied . [The gods]1538-the gods have readily given whatever [they]1538-the gods were able , and [[my]0-i father]5857-my father , [[her]4064-no guardian father]1694-her father , and [she]4064-no guardian [herself]4064-no guardian , want what [I]0-i want to happen . But [Nature]773-nature does not want it , [the only one who harms [me]0-i , more powerful than [them]1538-the gods all]4072-the only one who harms me , more powerful than them all . See , the longed - for time has come , the wedding torch is at hand , and [Ianthe]1116-ianthe will become [mine]0-i – yet not be had by [me]0-i . [I]0-i will thirst in the midst of the waters . [Juno]877-juno , [goddess of brides]4073-goddess of brides , and [Hymen]525-juno , why do [you]4074-you come to these marriage rites , where [the bridegroom]4075-the bridegroom is absent , and both are [brides]4076-brides ? ’ With these words , [she]4064-no guardian stopped speaking . [The other girl]7763-the other girl was no less on fire , and prayed , [Hymen]525-juno , that [you]4074-you would come quickly . [Telethusa]1111-telethusa , afraid of what [she]1111-telethusa sought , merely put off the day : now lengthening the delay through pretended illness , now , frequently , using omens and dreams as an excuse . But eventually every pretext was exhausted , the date for the delayed marriage ceremony was set , and only a day remained . Then [Telethusa]1111-telethusa took the sacred ribbons from [her]1111-telethusa own and [[her]1111-telethusa daughter]6750-her daughter [Iphis]1109-iphis ’s head , so that [their]7765-their hair streamed down , and clinging to the altar , cried : ‘[1112-isis] [Isis]1112-isis , [you]1112-isis who protect [Paraetonium]305-paraetonium , [Pharos]306-pharos , [the Mareotic fields]4077-the mareotic fields , and [Nile]551-nile , divided in [its]551-nile [seven streams]4078-seven streams , [I]0-i pray [you]1112-isis , bring help , and relieve [our]4079-us fears ! [Goddess]1118-goddess , [I]0-i saw [you]1112-isis once , [you]1112-isis , and those symbols of [you]1112-isis , and [I]0-i knew them all , accompanied by the jingling bronze of the sistrum , and imprinted [your]1112-isis commands on [my]0-i remembering mind . That [[my]0-i daughter]5934-my daughter looks on the light , that [I]0-i have not been punished , behold , it was [your]1112-isis purpose , and [your]1112-isis gift . Gladden [us]4079-us with [your]1112-isis aid . Have pity on [us]4079-us both ! ’ Tears followed words . [The goddess]5864-the goddess seemed to make the altar tremble ( it did tremble ) , and the doors of [the temple]1675-the temple shook , [her]5864-the goddess horns , shaped like the moon ’s crescents , shone , and the sistrum rattled loudly . Not yet reassured , but gladdened by the auspicious omen , [the mother]2342-the mother left [the temple]1675-the temple . [Iphis]1109-iphis , [[her]2342-the mother companion]2211-her companion , followed , taking larger paces than before ; with no whiteness left in [her]1109-iphis complexion ; with additional strength , and sharper features , and shorter , less elegant hair ; showing more vigour than [women]5877-women have . Take [your]1112-isis gifts to [the temple]1675-the temple , [Iphis]1109-iphis : rejoice , with confidence , not fear ! [You]1109-iphis , who were lately [a girl]1995-a girl , are now [a boy]2019-a boy ! [They]4079-us take [their]4079-us gifts to [the temple]1675-the temple , and add a votive tablet : the tablet has this brief line : [IPHIS]1109-iphis PERFORMS AS [A BOY]2019-a boy , WHAT [HE]2019-a boy PROMISED , AS [A GIRL]1995-a girl . The next day ’s sun reveals [the wide world]5935-the wide world in its rays , when [Venus]523-venus , and [Juno]525-juno , joined with [Hymen]525-juno , come , to the marriage torches , and [Iphis]1109-iphis , [the boy]1835-the boy , gains possession of [his]1835-the boy Ianthe . [Hymen]525-juno , called by the voice of [Orpheus]1119-orpheus , departed , and , dressed in [his]2019-a boy saffron robes , made [his]2019-a boy way through the vast skies to [the Ciconian coast]7780-the ciconian coast : but in vain . [He]2019-a boy was present at [Orpheus]1119-orpheus ’s marriage , true , but [he]2019-a boy did not speak the usual words , display a joyful expression , or bring good luck . The torch , too , that [he]2019-a boy held , sputtered continually , with tear - provoking fumes , and no amount of shaking contrived to light it properly . The result was worse than any omens . While [the newly wedded bride]7781-the newly wedded bride , [Eurydice]1120-eurydice , was walking through the grass , with a crowd of naiads as [[her]1120-eurydice companions]6707-her companions , [she]1120-eurydice was killed , by a bite on [her]1120-eurydice ankle , from a snake , sheltering there . When [Thracian Orpheus]1119-orpheus , [the poet of Rhodope]7783-the poet of rhodope , had mourned for [her]1120-eurydice , greatly , in [the upper world]7784-the upper world , [he]1119-orpheus dared to go down to [Styx]194-the styx , through the gate of [Taenarus]1121-taenarus , also , to see if [he]1119-orpheus might not move [the dead]6045-the dead . Through [the weightless throng , and the ghosts that had received proper burial]7786-the weightless throng , and the ghosts that had received proper burial , [he]1119-orpheus came to [Persephone]862-persephone , and [the lord of the shadows]7787-the lord of the shadows , [[he]7787-the lord of the shadows who rules [the joyless kingdom]7789-the joyless kingdom]7788-he who rules the joyless kingdom . Then striking the lyre - strings to accompany [his]1119-orpheus words , [he]1119-orpheus sang : ‘[4081-o gods of this world] [O gods of [this world]4082-this world]4081-o gods of this world , placed below [the earth]1463-the earth , to which [all , who are created mortal]4084-all , who are created mortal , descend ; if [you]4085-you allow [me]0-i , and it is lawful , to set aside the fictions of idle tongues and speak the truth , [I]0-i have not come here to see dark [Tartarus]7-tartarus , nor to bind [Cerberus]759-cerberus , [[Medusa]781-medusa ’s child]4086-medusa ’s child , with [his]759-cerberus three necks , and snaky hair . [[My]0-i wife]6055-my wife is the cause of [my]0-i journey . A viper [she]6055-my wife trod on diffused its venom into [her]6055-my wife body , and robbed [her]6055-my wife of [her]6055-my wife best years . [I]0-i longed to be able to accept it , and [I]0-i do not say [I]0-i have not tried : Love won . [He]4088-he is a god well known in [the world above]4089-the world above , though [I]0-i do not know if it is so here : though [I]0-i do imagine [him]4088-he to be [here]6115-here , as well , and if the story of that rape in ancient times is not a lie , [you]4091-you also were wedded by [Amor]526-amor . [I]0-i beg [you]4091-you , by [these fearful places]4092-these fearful places , by [this immense abyss]4093-this immense abyss , and the silence of [[your]4091-you vast realms]4094-your vast realms , reverse [Eurydice]1120-eurydice ’s swift death . All things are destined to be [yours]4091-you , and though [we]4095-we delay a while , sooner or later [we]4095-we hasten [home]2999-home . Here [we]4095-we are all bound , this is [[our]4095-we final abode]4097-our final abode , and [you]4091-you hold the longest reign over [the human race]5809-the human race . [Eurydice]1120-eurydice , too , will be [yours]4091-you to command , when [she]1120-eurydice has lived out [her]1120-eurydice fair span of years , to maturity . [I]0-i ask this benefit as a gift ; but , if [the fates]2293-the fates refuse [[my]0-i wife]6055-my wife this kindness , [I]0-i am determined not to return : [you]4091-you can delight in both [our]4095-we deaths . ’ [The bloodless spirits]7790-the bloodless spirits wept as [he]0-i spoke , accompanying [his]0-i words with the music . [Tantalus]761-tantalus did not reach for the ever - retreating water : [Ixion]763-ixion ’s wheel was stilled : the vultures did not pluck at [Tityus]1122-tityus ’s liver : [the Belides]1123-the belides , [the daughters of [Danaüs]1124-danaüs]7791-the daughters of danaüs , left [their]1123-the belides water jars : and [you]4091-you , [Sisyphus]762-sisyphus , perched there , on [your]4091-you rock . Then [they]7790-the bloodless spirits say , for the first time , the faces of [the Furies]764-the furies were wet with tears , won over by [his]0-i song : [the king of the deep]7792-the king of the deep , and [[his]0-i royal bride]7793-his royal bride , could not bear to refuse [his]0-i prayer , and called for [Eurydice]1120-eurydice . [She]1120-eurydice was among the recent ghosts , and walked haltingly from [her]1120-eurydice wound . [The poet of [Rhodope]915-mount rhodope]7783-the poet of rhodope received [her]1120-eurydice , and , at the same time , accepted this condition , that [he]7783-the poet of rhodope must not turn [his]7783-the poet of rhodope eyes behind [him]7783-the poet of rhodope , until [he]7783-the poet of rhodope emerged from [the vale of [Avernus]157-avernus]7795-the vale of avernus , or the gift would be null and void . [They]7796-they took [the upward path]7797-the upward path , through the still silence , steep and dark , shadowy with dense fog , drawing near to the threshold of [the upper world]7784-the upper world . Afraid [she]1120-eurydice was no longer there , and eager to see [her]1120-eurydice , [the lover]2082-the lover turned [his]2082-the lover eyes . In an instant [she]1120-eurydice dropped back , and [he]2082-the lover , [unhappy man]7800-unhappy man , stretching out [his]2082-the lover arms to hold [her]1120-eurydice and be held , clutched at nothing but the receding air . Dying a second time , now , there was no complaint to [[her]1120-eurydice husband]5872-her husband ( what , then , could [she]1120-eurydice complain of , except that [she]1120-eurydice had been loved ? ) . [She]1120-eurydice spoke a last ‘[4101-his] farewell ’ that , now , scarcely reached [his]2082-the lover ears , and turned again towards [that same place]7802-that same place . Stunned by the double loss of [[his]2082-the lover wife]1633-his wife , [Orpheus]1119-orpheus was like [that coward who saw [Cerberus]759-cerberus]7804-that coward who saw cerberus , the three - headed dog , chained by the central neck , and whose fear vanished with [his]2082-the lover nature , as stone transformed [his]2082-the lover body . Or like [Olenos]1125-olenos , and [you]7805-you , [his]1125-olenos Lethaea , too proud of [your]7805-you beauty : [he]1125-olenos wished to be charged with [your]7805-you crime , and seem guilty [himself]1125-olenos : once wedded hearts , [you]7805-you are now rocks set on [moist Mount [Ida]577-mount ida]7806-moist mount ida . [Orpheus]1119-orpheus wished and prayed , in vain , to cross [the Styx]194-the styx again , but [the ferryman]7807-the ferryman fended [him]1119-orpheus off . Still , for seven days , [he]1119-orpheus sat there by [the shore]2065-the shore , neglecting [himself]1119-orpheus and not taking nourishment . Sorrow , troubled thought , and tears were [his]1119-orpheus food . [He]1119-orpheus took [himself]1119-orpheus to [lofty Mount Rhodope]915-mount rhodope , and [Haemus]47-haemus , swept by the winds , complaining that [the gods of [Erebus]158-erebus]7809-the gods of erebus were cruel . Three times the sun had ended the year , in [watery Pisces]311-watery pisces , and [Orpheus]1119-orpheus had abstained from the love of [women]5877-women , either because things ended badly for [him]1119-orpheus , or because [he]1119-orpheus had sworn to do so . Yet , [many]1691-many felt a desire to be joined with [the poet]7812-the poet , and [many]1691-many grieved at rejection . Indeed , [he]1119-orpheus was [the first of [the Thracian people]7815-the thracian people]7814-the first of the thracian people to transfer [his]1119-orpheus love to [young boys]7816-young boys , and enjoy [their]7816-young boys brief springtime , and early flowering , this side of manhood . There was [a hill]7817-a hill , and , on [the hill]3425-the hill , a wide area of level ground , turfed with fresh blades of grass : shade was absent there : but when [the poet]7812-the poet , born of [the god]1482-the god , sounded the strings of [his]7812-the poet lyre , shade gathered there . [Jupiter]1077-jupiter ’s [Chaonian]830-the chaonian oak - tree came ; and [[Phaethon]553-phaethon ’s sisters]7821-phaethon ’s sisters , the Heliades , the poplars ; the durmast oak with its deep foliage ; the soft lime - tree ; the beech ; the virgin sweet - bay , laurel ; the hazel , frail ; the ash - tree , used for spears ; the sweeping silver - fir : holm - oak , heavy with acorns ; pleasant plane - tree ; the many - coloured maple ; with the river - haunting willow ; lotus , water - lover ; boxwood ever - verdant ; the slender tamarisk ; the myrtle , with , over and under its leaves , the two shades of green ; and the blue - berried wild - bay , laurus tinus . [You]7822-you came , also , twining ivy , together with shooting vines ; the vine - supporting elms ; the flowering ‘[1128-cyparissus] manna ’ ash ; the spruce ; the strawberry tree , weighed down with its red fruit ; the pliant palms , [the winner]7823-the winner ’s prize ; and [you]7822-you , the shaggy - topped pine tree , armed with needles , sacred to [Cybele]1126-cybele , [mother of [the gods]1538-the gods]7824-mother of the gods , since [Attis]1127-attis exchanged [his]1127-attis human form for [you]7822-you , and hardened in [your]7822-you trunk . Among [the crowd]2430-the crowd came the cypress , formed like the cone - shaped meta , that marks the turning point in the race - course : once [a boy]2019-a boy , but now a tree : loved by [the god who tunes the lyre , and strings the bow]7828-the god who tunes the lyre , and strings the bow . There was a giant stag , sacred to the nymphs that haunt [the Carthaean country]7829-the carthaean country , which cast deep shadows , around its head , from [his]7812-the poet wide - branching antlers . The antlers shone with gold , and the gems of a jewelled collar , around [his]7812-the poet polished neck , hung down onto [his]7812-the poet shoulders . A bulla , a silver charm , fastened with small strips of leather , quivered on [his]7812-the poet forehead , and on either side of [his]7812-the poet hollow temples matching pearls of bronze gleamed from both ears . Free from fear , and forgetting [his]7812-the poet natural shyness , [he]7812-the poet used to visit [[people]1519-people ’s houses]7831-people ’s houses , and offer [his]7812-the poet neck to be stroked by [strangers]7832-strangers ’[1128-cyparissus] hands . Yet , above all others , [he]4101-his was dear to [you]4102-you , [Cyparissus]1128-cyparissus , [loveliest of [the Cean boys]4104-the cean boys]4103-loveliest of the cean boys . [You]4102-you led [the stag]4105-the stag to [fresh pastures]4106-fresh pastures , and the waters of the clear spring . Now [you]4102-you would weave diverse flowers through [his]4101-his horns , and then , astride [his]4101-his back like [a horseman]4107-a horseman , delight in tugging [his]4101-his soft mouth one way or the other by means of a purple muzzle . It was noon of a summer ’s day , when the curving claws of shore - loving [Cancer]567-cancer were burning in the hot sun . Tired , the stag had settled its body on [the grassy turf]4108-the grassy turf and was enjoying the cool of the woodland shade . [The boy]1835-the boy , without intention , transfixed it with [his]1835-the boy sharp spear , and when [he]1835-the boy saw it dying from the cruel wound , [he]1835-the boy wished to die [himself]1835-the boy . What was there [Phoebus]519-phoebus did not say , in solace , advising a moderate grief matching the cause ! [He]519-phoebus only sighed , and begged , as the last gift of [the gods]1538-the gods , that [he]519-phoebus might mourn forever . Then , [his]519-phoebus blood discharged among endless tears , [his]519-phoebus limbs began to turn to a shade of green , and [his]519-phoebus hair that a moment ago hung over [his]519-phoebus pale forehead , became a bristling crown , and [he]519-phoebus stiffened to a graceful point gazing at the starry heavens . [The god]1482-the god sighed for [him]519-phoebus , and said , sadly : ‘ [I]1482-the god will mourn for [you]519-phoebus : [you]519-phoebus will mourn for [others]5836-others , and enter into sorrows ’[1482-the god] . Such was the grove of trees [the poet]7812-the poet gathered round [him]519-phoebus , and [he]519-phoebus sat in the midst of a crowd , of animals and birds . When [he]519-phoebus had tried a few chords , stroking the lyre with [his]519-phoebus thumb , and felt that the various notes were in tune , regardless of their pitch , [he]519-phoebus raised [his]519-phoebus voice to sing : ‘ Begin [my]519-phoebus song with [Jupiter]1077-jupiter , [Calliope]852-calliope , [O Muse]7834-o muse , [[my]519-phoebus mother]2965-my mother ( all things bow to [Jupiter]1077-jupiter ’s might ) ! [I]519-phoebus have often sung the power of [Jove]605-jove before : [I]519-phoebus have sung of the Giants , in an epic strain , and the victorious lightning bolts , hurled at [the Phlegraean field]7836-the phlegraean field . Now there is gentler work for the lyre , and [I]519-phoebus sing of [boys loved by the gods]7837-boys loved by the gods , and [girls]7682-girls stricken with forbidden fires , deserving punishment for [their]7682-girls lust . [The king of the gods]1581-the king of the gods once burned with love for [Phrygian Ganymede]1129-phrygian ganymede , and to win [him]1129-phrygian ganymede [Jupiter]1077-jupiter chose to be something other than [he]1077-jupiter was . Yet [he]1581-the king of the gods did not deign to transform [himself]1581-the king of the gods into any other bird , than that eagle , that could carry [his]1581-the king of the gods lightning bolts . Straightaway , [he]1581-the king of the gods beat the air with deceitful wings , and stole [the Trojan boy , who still handles the mixing cups]7840-the trojan boy , who still handles the mixing cups , and against [Juno]525-juno ’s will pours out Jove ’s nectar . [You]7841-you too , [Hyacinthus]1130-hyacinthus , of [Amyclae]312-amyclae , [Phoebus]519-phoebus would have placed in [heaven]1501-heaven , if sad fate had given [him]1581-the king of the gods time to do so . Still , as it is , [you]7841-you are immortal , and whenever spring drives winter away , and [Aries]1131-aries follows watery Pisces , [you]7841-you also rise , and flower in [the green turf]7843-the green turf . [[My]519-phoebus father]5857-my father , [Phoebus]519-phoebus , loved [you]7841-you above all others : and [Delphi]82-delphi , at [the centre of [the world]1448-the world]7845-the centre of the world , lost [[its]82-delphi presiding deity]7847-its presiding deity , while [the god]1482-the god frequented [Eurotas]1132-eurotas , and [Sparta]95-sparta without [its]95-sparta walls , doing no honour to the zither or the bow . Forgetting [his]519-phoebus usual pursuits , [he]519-phoebus did not object to carrying the nets , handling the dogs , or travelling as [a companion]7849-a companion , over [the rough mountain ridges]7850-the rough mountain ridges , and by constant partnership feeding the flames . Now , the sun was midway between the vanished and the future night , equally far from either extreme : [they]7851-they stripped off [their]7851-they clothes , and gleaming with the rich olive oil , [they]7851-they had rubbed [themselves]7851-they with , [they]7851-they began a contest with the broad discus . [Phoebus]519-phoebus went first , balancing it , and hurling it high into the air , scattering the clouds with its weight . Its mass took a long time to fall back to the hard ground , showing strength and skill combined . Immediately [the Taenarian boy]7852-the taenarian boy , without thinking , ran forward to pick up the disc , prompted by [his]519-phoebus eagerness to throw , but the solid earth threw it back , hitting [you]7853-you in the face , with the rebound , [Hyacinthus]1130-hyacinthus . [The god]1482-the god is as white as [the boy]1835-the boy , and cradles the fallen body . Now [he]1482-the god tries to revive [you]7853-you , now to staunch [your]7853-you dreadful wound , and now applies herbs to hold back [your]7853-you departing spirit . [His]1482-the god arts are useless : the wound is incurable . Just as if , when [someone]6346-someone , in [a garden]7857-a garden , breaks violets , stiff poppies , or the lilies with [their]6346-someone bristling yellow stamens , and , suddenly , [they]6346-someone droop , bowing [their]6346-someone weakened heads , unable to support [themselves]6346-someone , and [their]6346-someone tops gaze at the soil : so [his]1482-the god dying head drops , and , with failing strength , the neck is overburdened , and sinks onto the shoulder . ‘[519-phoebus] [You]4113-you slip away , [Spartan]663-spartan , robbed of the flower of youth ’ [Phoebus]519-phoebus sighed , ‘[0-i] and [I]0-i see [my]0-i guilt , in [your]4113-you wound . [You]4113-you are [my]0-i grief and [my]0-i reproach : [your]4113-you death must be ascribed to [my]0-i hand . [I]0-i am the agent of [your]4113-you destruction . Yet , how was it [my]0-i fault , unless taking part in a game can be called a fault , unless it can be called a fault to have loved [you]4113-you ? If only [I]0-i might die with [you]4113-you , and pay with [my]0-i life ! But since the laws of fate bind [us]4114-us , [you]4113-you shall always be with [me]0-i , and cling to [my]0-i remembering lips . [My]0-i songs ; the lyre [my]0-i hand touches ; will celebrate [you]4113-you . As a new - formed flower , [you]4113-you shall denote [my]0-i woe , by [your]4113-you markings . And the time will come , when [Ajax]605-jove , bravest of [heroes]4115-heroes , will associate [himself]605-jove with this same flower , and be identified by its petals . While the truthful mouth of [Apollo]519-phoebus uttered these words , look , the blood that had spilt on the ground staining the grass was no longer blood , and a flower sprang up , brighter than Tyrian dye , and took the shape of a lily , though it was purple in colour , where the other is silvery white . Not satisfied with this alone , [Phoebus]519-phoebus ( [he]519-phoebus , indeed , was [the giver of the honour]4116-the giver of the honour ) [himself]519-phoebus marked [his]519-phoebus grief on the petals , and the flower bore the letters AI AI , the letters of woe traced there . Nor was [Sparta]95-sparta ashamed of producing [Hyacinthus]1130-hyacinthus : [his]95-sparta honour has lasted to this day , and by ancient custom the Hyacinthia is celebrated , at its annual return , by displaying the flower in procession . ’ ‘[95-sparta] But if [you]4113-you should ask [the Cyprian city of [Amathus]314-amathus , rich in mines]4117-the cyprian city of amathus , rich in mines , whether it would have wished to have produced [those girls]4118-those girls , [the Propoetides]1134-the propoetides , it would repudiate [them]4118-those girls , and equally [those men , whose foreheads were once marred by two horns]4119-those men , whose foreheads were once marred by two horns , from which [they]4119-those men , whose foreheads were once marred by two horns took [their]4119-those men , whose foreheads were once marred by two horns name , Cerastae . An altar , to Jove the Hospitable , used to stand in front of the gates : if [any stranger]4120-any stranger , ignorant of [their]4119-those men , whose foreheads were once marred by two horns wickedness , had seen it , stained with blood , [they]4119-those men , whose foreheads were once marred by two horns would have thought that calves or sheep , from [Amathus]314-amathus , were sacrificed [there]1878-there : it was [[their]4119-those men , whose foreheads were once marred by two horns guests [they]4119-those men , whose foreheads were once marred by two horns killed]4122-their guests they killed ! [Kindly Venus]523-venus was preparing to abandon [[her]523-venus cities]4123-her cities , and [the Cyprian fields]4124-the cyprian fields , outraged by [their]4119-those men , whose foreheads were once marred by two horns abominable rites , but ‘ How , ’[523-venus] [she]523-venus said , ‘ have [[my]523-venus cities]7858-my cities , or [this dear place]7859-this dear place , sinned ? What is [their]4119-those men , whose foreheads were once marred by two horns crime ? Instead , let [this impious race]7860-this impious race pay the penalty of death or exile , or some punishment between execution and banishment , and what might that be but the penalty of being transformed ? ’[523-venus] While [she]523-venus is deciding how to alter them , [she]523-venus turns [her]523-venus eyes towards [their]4119-those men , whose foreheads were once marred by two horns horns , and this suggests that [she]523-venus might leave them those , and [she]523-venus changed them into wild bullocks . Nevertheless , [the immoral Propoetides]1134-the propoetides dared to deny that [Venus]523-venus was [the goddess]5864-the goddess . For this , because of [her]523-venus divine anger , [they]4119-those men , whose foreheads were once marred by two horns are said to have been the first to prostitute [their]4119-those men , whose foreheads were once marred by two horns bodies and [their]4119-those men , whose foreheads were once marred by two horns reputations in public , and , losing all sense of shame , [they]4119-those men , whose foreheads were once marred by two horns lost the power to blush , as the blood hardened in [their]4119-those men , whose foreheads were once marred by two horns cheeks , and only a small change turned [them]4119-those men , whose foreheads were once marred by two horns into hard flints . ’ ‘[1135-pygmalion] [Pygmalion]1135-pygmalion had seen [them]4119-those men , whose foreheads were once marred by two horns , spending [their]4119-those men , whose foreheads were once marred by two horns lives in wickedness , and , offended by the failings that nature gave the female heart , [he]1135-pygmalion lived as [a bachelor]4126-a bachelor , without [a wife]6965-a wife or [partner]4128-partner for [his]1135-pygmalion bed . But , with wonderful skill , [he]1135-pygmalion carved a figure , brilliantly , out of snow - white ivory , [no mortal woman]4129-no mortal woman , and fell in love with [his]1135-pygmalion own creation . The features are those of [a real girl]4130-a real girl , who , [you]4131-you might think , lived , and wished to move , if modesty did not forbid it . Indeed , art hides [his]1135-pygmalion art . [He]1135-pygmalion marvels : and passion , for this bodily image , consumes [his]1135-pygmalion heart . Often , [he]1135-pygmalion runs [his]1135-pygmalion hands over the work , tempted as to whether it is flesh or ivory , not admitting it to be ivory . [He]1135-pygmalion kisses it and thinks [his]1135-pygmalion kisses are returned ; and speaks to it ; and holds it , and imagines that [his]1135-pygmalion fingers press into the limbs , and is afraid lest bruises appear from the pressure . Now [he]1135-pygmalion addresses it with compliments , now brings it gifts that please [girls]7682-girls , shells and polished pebbles , little birds , and many - coloured flowers , lilies and tinted beads , and [the Heliades]1136-the heliades ’s amber tears , that drip from the trees . [He]1135-pygmalion dresses the body , also , in clothing ; places rings on the fingers ; places a long necklace round [its]4133-its neck ; pearls hang from the ears , and cinctures round the breasts . All are fitting : but it appears no less lovely , naked . [He]1135-pygmalion arranges the statue on a bed on which cloths dyed with Tyrian murex are spread , and calls it [[his]1135-pygmalion bedfellow]4134-his bedfellow , and rests its neck against soft down , as if it could feel . The day of [Venus]523-venus ’s festival came , celebrated throughout [Cyprus]315-cyprus , and heifers , [their]4135-their curved horns gilded , fell , to the blow on [their]4135-their snowy neck . The incense was smoking , when [Pygmalion]1135-pygmalion , having made [his]1135-pygmalion offering , stood by the altar , and said , shyly : “ If [you]4136-you can grant all things , [[you]4136-you gods]5823-you gods , [I]0-i wish as [a bride]2755-a bride to have ... ” and not daring to say “ [the girl of ivory]4139-the girl of ivory ” [he]0-i said “ one like [[my]0-i ivory girl]4140-my ivory girl . ” [Golden Venus]1137-venus , for [she]1137-venus [herself]1137-venus was present at the festival , knew what the prayer meant , and as a sign of [the gods]1538-the gods ’ fondness for [him]0-i , the flame flared three times , and shook its crown in the air . When [he]0-i returned , [he]0-i sought out the image of [[his]0-i girl]7861-his girl , and leaning over the couch , kissed [her]7861-his girl . [She]7861-his girl felt warm : [he]0-i pressed [his]0-i lips to [her]7861-his girl again , and also touched [her]7861-his girl breast with [his]0-i hand . The ivory yielded to [his]0-i touch , and lost its hardness , altering under [his]0-i fingers , as the bees ’[1137-venus] wax of Hymettus softens in the sun , and is moulded , under the thumb , into many forms , made usable by use . [The lover]2082-the lover is stupefied , and joyful , but uncertain , and afraid [he]2082-the lover is wrong , reaffirms the fulfilment of [his]2082-the lover wishes , with [his]2082-the lover hand , again , and again . It was flesh ! The pulse throbbed under [his]2082-the lover thumb . Then [the hero]2234-the hero , of [Paphos]1138-paphos , was indeed overfull of words with which to thank [Venus]1137-venus , and still pressed [his]2234-the hero mouth against a mouth that was not merely a likeness . [The girl]1792-the girl felt the kisses [he]2234-the hero gave , blushed , and , raising [her]1792-the girl bashful eyes to the light , saw both [[her]1792-the girl lover]2335-her lover and the sky . [The goddess]5864-the goddess attended the marriage that [she]5864-the goddess had brought about , and when the moon ’s horns had nine times met at the full , [the woman]5878-the woman bore [a son]5939-a son , [Paphos]1138-paphos , from whom [the island]7121-the island takes [its]7121-the island name . ’ ‘[5939-a son] [Cinyras]879-cinyras was [the son of [Paphos]1138-paphos]4150-the son of paphos , and [he]879-cinyras might have been counted amongst [the fortunate]4151-the fortunate , if [he]879-cinyras , in turn , had been childless . [I]0-i speak of terrible things . [Fathers]6052-fathers and [daughters]2264-daughters , keep away : or if [your]4154-you mind takes pleasure in [my]0-i song , put no faith in this story of [mine]0-i , and imagine it did not happen . Or , if [you]4154-you do believe it , believe in the punishment also , that it brought . If nature , however , allows such crimes to be visible , then [I]0-i give thanks that [the people of [Thrace]111-thrace]4155-the people of thrace , [this city]4156-this city , and [this land]4157-this land , are far from [the regions where such sin is born]4158-the regions where such sin is born . Let [the land of [Panchaia]317-panchaia]4159-the land of panchaia , beyond [Araby]318-araby , produce [its]4159-the land of panchaia balsam , cinnamon , costmary ; its incense , exuded from the trees ; its flowers different from [ours]4160-ours ; if it produces myrrh : a strange tree is not worth such a price . [Cupid]522-cupid denies that [his]522-cupid arrows hurt [you]4154-you , [Myrrha]1139-myrrha , and clears [his]522-cupid fires of blame for [your]4154-you crime . One of [the three sisters]7456-the three sisters , [the Furies]3113-the furies , with [her]3113-the furies swollen snakes , and firebrand from [the Styx]194-the styx , breathed on [you]4154-you . It is wrong to hate [[your]4154-you father]1808-your father , but that love was a greater wrong than hatred . The pick of [the princes]3090-the princes , from everywhere , desire [you]4154-you : [young men]2267-young men , from [the whole of [the East]37-the east]4166-the whole of the east , come to win [you]4154-you in marriage . Out of the many , choose one for [[your]4154-you husband]4045-your husband , [Myrrha]1139-myrrha , but let [one man]1607-one man not be amongst [the many]4169-the many . Indeed , [she]3113-the furies knows it , and fights against [her]3113-the furies disgraceful passion , and says , to [herself]3113-the furies : “ Where is [my]0-i thought leading ? What am [I]0-i creating ? [[You]4170-you gods]5823-you gods , [I]0-i pray , and the duty and sacred laws respecting [parents]3118-parents , prevent this wickedness , and oppose [my]0-i sin , indeed , if sin it is . But it can be said that duty declines to condemn such love . [Other creatures]4173-other creatures mate indiscriminately : it is no disgrace for a heifer to have [[her]4174-her sire]4175-her sire mount [her]4174-her , for [his]4175-her sire filly to be [a stallion ’s mate]4176-a stallion ’s mate : the goat goes with the flocks [he]4175-her sire has made , and the birds themselves conceive , by [him]4175-her sire whose seed conceived [them]4177-them . Happy [the creatures who are allowed to do so]4178-the creatures who are allowed to do so ! Human concern has made malign laws , and what nature allows , jealous duty forbids . Yet [they]4179-they say there are races where [mother]1809-mother and [son]6133-son , and [father]5922-father and [daughter]5903-daughter , pair off , and affection is increased by a double bond . Alas for [me]0-i , that [I]0-i did not happen to be born there , and that [I]0-i am made to suffer by an accident of place ! – Why do [I]0-i repeat these things ? Forbidden hopes , vanish ! [He]4175-her sire is worth loving , but only as [a father]5997-a father . – [I]0-i could lie with [Cinyras]879-cinyras , if [I]0-i were not [Cinyras]879-cinyras ’s already . Now , [he]879-cinyras is not [mine]0-i , because [he]879-cinyras is already [mine]0-i , and the nearness of [our]4185-our relationship damns [me]0-i : [I]0-i would be better off as [a stranger]2843-a stranger . [I]0-i would be happy to go far away , and leave the borders of [[my]0-i homeland]4187-my homeland behind [me]0-i , if [I]0-i might run from evil : but even if nothing more is permitted , a wicked desire to see [Cinyras]879-cinyras , touch [him]879-cinyras , speak to [him]879-cinyras , and kiss [him]879-cinyras , face to face , prevents [my]0-i leaving . But then , what more might [you]4188-you look to have , [impious girl]4189-impious girl ? Do [you]4188-you realise how many names and ties [you]4188-you are throwing into confusion ? Would [you]4188-you be , then , [[[your]4188-you mother]1807-your mother ’s rival , and [[your]4188-you father]1808-your father ’s mistress]4191-your mother ’s rival , and your father ’s mistress ? Would [you]4188-you be known , then , as [[[your]4188-you son]2646-your son ’s sister , [[your]4188-you brother]1933-your brother ’s mother]4194-your son ’s sister , your brother ’s mother ? Do [you]4188-you not fear [the three sisters]7456-the three sisters , with black snaky hair , that those with guilty hearts , [their]7456-the three sisters eyes and mouths attacked with cruel torches , see ? Since [you]4188-you have still not committed sin in the flesh , do not conceive it in [your]4188-you mind , or disregard the prohibitions of mighty nature , in vile congress ! Grant that [you]4188-you want it : the reality itself forbids it . [He]1808-your father is [a good man]4197-a good man , and mindful of the moral law – but , O , how [I]0-i wish the same passion were in [him]1808-your father ! ” ’ ‘[4198-her] [She]4198-her spoke : [Cinyras]879-cinyras , however , who was made doubtful of what to do by the crowd of [noble suitors]4199-noble suitors , naming [them]4199-noble suitors , asked [her]4198-her whom [she]4198-her wanted , as [a husband]3428-a husband . At first [she]4198-her is silent , and staring at [[her]4198-her father]1694-her father ’s face , hesitates , [her]4198-her eyes filling with warm tears . [Cinyras]879-cinyras thinking this to be virgin shyness , forbids [her]4198-her to cry , dries [her]4198-her cheeks , and kisses [her]4198-her on the lips . [Myrrha]1139-myrrha is overjoyed at this gift , and , being consulted as to what kind of husband [she]1139-myrrha might choose , says : “ Someone like [you]4202-you ” . Not understanding this , however , [he]879-cinyras praises [her]4198-her , saying : “ Always be so loving . ” At the word “ loving ” , [the girl]1792-the girl , lowers [her]1792-the girl glance , conscious of [her]1792-the girl sin . It was midnight , and sleep had released mortal flesh from worldly cares , but [[Cinyras]879-cinyras ’s daughter]4204-cinyras ’s daughter , wakeful , stirring the embers , reawakens [her]4204-cinyras ’s daughter ungovernable desires , one moment despairing , at another willing to try , ashamed and eager , not yet discovering what to do . As a tall tree , struck by the axe , the last blow remaining , uncertain how it will fall , causes fear on all sides , so [her]4204-cinyras ’s daughter fickle mind , swayed this way and that , [her]4204-cinyras ’s daughter thought taking both directions , seeing no rest for or end to [her]4204-cinyras ’s daughter passion , but death . [She]4204-cinyras ’s daughter felt ready to die . [She]4204-cinyras ’s daughter got up , determined , to fix a noose round [her]4204-cinyras ’s daughter throat , and , fastening a cord to the doorway ’s crossbeam , [she]4204-cinyras ’s daughter said : “ Goodbye , dear [Cinyras]879-cinyras , and realize the reason for [my]0-i death ! ” And [she]4204-cinyras ’s daughter tied the rope around [her]4204-cinyras ’s daughter bloodless neck . [They]4205-they say that the murmured words came to the ears of [[her]4204-cinyras ’s daughter loyal nurse]4206-her loyal nurse , who watched at [[her]4204-cinyras ’s daughter foster - child]2663-her foster - child ’s threshold . [The old woman]6745-the old woman gets up , and opens the door , and , seeing the equipment of death , cries out , and in the same moment , strikes [her]6745-the old woman breast , snatches at the folds of [her]6745-the old woman robe , and tearing the noose from [the girl]1792-the girl ’s neck , pulls it apart . Then , finally , [she]6745-the old woman has time to cry , to embrace [her]6745-the old woman , and demand the reason for the rope . [The girl]1792-the girl is mute and still , looking , fixedly , at the ground , and unhappy that [her]4204-cinyras ’s daughter belated attempt at death has been discovered . [The old woman]6745-the old woman insists on knowing , baring [her]6745-the old woman white hair and withered breasts , and begs [her]6745-the old woman to say what grieves [her]6745-the old woman , invoking [her]6745-the old woman infant cradle , and first nurturing . [The girl]1792-the girl turns away from [her]6745-the old woman pleading , with a sigh . [The nurse]7744-the nurse is determined to know , and promises more than loyalty . “ Tell [me]0-i , ” [She]7744-the nurse says , “ and let [me]0-i bring [you]1792-the girl some help : age does not slow [me]0-i . If it is some frenzy , [I]0-i have herbs and charms that heal : if [someone]6346-someone is seeking [your]1792-the girl harm , [I]0-i will purify [you]1792-the girl with magic rites : if [the gods]1538-the gods are angry , anger is appeased by sacrifice . What else could it be ? The destiny of [[your]1792-the girl house]3690-your house is fortunate , and on course : [they]4217-they are well , [[your]1792-the girl mother]1807-your mother and [father]5922-father . ” Hearing the word “ [father ”]4220-father ” , [Myrrha]1139-myrrha sighed deeply . Even then [the nurse]7744-the nurse had no idea of the sin in [her]7744-the nurse mind , though [she]7744-the nurse guessed it might be some love affair . [She]7744-the nurse begged [her]1792-the girl , tenaciously , to tell [her]1792-the girl what it was , and took [the weeping girl]4222-the weeping girl to [her]7744-the nurse aged breast , and holding [her]4222-the weeping girl with trembling arms [she]7744-the nurse said : “ [I]0-i know , [you]4222-the weeping girl are in love ! And in this matter ( have no fear ) [my]0-i diligence can serve [you]4222-the weeping girl , [[your]4222-the weeping girl father]1808-your father will never know . ” [The frenzied girl]4224-the frenzied girl leapt from [her]7744-the nurse arms , and burying [her]4224-the frenzied girl face in the bed , said , urgently : “ Go , [I]0-i beg [you]7744-the nurse , and forgo the knowledge of [my]0-i wretched shame ! Go , or stop asking why [I]0-i am grieving . What [you]7744-the nurse are striving to know , is wickedness . ” [The old woman]6745-the old woman shuddered , and stretching out [her]6745-the old woman hands that trembled with age and fear , [she]6745-the old woman fell at [[her]6745-the old woman foster - child]2663-her foster - child ’s feet , pleading , then coaxing , then frightening [her]6745-the old woman , into making [her]6745-the old woman party to it . [She]6745-the old woman threatens [her]6745-the old woman with the evidence of the noose , and the attempt on [her]6745-the old woman life , and promises [her]6745-the old woman help in [her]6745-the old woman love affair . [The girl]1792-the girl raises [her]1792-the girl head , and [her]1792-the girl welling tears rain on [[her]1792-the girl nurse]3142-her nurse ’s breast . [She]1792-the girl often tries to confess , and often stops [herself]1792-the girl , and hides [her]1792-the girl face , in shame , in [her]1792-the girl clothing : then gets as far as “ [Mother]1809-mother , [you]1809-mother are happy in [[your]1809-mother husband]4045-your husband ! ” and sighs . A shudder of cold penetrated [the nurse]7744-the nurse ’s flesh and bone ( now [she]7744-the nurse understood ) and [her]7744-the nurse white hair stiffened all over [her]7744-the nurse head . [She]7744-the nurse told [her]1792-the girl at length , to banish , if [she]7744-the nurse could , this fatal passion . Though [the girl]1792-the girl knew [she]1792-the girl was being advised rightly , [she]1792-the girl was still determined to die , if [she]1792-the girl could not possess [her]1792-the girl love . “ Live , ” said [the nurse]7744-the nurse , “ possess [[your]1792-the girl ....]4234-your .... ” - and did not dare say : “ [father]5922-father ” . [She]7744-the nurse was silent , and confirmed [her]7744-the nurse promise in the sight of heaven . ’ ‘[7744-the nurse] [The married women]4236-the married women were celebrating that annual festival of [Ceres]689-ceres , when , with [their]4236-the married women bodies veiled in white robes , [they]4236-the married women offer the first fruits of the harvest , wreathes of corn , and , for nine nights , treat sexual union , and the touch of [a man]5897-a man , as forbidden . Cenchreis , [[the king]6572-the king ’s wife]4239-the king ’s wife was among [the crowd , frequenting the sacred rites]4240-the crowd , frequenting the sacred rites . Finding [Cinyras]879-cinyras drunk with wine , [[the king]6572-the king ’s bed]4242-the king ’s bed empty of [[his]879-cinyras lawful partner]4243-his lawful partner , [the nurse]7744-the nurse , wrongly diligent , told [him]879-cinyras of one who truly loved [him]879-cinyras , giving [him]879-cinyras a fictitious name , and praised [her]7744-the nurse beauty . [He]879-cinyras , asking [the girl]1792-the girl ’s age , [she]7744-the nurse said : “ [Myrrha]1139-myrrha ’s is the same . ” After [she]7744-the nurse had been ordered to bring [her]1792-the girl , and had reached [home]2999-home , [she]7744-the nurse said : “ Be happy , [[my]0-i child]6113-my child , [we]4248-we have won ! ” [The unhappy girl]4249-the unhappy girl felt no joy at all in [her]4249-the unhappy girl heart , and [her]4249-the unhappy girl heart prophetically mourned , yet [she]4249-the unhappy girl was still glad : such was [her]4249-the unhappy girl confusion of mind . It was the hour , when all is silent , and [Boötes]1140-boötes , between [the Bears]574-the bears , had turned [his]879-cinyras wagon , with downward - pointing shaft : [she]7744-the nurse approached the sinful act . The golden moon fled the sky ; black clouds covered the hidden stars ; night lacked its fires . [You]4250-your , [Icarius]1141-icarius , and [you]4250-your , [Erigone]889-erigone , [[his]879-cinyras daughter]2098-his daughter , immortalised for [your]4250-your pious love of [[your]4250-your father]1808-your father , hid [your]4250-your faces first . [Myrrha]1139-myrrha was checked by [an omen]4253-an omen , three times , when [her]1139-myrrha foot stumbled : three times , the gloomy screech owl gave [her]1139-myrrha warning , with its fatal cry : [she]1139-myrrha still went on , [her]1139-myrrha shame made less by blindness and black night . With [her]1139-myrrha left hand , [she]1139-myrrha kept tight hold of [[her]1139-myrrha nurse]3142-her nurse , groping with the other [she]1139-myrrha found a way through the dark . Now [she]1139-myrrha reaches the threshold of [the room]2617-the room , now [she]1139-myrrha opens the door , now is led inside . But [her]1139-myrrha trembling knees give way , [her]1139-myrrha colour flees with [her]1139-myrrha blood , and thought vanishes as [she]1139-myrrha goes forward . The closer [she]1139-myrrha is to [her]1139-myrrha sin , the more [she]1139-myrrha shudders at it , repents of [her]1139-myrrha audacity , and wants to be able to turn back , unrecognised . When [she]1139-myrrha hesitated , [the old woman]6745-the old woman took [her]1139-myrrha by the hand , and , leading [her]1139-myrrha to the high bed , delivered [her]1139-myrrha up , saying : “ Take [her]1139-myrrha [Cinyras]879-cinyras , [she]1139-myrrha is [yours]879-cinyras ” , uniting [their]4257-their accursed flesh . [The father]1852-the father admitted [[his]1852-the father own child]3234-his own child into the incestuous bed , calmed [her]1139-myrrha virgin fears , and encouraged [her]1139-myrrha timidity . Perhaps [he]1852-the father also said the name , “ [daughter]5903-daughter ” , in accordance with [her]1139-myrrha age , and [she]1139-myrrha said , “ [father]5922-father ” , so that [their]4257-their names were not absent from [their]4257-their sin . [She]1139-myrrha left [the room]2617-the room impregnated by [[her]1139-myrrha father]1694-her father , bearing impious seed in [her]1139-myrrha fatal womb , carrying the guilt [she]1139-myrrha had conceived . The next night the crime was repeated : nor did it finish [there]1878-there . Eventually , [Cinyras]879-cinyras , eager to discover [[his]879-cinyras lover]4265-his lover after so many couplings , fetching a light , saw [[his]879-cinyras daughter]2098-his daughter and [his]879-cinyras guilt , and speechless from grief , [he]879-cinyras snatched [his]879-cinyras bright sword out of the sheath it hung in . [Myrrha]1139-myrrha ran , escaping death , by the gift of darkness and secret night . Wandering [the wide fields]2106-the wide fields , [she]1139-myrrha left [the land of [Panchaea]319-panchaea]4268-the land of panchaea , and [palm - bearing Arabia]4269-palm - bearing arabia , behind , and after roaming through nine returns of the crescent moon , weary , [she]1139-myrrha rested at last in [the land of [the Sabaeans]1142-the sabaeans]4270-the land of the sabaeans . Now [she]1139-myrrha could scarcely bear the weight of [her]1139-myrrha womb . Tired of living , and scared of dying , not knowing what to pray for , [she]1139-myrrha composed these words of entreaty : “ O , if there are any gods who hear [my]0-i prayer , [I]0-i do not plead against [my]0-i well deserved punishment , but lest , by being , [I]0-i offend [the living]4271-the living , or , by dying , offend the dead , banish [me]0-i from [both realms]4272-both realms , and change [me]0-i , and deny [me]0-i life and death ! ” [Some god]6967-some god listened to [her]1139-myrrha prayer : certainly the last request found its path to [the heavens]1940-the heavens . While [she]1139-myrrha was still speaking , the soil covered [her]1139-myrrha shins ; roots , breaking from [her]1139-myrrha toes , spread sideways , supporting a tall trunk ; [her]1139-myrrha bones strengthened , and in the midst of the remaining marrow , the blood became sap ; [her]1139-myrrha arms became long branches ; [her]1139-myrrha fingers , twigs ; [her]1139-myrrha skin , solid bark . And now the growing tree had drawn together over [her]1139-myrrha ponderous belly , buried [her]1139-myrrha breasts , and was beginning to encase [her]1139-myrrha neck : [she]1139-myrrha could not bear the wait , and [she]1139-myrrha sank down against the wood , to meet it , and plunged [her]1139-myrrha face into the bark . Though [she]1139-myrrha has lost [her]1139-myrrha former senses with [her]1139-myrrha body , [she]1139-myrrha still weeps , and the warm drops trickle down from the tree . There is merit , also , in the tears : and the myrrh that drips from the bark keeps [its mistress]7721-its mistress ’s name , and , about it , no age will be silent . ’ ‘[4276-the child , conceived in sin] [The child , conceived in sin]4276-the child , conceived in sin , had grown within the tree , and was now searching for a way to leave [[its]4276-the child , conceived in sin mother]2093-its mother , and reveal itself . The pregnant womb swells within the tree trunk , the burden stretching [the mother]2342-the mother . The pain can not form words , nor can [Lucina]850-lucina be called on , in the voice of [a woman in labour]4279-a woman in labour . Nevertheless the tree bends , like one straining , and groans constantly , and is wet with falling tears . [Gentle Lucina]850-lucina stood by the suffering branches , and laid [her]850-lucina hands on them , speaking words that aid childbirth . At this the tree split open , and , from the torn bark , gave up its living burden , and [the child]2366-the child cried . [The naiads]1761-the naiads laid [him]2366-the child on the soft grass , and anointed [him]2366-the child with [[his]2366-the child mother]5953-his mother ’s tears . Even [Envy]626-envy would praise [his]2366-the child beauty , being so like one of the torsos of [naked Amor painted on boards]4283-naked amor painted on boards . But to stop [them]4284-them differing in attributes , [you]4285-you must add a light quiver , for [him]2366-the child , or take theirs away from [them]4284-them . Transient time slips by [us]4286-us unnoticed , betrays [us]4286-us , and nothing outpaces the years .
