[That son of [[his]2366-the child grandfather]2444-his grandfather , [sister]6159-sister , now hid in a tree , and now born , then [a most beautiful child]4290-a most beautiful child , then [a boy]2019-a boy , now [a man]5897-a man , now more beautiful than [he]2019-a boy was before , now interests [Venus]1137-venus [herself]1137-venus , and avenges [[his]2019-a boy mother]5953-his mother ’s desire]4287-that son of his grandfather , sister , now hid in a tree , and now born , then a most beautiful child , then a boy , now a man , now more beautiful than he was before , now interests venus herself , and avenges his mother ’s desire . For while [the boy]1835-the boy , [Cupid]522-cupid , with quiver on shoulder , was kissing [[his]1835-the boy mother]5953-his mother , [he]1835-the boy innocently scratched [her]5953-his mother breast with a loose arrow . [The injured goddess]4296-the injured goddess pushed [[her]4296-the injured goddess son]6039-her son away : but the wound [he]1835-the boy had given was deeper than it seemed , and deceived [her]4296-the injured goddess at first . Now captured by [mortal beauty]4298-mortal beauty , [she]4296-the injured goddess cares no more for [[Cythera]320-cythera ’s shores]4299-cythera ’s shores , nor revisits [Paphos]1138-paphos , surrounded by [[its]1138-paphos deep waters]4300-its deep waters , nor [Cnidos]321-cnidos , the haunt of fish , nor [Amathus]314-amathus , rich in mines : [she]4296-the injured goddess even forgoes [the heavens]1940-the heavens : preferring [Adonis]1143-adonis to [heaven]1501-heaven . [She]4296-the injured goddess holds [him]1143-adonis , and is [[his]1143-adonis companion]3554-his companion , and though [she]4296-the injured goddess is used to always idling in the shade , and , by cultivating it , enhancing [her]4296-the injured goddess beauty , [she]4296-the injured goddess roams [mountain ridges]4304-mountain ridges , and [forests]4305-forests , and thorny cliff - sides , [her]4296-the injured goddess clothing caught up to the knee , like [Diana]527-diana . And [she]4296-the injured goddess cheers on the hounds , chasing things safe to hunt , hares flying headlong , stags with deep horns , or [their]4306-their hinds . [She]4296-the injured goddess avoids the strong wild boars , the ravening wolves , and shuns the bears armed with claws , and the lions glutted with the slaughter of cattle . [She]4296-the injured goddess warns [you]4307-you [Adonis]1143-adonis , as if it were ever effective to warn , to fear [them]4308-them too , saying : “ Be bold when [they]4308-them run , but bravery is unsafe when faced with the brave . Do not be foolish , beware of endangering [me]0-i , and do not provoke the creatures nature has armed , lest [your]4307-you glory is to [my]0-i great cost . Neither youth nor beauty , nor the charms that affect [Venus]1137-venus , affect lions or bristling boars or the eyes and minds of other wild creatures . [Boars]1144-boars have the force of a fierce lightning bolt in [their]1144-boars curving tusks , and so does the attack of tawny lions , in [their]4306-their huge anger : [the whole tribe]4309-the whole tribe are hateful to [me]0-i . ” When [he]1143-adonis asks [her]4296-the injured goddess why , [she]4296-the injured goddess says : “ [I]0-i will tell , and [you]1143-adonis will wonder , at the monstrous result of an ancient crime . But now the unaccustomed effort tires [me]0-i , and , look , a poplar tree entices [us]4310-us with its welcome shade , and the turf yields a bed . [I]0-i should like to rest here on the ground , ” ( and [she]4296-the injured goddess rested ) “ with [you]1143-adonis . ” [She]4296-the injured goddess hugged the grass , and [him]1143-adonis , and leaning [her]4296-the injured goddess head against the breast of [the reclining youth]4311-the reclining youth , [she]4296-the injured goddess spoke these words , interspersing them with kisses : ’ ‘[4296-the injured goddess] “ Perhaps [you]1143-adonis have heard of [a girl who beat [the fastest men]4313-the fastest men at running]4312-a girl who beat the fastest men at running : that was no idle tale , [she]4312-a girl who beat the fastest men at running did win . [Wife]5843-wife and bed will be given as prizes to the swift , death to the tardy : let those be the rules . ’[4296-the injured goddess] Truly [she]4296-the injured goddess was pitiless , but ( such was the power of [her]4296-the injured goddess beauty ) [a rash crowd of [suitors]4322-suitors]4321-a rash crowd of suitors came , despite the rules . [Hippomenes]1145-hippomenes had taken [his]1145-hippomenes seat as [a spectator]4323-a spectator at the unjust contest , and said ‘ Who would try for [a wife]6965-a wife at such a risk ? ’[1145-hippomenes] condemning [the young men]6888-the young men for [their]6888-the young men excess of passion . [I]1145-hippomenes had not yet realised what the prize was [you]4296-the injured goddess were after . ’[1145-hippomenes] Praising [her]4296-the injured goddess , [he]1145-hippomenes falls in love with [her]4296-the injured goddess , and hopes [none of the youths]2373-none of the youths run faster , afraid , through jealousy . ‘ But why , in this competition , is [my]1145-hippomenes luck left untested ? ’[1145-hippomenes] [he]1145-hippomenes says . [The god]1482-the god [himself]1482-the god favours the bold ! ’ While [Hippomenes]1145-hippomenes was debating with [himself]1145-hippomenes like this , [the virgin girl]1992-the virgin girl sped by on winged feet . To [the Aonian youth]7867-the aonian youth [she]1992-the virgin girl flew like a Scythian arrow , yet it made [him]1145-hippomenes admire [her]1992-the virgin girl beauty all the more . The race gave [her]1992-the virgin girl a beauty of its own . The breeze blew the streaming feathers on [her]1992-the virgin girl speeding sandals behind [her]1992-the virgin girl , and [her]1992-the virgin girl hair was thrown back from [her]1992-the virgin girl ivory shoulders . While [the stranger]2710-the stranger was watching this , the last marker was passed , and [the victorious Atalanta]7870-the victorious atalanta was crowned with a festive garland , while [the losers]2920-the losers , groaning , paid the penalty according to [their]2920-the losers bond . Undeterred by [the youths]3278-the youths ’[1482-the god] fate , [Hippomenes]1145-hippomenes stepped forward and , fixing [his]1145-hippomenes gaze on [the girl]1792-the girl , said ‘ Why seek an easy win beating [the lazy]7873-the lazy ? If fortune makes [me]1145-hippomenes [the master]7874-the master , it will be no shame for [you]1792-the girl to be outpaced by [such a man as [me]1145-hippomenes]7875-such a man as me , since [Megareus of Onchestus]1146-megareus of onchestus is [[my]1145-hippomenes father]5857-my father , and [[his]5857-my father grandfather]2444-his grandfather was [Neptune]514-neptune , so [I]1145-hippomenes am [the great - grandson of [the king of [the ocean]1657-the ocean]7879-the king of the ocean]7878-the great - grandson of the king of the ocean , and [my]1145-hippomenes courage is no less than [my]1145-hippomenes birth . Or if [I]1145-hippomenes am beaten , [you]7881-you will have a great and renowned name for defeating [Hippomenes]1145-hippomenes . ’[1145-hippomenes] As [he]4331-he spoke [[Schoeneus]1147-schoeneus ’s daughter]4332-schoeneus ’s daughter looked at [him]4331-he with a softening expression , uncertain whether [she]4332-schoeneus ’s daughter wanted to win or lose , and said to [herself]4332-schoeneus ’s daughter : ‘ What god , envious of [handsome youths]7882-handsome youths , wants to destroy [this one]7883-this one and send [him]7883-this one in search of marriage , at the risk of [his]7883-this one own dear life ? [I]4332-schoeneus ’s daughter am not worth that much , [I]4332-schoeneus ’s daughter think . [He]7883-this one does not move [me]4332-schoeneus ’s daughter [himself]7883-this one : it is [his]7883-this one youth . What if [he]7883-this one does have courage , and a spirit unafraid of dying ? What if [he]7883-this one is fourth in line from [the ruler of [the seas]2725-the seas]7885-the ruler of the seas ? While [you]7887-you can , [stranger]7888-stranger , leave this blood - soaked marrying . Wedding [me]4332-schoeneus ’s daughter is a cruel thing . [No one]1640-no one will refuse to have [you]7887-you , and [you]7887-you may be chosen by [a wiser girl]7890-a wiser girl . – Yet why this concern when so many have already died before [you]7887-you ? Let [him]7883-this one look out for [himself]7883-this one ! Let [him]7883-this one perish , since [he]7883-this one has not been warned off by the death of [so many suitors]7891-so many suitors , and shows [himself]7883-this one tired of life . – Should [he]7883-this one die , then , because [he]7883-this one wants to live with [me]4332-schoeneus ’s daughter , and suffer an unjust death as the penalty for loving ? [My]4332-schoeneus ’s daughter victory would not avoid incurring hatred . But it is not [my]4332-schoeneus ’s daughter fault ! [I]4332-schoeneus ’s daughter wish [you]7887-you would desist , or if [you]7887-you are set on it , [I]4332-schoeneus ’s daughter wish [you]7887-you might be [the faster]7892-the faster ! How the virginal expression of [a boy]2019-a boy clings to [his]2019-a boy face ! O ! [Poor Hippomenes]1145-hippomenes , [I]4332-schoeneus ’s daughter wish [you]7887-you had never seen [me]4332-schoeneus ’s daughter ! [You]7887-you were so fitted to live . There is [a field]4337-a field , [the people there]4338-the people there call [it]4337-a field [the field of]4339-the field of [Tamasus]324-tamasus , the richest earth in [the island of [Cyprus]315-cyprus]4340-the island of cyprus , which [the men of old]4341-the men of old made sacred to [me]0-i , and ordered it to be added to [[my]0-i temples]4342-my temples , as a gift . A tree gleams in the middle of [the field]2239-the field , with rustling golden leaves , and golden branches . Come from there , by chance , [I]0-i was carrying three golden apples , [I]0-i had picked , in [my]0-i hands , and [I]0-i approached [Hippomenes]1145-hippomenes , showing [myself]0-i only to [him]1145-hippomenes , and told [him]1145-hippomenes how to use them . [The trumpets]4344-the trumpets gave the signal , and , leaning forward , they flashed from the starting line , and skimmed the surface of [the sand]4345-the sand , with flying feet . [You]4346-you would think [them]4347-them capable of running along the waves without wetting them , and passing over the ripened heads of the standing corn . [The young man]6665-the young man ’s spirit was cheered by shouts and words of encouragement : ‘ Run , [Hippomenes]1145-hippomenes ! Now , now is the time to sprint ! Use [your]6665-the young man full power , now ! Do n’t wait : [you]6665-the young man ’ll win ! ’[6665-the young man] Who knows whether [[Megareus]1146-megareus of onchestus ’s heroic son]4349-megareus ’s heroic son , or [[Schoeneus]1147-schoeneus ’s daughter]4332-schoeneus ’s daughter , was more pleased with these words ? O how often , when [she]4332-schoeneus ’s daughter could have overtaken [him]6665-the young man , [she]4332-schoeneus ’s daughter lingered , and watching [his]6665-the young man face for a while , left [him]6665-the young man behind against [her]4332-schoeneus ’s daughter will ! Panting breath came from [his]6665-the young man weary throat , and the winning post was far off . Only then did [[Neptune]514-neptune ’s scion]4351-neptune ’s scion throw away one of the fruits from the tree . [The girl]1792-the girl was astonished , and , eager for the shining apple , [she]1792-the girl ran off the course , and picked up the spinning gold . [Hippomenes]1145-hippomenes passed [her]1792-the girl : the stands resounded with the applause . [She]1792-the girl made up for the delay and the lost time by a burst of speed , and left [the youth]1842-the youth behind once more . Again [she]1792-the girl delayed when a second apple was thrown , followed , and passed [the man]5875-the man . The last section of track was left . ‘ Now , ’[5875-the man] [he]5875-the man said , ‘ be near [me]5875-the man , goddess who made [me]5875-the man this gift ! ’[5875-the man] [He]5875-the man threw the shining gold vigorously , sideways , into the deep field , from where [she]1792-the girl would take longer to get back . [The girl]1792-the girl seemed to hesitate as to whether [she]1792-the girl should chase it : [I]0-i made [her]1792-the girl pick it up , and added weight to the fruit [she]1792-the girl held , and obstructed [her]1792-the girl equally with the heaviness of the burden and the delay . And lest [my]0-i story be longer than the race itself , [the virgin]1704-the virgin was overtaken : [the winner]7823-the winner led away [his]7823-the winner prize . ” ’ ‘[1143-adonis] “ [Adonis]1143-adonis , did [I]0-i deserve to be thanked , to have incense brought [me]0-i ? Unthinking , [he]5875-the man neither gave thanks , nor offered incense to [me]0-i . [I]0-i was provoked to sudden anger , and pained by [his]5875-the man contempt , so as not to be slighted in future , [I]0-i decreed an example would be made of them , and [I]0-i roused [myself]0-i against [them]4358-their both . [They]4358-their were passing [a temple , hidden in [the deep woods]5928-the deep woods , of [Cybele mother of [the gods]1538-the gods]4361-cybele mother of the gods]4359-a temple , hidden in the deep woods , of cybele mother of the gods , [that noble Echion had built in former times fulfilling a vow , and the length of [their]4358-their journey]4363-that noble echion had built in former times fulfilling a vow , and the length of their journey persuaded [them]4358-their to rest . There , stirred by [my]0-i divine power , an untimely desire to make love seized [Hippomenes]1145-hippomenes . Near [the temple]1675-the temple was [a poorly lit hollow , like [a cave]4366-a cave , roofed with the natural pumice - stone , sacred to the old religion , where [the priests]2126-the priests had gathered together wooden figures of [the ancient gods]4368-the ancient gods]4365-a poorly lit hollow , like a cave , roofed with the natural pumice - stone , sacred to the old religion , where the priests had gathered together wooden figures of the ancient gods . [They]4358-their entered [it]1675-the temple , and desecrated [the sanctuary]1671-the sanctuary , with forbidden intercourse . The sacred images averted [their]4358-their gaze , and [the Great Mother , with the turreted crown]4370-the great mother , with the turreted crown , hesitated as to whether to plunge [the guilty pair]4371-the guilty pair beneath [the waters of [the Styx]194-the styx]4372-the waters of the styx : but the punishment seemed too light . So tawny manes spread over [their]4358-their necks , that , a moment ago , were smooth ; [their]4358-their fingers curved into claws ; forelegs were formed from arms ; all their weight was in [their]4358-their breast ; and [their]4358-their tails swept the surface of the sand . [They]4358-their had a fierce expression , roared instead of speaking , and frequented [the woods]1690-the woods for a marriage - bed . As lions , fearful to [others]5836-others , [they]4358-their tamely bite on [Cybele]1126-cybele ’s bit . [You]4375-his must avoid , [them]4358-their , [my]0-i love , and with [them]4358-their all the species of wild creature , that do not turn and run , but offer [their]4358-their breasts to the fight , lest [your]4375-his courage be the ruin of [us]4376-us both ! ” ’ ‘[1126-cybele] [She]1126-cybele warned [him]4375-his , and made [her]1126-cybele way through the air , drawn by harnessed swans , but [his]4375-his courage defied the warning . By chance , [his]4375-his dogs , following [a well - marked trail]4377-a well - marked trail , roused a wild boar from its lair , and as it prepared to rush from the trees , [[Cinyras]879-cinyras ’s grandson]4378-cinyras ’s grandson caught it a glancing blow . Immediately the fierce boar dislodged the blood - stained spear , with its crooked snout , and chased [the youth , who was scared and running hard]4379-the youth , who was scared and running hard . It sank its tusk into [his]4375-his groin , and flung [him]4375-his , dying , on [the yellow sand]4380-the yellow sand . [Cytherea]737-cytherea , carried in [her]737-cytherea light chariot through the midst of [the heavens]1940-the heavens , by [her]737-cytherea swans ’ swiftness , had not yet reached [Cyprus]315-cyprus : [she]737-cytherea heard from afar the groans of [the dying boy]7894-the dying boy , and turned the white birds towards [him]7894-the dying boy . When , from [the heights]3863-the heights , [she]737-cytherea saw the lifeless body , lying in its own blood , [she]737-cytherea leapt down , tearing [her]737-cytherea clothes , and tearing at [her]737-cytherea hair , as well , and beat at [her]737-cytherea breasts with fierce hands , complaining to the fates . “ And yet not everything is in [your]7894-the dying boy power ” [she]737-cytherea said . “ [Adonis]1143-adonis , there shall be an everlasting token of [my]737-cytherea grief , and every year an imitation of [your]7894-the dying boy death will complete a re - enactment of [my]737-cytherea mourning . But [your]7894-the dying boy blood will be changed into a flower . [Persephone]862-persephone , [you]7894-the dying boy were allowed to alter [a woman]1994-a woman ’s body , [Menthe]1148-menthe ’s , to fragrant mint : shall the transformation of [[my]737-cytherea hero]7897-my hero , of the blood of [Cinyras]879-cinyras , be grudged to [me]737-cytherea ? ” So saying , [she]737-cytherea sprinkled the blood with odorous nectar : and , at the touch , it swelled up , as bubbles emerge in yellow mud . In less than an hour , a flower , of the colour of blood , was created such as pomegranates carry , that hide their seeds under a tough rind . But enjoyment of it is brief ; for , lightly clinging , and too easily fallen , the winds deflower it , which are likewise responsible for its name , windflower : anemone . While [the poet of [Thrace]111-thrace]7898-the poet of thrace , with songs like these , drew to [himself]7898-the poet of thrace the trees , the souls of wild beasts , and the stones that followed [him]7898-the poet of thrace , see , how [the frenzied Ciconian women]7899-the frenzied ciconian women , [their]7899-the frenzied ciconian women breasts covered with animal skins , spy [Orpheus]1119-orpheus from [a hilltop]1608-a hilltop , as [he]1119-orpheus matches songs to the sounding strings . One of [them]7899-the frenzied ciconian women , [her]737-cytherea hair scattered to the light breeze , called : ‘[737-cytherea] Behold , behold , this is the one who scorns [us]4382-us ! ’ and hurled [her]737-cytherea spear at the face of [[Apollo]519-phoebus ’s poet]7901-apollo ’s poet , as [he]1119-orpheus was singing . Tipped with leaves , it marked [him]1119-orpheus , without wounding . The next missile was a stone , that , thrown through the air , was itself overpowered by the harmony of voice and lyre , and fell at [his]1119-orpheus feet , as though it were begging forgiveness for its mad audacity . But in fact the mindless attack mounted , without restraint , and mad fury ruled . All [their]7899-the frenzied ciconian women missiles would have been frustrated by [his]1119-orpheus song , but the huge clamour of the Berecyntian flutes of broken horn , the drums , and the breast - beating and howls of [the Bacchantes]711-the bacchantes , drowned the sound of the lyre . Then , finally , the stones grew red , with the blood of [the poet]7812-the poet , to whom [they]7899-the frenzied ciconian women were deaf . First , the innumerable birds , the snakes , and the procession of wild animals , still entranced by the voice of [the singer]7903-the singer , a mark of [Orpheus]1119-orpheus ’s triumph , were torn apart by [the Maenads]1149-the maenads . Then [they]7899-the frenzied ciconian women set [their]7899-the frenzied ciconian women bloody hands on [Orpheus]1119-orpheus , and gathered , like birds that spy the owl , [the bird of night , wandering in the daylight]7904-the bird of night , wandering in the daylight , or as in [the amphitheatre]7905-the amphitheatre , on the morning of the staged events , on either side , a doomed stag , in the arena , is prey to the hounds . [They]7899-the frenzied ciconian women rushed at [the poet]7812-the poet , and hurled [their]7899-the frenzied ciconian women green - leaved thyrsi , made for a different use . Some threw clods of earth , some branches torn from the trees , and others flints . And so that [their]7899-the frenzied ciconian women madness did not lack true weapons , by chance , [oxen]7180-oxen were turning the soil under the ploughshare , and , not far away from [them]7899-the frenzied ciconian women , [brawny farm workers]7908-brawny farm workers were digging the solid earth , sweating hard to prepare it for use , who fled when [they]7908-brawny farm workers saw [the throng]7909-the throng , leaving [their]7908-brawny farm workers work tools behind . Hoes , heavy mattocks , and long rakes lay scattered through [the empty fields]3394-the empty fields . After catching these up , and ripping apart the oxen , that threatened [them]7899-the frenzied ciconian women with [their]7899-the frenzied ciconian women horns , [the fierce women]7911-the fierce women rushed back to kill [the poet]7812-the poet . As [he]7812-the poet stretched out [his]7812-the poet hands , speaking ineffectually for the first time ever , not affecting [them]7899-the frenzied ciconian women in any way with [his]7812-the poet voice , [the impious ones]7913-the impious ones murdered [him]7812-the poet : and the spirit , breathed out through that mouth to which stones listened , and which was understood by the senses of wild creatures – O , [God]1150-god ! – vanished down the wind . The birds , lamenting , cried for [you]7914-you , [Orpheus]1119-orpheus ; [the crowd of wild creatures]7915-the crowd of wild creatures ; the hard flints ; the trees that often gathered to [your]7914-you song , shedding [their]7916-their leaves , mourned [you]7914-you with bared crowns . [They]7899-the frenzied ciconian women say [the rivers]1902-the rivers , also , were swollen with [their]1902-the rivers own tears , and [the naiads and dryads , with dishevelled hair]7918-the naiads and dryads , with dishevelled hair , put on sombre clothes . [The poet]7812-the poet ’s limbs were strewn in different places : the head and the lyre [you]7914-you , [Hebrus]72-hebrus , received , and ( a miracle ! ) floating in midstream , the lyre lamented mournfully ; mournfully the lifeless tongue murmured ; mournfully [the banks]7920-the banks echoed in reply . And now , carried onward to [the sea]1464-the sea , [they]7922-they left [[their]7922-they native [river - mouth]7924-river - mouth]7923-their native river - mouth and reached [the shores of [Lesbos]326-lesbos]7925-the shores of lesbos , at [Methymna]327-methymna . Here , as the head lay exposed on the alien sand , its moist hair dripping brine , a fierce snake attacked [it]7812-the poet . But at last [Phoebus]519-phoebus came , and prevented it , as it was about to bite , and turned the serpent ’s gaping jaws to stone , and froze the mouth , wide open , as it was . The ghost of [Orpheus]1119-orpheus sank under [the earth]1463-the earth , and recognised all those places [it]7927-it had seen before ; and , searching [the fields of [the Blessed]7929-the blessed]7928-the fields of the blessed , [he]519-phoebus found [[his]519-phoebus wife]1633-his wife again and held [her]1633-his wife eagerly in [his]519-phoebus arms . There [they]7931-they walk together side by side ; now [she]1633-his wife goes in front , and [he]519-phoebus follows [her]1633-his wife ; now [he]519-phoebus leads , and looks back as [he]519-phoebus can do , in safety now , at [[his]519-phoebus Eurydice]7932-his eurydice . ’[717-lyaeus] However , [the god]1482-the god , [Lyaeus]717-lyaeus , did not allow such wickedness by [[his]717-lyaeus followers]4384-his followers to go unpunished . Grieved by the loss of [the poet]7812-the poet of [his]717-lyaeus sacred rites , [he]717-lyaeus immediately fastened down , with twisted roots , [all the Thracian women who had seen the sin , since the path , that [each one]2489-each one was on at that moment]4386-all the thracian women who had seen the sin , since the path , that each one was on at that moment , gripped [their]4386-all the thracian women who had seen the sin , since the path , that each one was on at that moment toes and forced the tips into the solid ground . As a bird , when it is caught in a snare , set by a cunning wild - fowler , and feels itself held , tightens the knot by its movement , beating and flapping ; so each of [the women , planted , stuck fast , terrified]4388-the women , planted , stuck fast , terrified , tried uselessly to run . But the pliant roots held [her]7812-the poet , and checked [her]7812-the poet , struggling . When [she]7812-the poet looked for where [her]7812-the poet toenails , toes and feet were , [she]7812-the poet saw the wood spreading over the curve of [her]7812-the poet leg , and , trying to strike [her]7812-the poet thighs with grieving hands , [she]7812-the poet beat on oak : [her]7812-the poet breasts turned to oak : [her]7812-the poet shoulders were oak . [You]4389-you would have thought the jointed arms were real branches , and [your]4389-you thought would not have been wrong . This did not satisfy [Bacchus]682-bacchus . [He]717-lyaeus left [the fields]1522-the fields [themselves]1522-the fields , and with [a worthier band of [followers]2015-followers]4391-a worthier band of followers sought out the vineyards of [[his]717-lyaeus own [Mount Tmolus]1156-mount tmolus]4393-his own mount tmolus , and [the River Pactolus]167-the river pactolus , though at that time [it]4394-it was not [a golden stream]4395-a golden stream , nor envied for [[its]4394-it valuable sands]4396-its valuable sands . [[His]717-lyaeus familiar cohorts]4397-his familiar cohorts , [the satyrs]5946-the satyrs and [bacchantes]4399-bacchantes accompanied [him]717-lyaeus , but [Silenus]726-silenus was absent . [The Phrygian countrymen]4400-the phrygian countrymen had taken [him]717-lyaeus captive , stumbling with age and wine , bound [him]717-lyaeus with garlands , and led [him]717-lyaeus to [King Midas]1152-midas , to whom , with [Athenian Eumolpus]1153-athenian eumolpus , [Orpheus of [Thrace]111-thrace]4401-orpheus of thrace had taught the Bacchic rites . When [the king]6572-the king recognised [him]717-lyaeus as [a friend]5954-a friend and companion of [[his]6572-the king worship]4404-his worship , [he]6572-the king joyfully led a celebration of [the guest]6568-the guest ’s arrival , lasting ten days and nights on end . And now , on the eleventh day , [Lucifer]623-lucifer had seen off the train of distant stars , and [the king with gladness]4406-the king with gladness came to [the fields of [Lydia]165-lydia]4407-the fields of lydia , and restored [Silenus]726-silenus to [[his]6572-the king young foster - child]4408-his young foster - child . Then [the god]1482-the god , happy at [[his]717-lyaeus foster - father]4410-his foster - father ’s return , gave [Midas]1152-midas control over the choice of a gift , which was pleasing , but futile , since [he]1152-midas was doomed to make poor use of [his]1152-midas reward . ‘ Make it so that whatever [I]1152-midas touch with [my]1152-midas body , turns to yellow gold , ’[1152-midas] [he]1152-midas said . [Bacchus]682-bacchus accepted [his]1152-midas choice , and gave [him]1152-midas the harmful gift , sad that [he]1152-midas had not asked for anything better . [The Berecyntian king]4411-the berecyntian king departed happily , rejoicing in [his]4411-the berecyntian king bane , and testing [his]4411-the berecyntian king faith in its powers by touching things , and scarcely believing it when [he]4411-the berecyntian king broke off a green twig from the low foliage of the holm - oak : the twig was turned to gold . [He]4411-the berecyntian king picked up a stone from the ground : the stone also was pale gold . [He]4411-the berecyntian king touched a clod of earth , and by the power of touch , the clod became a nugget . [He]4411-the berecyntian king gathered the dry husks of corn : it was a golden harvest . [He]4411-the berecyntian king held an apple [he]4411-the berecyntian king had picked from a tree : [you]4412-you would think [the Hesperides]288-the hesperides had given it to [him]4411-the berecyntian king . If [he]4411-the berecyntian king placed [his]4411-the berecyntian king fingers on the tall door - pillars , the pillars were seen to shine . When [he]4411-the berecyntian king washed [his]4411-the berecyntian king hands in clear water , the water flowing over [his]4411-the berecyntian king hands would have deceived [Danaë]777-aegina . [His]4411-the berecyntian king own mind could scarcely contain [his]4411-the berecyntian king expectations , dreaming of all things golden . As [he]4411-the berecyntian king was exulting , [[his]4411-the berecyntian king servants]7556-his servants set a table before [him]4411-the berecyntian king , heaped with cooked food , and loaves were not lacking . Then , indeed , if [he]4411-the berecyntian king touched the gift of [Ceres]689-ceres with [his]4411-the berecyntian king hand , [her]689-ceres gift hardened . If [he]4411-the berecyntian king tried , with eager bites , to tear the food , the food was covered with a yellow surface where [his]4411-the berecyntian king teeth touched . [He]4411-the berecyntian king mixed pure water with wine , the other gift of [[his]4411-the berecyntian king benefactor]4414-his benefactor , but molten gold could be seen trickling through [his]4411-the berecyntian king lips . Dismayed by this strange misfortune , rich and unhappy , [he]4411-the berecyntian king tries to flee [his]4411-the berecyntian king riches , and hates what [he]4411-the berecyntian king wished for a moment ago . No abundance can relieve [his]4411-the berecyntian king famine : [his]4411-the berecyntian king throat is parched with burning thirst , and , justly , [he]4411-the berecyntian king is tortured by the hateful gold . Lifting [his]4411-the berecyntian king shining hands and arms to heaven , [he]4411-the berecyntian king cries out : ‘ [Father]1155-father , [Bacchus]682-bacchus , forgive [me]4411-the berecyntian king ! [I]4411-the berecyntian king have sinned . But have pity on [me]4411-the berecyntian king , [I]4411-the berecyntian king beg [you]1155-father , and save [me]4411-the berecyntian king from this costly evil ! ’[4411-the berecyntian king] The will of [the gods]1538-the gods is kindly . [Bacchus]682-bacchus , when [he]4411-the berecyntian king confessed [his]4411-the berecyntian king fault , restored [him]4411-the berecyntian king , and took back what [he]4411-the berecyntian king had given in fulfilment of [his]4411-the berecyntian king promise . ‘ So [you]1155-father do not remain coated with the gold [you]1155-father wished for so foolishly , ’[4411-the berecyntian king] [he]4411-the berecyntian king said , ‘ go to [the river]1711-the river by [great Sardis]328-great sardis , make [your]1155-father way up [the bright ridge]7934-the bright ridge against the falling waters , till [you]1155-father come to [the source of [the stream]1788-the stream]7935-the source of the stream , and plunge [your]1155-father head and body at the same moment into the foaming fountain , where it gushes out , and at the same time wash away [your]1155-father sin . ’[4411-the berecyntian king] [The king]6572-the king went to [the river]1711-the river as [he]6572-the king was ordered : the golden virtue coloured the waters , and passed from [his]6572-the king human body into [the stream]1788-the stream . Even now , gathering the grains of gold from the ancient vein , [the fields]1522-the fields harden , [their]1522-the fields soil soaked by the pale yellow waters . Hating wealth , [Midas]1152-midas lived among [woods and fields]4420-woods and fields , and [the mountain caves [Pan]549-pan]4421-the mountain caves pan always inhabits . But [he]549-pan remained dull - witted , and , as before , [his]549-pan foolish mind was destined once again to hurt [its owner]6640-its owner . [Mount Tmolus]1156-mount tmolus , stands steep and high , commanding a wide view of [the distant sea]4423-the distant sea , [its]1156-mount tmolus sloping sides extending to [Sardis]328-great sardis on the one side , and as far as [tiny Hypaepae]330-tiny hypaepae on the other . While [Pan]549-pan was there , playing light airs on [his]549-pan reeds glued together with wax , [he]549-pan boasted of [his]549-pan pipings , to [the gentle nymphs]4424-the gentle nymphs , and dared to speak slightingly of [Apollo]519-phoebus ’s song compared with [his]549-pan own , and entered an unequal contest with [Tmolus]1156-mount tmolus , [the god of [the mountain]1771-the mountain]4425-the god of the mountain , as [judge]4427-judge .

[The aged judge]4428-the aged judge was seated on [his]4428-the aged judge mountain - top and shook [his]4428-the aged judge ears free of the trees . Only an oak - wreath circled [his]4428-the aged judge dark hair , and acorns brushed against [his]4428-the aged judge hollow temples . Looking at [the god of the flocks]4429-the god of the flocks [he]549-pan said : ‘ There is nothing to prevent [my]549-pan judging . ’[549-pan] [Pan]549-pan sounded the rustic reeds , and entranced [Midas]1152-midas ( who chanced to be near the playing ) with wild pipings . Following this , [sacred Tmolus]1156-mount tmolus turned [his]1156-mount tmolus face towards that of [Phoebus]519-phoebus : [[his]1156-mount tmolus forests]4430-his forests followed . [Phoebus]519-phoebus ’s golden hair was wreathed with laurel from Parnassus , and [his]519-phoebus robes dyed with Tyrian purple , swept [the earth]1463-the earth . [He]4428-the aged judge held [his]4428-the aged judge lyre , inlaid with gems and Indian ivory , in [his]4428-the aged judge left hand , and the plectrum in the other . [His]4428-the aged judge attitude was that of [a true artist]4432-a true artist . Then with skilled fingers , [he]4428-the aged judge plucked the strings , and [Tmolus]1156-mount tmolus , captivated by their sweetness , ordered [Pan]549-pan to lower [his]549-pan pipes in submission to the lyre . The judgement of [the sacred mountain - god]4433-the sacred mountain - god satisfied all opinions , and yet [Midas]1152-midas ’s voice alone challenged it and called it unjust . [The god of [Delos]897-delos]4434-the god of delos did not allow such undiscriminating ears to keep their human form , but drew them out and covered them with shaggy grey hair , and made them flexible at the base , and gave [them]4435-them powers of movement . Though [the rest]4436-the rest was human , [he]4428-the aged judge was punished in that sole aspect : [he]4428-the aged judge wore the ears of a slow - moving ass . [He]4428-the aged judge was anxious to conceal them , and tried to detract from the shameful ugliness of [his]4428-the aged judge head with a purple turban . But [the servant who used to trim [his]4428-the aged judge long hair with a blade , found it out , who , since [he]4428-the aged judge dare not reveal the disgrace [he]4428-the aged judge had seen , but eager to broadcast it to the four winds , and unable to keep it to [himself]4428-the aged judge]4437-the servant who used to trim his long hair with a blade , found it out , who , since he dare not reveal the disgrace he had seen , but eager to broadcast it to the four winds , and unable to keep it to himself , went off quietly and dug [a hole in the soil]4438-a hole in the soil . In a tiny voice , [he]4428-the aged judge whispered to [the hollow earth]4439-the hollow earth , and buried [his]4428-the aged judge spoken evidence under the infill , and stole away having closed up [the hidden trench]4440-the hidden trench . But a thick bed of quivering reeds began to shoot up there , and as soon as they had grown , at the end of the year , [they]4441-they gave the burrower away : stirred gently , then , by the wind [they]4441-they repeated the buried words , and testified against [[his]4428-the aged judge master]2048-his master . Having punished [him]4428-the aged judge , [[Latona]895-latona ’s son]3070-latona ’s son left [Mount Tmolus]1156-mount tmolus and , flying through the clear air , [he]3070-latona ’s son came to [earth]1449-earth in [the country of [Laomedon]878-laomedon]4445-the country of laomedon , this side of [the narrows of [the Hellespont]331-the hellespont]4446-the narrows of the hellespont , named from [Helle]1157-helle , [daughter of [Nephele]640-nephele]4447-daughter of nephele . To the right of [the deeps of [Sigeum]332-sigeum]4448-the deeps of sigeum , and to the left of [those of [Rhoeteum]333-rhoeteum]4449-those of rhoeteum , there was an ancient altar of [Jupiter the Thunderer]1158-jupiter , ‘ source of all oracles ’[1158-jupiter] . There , [Apollo]519-phoebus saw [Laomedon]878-laomedon building [the foundations of [the new city of]4451-the new city of [Troy]271-troy]4450-the foundations of the new city of troy . The great undertaking prospering with difficulty , and demanding no little resources , [he]519-phoebus , and [Neptune]514-neptune , [trident - bearing father of [the swelling sea]4453-the swelling sea]4452-trident - bearing father of the swelling sea , put on mortal form , and built the walls of [the city]2547-the city for [the Phrygian king]4455-the phrygian king for an agreed amount in gold . [The edifice]4456-the edifice stood [there]1878-there . But [the king]6572-the king denied [them]4459-them payment , and as a crowning treachery , perjured [himself]6572-the king by claiming [they]4459-them were lying . [The ruler of [the ocean]1657-the ocean]4460-the ruler of the ocean said : ‘ [You]7937-you will not go unpunished ’[6572-the king] , and [he]6572-the king turned all [his]6572-the king waters against [the shores of tight - fisted [Troy]271-troy]4462-the shores of tight - fisted troy . [He]6572-the king flooded [the land]1465-the land to form [a strait]4464-a strait , swept away [the farmers]1591-the farmers ’ crops , and buried the fields beneath the waves . Even this was insufficient punishment : [He]6572-the king demanded also that [Hesione]1159-hesione , [[the king]6572-the king ’s daughter]7939-the king ’s daughter , be given to a sea - monster , whom [Hercules]941-hercules freed , as [she]1159-hesione was chained to the solid rock . [Hercules]941-hercules demanded the payment promised , an agreed number of horses . But the reward for all [his]6572-the king work being refused , [he]6572-the king seized [the twice - perjured walls of [conquered Troy]271-troy]7940-the twice - perjured walls of conquered troy . [Telamon]973-telamon , [[his]6572-the king companion]3554-his companion , did not go without honour , and [Hesione]1159-hesione was given to [him]6572-the king in marriage . [Peleus]974-peleus , [[Telamon]973-telamon ’s brother]7942-telamon ’s brother , was already distinguished by having [a goddess]6068-a goddess as [[his]974-peleus wife]1633-his wife , and was not more proud of being [[Jupiter]1158-jupiter ’s grandson]7945-jupiter ’s grandson ( [[his]7945-jupiter ’s grandson father]1775-his father [Aeacus]972-aeacus being [the son of [Jove]605-jove by [Aegina]777-aegina]7947-the son of jove by aegina ) as [[his]974-peleus son - in - law]6581-his son - in - law ( by marrying [Thetis]1160-thetis ) , since [he]974-peleus was not [the only brother to be [[Jove]605-jove ’s grandson]7950-jove ’s grandson]7949-the only brother to be jove ’s grandson , but [he]974-peleus was [the only one to marry [a goddess]6068-a goddess]7951-the only one to marry a goddess . For [aged Proteus]1055-proteus had said to [Thetis]1160-thetis : ‘[6572-the king] [Goddess of [the waves]4467-the waves]4466-goddess of the waves , conceive : [you]4466-goddess of the waves will be [the mother of a warrior who will surpass [[his]4468-his father]1775-his father ’s deeds when [he]4468-his reaches manhood , and will be more famous than [him]4468-his . ’ So [Jupiter]1158-jupiter , lest [earth]1449-earth produce [someone greater than [himself]1158-jupiter]7955-someone greater than himself]7953-the mother of a warrior who will surpass his father ’s deeds when he reaches manhood , and will be more famous than him . ’ so jupiter , lest earth produce someone greater than himself , fled from union with [ocean - dwelling Thetis]7956-ocean - dwelling thetis , though [he]1158-jupiter had felt the hot fire of passion in [his]1158-jupiter heart , and ordered [[his]1158-jupiter grandson]6475-his grandson , [Peleus]974-peleus , [son of Aeacus]3520-son of aeacus , to fulfil [his]1158-jupiter promise , on [his]1158-jupiter behalf , and enter the arms of [the sea - maiden]7959-the sea - maiden . There is a bay , shaped like a scythe , in [Haemonia]25-haemonia , [its]7960-its arms projecting in a curved arc , which would provide [a harbour]7961-a harbour , if the waves were deeper : [the waters]1626-the waters cover the surface of [the sand]4345-the sand : [the shore]2065-the shore is solid earth , that takes no footprints , does not hinder a passage , and has no seaweed covering [it]2065-the shore . A myrtle grove grows nearby , dense with its red and black berries . There is [a cave in the centre]7965-a cave in the centre , whether fashioned by art or nature is uncertain , but probably by art . Often , [Thetis]1160-thetis [you]1160-thetis used to come [there]1878-there , naked , seated on [a bridled dolphin]7967-a bridled dolphin . There [Peleus]974-peleus found [you]1160-thetis , as [you]1160-thetis lay , overcome by sleep , and when , though influenced by [his]974-peleus entreaties , [you]1160-thetis refused [him]974-peleus , [he]974-peleus prepared to use force , winding both arms round [your]1160-thetis neck . [He]974-peleus would have taken [you]1160-thetis then , if [you]1160-thetis had not , by [your]1160-thetis well - known arts , frequently changed [your]1160-thetis form . But when [you]1160-thetis became a bird , [he]974-peleus still held [you]1160-thetis as a bird ; now as a tree , [Peleus]974-peleus clung fast to the tree . [Your]1160-thetis third guise was a striped tigress : in fear of that [the son of [Aeacus]972-aeacus]7968-the son of aeacus loosed [his]7968-the son of aeacus arms from [your]1160-thetis body . Then [he]7968-the son of aeacus entreated [the gods of [the sea]1464-the sea]2037-the gods of the sea , with wine poured over [the waters]1626-the waters , with sheep ’s entrails , and the smoke of incense , until [Proteus]1055-proteus , [the Carpathian seer]7972-the carpathian seer spoke from [his]7972-the carpathian seer deep gulfs : ‘[3520-son of aeacus] [Son of [Aeacus]972-aeacus]3520-son of aeacus , [you]3520-son of aeacus will have [the bride [you]3520-son of aeacus desire]4471-the bride you desire , if [you]3520-son of aeacus bind [her]4471-the bride you desire , unawares , with nooses and tight cords , while [she]4471-the bride you desire is lulled asleep in [the rocky cave]4472-the rocky cave . Though [she]4471-the bride you desire deceives [you]3520-son of aeacus with a hundred counterfeit shapes , hold [her]4471-the bride you desire to [you]3520-son of aeacus , whatever [she]4471-the bride you desire becomes , until [she]4471-the bride you desire is again what [she]4471-the bride you desire was before . ’ So [he]7972-the carpathian seer spoke , and hid [his]7972-the carpathian seer face below the waves , letting the waters flow in upon [his]7972-the carpathian seer final words . Now [Titan]1098-pallas was low in the sky , and , [his]1098-pallas chariot pointed downwards , was close to [the western ocean]7098-the western ocean , when the lovely [Nereid]979-nereid left the waves , and came to [her]979-nereid accustomed bed . [Peleus]974-peleus had scarcely taken a good grip of [her]979-nereid virgin body , when [she]979-nereid took on new forms , until [she]979-nereid realised [her]979-nereid limbs were tightly bound , and [her]979-nereid arms spread wide apart . Then at length [she]979-nereid sighed , saying : ‘[4471-the bride you desire] Not without [some god]6967-some god ’s help have [you]3520-son of aeacus won , ’ and [she]979-nereid showed [herself]979-nereid as [Thetis]1160-thetis . When [she]979-nereid acknowledged [herself]979-nereid , [the hero]2234-the hero embraced [her]979-nereid , achieved [his]2234-the hero wish , and conceived with [her]979-nereid the mighty [Achilles]1161-achilles . [Peleus]974-peleus was happy in [[his]974-peleus wife]1633-his wife and [son]6133-son , and was [a man for whom all things were successful]7977-a man for whom all things were successful , if [you]7978-you exclude the crime of killing [[his]974-peleus brother]1593-his brother [Phocus]975-phocus . Guilty of shedding [[his]974-peleus brother]1593-his brother ’s blood , exiled from [[[his]974-peleus father]1775-his father ’s country]7982-his father ’s country , [the soil of [Trachin]336-trachin]7983-the soil of trachin gave [him]974-peleus sanctuary . Here [Ceyx]1162-ceyx , [son of [Lucifer]623-lucifer]7984-son of lucifer , [the morning star]7985-the morning star , ruled , without force or shedding blood , [his]1162-ceyx face filled with [[his]1162-ceyx father]1775-his father ’s radiance . At that time [he]1162-ceyx was sad and unlike [his]1162-ceyx normal self , mourning the loss of [[his]1162-ceyx brother]1593-his brother , [Daedalion]1163-daedalion . [The son of [Aeacus]972-aeacus]7968-the son of aeacus came to [him]1162-ceyx , weary with cares and travel , and entered [the city]2547-the city with [a few companions]7990-a few companions . [He]7968-the son of aeacus left the flocks of sheep and cattle [he]7968-the son of aeacus had brought with [him]7968-the son of aeacus in [a shady valley]7991-a shady valley not far from the city walls . When [he]7968-the son of aeacus was first allowed to meet [the king]6572-the king , [he]7968-the son of aeacus held out the draped olive branch of the suppliant , and told [him]6572-the king whose son [he]7968-the son of aeacus was , concealed [his]7968-the son of aeacus crime , and lied about the cause of [his]7968-the son of aeacus flight . [He]7968-the son of aeacus begged to be allowed to support [himself]7968-the son of aeacus in [the city]2547-the city or [the fields]1522-the fields . [The king of [Trachin]336-trachin]7995-the king of trachin replied with these kind words : ‘[974-peleus] [Peleus]974-peleus , the opportunities in [[our]4474-our kingdom]4475-our kingdom are open even to the lower ranks , and [I]0-i do not rule [an inhospitable realm]4476-an inhospitable realm . Add to this willingness , the powerful influence of a noble name , and [your]974-peleus being [the grandson of [Jove]605-jove]4477-the grandson of jove . So waste no time in supplication ! [You]974-peleus will receive all that [you]974-peleus wish . Take a share of everything [you]974-peleus see , and call it [yours]974-peleus ! [I]0-i wish what [you]974-peleus see was better than it is ! ’ And [he]0-i wept . [Peleus]974-peleus and [[his]974-peleus companions]2277-his companions asked what the cause was of so much grief , to which [he]0-i replied : ‘[0-i] Perhaps [you]974-peleus think that bird , the hawk , that lives on prey , and terrifies other winged creatures , always had feathers . [He]0-i was once [a man]5897-a man ( and – inner nature is so consistent – even then [he]0-i was fierce , warlike and equipped for violence ): [his]0-i name , [Daedalion]1163-daedalion . [We]4479-we were [the sons of [Lucifer]623-lucifer , who summons the dawn , and is last to leave the sky]4480-the sons of lucifer , who summons the dawn , and is last to leave the sky . [I]0-i care for peace ; [I]0-i care for preserving peace ; and for [[my]0-i wife]6055-my wife . Savage warfare pleased [[my]0-i brother]6993-my brother . [His]6993-my brother power subdued [kings]1975-kings and [nations]4484-nations , that now , transformed , flutters the doves of [Boeotia]62-boeotia . [He]6993-my brother had [a daughter]4485-a daughter , [Chione]1165-chione , endowed with great beauty , who at fourteen , and ready for marriage , had [a thousand suitors]4486-a thousand suitors . It chanced that [Phoebus]519-phoebus - [Apollo]519-phoebus , and [Mercury]550-cyllenian mercury , [son of [Maia]621-maia]6094-son of maia , one returning from [[his]6993-my brother sacred Delphi]4488-his sacred delphi , the other from [the summit of [Cyllene]14-cyllene]4489-the summit of cyllene , saw [her]6055-my wife at the same instant , and , at the same instant , flushed with desire . [Apollo]519-phoebus deferred [his]519-phoebus hope of union with [her]6055-my wife till the night , but [Mercury]550-cyllenian mercury could not wait , and touched [the virgin]1704-the virgin ’s face with [his]550-cyllenian mercury sleep - inducing wand . [She]1704-the virgin lay beneath that potent touch , and suffered the assault of [the god]1482-the god . Night scattered the heavens with stars : [Phoebus]519-phoebus , having gained access disguised as [an old woman]2330-an old woman , enjoyed the delight that had been forestalled . When [Chione]1165-chione came to full term [she]1165-chione bore [the wing - footed god]6544-the wing - footed god [a son]5939-a son , [Autolycus]1058-autolycus , crafty , talented in all intrigue , who could make black seem white , and white black , not unworthy of [[his]519-phoebus father]1775-his father ; and to [Phoebus]519-phoebus ( it was a twin birth ) [she]1165-chione bore [Philammon]1166-philammon , famous for tuneful song and the lyre . But what is the benefit in having produced [two sons]4496-two sons , in having pleased [two gods]4497-two gods , in being [the child of [a powerful father]4499-a powerful father , and grandchild of [the shining one]4500-the shining one]4498-the child of a powerful father , and grandchild of the shining one ? Is glory not harmful also to [many]1691-many ? It certainly harmed [her]1704-the virgin ! [She]1704-the virgin set [herself]1704-the virgin above [Diana]527-diana , and criticized [the goddess]5864-the goddess ’s beauty . But , [the goddess]5864-the goddess , moved by violent anger , said to [her]1704-the virgin : “ Then [I]0-i must satisfy [you]1704-the virgin with action . ” Without hesitating , [she]5864-the goddess bent [her]5864-the goddess bow , sent an arrow from the string , and pierced the tongue that was at fault , with the shaft . The tongue was silent , neither sound nor attempts at words followed : and as [she]5864-the goddess tried to speak , [her]5864-the goddess life ended in blood . [I]0-i embraced [her]5864-the goddess , in [my]0-i misery , feeling [a father]5997-a father ’s grief in [my]0-i heart , and spoke words of comfort to [[my]0-i dear brother]4505-my dear brother . [[Her]5864-the goddess father]1694-her father heard them no more than the cliffs hear the murmuring of [the sea]1464-the sea , mourning [his]1694-her father lost one , bitterly . But when [he]1694-her father saw the burning of [her]5864-the goddess body , four times [he]1694-her father made as if to throw [himself]1694-her father into the blazing pyre ; four times was thrust back ; fled madly ; and ran where there were no tracks , like [a bullock whose neck is tender from the yoke , tormented by hornets ’ stings]7997-a bullock whose neck is tender from the yoke , tormented by hornets ’ stings . Even then to [me]623-lucifer [he]1694-her father seemed to run faster than humanly possible , and [you]7998-you would have thought [he]1694-her father had winged feet . [He]1694-her father escaped [us]7999-us all , swift with desire for death , and gained [the summit of [Parnassus]49-parnassus]8000-the summit of parnassus . When [Daedalion]1163-daedalion hurled [himself]1163-daedalion from [the high cliffs]8001-the high cliffs , [Apollo]519-phoebus , pitying [him]1163-daedalion , turned [him]1163-daedalion into a bird , and lifted [him]1163-daedalion , pendent on suddenly - formed wings , giving [him]1163-daedalion a hooked beak , and curved talons , [his]1163-daedalion former courage , and greater strength of body . Now , as a hawk , [he]1694-her father rages against all birds , is merciful to none , and , suffering , is a cause of suffering . ’[623-lucifer] While [[Lucifer]623-lucifer ’s son]4508-lucifer ’s son was telling the strange story of [[his]4508-lucifer ’s son brother]1593-his brother , [[Peleus]974-peleus ’s herdsman]4510-peleus ’s herdsman , Onetor [the Phocian]4511-the phocian , came racing up , breathing hard with the pace , shouting : ‘ [Peleus]974-peleus ! [Peleus]974-peleus ! [I]974-peleus bring [you]4510-peleus ’s herdsman news of grave trouble . ’[974-peleus] [Peleus]974-peleus ordered [him]4510-peleus ’s herdsman to tell it , whatever it was , [the Trachinian king]4512-the trachinian king [himself]4512-the trachinian king waiting with anxious face . [The herdsman]3627-the herdsman said : ‘ When the sun was at the zenith , seeing as much of the track left as [he]4512-the trachinian king had already run , [I]3627-the herdsman had driven [the tired oxen]8002-the tired oxen down to [the bay]8003-the bay . [Some of [the bullocks]8005-the bullocks]8004-some of the bullocks were kneeling on the yellow sand , lying there gazing out at the wide expanse of ocean ; [some]3440-some were wandering slowly here and there ; while [others]5836-others had waded out and stood up to [their]5836-others necks in [the water]1620-the water . There is [a temple near [the sea]1464-the sea]8009-a temple near the sea , not gleaming with gold and marble , but made of heavy timber , and shaded by an ancient grove . [Nereus]505-nereus and [the Nereids]16-the nereids haunt [it]8009-a temple near the sea ( [a sailor]8011-a sailor , drying [his]8011-a sailor nets on [the shore]2065-the shore , told [me]3627-the herdsman [they]16-the nereids were [the gods of [those waters]8014-those waters]8013-the gods of those waters ) . Close to [it]8009-a temple near the sea , there is [a swamp]8015-a swamp , choked with dense willows , which the salt flood has turned into [marshland]8016-marshland . From [it]8015-a swamp , a wolf , a huge beast , terrifies the places round about with its heavy crashing noises . It came out of [the marsh reeds]8017-the marsh reeds , its deadly jaws smeared with foam and clots of blood , and its eyes filled with red flame . It was savage with rage and hunger , more with rage ; since though hungry it did not bother with the dead cattle , or with satisfying its deadly appetite , but wounded the whole herd , slaughtering [them]8018-them all in its hostility . [Some of [[our]8020-our men]8021-our men]8019-some of our men were wounded by its fatal jaws while protecting [them]8019-some of our men , and given up as dead . [The shore]2065-the shore and [the shallows]8023-the shallows were red with blood , and [the marshes]8024-the marshes full of bellowing . But delay is fatal : the thing allows no hesitation . While there are some of [us]8020-our left , let [us]8020-our encounter [it]8025-it in armour , and , seizing [our]8020-our weapons , meet with it carrying spears ! ’[3627-the herdsman] So [the countryman]4514-the countryman spoke : the losses did not stir [Peleus]974-peleus : conscious of [his]974-peleus guilt [he]974-peleus concluded that [Psamathe]1168-psamathe , [the bereaved Nereid]4515-the bereaved nereid , was sending a funeral offering to [[her]1168-psamathe murdered son]4516-her murdered son [Phocus]975-phocus , by means of those same losses . [Oetean King Ceyx]4517-oetean king ceyx ordered [[his]4517-oetean king ceyx men]4518-his men to put on [their]4518-his men armour , and take [their]4518-his men deadly spears , while [he]4517-oetean king ceyx was [himself]4517-oetean king ceyx preparing to go with [them]4518-his men . But [Alcyone]955-alcyone , [[his]4517-oetean king ceyx wife]1633-his wife , disturbed by the shouting , scattering [her]955-alcyone hair that [she]955-alcyone had not yet quite arranged , flung [herself]955-alcyone on [[her]955-alcyone husband]5872-her husband ’s neck , begging [him]4517-oetean king ceyx , with words and tears , to send help , but not to go [himself]4517-oetean king ceyx , and protect both [their]4521-their lives , by protecting [his]4517-oetean king ceyx own . [Peleus]974-peleus , [the son of [Aeacus]972-aeacus]7968-the son of aeacus , said : ‘ [Queen Alcyone]955-alcyone , forget these loving fears that so become [you]955-alcyone ! [I]974-peleus am grateful for [[your]955-alcyone husband]4045-your husband ’s offer of help , but [I]974-peleus have no wish for arms to be used against the creature on [my]974-peleus behalf . [I]974-peleus must pray , instead , to [the goddess of [the ocean]1657-the ocean]8027-the goddess of the ocean ! ’[974-peleus] There was [a high tower]4523-a high tower ; [a beacon on top of [the citadel]4525-the citadel]4524-a beacon on top of the citadel ; a welcome sight for [labouring vessels]4526-labouring vessels . [They]4527-they climbed up , and looked out , with murmuring sighs , at the cattle lying on [the shore]2065-the shore , seeing [their]4527-they rampaging killer with bloody jaws , its shaggy pelt dripping gore . There , stretching [his]974-peleus hands out towards [the shores of [the open sea]7309-the open sea]4529-the shores of the open sea , [Peleus]974-peleus prayed to sea - born [Psamathe]1168-psamathe to forget [her]1168-psamathe anger , and to aid [him]974-peleus . [She]1168-psamathe was unmoved by the prayers of [the son of [Aeacus]972-aeacus]7968-the son of aeacus , but [Thetis]1160-thetis , as [a suppliant for [[her]1168-psamathe husband]5872-her husband]4532-a suppliant for her husband , obtained [her]1168-psamathe forgiveness . The wolf persisted even when ordered away from the savage slaughter , maddened by the taste of blood , until [the goddess]5864-the goddess changed it to marble , as it was clinging to the wounded neck of a heifer . The body remained completely the same , except for its colour : the colour of the stone showed [it]4535-it no longer wolf , no longer to be feared . But the fates did not allow [the exiled Peleus]974-peleus to remain in [that country]6099-that country . [The wandering fugitive]4537-the wandering fugitive reached [Magnesia]337-magnesia , and there was absolved of the murder by [Haemonian King Acastus]1015-acastus . Meanwhile [Ceyx]1162-ceyx , troubled by heart ’s anxiety , concerning [[his]1162-ceyx brother]1593-his brother , and what had followed [[his]1162-ceyx brother]1593-his brother ’s strange fate , was preparing to go and consult the sacred oracle of [Apollo]519-phoebus , at [Claros]23-claros , that reveals human affairs . [The infamous Phorbas]4540-the infamous phorbas , [leader of [the Phlegyans]1169-the phlegyans]4541-leader of the phlegyans , had made [Delphi]82-delphi inaccessible . Nevertheless , before [he]4540-the infamous phorbas set out , [he]4540-the infamous phorbas discussed it with [you]4542-you , [faithful Alcyone]955-alcyone . [She]955-alcyone felt a chill , immediately , deep in [her]955-alcyone marrow , [her]955-alcyone face grew boxwood - pale , and [her]955-alcyone cheeks were drenched in flowing tears . Three times [she]955-alcyone tried to speak , three times [her]955-alcyone face was wet with weeping , and sobs interrupting [her]955-alcyone loving reproaches , [she]955-alcyone said : ‘ What sin of [mine]955-alcyone has turned [your]4542-you mind to this , [dear one]8029-dear one ? Where is that care for [me]955-alcyone that used to come first ? Can [you]4542-you now leave [Alcyone]955-alcyone behind , without a thought ? Does it please [you]4542-you now to travel far ? Am [I]955-alcyone dearer to [you]4542-you , away from [you]4542-you ? But [I]955-alcyone suppose [your]4542-you way is overland , and [I]955-alcyone shall only grieve , not fear , for [you]4542-you . [My]955-alcyone anxieties will be free from terror . [The waters]1626-the waters scare [me]955-alcyone , and the sombre face of [the deep]1919-the deep : and lately [I]955-alcyone saw wrecked timbers on [the shore]2065-the shore , and [I]955-alcyone have often read the names on [empty tombs]8033-empty tombs . Do not allow [your]4542-you mind to acquire false confidence , because [Aeolus]511-aeolus , [son of [Hippotas]782-hippotas]6504-son of hippotas , is [[your]4542-you father - in - law]8035-your father - in - law , who keeps the strong winds imprisoned , and , when [he]511-aeolus wishes , calms [the sea]1464-the sea . When once the winds are released and hold sway over [the waters]1626-the waters , nothing can oppose [them]1626-the waters : [every country]8038-every country , [every ocean]8039-every ocean is exposed to [them]1626-the waters . [They]1626-the waters vex the clouds in the sky , and create the red lightning - flashes from [their]1626-the waters fierce collisions . The more [I]955-alcyone know of [them]1626-the waters ( [I]955-alcyone do know [them]1626-the waters , often seeing [them]1626-the waters as [a child]2050-a child in [[[my]955-alcyone father]5857-my father ’s house]8042-my father ’s house ) the more [I]955-alcyone consider [them]1626-the waters to be feared . But if no prayers can alter [your]8043-you purpose , [dear one]8029-dear one , [husband]8045-husband , if [you]8043-you are so fixed on going , take [me]955-alcyone with [you]8043-you , also ! Then [we]8046-we shall be storm - tossed together , and at least [I]955-alcyone shall know what [I]955-alcyone fear , together [we]8046-we shall bear whatever comes , together [we]8046-we shall be borne over [the waters]1626-the waters . ’[955-alcyone] [The star - born husband]4543-the star - born husband was moved by [the daughter of [Aeolus]511-aeolus]4544-the daughter of aeolus ’s words and tears : there was no less love in [himself]4543-the star - born husband . But [he]4543-the star - born husband would not relinquish [his]4543-the star - born husband planned sea - journey , nor did [he]4543-the star - born husband want to put [Alcyone]955-alcyone in peril . [His]4543-the star - born husband anxious heart tried to comfort [her]4544-the daughter of aeolus , with many words , yet , despite that , [he]4543-the star - born husband could not win [his]4543-the star - born husband case . [He]4543-the star - born husband added this further solace , the only one that moved [[his]4543-the star - born husband lover]4265-his lover : ‘ Every delay will seem long to [us]8048-us indeed , but [I]4543-the star - born husband swear to [you]4544-the daughter of aeolus by [[my]4543-the star - born husband father]5857-my father ’s light , to return to [you]4544-the daughter of aeolus as long as the fates allow it , before the moon has twice completed [her]4544-the daughter of aeolus circle . ’[4543-the star - born husband] When [her]4544-the daughter of aeolus hopes had been revived by these promises of return , [he]4543-the star - born husband immediately ordered [the ship]2497-the ship to be dragged down the slipway , launched into [the sea]1464-the sea , and fitted out with [her]4544-the daughter of aeolus gear . [Alcyone]955-alcyone , seeing this , as if [she]955-alcyone foresaw what was to come , shuddered again , and [she]955-alcyone gave way to a flood of tears . [She]955-alcyone hugged [him]4543-the star - born husband , and , in wretched misery , said a last ‘ Farewell ’[955-alcyone] and [her]955-alcyone whole body gave way beneath [her]955-alcyone . With [Ceyx]1162-ceyx still seeking reasons for delay , [the young crew , double - ranked]4548-the young crew , double - ranked , pulled on the oars , with deep - chested strokes , and cut the water with [their]4548-the young crew , double - ranked rhythmic blows . [She]955-alcyone raised [her]955-alcyone wet eyes , and leaning forward could see [[her]955-alcyone husband]5872-her husband standing on the curved afterdeck , waving [his]5872-her husband hand , and [she]955-alcyone returned the signal . When [he]5872-her husband was further from [shore]2463-shore , and [she]955-alcyone could no longer recognise [his]5872-her husband features , [she]955-alcyone followed [the fleeting ship]4551-the fleeting ship with [her]955-alcyone gaze , while [she]955-alcyone could . When even that was too far off to be seen , [she]955-alcyone still could see the topsails unfurling from the masthead . When no sails could be seen , with heavy heart , [she]955-alcyone sought out [the empty bedroom]4552-the empty bedroom , and threw [herself]955-alcyone on the bed . [The room]2617-the room and the bed provoked more tears and reminded [her]955-alcyone of [her]955-alcyone absent half . [They]4554-they had left [the harbour]4555-the harbour , and the breeze was stirring the rigging : [the captain]4556-the captain shipped the oars , ran [the yard]4557-the yard up to the top of the mast , and put on all sail to catch the freshening breeze . [The ship]2497-the ship was cutting through the waves , no more than mid - way across , maybe less , far from [either shore]4559-either shore , when , at nightfall , [the sea]1464-the sea began to whiten with swelling waves , and the east wind to blow with greater strength . [The captain]4556-the captain shouts : ‘ Lower [the yards]8050-the yards , now , and close reef all sails . ’[4556-the captain] [He]4556-the captain shouts the order but the adverse wind drowns it , and [his]4556-the captain voice can not be heard above the breaking seas . Yet , [some of [the crew]2504-the crew]4562-some of the crew , on [their]4562-some of the crew own initiative , remove the oars , some protect [the bulwarks]4564-the bulwarks , some deny the wind canvas - room . Here one bails water back into [the water]1620-the water , another secures the spars . While these things are being done , randomly , the storm increases its severity , and the roaring winds attack from every quarter , stirring the angry waves . [The captain]4556-the captain [himself]4556-the captain is fearful , and admits [he]4556-the captain does not know how things stand , what to order , what to prevent : such is the weight of destruction , so much more powerful than [his]4556-the captain skill . There is uproar : [men]5788-men shouting , the rigging straining , the sound of the breaking sea from a weight of sea , and the crash of thunder . The waves rise up and seem to form the sky , and their spray touches the lowering clouds . Now [the water]1620-the water is tainted yellow , with sand churned from the depths , now blacker than [the Styx]194-the styx , while the waves break white with hissing foam . [The Trachinian ship]4569-the trachinian ship is driven in the grip of fate , now lifted on high , as if looking down on [the valleys]1480-the valleys from [a mountain summit]4571-a mountain summit , into the depths of [Acheron]338-acheron : now sinking , caught in the trough of the wave , staring at heaven from [the infernal pool]4572-the infernal pool . Again and again the force of the flood strikes the sides with a huge crash , sounding no lighter a blow than when , sometime , an iron ram , or a ballista , strikes [a damaged fortress]4573-a damaged fortress . As [fierce lions , on the attack]4574-fierce lions , on the attack , drive [themselves]4574-fierce lions , on the attack onto the armoured chests and extended spears of [the hunters]2024-the hunters , so the waves drove forward in the rising winds , reaching the height of [the ship]2497-the ship , and higher , above it . And now the wooden wedges give way , and , stripped of their wax covering , cracks appear , offering the lethal waves a passage . Look how the heavy rain falls from the melting clouds , and [you]4577-you would think [the whole heaven]4578-the whole heaven was emptying into [the sea]1464-the sea , and [the sea]1464-the sea was filling [the heavenly zones]4581-the heavenly zones . The sails are soaked with spray , and the seawater mingles with water from the heavens . The sky is starless , and the murky night is full of its own and the storm ’s gloom . Flashes of lightning cleave it , and give light : the rain is illuminated by the lightning flares . Now the sea pours into [[the ship]2497-the ship ’s hollow hull]4583-the ship ’s hollow hull , as well . As [a soldier]4584-a soldier , more outstanding than the rest , who has often tried to scale [the battlement of [a besieged city]4586-a besieged city]4585-the battlement of a besieged city , succeeds at last , and fired with a love of glory , takes the wall , [one man in a thousand]4587-one man in a thousand ; so when the waves have battered nine times against the steep sides , [the tenth wave surging with greater impetus]4588-the tenth wave surging with greater impetus rushes on , and does not cease its assault on [the beleaguered craft]4589-the beleaguered craft , until it breaches [the conquered vessel ’s defences]4590-the conquered vessel ’s defences . So one part of [the sea]1464-the sea is still trying to take [the ship]2497-the ship , and part is already inside . All is confusion , as [a city]3751-a city is confused when some are undermining the walls from outside , while [others]5836-others hold them from within . Skill fails , and courage ebbs , and as many separate deaths as advancing waves seem to rush upon [them]4595-them and burst over [them]4595-them . [One]5944-one can not hold [his]5944-one tears , [another]2286-another is stupefied , and [one]5944-one cries out that [they]4599-they are [fortunate whom proper burial rites]4600-fortunate whom proper burial rites await . One worships [the gods]1538-the gods in prayer , and , lifting [his]5944-one arms in vain to the sky , [he]5944-one can not see , begs for help . [Some]3440-some think of [fathers]6052-fathers and [brothers]1493-brothers , some of [home]2999-home and [children]2996-children , or whatever [they]3440-some have left behind . But [Alcyone]955-alcyone is what moves [Ceyx]1162-ceyx : nothing but [Alcyone]955-alcyone is on [Ceyx]1162-ceyx ’s lips , and though [he]1162-ceyx only longs for [her]955-alcyone , [he]1162-ceyx rejoices that [she]955-alcyone is not there . How [he]1162-ceyx would like to see [[his]1162-ceyx native shores]4607-his native shores again , and turn [his]1162-ceyx last gaze towards [[his]1162-ceyx home]2302-his home , but [he]1162-ceyx knows not where it is : [the sea]1464-the sea swirls in such vortices , and the covering shadows of pitch - black clouds so hide the sky , that it mirrors the aspect of night . The mast is shattered by the onset of a storm - driven whirlwind , and the rudder is shattered . One ultimate wave , like a conqueror delighting in [his]1162-ceyx spoils , rears up gazing down at the other waves , and , as if one tore [Pindus]27-pindus , and [Athos]1171-athos , from [their]4610-their base , and threw [them]4610-their utterly into [the open sea]7309-the open sea , it fell headlong , and the weight and the impulse together , drove [the ship]2497-the ship to the bottom . [The majority of [the crew]2504-the crew]4613-the majority of the crew met [their]4613-the majority of the crew fate with [the ship]2497-the ship , driven down by the mass of water , never to return to the light . The rest clung to broken pieces of [the vessel]7095-the vessel . [Ceyx]1162-ceyx [himself]1162-ceyx , held on to a fragment of the wreck , with a hand more used to holding a sceptre , and called on [[his]1162-ceyx father]1775-his father , [Lucifer]623-lucifer , and [[his]1162-ceyx father - in - law]6072-his father - in - law , [Aeolus]511-aeolus , but alas , in vain . Mostly it is [[his]1162-ceyx wife]1633-his wife ’s , [Alcyone]955-alcyone ’s , name on [his]1162-ceyx lips . [He]1162-ceyx thinks of [her]1633-his wife , and speaks to [her]1633-his wife , and prays that the waves might carry [his]1162-ceyx body to [her]1633-his wife sight , and that , lifeless , [he]1162-ceyx might be entombed by [her]1633-his wife dear hands . While [he]1162-ceyx can swim , and as often as the waves allow [him]1162-ceyx to open [his]1162-ceyx mouth , [he]1162-ceyx speaks the name of [Alcyone]955-alcyone , far off , until the waves themselves murmur it , See , a black arc of water breaks over [the heart of [the sea]1464-the sea]4620-the heart of the sea , and the bursting wave buries [his]1162-ceyx drowning head . [Lucifer]623-lucifer was indistinct , and not to be known , that dawn , and since [he]623-lucifer was not allowed to leave the sky , [he]623-lucifer covered [his]623-lucifer face in dense cloud . Meanwhile , [Alcyone]955-alcyone , [[Aeolus]511-aeolus ’s daughter]2942-aeolus ’s daughter , counts the nights , unaware of this great misfortune , quickly weaving clothes for [him]1162-ceyx to wear , and for [herself]955-alcyone , for when [he]1162-ceyx returns , and [she]955-alcyone promises [herself]955-alcyone the homecoming that will not be . [She]955-alcyone piously offers incense to all the gods , but worships mostly at [[Juno]525-juno ’s temple]4623-juno ’s temple , coming to the altars for [a man who is no more , hoping [[her]955-alcyone husband]5872-her husband is safe , and returning to [her]955-alcyone , preferring [her]955-alcyone above [any other woman]4626-any other woman]4624-a man who is no more , hoping her husband is safe , and returning to her , preferring her above any other woman . Of all [her]955-alcyone prayers , only this could be granted . [The goddess]5864-the goddess could no longer bear these appeals for [one who was dead]4628-one who was dead , and , to free [her]955-alcyone altar from those inauspicious hands , [she]955-alcyone said : ‘ [Iris]512-iris , [most faithful carrier of [my]955-alcyone words]8051-most faithful carrier of my words , go quickly to [the heavy halls of Sleep]8052-the heavy halls of sleep , and order [him]5872-her husband to send [Alcyone]955-alcyone a dream - figure in the shape of [her]955-alcyone dead Ceyx , to tell [her]955-alcyone [his]5872-her husband true fate . ’[955-alcyone] As [she]955-alcyone spoke , [Iris]512-iris donned [her]512-iris thousand - coloured robe , and , tracing [her]512-iris watery bow on the sky , [she]512-iris searched out , as ordered , [the palace of [that king]4630-that king]4629-the palace of that king , hid under cloud . There is [a deeply cut cave]4631-a deeply cut cave , [a hollow mountain]4632-a hollow mountain , near [the Cimmerian country]4633-the cimmerian country , [the house and sanctuary of drowsy Sleep]4634-the house and sanctuary of drowsy sleep . [Phoebus]519-phoebus can never reach [it]4631-a deeply cut cave with [his]519-phoebus dawn , mid - day or sunset rays . Clouds mixed with fog , and shadows of the half - light , are exhaled from the ground . [No waking cockerel]4635-no waking cockerel summons [Aurora]569-aurora with [his]4635-no waking cockerel crowing : no dog disturbs the silence with its anxious barking , or goose , cackling , more alert than a dog . No beasts , or cattle , or branches in the breeze , no clamour of human tongues . There still silence dwells . But out of the stony depths flows [Lethe]1172-lethe ’s stream , whose waves , sliding over the loose pebbles , with their murmur , induce drowsiness . In front of [the cave]2159-the cave mouth a wealth of poppies flourish , and innumerable herbs , from whose juices dew - wet Night gathers sleep , and scatters it over [the darkened earth]4637-the darkened earth . There are no doors in [the palace]6417-the palace , lest a turning hinge lets out a creak , and no guard at the threshold . But in [the cave ’s centre]4639-the cave ’s centre there is a tall bed made of ebony , downy , black - hued , spread with a dark - grey sheet , where [the god]1482-the god [himself]1482-the god lies , [his]1482-the god limbs relaxed in slumber . Around [him]1482-the god , here and there , lie uncertain dreams , taking different forms , as many as the ears of corn at harvest , as the trees bear leaves , or grains of sand are thrown onshore . When [the nymph]1783-the nymph entered and , with [her]1783-the nymph hands , brushed aside the dreams in [her]1783-the nymph way , [the sacred place]4642-the sacred place shone with the light of [her]1783-the nymph robes . [The god]1482-the god , hardly able to lift [his]1482-the god eyes heavy with sleep , again and again , falling back , striking [his]1482-the god nodding chin on [his]1482-the god chest , at last shook [himself]1482-the god free of [his]1482-the god own influence , and resting on an elbow asked [her]1783-the nymph ( for [he]1482-the god knew [her]1783-the nymph ) why [she]1783-the nymph had come , and [she]1783-the nymph replied : ‘ Sleep , all things ’[1783-the nymph] rest : Sleep , gentlest of [the gods]1538-the gods , the spirit ’s peace , whom care flies from : who soothes [the body wearied with toil]4645-the body wearied with toil , and readies it for fresh labours : Sleep , order a likeness , that mirrors [his]1482-the god true form , and let it go , the image of [King Ceyx]1162-ceyx , to [Alcyone]955-alcyone , in Trachin of [Hercules]941-hercules , and depict a phantasm of the wreck . This , [Juno]525-juno commands . ’ After [she]1783-the nymph had completed [her]1783-the nymph commission , [Iris]512-iris departed , no longer able to withstand the power of sleep , and , feeling the drowsiness steal over [her]512-iris body , [she]512-iris fled , and re - crossed the arch by which [she]512-iris had lately come . From [a throng of a thousand sons]8053-a throng of a thousand sons , [[his]1482-the god father]1775-his father roused [Morpheus]1173-morpheus , [a master craftsman and simulator of human forms]8055-a master craftsman and simulator of human forms . [No one else]8056-no one else is as clever at expressing the movement , the features , and the sound of speech . [He]1173-morpheus depicts the clothes and the usual accents . [He]1173-morpheus alone imitates [human beings]1489-human beings . [A second son]8058-a second son becomes beast , or bird , or long snake ’s body . [The gods]1538-the gods call [him]8058-a second son [Icelos]1174-icelos , [the mortal crowd Phobetor]8060-the mortal crowd phobetor . [The third , of diverse artistry]8061-the third , of diverse artistry , is [Phantasos]1175-phantasos : [he]1175-phantasos takes illusory shapes of all inanimate things , earth , stones , [rivers]8062-rivers , trees . These are the ones that show [themselves]1538-the gods by night to [kings]1975-kings and [generals]8064-generals , [the rest]4436-the rest wander among [citizens]7238-citizens and [commoners]8067-commoners . [Old Somnus]1176-old somnus passed [them]1538-the gods by , choosing one of [all these brothers]8068-all these brothers , [Morpheus]1173-morpheus , to carry out the command of [Iris]512-iris , [daughter of [Thaumas]1177-thaumas]8069-daughter of thaumas , and relaxing again into sweet drowsiness , [his]1173-morpheus head drooped and [he]1173-morpheus settled into [his]1173-morpheus deep bed . Flying through the shadows on noiseless wings , [Morpheus]1173-morpheus , after a short delay , comes to [the Haemonian city]8070-the haemonian city . Shedding [his]1173-morpheus wings , [he]1173-morpheus takes the shape of [Ceyx]1162-ceyx , pallid like the dead , and naked , and stands before [[his]1173-morpheus unfortunate wife]8071-his unfortunate wife ’s bed . [He]1173-morpheus appears with sodden beard , and seawater dripping from [his]1173-morpheus matted hair .
