When [he]8276-his cowardly friend challenged [one warrior]8285-one warrior to meet [him]8276-his cowardly friend , [I]605-jove withstood [him]8276-his cowardly friend . [You]8280-you wished the lot would fall to [me]605-jove , [Achaeans]8286-achaeans , and [your]8280-you prayers were answered . If [you]8280-you ask what the outcome of that conflict was [I]605-jove was not beaten by [Hector]605-jove . See , [the Trojans]4754-the trojans bring fire and sword , and [Jupiter]1273-jupiter [himself]1273-jupiter , against [the Greek ships]8288-the greek ships : where now is the eloquent [Ulysses]1271-ulysses ? Surely [I]605-jove , with [my]605-jove own breast , shielded [the thousand ships]4732-the thousand ships , [your]8280-you hope of return : grant [me]605-jove the arms for all that fleet . Yet , if [I]605-jove may speak the truth , the arms search for greater honour than [I]605-jove do , to be linked to [my]605-jove glory , and the arms seek out [Ajax]605-jove , not [Ajax]605-jove the arms . Let [the Ithacan]1277-the ithacan compare with these things [his]1277-the ithacan killing of [Rhesus]1278-rhesus , and of cowardly [Dolon]1279-dolon , [his]1277-the ithacan taking captive [Helenus]1280-helenus , [[Priam]1181-priam ’s son]8290-priam ’s son , and [his]1277-the ithacan theft of [Pallas]1098-pallas ’s image , [the Palladium]351-the palladium : nothing performed in daylight , nothing without [Diomede]1073-diomede present . If ever [you]8280-you grant the armour for such worthless service , divide it , and let [Diomede]1073-diomede have the greater share of it . Nevertheless why give [them]8291-them to [the Ithacan , who carries things out secretly , and always unarmed]8292-the ithacan , who carries things out secretly , and always unarmed , deceiving [the unsuspecting enemy]8293-the unsuspecting enemy with [his]1277-the ithacan tricks ? The gleam of the helmet , radiant with shining gold , will reveal [his]1277-the ithacan scheming , and show where [he]1277-the ithacan hides . [The Dulichian]1271-ulysses ’s head beneath [Achilles]1161-achilles ’s helmet , will not bear so great a weight , and the spear - shaft , from [Pelion]504-pelion , can not be anything but heavy and burdensome for [his]1277-the ithacan arm , unsuited to war , and the shield , with its engraved design of [the vast world]8294-the vast world , will not be fit for that cowardly left hand born for stealing . [Perverse man]8295-perverse man , why do [you]8280-you go after a prize that will cripple [you]8280-you , one that , if it is given [you]8280-you in error by [the Achaean people]8296-the achaean people , will be a reason for being despoiled by [the enemy]6372-the enemy , not feared by [them]6372-the enemy ? And running away , in which [you]8280-you surpass [everyone]2389-everyone , [[you]8280-you master - coward]8299-you master - coward , will turn out to be a slow game for [you]8280-you , if [you]8280-you are carrying such a weight . Add to that [your]8280-you shield that is rarely used in battle , and uninjured , and [mine]8300-mine split in a thousand places from fending off spear - thrusts , that needs a new successor . Finally ( what is the use of words ? ) let [us]8301-us be seen together in action ! Send out [the brave hero]4784-the brave hero ’s arms into the middle of the enemy ranks : order [them]8303-them to be recovered from there , and let [the retriever]8304-the retriever be equipped with what [he]8304-the retriever retrieves . ’[605-jove] [The son of [Telamon]973-telamon]4921-the son of telamon finished , and [the crowd]2430-the crowd ’s applause followed [his]4921-the son of telamon closing words . Until [the hero]2234-the hero , [son of Laërtes]4936-son of laërtes , stood . [He]2234-the hero gazed at the ground for a while and then raised [his]2234-the hero eyes to look at [the captains]4928-the captains , and opened [his]2234-the hero lips for the speech [they]4928-the captains anticipated : [his]2234-the hero eloquent words did not lack grace in [their]4928-the captains delivery . ‘ If [my]2234-the hero wishes and [yours]8305-you , [Pelasgians]932-pelasgians , had been worth anything , there would be no question as to who should inherit the arms in this great contest : [you]8305-you , [Achilles]1161-achilles , would have [your]8305-you armour , and [we]8306-we would have [you]8305-you . But since unequal fate has denied [his]1161-achilles presence to [me]2234-the hero and to [you]8305-you , ( and [he]1161-achilles made as if to wipe a tear from [his]1161-achilles eye ) , who better to take [Achilles]1161-achilles ’s place than [the man through whom mighty [Achilles]1161-achilles took [his]1161-achilles place among [the Greeks]4756-the greeks]8307-the man through whom mighty achilles took his place among the greeks ? Only do not let it help [him]1161-achilles that [he]1161-achilles is slow - witted , as [he]1161-achilles seems to be , nor harm [my]2234-the hero case that [my]2234-the hero ability has always profited [you]8305-you [Greeks]1188-greeks . And let this eloquence of [mine]2234-the hero , if it exists , that often spoke for [you]8305-you , and now speaks for [its master]8309-its master , escape envy : [no man]2270-no man should refuse to employ [his]2270-no man talents . Now , as to race , and ancestry , and whatever [we]8311-we have not personally achieved ; [I]2234-the hero hardly call those things [ours]8311-we . But since [Ajax]605-jove has recalled that [he]605-jove is [[Jove]605-jove ’s great grandson]8312-jove ’s great grandson , [Jupiter]1273-jupiter is [the founder of [my]2234-the hero bloodline]8313-the founder of my bloodline also , and [I]2234-the hero am the same distance from [him]1273-jupiter . [Laërtes]1276-laërtes is [[my]2234-the hero father]5857-my father , [Arcesius]1281-arcesius was [[Laërtes]1276-laërtes ’s father]8315-laërtes ’s father , and [he]1281-arcesius was [the son of [Jupiter]1273-jupiter]6250-the son of jupiter : and there are [no exiled criminals]8317-no exiled criminals , like [Peleus]974-peleus and [Telamon]973-telamon , amongst [them]8317-no exiled criminals . Also there is the addition to [my]2234-the hero nobility of [Cyllenian]352-cyllenian Mercury through [[my]2234-the hero mother]2965-my mother , [Anticleia]1282-anticleia . [The gods]1538-the gods are in both [[my]2234-the hero parents]2453-my parents . But [I]2234-the hero do not claim the arms lying there because [I]2234-the hero am nobler on [[my]2234-the hero mother]2965-my mother ’s side , nor because [[my]2234-the hero father]5857-my father is innocent of [a brother]7684-a brother ’s blood . Judge the case on its merits . Provided that it is not regarded as [Ajax]605-jove ’s merit that [Telamon]973-telamon and [Peleus]974-peleus were [brothers]1493-brothers , and that what is considered in this award is respect for ability not the claims of blood ! Or , if [you]8325-you are asking who is [the next of kin]8326-the next of kin , and [the lawful heir]8327-the lawful heir , well [Peleus]974-peleus is [[Achilles]1161-achilles ’s father]8328-achilles ’s father , and [Pyrrhus]1283-pyrrhus is [[Achilles]1161-achilles ’s son]8329-achilles ’s son : where is [Ajax]605-jove ’s claim ? Take the arms to [[Peleus]974-peleus ’s [Phthia]353-phthia]8330-peleus ’s phthia , or [Pyrrhus]1283-pyrrhus ’s [Scyros]354-scyros ! [Teucer]1284-teucer is no less [[Achilles]1161-achilles ’s cousin]8331-achilles ’s cousin than [Ajax]605-jove , yet does [he]1284-teucer ask for the arms , and if [he]1284-teucer did , would [he]1284-teucer gain them ? So , since it is a contest about naked achievements , [I]2234-the hero have done more than [I]2234-the hero can recount in glib words , but [I]2234-the hero will take things in [their]8332-their proper order . [Thetis]1160-thetis , [[Achilles]1161-achilles ’s Nereid mother]8333-achilles ’s nereid mother , foreseeing [[her]8333-achilles ’s nereid mother son]6039-her son ’s death , disguised [his]6039-her son appearance , and wearing [women]5877-women ’s clothes [he]6039-her son deceived [everyone]2389-everyone , including [Ajax]605-jove . But , among the things [women]5877-women buy , [I]2234-the hero placed arms to stir [a man]5897-a man ’s spirit . Before [the hero]2234-the hero had abandoned the clothes of [a girl]1995-a girl , while [he]2234-the hero held the shield and spear , [I]2234-the hero said : ‘[2234-the hero] [Pergama]349-pergama the citadel doomed to be destroyed , waits for [you]4938-i , [son of [the goddess]5864-the goddess]7248-son of the goddess ! Why do [you]4938-i hesitate to overthrow mighty [Troy]271-troy ? ’ And [I]4938-i took [him]2234-the hero in hand , and sent [the brave]8341-the brave out to do brave things . So [his]2234-the hero deeds are mine : [I]4938-i overcame [warring Telephus]1195-telephus with [my]4938-i spear , and healed [him]2234-the hero with it , when [he]2234-the hero was defeated and begging for help . It is down to [me]4938-i that [Mysian Thebes]355-mysian thebes fell : credit the capture of [Lesbos]326-lesbos to [me]4938-i , Tenedos to [me]4938-i , [Chryse]356-chryse and [Cilla]357-cilla [the cities of [Apollo]519-phoebus]8342-the cities of apollo , and [Phrygian Scyros]359-phrygian scyros as well . Imagine that [my]4938-i right hand razed [Lyrnesus]1285-lyrnesus ’s walls to the ground . [I]4938-i gave [you]8343-you [the man who could destroy fierce [Hector]605-jove , not to speak of [those other Trojans]8345-those other trojans]8344-the man who could destroy fierce hector , not to speak of those other trojans : through [me]4938-i glorious [Hector]605-jove lies low ! [I]4938-i seek these arms for the arms that revealed [Achilles]1161-achilles : [I]4938-i gave to [the living]4271-the living , [I]4938-i claim from the dead . When [one man]1607-one man ’s sorrow fell on [all the Greeks]8348-all the greeks , and [a thousand ships]4711-a thousand ships gathered at [Euboean Aulis]360-euboean aulis , though [they]4711-a thousand ships waited for a long time , there were adverse winds or no wind . Then [a cruel oracle]8350-a cruel oracle ordered [Agamemnon]1270-agamemnon to sacrifice [[his]1270-agamemnon innocent daughter]8351-his innocent daughter , [Iphigenia]1190-iphigenia , to pitiless [Diana]527-diana . [The father]1852-the father said no , angered with [the gods]1538-the gods [themselves]1538-the gods : and there is still [a father]5997-a father even in [a king]8355-a king . [I]4938-i with [my]4938-i skill in words turned [him]1852-the father away from [a parent]3661-a parent ’s fondness and towards the common good . [I]4938-i had a difficult case indeed to plead , before ( [I]4938-i confess , and may Atrides pardon the confession ) [a prejudiced judge]8357-a prejudiced judge , but given the needs of [[his]1852-the father brother]1593-his brother and [the expedition]8359-the expedition , and the high command vested in [him]1852-the father , [he]1852-the father balanced glory against blood . Then [I]4938-i was sent to [the mother]2342-the mother , [Clytaemnestra]1286-clytaemnestra , who was not to be persuaded , but deceived by cunning . If [[Telamon]973-telamon ’s son]8361-telamon ’s son had gone , [[our]8362-our sails]8363-our sails would still be waiting for the winds . Also , as [an ambassador]8364-an ambassador , [I]4938-i was sent to [[Troy]271-troy ’s citadel]4869-troy ’s citadel , and saw and entered [the senate house of [lofty Ilium]339-ilium , still full of [heroes]4115-heroes]8366-the senate house of lofty ilium , still full of heroes . As [I]4938-i was charged to do by [Greece]108-greece , for the common good , undaunted , [I]4938-i accused [Paris]1187-paris , demanded the return of [Helen]1287-helen and what [Paris]1187-paris had plundered , and stirred [Priam]1181-priam , and [Antenor]1288-antenor , at one with [Priam]1181-priam . But [Paris]1187-paris , and [[his]8368-his brothers]2253-his brothers , and [those who plundered with [him]8368-his]8370-those who plundered with him , could scarcely keep [their]8370-those who plundered with him sinful hands off [me]4938-i ( [you]8371-you know it , [Menelaüs]1269-menelaüs ) and that first day of danger to [me]4938-i was shared with [you]8371-you . It would take a long time to tell what [I]4938-i have achieved that has been useful , by stratagem and deed , in the long space of this conflict . After the first onslaught [the enemy]6372-the enemy kept inside the city walls for a long time , and there was no chance for open warfare . Finally in the tenth year [we]8373-we fought it out . What were [you]8371-you doing meanwhile , [Ajax]605-jove , [you]8371-you who only know about battles ? What use were [you]8371-you then ? If [you]8371-you ask what [I]4938-i was doing , [I]4938-i laid ambushes for [the enemy]6372-the enemy ; surrounded the defences with [a ditch]8375-a ditch ; encouraged [[our]8373-we allies]8376-our allies so that [they]8376-our allies might bear the weariness of a long campaign with patience of mind ; advised on how [we]8373-we should be fed and armed ; was sent wherever benefit required it . See , deceived by a dream in sleep , [Agamemnon]1270-agamemnon , [the king]6572-the king , commanded by [Jupiter]1273-jupiter , orders [us]8373-we to give up all concern with the war [we]8373-we have begun . [He]1270-agamemnon can justify [his]1270-agamemnon words by this dream ’s authority . Let [Ajax]605-jove prevent it , and demand that [the citadel]4525-the citadel , [Pergama]349-pergama , be destroyed , let [him]605-jove do what [he]605-jove can do , fight ! Why does [he]605-jove not restrain those who are for returning [home]2999-home ? Why does [he]605-jove not take up arms , and give a lead for [the fickle mob]8380-the fickle mob to follow ? That was not too much to ask of one who never speaks without boasting : but what of the fact that [he]605-jove fled as well ? [I]4938-i saw [you]4941-you , [Ajax]605-jove , and was ashamed to see it , when , turning [your]4941-you back , [you]4941-you readied [your]4941-you dishonourable sails . Instantly [I]4938-i shouted : ‘[4938-i] What are [you]4941-you doing ? What madness is urging [you]4941-you to abandon captured [Troy]271-troy ? What are [you]4941-you taking [home]2999-home with [you]4941-you , except disgrace ? ’ With these words , and others , in which [my]4943-i anguish made [me]4943-i eloquent , [I]4943-i turned [men]5788-men from [their]5788-men flight , and led [them]5788-men back . [Atrides]1289-atrides assembled [the allies who were quaking with fear]8382-the allies who were quaking with fear : even then [the son of [Telamon]973-telamon]4921-the son of telamon did not dare utter a thing , but even [Thersites]1290-thersites dared to attack [the kings]8384-the kings with insolent words , though not without punishment from [me]4943-i ! [I]4943-i rose to [my]4943-i feet and urged on [[my]4943-i frightened countrymen]8385-my frightened countrymen against [the enemy]6372-the enemy , and by [my]4943-i voice restored [their]8385-my frightened countrymen lost courage . From that time on , whatever bravery [this man]2515-this man can be seen to have shown , is [mine]4943-i , who dragged [him]2515-this man back when [he]2515-this man was given to flight . Next , which of [the Greeks]4756-the greeks praises [you]8389-you or seeks [you]8389-you out , [Ajax]605-jove ? Yet [Diomede]1073-diomede shares what [he]2515-this man does with [me]4943-i , supports [me]4943-i , and always trusts [Ulysses]1271-ulysses as [[his]2515-this man companion]3554-his companion . That is something , to be singled out by [Diomede]1073-diomede from [so many thousand Greeks]8391-so many thousand greeks ! No drawing of lots forced [me]4943-i to go : yet , disregarding the dangers of night and [the enemy]6372-the enemy , [I]4943-i killed [Dolon]1279-dolon , [the Phrygian]8393-the phrygian , out on the same errand as [we]8394-we were , but not before [I]4943-i had forced [him]1279-dolon to tell what [he]1279-dolon knew , and had learned what [perfidious Troy]271-troy was planning . [I]4943-i had discovered everything , and had no need to spy further , and could now return with the glory [I]4943-i sought : yet not content with that , [I]4943-i searched out [[Rhesus]1278-rhesus ’s tents]8395-rhesus ’s tents , and [I]4943-i killed [him]1278-rhesus and [[his]1278-rhesus comrades]8396-his comrades in [[their]8395-rhesus ’s tents camp]8397-their camp . And so , [a victor]8398-a victor , with what [I]4943-i prayed for achieved , as if it were a triumph , [I]4943-i rode [[his]1278-rhesus captured chariot]8399-his captured chariot . Deny [me]4943-i the arms of [Achilles]1161-achilles , whose horses [[my]4943-i enemy]6940-my enemy , [Dolon]1279-dolon , asked of [Hector]605-jove , for [his]1278-rhesus night ’s work , and let [Ajax]605-jove be more generous than [you]8401-you . Why should [I]4943-i have to mention [the ranks of [Sarpedon of [Lycia]117-lycia]8403-sarpedon of lycia cut to pieces by [my]4943-i sword]8402-the ranks of sarpedon of lycia cut to pieces by my sword ? With bloody slaughter [I]4943-i killed [Coeranos]1291-coeranos , [[Iphitus]1292-iphitus ’s son]8404-iphitus ’s son ; [Alastor]1293-alastor and [Chromius]1294-chromius ; [Alcander]1295-alcander , [Halius]1296-halius , Noëmon and [Prytanis]8405-prytanis ; and [I]4943-i dealt destruction to [Thoön]1297-thoön , [Chersidamas]1298-chersidamas , [Charopes]1299-charopes , and [Ennomos]1300-ennomos driven by inexorable fate ; and [others less well known]8406-others less well known fell to [my]4943-i hand under the walls of [the city]2547-the city . [I]4943-i have wounds , [friends]6150-friends , [honourable ones]8409-honourable ones , as [their]8409-honourable ones position shows : do not believe empty words , look ! ’[4943-i] and [he]4943-i pulled [his]4943-i tunic open with [his]4943-i hand , ‘ here is [my]4943-i breast that has always been employed in [your]8410-your actions ! But [the son of Telamon]4921-the son of telamon has shed no blood for [[his]4921-the son of telamon companions]2277-his companions , in all these years , and [his]4921-the son of telamon flesh is unwounded ! What relevance is it that [he]4921-the son of telamon declares [he]4921-the son of telamon took up arms against [the Trojans]1301-the trojans and against [Jove]605-jove ? [I]4943-i agree , [he]4921-the son of telamon did ( since [I]4943-i do not maliciously disparage [beneficial]8413-beneficial actions ) but do not let [him]4921-the son of telamon seize the honour that is shared , and let [him]4921-the son of telamon grant [you]8410-your some respect also . It was [Patroclus]1302-patroclus , [son of Actor]6593-son of actor , protected by being disguised in [Achilles]1161-achilles ’s armour , who pushed back the Trojans from [the ships]1530-the ships that would have gone up in flames , with [Ajax]605-jove , [[their]2277-his companions defender]8416-their defender . [He]4921-the son of telamon thinks that [he]4921-the son of telamon is [the only one who dared to face [Hector]605-jove ’s spear]8417-the only one who dared to face hector ’s spear , forgetting [the captains]4928-the captains and [the king]6572-the king , and [myself]4943-i : [he]4921-the son of telamon was [the ninth to volunteer , and selected by the luck of the draw]8420-the ninth to volunteer , and selected by the luck of the draw . But what was the result of [your]8410-your struggle , strongest of [men]5788-men ? [Hector]605-jove retreated without receiving a single wound . Alas , with what sadness [I]4943-i am forced to recall that time when [Achilles]1161-achilles , the defence of [Achaia]139-achaia , fell ! Yet tears , grief , fear did not prevent [my]4943-i lifting [his]1161-achilles body from [the earth]1463-the earth : [I]4943-i carried the body of [Achilles]1161-achilles over these shoulders , these very shoulders , along with the weapons , that now also [I]4943-i am anxious to carry . [I]4943-i have strength enough for such a burden , and a mind that can surely appreciate the honour . Was it for this that [[his]1161-achilles mother]5953-his mother , [the sea - goddess]8424-the sea - goddess , was so ambitious for [[her]5953-his mother son]6039-her son , that the gifts of heaven , the works of such artistry , should adorn [an ignorant and thoughtless soldier]8426-an ignorant and thoughtless soldier ? [He]1161-achilles understands nothing of the shield ’s engraving , [Ocean]362-ocean , or [earth]1449-earth , or high starry sky ; the Pleiades and [the Hyades]697-the hyades , the Bear that is always clear of [the waters]1626-the waters , and opposite , beyond [the Milky Way]10-the milky way , [Orion]997-orion , with [his]1161-achilles glittering sword . [He]1161-achilles demands to bear armour that [he]1161-achilles does not comprehend ! What of the fact that [he]1161-achilles accuses [me]4943-i of shirking the harsh duties of war , and of coming late to a labour already begun ? Does [he]1161-achilles not see that [he]1161-achilles is speaking ill of [great Achilles]1161-achilles ? If [you]8429-you call it a crime to dissimulate , [we]8430-we both dissimulated : if delay is a fault , [I]4943-i was [the earlier to arrive]8431-the earlier to arrive . [A loving wife]8432-a loving wife detained [me]4943-i , [a loving mother [Achilles]1161-achilles]8433-a loving mother achilles . [Our]8430-we priority was given to [them]8434-them , the rest to [you]8429-you . [I]4943-i hardly fear an accusation , even if [I]4943-i can not defend [myself]4943-i against it , shared with [such a man]8435-such a man : [he]1161-achilles was revealed by [Ulysses]1271-ulysses ’s cunning , but not [Ulysses]1271-ulysses by [Ajax]605-jove ’s . Let [us]8430-we not be astonished that [he]1161-achilles pours out against [me]4943-i the invective from [his]1161-achilles foolish tongue , since [he]1161-achilles reproaches [you]8429-you shamefully . Was it a disgrace for [me]4943-i to accuse [Palamades]1274-palamades on an erroneous charge , but proper for [you]8429-you to condemn [him]1161-achilles ? But then [the son of Nauplias]8436-the son of nauplias could not defend [himself]8436-the son of nauplias against so great a crime , and one so clearly proven : nor did [you]8429-you merely hear of the crime : [you]8429-you saw it , revealed by the gold [I]4943-i exposed . Nor do [I]4943-i merit being called [a criminal]8437-a criminal because [Lemnos]1275-lemnos , [Vulcan]568-vulcan ’s isle , holds [the son of [Poeas]1076-poeas]8438-the son of poeas , [Philoctetes]1075-philoctetes , ( defend [your]8429-you own actions , since [you]8429-you agreed to it ! ) but [I]4943-i will not deny that [I]4943-i persuaded [him]1161-achilles to withdraw from the hardships of war and the journey , and to try and relieve [his]1161-achilles terrible agonies in rest . [He]1161-achilles agreed – and [he]1161-achilles still lives ! Not only was [my]4943-i opinion offered in good faith , though it is enough that it was in good faith , but it turned out well . Now since [[our]8439-our seers]8440-our seers demand [his]1161-achilles presence for the destruction of [Troy]271-troy , do not commission [me]4943-i ! [[Telamon]973-telamon ’s son]8361-telamon ’s son , with [his]8361-telamon ’s son eloquence , had better go and soothe [that man]8239-that man , maddened by pain and fury , or bring [him]8239-that man by some cunning trick ! If [my]4943-i mind were idle on [your]8429-you behalf , [the River Simoïs]363-the river simoïs would flow backwards , and [Mount Ida]577-mount ida stand there leafless , and [Achaia]139-achaia help [Pergama]349-pergama , before the skill , of [foolish Ajax]8443-foolish ajax , would benefit [the Greeks]4756-the greeks . [I]4943-i would go to [you]8429-you , harsh [Philoctetes]1075-philoctetes , and try to bring [you]8429-you back with [me]4943-i , though [you]8429-you are aggressive towards [king]5915-king and [countrymen]3050-countrymen , and [myself]4943-i ; though [you]8429-you execrate [me]4943-i , and pour curses endlessly on [my]4943-i head ; and , in [your]8429-you pain , long for [me]4943-i to be given into [your]8429-you power , to drink [my]4943-i blood , and to have [your]8429-you chance at [me]4943-i , as [I]4943-i did at [you]8429-you . And [I]4943-i would gain possession of [your]8429-you arrows ( by [Fortune]570-fortune ’s favour ) , as [I]4943-i took possession of the Dardanian seer , [Helenus]1280-helenus , whom [I]4943-i captured ; as [I]4943-i revealed [the gods]1538-the gods ’[4943-i] oracles and the fate of [Troy]271-troy ; as [I]0-i stole the image of [Phrygian Minerva]1304-minerva from [the inner sanctuary]4944-the inner sanctuary , from the midst of the enemy . Does [Ajax]605-jove compare [himself]605-jove to [me]0-i ? The fates surely denied [our]4945-our capturing [Troy]271-troy without it . Where is [brave Ajax]605-jove now ? Where are [the great hero]4946-the great hero ’s mighty words ? What do [you]4947-you fear then ? Why does [Ulysses]1271-ulysses dare to go through [the sentries]4948-the sentries and commit [himself]1271-ulysses to night ; to enter not only the walls of [Troy]271-troy but also [the heights of [the citadel]4525-the citadel]4949-the heights of the citadel , past the sharp swords ; and to snatch [the goddess]5864-the goddess from [[her]5864-the goddess temple]2124-her temple , and carry [her]5864-the goddess captive through the enemy ranks ? If [I]0-i had not done it , [the son of [Telamon]973-telamon]4921-the son of telamon would have carried the seven - layered bull’s - hide shield on [his]4921-the son of telamon left arm in vain . That night the victory over [Troy]271-troy was established : [I]0-i defeated [Pergama]349-pergama then , when [I]0-i secured the possibility of [her]349-pergama defeat . [You]4947-you can stop pointing out with [your]4947-you murmurs and looks , [Ajax]605-jove , that [Diomede]1073-diomede was [[my]0-i partner]4954-my partner : [he]4954-my partner has [his]4954-my partner share of praise in this ! Nor were [you]4947-you alone , when [you]4947-you held [your]4947-you shield in defence of [the allied ships]4955-the allied ships : [you]4947-you had [a crowd of companions]4956-a crowd of companions : [I]0-i had only one . If [he]4954-my partner did not know that [a fighter]4957-a fighter is worth less than [a thinker]4958-a thinker , and that the prize is not owed merely because of an indomitable right hand , [he]4954-my partner would also claim it ; so would [the lesser Ajax]4959-the lesser ajax , [fierce Eurypylus]1306-fierce eurypylus , and [Thoas]1307-thoas , [the son of [famous Andraemon]4961-famous andraemon]4960-the son of famous andraemon , and no less surely would [Idomeneus]1308-idomeneus , and [Meriones born of [the same nation]4963-the same nation]4962-meriones born of the same nation , and [Menelaüs]1269-menelaüs , [the brother of [Agamemnon]1270-agamemnon]4964-the brother of agamemnon . In fact , [they]4965-they accept [my]0-i counsel , these strong right hands , not second to [me]0-i in battle . [Your]4966-you right hand , useful in war , needs the guidance of [my]0-i intellect . [You]4966-you have power without mind , [mine]0-i is the care for the future . [You]4966-you can fight , but Atrides , with [me]0-i , chooses the time to fight . [You]4966-you only display the flesh , [I]0-i the spirit . By as much as [he]4967-he who steers [the ship]2497-the ship is superior to [him]4967-he who rows , by as much as [the general]4969-the general exceeds [the soldier]4970-the soldier , by that much [I]0-i surpass [you]4966-you . No less is the head more powerful than the hand , in [our]4971-our body : the energy of the whole is within it . O [princes]2434-princes , grant the prize to [[your]4966-you sentry]4973-your sentry , for the many years [I]0-i have spent in anxious care , grant [me]0-i the judgement , this honour for [my]0-i services . Now [my]0-i labour is done : [I]0-i have removed fate ’s obstacles , and by making it possible to take [high Pergama]349-pergama , have taken [her]349-pergama . Now , by [our]4971-our common expectation ; by [[Troy]271-troy ’s doomed walls]4974-troy ’s doomed walls ; by the gods [I]0-i recently took from [the enemy]6372-the enemy ; by whatever else remains that needs to be done wisely ; [I]0-i pray , that if there is still some bold and dangerous thing to attempt , if [you]4966-you think that anything is yet in store involving [Troy]271-troy ’s fate , remember [me]0-i ! And if [you]4966-you do not give [me]0-i the arms , give them to [her]349-pergama ! ’ and [he]0-i pointed towards [Minerva]1304-minerva ’s fatal statue . [The council of princes]8448-the council of princes was swayed , and it shows what eloquence can do : [the gifted speaker]8449-the gifted speaker carried away the arms of [the brave hero]4784-the brave hero . [But [Ajax]605-jove , who had so often stood alone against [Hector]605-jove , against sword and flame , against [Jove]605-jove [himself]605-jove , could not stand against mere passion , and indignation conquered [the unconquerable hero]8451-the unconquerable hero]605-jove . Drawing [his]605-jove sword [he]605-jove shouted : ‘[4966-you] This is mine , at least ! Or does [Ulysses]1271-ulysses demand it for [himself]1271-ulysses ? This [I]0-i will use [myself]0-i , on [myself]0-i , and the iron so often drenched in Phrygian blood , will now be drenched in [its master]8309-its master ’s , so that none can defeat [Ajax]605-jove but [himself]605-jove . ’ [He]605-jove spoke , and drove the lethal weapon to its full extent into [his]605-jove chest , that , till then , had never felt a wound . No hand was strong enough to draw out the implanted weapon : it was the blood itself expelled it , and the bloodstained ground bore a purple flower from the green turf , that had first sprung from the wound of [the Spartan]8452-the spartan , [Hyacinthus]1130-hyacinthus . In the centre of the petals letters are inscribed , shared by [the hero]2234-the hero and [the boy]1835-the boy , one reading of them being a name , ΑΙΑΣ , and the other one , ΑΙ ΑΙ , a cry of woe . [Ulysses]1271-ulysses , [the winner]7823-the winner , set sail for [Lemnos]1275-lemnos , [the island of [Queen Hypsipyle]1309-queen hypsipyle]8456-the island of queen hypsipyle and [[her]1309-queen hypsipyle father]1694-her father the famous [Thoas]1307-thoas , [a country notorious in ancient times for the murder by [its]8458-a country notorious in ancient times for the murder by its women of their men , to bring back the arrows of tyrinthian hercules women of [[their]8458-a country notorious in ancient times for the murder by its women of their men , to bring back the arrows of tyrinthian hercules men]8459-their men , to bring back the arrows of [Tyrinthian Hercules]941-hercules]8458-a country notorious in ancient times for the murder by its women of their men , to bring back the arrows of tyrinthian hercules . When [he]1271-ulysses had brought [them]8460-them back to [the Greeks]4756-the greeks , with [Philoctetes]1075-philoctetes [[their]4756-the greeks master]2274-their master , the last hand was dealt in the long drawn - out war . [Troy]271-troy fell , and [Priam]1181-priam also . [Hecuba]1183-hecuba , [[Priam]1181-priam ’s unhappy wife]8463-priam ’s unhappy wife , when all else was lost , lost [her]1183-hecuba human form , and filled the air of [an alien country]8464-an alien country , where [the long Hellespont]331-the hellespont narrows to [a strait , with strange barking]8465-a strait , with strange barking . [Ilium]339-ilium burned ; the flames had not yet died down ; [[Jove]605-jove ’s altar]8466-jove ’s altar was soaking up old [Priam]1181-priam ’s meagre stream of blood ; and [Cassandra]1310-cassandra , [the head priestess of [Apollo]1264-sminthean apollo]8467-the head priestess of apollo , dragged along by [her]1310-cassandra hair , stretched out [her]1310-cassandra arms uselessly to the heavens . [The Dardanian women]8468-the dardanian women , embracing the statues of [[their]8468-the dardanian women nation ’s gods]8469-their nation ’s gods while [they]8468-the dardanian women still could , and thronging [the burning temples]8470-the burning temples , were snatched away by [the victorious Greeks]8471-the victorious greeks as enviable prizes . Astyanax , was thrown down from [that tower]8472-that tower , from which [he]8473-his used to see [[his]8473-his father]1775-his father , [Hector]605-jove , whom Andromache [[his]8473-his mother]5953-his mother pointed out to [him]8473-his , as [Hector]605-jove fought for [him]8473-his , and protected [the ancestral kingdom]8476-the ancestral kingdom . Now [Boreas]497-boreas , the north wind , urged [the Greeks]1188-greeks on [their]1188-greeks way , and the sails flapped in a favourable breeze . [The sailers]8477-the sailers are ordered to take advantage of the wind . [The Trojan women]8478-the trojan women wail , kissing [[their]8478-the trojan women native earth]8479-their native earth , abandoning [the burning houses]8480-the burning houses : ‘[0-i] [Troy]271-troy , farewell ! [We]4977-we are taken against [our]4977-we will . ’ [The last to embark – pitiable sight]8481-the last to embark – pitiable sight ! – was [Hecuba]1183-hecuba , found among [the tombs of [[her]1183-hecuba sons]1540-her sons]8482-the tombs of her sons . There as [she]1183-hecuba clung to [[their]8478-the trojan women graves]8484-their graves , trying to kiss [their]8478-the trojan women relics , the hands of [Dulichian Ulysses]1271-ulysses dragged [her]1183-hecuba away . Yet [she]1183-hecuba emptied one sepulchre , and carried away with [her]1183-hecuba , at [her]1183-hecuba breast , [Hector]605-jove ’s ashes from the emptied urn . And on [[Hector]605-jove ’s grave]8485-hector ’s grave [she]1183-hecuba left a scant offering to the dead , shreds of [her]1183-hecuba grey hair , hair and tears . There is [a country opposite [Phrygia]176-phrygia]8486-a country opposite phrygia , where [Troy]271-troy stood , that [the Bistones]1311-the bistones inhabit : [[Polymestor]1312-polymestor ’s wealthy court]8487-polymestor ’s wealthy court was there , to whom [Priam]1181-priam [[your]8488-you father]1808-your father secretly sent [you]8488-you , [Polydorus]1313-polydorus , to be reared away from the Phrygian war : a wise plan if [he]1808-your father had not sent great riches with [you]8488-you , a reward for [the criminal]8490-the criminal , a temptation to the greedy spirit . When [Phrygia]176-phrygia ’s fortunes waned , [the impious king of [Thrace]111-thrace]8491-the impious king of thrace took [his]8491-the impious king of thrace sword and stabbed [[his]8491-the impious king of thrace young foster child]8492-his young foster child in the throat , and threw the body from [a cliff]6426-a cliff into [the sea]1464-the sea , as if murder could be eliminated with the corpse . [Agamemnon]1270-agamemnon had moored [[his]1270-agamemnon fleet]7289-his fleet on [a Thracian beach]8496-a thracian beach until [the sea]1464-the sea calmed , and the winds were kinder . Here , suddenly the ghost of [Achilles]1161-achilles appeared from [a broad fissure in [the earth]1463-the earth]8498-a broad fissure in the earth , as large as [he]1161-achilles used to be in life . [He]1161-achilles appeared as on the day when , with threatening face , and sword in hand , [he]1161-achilles fiercely challenged [Agamemnon]1270-agamemnon ’s injustice . ‘[4978-you] [You]4978-you depart , then , [Achaeans]8286-achaeans , forgetting [me]0-i , and gratitude for [my]0-i courage is buried with [me]0-i ! ’ [he]0-i cried , ‘[4978-you] Do not let it be so ! Let [Polyxena]1314-polyxena be sacrificed , so that [[my]0-i tomb]4025-my tomb is not without its honours . Appease [Achilles]1161-achilles ’s shade ! ’ [He]0-i spoke , and , [[his]0-i countrymen]8500-his countrymen obeyed [the pitiless ghost]8501-the pitiless ghost . Now , [she]8501-the pitiless ghost was torn from [[her]8501-the pitiless ghost mother]5866-her mother ’s arms , and [the girl]1792-the girl , almost Hecuba ’s only comfort , ill - fated , but with more than [a woman]1994-a woman ’s courage , was led to [the burial mound]8505-the burial mound and became [a victim of the dread grave]8506-a victim of the dread grave . [She]8501-the pitiless ghost remembered who [she]8501-the pitiless ghost was , set before the brutal altar , knowing the savage rite was readied for [her]8501-the pitiless ghost , and when [she]8501-the pitiless ghost saw [Neoptolemus]1315-neoptolemus standing , gripping [his]1315-neoptolemus sword , [his]1315-neoptolemus eyes gazing at [her]8501-the pitiless ghost face , [she]8501-the pitiless ghost said : ‘[1161-achilles] Now , shed noble blood , nothing prevents [you]4981-you : but sheathe [your]4981-you sword in [my]0-i throat or in [my]0-i breast , ’ and [she]8501-the pitiless ghost uncovered both [her]8501-the pitiless ghost throat and [her]8501-the pitiless ghost breast , ‘[4981-you] [Polyxena]1314-polyxena , for certain , has no desire to be slave to [any man]7064-any man ! [No god]2356-no god will be appeased by such a rite as this ! [I]0-i only wish [my]0-i death could be unknown to [[my]0-i mother]2965-my mother : [[my]0-i mother]2965-my mother weakens and lessens [my]0-i joy in death , though it is not [my]0-i dying but [her]2965-my mother living that is terrible . Now , move away , [you]4986-you , so that if [my]0-i request is lawful , [I]0-i may not be hindered in going to [the Stygian shades]4987-the stygian shades : and take the hands of [man from virgin flesh]4988-man from virgin flesh ! [My]0-i free blood will be more acceptable to [him]4989-him , whoever [he]4989-him is , whom [you]4986-you are trying to appease with [my]0-i murder . If [my]0-i last words still move any of [you]4986-you ( [The daughter of [Priam]1181-priam]4990-the daughter of priam asks it , not [a prisoner]4991-a prisoner ) return [my]0-i body to [[my]0-i mother]2965-my mother without ransom : let [her]2965-my mother pay for the sad privilege of burying [me]0-i , not with gold , but with tears ! When [she]2965-my mother could do so , [she]2965-my mother paid in gold as well ’ [She]2965-my mother spoke , and [the crowd]2430-the crowd could not restrain tears that [she]2965-my mother restrained . Then [the priest]6252-the priest , also weeping , and against [his]6252-the priest will , driving [his]6252-the priest sword home , pierced the breast [she]2965-my mother offered up . [Her]2965-my mother knees gave way , and [she]2965-my mother sank to the ground , keeping [her]2965-my mother look of fearless courage to the end . Even then , as [she]2965-my mother fell , [she]2965-my mother was careful to hide the parts that should be hidden , and to protect the honour of [her]2965-my mother chaste modesty . [The Trojan women]8478-the trojan women lift [her]2965-my mother body , counting over [the lamented children of [Priam]1181-priam]8510-the lamented children of priam , and recounting how much blood [one house]5835-one house has surrendered . [They]8478-the trojan women weep for [you]8512-you , [girl]5901-girl , and for [you]8512-you , [Hecuba]1183-hecuba , who were lately called [the royal wife]8514-the royal wife , [the royal parent]8515-the royal parent , the image of [bright Asia]163-asia , now in evil circumstances , even for [a prisoner]4991-a prisoner , whom [victorious Ulysses]1271-ulysses would not have wanted , except for the fact that [you]8512-you had given birth to [Hector]605-jove : [a partner for [[his]605-jove mother]5953-his mother that [Hector]605-jove would scarcely have imagined]8517-a partner for his mother that hector would scarcely have imagined ! Embracing the body of [Polyxena]1314-polyxena , now empty of that brave spirit , [she]1314-polyxena sheds the tears for [her]1314-polyxena that [she]1314-polyxena has shed so often for [[her]1314-polyxena husband]5872-her husband , [sons]5799-sons and [country]8521-country . [She]1314-polyxena pours [her]1314-polyxena tears over [[her]1314-polyxena daughter]6750-her daughter ’s wound , covers [her]1314-polyxena lips with kisses , and beats at [her]1314-polyxena own bruised breast . Then , tearing at [her]1314-polyxena white hair caked with blood , and plucking at [her]1314-polyxena breast , [she]1314-polyxena said this amongst other things : ‘[2965-my mother] [Child]6077-child – since , what else is left [me]0-i ? – [[your]6077-child mother]1807-your mother ’s last grief , [Child]1317-child , [you]6077-child lie there , and [I]0-i see [your]6077-child wound , that is [my]0-i wound . Look , [you]6077-child also have [your]6077-child wound , so that [I]0-i might lose none of [[my]0-i children]3004-my children without bloodshed . Because [you]6077-child were [a woman]1994-a woman , [I]0-i thought [you]6077-child safe from the sword : yet , [a woman]1994-a woman , [you]6077-child have died by the sword : and [that same Achilles who has ruined [Troy]271-troy and made [me]0-i childless , who has destroyed so many of [[your]6077-child brothers]4999-your brothers]4998-that same achilles who has ruined troy and made me childless , who has destroyed so many of your brothers , has killed [you]6077-child in the same way . Yet when [he]4998-that same achilles who has ruined troy and made me childless , who has destroyed so many of your brothers fell to the arrow of [Paris]1187-paris , and [Phoebus]519-phoebus , [I]0-i said : “ Now surely , [Achilles]1161-achilles is no longer to be feared . ” Yet even then [I]0-i still needed to fear [him]4998-that same achilles who has ruined troy and made me childless , who has destroyed so many of your brothers . [His]4998-that same achilles who has ruined troy and made me childless , who has destroyed so many of your brothers very ashes in [the tomb]2552-the tomb are hostile to [[our]5001-our race]1673-our race : even in the grave [we]5001-our feel [his]4998-that same achilles who has ruined troy and made me childless , who has destroyed so many of your brothers enmity : [I]0-i gave birth for [the Aeacidae]250-the aeacidae ! [Mighty Ilium]367-mighty ilium is in the dust , and , in a grievous outcome , [our]5001-our ruined State is ended . But still , it ended : in [me]0-i , only , [Pergama]349-pergama remains . [My]0-i grief still takes it course . A moment ago [I]0-i was endowed with the greatest things , so many [sons]5799-sons and [daughters]2264-daughters , [sons - in - law]5005-sons - in - law , and [daughters - in - law]5006-daughters - in - law , and [[my]0-i husband]6062-my husband . Now , exiled , destitute , torn from [the tombs of [[my]0-i loved ones]5009-my loved ones]5008-the tombs of my loved ones , [I]0-i am dragged off as a prize , to serve [Penelope]1028-penelope . [She]1028-penelope will point [me]0-i out to [the women of [Ithaca]368-ithaca]5010-the women of ithaca , as [I]0-i spin the wool [she]1028-penelope gives [me]0-i , and say : “ This is [the famous mother of [Hector]605-jove]5011-the famous mother of hector , this is [[Priam]1181-priam ’s queen]5012-priam ’s queen . ” Now [you]0-i , [Polyxena]1314-polyxena , after so many have been lost , [you]0-i , who were the only one left to comfort [[your]0-i mother]1807-your mother ’s grief , have been sacrificed on [an enemy tomb]5014-an enemy tomb ! [I]0-i have borne offerings for [the enemy dead]5015-the enemy dead ! Why do [I]0-i remain , unyielding ? Why do [I]0-i linger [here]6115-here ? Why do [you]0-i preserve [me]0-i , wrinkled old age ? Why prolong [an old woman]2330-an old woman ’s life , cruel gods , unless it is for [me]0-i to view more funerals ? Who would have thought [Priam]1181-priam could be happy when [Pergama]349-pergama has fallen ? Yet [he]1181-priam is happy , in death ! [He]1181-priam did not see [you]0-i killed , [daughter]5903-daughter , but left [[his]1181-priam kingdom]1964-his kingdom and [his]1181-priam life together . Do [I]0-i imagine [you]0-i will be endowed with funereal splendour , and [your]0-i body laid to rest in [the ancestral tomb]5020-the ancestral tomb ? That is not [[our]5021-our house]5022-our house ’s fate ! [[Your]0-i mother]1807-your mother ’s tears will be [your]0-i funeral gift , and the wastes of foreign sand . [I]0-i have lost everything : now [an only child]5024-an only child is left , once [the youngest son of [[my]0-i family]5026-my family , [[his]5024-an only child mother]5953-his mother ’s dearest]5025-the youngest son of my family , his mother ’s dearest , a reason to endure life for a brief space of time , [Polydorus]1313-polydorus , sent to [these shores]5028-these shores , to [the Ismarian king]5029-the ismarian king . But why do [I]0-i delay , meanwhile , the cleansing of [your]0-i cruel wound with water , [your]0-i face spattered with drops of blood ? ’ [She]1807-your mother spoke , and went to [the shore]2065-the shore , with the stumbling steps of [an old woman]2330-an old woman , tearing at [her]2330-an old woman white hair . ‘[0-i] Give [me]0-i an urn , [women of [Troy]271-troy]5030-women of troy ! ’ said [the unhappy mother]8525-the unhappy mother , wanting to draw water from [the sea]1464-the sea . There , [she]8525-the unhappy mother saw [Polydorus]1313-polydorus ’s body , thrown on [the beach]3773-the beach , covered with open wounds made by Thracian spears . [The Trojan women]8478-the trojan women cried out , but [she]8525-the unhappy mother was dumb with grief . The grief itself obliterated both [her]8525-the unhappy mother powers of speech and the tears welling inside , and [she]8525-the unhappy mother stood unmoving like solid rock , at one moment with [her]8525-the unhappy mother gaze fixed on the ground , the next lifting [her]8525-the unhappy mother face grimly towards the sky . Now [she]8525-the unhappy mother looked at [[her]8525-the unhappy mother dead son]8529-her dead son ’s face , now at [his]8529-her dead son wounds , mostly at [his]8529-her dead son wounds , awakening a growing anger in [herself]8525-the unhappy mother . Then it blazed out , and [she]8525-the unhappy mother , as if [she]8525-the unhappy mother were still [a queen]2859-a queen , determined on vengeance , [her]8525-the unhappy mother whole mind filled with thoughts of punishment . [Hecuba]1183-hecuba , [her]8525-the unhappy mother grief mixed with anger , forgetting [her]8525-the unhappy mother age , but not forgetting [her]8525-the unhappy mother rage , like a lioness maddened by the theft of [her]8525-the unhappy mother unweaned cub , that , though [she]8525-the unhappy mother can not see [[her]8525-the unhappy mother enemy]8531-her enemy , follows the traces [she]8525-the unhappy mother finds of [his]8529-her dead son footsteps , found [her]8525-the unhappy mother way to the author of the dreadful crime , [Polymestor]1312-polymestor . [She]8525-the unhappy mother made out that [she]8525-the unhappy mother wanted to show [him]8529-her dead son a secret hoard of gold , to be given to [[her]8525-the unhappy mother son]6039-her son . [The Thracian]8533-the thracian believed [her]8525-the unhappy mother , and with [his]8533-the thracian usual desire for gain , came with [her]8525-the unhappy mother secretly . Then with smooth and cunning words , [he]8533-the thracian said : ‘[0-i] Do not delay , [Hecuba]1183-hecuba : give [me]0-i [your]1183-hecuba gift to [[your]1183-hecuba son]2646-your son ! It will all be for [him]2646-your son , both what [you]1183-hecuba give and what was given before , [I]0-i swear by [the gods]1538-the gods . ’ [She]8525-the unhappy mother gazed at [him]8533-the thracian , grimly , as [he]8533-the thracian spoke and swore [his]8533-the thracian lying oath , until , [her]8525-the unhappy mother seething anger boiling over , [she]8525-the unhappy mother called on [[her]8525-the unhappy mother train of captive women]8534-her train of captive women to attack [the man]5875-the man , and drove [her]8525-the unhappy mother nails into [his]5875-the man deceitful eyes , and ( made strong by anger ) tore the eyeballs from their sockets , and dipped [her]8525-the unhappy mother hand , and drank , stained with [his]5875-the man sinful blood , not from [his]5875-the man eyes ( nothing of them remained ) but from the holes that were [his]5875-the man eyes . [The Thracians]1319-the thracians , enraged by the murder of [[their]1319-the thracians king]1555-their king , attacked [the Trojan woman]8537-the trojan woman , hurling stones and missiles , but [she]8525-the unhappy mother chased the stones [they]1319-the thracians threw , snapping at [them]1319-the thracians with a harsh growling , and , readying [her]8525-the unhappy mother jaws for words , barked when [she]8525-the unhappy mother tried to speak . [The place]1552-the place is still there , and takes [its]1552-the place name , [Cynossema]369-cynossema , [the Monument of [the Bitch]8540-the bitch]8539-the monument of the bitch , from this , and [she]8525-the unhappy mother still howls mournfully amongst [the Sithonian fields]8541-the sithonian fields , remembering endlessly [her]8525-the unhappy mother ancient suffering . [Her]8525-the unhappy mother fate moved [the Trojans]4754-the trojans and [[her]8525-the unhappy mother enemies]2729-her enemies [the Greeks]4756-the greeks , and it moved [all the gods]1558-all the gods as well , yes , all , so that even [Juno]525-juno , [[Jove]605-jove ’s sister - wife]8546-jove ’s sister - wife , said that [Hecuba]1183-hecuba did not merit such misfortune . But [Aurora]569-aurora had no time for being moved by the fall and ruin of [Hecuba]1183-hecuba and [Troy]271-troy , though [she]569-aurora had aided its defence . A closer sorrow , and a private grief tormented [her]569-aurora , the loss of [[her]569-aurora son]6039-her son [Memnon]1320-memnon , whom [she]569-aurora , [[his]6039-her son bright mother]8548-his bright mother , had seen wasted by [Achilles]1161-achilles ’s spear on [the Phrygian plain]8549-the phrygian plain . [She]569-aurora saw it , and that colour , that reddens the dawn , paled , and the sky was covered with cloud . [[His]6039-her son mother]5953-his mother could not bear to look at [his]6039-her son body laid on the summit of [the funeral pyre]8551-the funeral pyre , but with dishevelled hair , just as [she]569-aurora was , [she]569-aurora did not scorn to fall at the feet of [mighty Jove]605-jove , adding tears to these words : ‘[0-i] [I]0-i am the least of all , whom the golden heavens hold ( since temples to [me]0-i are the rarest in all [the world]1448-the world ) , yet [I]0-i come as [a goddess]6068-a goddess : though not that [you]5035-you might give [me]0-i sanctuaries , or sacred days , or altars to flame with sacrificial fires . Yet if [you]5035-you considered what [I]0-i , as [a woman]1994-a woman , do for [you]5035-you , when each new dawn [I]0-i keep the borders of night , [you]5035-you would think to give [me]0-i some reward . But that is not [my]0-i care , nor [Aurora]569-aurora ’s errand , to ask for well - merited honours . [I]0-i come bereft of [my]0-i Memnon , who bore arms bravely , but in vain , for [[his]0-i uncle]2445-his uncle [Priam]1181-priam , and in [his]0-i youth has fallen to [mighty Achilles]1161-achilles ( so [you]5035-you willed ) . [I]0-i beg [you]5035-you to grant [him]0-i some honour , as a solace for [his]0-i death , [great king of [the gods]1538-the gods]5038-great king of the gods , and lessen [a mother]5881-a mother ’s wound ! ’ [Jupiter]1273-jupiter nodded , while [[Memnon]1320-memnon ’s steep pyre]8552-memnon ’s steep pyre collapsed in leaping flames , and the daylight was stained with columns of black smoke , like the river - fog [the naiad]2361-the naiad breathes out , that does not admit the light beneath it . Dark ashes flew upwards , and gathering into a ball and solidifying , they formed a shape , and it drew life and heat from the fire ( its own lightness giving it wings ) . At first resembling a bird , then a true bird , it clapped its wings , and innumerable [sisters , sprung from the same natal source]8554-sisters , sprung from the same natal source , sounded too . Three times [they]8555-they circled [the pyre]8556-the pyre , and three times [their]8555-they clamour rose in the air in consonance , on the fourth flight [the flock]8557-the flock divided . Then in [two separate fierce bands]8558-two separate fierce bands [they]8555-they made war , wielding beaks and hooked talons in rage , wearying wing and breast in the struggle . Remembering [they]8555-they were sprung from [a brave hero]8559-a brave hero , [they]8555-they fell as offerings to the buried ashes of [[their]8555-they kinsman]8560-their kinsman ’s body . The source of [these suddenly created birds]8561-these suddenly created birds gave [them]8555-they [his]8559-a brave hero name : from [him]8559-a brave hero [they]8555-they were called [the Memnonides]8562-the memnonides : and when the sun has transited [his]8559-a brave hero twelve signs , [they]8555-they war and die again in ritual festival . And so , while [others]5836-others wept to witness [Hecuba]1183-hecuba ’s baying , [Aurora]569-aurora was intent on [her]569-aurora own grief , and even now [she]569-aurora sheds tears , and wets [the whole world]1451-the whole world with dew . Yet the fates did not allow [Troy]271-troy ’s destiny , also , to be overthrown with [her]569-aurora walls . [Aeneas]1321-aeneas , [[Cytherean Venus]523-venus ’s heroic son]8565-cytherean venus ’s heroic son , carried away on [his]1321-aeneas shoulders [her]569-aurora sacred icons , and bore [[his]1321-aeneas father]1775-his father , another sacred and venerable burden . [He]1321-aeneas dutifully chose that prize from all [his]1321-aeneas riches , and [[his]1321-aeneas son]1773-his son Ascanius , and carried over [the sea]1464-the sea in [[his]1321-aeneas exiled fleet]8569-his exiled fleet , [he]1321-aeneas left [[Antandros]370-antandros ’s harbour]8570-antandros ’s harbour , and [the sinful thresholds of [Thrace]111-thrace]8571-the sinful thresholds of thrace , and the soil drenched in [Polydorus]1313-polydorus ’s blood , and riding the favourable winds and tides , [he]1321-aeneas came with [[his]1321-aeneas company of [friends]6150-friends]8572-his company of friends , to [the city of [Apollo]519-phoebus on [Delos]897-delos]8574-the city of apollo on delos . [Anius]1322-anius , who ruled [the people]5829-the people , and worshipped [Phoebus]519-phoebus , with the proper ritual , as [high priest]8576-high priest , received [him]1322-anius in [palace]8577-palace and [temple]8578-temple . [He]1322-anius showed [him]1322-anius [the city]2547-the city , [the famous sanctuary]8580-the famous sanctuary , and the two trees to which [Latona]895-latona clung when [she]895-latona gave birth . [They]5829-the people gave incense to the flames , poured wine onto the incense , and , in accord with custom , burned the entrails of slaughtered oxen , and then sought out [the royal palace]2303-the royal palace , where reclining on high couches , [they]5829-the people ate the gifts of [Ceres]689-ceres , and drank the wine of [Bacchus]682-bacchus . Then virtuous [Anchises]1101-anchises said : ‘[5041-o chosen priest of phoebus] [O chosen priest of [Phoebus]519-phoebus]5041-o chosen priest of phoebus , am [I]0-i wrong , or do [I]0-i not remember that [you]5041-o chosen priest of phoebus had [a son]5939-a son and [four daughters]5043-four daughters , when [I]0-i first saw [[your]5041-o chosen priest of phoebus city]6143-your city ? ’ Shaking [his]0-i head , bound with its white sacrificial fillets , [Anius]1322-anius replied sadly : ‘[5045-mightiest of heroes] [Mightiest of [heroes]4115-heroes]5045-mightiest of heroes , [you]5041-o chosen priest of phoebus are not wrong : [you]5041-o chosen priest of phoebus saw [me]0-i [the father of five children]5047-the father of five children , whom now [you]5041-o chosen priest of phoebus see almost bereft . What is the use of [[my]0-i absent son]5048-my absent son , who holds [the island of [Andros]246-andros]5049-the island of andros , that takes [its]5049-the island of andros name from [him]5048-my absent son , and rules it in [[[his]5048-my absent son father]1775-his father ’s place]5051-his father ’s place ? [Delian Apollo]851-delian apollo gave [him]5048-my absent son the power of prophecy . [Bacchus Liber]682-bacchus gave [[my]0-i female offspring]5052-my female offspring other gifts , greater than those [they]5052-my female offspring hoped or prayed for . All that [[my]0-i daughter]5934-my daughter ’s touched turned into corn or wine or the grey - green olives of [Minerva]1304-minerva , and employing [them]5054-them was profitable . When [Agamemnon]1270-agamemnon , [son of Atreus]5055-son of atreus , [ravager of [Troy]271-troy]5056-ravager of troy , learned of this ( so that [you]5057-you do not think [we]5058-we escaped all knowledge of [your]5057-you destructive storm ) [he]1270-agamemnon used armed force to snatch [[my]0-i unwilling daughters]5059-my unwilling daughters from [a father]5997-a father ’s arms , and ordered [them]5059-my unwilling daughters to feed the Greek fleet , using [their]5059-my unwilling daughters gift from heaven . [Each]6651-each escaped where [they]5059-my unwilling daughters could . [Two]5062-two made for [Euboea]282-euboea , and two for [[their]5062-two brother]6046-their brother [’s island of [Andros]246-andros]246-andros . [The army]2244-the army landed and threatened war unless [they]2244-the army were given up . Fear overcame brotherly affection , and [he]6046-their brother surrendered [his]6046-their brother blood - kin . It is possible to forgive [the cowardly brother]5065-the cowardly brother , since [Aeneas]1321-aeneas and [Hector]605-jove , thanks to whom [you]5066-you held out till the tenth year , were not here to defend [Andros]246-andros . Now [they]2244-the army were readying the chains for [the prisoners]5067-the prisoners ’ arms . [They]2244-the army , while [their]2244-the army arms were free , stretched them out to the sky , saying : “ [Bacchus]682-bacchus , [father]5922-father , bring [your]5922-father aid ! ” and [he]6046-their brother , who granted [their]2244-the army gifts , helped [them]2244-the army – if [you]5066-you call it help for [them]2244-the army to lose in some strange way [their]2244-the army human form , for [I]2244-the army could not discover by what process [they]2244-the army lost it , nor can [I]2244-the army describe it . The end of this misfortune [I]2244-the army did observe : [they]2244-the army took wing , and became snow - white doves , the birds of [[your]5066-you goddess]2987-your goddess - wife [Anchises]1101-anchises , [Venus]523-venus . ’[2244-the army] After [they]5068-they had filled the time with these and other matters , [they]5068-they left the table and retired to sleep , and rising with the dawn , [they]5068-they went to [the oracle of [Phoebus]519-phoebus]5069-the oracle of phoebus , who ordered [them]5068-they to seek [[their]5068-they ancient mother]5070-their ancient mother , and [[their]5068-they ancestral shores]5071-their ancestral shores . [The king]6572-the king gave [them]5068-they parting gifts and escorted [them]5068-they on [their]5068-they way : a sceptre for [Anchises]1101-anchises , a cloak and quiver for [[his]6572-the king grandson]6475-his grandson , [Ascanius]1323-ascanius , and a drinking - bowl for [Aeneas]1321-aeneas , that [Therses of Thebes]693-thebes , [a friend]5954-a friend , had sent , from [the Aonian coast]5075-the aonian coast , to [the king]6572-the king : [Therses]693-thebes had given it , but it was made by [Alcon of Hyle]1324-alcon of hyle , who had engraved it with a complete story . There was [a city]3751-a city , and [you]5078-you could see [its]3751-a city seven gates : these served to name [it]3751-a city , and tell [you]5078-you that [it]3751-a city was [Thebes]89-thebes . In front of [the city]2547-the city funeral rites , sepulchres , funeral pyres , and fires , and [women with naked breasts and streaming hair]5080-women with naked breasts and streaming hair , depicted mourning . [Nymphs]5815-nymphs , also , appeared weeping , and lamenting [their]5815-nymphs dried - up fountains : the trees stood bare and leafless : goats nibbled the dry gravel . See here , in the midst of [Thebes]89-thebes [he]6572-the king portrays [[Orion]997-orion ’s daughters]5082-orion ’s daughters , [the one]1688-the one , more than [a woman]1994-a woman , slashing [her]1688-the one unprotected throat , [the other]1689-the other stabbing a weapon into [her]1688-the one valiant breast , falling on behalf of [[their]5082-orion ’s daughters people]5086-their people , then carried in glorious funeral procession through [the city]2547-the city , and burned among [crowds of [mourners]5089-mourners]5088-crowds of mourners . Then [two youths]5090-two youths , famous as [the Coroni]5091-the coroni , spring from the virgin ashes , so that the race will not die , and lead the cortège containing [[their]5090-two youths mother]1928-their mother ’s remains . Such was the ancient bronze with its gleaming designs : round the rim gilded acanthus leaves were embossed . [The Trojans]4754-the trojans gave gifts in return , worth no less : an incense - box for [the priest]6252-the priest , a libation - saucer , and a crown shining with gold and jewels . From there , remembering that [they]4754-the trojans , [the Teucrians]1325-the teucrians , came originally from the blood of [Teucer]1284-teucer , [they]4754-the trojans made for [[his]1284-teucer Crete]5095-his crete . But , unable to endure [Jove]605-jove ’s plague , [they]4754-the trojans left [Crete]88-crete with [[its]88-crete hundred cities]5096-its hundred cities , hoping to reach [the harbours of [Ausonian Italy]373-ausonian italy]5097-the harbours of ausonian italy . Tempests raged , and tossed [the heroes]7406-the heroes on stormy seas , and taking refuge in [the treacherous harbour of [the Strophades]374-the strophades]5099-the treacherous harbour of the strophades , [they]4754-the trojans were terrified by the harpy , [Aëllo]664-aëllo . Now [they]4754-the trojans were carried past [[Dulichium]375-dulichium ’s anchorage]5100-dulichium ’s anchorage ; past [Same]376-same , and [the houses of [Neritos]377-neritos]5101-the houses of neritos ; and [Ithaca]368-ithaca , [cunning [Ulysses]1271-ulysses ’s kingdom]5102-cunning ulysses ’s kingdom . [They]4754-the trojans saw [Ambracia]379-ambracia , famous now for [[its]379-ambracia Apollo of [Actium]381-actium]380-its apollo of actium , once contended over by [quarreling gods]5103-quarreling gods ; and saw the image of [the judge who was turned to stone]5104-the judge who was turned to stone ; [[Dodona]253-dodona ’s land]5105-dodona ’s land with [its]379-ambracia oracular oaks ; and [[Chaonia]382-chaonia ’s bay]5106-chaonia ’s bay , where [the sons of [Munichus]1326-munichus]5107-the sons of munichus , [the Molossian king]5108-the molossian king , escaped the impious flames on new - found wings . Next [they]4754-the trojans headed for [the country of [the Phaeacians , set with rich orchards]5110-the phaeacians , set with rich orchards , and touched at [Buthrotus]383-buthrotus in [Epirus]266-epirus]5109-the country of the phaeacians , set with rich orchards , and touched at buthrotus in epirus , [a miniature [Troy]271-troy , ruled by [Helenus]1280-helenus , [the Trojan seer]5112-the trojan seer]5111-a miniature troy , ruled by helenus , the trojan seer . From [there]1878-there , certain of [their]4754-the trojans future , all of which [Helenus]1280-helenus , [[Priam]1181-priam ’s son]8290-priam ’s son predicted , with reliable warnings , [they]4754-the trojans entered [Sicilian waters]5115-sicilian waters . [Three tongues of [this land]4157-this land]5116-three tongues of this land run down into [the sea]1464-the sea . Of [these Pachynos]5119-these pachynos faces the rainy south , [Lilybaeon]384-lilybaeon fronts the soft western breeze , and [Peloros]385-peloros looks to the northern Bears that never touch the waves . Here [the Teucrians]1325-the teucrians came , and rowing , with a favourable tide , [[their]4754-the trojans fleet]5120-their fleet reached [the sandy beach of [Zancle]386-zancle]5121-the sandy beach of zancle , as night fell . [Scylla]988-scylla attacks from [the right - hand coast]5122-the right - hand coast , restless [Charybdis]929-charybdis from the left . [The latter]5123-the latter sucks down and spits out ships [she]988-scylla has caught : the former has a girdle of savage dogs round [her]988-scylla dark belly . [She]988-scylla has [a girl]1995-a girl ’s face , and if the tales of [poets]5125-poets are not all false , [she]988-scylla was once [a girl]1995-a girl also . [Many suitors]2721-many suitors wooed [her]988-scylla , whom [she]988-scylla rejected , and [she]988-scylla would go and tell [the ocean nymphs]6540-the ocean nymphs , being well loved by [the ocean nymphs]6540-the ocean nymphs , of the thwarted desires of [young men]2267-young men . Once while [Galatea]1327-galatea let [Scylla]988-scylla comb [her]1327-galatea hair , [she]1327-galatea addressed these words to [her]988-scylla , sighing often : ‘ At least , O [virgin Scylla]988-scylla , [you]988-scylla are not wooed by [a relentless breed of men]8584-a relentless breed of men : and [you]988-scylla can reject [them]8584-a relentless breed of men without fear , as [you]988-scylla do . But [I]1327-galatea , whose father is [Nereus]505-nereus , and whose mother is sea - green [Doris]559-doris , [I]1327-galatea , though protected by [a crowd of [sisters]1823-sisters]8585-a crowd of sisters , was not allowed to flee the love of [Polyphemus]1328-polyphemus , [the Cyclops]8587-the cyclops , except through sorrow ’[1327-galatea] , and tears stopped the sound of [her]1327-galatea voice . When [the girl]1792-the girl had wiped away the tears with [her]1792-the girl white fingers , and [the goddess]5864-the goddess was comforted , [she]1327-galatea said : ‘ Tell [me]1327-galatea , [O dearest one]8588-o dearest one : do not hide the cause of [your]8588-o dearest one sadness ( [I]1327-galatea can be so trusted ) ’[1327-galatea] [The Nereid]5133-the nereid answered [[Crateis]1329-crateis ’s daughter]5134-crateis ’s daughter in these words : ‘ [Acis]1330-acis was [the son of [Faunus]905-faunus]8589-the son of faunus and [the nymph Symaethis]8590-the nymph symaethis , a great delight to [[his]1330-acis father]1775-his father and [mother]1809-mother , but more so even to [me]1327-galatea , since [he]1330-acis and [I]1327-galatea alone were united . [He]1330-acis was handsome , and having marked [his]1330-acis sixteenth birthday , a faint down covered [his]1330-acis tender cheeks . [I]1327-galatea sought [him]1330-acis , [the Cyclops]8587-the cyclops sought [me]1327-galatea , endlessly . If [you]8594-you asked , [I]1327-galatea could not say which was stronger in [me]1327-galatea , hatred of [Cyclops]679-cyclops or love of [Acis]1330-acis , both of [them]8595-them were equally strong . Oh ! [Gentle Venus]1331-venus , how powerful [your]8594-you rule is over [us]8596-us ! How [that ruthless creature , terrifying even to [the woods]1690-the woods [themselves]1690-the woods , whom [no stranger]8599-no stranger has ever seen with impunity , who scorns [mighty Olympus]12-olympus and its gods]8597-that ruthless creature , terrifying even to the woods themselves , whom no stranger has ever seen with impunity , who scorns mighty olympus and its gods , how [he]1330-acis feels what love is , and , on fire , captured by powerful desire , forgets [his]1330-acis flocks and caves . Now [Polyphemus]1328-polyphemus , [you]1328-polyphemus care for [your]1328-polyphemus appearance , and are anxious to please , now [you]1328-polyphemus comb [your]1328-polyphemus bristling hair with a rake , and are pleased to cut [your]1328-polyphemus shaggy beard with a reaping hook , and to gaze at [your]1328-polyphemus savage face in the water and compose its expression . [Your]1328-polyphemus love of killing , [your]1328-polyphemus fierceness , and [your]1328-polyphemus huge thirst for blood , end , and [the ships]1530-the ships come and go in safety . Meanwhile , [Telemus]1332-telemus the augur , [Telemus]1332-telemus , [the son of Eurymus , whom no flight of birds]8601-the son of eurymus , whom no flight of birds could deceive , came to [Sicilian Mount Aetna]1333-aetna , addressed [grim Polyphemus]1328-polyphemus , and said : “ [Ulysses]1271-ulysses will take from [you]1328-polyphemus , that single eye in the middle of [your]1328-polyphemus forehead . ” [He]1328-polyphemus laughed , and answered : “ [O most foolish of seers]8602-o most foolish of seers , [you]1328-polyphemus are wrong , another , [a girl]1995-a girl , has already taken it . ” So [he]1328-polyphemus scorned the true warning , given in vain , and weighed [the coast]8604-the coast down , walking with giant tread , or returned weary to [[his]1328-polyphemus dark cave]8605-his dark cave . [A wedge - shaped hillside]8606-a wedge - shaped hillside , ending in a long spur , projects into [the sea]1464-the sea ( the waves of [the ocean]1657-the ocean wash round [it]8606-a wedge - shaped hillside on both sides ) . The fierce Cyclops climbed to [it]8606-a wedge - shaped hillside , and sat at [its]8606-a wedge - shaped hillside apex , and [his]1328-polyphemus woolly flocks , [shepherd - less]8609-shepherd - less , followed . Then laying at [his]1328-polyphemus feet the pine trunk [he]1328-polyphemus used as a staff , fit to carry [a ship]1871-a ship ’s rigging , [he]1328-polyphemus lifted [his]1328-polyphemus panpipes made of a hundred reeds . [The whole mountain]8611-the whole mountain felt the pastoral notes , and the waves felt them too . Hidden by [a rock]8612-a rock , [I]1327-galatea was lying in [my]1327-galatea Acis ’s arms , and [my]1327-galatea ears caught these words , and , having heard them , [I]1327-galatea remembered : ’[1327-galatea] ‘ [Galatea]1327-galatea , whiter than the snowy privet petals , taller than slim alder , more flowery than [the meadows]1886-the meadows , friskier than [a tender kid]8614-a tender kid , more radiant than crystal , smoother than the shells , polished , by the endless tides ; more welcome than the summer shade , or the sun in winter , showier than the tall plane - tree , fleeter than the hind ; more than ice sparkling , sweeter than grapes ripening , softer than the swan’s - down , or the milk when curdled , lovelier , if [you]8615-you did not flee , than [a watered garden]8616-a watered garden . [Galatea]1327-galatea , likewise , wilder than an untamed heifer , harder than an ancient oak , trickier than [the sea]1464-the sea ; tougher than the willow - twigs , or the white vine branches , firmer than [these cliffs]8618-these cliffs , more turbulent than [a river]2448-a river , vainer than the vaunted peacock , fiercer than the fire ; more truculent than a pregnant bear , pricklier than thistles , deafer than [the waters]1626-the waters , crueller than a trodden snake ; oh , what [I]1327-galatea wish [I]1327-galatea could alter in [you]8615-you , most of all , is this : that [you]8615-you are swifter than the deer , driven by loud barking , swifter even than the winds , and the passing breeze . But if [you]8615-you knew [me]1327-galatea well , [you]8615-you would regret [your]8615-you flight , and [you]8615-you would condemn [your]8615-you own efforts [yourself]8615-you , and hold to [me]1327-galatea : [half of [the mountain]1771-the mountain]8621-half of the mountain is mine , and [the deep caves in [the natural rock]8624-the natural rock]8623-the deep caves in the natural rock , where winter is not felt nor the midsummer sun . There are apples that weigh down the branches , golden and purple grapes on the trailing vines . Those , and these , [I]1327-galatea keep for [you]8615-you . [You]8615-you will pick ripe strawberries born in the woodland shadows , in autumn cherries and plums , not just the juicy blue - purples , but also the large yellow ones , the colour of fresh bees’-wax . There will be no lack of fruit from the wild strawberry trees , nor from the tall chestnuts : every tree will be there to serve [you]8615-you . [This whole flock]8625-this whole flock is [mine]1327-galatea , and [many]1691-many are wandering [the valleys]1480-the valleys as well , many hidden by [the woods]1690-the woods , many penned in [the caves]6674-the caves . If [you]8615-you asked [me]1327-galatea [I]1327-galatea could not tell [you]8615-you how many there are : [a poor man]8630-a poor man counts [his]8630-a poor man flocks . [You]8615-you can see , [you]8615-you need not merely believe [me]1327-galatea , how [they]8625-this whole flock can hardly move [their]8625-this whole flock legs with [their]8625-this whole flock full udders . There are newborn lambs in [the warn sheepfolds]8631-the warn sheepfolds , and [kids too , of the same age]8632-kids too , of the same age , in other pens , and [I]1327-galatea always have snow - white milk : some of it kept for drinking , and some with rennet added to curdle it . [You]8615-you will not have vulgar gifts or easily found pleasures , such as leverets , or does , or [kids]8633-kids , or paired doves , or a nest from the treetops . [I]1327-galatea came upon twin cubs of a shaggy bear that [you]8615-you can play with : so alike [you]8615-you can hardly separate [them]8634-them . [I]1327-galatea came upon [them]8634-them and [I]1327-galatea said : “ [I]1327-galatea shall keep these for [[my]1327-galatea mistress]8635-my mistress . ” Now [Galatea]1327-galatea , only lift [your]8615-you shining head from [the dark blue sea]1817-the dark blue sea : come , do not scorn [my]1327-galatea gifts . Lately , [I]1327-galatea examined [myself]1327-galatea , it ’s true , and looked at [my]1327-galatea reflection in [the clear water]8637-the clear water , and , seeing [my]1327-galatea self , it pleased [me]1327-galatea . Look how large [I]1327-galatea am : [Jupiter]1273-jupiter , in the sky , since [you]8615-you are accustomed to saying some Jove or other rules there , has no bigger a body . Luxuriant hair hangs over [my]1327-galatea face , and shades [my]1327-galatea shoulders like a grove . And do not consider it ugly for [my]1327-galatea whole body to be bristling with thick prickly hair . A tree is ugly without its leaves : a horse is ugly unless a golden mane covers [its]8638-its neck : feathers hide the birds : [their]8639-their wool becomes the sheep : a beard and shaggy hair befits [a man]5897-a man ’s body . [I]1327-galatea only have one eye in the middle of [my]1327-galatea forehead , but it is as big as a large shield . Well ? Does [great Sol]600-sol not see all this from the sky ? Yet [Sol]600-sol ’s orb is unique . Added to that [[my]1327-galatea father]5857-my father , [Neptune]514-neptune , rules over [[your]8615-you waters]8642-your waters : [I]1327-galatea give [you]8615-you [him]514-neptune as [a father - in - law]8643-a father - in - law . Only have pity , and listen to [my]1327-galatea humble prayers ! [I]1327-galatea , who scorn [Jove]605-jove and [his]605-jove heaven and [his]605-jove piercing lightning bolt , submit to [you]8615-you alone : [I]1327-galatea fear [you]8615-you , [Nereid]979-nereid : [your]8615-you anger is fiercer than lightning . And [I]1327-galatea could bear this contempt of [yours]8615-you more patiently , if [you]8615-you fled from [everyone]2389-everyone . But why , rejecting [Cyclops]679-cyclops , love [Acis]1330-acis , and prefer [Acis]1330-acis ’s embrace to [mine]1327-galatea ? Though [he]514-neptune is pleased with [himself]514-neptune , and , what [I]1327-galatea dislike , pleases [you]8615-you too , [Galatea]1327-galatea , let [me]1327-galatea just have a chance at [him]514-neptune . Then [he]514-neptune will know [I]1327-galatea am as strong as [I]1327-galatea am big ! [I]1327-galatea ’ll tear out [his]514-neptune entrails while [he]514-neptune lives , rend [his]514-neptune limbs and scatter them over [the fields]1522-the fields , and over [[your]8615-you ocean]8646-your ocean , ( so [he]514-neptune can join [you]8615-you ! ) For [I]1327-galatea am on fire , and , wounded , [I]1327-galatea burn with a fiercer flame , and [I]1327-galatea seem to bear [Aetna]1333-aetna with all [his]514-neptune violent powers sunk in [my]1327-galatea breast , yet [you]8615-you , [Galatea]1327-galatea , are unmoved . ’[1327-galatea] ‘ With such useless complaints [he]514-neptune rose ( for [I]5901-girl saw it all ) and as a bull that can not stay still , furious when the cow is taken from it , [he]514-neptune wanders through [the woods]1690-the woods and glades . Not anticipating such a thing , without [my]5901-girl knowing , [he]514-neptune saw [me]5901-girl , and saw [Acis]1330-acis . “ [I]5901-girl see [you]5901-girl , ” [he]5901-girl cried , “ and [I]5901-girl ’ll make this the last celebration of [your]5901-girl love . ” [His]5901-girl voice was as loud as an angry [Cyclops]679-cyclops ’s voice must be : [Aetna]1333-aetna shook with the noise . And [I]5901-girl , terrified , plunged into [the nearby waters]8648-the nearby waters . [[My]5901-girl hero]7897-my hero , [son of [Symaethis]1334-symaethis]8650-son of symaethis , had turned [his]7897-my hero back , and ran , crying : “ Help [me]5901-girl , [I]5901-girl beg [you]5901-girl , [Galatea]1327-galatea ! [Forefathers]8651-forefathers , help [me]5901-girl , admit [me]5901-girl to [[your]5901-girl kingdom]3813-your kingdom or [I]5901-girl die ! ” [Cyclops]679-cyclops followed [him]5901-girl and hurled a rock wrenched from [the mountain]1771-the mountain , and though only the farthest corner of the stone reached [him]5901-girl , it still completely buried [Acis]1330-acis . Then [I]5901-girl , doing the only thing that fate allowed [me]5901-girl , caused [Acis]1330-acis to assume [his]1330-acis ancestral powers . From the rock , crimson blood seeped out , and in a little while its redness began to fade , became the colour of [a river]2448-a river at first swollen by rain , gradually clearing . Then the rock , that Polyphemus had hurled , cracked open , and a tall green reed sprang from the fissure , and the mouth of a chamber in the rock echoed with leaping waters , and ( a marvel ) suddenly [a youth]8655-a youth stood , waist - deep in the water , [his]8655-a youth fresh horns wreathed with rushes . It was [Acis]1330-acis , except that [he]8655-a youth was larger , and [his]8655-a youth face dark blue : yet it was still [Acis]1330-acis , changed to [a river - god]8656-a river - god , and [[his]8655-a youth waters]8657-his waters still retain [his]8655-a youth former name . [Galatea]1327-galatea finished speaking and [the group of Nereids]8658-the group of nereids went away , swimming through the placid waves . [Scylla]988-scylla returned to [the beach]3773-the beach , not daring to trust [herself]988-scylla to [mid - ocean]7011-mid - ocean , and either wandered naked along [the parched sand]8661-the parched sand , or , when [she]988-scylla was tired , found [a remote , sheltered pool]8662-a remote , sheltered pool , and cooled [her]988-scylla limbs in [its]8662-a remote , sheltered pool enclosed waters . See , [Glaucus]936-glaucus comes , skimming [the water]1620-the water , [a new inhabitant of [the sea]1464-the sea]8664-a new inhabitant of the sea , [his]8664-a new inhabitant of the sea form recently altered , at [[Anthedon]217-anthedon opposite [Euboea]282-euboea]8666-anthedon opposite euboea . Seeing [the girl]1792-the girl , [he]8664-a new inhabitant of the sea stood still , desiring [her]1792-the girl , and said whatever [he]8664-a new inhabitant of the sea thought might stop [her]1792-the girl running away . Nevertheless [she]1792-the girl ran , and , with the swiftness of fear , came to the top of [a mountain standing near [the shore]2065-the shore]8668-a mountain standing near the shore .
