[It]8668-a mountain standing near the shore faced [the wide sea]8089-the wide sea , rising to a single peak , [its]8668-a mountain standing near the shore wooded summit leaning far out over [the water]1620-the water . Here [she]1792-the girl stopped , and from a place of safety , marvelled at [his]8664-a new inhabitant of the sea colour ; the hair that hid [his]8664-a new inhabitant of the sea shoulders and covered [his]8664-a new inhabitant of the sea back ; and [his]8664-a new inhabitant of the sea groin below that merged into a winding fish ’s tail ; [she]1792-the girl not knowing whether [he]8664-a new inhabitant of the sea was god or monster . [He]8664-a new inhabitant of the sea saw [her]1792-the girl , and , leaning on a rock that stood nearby , [he]8664-a new inhabitant of the sea said : ‘[5901-girl] [Girl]5901-girl , [I]0-i am [no freak or wild creature]5136-no freak or wild creature , but [a god of [the sea]1464-the sea]5137-a god of the sea . [Proteus]5139-proteus , [Triton]5140-triton , or [Palaemon son of [Athamas]695-athamas]5141-palaemon son of athamas , have no greater power in [the ocean]1657-the ocean . [Mortal once]5143-mortal once , but no doubt destined for [the deep]1919-the deep , even then [I]0-i worked the waves : now drawing in the drag nets full of fish , now sitting on a rock , casting , with rod and line . There is [a beach]5145-a beach , bounded by a green field , one side bordered by [sea]1450-sea , the other by grass , that horned cattle have not damaged by grazing , that placid sheep or shaggy goats have not cropped . [No bees intent on gathering pollen]5147-no bees intent on gathering pollen plundered the flowers there ; no garlands came from there for the heads of [revellers]5148-revellers ; [no one]1640-no one had ever mown it , scythe in hand . [I]0-i was the first to sit there on the turf , drying [my]0-i sea - soaked lines , and laying out in order the fish [I]0-i had caught , to count them , that either chance or innocence had brought to [my]0-i curved hook . This will sound like a tale , but what would [I]0-i get from lying ? Touching the grass , [my]0-i catch began to stir , and shift about , and swim over [land]1458-land as if they were in [the sea]1464-the sea . While [I]0-i hesitated and wondered , the complete shoal fled into [[their]5152-their native waters]5153-their native waters , leaving behind [[their]5152-their new master]5154-their new master , [[their]5152-their new land]5155-their new land . [I]0-i stood dumbfounded , for a while not believing it , searching for the cause . Had [some god]6967-some god done it , or the juice of some herb ? “ Yet what herb has such power ? ” [I]0-i asked , and gathering some herbage in [my]0-i hand , [I]0-i bit what [I]0-i had gathered with [my]0-i teeth . [My]0-i throat had scarcely swallowed the strange juice , when suddenly [I]0-i felt [my]0-i heart trembling inside [me]0-i , [my]0-i breast seized with yearning for that other element . Unable to hold out for long , crying out : “ [Land]390-land , [I]0-i will never return to , goodbye ! ” [I]0-i immersed [my]0-i body in [the sea]1464-the sea . [The gods of [the sea]1464-the sea]2037-the gods of the sea received [me]0-i , thinking [me]0-i worth the honour of [[their]2037-the gods of the sea company]5160-their company , and asked [Oceanus]607-oceanus and [Tethys]562-tethys to purge what was mortal in [me]0-i . [I]0-i was purified by [them]2037-the gods of the sea , and , cleansed of sin by an incantation nine times repeated , [they]2037-the gods of the sea ordered [me]0-i to bathe [my]0-i body in [a hundred rivers]5161-a hundred rivers . Immediately streams from every side poured [their]2037-the gods of the sea waters over [my]0-i head . So much [I]0-i can tell of [you]5162-you of those marvellous things , so much of them [I]0-i remember : then [my]0-i mind knew no more . When later [I]0-i came to , [my]0-i whole body was altered from what [I]0-i was before , and [my]0-i mind was not the same . Then [I]0-i saw , for the first time , this dark green beard , [my]0-i hair that sweeps [the wide sea]8089-the wide sea , these giant shoulders and dusky arms , these legs that curve below into a fish ’s fins . Yet what use is this shape , or that [I]0-i was pleasing to [the ocean gods]5164-the ocean gods ? What use is it to be [a god]1461-a god , if these things do not move [you]5162-you ? ’ As [the god]1482-the god spoke these words , looking to say more , [Scylla]988-scylla abandoned [him]1482-the god . Then [Glaucus]936-glaucus , maddened , and angered by [her]988-scylla rejection , sought [the wondrous halls of [Circe]1337-circe]8673-the wondrous halls of circe , [daughter of [the Sun]392-the sun]8674-daughter of the sun . [Glaucus]936-glaucus , [the fisher of [the swollen Euboean waters]8676-the swollen euboean waters]8675-the fisher of the swollen euboean waters , soon left [Aetna]1333-aetna behind , that mountain piled on [Typhoeus]678-typhoeus ’s giant head , and [the Cyclops ’s fields]8677-the cyclops ’s fields , that know nothing of the plough ’s use or the harrow , and owe nothing to [the yoked oxen]8678-the yoked oxen . [Zancle]386-zancle was left behind as well , and the walls of Rhegium opposite , and [the dangerous strait]8679-the dangerous strait , hemmed in between twin coastlines , that marks [the boundary between [Sicily]146-sicily and [Italian Ausonia]394-italian ausonia]8680-the boundary between sicily and italian ausonia . From there , swimming with mighty strokes , across [the Tyrrhenian Sea]395-the tyrrhenian sea , [he]0-i came to [the grassy hills]8681-the grassy hills and [the halls of [Circe]1337-circe]8682-the halls of circe , daughter of the Sun , filled with transformed beasts . As soon as [he]0-i saw [her]1337-circe , and words of welcome had been exchanged , [he]0-i said : ‘[2767-goddess] [Goddess]2767-goddess , [I]0-i beg [you]2767-goddess , take pity on [a god]1461-a god ! [You]2767-goddess alone can help this love of [mine]0-i , if [I]0-i seem worthy of help . [No one]1640-no one knows better than [I]0-i , [Titaness]1336-titaness , what power herbs have , since [I]0-i was transmuted by them . So that the cause of [my]0-i passion is not unknown to [you]2767-goddess , [I]0-i saw [Scylla]988-scylla , on [the Italian coast]5169-the italian coast , opposite [Messene]185-messene ’s walls . [I]0-i am ashamed to tell of the prayers and promises , the blandishments [I]0-i used , words that were scorned . If there is any power in charms , utter a charm from [your]2767-goddess sacred lips : or , if herbs are more potent , use the proven strength of active herbs . [I]0-i trust [you]2767-goddess not to cure [me]0-i , or heal [me]0-i , of these wounds : [my]0-i love can not end : only let [her]5170-her feel this heat . [No one]1640-no one has a nature more susceptible to such fires than [Circe]1337-circe , whether the root of it is in [herself]1337-circe , or whether [Venus]1331-venus , offended by [Sol]600-sol [[her]1331-venus father]1694-her father ’s tale - bearing , made [her]1331-venus that way , so [she]1331-venus replied : ‘ [You]2767-goddess would do better to chase after [someone whose wishes and purposes were yours , and who was captured by equal desire]8683-someone whose wishes and purposes were yours , and who was captured by equal desire . Besides , [you]2767-goddess were worth courting ( and certainly could be courted ) , and if [you]2767-goddess offer any hope , believe [me]1331-venus [you]2767-goddess will be too . If [you]2767-goddess doubt it , and have no faith in [your]2767-goddess attractions , well , [I]1331-venus , though [I]1331-venus am [a goddess]6068-a goddess , [daughter of [shining Sol]600-sol]8685-daughter of shining sol , though [I]1331-venus possess such powers of herbs and charms , [I]1331-venus promise to be [yours]2767-goddess . Spurn [the spurner]8686-the spurner , repay [the admirer]8687-the admirer , and , in one act , be twice revenged . ’[1331-venus] To such temptations as these [Glaucus]936-glaucus replied : ‘ Sooner than [my]936-glaucus love will change , [Scylla]988-scylla unchanged , leaves will grow on [the waters]1626-the waters , and sea - weed will grow on [the hills]5818-the hills . ’[936-glaucus] [The goddess]5864-the goddess was angered , and since [she]5864-the goddess could not harm [him]5174-him ( nor , loving [him]5174-him , wished to do so ) [she]5864-the goddess was furious with [the girl]1792-the girl , who was preferred to [her]5864-the goddess . Offended at [his]5174-him rejection of [her]5864-the goddess passion , [she]5864-the goddess at once ground noxious herbs with foul juices , and joined the spells of [Hecate]890-hecate to [their]5176-their grinding . Wrapping [herself]5864-the goddess in a dusky cloak , [she]5864-the goddess made [her]5864-the goddess way from [the palace]6417-the palace , through the crowd of fawning beasts , and sought out [Rhegium]397-rhegium opposite [[Zancle]386-zancle ’s cliffs]5178-zancle ’s cliffs , travelling over [the seething tidal waters]5179-the seething tidal waters , as if [she]5864-the goddess trod on solid ground , crossing dry - footed over [the surface of [the sea]1464-the sea]5180-the surface of the sea . There was [a little pool , curved in a smooth arc , dear to [Scylla]988-scylla for [its]5182-a little pool , curved in a smooth arc , dear to scylla for its peacefulness peacefulness]5182-a little pool , curved in a smooth arc , dear to scylla for its peacefulness . When the sun was strongest , at the zenith , and from [its]5183-its heights made shortest shadows , [she]5864-the goddess retreated [there]1878-there from the heat of sky and [sea]1450-sea . This , [the goddess]5864-the goddess tainted in advance and contaminated with [her]5864-the goddess monstrous poison . [She]5864-the goddess sprinkled the liquid squeezed from harmful roots , and muttered a mysterious incantation , dark with strange words , thrice nine times , in magical utterance . [Scylla]988-scylla comes , wading waist deep into [the pool]6331-the pool , only to find the water around [her]988-scylla groin erupt with yelping monsters . At first , not thinking [them]5188-them part of [her]988-scylla own body , [she]988-scylla retreats from [their]5188-them cruel muzzles , fears [them]5188-them , and pushes [them]5188-them away : but , what [she]988-scylla flees from , [she]988-scylla pulls along with [her]988-scylla , and , seeking [her]988-scylla thighs , [her]988-scylla legs , [her]988-scylla feet , in place of them finds jaws like [Cerberus]759-cerberus ’s . [She]988-scylla stands among raging dogs , and is encircled by beasts , below the surface , from which [her]988-scylla truncated thighs and belly emerge . [[Her]988-scylla lover]2335-her lover [Glaucus]936-glaucus wept , and fled [Circe]1337-circe ’s embrace , [she]988-scylla , who had made too hostile a use of [her]988-scylla herbs ’ powers . [Scylla]988-scylla remained where [she]988-scylla was , and , at the first opportunity , in [her]988-scylla hatred of [Circe]1337-circe , robbed [Ulysses]1271-ulysses of [[his]1271-ulysses companions]2277-his companions . Later [she]988-scylla would have overwhelmed [the Trojan ships]8691-the trojan ships , if [she]988-scylla had not previously been transformed into a rock , whose stone is visible even now : a rock that [sailors]6225-sailors still avoid . When [the oarsmen of [the Trojan ships]8691-the trojan ships]8693-the oarsmen of the trojan ships had escaped [Scylla]988-scylla , and rapacious [Charybdis]929-charybdis , when [they]8693-the oarsmen of the trojan ships had almost reached [the Ausonian shore]8695-the ausonian shore , the wind carried [them]8693-the oarsmen of the trojan ships to [the coast of [Libya]61-libya]8696-the coast of libya . There [Sidonian Queen Dido]1338-sidonian queen dido took [Aeneas]1321-aeneas into [her]1338-sidonian queen dido heart and [home]2999-home , [she]1338-sidonian queen dido , who was fated not to endure [[her]1338-sidonian queen dido Phrygian husband]8698-her phrygian husband ’s departure . [She]1338-sidonian queen dido stabbed [herself]1338-sidonian queen dido with [his]1321-aeneas sword , on a blazing pyre , that was built as if it were intended for sacred rites , deceiving , as [she]1338-sidonian queen dido had been deceived . Fleeing from [the new city]8699-the new city , [Carthage]398-carthage , and [[its]398-carthage sandy shores]8700-its sandy shores , and carried back to [the home of [[his]1321-aeneas loyal half - brother]8702-his loyal half - brother [Acestes]1339-acestes]8701-the home of his loyal half - brother acestes , [son of [Venus of [Eryx]836-eryx]8704-venus of eryx]8703-son of venus of eryx , [Aeneas]1321-aeneas sacrificed [there]1878-there , and paid honours at [[his]1321-aeneas dead father]8706-his dead father ’s , [[Anchises]1101-anchises ’s , tomb]8707-anchises ’s , tomb . Then [he]1321-aeneas loosed [the ships]1530-the ships , that Iris almost destroyed by fire , at [Juno]525-juno ’s command , and passed [the Aeolian Islands]400-the aeolian islands , smoking with clouds of hot sulphur , [the kingdom of [Aeolus]511-aeolus]8709-the kingdom of aeolus , [son of [Hippotes]1340-hippotes]8710-son of hippotes , and passed [the rocky isle of [the Sirens]8712-the sirens]8711-the rocky isle of the sirens , [the daughters of [Acheloüs]1048-acheloüs]8713-the daughters of acheloüs . Bereft of [[its]8711-the rocky isle of the sirens pilot]8714-its pilot , [Palinurus]1341-palinurus , [he]1321-aeneas follows [the coast]8604-the coast by [Inarime]401-inarime , [Prochyte]402-prochyte , and Pithecusae , on [its]8711-the rocky isle of the sirens barren hill , named after [[its]8711-the rocky isle of the sirens inhabitants]8716-its inhabitants , from pithecium , a little ape . For [the father of the gods]1542-the father of the gods , [Jupiter]1273-jupiter , hating the lying and deceit of [the Cercopes]1342-the cercopes , and the crimes of [that treacherous people]8718-that treacherous people , changed [them]8718-that treacherous people into [disgraceful creatures]8719-disgraceful creatures , so that , though unlike [men]5788-men , [they]8718-that treacherous people should seem like [them]8718-that treacherous people . [He]1321-aeneas contracted [their]8718-that treacherous people limbs , turned up and blunted [their]8718-that treacherous people noses , and furrowed [their]8718-that treacherous people faces with the wrinkles of old age . [Their]8718-that treacherous people bodies completely covered by yellow hair , [he]1321-aeneas sent [them]8718-that treacherous people , as monkeys , to [this place]6354-this place , but not before [he]1321-aeneas had robbed [them]8718-that treacherous people of the power of speech , and those tongues born for dreadful deceit , leaving [them]8718-that treacherous people only the power to complain in raucous shrieks . When [he]1321-aeneas had passed [those islands]3696-those islands , and left [the walls of [Parthenope]403-parthenope]8723-the walls of parthenope behind [him]1321-aeneas to starboard , [the tomb of [Misenus]1343-misenus]8724-the tomb of misenus , [the trumpeter]6236-the trumpeter , [the son of Aeolus]8726-the son of aeolus , was to larboard , and [the shore of [Cumae]404-cumae]8727-the shore of cumae , [a place filled with marshy sedges]8728-a place filled with marshy sedges . [He]1321-aeneas entered [the cave of [the Sibyl]1344-the sibyl]8729-the cave of the sibyl , and asked to go down to [Avernus]157-avernus , to find [[[his]1321-aeneas father]1775-his father ’s ghost]8731-his father ’s ghost . Then [the Sibyl]1344-the sibyl after remaining , for a long time , with [her]1344-the sibyl eyes gazing at [the earth]1463-the earth , lifted them , at last , filled with the frenzy of [the god]1482-the god , and cried : ‘[988-scylla] [You]5190-you ask great things , [man of great achievements , whose hand has been tested by the sword , whose faith has been tested by the fire]5191-man of great achievements , whose hand has been tested by the sword , whose faith has been tested by the fire . But have no fear , [Trojan]1321-aeneas , [you]5190-you will have what [you]5190-you desire , and , with [me]0-i as [[your]5190-you guide]5192-your guide , [you]5190-you will know [the halls of [Elysium]405-elysium]5193-the halls of elysium , and [earth ’s strangest realm]5194-earth ’s strangest realm , and the likeness of [[your]5190-you dear father]5195-your dear father . To virtue , no way is barred . ’ [She]1344-the sibyl spoke , and pointed out to [him]5195-your dear father a gleaming golden bough , in [the woods of Proserpine]8734-the woods of proserpine , [the Juno of [Avernus]157-avernus]406-the juno of avernus , and ordered [him]5195-your dear father to break it from the tree . [Aeneas]1321-aeneas obeyed , and saw the power of dread [Dis]758-dis , and [he]1321-aeneas saw [[his]1321-aeneas own ancestors]8735-his own ancestors , and the ancient shade of great - souled Anchises . [He]1321-aeneas learned also the laws of [those regions]8736-those regions , and the trials [he]1321-aeneas must undergo in fresh wars . Then taking [the return path]8737-the return path , with weary paces , [he]1321-aeneas eased the labour by talking with [[his]1321-aeneas Cumean guide]8738-his cumean guide . As [he]0-i travelled [the fearful road]8739-the fearful road through the shadowy twilight , [he]0-i said : ‘[6068-a goddess] Whether [you]5196-you are truly [a goddess]6068-a goddess , or only most beloved by [the gods]1538-the gods , [you]5196-you will always be like [a goddess to [me]0-i]5199-a goddess to me , and [I]0-i will acknowledge [myself]0-i in [your]5196-you debt , who have allowed [me]0-i to enter [the place of the dead]5200-the place of the dead , and having seen [that place of the dead]5201-that place of the dead , escape [it]5201-that place of the dead . When [I]0-i reach the upper air , [I]0-i will build [a temple to [you]5196-you]5202-a temple to you , for this service , and burn incense in [your]5196-you honour . ’ [The priestess]8740-the priestess gazed at [him]0-i and with a deep sigh , said : ‘[0-i] [I]0-i am not [a goddess]6068-a goddess : do not assume [any human being]5204-any human being is worth the honour of holy incense , or err out of ignorance . [I]0-i was offered eternal life without end , if [I]0-i would surrender [my]0-i virginity to [Phoebus]519-phoebus [[my]0-i lover]5205-my lover . While [he]519-phoebus still hoped for it , while [he]519-phoebus desired to bribe [me]0-i beforehand with gifts , [he]519-phoebus said : “ [Virgin of Cumae]5206-virgin of cumae , choose what [you]0-i wish , and what [you]0-i wish [you]0-i shall have . ” Pointing to a pile of dust , that had collected , [I]0-i foolishly begged to have as many anniversaries of [my]0-i birth , as were represented by the dust . But [I]0-i forgot to ask that the years should be accompanied by youth . [He]519-phoebus gave [me]0-i the years , and lasting youth , as well , if [I]0-i would surrender : [I]0-i rejected [Phoebus]519-phoebus ’s gift , and never married . But now [my]0-i more fruitful time has turned its back on [me]0-i , and old age comes , with tottering step , that must be long endured . Though [I]0-i have now lived seven centuries , three hundred harvests , three hundred vintages , still remain to be seen , to equal the content of the dust . The time will come when the passage of days will render such body as [I]0-i have tiny , and [my]0-i limbs , consumed with age , will reduce to the slightest of burdens . [I]0-i will be thought never to have loved , and never to have delighted [a god]1461-a god . [Phoebus]519-phoebus too perhaps will either not know [me]0-i , or will deny that [he]519-phoebus loved [me]0-i . [I]0-i will go as far as having to suffer transformation , and [I]0-i will be viewed as non - existent , but still known as a voice : the fates will bequeath [me]0-i a voice . ’ As [the Sibyl]1344-the sibyl spoke these words , they emerged , by the rising path , from [the Stygian regions]8741-the stygian regions , into [the city of [Cumae]404-cumae of [the Euboeans]407-the euboeans]8742-the city of cumae of the euboeans . [Trojan Aeneas]1321-aeneas came to [the shore]2065-the shore that was later named after [[his]1321-aeneas nurse]8744-his nurse [Caieta]1346-caieta , where [he]1321-aeneas carried out [her]1346-caieta funeral rites , as accepted , according to custom . This was also the place where [Macareus of Neritos]888-macareus , [a companion of sorely tried [Ulysses]1271-ulysses]8745-a companion of sorely tried ulysses , had settled , after the interminable weariness of hardship . [Macareus]888-macareus now recognised [Achaemenides]1347-achaemenides , among [the Trojans]4754-the trojans , [he]1347-achaemenides , who had been given up as lost , by [Ulysses]1271-ulysses , long ago , among [the rocks of [Aetna]1333-aetna]8747-the rocks of aetna . Astonished to discover [him]1347-achaemenides , unexpectedly , still alive , [he]888-macareus asked : ‘[1347-achaemenides] What god or chance preserved [you]5208-you , [Achaemenides]1347-achaemenides ? Why does [a Trojan vessel]5209-a trojan vessel now carry [a Greek]4905-a greek ? What land is [[your]5208-you ship]5211-your ship bound for ? [Achaemenides]1347-achaemenides , no longer clothed in rags , [his]1347-achaemenides shreds of clothing held together with thorns , but [himself]1347-achaemenides again , replied to [his]1347-achaemenides questions , in these words : ‘ If [this ship]6214-this ship is not more to [me]1347-achaemenides than [Ithaca]368-ithaca and [[my]1347-achaemenides home]6064-my home , if [I]1347-achaemenides revere [Aeneas]1321-aeneas less than [[my]1347-achaemenides father]5857-my father , let [me]1347-achaemenides gaze at [Polyphemus]1328-polyphemus once more , with [his]1328-polyphemus gaping mouth dripping human blood . [I]1347-achaemenides can never thank [Aeneas]1321-aeneas enough , even if [I]1347-achaemenides offered [my]1347-achaemenides all . Could [I]1347-achaemenides forget , or be ungrateful for , the fact that [I]1347-achaemenides speak and breathe and see the sky and the sun ’s glory ? [Aeneas]1321-aeneas granted that [my]1347-achaemenides life did not end in the monster ’s jaws , and when [I]1347-achaemenides leave the light of day , now , [I]1347-achaemenides shall be buried in [the tomb]2552-the tomb , not , indeed , in its belly . What were [my]1347-achaemenides feelings , then ( if fear had not robbed [me]1347-achaemenides of all sense and feeling ) , abandoned , seeing [you]8752-you making for [the open sea]7309-the open sea ? [I]1347-achaemenides wanted to shout to [you]8752-you , but feared to reveal [myself]1347-achaemenides to [the enemy]6372-the enemy . Indeed , [Ulysses]1271-ulysses ’s shout nearly wrecked [[your]8752-you vessel]8755-your vessel . [I]1347-achaemenides watched as [Cyclops]679-cyclops tore an enormous boulder from [the mountainside]6238-the mountainside , and threw it into the midst of [the waves]4467-the waves . [I]1347-achaemenides watched again as [he]679-cyclops hurled huge stones , as if from a catapult , using the power of [his]679-cyclops gigantic arms , and , forgetting [I]1347-achaemenides was not on board [the ship]2497-the ship , [I]1347-achaemenides was terrified that the waves and air [they]4467-the waves displaced would sink [her]2497-the ship . When [you]8752-you escaped by flight from certain death , [Polyphemus]1328-polyphemus roamed over [the whole of [Aetna]1333-aetna]8759-the whole of aetna , groaning , and groping through [the woods]1690-the woods with [his]1328-polyphemus hands , stumbling , bereft of [his]1328-polyphemus sight , among the rocks . Stretching out [his]1328-polyphemus arms , spattered with blood , to [the sea]1464-the sea , [he]1328-polyphemus cursed [the Greek race]8762-the greek race like the plague , saying : “ O , if only chance would return [Ulysses]1271-ulysses to [me]1347-achaemenides , or one of [[his]1271-ulysses companions]2277-his companions , on whom [I]1347-achaemenides could vent [my]1347-achaemenides wrath , whose entrails [I]1347-achaemenides could eat , whose living body [I]1347-achaemenides could tear with [my]1347-achaemenides hands , whose blood could fill [my]1347-achaemenides gullet , and whose torn limbs could quiver between [my]1347-achaemenides teeth : the damage to [me]1347-achaemenides of [my]1347-achaemenides lost sight would count little or nothing then ! ” Fiercely [he]1328-polyphemus shouted , this and more . [I]1347-achaemenides was pale with fear , looking at [his]1328-polyphemus face still dripping with gore , [his]1328-polyphemus cruel hands , the empty eye - socket , [his]1328-polyphemus limbs and beard coated with human blood . Death was in front of [my]1347-achaemenides eyes , but that was still the least of evils . Now [he]1328-polyphemus ’ll catch [me]1347-achaemenides , [I]1347-achaemenides thought , now [he]1328-polyphemus ’ll merge [my]1347-achaemenides innards with [his]1328-polyphemus own , and the image stuck in [my]1347-achaemenides mind of the moment when [I]1347-achaemenides saw [him]1328-polyphemus hurl [two of [[my]1347-achaemenides friends]2469-my friends]8764-two of my friends against the ground , three , four times , and crouching over [them]8764-two of my friends like a shaggy lion , [he]1328-polyphemus filled [his]1328-polyphemus greedy jaws with flesh and entrails , bones full of white marrow , and warm limbs . Trembling seized [me]1347-achaemenides : [I]1347-achaemenides stood there , pale and downcast , watching [him]1328-polyphemus chew and spit out [his]1328-polyphemus bloody feast , vomiting up lumps of matter , mixed with wine . [I]1347-achaemenides imagined a like fate was being prepared for [my]1347-achaemenides wretched self . [I]1347-achaemenides hid for many days , trembling at every sound , scared of dying but longing to be dead , staving off hunger with acorns , and a mixture of leaves and grasses , alone , without help or hope , left to torture and death . After a long stretch of time , [I]1347-achaemenides spied [this ship]6214-this ship far off , begging [them]8764-two of my friends by gestures to rescue [me]1347-achaemenides , and ran to [the shore]2065-the shore and moved [their]8764-two of my friends pity : [a Trojan ship]8768-a trojan ship received [a Greek]4905-a greek ! Now , [dearest of [comrades]8771-comrades]8770-dearest of comrades , tell [me]1347-achaemenides of [your]8770-dearest of comrades fortunes too , and of [[your]8770-dearest of comrades leader]8772-your leader , and the company that has entrusted itself to [the sea]1464-the sea with [you]8770-dearest of comrades . ’[1347-achaemenides] [Macareus]888-macareus spoke of how [Aeolus]511-aeolus ruled [the Tuscan deep]5212-the tuscan deep , [Aeolus son of [Hippotes]1340-hippotes]5213-aeolus son of hippotes , imprisoning the winds . [Ulysses]1271-ulysses , [the Dulichian leader]5214-the dulichian leader , had received them from [him]1271-ulysses , an amazing gift , fastened up , in a bull ’s hide bag . Sailing for nine days , with a favourable wind , [Ulysses]1271-ulysses and [[his]1271-ulysses crew]5215-his crew spied [the homelands [they]5215-his crew sought]5216-the homelands they sought , but when the tenth morning came , [[his]1271-ulysses comrades]8396-his comrades were conquered by greed and desire for [their]8396-his comrades share : thinking the bag contained gold , [they]8396-his comrades loosened the strings that tied up the winds . [The ship]2497-the ship was blown back over [the waters]1626-the waters , through which [they]5215-his crew had come , and , once more , entered [[King Aeolus]511-aeolus ’s harbour]5220-king aeolus ’s harbour . ‘ From there , ’[888-macareus] [Macareus]888-macareus said , ‘ [we]5215-his crew came to [the ancient city of Lamus]8774-the ancient city of lamus , of [the Laestrygonians]1348-the laestrygonians : [Antiphates]1349-antiphates was now king in [that land]8775-that land . [I]888-macareus was sent to [him]1349-antiphates with [two companions]8776-two companions . [One of [[my]888-macareus friends]2469-my friends]8777-one of my friends and [myself]888-macareus , fleeing , barely reached safety . [The third]8779-the third reddened the Laestrygonians ’[888-macareus] evil mouths with [his]5221-his blood . [Antiphates]1349-antiphates chased [us]5222-us as [we]5222-us ran for it , urging [[his]1349-antiphates men]4518-his men on . [They]4518-his men rushed [us]5222-us , hurling rocks and tree - trunks , drowning [the men]2224-the men , and sinking [the ships]1530-the ships . [The one which [Ulysses]1271-ulysses [himself]1271-ulysses]5226-the one which ulysses himself , and [I]0-i sailed in , escaped . Mourning [[our]5222-us lost companions]5227-our lost companions , lamenting greatly , [we]5222-us came to [that land]8775-that land [you]5229-you see , in the distance , ( believe [me]0-i [the island]7121-the island [I]0-i saw is best seen from a distance ! ) and [I]0-i warn [you]5229-you , [O most virtuous of Trojans]5231-o most virtuous of trojans , [son of the goddess]7248-son of the goddess , ( since the war is over now , [I]0-i will not treat [you]5229-you as [an enemy]3865-an enemy , [Aeneas]1321-aeneas ) shun [the shores of [Circe]1337-circe]5234-the shores of circe ! [We]5222-us , likewise , beaching [[our]5222-us vessel]5235-our vessel , refused to go on , remembering [Antiphates]1349-antiphates , and [savage Cyclops]679-cyclops : but [we]5222-us were chosen by [lot]7488-lot to explore [the unknown place]5237-the unknown place . [I]0-i , and [the loyal Polites]5238-the loyal polites , and also [Eurylochus]1350-eurylochus , and [Elpenor]1351-elpenor , too fond of wine , and [eighteen others of [[my]0-i comrades]2466-my comrades]5239-eighteen others of my comrades , were sent within [[Circe]1337-circe ’s walls]5241-circe ’s walls . [We]5222-us had no sooner arrived , and were standing on the threshold of [[her]1337-circe courts]5242-her courts , when a thousand wolves , and mixed with the wolves , [she]5243-she - bears and lionesses rushed at [us]5222-us , filling [us]5222-us with terror . But there was nothing to be afraid of : none of [them]5244-they gave [our]5222-us bodies a single scratch . Why [they]5244-they even wagged [their]5244-they tails in the air with affection , and fawned on [us]5222-us , as [they]5244-they followed [our]5222-us footsteps , until [female servants]5245-female servants received [us]5222-us , and led [us]5222-us , through halls covered with marble , to [[their]5245-female servants mistress]2287-their mistress . [She]2287-their mistress sat in [a lovely inner room]5247-a lovely inner room on [her]2287-their mistress sacred throne , wearing a shining robe , covered over with a gold - embroidered veil . [Nereids]5248-nereids and [nymphs]5815-nymphs were with [her]2287-their mistress , who do not work wool with nimble fingers , nor , then , spin the thread : [they]5244-they arrange herbs , scattered without order , separating flowers and grasses of various colours , into baskets . [She]2287-their mistress [herself]2287-their mistress directs the work [they]5244-they do : [she]2287-their mistress [herself]2287-their mistress knows the use of each leaf , which kinds mix in harmony , examines them , and pays attention to the weighing of the herbs . When [she]2287-their mistress saw [us]5222-us , and words of welcome had been received , [she]2287-their mistress smiled at [us]5222-us , and seemed to give a blessing to [our]5222-us desires . Without delay [she]2287-their mistress ordered a drink to be blended , of malted barley , honey , strong wine , and curdled milk , to which [she]2287-their mistress secretly added juices , that its sweetness would hide . [We]5222-us took the cup offered by [her]2287-their mistress sacred hand . As soon as [we]5222-us had drained it , thirstily , with parched lips , [the dread goddess]5250-the dread goddess touched the top of [our]5222-us hair with [her]5250-the dread goddess wand , and then ( [I]0-i am ashamed , but [I]0-i will tell [you]5251-you ) [I]0-i began to bristle with hair , unable to speak now , giving out hoarse grunts instead of words , and to fall forward , completely facing the ground . [I]0-i felt [my]0-i mouth stiffening into a long snout , [my]0-i neck swelling with brawn , and [I]0-i made tracks on the ground , with the parts that had just now lifted the cup to [my]0-i mouth . [I]0-i was shut in a sty with the others in the same state ( so much can magic drugs achieve ! ) [We]5222-us saw that only [Eurylochus]1350-eurylochus had escaped the transformation : [the only one to avoid the proffered cup]5252-the only one to avoid the proffered cup . If [he]1350-eurylochus had not refused , [I]0-i would even now be one of [the bristly herd]5253-the bristly herd , since [Ulysses]1271-ulysses would not have heard of [our]5222-us plight from [him]1350-eurylochus , or come to [Circe]1337-circe , as [[our]5222-us avenger]5254-our avenger . [Peace - loving Cyllenian Mercury]550-cyllenian mercury had given [him]1350-eurylochus the white flower , [the gods]1538-the gods call moly , that springs from a black root . With this , and divine warnings , [he]1350-eurylochus entered [[Circe]1337-circe ’s house]5256-circe ’s house in safety , and , when [he]1350-eurylochus was asked to drink from the fateful cup , [he]1350-eurylochus struck aside the wand , with which [she]1337-circe tried to stroke [his]1350-eurylochus hair , and scared off [the frightened goddess]6708-the frightened goddess , with drawn sword . Then [they]5258-they gave [their]5258-they right hands to [each other]2544-each other , as a pledge of good faith , and after being received into [her]1337-circe bed as [[her]1337-circe husband]5872-her husband , [he]1350-eurylochus asked for [[his]1350-eurylochus friends]2223-his friends ’ true bodies to be restored , as a wedding gift . [We]8780-our were sprinkled with the more virtuous juices of unknown herbs , [our]8780-our heads were stroked with the wand reversed , and the words , [she]1337-circe had said , were pronounced , with the words said backwards . The more words [she]1337-circe spoke , the more [we]8780-our stood erect , lifted from the ground . [Our]8780-our bristles fell away , [our]8780-our cloven hoofs lost their cleft , [our]8780-our shoulders reappeared , and below them were [our]8780-our upper and lower arms . Weeping [we]8780-our embraced [him]1350-eurylochus , as [he]1350-eurylochus wept [himself]1350-eurylochus , and clung to [[our]8780-our leader]8781-our leader ’s neck , and nothing was said until [we]8780-our had testified to [our]8780-our gratitude . [We]8780-our stayed [there]1878-there for a year , and , in that length of time , [I]1350-eurylochus saw and heard many things . Here is [one]5944-one told [me]1350-eurylochus , in secret , by one of [the four female servants]8784-the four female servants , dedicated to those earlier tasks . While [Circe]1337-circe was tarrying alone with [[our]8780-our leader]8781-our leader , [the girl]1792-the girl showed [me]1350-eurylochus the statue of [a young man]7546-a young man , carved out of snow - white marble , with a woodpecker ’s head on top . It stood in [a holy temple]8788-a holy temple , distinguished by many wreaths . [I]1350-eurylochus asked , as [I]1350-eurylochus wished to know , who it was , and why [he]7546-a young man was worshipped in [a holy temple]8788-a holy temple , and why [he]7546-a young man bore a bird ’s head . [She]1792-the girl said “ Listen , [Macareus]888-macareus , and learn , as well , how great is [[my]1350-eurylochus mistress]8635-my mistress ’s power : keep [your]888-macareus mind on [my]1350-eurylochus words ! ” ’[1350-eurylochus] ‘ “ [Picus]1352-picus , [the son of [Saturn]500-saturn]6727-the son of saturn , was king in [the land of [Ausonia]409-ausonia]8792-the land of ausonia , and loved horses trained for war . [The hero]2234-the hero ’s appearance was as [you]888-macareus see it there . Though , if [you]888-macareus looked at [his]2234-the hero beauty itself , [you]888-macareus would approve the true and not the imaginary form . [His]2234-the hero spirit equalled [his]2234-the hero looks . In age , [he]2234-the hero had not yet seen four of the five - yearly Games at [Elis]83-elis in [Greece]108-greece . [He]2234-the hero had turned the heads of [the dryads born on [the hills of [Latium]410-latium]8795-the hills of latium]8794-the dryads born on the hills of latium : the nymphs of the fountains pursued [him]2234-the hero , and [the naiads]1761-the naiads ; those that live in [the Tiber]411-the tiber ; and in [the River Numicius]412-the river numicius ; in [[Anio]413-anio ’s streams]8797-anio ’s streams ; and the brief course of [the Almo]414-the almo ; the rushing Nar ; and Farfar of dense shadows ; and those who haunt [the wooded pool of [Scythian Diana]415-scythian diana]8798-the wooded pool of scythian diana , and [[its]415-scythian diana neighbouring lakes]8799-its neighbouring lakes . But , spurning [them]8800-them all , [he]2234-the hero loved [one nymph]8801-one nymph alone , whom , it is said , [Venilia]1353-venilia once bore , on [the Palatine hill]8802-the palatine hill , to two - faced [Janus]1354-janus . [She]1353-venilia , when [she]1353-venilia had grown to marriageable age , was given to [[Picus]1352-picus of [Laurentum]416-laurentum]8803-picus of laurentum , [preferred of all [[her]1353-venilia suitors]8805-her suitors]8804-preferred of all her suitors . [She]1353-venilia was of rare beauty , but rarer [her]1353-venilia gift of song , so that [she]1353-venilia was called [Canens]1355-canens . [She]1353-venilia could move the rocks and trees with [her]1353-venilia singing , make [wild beasts]8806-wild beasts gentle , halt [wide rivers]8807-wide rivers , and detain the wandering birds . One day when [she]1353-venilia was singing [her]1353-venilia song , with [a girl]1995-a girl ’s expressiveness , [Picus]1352-picus left [home]2999-home to hunt the native wild boar , in [the Laurentian fields]8810-the laurentian fields . Astride the back of an eager mount , [he]1352-picus carried two hunting spears in [his]1352-picus left hand , and wore a Greek military cloak , dyed crimson , fastened with a golden brooch . [[Sol]600-sol ’s daughter]4054-sol ’s daughter had come to [those same woods]8812-those same woods , leaving [the fields]1522-the fields , called [Circean]1356-circean from [her]1356-circean name , to cull fresh herbs in [the fertile hills]8814-the fertile hills . As soon as [she]1353-venilia saw [the youth from the cover of a thicket]8815-the youth from the cover of a thicket , [she]1353-venilia was stunned : the herbs [she]1353-venilia had culled fell from [her]1353-venilia hand , and flames seemed to reach to [her]1353-venilia very marrow . As soon as [she]1353-venilia had recovered rational thought after the wave of passion , [she]1353-venilia wanted to own to [her]1353-venilia desires , but [she]1353-venilia could not reach [him]5262-his , because of [his]5262-his horse ’s speed , and [[his]5262-his crowd of [companions]2256-companions]8816-his crowd of companions . ‘[1350-eurylochus] Though the wind take [you]5262-his , [you]5262-his will not escape , ’ [she]1353-venilia cried , ‘[1350-eurylochus] if [I]0-i know [my]0-i skill , if the power of herbs has not completely vanished , and [my]0-i incantations do not fail . ’ Saying this , [she]1353-venilia conjured up a bodiless phantom boar , and commanded it to cross under [the king]6572-the king ’s very eyes , and seem to enter a dense grove of trees , where [the woods]1690-the woods were thickest , and [the place]1552-the place was impenetrable to horses . Instantly , and unwittingly , without a moment ’s delay , [Picus]1352-picus , followed [[his]1352-picus shadowy prey]8821-his shadowy prey , and , quickly leaping from the back of [his]1352-picus foaming mount , [he]1352-picus roamed , on foot , through [the deep wood]8822-the deep wood , chasing an empty promise . [Circe]1337-circe recited curses , and spoke magic words , worshipping [unknown gods]8823-unknown gods , with unknown incantations , by which [she]1337-circe used to dim the face of the bright moon , and veil [[her]1337-circe father]1694-her father ’s orb , with moisture - loving cloud . Now , also , by [her]1337-circe song , the sky is darkened , and [the earth]1463-the earth breathes out fog , and [[his]1694-her father companions]2277-his companions wander on [blind trails]8827-blind trails , and [the king]6572-the king ’s protection is lost . Having made the time and place , [she]1337-circe says : ‘[1350-eurylochus] O , by those eyes , that have captured [mine]5263-mine , and by that beauty , most handsome of youths , that has made [a goddess]6068-a goddess suppliant to [you]5265-you , think of [my]0-i passion , and accept the sun , who sees all things , as [[your]5265-you father - in - law]8035-your father - in - law . Do not , unfeelingly , despise [Circe]1337-circe , [daughter of [Titan]569-aurora]5267-daughter of titan . ’ [She]1337-circe spoke : [he]0-i fiercely rejected [her]1337-circe and [her]1337-circe entreaties , and said : ‘[5267-daughter of titan] Whoever [you]1337-circe may be , [I]0-i am not for [you]1337-circe . [Another]2286-another has captured [my]0-i love and holds [me]0-i , and [I]0-i hope [she]2286-another will hold [me]0-i forever . While the fates guard [Canens]1355-canens , [[Janus]1354-janus ’s daughter]5269-janus ’s daughter , for [me]0-i , [I]0-i will not harm [our]5270-our bond of affection by an alien love . Repeating [her]1337-circe entreaties , time and again , in vain , [Circe]1337-circe cried : ‘ [You]0-i will not go unpunished , or return to [[your]0-i Canens]8829-your canens , and [you]0-i will learn the truth of what [the wounded]8830-the wounded ; [a lover]6116-a lover ; [a woman]1994-a woman , can do : and [Circe]1337-circe is [a lover]6116-a lover ; is wounded ; is [a woman]1994-a woman ! ’[1337-circe] Then twice to the west , twice to the east , [she]1337-circe turned ; thrice touched [the youth]1842-the youth with [her]1337-circe wand , thrice spoke an incantation . [He]1842-the youth ran , but was surprised to find [himself]1842-the youth running faster than before : [he]1842-the youth saw wings appear on [his]1842-the youth body . Angered at [his]1842-the youth sudden transformation to [a strange bird in [the woods of [Latium]410-latium]5273-the woods of latium]5272-a strange bird in the woods of latium , [he]1842-the youth pecked at the rough oak wood with [his]1842-the youth hard beak , and in fury wounded the long branches . The feathers of [his]1842-the youth crown and nape took on the colour of [his]1842-the youth crimson cloak , and what had been a golden brooch , pinning [his]1842-the youth clothes , became plumage , and [his]1842-the youth neck was surrounded behind by green - gold . Nothing was left to [Picus]1352-picus of [his]1842-the youth former being , except [his]1842-the youth name . ” ’ ‘[1337-circe] “ Meanwhile , [[his]1842-the youth companions]2277-his companions came upon [Circe]1337-circe , after calling for [Picus]1352-picus through [the fields]1522-the fields , often , and uselessly ( [she]1337-circe had now thinned the mist , and dispersed the clouds with winds , and revealed the sun ) . [They]2277-his companions pressed true charges against [her]1337-circe ; demanded [the king]6572-the king ; showed force ; and prepared to attack [her]1337-circe with deadly spears . [She]1337-circe sprinkled [them]2277-his companions with harmful drugs and poisonous juices , summoning [Night]914-night and [the gods of Night]5277-the gods of night , from [Erebus]158-erebus and [Chaos]1357-chaos , and calling on [Hecate]890-hecate with long wailing cries . Marvellous to say , the trees tore from their roots , the earth rumbled , [the surrounding woods]5278-the surrounding woods turned white , and the grass [she]1337-circe sprinkled was wet with drops of blood . And the stones seemed to emit harsh groans , and dogs to bark , and the ground to crawl with black snakes , and the ghostly shades of the dead to hover . [The terrified band]5279-the terrified band shuddered at [these monstrosities]5280-these monstrosities . [She]1337-circe touched the fearful , stunned , faces with [her]1337-circe wand , and , at its contact , the monstrous forms of various wild beasts appeared , as [the warriors]7415-the warriors were transformed : none of [them]7415-the warriors retained [his]7415-the warriors human form . Now [Phoebus]519-phoebus , setting , dyed [the shores of [Spain]284-spain]5282-the shores of spain , and [Canens]1355-canens was looking , in vain , for [[her]1355-canens husband]5872-her husband , with [her]1355-canens eyes and in [her]1355-canens thoughts . [[Her]1355-canens servants]7694-her servants , and [[her]1355-canens people]2551-her people , ran through [the woods]1690-the woods to meet [him]5872-her husband , carrying torches . [The nymph]1783-the nymph was not satisfied with weeping , and tearing at [her]1355-canens hair , and beating [her]1355-canens breast ( though [she]1783-the nymph did all those things ) and [she]1783-the nymph rushed out [herself]1783-the nymph , and roamed madly through [the fields of [Latium]410-latium]5288-the fields of latium . Six nights , and as many returns of the sun ’s light , found [her]1783-the nymph wandering , without food or sleep , through [valleys]5289-valleys and [hills]1659-hills , wherever chance lead [her]1783-the nymph . [Tiber]411-the tiber was last to see [her]1783-the nymph , as [she]1783-the nymph lay down , weary with grief and journeying , on [[his]411-the tiber wide banks]5291-his wide banks . There , [she]1783-the nymph poured out [her]1783-the nymph words of grief , tearfully , in faint tones , in harmony with sadness , just as the swan sings once , in dying , its own funeral song . At the last [she]1783-the nymph melted away , wasted by grief , liquefied to the marrow , little by little vanishing into thin air . But [her]1783-the nymph story is signified by [the place]1552-the place , that [the Muses of old]5293-the muses of old , fittingly , called [Canens]1355-canens , from [the nymph]1783-the nymph ’s name . ” ’ ‘[0-i] [I]0-i heard many such stories , and saw many things throughout that long year . Sluggish and torpid , through inactivity , [we]5295-we were commanded to spread the sails and travel [the seas]2725-the seas again . [Circe]1337-circe , [[the Titan]5870-the titan ’s daughter]5871-the titan ’s daughter , had told [us]5295-we of the fierce dangers of [the seas]2725-the seas to come , [the dangerous channels]5300-the dangerous channels , and [the vast reaches]5301-the vast reaches : [I]0-i confess [I]0-i was afraid , and finding [this shore]5302-this shore , [I]0-i clung to it . ’ [Macareus]888-macareus had done . [[Aeneas]1321-aeneas ’s nurse]8835-aeneas ’s nurse , [Caieta]1346-caieta , was interred in a marble urn , having a brief epitaph carved on [her]1346-caieta tomb : HERE [HE]1321-aeneas WHOM [I]0-i , [CAIETA]419-caieta , NURSED , WHO , NOTED FOR [HIS]1321-aeneas PIETY , SAVED [ME]0-i FROM [ACHAEAN FIRE]420-achaean fire , AS IS RIGHT , CREMATED [ME]0-i . Freeing [their]8836-their cables from [the grassy shore]8837-the grassy shore , and keeping far away from [the treacherous island]8838-the treacherous island and [the home of [the infamous goddess]8840-the infamous goddess]8839-the home of the infamous goddess , [the Trojans]4754-the trojans sought [the groves where [dark - shadowed Tiber , rushes , yellow with sand]8843-dark - shadowed tiber , rushes , yellow with sand , to [the sea]1464-the sea]8842-the groves where dark - shadowed tiber , rushes , yellow with sand , to the sea . There , [Aeneas]1321-aeneas won [the daughter]2598-the daughter , [Lavinia]1359-lavinia , and [the kingdom of Latinus]8846-the kingdom of latinus , [son of [Faunus]905-faunus]8847-son of faunus , but not without a battle . [Turnus]1360-turnus fights with fury for [[his]1360-turnus promised bride]8848-his promised bride , and war is waged with [a fierce people]8849-a fierce people . [All Etruria]8850-all etruria clashes with [Latium]410-latium , and for a long time , with anxious struggle , hard - fought victory is looked for . Both sides add to [their]8851-their strength with outside aid , and [many]1691-many support [the Rutuli]1361-the rutuli , [many others [the Trojan camp]8854-the trojan camp]8853-many others the trojan camp . [Aeneas]1321-aeneas did not seek help from [Evander]1362-evander in vain , but [Venulus]1363-venulus , sent by [Turnus]1360-turnus , had no profit from [the city of exiled Diomede]8855-the city of exiled diomede . [He]1363-venulus had founded [a major city]8856-a major city , [Arpi]421-arpi , in [[Daunus]422-daunus ’s kingdom of [Iapygia]424-iapygia]423-daunus ’s kingdom of iapygia , and held [the country]6548-the country given [him]1363-venulus as a dowry . When [Venulus]1363-venulus had done as [Turnus]1360-turnus commanded and asked for help , [Diomede]1073-diomede , [[Aetolia]1364-aetolia ’s hero]8858-aetolia ’s hero , pleaded lack of resources as an excuse : [he]1363-venulus did not wish to commit [himself]1363-venulus or [[[his]1363-venulus father]1775-his father - in - law ’s people]8860-his father - in - law ’s people , nor had [he]1363-venulus [any men of [his]1363-venulus own race [he]1363-venulus could arm]8861-any men of his own race he could arm . ‘[0-i] So that [you]5303-you do not think that these are lies , ’ [he]0-i said , ‘[0-i] [I]0-i will endure the telling of [my]0-i story patiently , though its mention renews [my]0-i bitter grief . When [high Ilium]339-ilium had been burned , and [Pergama]349-pergama had fed the Greek fires , and when [the lesser Ajax]4959-the lesser ajax , [hero of [Naryx]426-naryx]5305-hero of naryx , had brought down , on [us]5306-we all , [the virgin goddess]2072-the virgin goddess [Minerva]1304-minerva ’s punishment , that [he]4959-the lesser ajax alone deserved , for the rape of [virgin Cassandra]1310-cassandra , [we]5306-we Greeks were taken , and scattered by storms , over [the hostile seas]5308-the hostile seas . [We]5306-we suffered lightning , darkness , and storms , the anger of [sea]1450-sea and sky , and [Cape Caphereus]1365-cape caphereus , the culminating disaster . Not to waste time by telling [you]5303-you [our]5306-we sad misfortunes one by one , [the Greeks]4756-the greeks then might even have appeared to warrant [Priam]1181-priam ’s tears . [Warrior Minerva]1366-minerva ’s saving care for [me]0-i , however , rescued [me]0-i from the waves . But [I]0-i was driven from [[my]0-i native country]6991-my native country again , for gentle [Venus]1331-venus , remembering the wound [I]0-i had once given [her]1331-venus , exacted punishment . [I]0-i suffered such great toils in [the deep sea]2703-the deep sea , such conflicts on [land]1458-land , that [I]0-i often called [those happy whom the storm]5314-those happy whom the storm that [we]5306-we shared , and [the troubled waters of [Caphereus]427-caphereus]5315-the troubled waters of caphereus , drowned , and [I]0-i longed to have been [one of [them]5314-those happy whom the storm]7562-one of them . ’ ‘[0-i] Now [[my]0-i friends]2469-my friends lost heart , having endured ultimate misery in war and on [the sea]1464-the sea , and begged [me]0-i to end [our]5306-we wanderings . But fiery - natured [Acmon]1367-acmon , truly exasperated by [our]5306-we disasters , said : “ What is left , indeed , [men]5788-men , that [your]5788-men patience would not bear ? What more could [Cytherean Venus]523-venus do , do [you]5788-men think , if [she]523-venus wished to ? When [we]5306-we fear the worst there is a place for prayer , but when [our]5306-we lot is worst , fear is under [our]5306-we feet , and at the height of misfortune [we]5306-we are unconcerned . Though [she]523-venus [herself]523-venus should hear [me]0-i , though [she]523-venus should hate , as [she]523-venus does , all those under [Diomede]1073-diomede ’s command , yet [we]5306-we all scorn [her]523-venus hatred . Great powers hardly count as great to [us]5306-we . ” [Acmon of Pleuron]1367-acmon goaded [Venus]523-venus with these insulting words , and rekindled [her]523-venus former anger . [Few of [us]5306-we]5320-few of us approved of what [he]1367-acmon said : [the majority of [[his]1367-acmon friends]2223-his friends]5321-the majority of his friends reproved [him]1367-acmon , and when [he]1367-acmon tried to answer , [his]1367-acmon voice and throat grew attenuated ; [his]1367-acmon hair turned to plumage ; and plumage covered [his]1367-acmon newly formed neck , chest and back . [His]1367-acmon arms received large feathers , and [his]1367-acmon elbows twisted to form swift wings ; [his]1367-acmon toes took up most of [his]1367-acmon feet , and [his]1367-acmon face hardened and stiffened like horn , and ended in a pointed beak . [Lycus]1222-lycus , and [Idas]806-idas , Rhexenor , [Nycteus]1368-nycteus and [Abas]775-abas , marvelled at [him]1367-acmon , and while [they]5323-they marvelled , [they]5323-they took the same form . [The larger number of the flock]5324-the larger number of the flock rose , and circled [the oarsmen on beating wings]5325-the oarsmen on beating wings . If [you]5326-you ask the shape of these suddenly created birds , [they]5323-they were like white swans , though they were not swans . Now [I]0-i can scarcely hold [this house]5327-this house , and [[its]5327-this house parched fields]5328-its parched fields , as [[Daunus of Iapygia]423-daunus ’s kingdom of iapygia ’s son - in - law]5329-daunus of iapygia ’s son - in - law , with [this tiny remnant of [[my]0-i friends]2469-my friends]5330-this tiny remnant of my friends . ’ So said [Diomede]1073-diomede , [grandson of [Oeneus of [Calydon]182-calydon]8863-oeneus of calydon]8862-grandson of oeneus of calydon . [Venulus]1363-venulus left [that kingdom]8864-that kingdom passing [the Peucetian valleys]8865-the peucetian valleys , and [the fields of [Messapia]428-messapia]8866-the fields of messapia . Here [he]1363-venulus came across [a cave , dark with trees]8867-a cave , dark with trees , and masked by slender reeds , that now is held by [the goat - god [Pan]549-pan]8868-the goat - god pan , but once was held by [the nymphs]5945-the nymphs . [A shepherd from [that region of [Apulia]429-apulia]8871-that region of apulia]8870-a shepherd from that region of apulia scared [them]5945-the nymphs to flight , at first , suddenly inspiring terror in [them]5945-the nymphs . When [they]5945-the nymphs had collected [their]5945-the nymphs wits , scornful of [[their]5945-the nymphs pursuer]8872-their pursuer , [they]5945-the nymphs returned to [their]5945-the nymphs dancing , feet skipping to the measure . [The shepherd]8873-the shepherd mocked [them]5945-the nymphs , leaping wildly in imitation , and adding foul language , with coarse abuse . Nor was [his]5332-his mouth silent till tree - bark imprisoned [his]5332-his throat : [he]5332-his is indeed a tree : [you]8874-you may know its character , by the taste of its fruit that bears the mark of [his]5332-his speech in the wild olives ’[5332-his] bitterness . The sharpness of [his]5332-his words has entered [them]5333-them . When [the ambassadors]5334-the ambassadors returned , saying that [Aetolia]1364-aetolia ’s arms were denied [them]5334-the ambassadors , [the Rutuli]5335-the rutuli pursued war without [their]5334-the ambassadors help , and much blood was spilled on both sides . [Turnus]1360-turnus attacked [the pinewood ships]5336-the pinewood ships , with devouring fire , and [the Trojans]4754-the trojans feared to lose by fire what [the sea]1464-the sea had spared . Now [Mulciber]556-mulciber ’s flames burned the pitch and wax , and other fuel , and climbed the tall masts to the sails , and the thwarts across the curved hulls were smouldering , when [Cybele]1126-cybele , [the sacred mother of the gods]5339-the sacred mother of the gods , remembering that these pines were felled on [[Mount Ida]577-mount ida ’s summit]5340-mount ida ’s summit , filled the air with the clashing throb of bronze cymbals , and the shrilling of boxwood flutes . Carried through the clear air by tame lions , [she]1126-cybele cried out : ‘ [Turnus]1360-turnus , [you]1360-turnus hurl [those firebrands]8875-those firebrands , with sacrilegious hands , in vain ! [I]1126-cybele will save : [I]1126-cybele will not allow the devouring fire to burn what was part of [[my]1126-cybele woods]8876-my woods and belongs to [me]1126-cybele . ’[1126-cybele] As [the goddess]5864-the goddess spoke it thundered , and , after the thunder , heavy rain , and leaping hail , fell , and the winds , [the brothers]5342-the brothers , [sons of Astraeus the Titan by [Aurora]569-aurora]569-aurora , troubled the air and [the sea]1464-the sea , swollen by the sudden onrush , and joined the conflict . [The all - sustaining mother goddess]5344-the all - sustaining mother goddess , used the force of one of [them]5345-them , and broke the hempen cables of [the Trojan ships]8691-the trojan ships , drove [them]8691-the trojan ships headlong , and sank [them]8691-the trojan ships in [the deep ocean]8151-the deep ocean . [Their]8691-the trojan ships rigidity softened , and [their]8691-the trojan ships wood turned to flesh ; the curved sternposts turned into heads ; the oars into fingers and legs , swimming ; the sides of [each vessel]5348-each vessel became flanks , and the submerged keel down [the ship]2497-the ship ’s middle turned into a spine ; the cordage became soft hair , the yards were arms ; and [their]8691-the trojan ships dusky colour was as before . [Naiads of [the waters]1626-the waters]5350-naiads of the waters , [they]5350-naiads of the waters play , in the waves [they]5350-naiads of the waters used to fear , and born on [the hills]5818-the hills [they]5350-naiads of the waters frequent [the gentle sea]5353-the gentle sea , and [their]5350-naiads of the waters origin does not affect [them]5350-naiads of the waters . Yet not forgetting how many dangers [they]5350-naiads of the waters have often endured on [the ocean]1657-the ocean , [they]5350-naiads of the waters often place [their]5350-naiads of the waters hands beneath [storm - tossed boats]5355-storm - tossed boats , unless [they]5350-naiads of the waters have carried [Greeks]1188-greeks . Remembering , as yet , the Trojan disaster , [they]5350-naiads of the waters hate [the Pelasgians]5356-the pelasgians and with joyful faces [they]5350-naiads of the waters saw the wreckage of [[Ulysses]1271-ulysses ’s ship]5357-ulysses ’s ship , and with joyful faces [they]5350-naiads of the waters saw [[King Alcinous]1370-king alcinous ’s vessel]5358-king alcinous ’s vessel become a rock , its wood turning to stone . There was hope that [the Rutuli]5335-the rutuli , in awe of the wonder of the Trojan fleet being turned into [sea - nymphs]5360-sea - nymphs , would abandon the war . It continued , and [both sides]8114-both sides had [gods]1446-gods to help [them]8114-both sides , and courage that is worth as much as [the gods]1538-the gods ’ assistance . Now [they]8114-both sides were not seeking [a kingdom as a dowry]8877-a kingdom as a dowry , nor [a father - in - law]8643-a father - in - law ’s sceptre , nor [you]8879-you , [virgin Lavinia]1359-lavinia , but to win : and [they]8114-both sides waged war because [they]8114-both sides were ashamed to surrender . At length [Turnus]1360-turnus fell , and [Venus]523-venus saw [[her]523-venus son]6039-her son ’s weapons victorious . [Ardea]1371-ardea fell , spoken of as a power while [Turnus]1360-turnus lived . After the savage fires had destroyed [it]1371-ardea , and warm ashes buried [[its]1371-ardea houses]8881-its houses , a bird flew from [the ruins]8882-the ruins , one now seen for the first time , and beat at the embers with flapping wings . [Its]1371-ardea cry , its leanness , its pallor , everything that fitted [the captured city]8883-the captured city , even its name , ardea , the heron , survived in the bird : and in the beating of [its]1371-ardea wings , [Ardea]1371-ardea mourns itself . [Aeneas]1321-aeneas ’s virtues had compelled [all the gods]1558-all the gods , even [Juno]525-juno [herself]525-juno , to bring to an end [their]8114-both sides ancient feud , and since [[his]1321-aeneas young son]8885-his young son [Julus]1372-julus ’s fortunes were firmly founded , [[Cytherea]737-cytherea ’s heroic son]8886-cytherea ’s heroic son was ripe for heaven . [Venus]523-venus had sought the opinion of [the gods]1538-the gods , and throwing [her]523-venus arms round [[her]523-venus father]1694-her father ’s neck , had said ‘[5364-you] [You]5364-you have never been harsh to [me]0-i , [father]5922-father , now be kindest of all , [I]0-i beg [you]5922-father . Grant [[my]0-i Aeneas , who claims [you]5922-father as [[his]5367-he grandfather]2444-his grandfather through [my]0-i bloodline , some divinity , however little - [you]5922-father choose - so long as [you]5922-father grant [him]5367-he something ! It is enough that [he]5367-he once gazed on [the hateful kingdom]5369-the hateful kingdom , once crossed [the steams of [Styx]194-the styx]5370-the steams of styx]5366-my aeneas , who claims you as his grandfather through my bloodline , some divinity , however little - you choose - so long as you grant him something ! it is enough that he once gazed on the hateful kingdom , once crossed the steams of styx . ’ [The gods]1538-the gods agreed , and [Juno]525-juno , [the royal consort]8890-the royal consort , did not display [her]525-juno severe expression , but consented peacefully . Then [Jupiter]1273-jupiter said : ‘[5367-he] [You]5922-father are worthy of this divine gift , [you]5922-father who ask , as is [he]5367-he for whom [you]5922-father ask it : [[my]0-i daughter]5934-my daughter , possess what [you]5922-father desire ! ’ The word was spoken : with joy [she]5934-my daughter thanked [[her]5934-my daughter father]1694-her father , and drawn by [her]5934-my daughter team of doves through the clear air , [she]5934-my daughter came to [the coast of [Laurentum]416-laurentum]8892-the coast of laurentum , where [the waters of [the River Numicius]412-the river numicius]8893-the waters of the river numicius , hidden by reeds , wind down to [the neighbouring sea]8894-the neighbouring sea . [She]5934-my daughter ordered [the river - god]2896-the river - god to cleanse [Aeneas]1321-aeneas , of whatever was subject to death , and bear it away , in [his]1321-aeneas silent course , into [the depths of the ocean]8896-the depths of the ocean . [The horned god]8897-the horned god executed [Venus]523-venus ’s orders , and purged [Aeneas]1321-aeneas of whatever was mortal , and dispersed it on [the water]1620-the water : what was best in [him]1321-aeneas remained . Once purified , [[his]1321-aeneas mother]5953-his mother anointed [his]1321-aeneas body with divine perfume , touched [his]1321-aeneas lips with a mixture of sweet nectar and ambrosia , and made [him]1321-aeneas [a god]1461-a god , whom [the Romans]8901-the romans named [Indiges]1373-indiges , admitting [him]1321-aeneas to [[their]8901-the romans temples and altars]8902-their temples and altars . After that [the Alban]8903-the alban and [Latin kingdom]8904-latin kingdom had both names under [Ascanius]1323-ascanius . [Silvius]1374-silvius succeeded [him]1374-silvius , whose son claimed the name [Latinus]1375-latinus , with the sceptre . The famous Alba followed [Latinus]1375-latinus , and then [Epytus]1376-epytus inherited . After [him]1374-silvius came first [Capys]1377-capys , and then [Capetus]1378-capetus . [Tiberinus]1379-tiberinus inherited [the kingdom]2774-the kingdom from [them]8906-them , who , drowning in [the waters of [that Tuscan stream]8908-that tuscan stream]8907-the waters of that tuscan stream , gave [his]1379-tiberinus name to [the River Tiber]431-the river tiber . [[His]1379-tiberinus sons]3652-his sons were [Acrota]1380-acrota [the warrior]8910-the warrior , and [Remulus]1381-remulus . [The elder Remulus]8911-the elder remulus was killed by a lightning - bolt , when trying to portray the lightning . [Acrota]1380-acrota , more restrained than [[his]1380-acrota brother]1593-his brother , passed the sceptre to [brave Aventinus , who lies buried on [the very hill where [he]8913-brave aventinus , who lies buried on the very hill where he reigned , and has given his name to it , the aventine hill reigned]8914-the very hill where he reigned , and has given [his]8913-brave aventinus , who lies buried on the very hill where he reigned , and has given his name to it , the aventine hill name to [it]8914-the very hill where he reigned , [the Aventine hill]8915-the aventine hill]8913-brave aventinus , who lies buried on the very hill where he reigned , and has given his name to it , the aventine hill . And then [Proca]1382-proca had the rule of [the Palatine people]8916-the palatine people . [Pomona]1383-pomona lived in [this king]8917-this king ’s reign . [No other hamadryad , of [the wood nymphs of [Latium]410-latium]8919-the wood nymphs of latium]8918-no other hamadryad , of the wood nymphs of latium , tended [the gardens]8920-the gardens more skilfully or was more devoted to [the orchards]8921-the orchards ’[5922-father] care , hence [her]5372-she name . [She]5372-she loved [the fields]1522-the fields and the branches loaded with ripe apples , not [the woods]1690-the woods and [rivers]8062-rivers . [She]5372-she carried a curved pruning knife , not a javelin , with which [she]5372-she cut back the luxuriant growth , and lopped the branches spreading out here and there , now splitting the bark and inserting a graft , providing sap from a different stock for the nursling . [She]5372-she would not allow [them]5376-them to suffer from being parched , watering , in trickling streams , the twining tendrils of thirsty root . This was [her]5372-she love , and [her]5372-she passion , and [she]5372-she had no longing for desire . Still fearing boorish aggression , [she]5372-she enclosed [herself]5372-she in [an orchard]5377-an orchard , and denied an entrance , and shunned [men]5788-men . What did [the Satyrs]5946-the satyrs , fitted by [their]5946-the satyrs youth for dancing , not do to possess [her]5372-she , and the Pans with pine - wreathed horns , and [Silvanus]1384-silvanus , always younger than [his]1384-silvanus years , and [Priapus]1088-obscene priapus , [the god who scares off [thieves]5381-thieves , with [his]1384-silvanus pruning hook or [his]1384-silvanus phallus]5380-the god who scares off thieves , with his pruning hook or his phallus ? But [Vertumnus]1385-vertumnus surpassed [them]5382-them all , even , in [his]1385-vertumnus love , though [he]1385-vertumnus was no more fortunate than [them]5382-them . O how often , disguised as [an uncouth reaper]5383-an uncouth reaper , [he]1385-vertumnus would bring [her]5372-she a basket filled with ears of barley , and [he]1385-vertumnus was the perfect image of [a reaper]5384-a reaper ! Often [he]1385-vertumnus would display [his]1385-vertumnus forehead bound with freshly cut hay , and might seem to have been tossing the new - mown grass . Often [he]1385-vertumnus would be carrying an ox - goad in [his]1385-vertumnus stiff hand , so that [you]5385-you would swear [he]1385-vertumnus had just unyoked [[his]1385-vertumnus weary team]5386-his weary team . Given a knife [he]1385-vertumnus was [a dresser and pruner of vines]5387-a dresser and pruner of vines : [he]1385-vertumnus would carry a ladder : [you]5385-you would think [he]1385-vertumnus ’d be picking apples . [He]1385-vertumnus was [a soldier with a sword]5388-a soldier with a sword , or [a fisherman]3768-a fisherman taking up [his]3768-a fisherman rod . In short , by [his]1385-vertumnus many disguises , [he]1385-vertumnus frequently gained admittance , and found joy , gazing at [her]5390-you beauty . Once , [he]1385-vertumnus even covered [his]1385-vertumnus head with a coloured scarf , and leaning on a staff , with a wig of grey hair , imitated [an old woman]2330-an old woman . [He]1385-vertumnus entered [the well - tended garden]5392-the well - tended garden , and admiring the fruit , said : ‘ [You]5390-you are so much more lovely ’[1385-vertumnus] , and gave [her]5390-you a few congratulatory kisses , as [no true old woman]5393-no true old woman would have done . [He]1385-vertumnus sat on the flattened grass , looking at the branches bending , weighed down with autumn fruit . There was a specimen elm opposite , covered with gleaming bunches of grapes . After [he]1385-vertumnus had praised it , and its companion vine , [he]1385-vertumnus said : ‘ But if that tree stood there , unmated , without [its]1385-vertumnus vine , [it]1385-vertumnus would not be sought after for more than [its]1385-vertumnus leaves , and the vine also , which is joined to and rests on the elm , would lie on the ground , if it were not married to it , and leaning on it . But [you]5390-you are not moved by this tree ’s example , and [you]5390-you shun marriage , and do not care to be [we]8922-we d. [I]1385-vertumnus wish that [you]5390-you did ! [Helen]1287-helen would not have had [more suitors]8923-more suitors to trouble [her]1287-helen , or [Hippodamia]1386-hippodamia , who caused the Lapithae problems , or [Penelope]1028-penelope , [wife of that Ulysses , who was delayed too long at the war]8924-wife of that ulysses , who was delayed too long at the war . Even now [a thousand men]4758-a thousand men want [you]5390-you , and [the demi - gods]8926-the demi - gods and the gods , and the divinities that haunt [the Alban hills]8927-the alban hills , though [you]5390-you shun [them]4758-a thousand men and turn away from [their]4758-a thousand men wooing . But if [you]5390-you are wise , if [you]5390-you want to marry well , and listen to [this old woman]8928-this old woman , that loves [you]5390-you more than [you]5390-you think , more than [them]4758-a thousand men all , reject [their]4758-a thousand men vulgar offers , and choose [Vertumnus]1385-vertumnus to share [your]5390-you bed ! [You]5390-you have [my]1385-vertumnus assurance as well : [he]1385-vertumnus is not better known to [himself]1385-vertumnus than [he]1385-vertumnus is to [me]1385-vertumnus : [he]1385-vertumnus does not wander here and there in [the wide world]5935-the wide world : [he]1385-vertumnus lives on [his]1385-vertumnus own in [this place]6354-this place : and [he]1385-vertumnus does not love [the latest girl [he]1385-vertumnus has seen]8931-the latest girl he has seen , as most of [[your]5390-you suitors]8932-your suitors do . [You]5390-you will be [his]1385-vertumnus first love , and [you]5390-you will be [his]1385-vertumnus last , and [he]1385-vertumnus will devote [his]1385-vertumnus life only to [you]5390-you . And then [he]1385-vertumnus is young , is blessed with natural charm , can take on a fitting appearance , and whatever is ordered , though [you]5390-you ask all , [he]1385-vertumnus will do . Besides , that which [you]5390-you love the same , those apples [you]5390-you cherish , [he]1385-vertumnus is the first to have , and with joy holds [your]5390-you gifts in [his]1385-vertumnus hand ! But [he]1385-vertumnus does not desire now the fruit of [your]5390-you trees , or the sweet juice of [your]5390-you herbs : [he]1385-vertumnus desires nothing but [you]5390-you . Take pity on [his]1385-vertumnus ardour , and believe that [he]1385-vertumnus , who seeks [you]5390-you , is begging [you]5390-you , in person , through [my]1385-vertumnus mouth . Fear [the vengeful gods]8933-the vengeful gods , and [Idalian Venus]1387-venus , who hates [the hard - hearted]8934-the hard - hearted , and [Rhamnusian Nemesis]688-nemesis , [her]1387-venus inexorable wrath ! That [you]5390-you may fear [them]8935-them more ( since [my]1385-vertumnus long life has given [me]1385-vertumnus knowledge of many tales ) [I]1385-vertumnus will tell [you]5390-you a story , famous through all of [Cyprus]315-cyprus , by which [you]5390-you might easily be swayed and softened . ’[1385-vertumnus] ‘ Once , [Iphis]1109-iphis , [a youth , born of humble stock]8936-a youth , born of humble stock , saw [noble Anaxarete]1388-noble anaxarete , of the blood of [Teucer]1284-teucer , saw [her]8937-her , and felt the fire of passion in every bone . [He]8936-a youth , born of humble stock fought it for a long time , but when [he]8936-a youth , born of humble stock could not conquer [his]8936-a youth , born of humble stock madness by reason , [he]8936-a youth , born of humble stock came begging at [her]8937-her threshold . Now [he]8936-a youth , born of humble stock would confess [his]8936-a youth , born of humble stock sorry love to [[her]8937-her nurse]3142-her nurse , asking [her]3142-her nurse not to be hard on [him]8936-a youth , born of humble stock , by the hopes [she]3142-her nurse had for [[her]3142-her nurse darling]8939-her darling . At other times [he]8936-a youth , born of humble stock flattered [each of [[her]8937-her many attendants]8941-her many attendants]8940-each of her many attendants , with enticing words , seeking [their]8940-each of her many attendants favourable disposition . Often [he]8936-a youth , born of humble stock gave [them]8940-each of her many attendants messages to carry to [her]8937-her , in the form of fawning letters . Sometimes [he]8936-a youth , born of humble stock hung garlands on [her]8937-her doorpost wet with [his]8936-a youth , born of humble stock tears , and lay with [his]8936-a youth , born of humble stock soft flank on the hard threshold , complaining at the pitiless bolts barring the way . But [she]8937-her spurned , and mocked , [him]8936-a youth , born of humble stock , crueler than the surging sea , when the Kids set ; harder than steel tempered in the fires of [Noricum]432-noricum ; or natural rock still rooted to its bed . And [she]8937-her added proud , insolent words to harsh actions , robbing [[her]8937-her lover]2335-her lover of hope , as well . Unable to endure the pain of [his]8936-a youth , born of humble stock long torment , [Iphis]1109-iphis spoke these last words before [her]8937-her door . “ [You]8937-her have conquered , [Anaxarete]1388-noble anaxarete , and [you]8937-her will not have to suffer any tedium on [my]1385-vertumnus account . Devise glad triumphs , and sing the Paean of victory , and wreathe [your]8937-her brow with shining laurel ! [You]8937-her have conquered , and [I]1385-vertumnus die gladly : now , heart of steel , rejoice ! Now [you]8937-her will have something to praise about [my]1385-vertumnus love , something that pleases [you]8937-her . Remember that [my]1385-vertumnus love for [you]8937-her did not end before life itself , and that [I]1385-vertumnus lose twin lights in one . No mere rumour will come to [you]8937-her to announce [my]1385-vertumnus death : have no doubt , [I]1385-vertumnus [myself]1385-vertumnus will be there , visibly present , so [you]8937-her can feast [your]8937-her savage eyes on [my]1385-vertumnus lifeless corpse . Yet , if [you]8937-her , [O gods]8943-o gods , see what [mortals]2926-mortals do , let [me]1385-vertumnus be remembered ( [my]1385-vertumnus tongue can bear to ask for nothing more ) , and suffer [my]1385-vertumnus tale to be told , in future ages , and grant , to [my]1385-vertumnus fame , the years , [you]8937-her have taken from [my]1385-vertumnus life . ” [He]1385-vertumnus spoke , and lifted [his]1385-vertumnus tear - filled eyes to the doorposts [he]1385-vertumnus had often crowned with flowery garlands , and , raising [his]1385-vertumnus pale arms to them , tied a rope to the cross - beam , saying : “ This wreath will please [you]8937-her , cruel and wicked , as [you]8937-her are ! ” Then [he]1385-vertumnus thrust [his]1385-vertumnus head in the noose , though , as [he]1385-vertumnus hung there , a pitiful burden , [his]1385-vertumnus windpipe crushed , even then [he]1385-vertumnus turned towards [her]8937-her . The drumming of [his]1385-vertumnus feet seemed to sound a request to enter , and when the door was opened it revealed what [he]1385-vertumnus had done . [The servants]8074-the servants shrieked , and lifted [him]1385-vertumnus down , but in vain . Then [they]8074-the servants carried [his]1385-vertumnus body to [[[his]1385-vertumnus mother]5953-his mother ’s house]8947-his mother ’s house ( since [[his]1385-vertumnus father]1775-his father was dead ) . [She]8937-her took [him]1385-vertumnus to [her]8937-her breast , and embraced [[her]8937-her son]6039-her son ’s cold limbs , and when [she]8937-her had said all the words [a distraught father]8950-a distraught father could say , and done the things [distraught mothers]8951-distraught mothers do , weeping , [she]8937-her led [his]1385-vertumnus funeral procession through [the heart of [the city]2547-the city]8952-the heart of the city , carrying the pallid corpse , on a bier , to the pyre . The sound of mourning rose to the ears of [stony - hearted Anaxarete]8954-stony - hearted anaxarete , [[her]8937-her house]8955-her house chancing to be near [the street]8956-the street , where the sad procession passed . Now [a vengeful god]8957-a vengeful god roused [her]8937-her . Still , [she]8937-her was roused , and said : “ Let [us]8958-us see this miserable funeral ” and went to [a rooftop room with open windows]8959-a rooftop room with open windows . [She]8937-her had barely looked at [Iphis]1109-iphis , lying on the bier , when [her]8937-her eyes grew fixed , and the warm blood left [her]8937-her pallid body . Trying to step backwards [she]8937-her was rooted : trying to turn [her]8937-her face away , also , [she]8937-her could not . Gradually the stone that had long existed in [her]8937-her heart possessed [her]8937-her body . If [you]8960-you think this is only a tale , [Salamis]1389-salamis still preserves the image of [the lady]8961-the lady as a statue , and also possesses [a temple of Gazing Venus]8962-a temple of gazing venus . Remember all this , [O nymph of [mine]8964-mine]8963-o nymph of mine : put aside , [I]1385-vertumnus beg [you]8960-you , reluctant pride , and yield to [[your]8960-you lover]4014-your lover . Then the frost will not sear [your]8960-you apples in the bud , nor the storm winds scatter them in flower . ’[1385-vertumnus] When [Vertumnus]1385-vertumnus , [the god , disguised in the shape of the old woman]5394-the god , disguised in the shape of the old woman , had spoken , but to no effect , [he]1385-vertumnus went back to being [a youth]8655-a youth , and threw off the dress of [an old woman]2330-an old woman , and appeared to [Pomona]1383-pomona , in the glowing likeness of the sun , when it overcomes contending clouds , and shines out , unopposed . [He]1385-vertumnus was ready to force [her]2330-an old woman : but no force was needed , and [the nymph captivated by the form of the god]5397-the nymph captivated by the form of the god , felt a mutual passion . Now unjust [Amulius]1390-amulius rules [Ausonia]409-ausonia , by means of military power , and [old Numitor]1391-old numitor , with [[his]1391-old numitor grandson]6475-his grandson [Romulus]1392-romulus ’s help , captures [the kingdom [he]1391-old numitor has lost]5399-the kingdom he has lost , and [the city of Rome]5400-the city of rome is founded , on the day of [the Palilia]433-the palilia . [The Sabine leaders]5401-the sabine leaders , and [[their]5401-the sabine leaders king]1555-their king [Tatius]1393-tatius , wage war , and [Tarpeia]1394-tarpeia who gives [them]5401-the sabine leaders access to [the citadel]4525-the citadel , is punished as [she]1394-tarpeia deserves , stripped of [her]1394-tarpeia life , crushed by a heap of weapons .
