Then [the men of Cures]5404-the men of cures , with hushed voices , silently , like wolves , overcome [the Romans , whose bodies are lost in sleep]5405-the romans , whose bodies are lost in sleep , and attempt the gates that [Romulus]1392-romulus , [son of [Ilia]1395-ilia]5406-son of ilia , has closed , and firmly barred . [Saturnian Juno]513-juno [herself]513-juno unbarred a gate , opening it silently on its hinges . Only [Venus]1387-venus saw that the gate ’s bars had dropped , and would have closed it , except that [one god]4911-one god is never allowed to reverse the actions of [another]2286-another . [The Ausonian Naiads]690-the naiads , owned a spot , adjoining [the temple of Janus , moistened by a cold spring]5409-the temple of janus , moistened by a cold spring . [Venus]1387-venus asked [them]690-the naiads for help : [the nymphs]5945-the nymphs did not refuse [her]1387-venus just request , and elicited the aid of [the streams]2456-the streams , and watercourses , belonging to [[their]690-the naiads fountain]5412-their fountain . But [the pass of [Janus]1354-janus]5413-the pass of janus was still not blocked , and the water did not bar the way : [they]690-the naiads placed yellow sulphur under [their]690-the naiads copious spring , and heated the hollow channels with burning pitch . By these and other means the vapour penetrated the depths of the spring , and [you]5414-you waters that a moment ago dared to compete with Alpine coldness , now did not concede to fire itself ! The twin gateposts smouldered under a fiery spray , and the gate , that vainly promised an entrance to [the tough Sabines]434-the tough sabines , was blocked by [the new waters]5415-the new waters , while [the Roman soldiers]5416-the roman soldiers took up [their]5416-the roman soldiers weapons of war . After this [Romulus]1392-romulus sallied out , and [the Roman soil]5417-the roman soil was strewn with the Sabine dead , and with [Rome]11-rome ’s own , and the impious sword mixed the blood of [son - in - law]5418-son - in - law with the blood of [father - in - law]5419-father - in - law . Yet it was decided not to fight it out to the end , to let peace end war , and that [Tatius]1393-tatius should share the rule of [Rome]11-rome . [Tatius]1393-tatius died , and [you]5414-you , [Romulus]1392-romulus , gave orders equally to [both peoples]5420-both peoples . [Mars]635-mars , removing [his]635-mars helmet , addressed [the father of gods]5421-the father of gods and [men]5788-men in these words : ‘ The time has come , [lord]8966-lord , to grant the reward ( that [you]8966-lord promised to [me]635-mars and [[your]8966-lord deserving grandson]8967-your deserving grandson ) , since the Roman state is strong , on firm foundations , and does not depend on [a single champion]8968-a single champion : free [his]8967-your deserving grandson spirit , and raising [him]8967-your deserving grandson from [earth]1449-earth set [him]8967-your deserving grandson in the heavens . [You]5421-the father of gods once said to [me]635-mars , in person , at a council of [the gods]1538-the gods ( since [I]635-mars am mindful of the gracious words [I]635-mars noted in [my]635-mars retentive mind ) , ‘[635-mars] There will be one whom [you]5421-the father of gods will raise to [azure heaven]5423-azure heaven . ’ Let [your]5421-the father of gods words be ratified in full ! ’[1396-jupiter] [Omnipotent Jupiter]1396-jupiter nodded , and , veiling the sky with dark clouds , [he]1396-jupiter terrified [men]5788-men on [earth]1449-earth with thunder and lightning . [Mars]635-mars knew this as a sign that ratified the promised ascension , and leaning on [his]635-mars spear , [he]635-mars vaulted , fearlessly , into [his]635-mars chariot , the horses straining at the blood - wet pole , and cracked the loud whip . Dropping headlong through the air , [he]635-mars landed on [the summit of [the wooded Palatine]435-the wooded palatine]5426-the summit of the wooded palatine . [The king]6572-the king ’s mortal body dissolved in the clear atmosphere , like the lead bullet , that often melts in mid - air , hurled by the broad thong of a catapult . Now [he]6572-the king has beauty of form , and [he]6572-the king is [Quirinus]1397-quirinus , clothed in ceremonial robes , such a form as is worthier of the sacred high seats of [the gods]1538-the gods . [[His]6572-the king wife]1633-his wife , [Hersilia]1398-hersilia , was mourning [him]6572-the king as lost , when royal [Juno]513-juno ordered [Iris]512-iris to descend to [her]1398-hersilia , by [her]512-iris rainbow path , and carry these commands , to [the widowed queen]5432-the widowed queen : ‘ [O lady]8971-o lady , glory of [the Latin and Sabine peoples]8972-the latin and sabine peoples , worthy before to have been [the wife of [so great a hero]8974-so great a hero]8973-the wife of so great a hero , and now of [Quirinus]1397-quirinus , dry [your]5432-the widowed queen tears , and if it is [your]5432-the widowed queen desire to see [[your]5432-the widowed queen husband]4045-your husband , follow [me]512-iris and seek [the grove]1996-the grove , that flourishes on [the Quirinal hill]8977-the quirinal hill and shades [the temple of [[Rome]11-rome ’s king]8979-rome ’s king]8978-the temple of rome ’s king . ’[512-iris] [Iris]512-iris obeyed , and gliding to [earth]1449-earth along [her]512-iris many - coloured arch addressed [Hersilia]1398-hersilia as [she]512-iris had been ordered . [She]512-iris , hardly raising [her]512-iris eyes , replied , modestly : ‘ [O goddess]8980-o goddess ( since it is not easy for [me]512-iris to say who [you]8980-o goddess are , but it is clear [you]8980-o goddess are [a goddess]6068-a goddess ) , lead on : O , lead on , and show [me]512-iris [[my]512-iris husband]6062-my husband ’s face . If only the fates allow [me]512-iris to see [him]6062-my husband once , [I]512-iris shall declare [I]512-iris have been received in [heaven]1501-heaven . ’[512-iris] Without delay , [she]512-iris climbed to [[Romulus]1392-romulus ’s hill]5434-romulus ’s hill , with [Iris]512-iris , [the virgin daughter of [Thaumas]1177-thaumas]5435-the virgin daughter of thaumas . There a star fell , gliding from sky to [earth]1449-earth , and [Hersilia]1398-hersilia , hair set alight by its fire , vanishes with the star in the air . [The founder of [the Roman city]5438-the roman city]5437-the founder of the roman city receives [her]1398-hersilia in [his]5437-the founder of the roman city familiar embrace , and alters [her]1398-hersilia former body and [her]1398-hersilia name , and calls [her]1398-hersilia [Hora]1399-hora , who , [a goddess]6068-a goddess now , is one with [her]1398-hersilia [Quirinus]1397-quirinus . Meanwhile [the Romans]8901-the romans looked for [a leader , to bear the weight of such responsibility]5441-a leader , to bear the weight of such responsibility , and follow so great [a king]8355-a king : [Fame]1400-fame , [the true harbinger]5443-the true harbinger , determined on the illustrious Numa for the throne . Not content with knowing the rituals of [the Sabine people]5444-the sabine people , with [his]5437-the founder of the roman city capable mind [he]5437-the founder of the roman city conceived a wider project , and delved into the nature of things . [His]5437-the founder of the roman city love of these enquiries led [him]5437-the founder of the roman city to leave [[his]5437-the founder of the roman city native Cures]5445-his native cures , and visit [the city of]7138-the city of [Crotona]436-crotona , to which [Hercules]941-hercules was friendly . When [Numa]1401-numa asked who was [the founder of [this Greek city on [Italian soil]5449-italian soil]5448-this greek city on italian soil]5447-the founder of this greek city on italian soil , one of [the older inhabitants , not ignorant of the past]5450-the older inhabitants , not ignorant of the past , replied : ‘ [They]8901-the romans say that [Hercules]941-hercules , [[Jupiter]1396-jupiter ’s son]6106-jupiter ’s son , back from [the sea]1464-the sea with [the rich herds of [Spain]284-spain]8986-the rich herds of spain , happily came to [the shore of [Lacinium]437-lacinium]8987-the shore of lacinium , and while [his]941-hercules cattle strayed through the tender grass , [he]941-hercules entered [the house of [the great Croton]8989-the great croton]8988-the house of the great croton , [a not inhospitable roof]8990-a not inhospitable roof , and refreshed [himself]941-hercules with rest , after [his]941-hercules long labours , and , in leaving , said : ‘[5450-the older inhabitants , not ignorant of the past] At a future time , there will be [a city here]5451-a city here , of [[your]5452-him descendants]2955-your descendants . ’ And the promise proved true , since there was [one Myscelus , [the son of Alemon of [Argos]28-argos]8992-the son of alemon of argos , dearest to [the gods of all [his]941-hercules generation]8993-the gods of all his generation]8991-one myscelus , the son of alemon of argos , dearest to the gods of all his generation . [Hercules]941-hercules , [the club - bearer]8994-the club - bearer , leaning over [him]5452-him , spoke to [him]5452-him as [he]5452-him lay in a deep sleep : ‘[5450-the older inhabitants , not ignorant of the past] Rise now , leave [[your]5452-him native country]5454-your native country : go , find [the pebble - filled waves of [Aesar]438-aesar]5455-the pebble - filled waves of aesar ! ’ and [he]941-hercules threatened [him]5452-him with many and fearful things if [he]5452-him did not obey . Then [the god]1482-the god and sleep vanished together . [[Alemon]1402-alemon ’s son]8996-alemon ’s son rose , and , in silence , thought over the vision , fresh in [his]8996-alemon ’s son mind . [He]8996-alemon ’s son struggled in [himself]8996-alemon ’s son for a long time over the decision : [the god]1482-the god ordered [him]8996-alemon ’s son to go : the law prohibited [his]8996-alemon ’s son going . Death was the penalty for [the man who wished to change [his]8996-alemon ’s son nationality]8998-the man who wished to change his nationality . [Bright Sol]600-sol had hidden [his]600-sol shining face in [Ocean ’s stream]8999-ocean ’s stream , and [Night]914-night had lifted [her]1482-the god starriest face : [the same god]9000-the same god seemed to appear to [him]8996-alemon ’s son , to admonish [him]8996-alemon ’s son in the same way , and warn of worse and greater punishment if [he]8996-alemon ’s son did not obey . [He]8996-alemon ’s son was afraid , and prepared , at once , to transfer [the sanctuary of [[his]8996-alemon ’s son ancestors]9002-his ancestors]9001-the sanctuary of his ancestors to [a new place]9003-a new place . There was talk in [the city]2547-the city , and [he]8996-alemon ’s son was brought to trial , for showing contempt for the law . When the case against [him]8996-alemon ’s son had been presented , and it was evident the charge was proven , without needing [witnesses]9005-witnesses , [the wretched defendant]9006-the wretched defendant , lifting [his]0-i face and hands to heaven , cried : ‘[5456-you] O [you]5456-you , whose twelve labours gave [you]5456-you the right to heaven , help [me]0-i , [I]0-i beg [you]5456-you ! Since [you]5456-you are the reason for [my]0-i crime . ’ The ancient custom was to vote using black and white pebbles : the black to condemn : the white to absolve from punishment . Now , also , the harsh verdict was determined in this way , and every pebble dropped into the pitiless urn was black : but when the urn was tipped over and the pebbles poured out for [the count]9007-the count , their colour had changed from black to white , and , acquitted through the divine power of [Hercules]941-hercules , [[Alemon]1402-alemon ’s son]8996-alemon ’s son was freed . [He]8996-alemon ’s son first gave thanks to [that son of [Amphitryon]439-amphitryon]9009-that son of amphitryon , [[his]8996-alemon ’s son patron]9010-his patron , and with favouring winds set sail on [the Ionian Sea]440-the ionian sea . [He]8996-alemon ’s son sailed by [Neretum]441-neretum , of [the Sallentines]9011-the sallentines , [Sybaris]442-sybaris , and [the Spartan colony of [Tarentum]443-tarentum]9012-the spartan colony of tarentum , [the bay of [Siris]444-siris]9013-the bay of siris , [Crimisa]445-crimisa , and [the Iapygian fields]9014-the iapygian fields . [He]8996-alemon ’s son had barely passed [the lands that overlook [those seas]9016-those seas]9015-the lands that overlook those seas , when [he]8996-alemon ’s son came , by destiny , to [the mouth of [the river Aesar]438-aesar]9017-the mouth of the river aesar , and near it the tumulus beneath which the earth covered the sacred bones of [Croton]447-croton . [He]8996-alemon ’s son founded [the city of [Crotona]436-crotona]9018-the city of crotona [there]1878-there , in [the land commanded by [the god]1482-the god]9020-the land commanded by the god , and derived the name of [the city]2547-the city from [him]1482-the god , whom the tumulus held . Such were the established beginnings , according to reliable tradition , of [that place]6756-that place , and the cause of [the city]2547-the city ’s being sited on [Italian soil]5449-italian soil . There was [a man]5897-a man [here]6115-here , [Pythagoras]1403-pythagoras , [a Samian by birth]9028-a samian by birth , who had fled [Samos]998-samos and [[its]998-samos rulers]9029-its rulers , and , hating [their]9029-its rulers tyranny , was living in voluntary exile . Though [the gods]1538-the gods were far away , [he]8996-alemon ’s son visited [[their]1538-the gods region of the sky]9031-their region of the sky , in [his]8996-alemon ’s son mind , and what nature denied to human vision [he]8996-alemon ’s son enjoyed with [his]8996-alemon ’s son inner eye . When [he]8996-alemon ’s son had considered every subject through concentrated thought , [he]8996-alemon ’s son communicated it widely in public teaching [the silent crowds]9032-the silent crowds , who listened in wonder to [his]8996-alemon ’s son words , concerning the origin of the vast universe , and of the causes of things ; and what [the physical world]9033-the physical world is ; what [the gods]1538-the gods are ; where the snows arise ; what the origin of lightning is ; whether [Jupiter]1396-jupiter , or the storm - winds , thunder from colliding clouds ; what shakes [the earth]1463-the earth ; by what laws the stars move ; and whatever else is hidden ; and [he]8996-alemon ’s son was the first to denounce the serving of animal flesh at table ; [the first voice , wise but not believed in]9036-the first voice , wise but not believed in , to say , for example , in words like these : ‘[5456-you] [Human beings]1489-human beings , stop desecrating [your]1489-human beings bodies with impious foodstuffs . There are crops ; there are apples weighing down the branches ; and ripening grapes on the vines ; there are flavoursome herbs ; and those that can be rendered mild and gentle over the flames ; and [you]1489-human beings do not lack flowing milk ; or honey fragrant from the flowering thyme . [The earth]1463-the earth , prodigal of its wealth , supplies [you]1489-human beings with gentle sustenance , and offers [you]1489-human beings food without killing or shedding blood . Flesh satisfies the wild beast ’s hunger , though not all of them , since horses , sheep and cattle live on grasses , but those that are wild and savage : Armenian tigers , raging lions , and wolves and bears , enjoy food wet with blood . Oh , how wrong it is for flesh to be made from flesh ; for a greedy body to fatten , by swallowing another body ; for one creature to live by the death of [another creature]5459-another creature ! So amongst such riches that earth , the greatest of [mothers]2432-mothers , yields , [you]1489-human beings are not happy unless [you]1489-human beings tear , with cruel teeth , at pitiful wounds , recalling [Cyclops]679-cyclops ’s practice , and [you]1489-human beings can not satisfy [your]1489-human beings voracious appetite , and [your]1489-human beings restless hunger , unless [you]1489-human beings destroy other life ! But that former age , that [we]5461-us call golden , was happy with the fruit from the trees , and the herbs [the earth]1463-the earth produced , and did not defile its lips with blood . Then birds winged their way through the air in safety , and hares wandered , unafraid , among [the fields]1522-the fields , and its own gullibility did not hook the fish : all was free from trickery , and fearless of any guile , and filled with peace . But once [someone]6346-someone , whoever [he]6346-someone was , [the author of something unfitting]5465-the author of something unfitting , envied the lion ’s prey , and stuffed [his]6346-someone greedy belly with fleshy food , [he]6346-someone paved the way for crime . It may be that , from the first , weapons were warm and bloodstained from the killing of wild beasts , but that would have been enough : [I]0-i admit that creatures that seek [our]5461-us destruction may be killed without it being a sin , but while [they]5466-they may be killed , [they]5466-they still should not be eaten . From that , the wickedness spread further , and it is thought that the pig was first considered to merit slaughter because it rooted up the seeds with its broad snout , and destroyed all hope of harvest . [The goat]5467-the goat was led to death , at the avenging altar , for browsing the vines of [Bacchus]682-bacchus . [These two]5468-these two suffered for [their]5468-these two crimes ! What did [[you]1489-human beings sheep]5469-you sheep do , tranquil flocks , born to serve [man]6314-man , who bring [us]5461-us sweet milk in full udders , who give [us]5461-us [your]1489-human beings wool to make soft clothing , who give [us]5461-us more by [your]1489-human beings life than [you]1489-human beings grant [us]5461-us by dying ? What have [the oxen]5471-the oxen done , without guile or deceit , harmless , simple , born to endure labour ? [He]5471-the oxen is truly thankless , and not worthy of the gift of corn , who could , in a moment , remove the weight of the curved plough , and kill [[his]5471-the oxen labourer]5472-his labourer , striking that work - worn neck with [his]5471-the oxen axe , that has helped turn [the hard earth]3329-the hard earth as many times as [the earth]1463-the earth yielded harvest . It is not enough to have committed such wickedness : [they]5475-they involve [the gods]1538-the gods in crime , and believe that [the gods above delight in the slaughter of suffering oxen]5477-the gods above delight in the slaughter of suffering oxen ! [A victim of outstanding beauty , and without blemish ( since to be pleasing is harmful ) , distinguished by sacrificial ribbons and gold]5478-a victim of outstanding beauty , and without blemish ( since to be pleasing is harmful ) , distinguished by sacrificial ribbons and gold , is positioned in front of the altar , listens unknowingly to the prayers , and sees the corn [it]5479-it has laboured to produce scattered between its horns , and , struck down , stains with blood those knives that it has already caught sight of , perhaps , reflected in the clear water . Immediately [they]5475-they inspect the lungs , ripped from the still - living chest , and from [them]5475-they find out the will of [the gods]1538-the gods . On this ( so great is [man]6314-man ’s hunger for forbidden food ) [you]1489-human beings feed , [O human race]5482-o human race ! Do not , [I]0-i beg [you]1489-human beings , and concentrate [your]1489-human beings minds on [my]0-i admonitions ! When [you]1489-human beings place the flesh of slaughtered cattle in [your]1489-human beings mouths , know and feel , that [you]1489-human beings are devouring [your]1489-human beings fellow - creature . ’ ‘[1489-human beings] Now , since [a god]1461-a god moves [my]0-i lips , [I]0-i will follow , with due rite , [the god who moves those lips]5484-the god who moves those lips , and reveal [my]0-i beloved [Delphi]82-delphi and [the heavens]1940-the heavens [themselves]1940-the heavens , and unlock the oracles of that sublime mind . [I]0-i will speak of mighty matters , not fathomed by earlier greatness , things long hidden . [I]0-i delight in journeying among the distant stars : [I]0-i delight in leaving [earth]1449-earth and [its]1449-earth dull spaces , to ride the clouds ; to stand on the shoulders of [mighty Atlas]546-atlas , looking down from far off on [men , wandering here and there , devoid of knowledge , anxious , fearing death]5487-men , wandering here and there , devoid of knowledge , anxious , fearing death ; to read the book of fate , and to give [them]5487-men , wandering here and there , devoid of knowledge , anxious , fearing death this encouragement ! O species , stunned by [your]1489-human beings terror of chill death , why fear [the Styx]194-the styx , why fear the ghosts and empty names , the stuff of [poets]5125-poets , the spectres of [a phantom world]5489-a phantom world ? Do not imagine [you]1489-human beings can suffer any evil , whether [your]1489-human beings bodies are consumed by the flames of the funeral pyre , or by wasting age ! [Souls]1405-souls are free from death , and always , when [they]1405-souls have left [their]1405-souls previous being , [they]1405-souls live in new dwelling - places , and inhabit what received [them]1405-souls . [I]0-i [myself]0-i ( for [I]0-i remember ) was [Euphorbus]1406-euphorbus , [son of [Panthoüs]1407-panthoüs]5490-son of panthoüs , at the time of the Trojan War , in whose chest was pinned the heavy spear of the lesser Atrides , [Menelaüs]1269-menelaüs . [I]0-i recognised the shield [I]0-i used to carry on [my]0-i left arm , recently , in [the temple of [Juno]513-juno at [Argos]28-argos , [city of Abas]5492-city of abas]5491-the temple of juno at argos , city of abas ! Everything changes , nothing dies : the spirit wanders , arriving here or there , and occupying whatever body it pleases , passing from a wild beast into [a human being]5493-a human being , from [our]5494-our body into a beast , but is never destroyed . As pliable wax , stamped with new designs , is no longer what it was ; does not keep the same form ; but is still one and the same ; [I]0-i teach that the soul is always the same , but migrates into different forms . So , [I]0-i say as [a seer]5495-a seer , cease to make [kindred spirits]5496-kindred spirits homeless , by wicked slaughter : do not let blood be nourished by blood ! ’ ‘[0-i] Since [I]0-i have embarked on [the wide ocean]3262-the wide ocean , and given full sails to the wind , [I]0-i say there is nothing in [the whole universe]5498-the whole universe that persists . Everything flows , and is formed as a fleeting image . Time itself , also , glides , in its continual motion , no differently than a river . For neither [the river]1711-the river , nor the swift hour can stop : but as wave impels wave , and as the prior wave is chased by the coming wave , and chases [the one before]5500-the one before , so time flees equally , and , equally , follows , and is always new . For what was before is left behind : and what was not comes to be : and each moment is renewed . [You]5501-i see the nights ’ traverses tend towards day , and brilliant light follow the dark of night . The sky has a different colour when all weary things are at rest , at midnight , than when bright [Lucifer]623-lucifer appears on [his]623-lucifer white charger , and alters again when [Aurora]569-aurora , herald of the dawn , stains [the world [she]569-aurora bequeaths to [Phoebus]519-phoebus]9037-the world she bequeaths to phoebus . The shield of [the god himself]9038-the god himself is red , when it rises from beneath [the earth]1463-the earth , and still red , when it is hidden below [the earth]1463-the earth , again : but is white at the zenith , because there the atmosphere is purer , and it escapes far from the contagion of earth . And [Diana]527-diana , the moon , can never have the same or similar form , and is always less today than tomorrow if [her]527-diana orb is waxing , greater if it is waning . ’[5501-i] ‘ Do [you]5501-i not see that the year displays four aspects , passing through them , in a semblance of [our]9041-our life ? For spring , in its new life , is tender and sap - filled , and like [a child]2050-a child : then the shoots are fresh and growing , delicate , without substance , quickening [the farmer]9043-the farmer ’s hopes . Then everything blossoms , [the kindly land]9044-the kindly land is a riot of brightly coloured flowers , but the leaves are still not strong . From spring , the year , grown stronger , moves to summer , and becomes [a powerful man]9045-a powerful man : no season is sturdier , or more expansive , than this , or shines more richly . Autumn comes , when the ardour of youth has gone , ripe and mellow , between youth and age , a scattering of grey on its forehead . Then trembling winter , with faltering steps , its hair despoiled , or , what it has , turned white . And [our]9041-our bodies themselves are always , restlessly , changing : [we]9041-our shall not be , tomorrow , what [we]9041-our were , or what [we]9041-our are . There was a time when [we]9041-our were hidden in [[our]9041-our first mother]9046-our first mother ’s womb , only the seed and promise of [a human being]5493-a human being : nature applied [her]9046-our first mother skilful hands , and , unwilling for [our]9041-our bodies to be buried , cramped in [[our]9041-our mother]9048-our mother ’s swollen belly , expelled [us]9041-our from [[our]9041-our home]2766-our home , into the empty air . Born into the light , [the infant]6424-the infant lay there , powerless : but soon it scrambled on all fours like a wild creature , then , gradually , helped by a supporting harness , it stood , uncertainly , on shaky legs . From that point , it grew strong and swift , and passed through [its]6424-the infant span of youth . When the middle years are also done , life takes the downward path of declining age . [Milon]1408-milon , [the athlete , grown old]9051-the athlete , grown old , cries when [he]1408-milon looks at those weak and flabby arms that were once like those of [Hercules]941-hercules , a solid mass of muscle . [Helen]1287-helen , [the daughter of [Tyndareus]1010-tyndareus]9052-the daughter of tyndareus , also weeps , when [she]1287-helen sees [an old woman]2330-an old woman ’s wrinkles in the glass , and asks why [she]2330-an old woman has been twice ravaged . Devouring Time , and [you]9054-your , jealous Age , consume everything , and slowly gnawing at them , with [your]9054-your teeth , little by little , consign all things to eternal death ! ’[5501-i] ‘ Even the things [we]9041-our call elements do not persist . Apply [your]9054-your concentration , and [I]5501-i will teach the changes [they]9055-they pass through . [The everlasting universe]9056-the everlasting universe contains four generative states of matter . Of these , two , earth and water , are heavy , and sink lower , under [their]9057-they own weight . The other two lack heaviness , and , if not held down , [they]9057-they seek height : that is air , and fire , purer than air . Though they are distinct in space , nevertheless they are all derived from one another , and resolve into one another . Earth , melting , is dilated to clear water : the moisture , rarified , changes to wind and air : then air , losing further weight , in [the highest regions]1885-the highest regions shines out as fire , the most rarified of all . Then [they]9057-they return , in reverse , revealing the same series of changes . Since fire , condenses , turns into denser air , and this to water , and water , contracted , solidifies as earth . Nothing keeps its own form , and Nature , [the renewer of things]9059-the renewer of things , refreshes one shape from another . Believe [me]5501-i , nothing dies in [the universe]9060-the universe as a whole , but it varies and changes its aspect , and what [we]9041-our call ‘[5501-i] being born ’ is a beginning to be , of something other , than what was before , and ‘[5501-i] dying ’ is , likewise , ending a former state . Though , ‘[5501-i] that ’ perhaps is transferred here , and ‘[5501-i] this ’ , there , the total sum is constant . For [my]5501-i part , [I]5501-i would have thought that nothing lasts for long with the same appearance . So the ages changed from gold to iron , and so the fortunes of places have altered . [I]5501-i have seen [myself]5501-i what was once [firm land]9061-firm land become [the sea]1464-the sea : [I]5501-i have seen [earth]1449-earth made from [the waters]1626-the waters : and seashells lie far away from [the ocean]1657-the ocean , and an ancient anchor has been found on [a mountaintop]9066-a mountaintop . The down rush of waters has made what was once [a plain]9067-a plain into [a valley]9068-a valley , and [hills]1659-hills , by the deluge have been washed to [the sea]1464-the sea . [Marshy land]9071-marshy land has drained to parched sand , and what was once thirsty ground filled with [a marshy pool]9072-a marshy pool . Here , [Nature]773-nature generates fresh springs , and there seals them up , and rivers , released by deep earthquakes , burst out or dry up , and sink . So when [the Lycus]1222-lycus is swallowed by a chasm in [the earth]1463-the earth , it emerges far off , reborn , from a different source . So , engulfed , flowing as a hidden stream , [the mighty Erasinus]1409-the mighty erasinus emerges again , in [the fields of [Argos]28-argos]9074-the fields of argos . And [they]9075-they say that [Mysus]1222-lycus , ashamed of [its]1222-lycus origin and [[its]1222-lycus former banks]9076-its former banks , now flows elsewhere , as [Caicus]451-caicus . [Amenanus]1410-amenanus flows sometimes churning [Sicilian sands]9077-sicilian sands , at other times dried up , [its]1410-amenanus fountains blocked . Anigrus , once drinkable , now flows with water [you]9078-you would not wish to touch , since , unless [we]9079-we deny all credence to [the poets]9080-the poets , the bi - formed centaurs washed [their]9075-they wounds there , dealt by the bow of club - bearing [Hercules]941-hercules . Is [the Hypanis]1411-the hypanis , born in [the Scythian mountains]9081-the scythian mountains , not ruined by bitter saltwater , that once was sweet ? [Antissa]452-antissa , and [Pharos]306-pharos , and [Phoenician Tyre]453-phoenician tyre , were surrounded by [sea]1450-sea : of which not one , now , is [an island]9083-an island . [The former settlers of [Leucas]454-leucas]9084-the former settlers of leucas lived on [a peninsula]9085-a peninsula : now the waves encircle [it]9085-a peninsula . [Zancle]386-zancle also is said to have been joined to [Italy]455-italy , till the waves washed away the boundary , and [the deep sea]2703-the deep sea pushed back [the land]1465-the land . If [you]9078-you look for [Helice]996-helice and [Buris]457-buris , [cities of [Achaia]139-achaia]9088-cities of achaia , [you]9078-you will find them under [the waters]1626-the waters , and [sailors]6225-sailors are accustomed , even now , to point out [the submerged towns with [their]9091-the submerged towns with their sunken walls sunken walls]9091-the submerged towns with their sunken walls . There is [a mound near [Troezen]188-troezen]9092-a mound near troezen , where [Pittheus]1051-pittheus ruled , steep and treeless , that once was [the flattest open space on [the plain]3515-the plain]9093-the flattest open space on the plain , and now is [a mound]9095-a mound . For ( strange to relate ) the wild strength of the winds , imprisoned in [dark caves]9096-dark caves , longing for [somewhere to breathe]9097-somewhere to breathe , and struggling in vain to enjoy the freer expanses of sky , since there was no gap at all in [[their]9098-their prison]9099-their prison , as an exit for [their]9098-their breath , extended and swelled the ground , just as [a man]5897-a man inflates a bladder , or a goatskin taken from a twin - horned goat . The swelling remained there , and has the look of [a high hill]2465-a high hill , solidified by long centuries . ’[5501-i] ‘ Though many instances [I]5502-i have heard and known of , come to mind , [I]5502-i shall relate only a few more . Does not water , also , offer and receive new forms ? [[Your]9078-you stream]9102-your stream , horned [Ammon]499-jupiter , is chill at mid - day , and warm in the morning and evening , and [they]9103-they tell of [the Athamanians]1412-the athamanians setting fire to wood by pouring [your]9078-you waters over it , when the moon wanes to [her]9104-her smallest crescent . [The Cicones]9105-the cicones have [a river]2448-a river , whose waters when drunk turn the vital organs to stone , and that change things to marble when touched . [The Crathis]1413-the crathis , and [the Sybaris]442-sybaris , here , near [[our]9107-our own country]9108-our own country , make hair like amber or gold : and what is more amazing , there are streams that have power to change not merely the body but the mind as well . Who has not heard of the disgusting waves of [Salmacis]756-salmacis , and [the Aethiopian lakes]9109-the aethiopian lakes ? [Whoever]9110-whoever wets [his]9110-whoever throat with these , is either maddened , or falls into a strange , deep sleep . [Whoever]9110-whoever slakes [his]9110-whoever thirst at [Clitor]1415-clitor ’s fountain , shuns wine , and only enjoys pure water , whether it is due to a power in the water that counteracts hot wine , or whether , as [the natives]9112-the natives claim , [Melampus]647-melampus , [[Amythaon]1416-amythaon ’s son]9113-amythaon ’s son , when [he]647-melampus had saved [the demented daughters of [Proetus]839-proetus]9114-the demented daughters of proetus from madness , by herbs and incantations , threw the remnants of what had purged [their]9112-the natives minds into [its]2448-a river springs , and the antipathy to wine was left behind in [its]2448-a river waters . The flow of [the River Lyncestius]459-the river lyncestius has the opposite effect , so that whoever drinks even moderately of it , stumbles about , as if [they]9110-whoever had drunk pure wine . There is [a place in [Arcadia]30-arcadia]9115-a place in arcadia , [the ancients]9116-the ancients called [Pheneus]460-pheneus , mistrusted for [[its]9115-a place in arcadia dual - natured waters]9117-its dual - natured waters : beware of [them]9117-its dual - natured waters at night , drunk at night [they]9117-its dual - natured waters are harmful : in the day [they]9117-its dual - natured waters can be drunk without harm . So , [rivers]8062-rivers and [lakes]1474-lakes can harbour some power or other . There was a time when [Ortygia]156-ortygia floated on the waves , now it is fixed , and [[the Argo]1418-the argo ’s crew]9120-the argo ’s crew feared the Symphlegades ’[5502-i] collisions , and the spray of [their]5502-i crashing waves , islands that now stand there motionless , and resist the winds . And Aetna that glows , with its sulphurous furnaces , was not always on fire , and will not always be on fire . For if [the earth]1463-the earth is a creature that lives , and , in many places , has vents that breathe out flame , [she]1463-the earth can alter [her]1463-the earth air passages , and as frequently as [she]1463-the earth shifts , [she]1463-the earth can close [these caverns]5504-these caverns and open others . Or , if swift winds are confined in [the deep caves]5505-the deep caves , and strike rock against rock , or against material containing the seeds of fire , and [Aetna]1333-aetna catches alight from the friction , [the caves]6674-the caves will be left cold when the wind dies . Or , if it is bituminous substances that take fire , and yellow sulphur , burning with little smoke , then , when the ground no longer provides rich fuel , or nourishment for the flames , and [their]5502-i strength fails after long centuries , [earth]1449-earth [herself]1449-earth will lack the support of devouring nature , and will not withstand that famine , and forsaken , will forsake [her]1449-earth fires . There is a tale of [men in Hyperborean Pallene , who are used to clothing [their]5508-men in hyperborean pallene , who are used to clothing their bodies in soft plumage , by plunging nine times in minerva ’s pool bodies in soft plumage , by plunging nine times in [[Minerva]1366-minerva ’s pool]5509-minerva ’s pool]5508-men in hyperborean pallene , who are used to clothing their bodies in soft plumage , by plunging nine times in minerva ’s pool : for [my]0-i part , [I]0-i can scarcely believe it : also [the women of [Scythia]5-scythia]5510-the women of scythia are said to practise the same arts , sprinkling [their]5510-the women of scythia bodies with magic liquids . ’ ‘[5510-the women of scythia] However if trust is only placed in proven things , do [you]5511-you not see that whenever corpses putrefy , due to time or melting heat , [they]5512-they generate tiny creatures ? Bury the carcases of sacrificed bulls ( it is a known experiment ) in the ditch where [you]5511-you have thrown them , and flower - sipping bees will be born , here and there , from the putrid entrails . After the custom of [their]5513-their parent bodies , [they]5513-their frequent [the fields]1522-the fields , are devoted to work , and labour in hope of harvest . A war - horse dug into [the earth]1463-the earth is the source of hornets . If [you]5511-you remove the hollow claws of land - crabs , and put the rest under the soil , a scorpion , with its curved and threatening tail , will emerge from the parts interred : and the caterpillars that are accustomed to weave [their]5516-their white cocoons on uncultivated leaves ( a thing observed by [farmers]5884-farmers ) change to a butterfly ’s form , symbol of the soul . Mud contains the generative seeds of green frogs , and generates them without legs , soon giving [them]5518-their legs for swimming , and , at the same time , with hind legs longer than [their]5518-their forelegs , so that they are fit to take long leaps . The cub that [a she - bear has just produced]5519-a she - bear has just produced is not a cub but a scarcely living lump of flesh : [the mother]2342-the mother gives [it]5521-it a body , by licking it , and shapes [it]5521-it into a form like that [she]2342-the mother has [herself]2342-the mother . Do [you]5511-you not see how the larvae of the honey - carrying bees , protected by the hexagonal waxen cells , are born as limbless bodies , and later acquire legs , and later still wings ? Who would believe , if [he]5522-he did not know , that [Juno]513-juno ’s bird , the peacock , that bears eyes , like stars , on its tail ; and [Jupiter]499-jupiter ’s eagle , carrying [his]499-jupiter lightning - bolt ; and [Cytherea]737-cytherea ’s doves ; all the bird species ; are born from the inside of an egg ? There are those who believe that when the spine decomposes , interred in [the tomb]2552-the tomb , human marrow forms a snake . ’ ‘[737-cytherea] Yet these creatures receive [their]5518-their start in life from [others]5836-others : there is one , a bird , which renews itself , and reproduces from itself . [The Assyrians]1419-the assyrians call it the phoenix . [It]5525-it does not live on seeds and herbs , but on drops of incense , and the sap of the cardamom plant . When it has lived for five centuries , it then builds a nest for itself in the topmost branches of a swaying palm tree , using only its beak and talons . As soon as it has lined it with cassia bark , and smooth spikes of nard , cinnamon fragments and yellow myrrh , it settles on top , and ends its life among the perfumes . [They]5526-they say that , from [the father]1852-the father ’s body , a young phoenix is reborn , destined to live the same number of years . When age has given [it]5525-it strength , and it can carry burdens , it lightens the branches of the tall palm of the heavy nest , and piously carries [its]5525-it own cradle , that was [[[its]5525-it father]5528-its father ’s tomb]5529-its father ’s tomb , and , reaching [the city of Hyperion]5530-the city of hyperion , [the sun - god]3192-the sun - god , through the clear air , lays [it]5525-it down in front of the sacred doors of [[Hyperion]745-hyperion ’s temple]5532-hyperion ’s temple . If there is anything to marvel at , however , in these novelties , [we]5533-we might marvel at how the hyena changes function , and a moment ago [a female]4052-a female , taken from behind by [a male]4056-a male , is now [a male]4056-a male . Also that animal , [the chameleon , fed by wind and air]5537-the chameleon , fed by wind and air , instantly adopts the colour of whatever it touches . [Vanquished India]774-india gave lynxes to Bacchus of the clustered vines , and , [they]5526-they say that , whatever [their]5526-they bladder emits changes to stone , and solidifies on contact with air . So coral , also , hardens the first time air touches it : it was a soft plant under the waves . ’ ‘[5526-they] The day will end , and [Phoebus]519-phoebus will bathe [his]519-phoebus weary horses in [the deep]1919-the deep , before [my]0-i words can do justice to all that has been translated into new forms . So [we]5533-we see times change , and these nations acquiring power and those declining . So [Troy]271-troy , that was so great in men and riches , and for ten years of war could give so freely of [her]5539-her blood , is humbled , and only reveals [ancient ruins]5540-ancient ruins now , and , for wealth , [ancestral tombs]5541-ancestral tombs . [Sparta]95-sparta was famous , great Mycenae flourished , and [[Cecrops]628-cecrops ’s citadel of [Athens]85-athens]462-cecrops ’s citadel of athens , and [[Amphion]893-amphion ’s Thebes]5542-amphion ’s thebes . [Sparta]95-sparta is [worthless land]5543-worthless land , proud [Mycenae]463-mycenae is fallen , and what is [the Thebes of Oedipus]464-the thebes of oedipus but a name , what is left of [the Athens of [Pandion]909-pandion]465-the athens of pandion , but a name ? Even now , there is a rumour that [Rome]11-rome , of [the Dardanians]1420-the dardanians , is rising , by [Tiber]411-the tiber ’s waters , born in [the Apennines]60-cloud - capped apennines , and laying , beneath its mass , the foundation of great things . So , growing , it changes form , and one day will be [the capital of [a whole world]5545-a whole world]5544-the capital of a whole world ! So , it is said , [the seers]5546-the seers predict , and the oracles that tell [our]5547-our fate . As [I]0-i remember also , when [the Trojan State]468-the trojan state was falling , [Helenus]1280-helenus , [son of [Priam]1181-priam]5548-son of priam , said to [a weeping Aeneas , who was unsure of [his]1321-aeneas future]1321-aeneas : “ [Son of [the goddess]5864-the goddess]7248-son of the goddess , if [you]7248-son of the goddess take careful heed , of what [my]0-i mind prophesies , [Troy]271-troy will not wholly perish while [you]7248-son of the goddess live ! Fire and sword will give way before [you]7248-son of the goddess : [you]7248-son of the goddess will go , as [one man]1607-one man , catching up , and bearing away [Pergama]349-pergama , till [you]7248-son of the goddess find [a foreign land]5552-a foreign land , kinder to [you]7248-son of the goddess and [Troy]271-troy , than [[your]7248-son of the goddess fatherland]5553-your fatherland . [I]0-i see , even now , [a city]3751-a city , destined for [Phrygian descendants]5555-phrygian descendants , than which none is greater , or shall be , or has been , in past ages . [Other leaders]5556-other leaders will make [her]5864-the goddess powerful , through the long centuries , but [one , born of the blood of Iülus]5557-one , born of the blood of iülus , will make [[her]5864-the goddess mistress of [the world]1448-the world]5558-her mistress of the world . When [earth]1449-earth has benefited from [him]5557-one , born of the blood of iülus , [the celestial regions]3886-the celestial regions will enjoy [him]5557-one , born of the blood of iülus , and [heaven]1501-heaven will be [his]5557-one , born of the blood of iülus goal . ” These things , [I]0-i remember well , [Helenus]1280-helenus prophesied for [Aeneas]1321-aeneas , as [Aeneas]1321-aeneas carried [the ancestral gods]5563-the ancestral gods , and [I]0-i am glad that the walls , of [[his]1321-aeneas descendants]5564-his descendants , are rising , and that [the Greeks]4756-the greeks conquered to a [Trojan]1321-aeneas ’s gain . ’ ‘[0-i] Now ( lest [I]0-i stray too far off course , [my]0-i horses forgetting to aim towards [their]5566-their goal ) , [the heavens]1940-the heavens , and whatever is under [them]5566-their , change [their]5566-their form , and [the earth]1463-the earth , and whatever is within [it]1463-the earth . [We]5569-we , as well , who are a part of [the universe]9060-the universe , because [we]5569-we are not merely flesh , but in truth , winged spirits , and can enter into the family of wild creatures , and be imprisoned in the minds of animals . [We]5569-we should allow [those beings]5571-those beings to live in safety , and honour , that the spirits of [[our]5569-we parents]5572-our parents , or [brothers]1493-brothers , or those joined to [us]5569-we by some other bond , certainly human , might have inhabited : and not fill [our]5569-we bellies as if at a Thyestean feast ! What evil [they]5571-those beings contrive , how impiously [they]5571-those beings prepare to shed human blood itself , who rip at a calf ’s throat with the knife , and listen unmoved to its bleating , or can kill [a kid to eat that cries like a child]5574-a kid to eat that cries like a child , or feed on a bird , that [they]5571-those beings [themselves]5571-those beings have fed ! How far does that fall short of actual murder ? Where does the way lead on from there ? Let the ox plough , or owe [his]5575-his death to old age : let the sheep yield wool , to protect against the chill north wind : let the she - goats give [you]5576-you full udders for milking ! Have done with nets and traps , snares and the arts of deception ! Do not trick the birds with limed twigs , or imprison the deer , scaring [them]5577-them with feathered ropes , or hide barbed hooks in treacherous bait . Kill [them]5571-those beings , if [they]5571-those beings harm [you]5576-you , but even then let killing be enough . Let [your]5576-you mouth be free of [their]5571-those beings blood , enjoy milder food ! ’ [His]5575-his mind versed in these and other teachings , it is said that [Numa]1401-numa returned to [[his]1401-numa native country]9121-his native country , and took control of [Latium]410-latium , at [the people]5829-the people ’s request . Blessed with [a nymph]6310-a nymph , [Egeria]1421-egeria , for [wife]5843-wife , and guided by [the Muses]578-the muses , [he]1401-numa taught the sacred rituals , and educated [a savage , warlike , race in the arts of peace]9125-a savage , warlike , race in the arts of peace . When , in old age , [he]1401-numa relinquished [his]1401-numa sceptre with [his]1401-numa life , [the women of [Latium]410-latium]9126-the women of latium , [the populace]9127-the populace , and [the senators]9128-the senators wept for the dead [Numa]1401-numa : but [Egeria]1421-egeria , [[his]1401-numa wife]1633-his wife , left [the city]2547-the city , and lived in retirement , concealed by [dense woods]9131-dense woods , in [the valley of [Aricia]469-aricia]9132-the valley of aricia , and [her]1421-egeria sighs and lamentations prevented the worship of [Oresteian Diana]527-diana . O ! How often [the nymphs of [the lakes and groves]9134-the lakes and groves]9133-the nymphs of the lakes and groves admonished [her]1421-egeria to stop , and spoke words of consolation to [her]1421-egeria ! How often [Hippolytus]1422-hippolytus , [[Theseus]958-theseus ’s heroic son]9135-theseus ’s heroic son , said to [the weeping nymph]9136-the weeping nymph : ‘[5836-others] Make an end to this , since [yours]5578-your is not the only fate to be lamented : think of [others]5836-others ’ like misfortunes : [you]5578-your will endure [your]5578-your own more calmly . [I]5836-others wish [my]5836-others own case had no power to lighten [your]5578-your sorrow ! But even [mine]5836-others can . If [your]5578-your ears have heard anything of [Hippolytus]1422-hippolytus , of how , through [[his]1422-hippolytus father]1775-his father ’s credulity , and the deceits of [[his]1422-hippolytus accursed stepmother]9138-his accursed stepmother , [he]1422-hippolytus met [his]1422-hippolytus death , though [you]5578-your will be amazed , and [I]5836-others will prove it with difficulty , nevertheless , [I]5836-others am [he]1422-hippolytus . [Phaedra]1423-phaedra , [[Pasiphaë]989-pasiphaë ’s daughter]9139-pasiphaë ’s daughter , having tried , vainly , to tempt [me]5836-others to dishonour [[my]5836-others father]5857-my father ’s bed , deflected guilt , and , ( more through fear than anger at being rejected ? ) , made out [I]5836-others had wanted what [she]9138-his accursed stepmother wished , and so accused [me]5836-others . Not in the least deserving it , [I]5836-others was banished by [[my]5836-others father]5857-my father from [the city]2547-the city , and called down hostile curses on [my]5836-others head . Exiled , [I]5836-others headed [[my]5836-others chariot]7053-my chariot towards [Troezen]188-troezen , [[Pittheus]1051-pittheus ’s city]9144-pittheus ’s city , and was travelling [the Isthmus]190-the isthmus , near [Corinth]63-corinth , when [the sea]1464-the sea rose , and a huge mass of water shaped itself into [a mountain]2275-a mountain , and seemed to grow , and give out bellowings , splitting at the summit : from it , a horned bull , emerged , out of the bursting waters , standing up to [his]5857-my father chest in the gentle breeze , expelling quantities of seawater from [his]5857-my father nostrils and gaping mouth . [[My]5836-others companions]2475-my companions ’[5836-others] hearts were troubled , but [my]0-i mind stayed unshaken , preoccupied with thoughts of exile , when [my]0-i fiery horses turned [their]5580-their necks towards [the sea]1464-the sea , and trembled , with ears pricked , disturbed by fear of the monster , and dragged [the chariot]5992-the chariot , headlong , down [the steep cliff]1794-the steep cliff . [I]0-i struggled , in vain , to control [them]5580-their with the foam - flecked reins , and leaning backwards , strained at the resistant thongs . Even then , the horses ’ madness would not have exhausted [my]1421-egeria strength , if a wheel had not broken , and been wrenched off , as the axle hub , round which it revolves , struck a tree . [I]1421-egeria was thrown from [the chariot]5992-the chariot , and , [my]1421-egeria body entangled in the reins , [my]1421-egeria sinews caught by the tree , [you]9149-you might have seen [my]1421-egeria living entrails dragged along , [my]1421-egeria limbs partly torn away , partly held fast , [my]1421-egeria bones snapped with a loud crack , and [my]1421-egeria weary spirit expiring : no part of [my]1421-egeria body recognisable : but all one wound . Now can [you]9149-you compare [your]9149-you tragedy , or dare [you]9149-you , nymph , with [mine]1421-egeria ? [I]1421-egeria saw , also , [the kingdom]2774-the kingdom without light , and bathed [my]1421-egeria lacerated body in Phlegethon ’s waves : there still , if [[Apollo]519-phoebus ’s son]9151-apollo ’s son , [Aesculapius]616-aesculapius , had not restored [me]1421-egeria to life with [his]616-aesculapius powerful cures . When , despite [Dis]758-dis ’s anger , [I]1421-egeria regained it , by the power of herbs and [Paean]532-paean ’s help , [Cynthia]981-cynthia , created a dense mist round [me]1421-egeria , so that [I]1421-egeria might not be seen and increase envy at the gift . And [she]981-cynthia added a look of age , and left [me]1421-egeria unrecognisable , so that [I]1421-egeria would be safe , and might be seen with impunity . [She]981-cynthia considered , for a while , whether to give [me]1421-egeria [Crete]88-crete or [Delos]897-delos to live in : abandoning [Delos]897-delos and [Crete]88-crete , [she]981-cynthia set [me]1421-egeria down here , and ordered [me]1421-egeria to discard [my]1421-egeria name that might remind [me]1421-egeria of horses , and said : “ [You]1421-egeria , who were [Hippolytus]1422-hippolytus , be also , now , [Virbius]1424-virbius ! ” Since then [I]1421-egeria have lived in [this grove]9152-this grove , one of [the minor deities]9153-the minor deities , and sheltering in the divinity of [Diana]527-diana , [[my]1421-egeria mistress]8635-my mistress , [I]1421-egeria am coupled with [her]527-diana . ’[1421-egeria] [Egeria]1421-egeria ’s grief could not be lessened , even by the sufferings of [others]5836-others : prostrate , at the foot of [a mountain]2275-a mountain , [she]1421-egeria melted away in tears , till [[Phoebus]519-phoebus ’s sister]5586-phoebus ’s sister , out of pity for [her]1421-egeria true sorrow , made a cool fountain from [her]1421-egeria body , and reduced [her]1421-egeria limbs to unfailing waters . This strange event amazed [the nymphs]5945-the nymphs , and [[the Amazon]5588-the amazon ’s son]5589-the amazon ’s son was no less astounded , than [the Tyrrhenian ploughman]5590-the tyrrhenian ploughman when [he]5589-the amazon ’s son saw a fateful clod of earth in the middle of [[his]5589-the amazon ’s son fields]5591-his fields first move by itself with [no one]1640-no one touching it , then assume the form of [a man]5897-a man , losing its earthy nature , and open its newly acquired mouth , to utter things to come . [The native people]5594-the native people called [him]5589-the amazon ’s son [Tages]1425-tages , [he]5589-the amazon ’s son who first taught [the Etruscan race to reveal future events]5595-the etruscan race to reveal future events . No less astounded than [Romulus]1392-romulus , when [he]1392-romulus saw [his]1392-romulus spear , that had once grown on [the Palatine Hill]8802-the palatine hill , suddenly put out leaves , and stand there , not with its point driven in , but with fresh roots : now not a weapon but a tough willow - tree , giving unexpected shade to those who wondered at it . No less astounded than [Cipus]1426-cipus , [the praetor]5597-the praetor , when [he]1426-cipus saw [his]1426-cipus horns in [the river ’s water]5598-the river ’s water ( truly [he]1426-cipus saw them ) and , thinking it a false likeness of [his]1426-cipus true form , lifting [his]1426-cipus hands repeatedly to [his]1426-cipus forehead , touched what [he]1426-cipus saw . Unable now to resist the evidence of [his]1426-cipus eyes , [he]1426-cipus raised [his]1426-cipus eyes and arms to the sky , like [a victor returning from a beaten enemy]5599-a victor returning from a beaten enemy , and cried : ‘ [[You]1538-the gods gods]5823-you gods , whatever this unnatural thing portends , if it is happiness , let it be the happiness of [[my]1426-cipus country]2452-my country , and [the race of [Quirinus]1397-quirinus]9157-the race of quirinus : if it is a threat , let it be towards [me]1426-cipus . ’[1426-cipus] Making a grassy altar of green turf , [he]1426-cipus appeased [the gods]1538-the gods with burning incense , and made a libation of wine , and inspected the quivering entrails of sacrificed sheep , as to what they portended for [him]1426-cipus . As soon as [the Tyrrhenian seer]5601-the tyrrhenian seer , there , saw them , [he]5601-the tyrrhenian seer recognised the signs of great happenings , not yet manifest , and when indeed [he]5601-the tyrrhenian seer raised [his]5601-the tyrrhenian seer keen eyes from the sheep ’s entrails to [Cipus]1426-cipus ’s forehead , [he]5601-the tyrrhenian seer cried : ‘ Hail ! [O King]9158-o king ! [You]9158-o king , even [you]9158-o king , [Cipus]1426-cipus , and [your]9158-o king horns , [this place]6354-this place , and [[Latium]410-latium ’s citadels]9160-latium ’s citadels , shall obey . Only no delay : hurry and enter the open gates ! So fate commands : and received in [the city]2547-the city , [you]9158-o king will be [king]5915-king , and safely possess the eternal sceptre . ’[5601-the tyrrhenian seer] [Cipus]1426-cipus drew back , and grimly turning [his]1426-cipus face away from [the city]2547-the city ’s walls , [he]1426-cipus said : ‘ Oh , let [the gods]1538-the gods keep all such things , far , far away , from [me]1426-cipus ! Far better for [me]1426-cipus to spend [my]1426-cipus life in exile , than for [the Capitol]5925-the capitol to see [me]1426-cipus crowned ! ’[1426-cipus] [He]1426-cipus spoke , and immediately called together [the people]5829-the people and [the grave senators]5604-the grave senators . First however [he]1426-cipus hid [his]1426-cipus horns with the laurels of peace , then standing on a mound raised by [resolute soldiers]5605-resolute soldiers , and praying to [the ancient gods]4368-the ancient gods as customary , [he]1426-cipus said : ‘ There is [a man here who shall be [king]5915-king , unless [you]9167-you drive [him]9165-a man here who shall be king , unless you drive him from the city from [the city]2547-the city]9165-a man here who shall be king , unless you drive him from the city . [I]1426-cipus will show [you]9167-you who [he]9165-a man here who shall be king , unless you drive him from the city is , not by name , but by a sign : [he]9165-a man here who shall be king , unless you drive him from the city wears horns on [his]9165-a man here who shall be king , unless you drive him from the city forehead ! [The augur]2368-the augur declares that if [he]9165-a man here who shall be king , unless you drive him from the city enters [Rome]11-rome , [he]9165-a man here who shall be king , unless you drive him from the city will grant [you]9167-you only the rights of [slaves]9170-slaves . [He]9165-a man here who shall be king , unless you drive him from the city could have forced [his]9165-a man here who shall be king , unless you drive him from the city way in , through the open gates , but [I]1426-cipus opposed it , though [no one]1640-no one is more closely connected to [him]9165-a man here who shall be king , unless you drive him from the city than [me]1426-cipus . [Quirites]1427-quirites , keep [the man]5875-the man out of [[your]9167-you city]6143-your city , and , if [he]5875-the man deserves it , load [him]5875-the man with heavy chains , or end all fear , with the death of [this fated tyrant]9174-this fated tyrant ! ’[1426-cipus] There was a sound from [the crowd]2430-the crowd , like the murmur from the pine - trees when the wild East wind whistles through [them]5608-them , or like the waves of [the sea]1464-the sea , heard from far off : but among the confused cries of [the noisy throng]5610-the noisy throng , one rang out : ‘ Who is [he]5875-the man ? ’[5611-they] [They]5611-they looked at [each other]2544-each other ’s forehead looking for the horns foretold . [Cipus]1426-cipus spoke to [them]5611-they again : ‘ [You]5611-they have here , whom [you]5611-they seek , ’[1426-cipus] and , taking the wreath from [his]1426-cipus head , [the people trying to prevent [him]1426-cipus]5613-the people trying to prevent him , [he]1426-cipus showed [them]5611-they [his]1426-cipus temples , conspicuous by [their]5611-they twin horns . [They]5611-they all sighed , and lowered [their]5611-they eyes ( who could believe it ? ) and were reluctant to look at that distinguished head . Not allowing [him]1426-cipus any longer to be dishonoured , [they]5611-they replaced the festal wreath . But since [you]5614-you were forbidden to enter [the city]2547-the city , [Cipus]1426-cipus , [they]5611-they gave [you]5614-you , as an honour , as much land as [you]5614-you could enclose , with a team of oxen , harnessed to the plough , between dawn and sunset . And [they]5611-they engraved horns on the bronze gateposts , recalling [their]5611-they marvellous nature , to remain there through the centuries . [You]5614-you Muses , goddesses present to [poets]5125-poets , reveal now ( since [you]5614-you know , and spacious time can not betray [you]5614-you ) where [Aesculapius]616-aesculapius , [son of Coronis]5617-son of coronis , came from , to be joined to [the gods of [[Romulus]1392-romulus ’s city]1392-romulus]5618-the gods of romulus ’s city , that [the deep Tiber]411-the tiber flows around . Once , plague tainted the air of [Latium]410-latium , and [people]1519-people ’s bodies were ravaged by disease , pallid and bloodless . When [they]5611-they saw that [their]5611-they efforts were useless , and medical skill was useless , wearied with funeral rites , [they]5611-they sought help from the heavens , and travelled to [Delphi , set at the centre of the earth]5620-delphi , set at the centre of the earth , to [the oracle of [Phoebus]519-phoebus]5069-the oracle of phoebus , and prayed that [he]519-phoebus would aid [them]5611-they , in [their]5611-they misery , by a health - giving prophecy , and end [[their]5611-they great city]5622-their great city ’s evil . The ground , the laurel - tree , and the quiver [he]519-phoebus holds [himself]519-phoebus , trembled together , and the tripod responded with these words , from the innermost sanctuary , troubling [their]5611-they fearful minds : ‘ [You]9175-you should have looked in a nearer place , [Romans]1428-romans , for what [you]9175-you seek here : even now , look for it from [that nearer place]9176-that nearer place : [your]9175-you help is not from [Apollo]519-phoebus , to lessen [your]9175-you pain , but [[Apollo]519-phoebus ’s son]9151-apollo ’s son . Go , with good omens , and fetch [[my]1482-the god child]6113-my child . ’[1482-the god] When [the Senate]5623-the senate , in its wisdom , heard [the god]1482-the god ’s command , it made enquiries as to [the city where [[Phoebus]519-phoebus ’s son]5626-phoebus ’s son lived]5625-the city where phoebus ’s son lived , and sent an embassy to sail to [the coast of [Epidaurus]960-epidaurus]5627-the coast of epidaurus . As soon as [the curved ship]5628-the curved ship touched [shore]2463-shore , [the embassy]5630-the embassy went to [the council of [Greek elders]5632-greek elders]5631-the council of greek elders , and begged [them]5631-the council of greek elders to give up [the god]1482-the god , who , by [his]1482-the god presence , might prevent the death of [the Ausonian race]5634-the ausonian race : so [the oracle]5867-the oracle truly commanded . [They]5631-the council of greek elders disagreed , and were of various minds : some thought that help could not be refused : the majority recommended [the god]1482-the god should be kept , and [their]5631-the council of greek elders own wealth not released , or surrendered . While [they]5631-the council of greek elders wavered , as dusk dispelled the lingering light , and darkness covered the countries of [the earth]1463-the earth with shadow , then , in [your]5638-your dreams , [Aesculapius]616-aesculapius , [god of healing]5639-god of healing , seemed to stand before [your]5638-your bed , [Roman]1429-roman , just as [he]616-aesculapius is seen in [[his]616-aesculapius temple]5640-his temple , holding a rustic staff in [his]616-aesculapius left hand , and stroking [his]616-aesculapius long beard with [his]616-aesculapius right , and with a calm voice , speaking these words : ‘ Have no fear ! [I]1482-the god will come , and [I]1482-the god will leave a statue of [myself]1482-the god behind . Take a good look at this snake , that winds , in knots , round [my]1482-the god staff , and keep it in [your]5638-your sight continually , until [you]5638-your know it ! [I]1482-the god will change into this , but greater in size , seeming as great as a celestial body should be when it changes . ’[1482-the god] [The god]1482-the god vanished with the voice , at once : and sleep , with the voice , and [the god]1482-the god : and as sleep fled , kind day dawned . When morning had put the bright stars to flight , [the leaders]8120-the leaders , still unsure what to do , gathered at [the temple complex of [that god whom [the Romans]1428-romans sought]5645-that god whom the romans sought]5644-the temple complex of that god whom the romans sought , and begged [him]1482-the god to show [them]8120-the leaders by some divine token where [he]1482-the god [himself]1482-the god wanted to live . [They]8120-the leaders had hardly ceased speaking , when [the golden god , in the likeness of a serpent with a tall crest]5646-the golden god , in the likeness of a serpent with a tall crest , gave out a hiss as a harbinger of [his]1482-the god presence , and by [his]1482-the god coming , rocked the statue , the doors , [the marble pavement]5647-the marble pavement , and the gilded roof . Then [he]1482-the god stopped , in the middle of [the temple]1675-the temple , raising [himself]1482-the god breast - high , and gazed round , with eyes flashing fire . [The terrified crowd]5649-the terrified crowd trembled , but [the priest]6252-the priest , [his]6252-the priest sacred locks tied with a white band , knew [the divine one]5651-the divine one , and cried : ‘ [The god]1482-the god , behold , it is [the god]1482-the god ! Restrain [your]1482-the god minds and tongues , whoever is [here]6115-here ! Let the sight of [you]1482-the god , [O most beautiful one]9182-o most beautiful one , work for [us]8901-the romans , and help [the people worshipping at [[your]1482-the god shrine]9184-your shrine]9183-the people worshipping at your shrine ! ’[6252-the priest] Whoever was [there]1878-there , worshipped [the god]1482-the god , as [they]5649-the terrified crowd were told , and [all]5784-all re - echoed [the priest]6252-the priest ’s words , and [the Romans]8901-the romans gave dutiful support , with mind and voice . [The god]1482-the god nodded , and shook [his]1482-the god crest , confirming [his]1482-the god favour , by hissing three times in succession , with [his]1482-the god flickering tongue . Then [he]1482-the god glided down the gleaming steps , and turning [his]1482-the god head backwards , gazed at the ancient altars [he]1482-the god was abandoning , and saluted [[his]1482-the god accustomed house]5658-his accustomed house , and [the temple where [he]1482-the god had lived]5659-the temple where he had lived . From there the vast serpent slid over the flower - strewn ground , flexing [his]1482-the god body , and made [his]1482-the god way through [the city centre]5660-the city centre to [the harbour]4555-the harbour , protected by [its]4555-the harbour curved embankment . [He]1482-the god halted there , and , appearing to dismiss [the dutiful throng , with a calm expression]5662-the dutiful throng , with a calm expression , settled [his]1482-the god body down in [the Ausonian ship]5663-the ausonian ship . [It]5663-the ausonian ship felt the divine burden , and the keel sank under [the god]1482-the god ’s weight . [The Romans]8901-the romans were joyful , and , sacrificing a bull on [the shore]2065-the shore , [they]8901-the romans loosed the twisted cables of [[their]8901-the romans wreath - crowned ship]5667-their wreath - crowned ship . A gentle breeze drove [the vessel]7095-the vessel : [the god]1482-the god arching skyward , rested [his]1482-the god neck heavily on the curving sternpost , and gazed at [the dark blue waters]5670-the dark blue waters . With gentle breezes [he]1482-the god reached [Italy]455-italy , over [the Ionian Sea]440-the ionian sea , on the sixth morning . [He]1482-the god passed [the shores of [Lacinium]437-lacinium]5671-the shores of lacinium , famous for [[Juno]513-juno ’s temple]4623-juno ’s temple , and [Scylaceum]475-scylaceum ; [he]1482-the god left [Iapygia]424-iapygia , and avoided [the rocks of [Amphrisia]476-amphrisia]5673-the rocks of amphrisia to [larboard]477-larboard , [the cliffs of [Cocinthia]478-cocinthia]5674-the cliffs of cocinthia to starboard ; [he]1482-the god coasted by [Romethium]479-romethium , by Caulon and [Narycia]480-narycia : [he]1482-the god passed [the narrow strait of [Sicilian Pelorus]481-sicilian pelorus]5675-the narrow strait of sicilian pelorus , and [the home of [King Aeolus]511-aeolus]5676-the home of king aeolus , and [the mines of [Temese]482-temese]5677-the mines of temese , and headed for [Leucosia]483-leucosia and [the rose - gardens of [gentle Paestum]484-gentle paestum]5678-the rose - gardens of gentle paestum . From there [he]1482-the god skirted [Capri]485-capri , and [Minerva]1366-minerva ’s promontory , and [Surrentum]1430-surrentum ’s hills well - stocked with vines , Herculaneum , Stabiae , and [Parthenope]403-parthenope , born for idleness , and headed for [the temple of the Cumean Sibyl]5679-the temple of the cumean sibyl . By [Baiae ’s hot pools]5680-baiae ’s hot pools ; and [Liternum]1432-liternum ’s lentisk trees ; and [the River Volturnus]486-the river volturnus , dragging quantities of sand along in [its]486-the river volturnus floodwaters ; and Sinuessa , frequented by white doves ; and unhealthy [Minturnae]1433-minturnae ; and [Caïeta]1434-caïeta , named after [her]5681-her whom [Aeneas]1321-aeneas [[her]5681-her foster - son]5682-her foster - son buried ; and [the home of [Antiphates]1349-antiphates]5683-the home of antiphates ; and [marsh - surrounded Trachas]5684-marsh - surrounded trachas ; and [[Circe]1337-circe ’s land]5685-circe ’s land ; and [[Antium]1435-antium ’s firm shore]5686-antium ’s firm shore . When [the sailors]3709-the sailors steered [[their]3709-the sailors ship]3283-their ship , under sail , to the place ( since [the sea]1464-the sea was now rough ) [the god]1482-the god unwound [his]1482-the god coils , and gliding along , fold after fold , in giant curves , entered [[[his]1482-the god father]1775-his father [Apollo]519-phoebus ’s temple]5692-his father apollo ’s temple , bordering the yellow strand . When [the sea]1464-the sea was calm , [the Epidaurian]5694-the epidaurian left the paternal altars , and having enjoyed the hospitality of [[his]5694-the epidaurian divine father]5695-his divine father , furrowed [the sandy shore]5696-the sandy shore as [he]5694-the epidaurian dragged [his]5694-the epidaurian rasping scales along , and climbing the rudder , rested [his]5694-the epidaurian head on [the ship]2497-the ship ’s high sternpost , until [he]5694-the epidaurian came to [Castrum]488-castrum , [the sacred city of Lavinium]5698-the sacred city of lavinium , and [[the Tiber]411-the tiber ’s mouths]5699-the tiber ’s mouths . [All the people]5700-all the people , [men]5788-men and [women]5877-women alike , had come thronging from every side , in a crowd , to meet [him]5694-the epidaurian , along with [those who serve [your]5704-your flames]5703-those who serve your flames , [Trojan Vesta]1436-vesta , and [they]5700-all the people hailed [the god with joyful cries]5705-the god with joyful cries . As [the swift ship]5706-the swift ship sailed up - stream , incense burned with a crackling sound on a series of altars on either bank , and the fumes perfumed the air , and [the slaughtered victims]5707-the slaughtered victims bled heat on the sacrificial knives . Now it entered [Rome]11-rome , [the capital of the world]5708-the capital of the world . The snake stood erect , and resting [his]5694-the epidaurian neck on the mast ’s summit , turned , and looked for places fit for [him]5694-the epidaurian to live . [The river]1711-the river splits here into two branches , flowing round what is named [the Island]489-the island , stretching its two arms out equally on both sides , with [the land]1465-the land between . There [the serpent - child of Phoebus]5711-the serpent - child of phoebus landed , and , resuming [his]5711-the serpent - child of phoebus divine form , made an end to grief , and came as [a health - giver to [the city]2547-the city]5712-a health - giver to the city . Though [Aesculapius]616-aesculapius came as [a stranger to [[our]5715-our temples]5716-our temples]5714-a stranger to our temples , [Caesar]508-caesar is [a god in [[his]508-caesar own city]5718-his own city]5717-a god in his own city . Outstanding in war or peace , it was not so much [his]508-caesar wars that ended in great victories , or [his]508-caesar actions at [home]2999-home , or [his]508-caesar swiftly won fame , that set [him]508-caesar among the stars , a fiery comet , as [[his]508-caesar descendant]5720-his descendant . There is no greater achievement among [Caesar]508-caesar ’s actions than that [he]508-caesar stood [father]5922-father to [[our]5715-our emperor]5722-our emperor . Is it a greater thing to have conquered [the sea - going]5723-the sea - going [Britons]1437-britons ; to have led [[his]508-caesar victorious ships]5724-his victorious ships up [the seven - mouthed flood of [the papyrus - bearing Nile]551-nile]5725-the seven - mouthed flood of the papyrus - bearing nile ; to have brought [the rebellious Numidians]5726-the rebellious numidians , under [Juba of Cinyps]1438-juba of cinyps , and Pontus , swollen with the name of [Mithridates]1439-mithridates , under [the people of [Quirinus]1397-quirinus]5727-the people of quirinus ; to have earned many triumphs and celebrated few ; than to have sponsored [such a man , with whom , as ruler of all , [you]5729-you gods]5728-such a man , with whom , as ruler of all , you gods have richly favoured [the human race]5809-the human race ? Therefore , in order for [the emperor]5731-the emperor not to have been born of mortal seed , [Caesar]508-caesar needed to be made [a god]1461-a god . When [Venus]1387-venus , [the golden mother of [Aeneas]1321-aeneas]5733-the golden mother of aeneas , saw this , and also saw that a grim death was being readied for [Caesar]508-caesar , [[her]1387-venus high - priest]5734-her high - priest , and an armed conspiracy was under way , [she]1387-venus grew pale and said to [every god in turn]5735-every god in turn : ‘ See the nest of tricks being prepared against [me]1387-venus , and with what treachery that life is being attacked , all that is left to [me]1387-venus of [Trojan Iülus]1440-trojan iülus . Will [I]1387-venus be [the only one always to be troubled by well - founded anxiety]9185-the only one always to be troubled by well - founded anxiety : now [Diomede]1073-diomede ’s Calydonian spear wounds [me]1387-venus : now [the ill - defended walls of [Troy]271-troy]9186-the ill - defended walls of troy confound [me]1387-venus , seeing [[my]1387-venus son]5963-my son [Aeneas]1321-aeneas driven to endless wandering , storm - tossed , entering [the silent house of shadows]9188-the silent house of shadows , waging war against [Turnus]1360-turnus , or , if [we]9189-we speak the truth , with [Juno]513-juno , rather ? Why do [I]1387-venus recall , now , the ancient sufferings of [[my]1387-venus race]9190-my race ? This present fear inhibits memory of the past : look at those evil knives being sharpened . Prevent them , [I]1387-venus beg [you]9191-you , thwart this attempt , and do not allow [Vesta]1436-vesta ’s flames to be quenched by the blood of [[her]1436-vesta priest]9192-her priest ! ’[1387-venus] [Venus]1387-venus in [her]1387-venus anxiety voiced [her]1387-venus fears throughout the heavens , but in vain , troubling [the gods , who though [they]5736-the gods , who though they could not break the iron rules of the ancient sisters could not break the iron rules of [the ancient sisters]5737-the ancient sisters]5736-the gods , who though they could not break the iron rules of the ancient sisters , nevertheless gave no uncertain omens of imminent disaster . [They]5736-the gods , who though they could not break the iron rules of the ancient sisters say weapons , clashing among black clouds , and terrifying trumpets and horns , foretelling crime , were heard from the sky : and that the face of the sun , darkened , gave out a lurid light , over [the troubled earth]5738-the troubled earth . Often , firebrands were seen , burning in the midst of the stars : often drops of blood rained from the clouds : [Lucifer]623-lucifer , the morning star , was dulled , with rust - black spots on [his]623-lucifer disc , and the moon ’s chariot was spattered with blood . The Stygian owl sounded its sad omens in a thousand places : in a thousand places ivory statues wept : and incantations , and warning words , were said to have been heard in [the sacred groves]5739-the sacred groves . No sacrifice was favourable , and the livers were found with cleft lobes , among the entrails , warning of great and impending civil conflict . In [the forum]5740-the forum , and around [[men]5788-men ’s houses]5742-men ’s houses , and [the temples of [the gods]1538-the gods]5743-the temples of the gods , dogs howled at night , and [they]5736-the gods , who though they could not break the iron rules of the ancient sisters say [the silent dead]5745-the silent dead walked , and earthquakes shook [the city]2547-the city . Still the gods ’ warnings could not prevent the conspiracy , or fate ’s fulfillment . Drawn swords were carried into [the curia]9193-the curia , [the sacred Senate house]9194-the sacred senate house : [no place in [the city]2547-the city]9195-no place in the city would satisfy [them]5736-the gods , who though they could not break the iron rules of the ancient sisters as scene for the act of evil murder but this . Then in truth [Cytherean Venus]523-venus struck [her]523-venus breast with both hands , and tried to hide [Caesar]508-caesar in a cloud , as [Paris]1187-paris was once snatched from the attack of [Atrides]1289-atrides , and [Aeneas]1321-aeneas escaped [Diomede]1073-diomede ’s sword . Then [Jupiter]499-jupiter , [the father]1852-the father , spoke : ‘[5736-the gods , who though they could not break the iron rules of the ancient sisters] Alone , do [you]5747-you think [you]5747-you will move the immoveable fates , [daughter]5903-daughter ? [You]5747-you are allowed [yourself]5747-you to enter [the house of the three]5749-the house of the three : there [you]5747-you will see all things written , a vast labour , in bronze and solid iron , that , eternal and secure , does not fear the clashing of the skies , the lightning ’s anger , or any forces of destruction . There [you]5747-you will find the fate of [[your]5747-you descendants]2955-your descendants cut in everlasting adamant . [I]0-i have read them [myself]0-i , and taken note of them in [my]0-i mind , and [I]0-i will tell [you]5747-you , so that [you]5747-you are no longer blind to the future . [This descendant of [yours]5747-you]5751-this descendant of yours [you]5747-you suffer over , [Cytherean]523-venus , has fulfilled [his]5751-this descendant of yours time , and the years [he]5751-this descendant of yours owes to [earth]1449-earth are done . [You]5747-you , and [Augustus]509-augustus , [[his]5751-this descendant of yours ‘ son]9198-his ‘ son ’[5747-you] , will ensure that [he]509-augustus ascends to heaven as [a god]1461-a god , and is worshipped in [the temples]5754-the temples . [Augustus]509-augustus , as heir to [his]509-augustus name , will carry the burden placed upon [him]509-augustus alone , and will have [us]5755-us with [him]509-augustus , in battle , as [the most courageous avenger of [[his]509-augustus father]1775-his father ’s murder]5756-the most courageous avenger of his father ’s murder .
