Under [his]509-augustus command , [the conquered walls of [besieged Mutina]492-besieged mutina]5758-the conquered walls of besieged mutina will sue for peace ; [Pharsalia]1441-pharsalia will know [him]509-augustus ; [Macedonian Philippi]1442-macedonian philippi twice flow with blood ; and the one who holds [Pompey]1443-pompey ’s great name , will be defeated in [Sicilian waters]5115-sicilian waters ; and [[a Roman general]5760-a roman general ’s Egyptian consort]5761-a roman general ’s egyptian consort , trusting , to [her]5761-a roman general ’s egyptian consort cost , in [their]5762-their marriage , will fall , [her]5761-a roman general ’s egyptian consort threat that [our]5755-us Capitol would bow to [[her]5761-a roman general ’s egyptian consort city of [Canopus]493-canopus]5763-her city of canopus , proved vain . Why enumerate [foreign countries]5764-foreign countries , for [you]5765-you or [the nations living on either [ocean shore]5767-ocean shore]5766-the nations living on either ocean shore ? [Wherever [earth]1449-earth contains [habitable land]7498-habitable land]5768-wherever earth contains habitable land , it will be [his]509-augustus : and even [the sea]1464-the sea will serve [him]509-augustus ! When [the world]1448-the world is at peace , [he]509-augustus will turn [his]509-augustus mind to the civil code , and , as [the most just of legislators]5773-the most just of legislators , make law . [He]509-augustus will direct morality by [his]509-augustus own example , and , looking to the future ages and coming generations , [he]509-augustus will order [a son]5939-a son , [Tiberius]1444-tiberius , born of [[his]509-augustus virtuous wife]5775-his virtuous wife , to take [his]509-augustus name , and [his]509-augustus responsibilities . [He]509-augustus will not attain [[his]509-augustus heavenly home]5776-his heavenly home , and the stars , [his]509-augustus kindred , until [he]509-augustus is old , and [his]509-augustus years equal [his]509-augustus merits . Meanwhile take up [Caesar]508-caesar ’s spirit from [his]508-caesar murdered corpse , and change it into a star , so that [the deified Julius]5777-the deified julius may always look down from [[his]5777-the deified julius high temple]5778-his high temple on [[our]5779-our Capitol and [forum]5781-forum]5780-our capitol and forum . ’ [He]508-caesar had barely finished , when [gentle Venus]523-venus stood in the midst of [the Senate]5623-the senate , seen by [no one]1640-no one , and took up the newly freed spirit of [her]523-venus Caesar from [his]508-caesar body , and preventing it from vanishing into the air , carried it towards the glorious stars . As [she]523-venus carried it , [she]523-venus felt it glow and take fire , and loosed it from [her]523-venus breast : it climbed higher than the moon , and drawing behind it a fiery tail , shone as a star . Seeing [[his]508-caesar son]1773-his son ’s good works , [Caesar]508-caesar acknowledges they are greater than [his]508-caesar own , and delights in being surpassed by [him]508-caesar . Though [the son]4706-the son forbids [his]4706-the son own actions being honoured above [[his]4706-the son father]1775-his father ’s , nevertheless fame , free and obedient to [no one]1640-no one ’s orders , exalts [him]4706-the son , despite [himself]4706-the son , and denies [him]4706-the son in this one thing . So great [Atreus]1268-atreus cedes the title to [Agamemnon]1270-agamemnon : so [Theseus]958-theseus outdoes [Aegeus]957-aegeus , and [Achilles]1161-achilles [[his]1161-achilles father]1775-his father Peleus : and lastly , to quote an example worthy of these two , so [Saturn]500-saturn is less than Jove . [Jupiter]499-jupiter commands the heavenly citadels , and [the kingdoms of [the threefold universe]9207-the threefold universe]9206-the kingdoms of the threefold universe . [Earth]1-earth is ruled by [Augustus]509-augustus . [Each]6651-each is [a father]5997-a father and [a master]9210-a master . [[You]9211-you gods]5823-you gods , [the friends of Aeneas , to whom fire and sword gave way]9213-the friends of aeneas , to whom fire and sword gave way ; [[you]9211-you deities of [Italy]455-italy]9214-you deities of italy ; and [Romulus]1392-romulus , founder of [[our]9215-our city]9216-our city ; and [Mars]635-mars , [father of [Romulus]1392-romulus]9217-father of romulus ; [Vesta]1436-vesta , [Diana]527-diana , sacred among [[Caesar]508-caesar ’s ancestral gods]9218-caesar ’s ancestral gods , and [you]9211-you , [Phoebus]519-phoebus , sharing [the temple]1675-the temple with [Caesar]508-caesar ’s Vesta ; [you]9211-you , Jupiter who hold [the high Tarpeian citadel]9220-the high tarpeian citadel ; and all [you]9211-you other gods , whom it is fitting and holy for [a poet]9221-a poet to invoke , [I]0-i beg that the day be slow to arrive , and beyond [our]9215-our own lifetimes , when [Augustus]509-augustus shall rise to [heaven]1501-heaven , leaving [the world]1448-the world [he]509-augustus rules , and there , far off , shall listen , with favour , to [our]9215-our prayers ! And now the work is done , that [Jupiter]499-jupiter ’s anger , fire or sword can not erase , nor the gnawing tooth of time . Let that day , that only has power over [my]0-i body , end when it will , [my]0-i uncertain span of years : yet the best part of [me]0-i will be borne , immortal , beyond the distant stars . Wherever [Rome]11-rome ’s influence extends , over [the lands it has civilized]9224-the lands it has civilized , [I]0-i will be spoken , on [people]1519-people ’s lips : and , famous through all the ages , if there is truth in [poets]5125-poets ’[0-i] prophecies , – vivam – [I]0-i shall live .
